Source: What a ridiculous question!\n\nTashmin is … he's part of this family. And it's a better family than the one I was born into, believe me.
Target: 그게 무슨 멍청한 질문이야!\n\n타시민은 ... 그 애는 우리 가족의 일원이야. 그리고 내가 태어났던 가족보단 훨씬 나은 가족이 될 거라고. 날 믿어.

Source: High King Emeric's truly blessed. He's survived another attempt on his life!
Target: 하이 킹 에밀리는 진실로 축복 받았습니다. 그는 자신의 인생에 대한 또 다른 시도에서 살아 남았습니다!\n

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: Of course, boss, I'm eager to see you in action. Bring me a posting and we'll be on our way.
Target: 물론이오, 대장. 당신이 행동하는 걸 얼른 보고 싶다오. 내게 게시물을 가져 오면 우린 길을 떠날 수 있을 거라오.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: There always seems to be something weird with those noble types. I think they go stir crazy without honest work. Not like us.\n\nIf they want to part with their fortunes willingly, you won't get complaints from me. Or you, I'd wager.
Target: 그런 귀족 타입에겐 항상 이상한 점이 있는 것 같아. 그들은 정직한 일을 하지 않으면 제정신을 잃나 봐. 우리랑 다르게 말이야.\n\n그들이 기꺼이 재산을 나눠 주고 싶다면, 난 불평하지 않을거야. 너도 마찬가지겠지, 틀림 없어.

Source: Muzgu asked me to kill him to stop the Omen from possessing him. I refused. Instead, we agreed to capture a Supernal Dreamer and trick the Omen into possessing them instead.\n\nVaermina will take the Supernal Dreamer and lock them in eternal nightmare.
Target: Muzgu asked me to kill him to stop the Omen from possessing him. I refused. Instead, we agreed to capture a Supernal Dreamer and trick the Omen into possessing them instead.\n\nVaermina will take the Supernal Dreamer and lock them in eternal nightmare.

Source: Gerarde made it to Master Muzgu safely. Muzgu refuses to return to the abbey, insisting that Gerarde should return alone.
Target: 헤라르데는 무즈구 마스터에게 무사히 갔다. 무즈 주는 게라르데가 혼자 돌아와야 한다고 주장하며 아베리로 돌아가는 것을 거부한다.\n

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: You outdid yourself this time. Thanks to your skill we got an even bigger payday than normal. Nice work.
Target: 이번엔 전에 없이 잘 하셨소. 당신의 재주 덕분에 평소보다 훨씬 더 큰 보수를 받았다오. 잘 하셨소.

Source: Northpoint was liberated, but did you hear what Baron Dorell did? He arrested his own son! That man is heartless, I tell you, Heartless!
Target: 노스 포인트는 해방되었지만 도럴 남작이 한 일을 들었습니까? 그는 자기 아들을 체포했다! 정말 무정하군!

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: finish quest
Target: finish quest

Source: The survivors' food supply was burned, forcing the camp dwellers to abandon the forgotten crypts. <<1>> was told of <<2>>'s death.
Target: The survivors' food supply was burned, forcing the camp dwellers to abandon the forgotten crypts. <<1>> was told of <<2>>'s death.

Source: They tried to make a fuss about the traces you left during the job, but <<1>> knows the value of a little blackmail to ensure the agreed upon price.\n\nYour share, boss. It may not have the beauty of stones, but I find the jingle quite fetching.
Target: 그들은 당신이 작업을 남은 동안 남긴 흔적에 대해 투덜거리려 했지만, <<1>>는 그것이 약정 가격을 보증할 작은 협박이라는 걸 알고 있다오.\n\n당신의 몫이라오, 대장. 그 돌들의 아름다움은 없지만, 짤랑거리는 소리가 꽤 듣기 좋다오.

Source: The survivors' food supply was burned, forcing the camp dwellers to abandon the forgotten crypts. <<1>> is nowhere to be found.
Target: The survivors' food supply was burned, forcing the camp dwellers to abandon the forgotten crypts. <<1>> is nowhere to be found.

Source: The survivors of the forgotten crypts were left to continue their cannibalism. <<1>> was told of <<2>>'s death.
Target: The survivors of the forgotten crypts were left to continue their cannibalism. <<1>> was told of <<2>>'s death.

Source: The survivors of the forgotten crypts were left to continue their cannibalism. <<1>> is nowhere to be found.
Target: The survivors of the forgotten crypts were left to continue their cannibalism. <<1>> is nowhere to be found.

Source: Their eyes shone brighter than the stones themselves. It was a simple thing to get them to part with a little extra for the flawless services you provided.\n\nYour cut, boss. Enjoy.
Target: 그들의 눈은 보석보다 더 밝게 빛났소. 당신이 제공한 완벽한 서비스로 약간의 추가 비용을 받는 것은 간단한 일이었다오.\n\n여기 당신의 몫이오, 보스. 즐기시오.

Source: <<1>> safely made it to the crypt, but her husband is nowhere to be found. She will leave the crypt while the search continues.
Target: <<1>> safely made it to the crypt, but her husband is nowhere to be found. She will leave the crypt while the search continues.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: <<1>> safely made it to the crypt, but her husband is nowhere to be found. She will wait at the camp while the search continues.
Target: <<1>> safely made it to the crypt, but her husband is nowhere to be found. She will wait at the camp while the search continues.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: Crime is dirty business, boss. Best to discourage it from getting dirtier. Show that we are squeamish and soon everyone will keep their precious things in outhouses and chamber pots.\n\nHave a soak and count your coin, it'll improve your mood.
Target: 범죄는 더러운 사업입니다, 대장. 더러워지지 않도록 최선을 다하십시오. 우리가 비명을 지르며 곧 모든 사람들이 옥상이나 방 냄비에 소중한 것을 지킬 것을 보여주십시오.\n\n 목욕물에 몸을 담그고 돈을 세면 기분이 좀 나아질 겁니다.

Source: I didn't think grime could stick to one so slick as you, boss. The buyers were quite pleased with the pace with which the goods passed through and dumped a tidy sum on our doorstep.\n\nGold has a way of clearing the air, does it not?
Target: 당신처럼 매끌매끌한 사람에겐 때가 달라 붙지 않을 것 같소, 대장. 구매자들은 물건이 빨리 도착해서 꽤 만족스러워 했고 길드 문 앞에 많은 돈을 두고 갔다오.\n\n금이 공기를 상쾌하게 해 주지, 그렇지 않소?

Source: We all owe you a debt of gratitude for freeing us. \n\nWe'll be safe for a while, but life won't really return to normal until someone drives out those mercenaries.
Target: We all owe you a debt of gratitude for freeing us. \n\nWe'll be safe for a while, but life won't really return to normal until someone drives out those mercenaries.

Source: Oh Breloth, my love! Do you see what we have for you? She would've loved this.\n\nFlowers, wine, food … everything will be perfect.
Target: 오 브렐로스, 내 사랑! 우리가 널 위해 뭘 준비했는지 알겠어? 그녀는 이것을 좋아했을 거야.\n\n꽃, 와인, 음식... 모든게 완벽할거야.

Source: This is good. Relieves Dro-Dara greatly. Many years we traveled together and many years we worked to make this plantation profitable. \n\nDro-Dara can abandon plantation. Good friends, he cannot.
Target: This is good. Relieves Dro-Dara greatly. Many years we traveled together and many years we worked to make this plantation profitable. \n\nDro-Dara can abandon plantation. Good friends, he cannot.

Source: Of course, just as you suggested.\n\nAnd the forged letters worked perfectly. Pimsy's days of slavery are over—his new life starts today.
Target: 물론이죠, 당신이 제안했던 대로요.\n\n그리고 위조된 편지는 완벽했어요. 핌시의 노예 시절이 끝났죠. 그의 새 삶이 오늘부터 시작될 거예요.

Source: I returned dreugh eggs to their nests and killed the dreugh encroaching on Wayrest. That's significantly reduced the chance the dreugh will invade the slums again. Soon, they'll go back to their spawning pools and leave the slums alone.
Target: 난 드레그의 알을 둥지로 가져간뒤 웨이레스트로 침범하는 드레그들을 죽였다. 덕분에 드레그들이 빈민가를 침범하는 일이 확실히 줄었다. 드레그들은 곧 그들의 번식지로 돌아가 빈민가를 건드리지 않을 것이다.

Source: Yes, they were collecting nirncrux. I defeated someone called Arnoth, a Scaled Court exarch.
Target: Yes, they were collecting nirncrux. I defeated someone called Arnoth, a Scaled Court exarch.

Source: What happens now?
Target: What happens now?

Source: No good comes from the Wood Orcs. Never forget Velyn Harbor!
Target: No good comes from the Wood Orcs. Never forget Velyn Harbor!

Source: Ha! There won't be an 'attack.' I don't have the soldiers to spare.\n\nAbbot Durak says you're a champion though, and I trust him. I believe you can do this on your own.
Target: 하! '공격'은 없을 거다. 나는 병사들을 쓰지 않을 거야.\n\n듀락 수도원장은 네가 챔피언이라고 말했고 나는 그를 믿는다. 넌 이 일을 혼자 할 수 있을 거야.

Source: I give up. I can't beat the Celestial Serpent.
Target: I give up. I can't beat the Celestial Serpent.

Source: The undead are gone from the ruins?
Target: 언데드들이 페허에서 사라질까요?

Source: I suppose so.
Target: 그런 것 같군요.

Source: I suppose so.
Target: 그런 것 같군요.

Source: I suppose so.
Target: 그런 것 같군요.

Source: Yes. You and the tree can both be at peace now.
Target: Yes. You and the tree can both be at peace now.

Source: I found your notes. The Veiled Heritance was using them to create liches.
Target: 이 기록을 찾았어요. 베일의 계승단이 이 기록을 이용해서 리치를 만들고 있더군요.

Source: What you accomplished at Tava's Blessing was a miracle! The gods are surely with you!
Target: 당신이 타바의 축복에서 이룬 것들은 기적이예요! 신들이 당신과 함께 하고 있네요!

Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: As I thought... the Blight did not spare our brethren at the fort.\n\nAs for you, I see you have returned uninfected. I know not what magic keeps you free of the Blight, but you have proven your claim of immunity.

Target: 바위에 부딪친 배가 하나뿐이길 바랄 뿐이야. \n\n난 이 일을 하는 내 직업을 잃어버릴 수도 있었어. 바라건대.. 만약 누가 네게 물어본다면, 봉화가 꺼진 게 내 잘못이 아니라고 말해줘.

Target: Yes, Nisuzi smells the blood on you. If this does not get the Hungry Cat's attention, I do not know what will!\n\nYou have our gratitude, walker. Khenarthi's breezes keep you safe!

Source: The keg must have dropped out of our wagon. Which is a little odd, given that my husband should have been sitting right by it.\n\nAh, well, no harm done. And here's a reward for your troubles. Not sure what we would do if we lost this beauty!
Target: The keg must have dropped out of our wagon. Which is a little odd, given that my husband should have been sitting right by it.\n\nAh, well, no harm done. And here's a reward for your troubles. Not sure what we would do if we lost this beauty!

Source: Exile is better than a spy like Aera Earth-Turner deserved. You're more merciful than I would have been.
Target: 망명은 아에라-어스-터너와 같은 첩자에겐 과분하지. 자네는 나보다 더 자비롭군.

Source: I hear you recovered the legendary sword of King Aphren. Bravo!
Target: I hear you recovered the legendary sword of King Aphren. Bravo!

Source: No tricks this time. One way or the other, I need to settle things with Tu'heiba. Otherwise, I'll never have any peace.\n\nTake this for your trouble, eh? Assuming Tu'heiba doesn't kill me, you should join us for drinks! Thanks again, good looking.
Target: No tricks this time. One way or the other, I need to settle things with Tu'heiba. Otherwise, I'll never have any peace.\n\nTake this for your trouble, eh? Assuming Tu'heiba doesn't kill me, you should join us for drinks! Thanks again, good looking.

Source: Ingride Vanne speaks highly of you. If you're high in her esteem, you're high in mine.
Target: Ingride Vanne는 당신에 대해 높이 평가하고 있어. 만약 그녀가 당신을 높게 평가한다면, 나 또한 당신을 높게 평가하지.

Source: Yes, Nisuzi can smell your victory from here! Sulfur, oil, and buckets of Daedra blood, yes?\n\nThis one cannot thank you enough, walker. A Baandari who cannot travel by night is no true Baandari. Please, take this, with our thanks.
Target: Yes, Nisuzi can smell your victory from here! Sulfur, oil, and buckets of Daedra blood, yes?\n\nThis one cannot thank you enough, walker. A Baandari who cannot travel by night is no true Baandari. Please, take this, with our thanks.

Source: Rhea sees but a sliver of what's to come. Princes unbound by Sotha Sil's compact move against Nirn. I retire to Moonshadow to prepare.\n\nVile's work in Vvardenfell was the first taste of something far worse. Ready yourself, child. Night draws near.
Target: 레아는 앞으로 무엇이 오는지를 보게 될 것입니다. 소사 실의 협정에 묶여있지 않은 데이드릭 프린스는 넌을 노리고 있습니다. 저는 준비를 위해 문쉐도우로 돌아갈 것입니다.\n\n바덴펠에서의 일은 훨씬 더 좋지 않은 일의 첫걸음에 불과합니다. 준비하십시오, 밤이 다가오고 있습니다.

Source: Wonderful! Here's a reward for all of your hard work, my valiant friend!\n\nCheck back with me each day. These Dragons won't keep themselves in check.
Target: 훌륭하군! 여기 힘든 임무에 대한 보상일세, 용맹한 전우여!\n\n매일 나에게로 와서 확인하게. 드래곤들이 스스로 확인하지는 않을테니 말이야.

Source: Or they wanted to keep it out of the hands of cruel, Daedra worshiping conquerors—not that the Dwemer were exactly saints themselves. If it was dangerous at one time, it's nothing more than inert stone now. A priceless lump of inert stone.

Source: Or they simply wanted to keep the Wrathstone for themselves. We don't know their reasons, yet, but this could be the key to understanding why.\n\nWhatever its history, the Wrathstone's just a lump of inert stone now. A priceless lump of inert stone.
Target: 아니면 단순히 그들 자신을 위해 Wrathstone을 지키길 원했을 수도 있습니다. 아직 그들의 이유는 알 수 없지만, 이것이 그 이유를 이해하는 열쇠가 될 수 있습니다.\n\n역사가 어찌되었든 간에, 이제 Wrathstone은 불활성 돌덩어리에 불과해요. 값진 불활성 돌덩어리입니다.

Source: The Wilderking could create a new tree in its place, or perhaps now we're meant to stay in paradise.\n\nIf <<A:1>> survives, we'll return again, and I'll know my decision was correct. If we never return, at least I'll be with my family to the end.
Target: 윌더킹께서 그 자리에 새로운 나무를 만드실 수도 있죠. 아니면 이제 우릴 낙원에 머물게 하실 수도 있고요.\n\n만약 <<1>>가 살아남는다면, 우린 다시 돌아올 거고 이 결정이 맞았는지도 알게 될 겁니다. 우리가 다시는 돌아오지 못한다면, 적어도 마지막까지 가족과 함께 있게 되겠네요.

Source: No, I told Master Fyr I wouldn't go. He just walked away. I … think he fired me? I'm just glad he didn't ask my sister.\n\nIf you have your heart set on an untimely death, Master Fyr's still intent on going.
Target: 아니, 나는 마스터 피르에게 가지 않을 것이라고 말했어. 마스터는 그냥 그 자리를 떠나셨어. 나는 ... 마스터가 날 해고했다고 생각해? 마스터가 내 동생에게 물어보지 않으셔서 그나마 다행이야.\n\n네가 일찍 죽겠다는 각오가 있다면, 마스터 피르는 아직도 가실 생각이 있으실거야.

Source: That idiot! I'm done with him and his stupid plans. I told him that when I left; he never listens to me. I love it here and I'm not leaving. Sorry my brother wasted your time. Here's some coin for your trouble.
Target: 그 멍청이가! 난 그놈이랑 그 멍청한 계획에서 손 뗐어. 내가 떠날 때 말 했는데, 듣지도 않았구만. 난 여기 있는게 좋고, 떠나지 않을 거야. 내 형제 때문에 시간 낭비하게 돼서 미안하군. 여기 곤란하게 한 것에 대한 배상이야.

Source: Back to Morrowind, I suppose. Or maybe I'll stick around the Gold Coast for awhile. See the sights. Take in the ambiance.\n\nIf you have some free time, hero, let's get together. Work on our mutual cooperation. Who knows? You might even enjoy it.
Target: Back to Morrowind, I suppose. Or maybe I'll stick around the Gold Coast for awhile. See the sights. Take in the ambiance.\n\nIf you have some free time, hero, let's get together. Work on our mutual cooperation. Who knows? You might even enjoy it.

Target: 그것에 대해 뭐라 할 말이 없네요. 나는 이것이 무엇인지 알고 있어요. 이 환영들은 메인이 그녀의 사람들을 이끌지 않는 미래예요. 힘뿐만 아니라 지혜도 함께요. 이것은 우리의 미래가 아닐거예요.

Target: 묘지만큼 심각하다오. 물론 농담이오. 하지만 구매자들이 겁을 먹었기 때문에 물건을 다른 곳에 떠넘겨야 했다오. 당신의 작업은 여전히 가치가 있었으니 거기 대해선 걱정 마시오.\n\n여기 당신 몫이오, 대장. 먼지가 덜 있는 곳에 그걸 보관 하시오, 응?

Source: Then the King of Thieves was watching over you! Let's see, let's see … ah, yes this will do. Yes, yes, yes. Fine offerings for Rajhin.\n\nDo not forget yourself when dividing spoils or Rajhin will think you a fool. Good thieves always take their cut.

Source: The Hound heard no tales, if he thought kidnapping a maiden would result in victory.

Target: 이제 제가 주위에 있다는 걸 아니까요? 그녀가 노력을 두 배로 들이고 가문의 돈으로 살 수 있는 모든 이점을 이용할 거라고 생각해요. 제가 하려는 일이었죠.\n\n어쨌든, 절 도와 주셔서 감사해요. 다음에 어떤 행동을 할 지 결정하면 알려 드릴게요.

Source: Excellent! I just hope no other pirate crews are stupid enough to try to loot the old tomb.\n\nI'm glad to have Spiritcatcher back, but I won't see you leave empty handed. Take this as a token of my gratitude for what you have done.
Target: 훌륭하군! 다른 해적들이 그 오래된 무덤을 약탈할 정도로 멍청하지 않길 바랄 뿐이야.\n\n스피릿캐처를 다시 돌려 받아서 기뻐. 하지만 네가 빈 손으로 가게 할 순 없지. 이걸 내 감사의 표시로 받아 줘.

Source: Cake? I don't know. This one came out so well, I might just keep it for myself.\n\nJust kidding! You earned this special cake. Wait until you taste it! I think you're going to be pleasantly surprised.
Target: 케이크? 나는 모른다. 이건 너무 잘 나왔어. 나 혼자만 가질 수있을거야.\n\n그냥 농담이야! 당신은이 특별한 케이크를 얻었습니다. 너가 그 특별한 케이크를 맛볼 때까지 기다릴게! 나는 네가 유쾌하게 놀랄 것 같아.

Source: Indeed. With Sir Croix slain, I am assuming command of Firebrand Keep for now.\n\nNeedless to say, preparations to march to Alcaire Castle have been called off.
Target: Indeed. With Sir Croix slain, I am assuming command of Firebrand Keep for now.\n\nNeedless to say, preparations to march to Alcaire Castle have been called off.

Source: All these wasted years, we've missed out on so much. Narahni wears them like a cloak—though with grace and style.\n\nI am … grateful … you convinced her to come here.
Target: 이 모든 세월을 헛되이 보내며, 우린 너무 많은 것을 놓쳤어. 나라니는 그 세월을 망토처럼 걸치고 있지—우아하고 세련되게 말이야.\n\n나라니를 여기 오도록 설득해 줘서 ... 고마워.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Well, that's something at least. I just wish we hadn't lost another Sister along the way.\n\nThat's enough for now, Assassin. <<1>> and I have much to discuss.
Target: Well, that's something at least. I just wish we hadn't lost another Sister along the way.\n\nThat's enough for now, Assassin. <<1>> and I have much to discuss.

Source: I heard that someone found a way into Fort Cradlecrush and defeated the Stormfist leader there.
Target: I heard that someone found a way into Fort Cradlecrush and defeated the Stormfist leader there.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: So you have chosen. So shall it be.\n\nYour allegiance has been pledged to Angof of the Reach.
Target: 선택을 내렸구나. 그렇게 될 것이다.\n\n너의 충성은 리치의 앵고프에게 서약될 것이다.

Source: This one knows, Hallowed. Former Mane Akkhuz-ri is here. Preparations have begun. Your path to the Two Moons Dance begins here and now.
Target: 이 몸도 알고 있답니다, 성자님. 전대 메인이신 아크후즈-리님도 여기 계시거든요. 이미 준비가 시작됐지요. 지금 여기서 쌍둥이 달의 춤을 향한 길이 시작되는 것이랍니다.

Source: How true were those visions?
Target: 그 환영들은 얼마나 사실이죠?

Source: Can you believe it? I saw Almalexia herself! I am forever blessed by the Healing Mother.
Target: Can you believe it? I saw Almalexia herself! I am forever blessed by the Healing Mother.

Source: How could anyone, let alone a Dark Elf, desecrate the Shrine of Saint Veloth? It's scandalous!
Target: How could anyone, let alone a Dark Elf, desecrate the Shrine of Saint Veloth? It's scandalous!

Source: Sadly, yes. The attack is underway.
Target: 슬프지만, 그렇소. 공격이 진행중이지.

Source: We'll just have to see, won't we?\n\nIn any case. For the lads and lasses here—thank you.
Target: 이제 보게 되겠지. 그렇지 않소?\n\n어찌 됐든, 여기 있는 젊은이들을 대표해서, 고맙소.

Source: Thank you so much! With everything that happened at Pell's Gate, I was afraid I'd never see her again. Please, take this with my gratitude.
Target: 정말 고마워요! 펠의 관문에서 일어났던 모든 일 이후로는 언니를 다시 보지 못할까봐 걱정했었거든요. 부디 감사의 표시를 받아 주세요.

Source: What! I knew I shouldn't have trusted that fool to get her here. Now I'm going to have to find someone else to marry me. It wasn't easy getting Munya to agree. When Fabanil gets here, I'm going to beat him bloody.
Target: What! I knew I shouldn't have trusted that fool to get her here. Now I'm going to have to find someone else to marry me. It wasn't easy getting Munya to agree. When Fabanil gets here, I'm going to beat him bloody.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: Glad I could help.

Source: You're the one who slew Master Muzgu, aren't you? Are you proud of that?
Target: 네가 Master 무즈구를 이긴 사람 맞지? 그게 자랑스럽니?

Source: And my reward?
Target: 내 보상은?

Source: Sad about Miranda Arcole, isn't it? But I guess you did what you could.
Target: Sad about Miranda Arcole, isn't it? But I guess you did what you could.

Source: No. Naemon seeks to corrupt all of Valenwood.
Target: 그래요. 네이몬은 발렌우드 전체를 오염시키려 하더군요.

Source: Here, these gems are for you.
Target: Here, these gems are for you.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘네요.

Source: The Fighters Guild is a nest of snakes. They should have put that Argonian to the sword.
Target: 파이터 길드는 뱀의 둥지입니다. 그들은 Argonian을 검이 있는곳에 두었어야했습니다.\n

Source: Is it really you? The one who saved Master Muzgu from the Supernal Dreamers?
Target: Master Muzgu를 숭고한 몽상가들에게서 구한 것이 정말 너라고?

Source: Thank you. I'll destroy this immediately.\n\nMy sister is all I have left. We'll learn to forgive each other. We have to, if we are going to rebuild.
Target: 고마워요. 당장 부숴버리겠어요.\n\n제게 남은건 이제 누나 뿐이에요. 우리가 재건하려면, 서로 용서하는 법을 배워야겠죠.

Source: That sack of skooma bought your freedom, and a reward for your cooperation.\n\nNow, stand aside. I've got business with these Khajiit.
Target: 그 스쿠마 자루를 넘겼으니 넌 자유를 보장받을 것이고, 협력에 대한 보상도 해 주지.\n\n자, 이제 물러서. 난 이 카짓들에게 볼 일이 있으니까.

Source: Jone and Jode dance kindly with you, walker. Whatever the findings of our esteemed Inspector, we're in your debt!
Target: 존과 조드께서 상냥하게 자네와 춤추실 거야, 보행자. 우리 존경받는 감독관님께서 어떤 결정을 내리시건, 우리가 빚을 졌군 그래!

Source: Truly? Well, at this point that should come as no surprise. Nonetheless, I will wait until later to give him this news. \n\nHis Majesty is dealing with a crisis here in Sentinel. You might be able to help him … if you are so inclined.
Target: Truly? Well, at this point that should come as no surprise. Nonetheless, I will wait until later to give him this news. \n\nHis Majesty is dealing with a crisis here in Sentinel. You might be able to help him … if you are so inclined.

Source: It's better for him if you end it now. Nobody should come back like that.
Target: 당신 손으로 직접 끝내는게 그에게 나은 선택일겁니다. 그렇게 된 사람을 되돌릴 순 없어요.

Source: Is it true, Lodorr came back from the dead? And you killed him again? Fantastic!
Target: Is it true, Lodorr came back from the dead? And you killed him again? Fantastic!

Source: You have to give him a chance. He's your son. There's always hope.
Target: 그에게 기회를 줘야 해요. 당신 아들이잖아요. 희망이 있을 겁니다.

Source: I was happy to help.
Target: I was happy to help.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울수 있어 기쁘네요.

Source: Here you are.
Target: 여기 가져가라.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: I need to think about what you've said.
Target: I need to think about what you've said.

Source: Here's the poison. Where's my money?
Target: Here's the poison. Where's my money?

Source: This Drillk thinks himself a king, does he? Fine, as long as he bows to the Pact.
Target: This Drillk thinks himself a king, does he? Fine, as long as he bows to the Pact.

Source: This one does not know what to think. A Khajiiti woman slain and a Daedra-worshipper advising the Fighters Guild? Strange times we live in.
Target: This one does not know what to think. A Khajiiti woman slain and a Daedra-worshipper advising the Fighters Guild? Strange times we live in.

Source: I hear someone found Fontbonne's stash. Must've been something special.
Target: 누군가 Fontbonne이 숨겨둔 것을 찾았다고 들었어. 아주 특별한 물건이었을 거야.

Source: I'm proud to stand with you, Khali.
Target: 당신과 함께 해서 자랑스럽습니다.

Source: I love mead. I love Voljar mead. Well, really, I love any mead. I'm not that particular.
Target: I love mead. I love Voljar mead. Well, really, I love any mead. I'm not that particular.

Source: Give me that, quickly. If the Imperials see it, we're both dead!\n\nPoor Belya. I'm afraid I lured him to his death. At least now I know not to wait for him any longer. Thank you for delivering this.
Target: 이리 내시오, 빨리. 제국군이 이걸 보면, 우리 둘 다 죽은 목숨이오!\n\n불쌍한 벨야. 내가 그를 죽음으로 꾀어냈다니 유감이오. 적어도 이제 더 이상 벨야를 기다릴 일은 없겠지. 이걸 전해줘서 고맙소.

Source: Well, if anyone can survive the planes of Oblivion, it's a Vinedusk Ranger.  Nara's tougher than wood.\n\nWe'll mop up the remaining Daedra and start rebuilding the outpost. Thanks to you, we won't have to fight a war on two fronts.
Target: 뭐, 만약 누군가가 오블리비언 차원에서 살아남을 수 있다면, 그건 덩굴그늘 유격대원일 겁니다. 나라는 나무보다 강하니까요.\n\n저희는 남은 데이드라를 소탕하고 전초 기지를 복구하겠습니다. 당신 덕분에 양쪽에서 전쟁을 치를 걱정은 없겠군요.

Source: Firsthold is under siege. The guard at the gates asked me to pass on a request for reinforcements.
Target: Firsthold is under siege. The guard at the gates asked me to pass on a request for reinforcements.

Source: Did you hear about Deepcrag Den? The poison leak? No one is really sure what happened.
Target: Did you hear about Deepcrag Den? The poison leak? No one is really sure what happened.

Source: Then it worked?
Target: 그럼 성공한건가요?

Source: I know you -- you're the one who saved Miranda from that awful husband of hers.
Target: 당신을 압니다. 당신은 미란다 부인을 그녀의 끔찍한 남편으로부터 구한 분이시죠.

Source: Ah, good! Arcarin promised these yesterday; we are always running low.\n\nI have been instructing new recruits on the use of siege weapons. Much ammunition is wasted.
Target: Ah, good! Arcarin promised these yesterday; we are always running low.\n\nI have been instructing new recruits on the use of siege weapons. Much ammunition is wasted.

Source: Don't be silly. Ah, here it is.\n\nTake my wand. It worked better for you, anyway. Remember me when you use it.
Target: Don't be silly. Ah, here it is.\n\nTake my wand. It worked better for you, anyway. Remember me when you use it.

Source: Teeth from the great blasphemer's mouth. We will keep them as reminders of the victory you won today in the name of the Great Cat.\n\nThis temple will honor you and this day forever more.
Target: Teeth from the great blasphemer's mouth. We will keep them as reminders of the victory you won today in the name of the Great Cat.\n\nThis temple will honor you and this day forever more.

Source: Excellent work silencing the target. You've proven your worth. Enclosed you'll find a reward and an invitation to Sanctuary.
Target: Excellent work silencing the target. You've proven your worth. Enclosed you'll find a reward and an invitation to Sanctuary.

Source: Teeth from the great blasphemer's mouth. We will keep them as reminders of the victory you won today in the name of the Great Cat.\n\nWe honor this great deed done in Alkosh's name! Take this with our gratitude.
Target: Teeth from the great blasphemer's mouth. We will keep them as reminders of the victory you won today in the name of the Great Cat.\n\nWe honor this great deed done in Alkosh's name! Take this with our gratitude.

Source: This one would not have seen if he had not been guided by wiser walkers. You have the bravery and heart of the old heroes who fought the White Snake on this mountain. Alkosh smiles on you, and so do we all. Take these offerings for your true faith!
Target: This one would not have seen if he had not been guided by wiser walkers. You have the bravery and heart of the old heroes who fought the White Snake on this mountain. Alkosh smiles on you, and so do we all. Take these offerings for your true faith!

Source: Only because Alkosh sent a miracle to set things right. You blessed champions cast down the false gods with such vengeance that this one wonders if the Dragon King of Cats did not strike the blows himself!\n\nWe offer you all the thanks we have.
Target: Only because Alkosh sent a miracle to set things right. You blessed champions cast down the false gods with such vengeance that this one wonders if the Dragon King of Cats did not strike the blows himself!\n\nWe offer you all the thanks we have.

Source: The golden liar's tongue. Ensuring it never again speaks its blasphemy is a fitting tribute to Alkosh! We will keep it as proof of your great deed, and the fate of those who would profane our worship of the Great Cat!\n\nTake this with our blessing.
Target: The golden liar's tongue. Ensuring it never again speaks its blasphemy is a fitting tribute to Alkosh! We will keep it as proof of your great deed, and the fate of those who would profane our worship of the Great Cat!\n\nTake this with our blessing.

Source: Then present yourself to our bishop, Azin-jo. With his blessing, you may proceed into the temple grounds and have your audience with the Divine.
Target: Then present yourself to our bishop, Azin-jo. With his blessing, you may proceed into the temple grounds and have your audience with the Divine.

Source: The old ghost was royalty? If Saviwa had that treasure, he would have never had to work a day in his life. Oh, well. Saviwa will find another way to be lazy.\n\nTake this for your efforts. It's no royal treasure, but it's the best Saviwa has to give.
Target: The old ghost was royalty? If Saviwa had that treasure, he would have never had to work a day in his life. Oh, well. Saviwa will find another way to be lazy.\n\nTake this for your efforts. It's no royal treasure, but it's the best Saviwa has to give.

Source: I have heard rumors of such a place. Just remember our agreement. Help me find a way to become what I once was and I will aid you against Molag Bal.\n\nI will find you in this city of yours soon enough.
Target: 그곳에 대한 소문을 들었어. 우리의 합의을 기억해둬. 네가 몰라그 발과 맞서는 것을 돕겠어. 내가 예전의 모습을 되찾을 수 있도록 도와줘. \n\n가능한 빨리 그 도시에서  당신을 찾겠어.

Source: You did well, my friend. Thanks to your efforts, we control the Chasm and can freely move troops between the Hollow City and the front lines.\n\nTake a moment to collect your thoughts, then come see me again. This gauntlet we must run is far from over.
Target: 잘 해 줬네, 친구. 자네의 노력 덕분에 우리가 균열을 통제하고 공허한 도시와 최전선 사이에 병력들을 자유롭게 이동시킬 수 있게 되었다네.\n\n잠깐 마음을 가다듬고, 다시 날 만나러 오게. 우리가 극복해야 할 시련은 한참 남았으니까.

Source: So I heard. Well done. \n\nHere, take this as a token of my appreciation. But don't get too comfortable. Matters of grave urgency loom on the horizon.
Target: So I heard. Well done. \n\nHere, take this as a token of my appreciation. But don't get too comfortable. Matters of grave urgency loom on the horizon.

Source: If rumors are to be believed, you saved King Emeric's life. Quite an honor!
Target: If rumors are to be believed, you saved King Emeric's life. Quite an honor!

Source: You saved Count Hosni from that terrible woman. Good riddance, I say!
Target: 넌 그 끔찍한 여인에게서 호스니 백작을 구했어. 아이구, 속이 시원해라!

Source: I appreciate your help and your concern, but what possible harm could glancing at a few dusty scrolls cause? Here, for your trouble. I seem to have some extra gold after adjusting my staff's compensation.\n\nOh, Stibbons, since you like to read ….
Target: 네 도움과 관심에 감사하지만, 먼지투성이 두루마리를 잠깐 본다고 무슨 해가 되겠어? 여기,고생한 댓가야. 직원들 수당을 주고나니 여분의 돈이 조금 있었어.\n\n 오, 스티븐스, 읽는 것을 좋아했던 당신은...

Source: He's dead. I found his journal and brought the cure.
Target: 죽었어요. 제가 당신 아버지의 일지를 찾아서 치료제를 가져온 거고요.

Source: Dead. I found his journal and brought the cure.
Target: 죽었어요. 제가 당신 아버지의 일지를 찾아서 치료제를 가져온 거고요.

Source: We were lucky to have the help of a five-clawed one such as yourself. I appreciate all you have done for me.\n\nNow, though it pains me, I must free my brother from his suffering. Good luck to you.
Target: We were lucky to have the help of a five-clawed one such as yourself. I appreciate all you have done for me.\n\nNow, though it pains me, I must free my brother from his suffering. Good luck to you.

Source: Feyne came here to please me. It's only fair we should return to Narsis to please her.\n\nThanks for helping me decide.
Target: Feyne came here to please me. It's only fair we should return to Narsis to please her.\n\nThanks for helping me decide.

Source: Thank the Three! And thank you, friend. Now I can do something to help these injured people.
Target: 세 명의 신들에게 감사를! 그리고 고맙네 친구여. 이제야 난 다친 사람들을 도울 수 있겠군.

Source: Zahari hopes they take such a lesson to heart. Our needs are great and the time to train is frightfully little to prepare against this Dragon invasion.\n\nThank you for your help on this matter.
Target: Zahari hopes they take such a lesson to heart. Our needs are great and the time to train is frightfully little to prepare against this Dragon invasion.\n\nThank you for your help on this matter.

Source: Hopefully, such a lesson has taught our recruits much. Their hearts may be brave, but it is their skill that will decide our battles against the Dragons.\n\nZahari is most grateful for your aid, warrior.
Target: Hopefully, such a lesson has taught our recruits much. Their hearts may be brave, but it is their skill that will decide our battles against the Dragons.\n\nZahari is most grateful for your aid, warrior.

Source: Excellent work. It will take our scholars time to decipher the writing, but Zahari has no doubt it will prove useful in the battles ahead.\n\nNo enemy is invulnerable, not even Dragons. This scroll proves that.
Target: Excellent work. It will take our scholars time to decipher the writing, but Zahari has no doubt it will prove useful in the battles ahead.\n\nNo enemy is invulnerable, not even Dragons. This scroll proves that.

Source: Today they watch a warrior at work. Tomorrow, they face the mighty threat of the Dragons who threaten us. And thanks to you, they are a little more prepared for such a fight.\n\nYou have this one's gratitude, warrior.
Target: Today they watch a warrior at work. Tomorrow, they face the mighty threat of the Dragons who threaten us. And thanks to you, they are a little more prepared for such a fight.\n\nYou have this one's gratitude, warrior.

Source: This one hopes our recruits have taken your demonstration most seriously. Each lesson learned is worth much in these troubling times of Dragons and mayhem.\n\nYou have aided us greatly, warrior. You have Zahari's thanks.
Target: This one hopes our recruits have taken your demonstration most seriously. Each lesson learned is worth much in these troubling times of Dragons and mayhem.\n\nYou have aided us greatly, warrior. You have Zahari's thanks.

Source: Around Dreughside they say you took Baron Sorick down a peg or two. Had it coming.
Target: Around Dreughside they say you took Baron Sorick down a peg or two. Had it coming.

Source: Excellent! Please, speak to my associates and they'll help you get started.\n\nHere's a small retainer to keep your interest. Generous, yes? Ha! Good hunting, walker.
Target: 훌륭해, 내 동료들에게 말하면 시작 할 수 있게 도와줄거야.\n\n여기 당신의 관심을 끌 만한 의뢰비가 조금 있어. 구미 당기지 않아? 하! 좋은 사냥 되기를, 방랑자여.

Source: There will always be some who are willing to choose risk over reason, but for now this threat has passed.\n\nTake this, along with my gratitude.
Target: There will always be some who are willing to choose risk over reason, but for now this threat has passed.\n\nTake this, along with my gratitude.

Source: And so we gain another arrow in our quiver. Thank Jone and Jode.\n\nAnd thank you as well, warrior. Zahari has a feeling that this scroll will prove more than useful, once our scholars decipher it.
Target: And so we gain another arrow in our quiver. Thank Jone and Jode.\n\nAnd thank you as well, warrior. Zahari has a feeling that this scroll will prove more than useful, once our scholars decipher it.

Source: Your work is most appreciated, warrior. Anything we can learn about the Dragons is a closer step to victory.\n\nThis one will notify our scholars immediately. They will want to start their studies.
Target: Your work is most appreciated, warrior. Anything we can learn about the Dragons is a closer step to victory.\n\nThis one will notify our scholars immediately. They will want to start their studies.

Source: I had a sister stationed at Grimwatch. Thanks for what you did for them.
Target: I had a sister stationed at Grimwatch. Thanks for what you did for them.

Source: You don't sound surprised.
Target: 별로 놀란 것 같지는 않네요.

Source: Do you have a plan?
Target: Do you have a plan?

Source: Damn his stubborness! And yet, I love him for his sense of honor.\n\nI must go. The others are waiting. <<1>> will remain, the caretaker of our only link with Tamriel. I'll make sure our child knows him, and what he gave up to protect our way of life.
Target: 고집불통 같으니! 그렇긴 해도, 그 명예로움이 사랑스러운 거죠.\n\n전 떠나야 해요. 다른 사람들이 기다리고 있어요. <<1>>는 관리인으로 남아서 저희와 탐리엘 사이의 유일한 연결고리가 되겠죠. 아이한테 확실하게 알려 주겠어요. 저희의 삶을 지키기 위해 그이가 뭘 포기했는지를요.

Source: My father's dead? Vivec's wrath, what in Oblivion happened? Those notes you found … what was my father doing in this place?\n\nPlease, leave me. I need to think.
Target: My father's dead? Vivec's wrath, what in Oblivion happened? Those notes you found … what was my father doing in this place?\n\nPlease, leave me. I need to think.

Source: So you have chosen. So shall it be.\n\nYour allegiance has been pledged to Kinlady Estre of the Summerset Isles.
Target: 선택을 내렸구나. 그렇게 될 것이다.\n\n너의 충성은 서머셋 군도의 혈족부인 에스트리에게 서약될 것이다.

Source: Yes, he did, and he told me a most peculiar tale. \n\nI owe you for getting him out of this mess. Take these coins. It's the least I can do.
Target: Yes, he did, and he told me a most peculiar tale. \n\nI owe you for getting him out of this mess. Take these coins. It's the least I can do.

Source: Long may you prosper, wayfarer. You have lifted a great burden from me.
Target: Long may you prosper, wayfarer. You have lifted a great burden from me.

Source: So you have chosen. So shall it be.\n\nYour allegiance has been pledged to Thallik Wormtongue.
Target: 선택을 내렸구나. 그렇게 될 것이다.\n\n너의 충성은 벌레아비 탈릭님께 서약될 것이다.

Source: He's alive, though? Ayem bless you, my friend. I'll get things squared away here and make my way to the tower.\n\nI can't believe my fortune, running into you here. Thank you for your help.
Target: 그가 살아있어? 아옘(*아말렉시아)의 축복이 함께하기를, 친구여.  여기서의 일을 끝내고 탑으로 가야겠어.\n\n여기서 당신을 우연히 만나다니, 내 운명을 믿을 수 없네. 도와줘서 고마워.

Source: Well, it's not like you killed the Dragon. But you killed everyone who did kill it, so next best thing. Slaying the Dragonguard and his vampire cohort merits a key.\n\nNow go wash the taste of blood out of your mouth with some ale.
Target: Well, it's not like you killed the Dragon. But you killed everyone who did kill it, so next best thing. Slaying the Dragonguard and his vampire cohort merits a key.\n\nNow go wash the taste of blood out of your mouth with some ale.

Source: Turning Moongrave into a graveyard is worthy of reward. Put it toward some silver boot caps for the next time you run roughshod over a bunch of bloodsuckers.
Target: Turning Moongrave into a graveyard is worthy of reward. Put it toward some silver boot caps for the next time you run roughshod over a bunch of bloodsuckers.

Source: I release you to your final rest. Farewell, King Donel.
Target: I release you to your final rest. Farewell, King Donel.

Source: That Hollowfang alchemy got the Dragonguard's blood boiling, eh? Defeating Grundwulf at the height of his bloodlust must've been a glorious battle alright. \n\nGets me flush just thinking about it. Might give you more than a key next time you swing by.
Target: That Hollowfang alchemy got the Dragonguard's blood boiling, eh? Defeating Grundwulf at the height of his bloodlust must've been a glorious battle alright. \n\nGets me flush just thinking about it. Might give you more than a key next time you swing by.

Source: Yes. They're imprisoned. The guardian said we need to cleanse the standing stones.
Target: 네. 그들은 속박되었어요. 수호자가 돌을 정화해야 한다고 했습니다.

Source: Bet you thought you had a nice cozy pledge before the Dragon turned Selene against you. Not just anyone could have faced down Maarselok and the Changeling at the same time. Selene better behave, eh?\n\nTake your reward, Undaunted. You earned it.
Target: Bet you thought you had a nice cozy pledge before the Dragon turned Selene against you. Not just anyone could have faced down Maarselok and the Changeling at the same time. Selene better behave, eh?\n\nTake your reward, Undaunted. You earned it.

Source: You fulfilled your pledge, even if you had help from a vengeful nature spirit. Can't say I wouldn't enjoy beating a Dragon like a festival effigy given the opportunity. Just give the next one a fighting chance.\n\nHere's your key and cut.
Target: You fulfilled your pledge, even if you had help from a vengeful nature spirit. Can't say I wouldn't enjoy beating a Dragon like a festival effigy given the opportunity. Just give the next one a fighting chance.\n\nHere's your key and cut.

Source: Here. This was a gift from King Camoran. It's yours now. Payment in kind. With some gratitude on the house.
Target: Here. This was a gift from King Camoran. It's yours now. Payment in kind. With some gratitude on the house.

Source: Only through your works and your devotion. Were it not for you, this one would still blindly follow a false god.\n\nAzin-jo is not fit to give you Alkosh's blessings, but they are all he has to offer. May the Great Cat keep your path true.
Target: Only through your works and your devotion. Were it not for you, this one would still blindly follow a false god.\n\nAzin-jo is not fit to give you Alkosh's blessings, but they are all he has to offer. May the Great Cat keep your path true.

Source: I heard that they discovered a Light of Meridia floating above the Library of Dusk.
Target: I heard that they discovered a Light of Meridia floating above the Library of Dusk.

Source: I have defeated Captain Blackheart, who was under the thrall of an evil power. The seas of Tamriel are free from Blackheart's menace.
Target: I have defeated Captain Blackheart, who was under the thrall of an evil power. The seas of Tamriel are free from Blackheart's menace.

Source: Killing a Dragon's worth bragging about, even with Selene's help. From what I heard it'd already killed an army of Wood Elves before you arrived. They'll be cheering your name all over Grahtwood for slaying that monster.
Target: Killing a Dragon's worth bragging about, even with Selene's help. From what I heard it'd already killed an army of Wood Elves before you arrived. They'll be cheering your name all over Grahtwood for slaying that monster.

Source: You are the one who destroyed the Withered Hand! You are a hero!
Target: 당신은 메마른 손을 무찌른 분입니다! 당신은 영웅이에요!

Source: I don't know. I'll go wherever I'm supposed to go, I guess. Wherever it is, it has to be better than here.\n\nThank you. Now, if you'll excuse me.
Target: 나도 모르겠군. 내가 가야만 하는 곳으로 가게 될 것 같아. 그게 어디든지간에 여기보다는 나은 곳이겠지.\n\n고마워. 이제 이만 실례하지.

Source: You did what you could. I somehow knew it would end this way.\n\nThank you for listening to a mother's plea. I'd like to be alone now.
Target: 할 수 있는 일을 해 주셨네요. 어떻게든 이런 식으로 끝날 줄은 알았어요.\n\n어머니의 간청을 들어 주셔서 고마워요. 지금은 혼자 있고 싶네요.

Source: That's right. I'll collect Nelulin on the way out. I think maybe we'll retire to the countryside. \n\nThat sounds nice. Goodbye.
Target: 좋아요. 가는 길에 넬룰린을 데려올 거에요. 아마도 우린 한적한 시골로 내려가 살겠지요.\n\n그거 좋은 생각이네요. 잘 가요.

Source: Great to hear it. Now quiet down or you'll get us both killed!
Target: 그말을 들으니 기쁘군. 이제 조용히 해, 아니면 우리 둘 다 살해 당할거야!\n

Source: Oh. I'm almost afraid to ask what happened. I hope this trial wasn't too painful ….\n\nI'll start translating this book right away. We've got one more trial to go. Nice work.
Target: 오. 무슨일이 있었는지 물어보기 두렵군요. 이번 시험이 고통스럽지 않았기를 빌게요....\n\n지금부터 책을 해독해야겠어요. 이제 마지막 하나의 시험만 남았군요. 잘 하셨어요.

Source: And here's your reward, as promised.\n\nIf you ever need someone to put in a good word for you, let me know. I always repay my debts.
Target: And here's your reward, as promised.\n\nIf you ever need someone to put in a good word for you, let me know. I always repay my debts.

Source: Harim and whoever he works for have Duke Sebastien, ruler of Camlorn, hostage. The package Chamberlain Weller hired me to deliver was a ransom. \n\nWeller now believes the Red Rooks do not negotiate in good faith, and has another plan.
Target: Harim and whoever he works for have Duke Sebastien, ruler of Camlorn, hostage. The package Chamberlain Weller hired me to deliver was a ransom. \n\nWeller now believes the Red Rooks do not negotiate in good faith, and has another plan.

Source: Give me the Fang. I've got a special coffer to shield me from its magic. What happened to <<1>> need not happen to anyone else.\n\nPoor bastard. I'm glad he survived. But he only had one Fang of Sithis? There should be two. Hmm.
Target: Give me the Fang. I've got a special coffer to shield me from its magic. What happened to <<1>> need not happen to anyone else.\n\nPoor bastard. I'm glad he survived. But he only had one Fang of Sithis? There should be two. Hmm.

Source: Fascinating. That's not what I expected. Perhaps I should pick up an alchemical text or two, purely to augment my own talent, of course.\n\nThank you. Swim swiftly.
Target: Fascinating. That's not what I expected. Perhaps I should pick up an alchemical text or two, purely to augment my own talent, of course.\n\nThank you. Swim swiftly.

Source: Will the High Elves build our embassy even uglier than theirs? But no, this one shouldn't complain.
Target: Will the High Elves build our embassy even uglier than theirs? But no, this one shouldn't complain.

Source: Here is the Ring of Stendarr's Mercy. The Abbey of Blades was destroyed.
Target: 여기 스텐다르의 자비의 반지입니다. 검의 수도원은 파괴되었죠.

Source: I've explored the entirety of the Archive, and defeated the opponents within.
Target: I've explored the entirety of the Archive, and defeated the opponents within.

Source: As you say, Sai.
Target: 그렇게 하시죠, 사이.

Source: I've explored Hel Ra Citadel and defeated the opponents within.
Target: I've explored Hel Ra Citadel and defeated the opponents within.

Source: My scales are truly dry now, my friend. I erect the spine of regret.\n\nSomeday, I will cool my tail in the River of Humor. My quest continues.
Target: My scales are truly dry now, my friend. I erect the spine of regret.\n\nSomeday, I will cool my tail in the River of Humor. My quest continues.

Source: A thousand curses on the Reachmen! Sinmur must be stopped, somehow.
Target: 리치맨놈들이 온갖 저주를 받기를! 신무르를 반드시 멈춰야해.\n

Source: You made the right choice, outsider. Life must always be preserved and cherished, even a life of pain and suffering and bondage.\n\nWhen the time comes, my warriors will be yours to command. Perhaps if you succeed, the Hist can finally be free.
Target: 옳은 결정을 내려주신 거요, 외부인. 생명은 항상 보존되고 소중히 여겨져야 하지. 설령 고통과 괴로움, 속박의 삶이라고 해도 말이외다.\n\n때가 오면 우리 전사들은 당신의 지시를 따를 것이오. 만약 당신이 성공한다면, 히스트도 마침내 자유로워질지도 모르겠소이다.

Source: In the meantime, keep an eye out during your travels. There are many lost tomes scattered throughout Tamriel.\n\nWho knows? Any one of these books may help us restore Shalidor's lost island haven.
Target: 그 사이에, 여행하는 동안 주의 깊게 살펴봐 주세요. 탐리엘에는 잃어버린 책들이 곳곳에 있거든요.\n\n그 책들 중에 샬리도어님의 잃어버린 낙원을 되찾는데 도움이 될 만한 책이 있을지 누가 알겠어요?

Source: Meet Sara with all three elements.
Target: Meet Sara with all three elements.

Source: Thank you, outsider. Because of you, the Hist tree's eternal suffering and enslavement shall finally come to an end.\n\nWe shall mourn the Hist, but we shall also find solace now that its pain and torment is over. When you need us, we shall be there.
Target: 고맙소이다, 외부인이여. 당신 덕분에 히스트 나무의 영원한 고통과 노예 상태가 드디어 종말을 향해 가는구려.\n\n우리는 히스트를 애도하겠지만, 이제 그 고통과 고문이 끝났다는 것에서 위안도 찾게 될 것이오. 우리가 필요한 때가 오면, 바로 옆에 있으리다.

Source: Indeed! Your efforts will be rewarded, my featherless subject. You are the first to satisfy the terms of our toll.\n\nI hereby bestow upon you citizenship in these woods, as well as vassal servants to aid you. Welcome to Crow's Wood, fledgling.
Target: 실로 그러하다!네가 우리에게 준 공물은 처음으로 우리를 만족시켰으니. 나의 깃털 없는 백성은, 노력에 대한 보상을 받게 될 것이다. \n\n봉사에 대한 보답으로 네게, 이 나무에서의 시민권을 주마. 까마귀들의 숲(Crow's Wood)에 온 걸 환영하마, 아기 새야.

Source: Thank you.
Target: 고맙습니다.

Source: Our former master gave him this necklace. My son wore it to remind himself that not every Dark Elf is cruel.\n\nAt least <<1>> returned to the Hist a free Argonian. Thank you for finding him.
Target: Our former master gave him this necklace. My son wore it to remind himself that not every Dark Elf is cruel.\n\nAt least <<1>> returned to the Hist a free Argonian. Thank you for finding him.

Source: You've done more than many would do—more than many would be capable of. I think my friends and I will need to recuperate before setting out to sea again.
Target: 당신은 많은 사람들이 할 수 있었던 일보다 더 많은 일을 했소. 내 친구들과 나는 다시 바다로 나가기 전에 회복을 해야 할 것 같소.

Source: I think she wants you to have her sword.
Target: 나는 네가 칼을 갖고 싶어한다고 생각해.\n

Source: You gave him … damn! He ran off to drink it all himself, didn't he?\n\nI have to get back to town. Take this, and thank you, friend!
Target: 당신이 그에게... 젠장! 그는 직접 술을 마시러 도망쳤죠?\n\n난 마을로 돌아가야 해요. 이걸 가져가고 고마워요, 친구!

Source: Thank you.
Target: 고맙습니다.

Source: I've helped the Office of Divine Prosecution combat the growing reef viper population in Wasten Coraldale.
Target: 저는 디바인의 종사가 황량한 산호계곡에서 암초 독사의 늘어나는 개체 수와 싸우는 걸 도왔습니다.

Source: Thank you.
Target: 고맙습니다.

Source: I heard what you did at the Guard, traveler. Auri-el keep you safe.
Target: I heard what you did at the Guard, traveler. Auri-el keep you safe.

Source: The goodness you showed that Aldarch at Torinaan. Divines bless and keep you.
Target: The goodness you showed that Aldarch at Torinaan. Divines bless and keep you.

Source: A little extra gold and you buy our silence.
Target: A little extra gold and you buy our silence.

Source: That's the place we were trying to reach when the portal spit us in all directions.\n\nYou really are remarkable. I can't believe you actually won that twisted game. We'll see you in the city. Find us when you have need of our skills.
Target: That's the place we were trying to reach when the portal spit us in all directions.\n\nYou really are remarkable. I can't believe you actually won that twisted game. We'll see you in the city. Find us when you have need of our skills.

Source: I'll find this city of yours. I could do with a bath and a glass of fine wine. It's been far too long.\n\nJust remember our agreement. You help me, and I help you.
Target: I'll find this city of yours. I could do with a bath and a glass of fine wine. It's been far too long.\n\nJust remember our agreement. You help me, and I help you.

Source: This one will find it. That was where we were headed when we got separated from the others.\n\nAt least I am no longer under the thumb of that horrible, horrible Breton!
Target: This one will find it. That was where we were headed when we got separated from the others.\n\nAt least I am no longer under the thumb of that horrible, horrible Breton!

Source: Yes, I know of it. My former master spoke of it once. How he hated the place!\n\nI'll make my way there. Come and get me when you're ready to actually do something significant.
Target: Yes, I know of it. My former master spoke of it once. How he hated the place!\n\nI'll make my way there. Come and get me when you're ready to actually do something significant.

Source: I have the Tear of Anurraame right here. Take it.
Target: I have the Tear of Anurraame right here. Take it.

Source: We'll head out at once. That was where we were trying to go when we got separated from the others.\n\nI wish Angof the best. He really wasn't that bad. I think somewhere, deep inside, he remembered what it was like to be human.
Target: We'll head out at once. That was where we were trying to go when we got separated from the others.\n\nI wish Angof the best. He really wasn't that bad. I think somewhere, deep inside, he remembered what it was like to be human.

Source: Family? Does that mean your brother is staying?
Target: 가족? 네 동생이 머물고 있니?\n

Source: Yes, I know you must have been concerned about the messenger. He made it through safely.
Target: 그렇네. 자네는 분명 전령을 걱정하고 있었겠지. 그는 무사히 돌아왔다네.

Source: I found this necklace. Does it belong to you?
Target: 이 목걸이를 찾았어요. 당신 물건 아닌가요?

Source: Did you hear that Vanus Galerion was rescued from the Black Forge?
Target: Did you hear that Vanus Galerion was rescued from the Black Forge?

Source: I found this recipe.
Target: I found this recipe.

Source: Your sister? I thought you hated each other.
Target: Your sister? I thought you hated each other.

Source: I found this journal. It contained a message addressed to you.
Target: I found this journal. It contained a message addressed to you.

Source: Three bless you and thank you! \n\nNow we can see about restoring some order to this chaos.
Target: 신들의 축복이 있기를 감사합니다!\n\n 이제 혼돈에서 질서를 찾아가는 것이 보입니다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: I know that handwriting. This is a note I hoped never to receive. But I thank you for delivering it to me.
Target: I know that handwriting. This is a note I hoped never to receive. But I thank you for delivering it to me.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: Good. Avenging Tiril's murder will require the deaths of many more Cat-Men. As you said, his kind must pay.
Target: Good. Avenging Tiril's murder will require the deaths of many more Cat-Men. As you said, his kind must pay.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: She's in a better place now.
Target: 그녀는 더 좋은 곳에 갔어.

Source: Don't believe the rumors. Prince Naemon died protecting the queen in the Orrery.
Target: 소문을 믿지 마세요. 네이몬 대군은 태양계의에서 여왕님을 보호하려다가 돌아가신 거라구요.

Source: You needed to know the truth.
Target: 넌 진실을 알아야 해.

Source: Yes. Your acolytes are dead.
Target: Yes. Your acolytes are dead.

Source: The Blacksap Rebellion out of Cormount, and its leaders on trial. I never thought I'd see the day.
Target: 코마운트의 검은수액 반란과 그 지도자들에 대한 재판이라니. 이런 걸 보게 될 날이 올 줄은 몰랐는데.

Source: Cormount was like a wasp's nest. You were a bold one to shove your hand inside.
Target: Cormount was like a wasp's nest. You were a bold one to shove your hand inside.

Source: What the Imperials didn't steal or destroy will soon be for sale to desperate people. That's the hidden cost of any war.
Target: What the Imperials didn't steal or destroy will soon be for sale to desperate people. That's the hidden cost of any war.

Source: You're always welcome here, warrior. But now, others need to speak with you.
Target: You're always welcome here, warrior. But now, others need to speak with you.

Source: The rest is best learned through experience. The mission boards contain Grand Warlord Sorcalin's latest orders. Atahba suggests a Scouting mission to start.\n\nWelcome to the war!
Target: The rest is best learned through experience. The mission boards contain Grand Warlord Sorcalin's latest orders. Atahba suggests a Scouting mission to start.\n\nWelcome to the war!

Source: Yes, yes. We are here to gather some intelligence, right some wrongs. \n\nAnd perhaps slit some throats. We'll see how the day goes.
Target: 그래, 맞아. 정보를 좀 모으고, 잘못된 것도 바로잡으러 왔지. \n\n어쩌면 누군가의 목을 잘라야 할 지도 몰라. 하루가 어떻게 흘러갈지 봐야지.

Source: Estre. If only you arrived here sooner. It's a lesson I'll never forget. She decimated my town!\n\nIf you can help, please, speak to Landare.
Target: 에스트리라. 자네가 더 일찍 도착했다면 좋았을 것을. 나는 절대 잊지 않을 교훈을 얻었네. 그 여자가 내 마을을 박살냈어!\n\n도와줄 수 있다면, 부탁일세. 란다레와 말해 보게.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: Something was wrong with Heloise. She decided to go away to keep people safe.
Target: Something was wrong with Heloise. She decided to go away to keep people safe.

Source: I found your captured guards. The Iron Orcs fed them to trolls.
Target: I found your captured guards. The Iron Orcs fed them to trolls.

Source: Good to know.
Target: 알게 돼서 좋네요.

Source: Where am I supposed to go?
Target: 어디로 가야하지?

Source: The standards have been burned and Agganor's helmet is on display.
Target: 깃발은 불태워졌고 아가노어의 투구는 구경거리가 되었다.

Source: I'll see what I can do.
Target: 뭘 할 수 있을지 알아보죠.

Source: That Argonian traitor should have been put to the blade. Guildmaster at-Aswala is kinder than I'd have been!
Target: 그 아르곤의 반역자는 칼날에 처해져야 했습니다. 애스왈라 길드마스터는 저보다 친절해요!

Source: Heloise killed Gennove Hinault. She decided to take her own life.
Target: 헬로이즈는 제노브 히널트를 죽였습니다. 그녀는 스스로 목숨을 끊는 걸 선택했어요.

Source: What now?
Target: What now?

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: Did I earn a reward?
Target: 제가 보상을 받을만 합니까?

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: Did I earn a reward?
Target: 제가 보상을 받을만 합니까?

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: I've recovered a horn we can use to control these spirits; we can use them to fight the cult.
Target: I've recovered a horn we can use to control these spirits; we can use them to fight the cult.

Source: I'll see what I can do.
Target: 뭘 할 수 있을지 알아보죠.

Source: I'll see what I can do.
Target: 할 수 있는건 해보지.

Source: What is my reward for defeating Lord Warden Dusk?
Target: What is my reward for defeating Lord Warden Dusk?

Source: I will.
Target: 그러죠.

Source: The First Mane told me to bring you the Claw, actually.
Target: 사실, 첫 번째 메인님은 발톱을 당신에게 전해달라고 하시더군요.

Source: I hope your brother is safe.
Target: 동생분이 무사하길 빕니다.

Source: I killed the Timberscar chieftain.
Target: 산림흉터 족장을 죽였어요.

Source: That's wonderful. We're all saved!
Target: 그것 참 멋지군. 우리 모두 무사해!

Source: Has the battle been won?
Target: Has the battle been won?

Source: What is my reward for defeating Lord Warden Dusk?
Target: What is my reward for defeating Lord Warden Dusk?

Source: Yes. They should reach Orsinium soon.
Target: Yes. They should reach Orsinium soon.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Ah, the shards! Finally, I can have my wizard restore the crystal. Here is your reward for your trouble.
Target: 아, 조각들이군! 결국 난 내 크리스탈을 회복시킬수 있겠어. 여기 너에게 주는 보상이야.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Oh, thank you! You have my eternal thanks. But I fear that we are not out of the woods yet.
Target: 정말고마워! 하지만 우리가 숲을 벗어나지 못해서 아직 두려워.

Source: Oh, thank you! They taste like candy.
Target: 오, 고마워! 그건 사탕맛이 나지.

Source: The garrison's ever protected the pass, and it's ours once more. And the less we hear about Imperials or Reachmen, the better.
Target: The garrison's ever protected the pass, and it's ours once more. And the less we hear about Imperials or Reachmen, the better.

Source: Good. Now I can repair the Crystal of Power and make sure the ritual never occurs.
Target: 좋아. 이제 크리스탈의 힘을 수리할 수 있겠군 그리고 이 의식이 다시는 행해지지 않도록 할 수 있을 거야.

Source: Indeed! So few manage to satisfy the terms of our toll.\n\nYou shall be rewarded. I hereby bestow upon you citizenship of these woods, as well as vassal servants to aid you. Welcome to Crow's Wood, fledgling.
Target: Indeed! So few manage to satisfy the terms of our toll.\n\nYou shall be rewarded. I hereby bestow upon you citizenship of these woods, as well as vassal servants to aid you. Welcome to Crow's Wood, fledgling.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 할 거지?

Source: That's a dark twist in the river. I'll send troops to investigate the ruin.\n\nIt's been dirty work, but I thank you for your help.
Target: 강물에 어두운 소용돌이가 일었군요. 유적을 조사하기 위해 군대를 파견하겠습니다.\n\n 더러운 일 이었지만, 도움을 주셔서 감사합니다.

Source: The Mages Guild will expect you keep your promise.
Target: 메이지 길드에선 당신이 약속을 지키길 기대할거야.

Source: The storyteller at Sarandel's Carnival ... how could he get Bosmer history so wrong?
Target: 사란델의 축제에 있는 그 이야기꾼 녀석... 보스머 역사를 어떻게 그렇게 잘못 알 수가 있지?

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: By the Eight, no! My beloved Hodmar! He was so strong, so tough. I thought he made it out alive. \n\nBy Mara, I'll kill those Goblins, one and all!
Target: By the Eight, no! My beloved Hodmar! He was so strong, so tough. I thought he made it out alive. \n\nBy Mara, I'll kill those Goblins, one and all!

Source: We'll find shelter for those who lost their homes. Maybe the Temple of Mara can put them up. You've done a good turn for the people here. Thanks.
Target: We'll find shelter for those who lost their homes. Maybe the Temple of Mara can put them up. You've done a good turn for the people here. Thanks.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I will.
Target: 그러죠.

Source: You've done us a good turn! I'd hate to think of the knowledge we could have lost. You have my thanks. And my mead!
Target: You've done us a good turn! I'd hate to think of the knowledge we could have lost. You have my thanks. And my mead!

Source: Aye! And I'll be lucky if Odana doesn't toss me in the lake tonight. Still, don't doubt it for a minute, my friend. The song of this day will be sung from every tavern in Skyrim.
Target: Aye! And I'll be lucky if Odana doesn't toss me in the lake tonight. Still, don't doubt it for a minute, my friend. The song of this day will be sung from every tavern in Skyrim.

Source: It's a hard life out here in the White. Somewhere off in Sovngarde, Treva's smiling down at us.\n\nYou're a part of the clan now. Fight well!
Target: 이 눈 속에서 살아간다는건 힘들어요 .소븐가르드의 어딘가에서 트레바가 미소짓고 보고 계실꺼에요.\n\n 당신은 이제 가족의 일원입니다. 잘 싸워줬어요!

Source: What are you talking about?
Target: 무슨 말을 하는 거에요?

Source: I can't believe anyone survived. Shor's Stone is forever in your debt.
Target: 누군가 살아남았다니 믿을수가 없군요. 쇼어의 돌은 영원히 당신에게 빚을 졌습니다.\n

Source: What am I supposed to do?
Target: 뭘 해야하지?

Source: Greed. Another admirable trait. Anyone who claims to work for free either wants to rob or cheat you. Never trust an unselfish cur, that's my motto.\n\nHere's your gold. You want more, come back tomorrow. Probably need to replace the sigils by then.
Target: 탐욕스럽군. 그건 훌륭한 성격이야. 무보수로 일할 걸 요구하는 이들은 널 속이거나 뭔가를 훔치려고 하지. 이타적인 자를 절대 믿지 말라, 그게 내 좌우명이야.\n\n여기 돈이 있어. 더 벌고 싶으면 내일 다시 와. 그때까지 인장을 다시 칠해야 할지 모르니까.

Source: Oh, this is a nice, strong specimen you've selected for me. Isn't it adorable! And you have the notes too, excellent! I'll begin my research at once.\n\nYou've done a huge favor not only for me, but for all kwama kind. Thank you.
Target: 오, 나를 위해 멋지고 강한 표본을 골라왔군. 사랑스럽지 않아? 그리고 노트도 가지고 있군! 내 연구를 바로 시작해야겠어.\n\n 나뿐만 아니라 모든 크와마 종에 큰 은혜를 베푼거야. 고마워.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: The Crestshade refugees are safe, but Captain Janeve didn't survive the battle. I heard she died a hero.
Target: Crestshade의 난민들은 안전하지만 JCaptain Janeve 는 전투에서 살아남지 못했습니다. 나는 그녀가 영웅으로 죽었다고 들었다.\n

Source: You helped restore the Thieves Guild—make it more than it once was. Of course I trust your judgment. Now, all the old business is put to rest.\n\nLet's go. We have a guild to run.
Target: 넌 도둑 길드를 복원하는 걸 도왔어. 한때 그랬던 것보다 더 번성하게 했지. 물론 난 네 판단을 믿어. 이제 오래 된 일은 잊어야겠지.\n\n가자. 우리에겐 운영해야 할 길드가 있어.

Target: 팔츄의 약점이 불이라는 것을 알아냈습니다. 불을 이용해서 우리는 그를 죽일 수 있습니다.

Source: I destroyed Westtry's wraiths. The town is safe again.
Target: 나는 웨스트리(Westtry)의 유령을 물리쳤다. 마을은 다시 안전해.

Target: 아이언 휠은 항구에 몰아쳐 눈 앞의 모든 걸 부수는 허리케인이야. <<1>>와 <<2>>가 그걸 촉발시켰지.\n\n이제 어떡하냐고? 우린 이제 놈들이 가장 소중하게 쥐거 있는 걸 알아 냈어. 그럼 그걸 가져와야겠지.

Target: 비벡의 전능한 창이여, 넌 정말 대단한 일을 했군. 질투심을 느껴야겠지만, 사실은 파묻힌 지하실에서 탈출한 데이드라들만 쳐잡아도 양손이 가득이야.\n\n벌레 교단의 장난질을 막아줘서 고마워. 도둑놈들은 내가 정리할께.

Source: From the vampire lord? Yes. But these are turbulent times. Other threats endanger Anvil and the Gold Coast—some even worse than Zalar-do.\n\nRemain vigilant, hunter. Perhaps we shall meet again.
Target: 뱀파이어 군주로부터 말인가? 그렇다네. 하지만 지금은 혼란스러운 때일세. 다른 위험이 앤빌과 골드코스트를 위협하고 있다네. 잘라르-도 보다 끔찍한 것들이 말이지.\n\n항상 경계하게, 사냥꾼이여. 아마 우리는 다시 또 만나게 될걸세.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: "Never waste an opportunity." Huh. <<1>> used to say that.\n\nWell, then … let's see what Taneth nobles think "lucrative" means.
Target: \\"Never waste an opportunity.\"\" Huh. <<1>> used to say that.\n\nWell
column4: then … let's see what Taneth nobles think \"\"lucrative\"\" means."

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: This is one of the times I hate to be right. Was hoping someone would have run them out of the cavern already, honestly. I'll let my business partners know, and we'll decide what to do from here. Thanks for the help.
Target: 지금은 내가 옳고 싶지 않은 때 중 하나이군.. 솔직히 벌써 누군가 동굴 밖으로 도망쳤길 바라고 있었어. 내 사업 파트너들에게 알려주고, 여기서 무엇을 해야 할지 결정할거야. 도와 줘서 고마워.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Apinia is dead, so she won't slaughter any more citizens. That will please Queen Ayrenn, which pleases Raz. And we recovered Bravil's trinkets. A good day's work, yes?\n\nThis one might stick around. Look into Trading Company. Stay fragrant, my friend!
Target: 아피니아는 죽었어, 그러니 그녀는 시민들을 더 이상 학살하지 않을 거야. 아이렌 여왕님이 기뻐하실 거야. 그리고 여왕님이 기뻐하시면 라즈도 기뻐. 그리고 우린 브라빌의 장신구들을 회수했어. 하루의 노동이었지, 응?\n\n이 몸은 여기 머물러 있어서는 안 돼. 무역 회사를 살피러 가야 하지. 향기롭게 있으라구, 친구!

Source: <<1>> won't talk to me. He ran up and hugged me, but he won't speak to me!\n\nAt least we're both alive. We're together again, thanks to you.
Target: <<1>> won't talk to me. He ran up and hugged me, but he won't speak to me!\n\nAt least we're both alive. We're together again, thanks to you.

Source: Sees-All-Colors will be found, and thrown in a cell. Stay in touch comrade. We will need you when the time comes. Until then ….
Target: 씨즈-올-컬러즈를 찾아 감옥에 던져 넣을 거라오. 계속 연락하시오, 동지여. 때가 되면 당신이 다시 필요해질 거요. 그 때까지...

Source: The greatest lesson of HoonDing's Watch is this: wars are fleeting, but honor is eternal. The dunes of time are ever shifting. Kings rise and fall, cities are razed and rebuilt, alliances are forged and broken. But honor, glory … legend remains.
Target: 훈딩의 전망대에서 얻은 가장큰 교훈은 이거야. 전쟁은 순식간이지만, 명예는 영원해.  모래언덕은 계속 움직이고, 왕은 즉위했다 사라지며, 도시들은 파괴되었다가 다시 복구되지. 동료들은 모였다가 흩어지고. 하지만 명예, 영광, 전설은 남는다는거야.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <<1>> said you were in charge until she returned to <<c:2>>. That makes you the acting guildmaster.\n\nBoss.
Target: <<1>>는 자기가 <<c:2>>로 돌아갈 때까지 당신이 책임자라고 말했습니다. 당신이 길드 마스터 대행이라는 뜻이에요.\n\n 대장.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Anything to stop skooma from invading Vvardenfell is worthy of a reward. Hopefully one day we can stop this operation in its tracks, but for now you've done a great deal to prevent these bandits from reaching their despicable goals.
Target: 스쿠마가 바덴펠에 침투하는걸 막는 모든 일은 보상을 받아야 하지.언젠가 이 작전도 할 필요가 없길 바라네만, 지금은 우선 자네가 이 도적들이 비열한 성공을 거두는 것을 막기 위해 많은 노력을 해줬군.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Aha! Good work! Generations of orcs will admire what you've helped create.\n\nI've heard more good news as well. General Godrun said there's another battle coming. Bring it on, I say!
Target: 아! 좋아! 오크의 후예들이 네 도움으로 만든 목걸이를 감탄하며 쳐다볼 거야.\n\n그리고 더 좋은 소식을 들었지. Godrun 장군이 또 다른 전투가 있을 거라 말했다는군. 다 덤벼!

Source: What's next?
Target: What's next?

Source: Those Keepers must keep you in their prayers each night.
Target: Those Keepers must keep you in their prayers each night.

Source: I-I don't know. When he heard the cavern collapse, he declared 'mission accomplished' for the Ironhand Ogres. \n\nBut then he ordered me to muster the troops and prepare to march on Wayrest!
Target: 나는, 나는 몰라. 동굴이 무너졌다는 소식을 들었을 때, 장군님은 아이언핸드 오우거에 대한 '임무가 완료되었다'고 선포했어.\n\n하지만 그러고 나서 그는 내게 군대를 모아 웨이레스트로 진군할 준비를 하라고 명령했어!

Source: The king has waited too long. So many warriors have died, and Marimah holds onto life by a thread.\n\nWe will answer the king's call to the best of our ability, but I fear we can do very little. You should speak to Talia if you haven't already.
Target: 왕은 너무나 오래 기다렸습니다. 너무나 많은 전사들이 죽었고, Marimah 족장님의 목숨은 끊어질 실낱같은 상태죠.\n\n우리는 가능한 한 최선을 다해 왕의 부름에 답할 것이지만, 우리가 할 수 있는 것이 거의 없을까 두렵군요. 아직 Talia와 이야기해보지 않으셨다면, 가서 말씀을 나눠 보십시오.

Source: It was a tunnel? Huh. Does that mean they were coming from Bangkorai?  \n\nI guess that's a concern for another time. I'm damn glad you collapsed the tunnel though. I guess that's a good day's work for all of us!
Target: 터널을 통해서 온건가? 허. 그럼 그놈들이 뱅코라이에서부터 왔다는 뜻인가?\n\n그건 또 다른 걱정거리인듯 하군. 그래도 자네가 터널을 무너뜨려줬다니 정말 고맙구만. 우리 모두에게 좋은 일이군!

Source: The leaders of the Withered Hand? But that would mean … Shiri is one of them too? A necromancer?\n\nYou think … tears of Zeht! With that text … and we have no idea where she is!
Target: 메마른 손의 지도자들이요? 그럼.... 시리도 그들 중 하나인가요? 네크로맨서?\n\n당신은 그렇게 생각하시는군요... 제트 신이시여! 시리가 그 문서를 가지고 있고... 우리는 시리가 어디에 있는지도 모르는군요!

Source: Did you hear the Nords settled their quarrel without spilling any more blood? What a remarkable achievement!
Target: Did you hear the Nords settled their quarrel without spilling any more blood? What a remarkable achievement!

Source: What am I supposed to do?
Target: What am I supposed to do?

Source: Reassuring, isn't it? Knowing the Daedra can suffer. I could kill them all day. You too, it seems.\n\nYour key and your cut. See me tomorrow, I'll find you something equally rewarding.
Target: Reassuring, isn't it? Knowing the Daedra can suffer. I could kill them all day. You too, it seems.\n\nYour key and your cut. See me tomorrow, I'll find you something equally rewarding.

Source: The gorge is safe now.
Target: 이 협곡은 이제 안전합니다.

Source: I discovered that the Pellingare siblings, Allene and Varaine, were organizing an army in the sewers of Wayrest, and planned to take over the city. I've ended their threat by defeating both in battle.
Target: 나는 펠링게어 남매  알렌과 바레인이 웨이레스트의 하수도에서 군대를 조직하고 도시를 점거할 계획을 세웠다는 것을 알아냈다. 나는 전투에서 둘을 모두 물리치고 위협을 끝냈다.

Source: It is not for her to decide. If Khajiit lost their faith in her, she would not be surprised. This one will beg forgiveness for her failings and accept the will of her clowder. She was too reliant on her gifts and a leader must be more than a prophet.
Target: It is not for her to decide. If Khajiit lost their faith in her, she would not be surprised. This one will beg forgiveness for her failings and accept the will of her clowder. She was too reliant on her gifts and a leader must be more than a prophet.

Source: You're welcome, Your Majesty.
Target: 천만에요, 폐하.

Source: What can I do with the keystone?
Target: 키스톤으로 뭘 할수 있는거지?

Source: The Fangs of Sithis are too dangerous to keep. I've given them to the Shadowscales. Hopefully, they can contain their power.
Target: The Fangs of Sithis are too dangerous to keep. I've given them to the Shadowscales. Hopefully, they can contain their power.

Source: Take it and make sure your family doesn't starve.
Target: Take it and make sure your family doesn't starve.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: The Ordinators have summoned their men to guard the walls.
Target: 사원을 지키기 위해 신성집행관들이 그들의 동료들을 불러들였어.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Here. I wrote it all down. Take my notes.
Target: Here. I wrote it all down. Take my notes.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Oh goodie! I'm so glad I've piqued your interest!\n\nNow, how best to have you serve your Queen … I know!
Target: 오 이런! 자네의 관심을 불러 일으키다니 정말 기쁘군!\n\n자, 이제 자네가 자네의 여왕을 어떻게 해야 잘 섬길수있는지 생각해 볼까  … 아 그래!

Source: If you stripped to your small clothes and paraded through town, I'd call it a good start!
Target: 네 옷쪼가리 몇 개만 풀어 해치고 마을을 행진한다면, 좋은 시작이라고 할 수 있지!

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: How did you get here before me?
Target: How did you get here before me?

Source: Anyway you can, so long as someone is laughing!\n\nJorunn suggests you prance, dance, and sing before your king! Or do you seek to raise a toast and boast your deeds at my royal roast?
Target: Anyway you can, so long as someone is laughing!\n\nJorunn suggests you prance, dance, and sing before your king! Or do you seek to raise a toast and boast your deeds at my royal roast?

Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Target: The <<1>> has been slain.

Source: You're the hero who made Stral pay for the deaths of Dajaheel and Belron.
Target: You're the hero who made Stral pay for the deaths of Dajaheel and Belron.

Source: I'm afraid so, your grace.
Target: 당신의 염려가 옳았습니다.

Source: I did what I could.
Target: 제가 할 수 있는 걸 했을 뿐이에요.

Source: I need to talk to you about the back-alley murders. It was a werewolf.
Target: 뒷골목에서 일어나는 살인들에 대해 이야기를 나눌 필요가 있어요. 그건 늑대인간의 짓이었어요.

Source: Take this. It will help.
Target: 받으세요. 도움이 될 겁니다.

Source: Ah, yes. Mother's docile screeching can lull Raz to sleep.\n\nNow, this one suspects that Mother would try to cheat you if you asked her for payment. So here, a reward from Raz's own pockets. Aren't you a lucky one?
Target: Ah, yes. Mother's docile screeching can lull Raz to sleep.\n\nNow, this one suspects that Mother would try to cheat you if you asked her for payment. So here, a reward from Raz's own pockets. Aren't you a lucky one?

Source: A senche tiger? That's remarkable! If he managed that, a frog should present no challenge at all!\n\nThank you so much, walker. When I publish about this, I'll be sure to mention your contribution. Ha! I can't wait to see the look on Caldathir's face!
Target: 센치 호랑이? 정말 놀라운데! 만약 그게 가능하다면, 개구리정도는 쉽게 되살릴 수 있을거야! \n\n정말 고마워, 여행자. 이 이야기를 출판할때 네가 해준 일을 잊지않고 반드시 언급할께. 칼데디어의 얼굴을 빨리 보고싶어!

Source: Anything else you need from me?
Target: 다른 필요한 건 더 없으세요?

Source: Wickton said you might know something about a strange, thorny vine.
Target: 윅턴이 말하길 당신이 가시 많고 이상하게 생긴 덩굴에 대해 알고 있을 지도 모른다고 했어요.

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress

Source: The Nord traitor is dead. Long live the champion, and long live the Skald-King!
Target: The Nord traitor is dead. Long live the champion, and long live the Skald-King!

Source: The villagers can't hide in the mill forever.
Target: 마을 사람들이 제분소에 영원히 숨어 있을 순 없어요.

Source: You appeared when Elsweyr needed you most. In our most desperate time of troubles, you helped restore our nation. You will always have a place here, my friend.\n\nAnd I want you to accept the greatest award I can offer. I name you Champion of Anequina!
Target: You appeared when Elsweyr needed you most. In our most desperate time of troubles, you helped restore our nation. You will always have a place here, my friend.\n\nAnd I want you to accept the greatest award I can offer. I name you Champion of Anequina!

Source: It looks like the nobles got out safely.
Target: It looks like the nobles got out safely.

Source: I'm here to rescue you. This wolf's woe will allow your family to avoid the wolves and get away.
Target: I'm here to rescue you. This wolf's woe will allow your family to avoid the wolves and get away.

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress

Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress

Source: Let us pray the lesson takes, for soon they must face the might of Dragons.\n\nYour aid in this matter is most appreciated. This one hopes you will continue to provide such a demonstration for the many recruits to come.
Target: Let us pray the lesson takes, for soon they must face the might of Dragons.\n\nYour aid in this matter is most appreciated. This one hopes you will continue to provide such a demonstration for the many recruits to come.

Source: Is this your lockbox?
Target: Is this your lockbox?

Source: The Shadowscales have defeated the Dominion at Murkwater.
Target: The Shadowscales have defeated the Dominion at Murkwater.

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress

Source: I did? That's worse than I thought then. I had absolutely no control over myself whatsoever … or was that even me?\n\nI'm sorry. I'm not used to being … compromised like this. But that only doubles my debt to you.
Target: I did? That's worse than I thought then. I had absolutely no control over myself whatsoever … or was that even me?\n\nI'm sorry. I'm not used to being … compromised like this. But that only doubles my debt to you.

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress
