Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress

Source: The Silvenar is crucial to the Dominion's stability. His advisor's sacrifice won't be forgotten.
Target: 실베나는 자치령의 안정에 반드시 필요한 사람이지. 실베나의 조언자들이 겪은 희생은 잊혀지지 않을 거야.

Source: Rumors spread like water in a stream that one of my people saved the King. Perhaps now they will respect us.
Target: Rumors spread like water in a stream that one of my people saved the King. Perhaps now they will respect us.

Source: King Casimir is the target. Assassins are hiding in cargo crates on the docks.
Target: 카시미르 왕이 표적입니다. 암살자들은 부두에 있는 화물 상자에 숨어 있어요.

Source: For now, recover your strength and prepare yourself. Euraxia's forces will arrive soon and we'll need you ready for the battle to come.\n\nAnd here, take this. Gharesh-ri keeps handing me pouches, but I have little use for Khajiiti gold.
Target: 우선 지금은, 힘을 회복하면서 준비해라. 유라시아의 군대는 곧 도착할 거다 그러니 우린 전투에 임할 준비가 되어있아야해. \n\n그리고 여기, 이걸 가져가라. 가레쉬-리가 계속 내 주머니에 넣어주는데, 난 카짓들이 주는 작은 금화는 필요가 없어서.

Source: Every member of the Dominion is a little safer because of what we've done here today. Queen Ayrenn's not here to give you a fancy scepter, or a royal title. Just me.\n\nBut, from me … thanks.
Target: 자치령의 모두는 우리가 오늘 여기에서 한 일로 조금 더 안전해질거에요. 아이렌 여왕폐하께서 멋진 권리나 영예를 주시기 위해서 여기 있으시진 않죠. 그저 저뿐이에요.\n\n하지만, 전.... 감사해요.

Source: Is there anything else I can do?
Target: 내가 할 수 있는 다른 일이 있습니까?

Source: There are few who could meet the needs of these buyers on such short notice. Your skills have made us all a hearty sum. The guild is sure to take note.
Target: 짧은 시간에 이러한 구매자의 요구를 충족시킬 수있는 사람은 거의 없습니다. 당신의 기술은 우리 모두를 가슴 벅찬 합계로 만들었습니다. 길드는 반드시주의해야합니다.\n

Source: I'll see to the Staff of Magnus's safety myself.\n\nAs for you, the Bosmer have their Silvenar. With both the Silvenar and the Green Lady, it's time the two became one. Go to Velyn Harbor in Malabal Tor and we will make preparations.
Target: 마그누스의 지팡이는 내 직접 안전하게 보관하겠다.\n\n그대 덕분에 보스머에게 실베나가 생겼구나. 실베나와 녹색 여군주가 모두 있으니, 그 둘이 하나가 될 시간이 왔다. 말라발 토르의 벨린항으로 가면 우리가 준비를 할 것이다.

Source: The generous Bar-Neeus forgave his would-be enemies. I delivered his package of supplies and gold, which will enable the Rothalen family to survive and rebuild.
Target: The generous Bar-Neeus forgave his would-be enemies. I delivered his package of supplies and gold, which will enable the Rothalen family to survive and rebuild.

Source: Here. That's most of what's left after I paid off that walking canker. Thanks to you, I might break even on this voyage.\n\nEnjoy your time in Anvil, friend. I hope to never see these despicable docks again.
Target: Here. That's most of what's left after I paid off that walking canker. Thanks to you, I might break even on this voyage.\n\nEnjoy your time in Anvil, friend. I hope to never see these despicable docks again.

Source: <<1>> sent me to you.
Target: <<1>>이 절 당신에게 보냈어요.

Source: Is that why you've returned?
Target: 그것이 당신이 돌아온 이유입니까?

Source: I hope you twisted the knife in the Hound's guts, on behalf of the Green Lady.
Target: I hope you twisted the knife in the Hound's guts, on behalf of the Green Lady.

Source: Did Thallik really try to open a portal to Oblivion?
Target: 탈릭이 정말로 오블리비언의 문을 열려고 했습니까?

Source: As promised, your reward. \n\nWe appreciate your help. Here's a little something for the effort.
Target: As promised, your reward. \n\nWe appreciate your help. Here's a little something for the effort.

Source: Rosalind knows what you have done.
Target: Rosalind knows what you have done.

Source: Always, hero. Oh, hey, I want you to have this. Something to remember Veya by. For an Outlander, I think she kind of liked you.\n\nI suppose I kind of like you, too. Really, I'm not always this morose. Next time we meet, you'll see. Take care, hero.
Target:
고마워, 영웅 나으리. 아, 그래 맞아. 이걸 받아. 가끔은 베야를 떠올려줘. 이방인치고는 널 꽤 마음에 들어했으니까.

나도 마찬가지야. 나라고 항상 이렇게 언짢은건 아니니까. 다음에 만나면 보여줄께.
또 보자, 영웅 나으리.

Source: You didn't know for certain. You didn't want to kill an innocent man.
Target: 너는 확신이 없었어. 넌 무고한 사람을 죽이고 싶지 않았잖아.

Source: I'm glad everyone's safe.
Target: 모두가 안전해서 기쁩니다.

Source: If I see this through, maybe I can change what happened.
Target: If I see this through, maybe I can change what happened.

Source: <Fadeel hesitates for a moment and then turns to go.>
Target: <Fadeel은 망설이다가 떠나버렸다>

Source: Magistrix Vox nearly destroyed Selfora, just because the people refused to bow down to her.
Target: Magistrix Vox nearly destroyed Selfora, just because the people refused to bow down to her.

Source: I rescued Countess Ilise Manteau from her mirror. Now I should speak to her about his this happened.
Target: 나는 그녀의 거울로부터 일리스 맨토 백작 부인을 구출했다. 이제 나는 그녀에게 일어난 일에 대해 말해야 해.\n

Source: I served time in White Rose. Horrible place. You made the right choice, friend.
Target: I served time in White Rose. Horrible place. You made the right choice, friend.

Source: You did more for us than anyone in this wretched city. Raynor and I will do our jobs and complete our contracts.\n\nThen it's off to Hammerfell! There are ruins to explore, adventures to partake in! I'm all tingly with anticipation!
Target: You did more for us than anyone in this wretched city. Raynor and I will do our jobs and complete our contracts.\n\nThen it's off to Hammerfell! There are ruins to explore, adventures to partake in! I'm all tingly with anticipation!

Source: You did more for us than anyone in this wretched city. Raynor and I will do our jobs and complete our contracts.\n\nThen it's off to Hammerfell! There are ruins to explore, adventures to partake in! I'm all tingly with anticipation!
Target: You did more for us than anyone in this wretched city. Raynor and I will do our jobs and complete our contracts.\n\nThen it's off to Hammerfell! There are ruins to explore, adventures to partake in! I'm all tingly with anticipation!

Source: I'll go through what you recovered. See if it offers a clue to <<1>>'s plans, or anything involving the missing dowry. I need to make sense of all this.\n\nGet some rest. I'll need you ready when we make our move. And … good job.
Target: 난 네가 가져온 걸 조사할 거야. <<1>>의 계획이나 사라진 지참금에 대한 단서가 있는지 보겠어. 이 모든 걸 알아내야 해.\n\n가서 좀 쉬도록 해. 작업을 시작해야 할 때 네가 필요할 거야. 그리고 ... 잘 했어.

Source: Always, hero. Oh, hey, I want you to have this. Something to remember me by until we meet again.\n\nI hope you don't leave here with the impression that all Dark Elves are conniving dirt bags. Some of us are also kind of sexy. Like me, for instance.
Target: 고마워, 영웅 나으리. 아, 그래. 이걸 받아줘. 또 만날 때까지 나를 잊지 말아줘.\n\n다크 엘프는 모두 교활한 녀석이라는 인상을 갖지 않았으면 해. 조금 섹시한 점도 있으니깐 말이야. 예를 들면, 나처럼.

Source: That's what I like to hear! The more you play, the more rewards. It's as simple as that. Occasionally I'll give you specific goals with greater rewards if you can accomplish them.\n\nCome and see me anytime you wish for such a challenge.
Target: 그게 내가 듣고 싶은 말이야! 더 많이 플레이할수록 더 많은 보상을 받을 수 있어. 무척이나 간단하지. 때로는 내가 네게 구체적인 목표를 제시할거야. 물론 목표를 달성하면 더 많은 보상을 제공하지.\n\n도전하고자 하시면 언제든 나를 찾아와.

Source: I'm … happy to hear <<1>> plans to join us. Her skills will be invaluable.\n\nNot very convincing, was it? I'll need to practice.
Target: <<1>>가 우리와 함께 할 생각이라니 ... 기쁘네. 벨사의 기술은 소중하거든.\n\n진짜 기뻐하는 것 같지 않지? 연습해야겠어.

Source: My research indicates that thirty of our most revered families each left a clue to the location of the Library of Andule.\n\nFind the remaining twenty-nine tombs, take rubbings, and before long our model will be complete and the location revealed.
Target: 내의 연구에 따르면 가장 존경받는 가문 중 30 명은 각각 안둘 도서관의 위치에 대한 단서를 남겼어.\n\n 나머지 29 개의 무덤을 찾아 탁본을 뜨면 이 모형이 완성되고 안둘 도서관의 위치가 공개될거야

Source: It must be important if the Iron Wheel wants it. Father did love his puzzles. I should see if it means anything.\n\nThank you for this. It's not the answer I wanted, but I'm glad you were by my side.
Target: 아이언 휠이 이걸 원한다면 틀림없이 중요한 물건일 거야. 아버지는 수수께끼를 좋아했어. 이게 뭘 의미하는지 알아내야겠어.\n\n도와줘서 고마워. 내가 원했던 답은 아니지만, 네가 내 옆에 있어줘서 기뻐.

Source: If I'd been in Crosswych, I'd have put my mining pick right into Sternes Gelves back.
Target: 내가 Crosswych에 있었다면, 내 곡괭이를 Sternes Gelves 등에 꽂아 버렸을 거야.

Source: The deal is off, but it's no trouble, boss. I'll find another outlet for these goods. <<1>> always comes through.
Target: 거래는 끝났지만 문제 없소, 대장. 이 상품을 팔 또 다른 가게를 찾을 거라오. <<1>>은 항상 해내지.

Source: I'm here to claim the bounty on the crocodiles.
Target: 악어 현상금을 받기 위해 왔습니다.

Source: Your father's spirit was here. He had a message. Take this gold and go to Crosswych.
Target: 당신 아버지의 영혼이 이곳에 있었습니다. 그가 말을 전해달라고 했어요. 이 돈을 가지고 크로스위치로 가세요.

Source: Where will you and Safik go?
Target: Where will you and Safik go?

Source: You couldn't free those Imperial soldiers from White Rose. They're the enemy.
Target: You couldn't free those Imperial soldiers from White Rose. They're the enemy.

Source: Is all of this really necessary?
Target: Is all of this really necessary?

Source: Quite a few, actually. I recovered the mask and killed Ra'khajin.
Target: Quite a few, actually. I recovered the mask and killed Ra'khajin.

Source: The coven was kidnapping women. I had to stop them.
Target: 마녀가 여자들을 납치했어. 나는 그들을 멈춰야만 했다.

Source: I don't know.\n\nI think I'll stay in Abah's Landing for now. It's where my friends are.
Target: 모르겠어.\n\n지금부터 아바스 랜딩에 머무를 것 같아. 내 친구들이 있는 곳이거든.

Source: A parley? I may not like her, but we are family. Besides, it would give the Khajiit time to regroup. You're beginning to think like a Tharn, my friend.\n\nHere, take this. Gharesh-ri gave it to me, but I refuse to accept payment for my services.
Target: 협상이라고? 난 그녀를 좋아하지 않지만, 그래도 우리가 가족이긴 하지. 하지만, 협상이 진행되는 동안 카짓군대를 재편성 할 수 있을거야. 이제 자네도 탄가문 사람처럼 생각 할 줄 알게됐구나, 친구여.\n\n이걸 받게. 가레쉬-리경이 내게 준건데, 봉사를 하는 일에 임금을 받고 싶지는 않아서 말이야.

Source: I'll give her my bunk. Honestly, I prefer hammocks.\n\n<<1>> won't have the luxuries of her manor, but she'll be safe in <<c:2>>. As my father would have wanted.
Target: 그녀에게 내 침대를 줄 거야. 솔직히 난 해먹이 더 좋거든.\n\n<<1>>에겐 이제 호화로운 저택이 없지만 <<c:2>>에서 안전 할 것야. 내 아버지가 원하셨던 대로.

Source: In return, I expect only unwavering loyalty and ruthless efficiency. Now, let us discuss the task before you. A killing that shall form a covenant between us, signed in blood.
Target: 그 대가로, 자네에게 변함 없는 충성과 가차없는 일처리를 기대하겠네. 이제, 자네에게 부여할 임무에 대해 상의해야겠군. 우리를 피의 맹세로 맺어줄 그 임무를 말이야.

Source: And such skill deserves ample reward. Keep it up, champion. Strive for victory in every match, no matter who may be your opponent.
Target: 이러한 솜씨에는 훌륭한 보수를 줘야하는 법이지. 이 상태를 계속 유지해주게. 상대가 누구든 모든 시합에서 승리를 거머쥐게.

Source: I'm trying to compose a song about your heroics at Fallowstone Hall.
Target: I'm trying to compose a song about your heroics at Fallowstone Hall.

Source: Magistrix Vox was finally defeated. What a shame, I heard she used to be one of Almalexia's hand maidens.
Target: Magistrix Vox was finally defeated. What a shame, I heard she used to be one of Almalexia's hand maidens.

Source: Your departure? Are you leaving?
Target: Your departure? Are you leaving?

Source: Here's what the courier in Malak's Maw was carrying.
Target: Here's what the courier in Malak's Maw was carrying.

Source: I'll let you know if I find more pieces.
Target: I'll let you know if I find more pieces.

Source: I found this shield at the Akaviri grave in Windridge Cave.
Target: I found this shield at the Akaviri grave in Windridge Cave.

Source: That's sweet, but you've already done more than enough. You helped me show my sister the truth about the Society of the Dragon. She's safe now and our plan worked exactly as I'd hoped.\n\nI couldn't have saved Josseline without your help. Thank you.
Target: That's sweet, but you've already done more than enough. You helped me show my sister the truth about the Society of the Dragon. She's safe now and our plan worked exactly as I'd hoped.\n\nI couldn't have saved Josseline without your help. Thank you.

Source: Well done! Though a team is made of no single individual, it's still important that each spoke in the wheel bears its share of the burden. \n\nYou'd do well to remember that lesson. Here's your reward.
Target: 잘 했네! 팀은 개인의 집합은 아니지만 수레바퀴 스포크가 각각 부담을 나누는 건 중요하지.\n\n이 교훈을 잘 기억해두게. 보수를 주지.

Source: As with any skill, practice makes perfect. It's important to stay sharp out there. Champions don't just spring up overnight!\n\nYou've earned your reward.
Target: 어떠한 기술이든 훈련이 그걸 숙달시켜주는 것은 변함이 없지. 항상 준비하는 것이 필요하네. 챔피언은 하룻밤에 생겨나지 않아!\n\n보수를 받아주게.

Source: My notebook! I thought it lost forever. I must have left it at one of the wells I was researching. Fascinating, aren't they?\n\nWith these notes, perhaps I can finish my book on Ayleid wells throughout Cyrodiil. Thank you!
Target: 내 공책! 영원히 잃어버린 줄 알았는데. 분명히 내가 연구하던 우물 중에 한 곳에 놓고 와버렸겠지. 우물들이 매혹적이지 않아?\n\n이 공책이 있으니, 어쩌면 시로딜 전역의 에일리드 우물에 관한 내 책을 끝마칠 수도 있겠어. 고마워!

Source: Ha! That sneaky Tamien fellow sure will be surprised.\n\nHopefully now, Lady Laurent will forgive me and realize we don't need any hired help. A mercenary … what in Oblivion was she thinking?
Target: 하! 그 비열한 타미엔 녀석이 분명히 놀랄 겁니다.\n\n다행스럽게도, 로렌 여사께서 절 용서하시고 더이상 외부의 도움은 필요없다는 걸 아실 겁니다. 용병이라니... 여사께서 무슨 생각을 하셨던 걸까요?

Source: Here's half, along with my gratitude—which can be quite valuable in certain circles!\n\nI hope we cross paths again. Next time, I'll be the one doing you a good turn. You can count on it.
Target: Here's half, along with my gratitude—which can be quite valuable in certain circles!\n\nI hope we cross paths again. Next time, I'll be the one doing you a good turn. You can count on it.

Source: I'll see what I can do.
Target: 할 수 있는건 해보지.

Source: I took care of some of them for you.
Target: 당신을 위해서 놈들을 좀 처리해 뒀어요.

Source: I found this note and bracelet. Were they your brother's?
Target: 이 메모와 팔찌를 찾았어. 이 물건의 주인이 너의 오빠인가?

Source: I came across the remains of your band and killed the wispmother.
Target: I came across the remains of your band and killed the wispmother.

Source: This the crown you're looking for?
Target: 찾고 있던 왕관이 이겁니까?

Source: This one is not sure what to think about a Redguard leading the Fighters Guild. Strange times we live in.
Target: This one is not sure what to think about a Redguard leading the Fighters Guild. Strange times we live in.

Source: I'll do what I can.
Target: 최대한 노력해 보죠.

Source: What will you do now, Skordo?
Target: What will you do now, Skordo?

Source: Yes. Of course. I have been waiting for you for some time. The story needs you to play a part in the present … and in the past.
Target: 그래, 그렇겠지. 한동안 자넬 기다리고 있었거든. 자네는 이야기에서 배역을 맡아야 한다네. 현재... 그리고 과거의 이야기에서 말일세.

Source: Great. A fan.\n\nI need you to keep quiet!
Target: 좋아요, 제 팬이 생겼군요.\n\n조용히 해주셔야 해요!

Source: Za'ji agreed to join our Dragonguard and will speak to the rest of his crew on our behalf.
Target: Za'ji agreed to join our Dragonguard and will speak to the rest of his crew on our behalf.

Source: Yes! You're just the best. Working with you is like that Argonian bard at my local tavern. An unexpected but very welcome surprise.
Target: 좋았어! 당신 진짜 최곤데. 꼭 우리 고향 술집에서 아르고니안 음유 시인을 만난 것 같아. 예상하지 못했지만 즐거운 놀라움을 겪었으니까.

Source: The Dominion severed the keepers' link to the Hist, but I managed to save several eggs from Dominion attackers.
Target: The Dominion severed the keepers' link to the Hist, but I managed to save several eggs from Dominion attackers.

Source: I knew you were the one I was waiting for!\n\nMolag Bal locked me away for a reason. He fears me. Once you set me free, we can make him regret the day he made us his enemies.
Target: 내가 기다리던 자가 바로 너였을 줄 알았느니라!\n\n몰라그 발이 날 가둔 것은 다 이유가 있다. 날 두려워하지. 날 풀어 준다면 놈이 우리를 적으로 돌렸던 날을 후회하게 만들어줄 수 있을 것이니라.

Source: With Bar-Neeus out of the way, Sarisa's family can claim the coveted spot in the central market. Not sure how I feel about my role in this, but her money is good.
Target: With Bar-Neeus out of the way, Sarisa's family can claim the coveted spot in the central market. Not sure how I feel about my role in this, but her money is good.

Source: Truly! Then thank S'rendarr you came along. Tamriel is free of another shaveskin muskarse, and Tand is returned to me. Bright Moons and long life to you, walker. We will remember you, always!
Target: 그랬군요! 당신이 나타난걸 스'렌다르께 감사드려야겠어요. 탐리엘에서 민둥이 사향궁둥짝놈이 하나 줄었고, 탄드도 돌아왔으니까요. 당신이 장수하고, 빛나는 달들께서 함께 하시길 빌게요, 보행자님. 당신을 언제나 기억하겠어요!

Source: I didn't do anything to him.
Target: 아무 짓도 안 했어요.

Source: Ah...the hero of Koeglin Village. Very impressive.
Target: 아... 코글린 마을의 영웅이죠. 정말 인상적이에요.

Source: So I'm in?
Target: 그럼, 들어가도 될까요?

Source: Here's the produce I collected.
Target: 여기 제가 모은 농작물이에요.

Source: I cannot express how grateful I am. You have saved us, body and soul. May your steps on the two-moons dance bring you where you need to go.
Target: 얼마나 감사한지 표현을 못 할 정도로군. 자네가 우리의 몸과 영혼을 구했어. 쌍둥이 달의 춤을 추는 자네의 발걸음이 자네를 필요한 곳으로 이끌어 가기를.

Source: <<1>>'s contingent left to investigate the Dominion presence in <<2>>. A short time ago, lamia boiled out of the ruins.
Target: <<1>>'s contingent left to investigate the Dominion presence in <<2>>. A short time ago, lamia boiled out of the ruins.

Source: What else? It's time to fight! You have the credentials, so you've already met the division champions. Now you must fight through the ranks of their divisions. \n\nSurvive that and you'll face the Grand Champion. But first things first. Get moving now.
Target: 달리 뭐겠어요? 싸워야죠! 자격증을 받았으니 종목 우승자들은 벌써 만나보셨을 테고. 이제 종목에서 싸우면서 등급을 올려나가야 해요.\n\n종목 경기에서 살아남으면 최종 우승자를 대면할 수 있죠. 하지만 일단 처음부터 시작해야 하니까, 바로 움직이세요.

Source: This is it … your chance to take on the Grand Champion. May the luck of Jone and Jode be with you.
Target: 이제 시작이네요... 최종 우승자가 될 기회가 생겼어요. 존과 조드님의 행운이 함께하길 빌어 드리죠.

Source: You have one title under your belt. Gain the other two division titles and you'll have the chance to unseat Ishalga, our Grand Champion. May the luck of Baan Dar continue to follow you.
Target: 새로운 지위를 하나 얻었군요. 다른 두 가지 지위도 얻으면 우리 최종 우승자 이샬가까지 밀어낼 기회가 생길 거에요. 반 다르의 행운이 계속 당신을 따라주길 빌어 드리죠.

Source: Keep it up. You will give Ishalga quite a challenge if she faces you in the Grand Championship.\n\nMay Riddle'Thar be kind when he determines your fate.
Target: 계속 그렇게 이겨나가세요. 이샬가가 최종 결승전에서 당신을 만난다면, 이샬가한텐 상당한 도전이 될 거에요.\n\n리들타르가 당신의 운명을 결정할 때 친절하길 바라죠.

Source: I hope it stays lit for you.
Target: 그 불꽃이 계속 붙어 있는다면 좋겠군요.

Source: Look at you. A fighter from humble beginnings, now the Grand Champion. You are a marvel, Mysterious Stranger. \n\nI hope one day you will return to defend your title. Until then, may Jone and Jode light your path.
Target: 당신 좀 보세요. 초라한 싸움꾼으로 시작해서 최종 우승자가 되다니. 정말 굉장하네요, 신비의 이방인씨.\n\n언젠가 당신이 돌아와서 방어전을 치러 줬으면 좋겠네요. 그때까지는 존과 조드님의 빛이 당신 앞길을 비춰 주시길 빌게요.

Source: I bring news of <<1>>'s death.
Target: <<1>>>>의 죽음을 알리러 왔습니다.

Source: I'll find a way.
Target: 방법을 찾겠습니다.

Source: I'm ready.
Target: 준비됐어.

Source: I found this <<z:1>> with your name on it.
Target: I found this <<z:1>> with your name on it.

Source: So, the cove is cleansed?
Target: So, the cove is cleansed?

Source: He admitted his men planted the dreugh eggs. Arcady Charnis witnessed it.
Target: 그는 부하들이 드레그 알을 마을에 숨기도록 명령했습니다. Arcady Charnis가 목격자입니다.

Source: Aphren's Hold is once again a peaceful place, thanks to you.
Target: Aphren's Hold is once again a peaceful place, thanks to you.

Source: Alive, last I saw, and with your scout.
Target: 적어도 제가 봤을때는 살아 있었어요. 당신 정찰병도 무사했고요.

Source: Thank Vivec you stopped the Covenant from summoning Sadal!
Target: 비벡님 감사합니다. 당신이 사달을 소환하려는 동맹을 저지했군요.

Source: Pellingare deserves death. I will look the other way.
Target: 펠링게어는 죽어야 마땅해. 난 고개를 돌리고 있을게.

Source: I killed the wasp. Here's its head.
Target: 나는 말벌을 죽였어. 여기에 머리가 있습니다.\n

Source: Is it true they summoned Balreth to defeat the Daggerfall army at Davon's Watch?
Target: 그들이 발레스를 소환해 대거폴군을 패배시켰다는게 사실입니까?

Source: We're moving along.
Target: 그들이 합류했어.

Source: Here's the troll's arm as proof of the kill.
Target: 죽였다는 증거로 트롤의 팔을 가져왔어요.

Source: Here's the mammoth's tusk as proof of the kill.
Target: 여기 증거로 매머드 상아를 가져왔어요.

Source: Estre was a traitor! And deserved to be put down.
Target: Estre was a traitor! And deserved to be put down.

Source: Kargand will live and by my claws, I promise he will defeat this corruption. I thank you for freeing us. Know peace in your journeys.
Target: Kargand will live and by my claws, I promise he will defeat this corruption. I thank you for freeing us. Know peace in your journeys.

Source: Then you have this one's gratitude.\n\nAnd the gratitude of Azurah as well, it seems. Just as Mazdurr was leaving, he happened to find something of value. Take it as your well earned reward.
Target: 그럼 이번에도 자네에게 감사해야겠네. \n\n그리고 내가 보기엔, 아주라님께서도 자네에게 감사의 뜻을 전하려고 하는 것 같네. 마즈두르가 떠나려 하려했을때, 그는 우연히 가치있는 무언가를 발견했네. 자네에게 이것을 보상으로 주고 싶네.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군.

Source: Truly, I am glad. She was very lonely, and for so long.\n\nBut enough melancholy, yes? To our spoils!
Target: 정말 기쁜 일이네요. 그 유령은 너무 오랫동안 외로워했으니까요.\n\n하지만 슬픈 얘기는 이쯤 하죠? 전리품을 챙길 시간이에요!

Source: Mininque now has a book of Skald Skullsplitter's drinking songs. I told her about his "darker works" and his … proposal. She was shocked. She may need some more time to think about her hero in this new light.
Target: Mininque now has a book of Skald Skullsplitter's drinking songs. I told her about his "darker works" and his … proposal. She was shocked. She may need some more time to think about her hero in this new light.

Source: There's nothing left for me here. We couldn't save my clan from doom, but I am grateful for all you've done.\n\nAs are the caravanners. They've scrounged this up, as thanks.
Target: There's nothing left for me here. We couldn't save my clan from doom, but I am grateful for all you've done.\n\nAs are the caravanners. They've scrounged this up, as thanks.

Source: Tales of Angof's defeat by your hand have begun to spread. You're starting to make quite a name for yourself.
Target: Tales of Angof's defeat by your hand have begun to spread. You're starting to make quite a name for yourself.

Source: Very good. Zahari will make sure these gems are distributed among our enchanters. When this one has more gems to fill, she will let you know.
Target: Very good. Zahari will make sure these gems are distributed among our enchanters. When this one has more gems to fill, she will let you know.

Source: Rajhin's Shadow? I … I'll be honest. That's a lot to take in. But after all you've done for us, how can I not offer you the benefit of the doubt? \n\nFeel free to place any mural pieces that you find. And here, something for your troubles.
Target: Rajhin's Shadow? I … I'll be honest. That's a lot to take in. But after all you've done for us, how can I not offer you the benefit of the doubt? \n\nFeel free to place any mural pieces that you find. And here, something for your troubles.

Source: I'm sorry. Your son is dead. I found this journal near his body.
Target: 유감입니다. 댁 아드님은 죽었습니다. 이 일지를 그의 품에서 발견했습니다.

Source: I released the spirits, but Carzog's Demise is the cult's target.
Target: 영혼들을 풀어주었지만, 카조그의 종말은 숭배자들의 목표야.

Source: The cult seeks a powerful relic beneath Carzog's Demise.
Target: 그 숭배자들은 카조그의 종말 아래에서 강력한 유물을 찾고 있어.

Source: So what's next for Zhasim and Winks?
Target: So what's next for Zhasim and Winks?

Source: I found this.
Target: 이걸 찾았어요.

Source: Ha! Nice of Marcellus to let me know he found me. Lucky for me, I've made enough in Cheydinhal to disappear again.\n\nHere, take this for your trouble. And remember, you never saw me.
Target: 하! 마르셀루스가 절 찾았다는걸 알려줘서 고맙네요. 운 좋게도, 체이딘할에서 또 다시 사라질 수 있겠어요.\n\n여기, 수고해 주신 답례에요. 그리고 명심해요. 당신은 절 본 적 없는 거에요.

Source: You've done a great service for the guild today, comrade. I look forward to drawing steel with you in the future.\n\nIf we learn anything from the journal, I'll make sure you hear about it.
Target: 자넨 오늘 길드를 위해 훌륭한 일을 했네, 동지. 훗날 자네와 함께 칼을 뽑기를 기대하겠네.\n\n만약 우리가 일지로부터 무엇이든 알게 된다면, 자네가 그걸 들을 수 있도록 하지.

Source: Oh. That's good, then. I'm pleased to see a friendly snout. That's much better than all the dead faces lately.\n\nWhy is it Elves who die cannot stay in the ground?
Target: 오. 그래준다면, 고맙지. 같은 편을 만나서 반가워. 망자들 얼굴 보는 것 보다 훨씬 낫네.\n\n왜 엘프들은 죽은 후에도 그냥 누워 있지 않는 거지?

Source: Who knows how long it will take the town to rebuild? But with the Marines at our backs, we cut them to ribbons. We've won the day. \n\nThank you. You've the thanks of a grateful Captain.
Target: 마을을 재건하기까지 얼마나 걸릴지 누가 알겠소? 하지만 해병대의 도움을 받아서 놈들을 박살내 줬지. 오늘은 우리가 이긴 거요.\n\n고맙소. 대장으로서 정말로 고맙소.

Source: I hope these two have learned from their mistakes. Spellcrafting is not to be taken lightly. Like a Goblin's heart, apparently.
Target: I hope these two have learned from their mistakes. Spellcrafting is not to be taken lightly. Like a Goblin's heart, apparently.

Source: Come back again, there's more blood to be shed!
Target: 나중에 다시 오세요. 더 많은 피가 흐를 거에요!

Source: I see. Thank you for telling me the truth. \n\nNot only did Gorak do something incredibly stupid, but he lied to me about it, as well.
Target: I see. Thank you for telling me the truth. \n\nNot only did Gorak do something incredibly stupid, but he lied to me about it, as well.

Source: No, thank you! I learn more about this game every time I see someone run.\n\nYou should consider playing spikeball professionally.
Target: 아뇨, 괜찮아요! 누가 달리는 모습을 볼 때마다 이 경기에 대해서 더 많이 배우니까요.\n\n가시공 경주 전문 선수가 되는걸 진지하게 생각해보세요.

Source: Incredible. I knew you had potential, Gorak, but I never imagined you were so capable.\n\nThank you for your help, friend, though it sounds like Gorak didn't really need it.
Target: Incredible. I knew you had potential, Gorak, but I never imagined you were so capable.\n\nThank you for your help, friend, though it sounds like Gorak didn't really need it.

Source: Let me see that. I'm sure he wants gold, the deadbeat. \n\nHe fled to the abbey to avoid creditors and now he wants my help to return? I don't think so. This is his mess, not mine.
Target: 어디 보지. 분명히 금화를 원하는 것이겠지. 게으름뱅이 같으니.\n\n채무자들을 피해 수도원으로 달아나놓고선 이제 내 도움을 원한다고? 난 그러고 싶지 않은데. 이건 녀석의 문제지, 내 알 바 아니야.

Source: The kwama will soon learn the cave is their nest and treat the spirit as their queen. Together, they'll guard the cave against intruders who seek to harm the Great Tree.\n\nA new story can frighten any creature, until it realizes its role within.
Target: 크와마들은 곧 동굴이 자기들 둥지라는 것을 배우고 영혼을 여왕으로서 대할 거에요. 그들은 거대한 나무를 해하려는 침입자로부터 함께 동굴을 지키게 되겠죠.\n\n새로운 환경은 어떤 생명체라도 겁먹게 만들 수 있답니다. 자기 역할을 깨달을 때까진 말이죠.

Source: Thank you. You move a great weight off of the heart of a dying man.\n\nThe future of our tribe … our honor … depends on you fulfilling our duty and fighting … the Withered Hand.
Target: 감사합니다. 죽어가는 남자의 마음에서 큰 짐을 덜어 주셨군요.\n\n우리 부족의 운명... 우리의 명예가 메마른 손과 싸우고 우리의 의무를 완수하는 당신의 손에 달려 있습니다.

Source: Whatever wards the disciples of this temple put in place to keep Arum-Khal bound are failing, and it's unlikely we'll find the means to mend them. \n\nWe'll have to deal with this threat head on. For that, I need your help.
Target: Whatever wards the disciples of this temple put in place to keep Arum-Khal bound are failing, and it's unlikely we'll find the means to mend them. \n\nWe'll have to deal with this threat head on. For that, I need your help.

Source: The Moonlight Blade, eh? And I assume this spirit bound himself to the sword somehow? Fascinating.\n\nWith this blade, and a wise spirit guiding us, we finally have a real chance at defeating Arum-Khal. Well done, my friend.
Target: The Moonlight Blade, eh? And I assume this spirit bound himself to the sword somehow? Fascinating.\n\nWith this blade, and a wise spirit guiding us, we finally have a real chance at defeating Arum-Khal. Well done, my friend.

Source: Well, I suspect his involvement had much more to do with you than the mural itself.\n\nFeel free to visit the House of Histories anytime you wish, free of charge. And here, a gift for your many troubles.
Target: Well, I suspect his involvement had much more to do with you than the mural itself.\n\nFeel free to visit the House of Histories anytime you wish, free of charge. And here, a gift for your many troubles.

Source: And only more to come, this one fears.\n\nBefore you leave, you should speak to Zamarak. It seems that he's also decided to leave us. Perhaps he can help guide you to your next location.
Target: 앞으로 더한것이 올 것 같다는 생각이 들어, 두렵다네. \n\n떠나기전에 자마락과 이야기 해보게나. 그는 우리를 떠나기로 결정 한 것 같네. 아마 자네가 다음으로 갈 장소 까지 길을 안내 해 줄 수 있을걸세.

Source: I think I'll stay here a while. The adepts of the Hidden Moon still have a great deal to teach us, it seems.\n\nAs for you, the Moonlight Blade remains in your care. Wield it justly, and never forget what we accomplished here. Azura guide you, friend.
Target: I think I'll stay here a while. The adepts of the Hidden Moon still have a great deal to teach us, it seems.\n\nAs for you, the Moonlight Blade remains in your care. Wield it justly, and never forget what we accomplished here. Azura guide you, friend.

Source: If it is true that you have joined the Ash'abah...you are not welcome in my home.
Target: If it is true that you have joined the Ash'abah...you are not welcome in my home.

Source: You are the one they say joined the Ash'abah. I cannot imagine why.
Target: You are the one they say joined the Ash'abah. I cannot imagine why.

Source: You were in no condition to fight. Kjalnar is dead, and the Draugrkin are gone. That's what matters.
Target: 너는 싸우기위한 상태가 아니였어. Kjalnar는 죽었고 Draugrkin는 사라졌어.\n그게 중요한거야.\n

Source: The Bloody Hand has one less skirimisher.
Target: 핏빛손에 척후병이 하나 줄었네요.

Source: What's my reward for clearing Unhallowed Grave?
Target: 더럽혀진 무덤을 공략한 나의 보상은 뭔가?

Source: What's my reward for clearing Unhallowed Grave?
Target: 더럽혀진 무덤을 공략한 나의 보상은 무엇인가?

Source: What's my reward for clearing out Icereach?
Target: 아이스리치를 공략한 것에 대한 나의 보상은 뭐지?

Source: So, what comes next?
Target: 그래서, 그 다음은 뭐지?

Source: What's my reward for clearing out Icereach?
Target: 아이스리치를 공략한 것에 대한 나의 보상은 뭐지?

Source: What's my reward for clearing out Icereach?
Target: 아이스리치를 공략한 것에 대한 나의 보상은 뭐지?

Source: If it weren't for your heroism and Tanval's sacrifice, Stonefalls would've been destroyed by that monster.
Target: If it weren't for your heroism and Tanval's sacrifice, Stonefalls would've been destroyed by that monster.

Source: That was risky, yes? Let us hope nothing was broken.\n\nOur rewards await!
Target: That was risky, yes? Let us hope nothing was broken.\n\nOur rewards await!

Source: My flute! I sold it after the earthquake ruined my home. It killed me to part with it, but I needed money for repairs. \n\nNot that it helped, with the continual tremors and monster attacks.
Target: 내 플루트! 지진으로 집이 엉망이 된 후에 팔았었는데. 내 손에서 떼어놓으려니 죽을 만큼 괴로웠지만, 수리에 쓸 돈이 필요했었소.\n\n계속되는 진동과 괴물들의 공격 때문에 돈은 도움이 되지 않았지만 말이오.

Source: You felt the rumblings. Saw the darkness pouring from the ground. You tell me what that was.\n\nAll I know is <<1>> gave her life to save us from it. Don't waste her sacrifice.
Target: 당신은 울림을 느꼈고, 땅에서 쏟아져 나오는 어둠을 봤어요. 당신은 내게 그게 뭐였는지 물어봤죠.\n\n 내가 아는 전부는 <<1>>가 우리를 구하기 위해 목숨을 바쳤다는 거에요. 그녀의 희생을 헛되이 하지 마세요.

Source: I'm certain. But no one else shall fall into their trap.\n\nYou managed what I could not. But it is done, which is all that matters.
Target: 확실해요. 그 누구도 놈들의 함정에 떨어지지 않겠죠.\n\n제가 할 수 없었던 일을 해내셨네요. 이제 끝난 일이라는게 중요한 거겠죠.

Source: Oh yes, my friend. I hereby grant you special dispensation to investigate the villain Angof in my name. \n\nBut you must keep this quiet, for we don't want to tip our hand. I shall never forget your service this day, however.
Target: 오, 그럼, 나의 친구여. 이로써 내 너에게 악당 앵고프를 조사하기 위한 특권을 나의 이름으로 부여하노라.\n\n그러나 자네는 이걸 비밀로 해야하네, 계획이 누설되지 않기 위함이지. 그러나 내 오늘 자네의 일은 결코 잊지 않을 걸세.

Source: An old trinket, but this one always felt it brought her some luck. Perhaps it's what led us to meet at this shrine!\n\nA true pleasure. It would be good to meet again, yes?
Target: 낡은 싸구려이지만, 이 카짓은 항상 이게 행운을 가져다준다고 느꼈지. 어쩌면 이 성소에서 만날 수 있도록 우리를 이끌어 줬을지도 몰라!\n\n진정으로 감사를 표할게. 다시 만난다면 좋겠어, 그렇지?

Source: I get to welcome you beneath the Veil. Do your damnedest to make the Veiled Queen proud.
Target: 베일 아래에서 널 환영한다. 베일의 여왕님께서 자랑스러워하시도록 최선을 다해라.

Source: Please come and play again!
Target: 부디 나중에 오셔서 다시 해 보세요!

Source: I knew he wouldn't give up. He won't come home until he finds Donus. I'll know if anything happens to either of them, I'm sure of it. Still, your news is good and I thank you. Take this for your trouble.
Target: I knew he wouldn't give up. He won't come home until he finds Donus. I'll know if anything happens to either of them, I'm sure of it. Still, your news is good and I thank you. Take this for your trouble.

Source: What are your plans?
Target: 당신의 계획은 무엇입니까?

Source: You fetcher! It was my idea!\n\nFine. I'll give it to Boril. I'm sure he'll pat me on the head for being so loyal and honest. Who needs all those annoying gold pieces cluttering up their purse, anyway?
Target: 당신은 가서 가져오는 사람이었어요! 그건 제 생각이었구요!\n\n하 좋아요. 제가 보릴에게 가져다 주도록 하죠. 저는 그가 매우 충실하고 정직하다고 내 머리를 쓰다듬을 것이라고 확신해요. 애초에 그런 쓸데없는 금조각들을 누가 자기의 지갑에 넣고 싶어 하겠어요?

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: I'm impressed. Taking out those officers threw the Lion Guard camps into chaos. That gave our reinforcements the distraction they needed to surround the valley. It's all clean up from here on out.\n\nWe couldn't have done this without you.
Target: 대단한데. 그 장교들이 없어졌으니 사자 근위대 야영지는 혼란에 빠질 거야. 우리 지원 병력이 골짜기를 포위할 동안 시선을 돌릴 수 있겠지. 이제부터는 우리가 전부 정리할거야.\n\n네가 없었다면 이 일도 해내지 못했겠지.

Source: Fjar? Really? I've known him for years, but I guess I didn't really know him at all. Makes me sad.\n\nThanks for your help. The Pact appreciates your loyalty.
Target: 프얄? 정말로? 내가 녀석을 알은 지도 몇 년인데, 진정한 모습은 전혀 몰랐던 모양이군. 슬픈 일이야.\n\n도와줘서 고마워. 조약은 네 충성에 고마워할거야.

Source: Indeed. For all you've done for our little community, you have my thanks. You are most welcome in Greenhill, from this day forth.
Target: 그렇군요. 우리 작은 공동체를 위해 해 준 일에 감사드려요. 당신은 오늘부터 그린힐의 가장 큰 환영을 받게 될 거에요.

Source: Indeed. For all you've done for our little community, you have my thanks. You are most welcome in Greenhill, from this day forth. I hope future days here will feature less heartache and sorrow.
Target: Indeed. For all you've done for our little community, you have my thanks. You are most welcome in Greenhill, from this day forth. I hope future days here will feature less heartache and sorrow.

Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: What's my reward for clearing Unhallowed Grave?
Target: 더럽혀진 무덤을 공략한 나의 보상은 뭔가?

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 할 건가요?

Source: I recognize you. Sir Hughes wanted me to convey his regards.
Target: 네가 누군지 알겠군. 휴즈 경은 내가 그의 안부를 전하기를 원했어.

Source: It's great to hear the Mages Guild have a new refuge for study and contemplation. Scholars should have a safe place to study, don't you think?
Target: It's great to hear the Mages Guild have a new refuge for study and contemplation. Scholars should have a safe place to study, don't you think?

Source: I found your sealed Akaviri tomes.
Target: I found your sealed Akaviri tomes.

Source: Ahzirr traajijazeri—"we justly take by force." At <<1>>, we study the thin line between justice and vengeance. We train so we will always know the difference.\n\nEnjoy your life, walker. You never know when those you love can slip away.
Target: Ahzirr traajijazeri- \\"우리는 정당하게 힘을 행사한다.\"\" <<1>>에서 우리는 정의와 복수 사이의 얇은 선을 연구하죠. 우리는 항상 그 둘의 차이를 알기 위해 훈련을합니다.\n\n인생을 즐기세요. 여행자여. 당신이 사랑하는 사람들이 언제 빠져 나가는지 당신은 결코 알지 못해요."

Source: My robes! They were stolen en route from my tailor in Faregyl. I've worn holes in my only other set. I'm sure you can imagine the jokes at my expense.\n\nWhat bandits wanted with my robes is beyond me.
Target: My robes! They were stolen en route from my tailor in Faregyl. I've worn holes in my only other set. I'm sure you can imagine the jokes at my expense.\n\nWhat bandits wanted with my robes is beyond me.

Source: Excellent! I knew she'd come through for me. Best news I've had in months. Here's your coin, hope you live long enough to spend it.
Target: Excellent! I knew she'd come through for me. Best news I've had in months. Here's your coin, hope you live long enough to spend it.

Source: The death of Princess Lakana was so tragic, but we appreciate your efforts to save her.
Target: The death of Princess Lakana was so tragic, but we appreciate your efforts to save her.

Source: I read two silly books. No wonder Jacques is so morose. He doesn't want to leave this place, but thankfully, I can.
Target: I read two silly books. No wonder Jacques is so morose. He doesn't want to leave this place, but thankfully, I can.

Source: Yes, I'm ready to take on some of these tasks.
Target: 좋아, 이 임무를 받을 준비가 됐어

Source: I found this note under Ilessan Tower.
Target: 일레산 탑에서 이 메모를 발견했습니다.

Source: They let a Red Rook help the Lion Guard at Eagle's Brook? I hope the soldiers double checked their supplies afterwards.
Target: They let a Red Rook help the Lion Guard at Eagle's Brook? I hope the soldiers double checked their supplies afterwards.

Source: Yes.
Target: 네.

Source: My cousin trades with Eagle's Brook. I hope his business doesn't suffer after that attack.
Target: My cousin trades with Eagle's Brook. I hope his business doesn't suffer after that attack.

Source: I hid the books.
Target: 책을 숨겼어요.

Source: The guardian is dead and I retrieved some temple dust.
Target: The guardian is dead and I retrieved some temple dust.

Source: Get what over with?
Target: 뭘 끝낸다고요?

Source: Odei was supposed to meet me on this end of the pass.
Target: 오데이는 이 길의 끝에서 나를 만나기로 돼 있었어요.

Source: It's done. <<1>> and his students are dead, and I gathered springmint for the healers.
Target: It's done. <<1>> and his students are dead, and I gathered springmint for the healers.

Source: Observe the Ceremony
Target: 의식 지켜보기

Source: Heard you wiped out that goblin tribe in Fungal Grotto. Maybe I can go visit the place now.
Target: Heard you wiped out that goblin tribe in Fungal Grotto. Maybe I can go visit the place now.

Source: <<1>> and his students are dead, plus I have your rice for you.
Target: <<1>> and his students are dead, plus I have your rice for you.

Source: You've passed the first test of your initiation. Congratulations.
Target: 입회식의 첫 번째 시험을 통과한 거야. 축하한다.

Source: Then … it's done. We've taken the school. We'll restart. We'll study to actually join the Thalmor. To put Bosmer and Khajiit in positions of power.\n\nThank you, my friend. The alliance is stronger for your courage.
Target: 그렇다면... 이제 끝났네요. 우리가 학교를 접수했거든요. 다시 시작해야죠. 진짜로 탈모어에 들어가기 위한 공부를 할 거에요. 보스머와 카짓을 권력의 자리에 올려놓는 거죠.\n\n고마워요, 친구. 당신의 용기가 있으면 우리 연합은 더 강해질 거에요.

Source: I was right about you. You're strong. But you can't bully me into forgetting what's important.\n\nIf you won't help me, I'll save Falinesti by myself!
Target: I was right about you. You're strong. But you can't bully me into forgetting what's important.\n\nIf you won't help me, I'll save Falinesti by myself!

Source: Hail, Champion of the Crucible!
Target: Hail, Champion of the Crucible!

Source: Werewolves tried to take over the town, but they didn't succeed.
Target: 늑대인간들이 마을을 장악하려 했지만 실패했다.

Source: Just as in Camlorn, fire made Faolchu vulnerable.
Target: 캠론에서와 같이, 불이 팔츄를 약하게 만들었다.

Source: I collected Mountain Tail for Sister Alarvyne.  The Sisters of Mara tend to the blighted, and she says the herb will make a soothing tea.
Target: I collected Mountain Tail for Sister Alarvyne.  The Sisters of Mara tend to the blighted, and she says the herb will make a soothing tea.

Source: The water made them thralls to the Nereids. They weren't in control of their actions.
Target: The water made them thralls to the Nereids. They weren't in control of their actions.

Source: Here's something we found near the ruin. Please take it for helping us.\n\nYou know, you're not bad to have around. Feel free to come dungeon delving with us whenever you want!
Target: 여기 저희가 유적에서 발견한것입니다. 저희를 도와주신 보상으로 가져가 주셨으면 좋겠습니다.\n\n당신도 알다시피, 당신과 함께 하는게 나쁘지 않은것 같습니다.원하신다면 언제든 자유롭게 저희와 던전을 탐구하러 오셔도 좋아요!

Source: Just as in Camlorn, fire made Faolchu vulnerable.
Target: 캠론에서와 같이, 불이 팔츄를 약하게 만들었다.

Target: 추방자의 지하묘지에서 <<z:1>>를 가져왔어요.

Target: Your sister sent me. This letter details the order she's been waiting for.

Source: How do we stop him?
Target: 그를 어떻게 막을 수 있죠?

Source: You saved those poor mages trapped within Elden Hollow. An honorable deed.
Target: You saved those poor mages trapped within Elden Hollow. An honorable deed.

Source: I'm back from Shael Ruins.
Target: 쉘 유적에서 돌아왔어요.

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Yes. The words have been spoken. \n\nNormally my father would conduct a small ceremony and speak the words … but his spirit moved on while you were unconscious. His last request was that you and I would destroy the Withered Hand.
Target: 예. 물론입니다.\n\n평상시라면 제 아버지께서 작은 축하의식을 치르고 말씀을 해주시겠지만... 당신이 환영을 경험하는 동안, 그분의 영혼은 다른 곳으로 떠나가시고 말았죠. 그분의 마지막 유언은 저와 당신이 메마른 손을 물리쳐야 한다는 거였어요.

Source: I placed the wards in the Corpse Garden.
Target: 시체들의 정원에 보호석을 가져다놨어요.

Source: She's a bit too obsessed with old Fahara'jad for me, but I like her style. Seeing as I need a new ship, gold will come in handy.\n\nI'm in. Can't let what you did for us go unrewarded. See you back in town.
Target: 그녀는 늙은 파하라자드와 있었던 일 이후로 나한테 조금 집착하는 경향이 있어, 그래도 그녀 방식은 마음에 들어. 마침 새로운 배가 필요하기도 하니, 너를 도와주면 돈을 벌기도 좋겠군.\n\n나도 참여하지. 네가 우리에게 해 준 일을 생각하면, 가만있을 수는 없으니까. 마을에서 다시 만나자.

Source: He what? Kyne take him! Wherever he is, I'm sure the old bastard is laughing at me. Imagine. Leading the military here, alone.\n\nI suppose I should thank you, my friend. Without you, well, I hope to see you again before we meet in Sovngarde.
Target: He what? Kyne take him! Wherever he is, I'm sure the old bastard is laughing at me. Imagine. Leading the military here, alone.\n\nI suppose I should thank you, my friend. Without you, well, I hope to see you again before we meet in Sovngarde.

Source: I've not only saved Moon Hunter Keep, but also collected the necessary ingredients to cure Adonatus from lycanthropy. I should speak to him in order to receive my reward.
Target: 문 헌터 요새를 구했을 뿐 아니라, 아도나투스의 늑대인간화를 치료하기 위한 재료를 모두 모았다. 보상을 받기 위해 그와 이야기 해야 한다.

Source: I heard Bloodthorn assassins tried to kill King Casimir.
Target: 핏빛가시단 암살자가 카시미르(Casimir) 왕을 죽이려 했다는 이야길 들었어요.

Source: I heard you convinced Martin Dathieu to enlist in the guard. I hope he's half the soldier his father was.
Target: 당신이 마틴 다티유가 경비대에 입대하도록 설득했다고 들었어요. 그 애가 아버지의 반이라도 닮았으면 좋겠군요.

Source: Keep your voice down! Apphia was a mistake, a one-time thing. That's why I sent the fool girl away.\n\nIf my wife finds out, she'll carve me a new smile! Take this and forget all about it.
Target: 목소리 낮춰! 아피아는 실수였어. 하룻밤 관계였다고. 그래서 그 바보같은 여자애를 멀리 보냈던거야.\n\n내 아내가 이걸 알면, 날 썰어버릴 거라고! 이걸 받고 이 문제는 전부 잊어 줘.

Source: I … you're right. That stuff doesn't belong to me.\n\nI'll make sure the families get their goods back. And I'm sorry for making up that story.
Target: 나 ... 당신말이 맞아. 그 물건들은 내것이 아냐\n 가족들에게 물건을 돌려줄거야. 그리고 거짓말해서 미안해

Source: These beasts made our people suffer. We've gathered this reward for you.\n\nI could pray for your kills to be quick and many, but you don't need my blessings. You're already a great hunter.
Target: 이 짐승들은 우리 민족을 고통스럽게 만들었습니다. 당신을 위해 포상을 준비했습니다.\n\n 당신의 사냥이 더 빨라지고 사냥감이 많아지길 기도 할 수도 있지만, 그럴 필요는 없을 것 같군요. 당신은 이미 위대한 사냥꾼입니다.

Source: Pellingare deserves a chance. He goes to trial.
Target: 펠링게어에게 기회를 줘야 해. 그는 재판에 회부될거야.

Source: What happens now?
Target: What happens now?

Source: So Raynor's control rod actually works. Do you believe it?\n\nLet's see those parts. I think I know how to fix this thing.
Target: 레이노어의 제어봉이 실제로 작동한다니. 이게 믿겨져요?\n\n 이 부품들 좀 보세요. 제 생각엔 이걸 고칠 수 있을것 같아요.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>

Source: Ah, I thought he might be telling tall tales. Still, what Gorak did was brave. Stupid, but brave.\n\nThank you for finding Gorak, stranger. I shudder to think what those cultists would have done to him.
Target: Ah, I thought he might be telling tall tales. Still, what Gorak did was brave. Stupid, but brave.\n\nThank you for finding Gorak, stranger. I shudder to think what those cultists would have done to him.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Thank you, now get out of here.
Target: 고맙군. 이제 썩 꺼져.

Source: I knew you were the one I was waiting for!\n\nWhatever your purpose here, I can help you. Especially if it has anything to do with ruining Molag Bal's day.
Target: 내가 기다리던 자가 바로 너였을 줄 알았느니라!\n\n몰라그 발이 날 가둔 것은 다 이유가 있다. 날 두려워하지. 날 풀어 준다면 놈이 우리를 적으로 돌렸던 날을 후회하게 만들어줄 수 있을 것이니라.

Source: Tamien, here? I hoped he would return.\n\nThere's no time for that right now, though. We need to act, before the Bloodthorn cultists cause more damage.
Target: 타미엔이 여기에?  그가 돌아와줄거라 믿었어요.\n\n 하지만 지금은 그런 말 하고 있을 때가 아니예요. 핏빛가시단 광신도들이 더 많은 피해를 입히기 전에 행동해야 합니다.

Source: What happens now?
Target: What happens now?

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I thought I'd never see this again! When the Goblins attacked, I panicked and ran. If I'd known how desperately I'd need my instruments here, I would have held onto my bag.\n\nThank you for returning it to me!
Target: 다시는 이걸 볼 수 없을거라 생각했소! 고블린들이 날 공격했을 때 공황에 빠져서 도망쳤었지. 여기서 내 의료 기구가 얼마나 절실하게 필요할지 알았더라면 가방을 꼭 가져왔을 거요.\n\n가방을 돌려줘서 고맙소!

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Ah, it's good to make new business acquaintances.\n\nRemember Naril Heleran, my friend. We may see each other again.

Source: Finally. I needed those a week ago. I'm going to have to find a new supplier if Saldir can't deliver on time.\n\nThis is for your trouble.
Target: 드디어 왔군요. 일주일 전에 필요했었다고요. 살디어가 제 시간에 배달을 해줄 수 없다면 다른 공급자를 찾아야겠어요.\n\n여기 당신 보수에요.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Good luck with your music.
Target: 너의 음악에 행운이 있기를.

Source: My son sent you here? Where is he?\n\nWait, there's no time for that. We must act quickly. The Bloodthorn must be stopped.
Target: 우리 아들이 여기 보냈나? 그는 어디 있지?\n\n 잠깐, 그럴 시간이 없어. 우리는 빨리 행동해야 해. 핏빛가시단을 멈춰야 해.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Yes, I have the ash.
Target: 네. 재를 가져왔어요.

Source: I found this blackened gem inside a Dwemer orrery, but I can't read the writing.
Target: I found this blackened gem inside a Dwemer orrery, but I can't read the writing.

Source: It figures Hilka was the traitor. You know she tried to punch me out once? Well, I'm not going to shed any tears.\n\nThanks to you, I have my scouts back, and you gave me the cover I needed to secure their exit. You're a credit to the Pact.
Target: 힐카였을 줄 알았지. 한번은 그녀석이 날 때려눕히려 했던 건 알아? 뭐, 눈물흘릴 일은 없겠구만.\n\n당신 덕분에 내 정찰대원들이 돌아왔고, 안전하게 빠져나올 출구를 확보할 수 있었지. 당신은 조약의 자랑거리야.

Source: Thank you. I'll begin my research straight away. You'll be the first we contact once I know the details.\n\nIn the meantime, Sees-All-Colors sends her regrets she couldn't stay. She said she had an urgent matter to attend to.
Target: 고맙소. 곧 연구를 시작할 거요. 자세한 정보를 알게 되면 당신에게 가장 먼저 연락하도록 하겠소.\n\nSees-All-Colors가 이 곳에 머무를 수 없어 유감스럽다고 전해달라 했소. 그녀는 처리해야할 긴급한 문제가 있다고 했소.

Source: So it was Hald? Damn. He was tortured years ago, in Daggerfall. I don't think he ever recovered. That's no excuse for treason, but it still makes me sad. \n\nThanks for your help. The Pact appreciates your loyalty.
Target: 할드였다고? 젠장. 녀석은 몇 년 전에 대거폴에서 고문당한 적이 있었어. 극복하지 못했을 줄은 몰랐는데. 그게 반역죄에 대한 변명이 될 수는 없지만, 그래도 슬픈 일이야.\n\n도와줘서 고마워. 조약은 네 충성에 고마워할거야.

Source: I have the ash you wanted.
Target: 당신이 원하던 재가 있어요.

Source: I found these letters carved into a stone in Zalgaz's Den. What do they mean?
Target: I found these letters carved into a stone in Zalgaz's Den. What do they mean?

Source: I have the ash right here.
Target: 여기 재를 가져왔어요.

Source: I found this Dwemer lexicon in Rkhardahrk.
Target: I found this Dwemer lexicon in Rkhardahrk.

Source: Yes. I consecrated her remains as you asked.
Target: 예. 나는 네가 묻는대로 그녀의 유골을 봉헌했다.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: You're welcome.
Target: 천만에요.

Source: You're welcome.
Target: 천만에요.

Source: Do you think that's a possibility?
Target: Do you think that's a possibility?

Source: Is there anything else I can do?
Target: Is there anything else I can do?

Source: Truly, your coming was a gift from Mara herself! To confess the truth, I feared I'd sent you to your death. My faith was being tested. I see that now. Thank you, and go with the love of Mara.
Target: 진실로 네가 온 것은 마라의 선물이었어! 솔직히 말하자면, 나는 너를 사지로 내몬 건 아닐까 두려웠단다. 내 믿음이 시험받고 있었던 거야. 이제야 알겠어. 고맙구나, 마라의 사랑과 함께 하기를.

Source: How thoughtful of you both! Mansa knows cold-water fish are my favorite. A simple pleasure in these troubled times.\n\nPlease accept something for your efforts.
Target: 둘 다 정말 배려심있네요! 제가 제일 좋아하는게 찬물 생선이라는걸 만사가 알거든요. 이 힘든 시기의 소박한 즐거움이네요.\n\n애써 주셨으니 부디 답례를 받아 주세요.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Masterfully done. Truly a procurement worthy of praise … and reward!\n\nIt's an honor and a privilege doing business with you, friend.
Target: Masterfully done. Truly a procurement worthy of praise … and reward!\n\nIt's an honor and a privilege doing business with you, friend.

Source: I knew you were the one I was waiting for!\n\nMolag Bal locked me away for a reason. He fears me. Once you set me free, we can make him regret the day he made us his enemies.
Target: 내가 기다리던 자가 바로 너였을 줄 알았느니라!\n\n몰라그 발이 날 가둔 것은 다 이유가 있다. 날 두려워하지. 날 풀어 준다면 놈이 우리를 적으로 돌렸던 날을 후회하게 만들어줄 수 있을 것이니라.

Source: What now?
Target: What now?

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: congrats, you clicked both the chest and the rock.
Target: 축하합니다. 당신은 상자와 바위를 동시에 클릭하였습니다.

Source: I hope it was worth it. Those Bloodthorn cultists will cause trouble elsewhere, no doubt.\n\nThere's some consolation that you stopped the necromantic ritual, however. We'll take care of the remaining cultists and their zombies.
Target: 그만한 가치가 있기를 바랍니다. 저 핏빛가시단 광신도들은 의심의 여지없이 다른 곳에서 문제를 일으킬 것입니다.\n\n 그나마 당신이 네크로맨서의 의식을 중단해서 다행입니다. 우리는 나머지 광신도들과 그들의 좀비들을 처리할 것입니다.

Source: I think I've done all I can. You're pretty tough—tougher than me, at least. You may be ready for the next fight, but I'm going to need a few minutes.\n\nGo on, though. With you on our side, this whole Maormer thing will be over quick, I imagine.
Target: 할 수 있는건 다 한 것 같네요. 당신 꽤나 강하신데요. 적어도 나보다는 강하세요. 당신은 다음 싸움을 벌일 준비가 됐을지도 모르겠지만, 난 몇 분 정도 쉬어야겠어요.\n\n그래도 계속해 주세요. 당신이 우리 편에 있으니 저 마오머 문제도 금방 끝날 것 같네요.

Source: I'm not so certain.
Target: 잘 모르겠습니다만.

Source: So I see. Sent the cultists right into our waiting blades. Good job!\n\nYou were right about that bandit. He really came through for us. We'll deal with the remaining cultists and their zombies.
Target: So I see. Sent the cultists right into our waiting blades. Good job!\n\nYou were right about that bandit. He really came through for us. We'll deal with the remaining cultists and their zombies.

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: What we saw … could it be the future of the Dominion?
Target: 우리가 본 것은 ... 그게 자치령의 미래 인건가요?

Source: Seems like we made it.
Target: Seems like we made it.

Target: We receive these scrolls on behalf of the Golden Eye. We vow to begin our research anew.\n\nThis will take generations, but what is time to the Abider in the Abyss?

Source: I'm proud to stand with you, Shazah.
Target: 너와 함께할 수 있어 영광이야 , 샤자.

Source: So you'd say the Boast went well?
Target: 자랑 축제가 잘 풀렸다는 말인가요?

Source: Details from Major Cirenwe and Fariel to bring you up to speed.
Target: 쉽게 이해하실 수 있도록 지휘관 시렌웨와 파리엘이 자세한 사항들을 적어 보냈습니다.

Source: We will figure that out together. Though the invitation didn't start out in your hands, that's where it ended up. You were meant to be here. \n\nA great danger approaches this Academy. And you will save us from this disaster. I have foreseen it!
Target: 우리는 그것을 같이 알아낼 것입니다. 초대가 당신의 손에서 시작하진 않았지만 그 손이 모든 상황을 끝낼 것입니다.\n큰 위험이 이 아카데미에 접근하고 당신이 재앙으로부터 우리를 구해낼 거예요 난 그것을 예언해왔죠.

Source: I remember my death, but that is the past now. You have more pressing matters to deal with than to listen to a ghost's stories. You have the decanter now.
Target: 난 내 죽음을 기억하지. 하지만 다 지난 일이야. 넌 유령의 이야기를 듣는것 보다 더 중요한 문제가 있지. 이제 유리병을 가지고 가도록 해라.

Source: Apparently, they found this crazy old Breton lost in the desert. Stibbons...that was his name.
Target: Apparently, they found this crazy old Breton lost in the desert. Stibbons...that was his name.

Source: Hey there. My friend Stibbons wanted me to say hello, tell you 'thanks again'.
Target: Hey there. My friend Stibbons wanted me to say hello, tell you 'thanks again'.

Target: 유감입니다.

Source: Yes, and I am grateful for that. You deserve a reward, wayfarer, not me. \n\nI will keep them safe now until we get to a town. Then I will return their money and go on my way.
Target: 그렇죠. 정말 감사드립니다. 제가 아니라 당신이 보상을 받을 자격이 있어요, 여행자여.\n\n이제 우리가 마을에 도착할 때까지 제가 그들을 보호할 겁니다. 그 뒤에는 그들에게 돈을 돌려주고 제 갈 길을 갈 거에요.

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Target: 그 배신자 Montclair가 Doomcrag 꼭대기에 숨어 ​​있습니다! 정면에서의보고에 의하면 경비원이 슈라우드 패스를 통제하고 있다고합니다.\n

Target: 뱀 자리가 전사 자리의 향점석을 오염시켰지만 원상태로 되돌렸습니다.

Source: I defeated the betrayer, Abelazar of the Scaled Court.
Target: I defeated the betrayer, Abelazar of the Scaled Court.

Source: Shada is dead. She wanted more thralls to fight the Celestials above.
Target: Shada is dead. She wanted more thralls to fight the Celestials above.

Source: I've just come from <<1>>. <<2>> sent me. The island was attacked by Maormer.
Target: 방금 <<1>>에서 온 참입니다. <<2>>가 보냈죠. 섬이 마오머들에게 공격당했습니다.

Source: <<1>> is dead.
Target: <<1>>은 죽었어요.

Source: I don't know what you're planning, but I need a good, long rest. I'll head over to Hatching Pools in a few days.\n\nYou have a new weapon to try out, I think. I wish you luck, and long life!
Target: I don't know what you're planning, but I need a good, long rest. I'll head over to Hatching Pools in a few days.\n\nYou have a new weapon to try out, I think. I wish you luck, and long life!

Source: Give me the Fang. I've got a special coffer that will deaden its spell. What happened to <<1>> need not happen to anyone else.\n\nPoor bastard. I'll miss him. And he only had one Fang of Sithis? There should have been two. Hmm.
Target: Give me the Fang. I've got a special coffer that will deaden its spell. What happened to <<1>> need not happen to anyone else.\n\nPoor bastard. I'll miss him. And he only had one Fang of Sithis? There should have been two. Hmm.

Target: 스카웃 야울이 나를 보내달라고했습니다.

Target: 그랬으면 좋겠소.

Source: This one has heard of your bravery. You drove the Colovians from Arenthia!
Target: This one has heard of your bravery. You drove the Colovians from Arenthia!

Source: Merric, Aelif, and I will confer with the council of Provost Generals. We'll want to talk about the attack, and this revelation about Guildmaster Iceblade. We'll contact you again, when there's more to discuss. Until then, comrade.
Target: 메릭, 에일리프, 그리고 저는 Provost General 회의와 협의할 겁니다. 그 공격과 길드마스터 아이스블레이드의 폭로에 대해 얘기하고 싶군요. 논의할 것이 더 생기면 당신에게 다시 연락하겠습니다. 그럼 그 때까지, 동지여.

Target: The Thizzrini champion, here before me!

Source: My crew. They got excited and rushed to grab the treasure. The gold—it turned them into skeletons!\n\nThen some kind of spectre appeared and ordered my own crew to attack me. I had to kill them, curse the luck.
Target: 내 선원들이, 흥분해서는 달려들어 보물을 집어들었어. 그 황금이... 녀석들을 해골로 바꿔버렸다고!\n\n그러더니 어떤 망령이 나타나서 선원들에게 날 공격하라고 명령했지. 녀석들을 죽여야만 했어. 저주받은 운수로군.

Source: You've saved my life.\n\nI spoke at length with that witch—with Drodda, before she cast me in ice. My family has caused her, and many of her kind, much grief. I will restore this Keep, but no more will it be a headquarters for witch-hunting.
Target: 당신은 내 목숨을 구했습니다.\n\n저 마녀, 드로다(Drodda)가 날 얼음으로 만들기 전에, 그녀는 나와 많은 이야기를 나눴었습니다. 우리 가문은 그녀와 그녀의 일족들에게 지울 수 없는 상처를 줬었습니다. 나는 이 성을 재건할 것이지만, 더 이상 마녀 사냥을 위한 본부로 사용하지는 않을 것입니다.

Source: The aspects have been reunited with the Lost One. Now they must resist the Serpent's corruption.
Target: 형상들은 잃어버린 자와 재결합했어요. 이제 그들은 뱀의 타락에 대항해야 합니다.

Target: 아, 그렇군요. 제가 당신에게 저한테 보고하라 했었군요.\n\n트라이뷰널을 대변하여, 신성 집행관은 당신에게 감사를 드리며 이 보상을 드립니다. 그리고 세 분께서 당신을 지켜봐주시길.

Source: Thank you. Take this as a reward.\n\nIt may not seem like much, but even one dead enemy could mean the difference between victory and defeat.

Target: 크라! 네가 먼저 시작하게 뒀으면 안됐던건데! 이제 사라지는 뭘 사냥하지? 새나 줄다람쥐? \n\n음, 내기는 내기야, 그렇지? 여기. 이걸가지고 괜찮은 음식이라고 서먹어,여행자. 강인한 근육과 빛나는 털은 저녁 식사로부터 시작된다고! 잘가.

Source: I do, if you didn't let some filthy scamp run off with it.
Target: 원합니다. 당신이 그 더러운 스캠프들이 내 보상을 가지고 도망치게 내버려 두지 않았다면 말이죠.

Source: I picked every pocket I could find.
Target: 눈에 보이는 주머니는 전부 다 털어 왔어요.

Source: I do, if you didn't let some filthy scamp run off with it.
Target: I do, if you didn't let some filthy scamp run off with it.

Source: I picked some pockets like you asked.
Target: I picked some pockets like you asked.

Source: Brivan was Ulran's best friend. Would he really betray my brother?\n\nRegardless, I want you to have this. You could have handed me to my father and you didn't. Other than Naryu and Ashur, you might be the only friend I have left.
Target: 브리반은 울란의 가장 친한 친구였어. 그가 정말로 우리 오빠를 배신했을까?\n\n상관없어.이걸 받아줘. 당신은 나를 아버지 께 넘겨 줄 수 있었지만 하지 않았지. 나류와 어셔를 제외하면, 당신은 제게 남은 유일한 친구일지도 몰라.

Source: Ah, indeed you do! The Gorger of Glenumbra, captured once more! Its bestial intellect swayed by the promise of grisly table scraps!\n\nZiss'vo, could you work with me here? It's part of the mystique. Just take your gold and act astounded, all right?
Target: Ah, indeed you do! The Gorger of Glenumbra, captured once more! Its bestial intellect swayed by the promise of grisly table scraps!\n\nZiss'vo, could you work with me here? It's part of the mystique. Just take your gold and act astounded, all right?

Target: 밤의 화염 보그단을 죽인 건 얼마나 가치가 있죠?

Source: You have done enough for today. Though lives were lost, thanks to you others were saved.\n\nTake this for your efforts. And keep your ears open. We will contact you when the king again has need of your services.
Target: You have done enough for today. Though lives were lost, thanks to you others were saved.\n\nTake this for your efforts. And keep your ears open. We will contact you when the king again has need of your services.

Source: Yes, but your journey continues. The time has come for you to move on.\n\nWe will work to restore order in Morrowind. You may leave that to the Three.
Target: 그래, 하지만 너의 여행은 계속 될 거야. 이제 다음 단계로 향해야 한다.\n\n우리는 모로윈드의 질서를 되찾으려 한다. 이 일은 우리 삼신에게 맡기도록.

Source: Hmm. I'm grateful for your service, friend. I wish I could say with certainty that this won't happen again, but Riekr are stubborn brutes. I'm afraid we may call on you again before long. Farewell.
Target: 흠. 당신의 도움에 감사드립니다. 다시는 이런 일은 없을 거라고 확언하고 싶지만, 리클들은 고집센 짐승들입니다. 조만간 다시 찾아뵐지도 모르겠군요. 그럼 안녕히 가시길.

Source: Holgunn, Walks-In-Ash, the Vanguard, and myself. We'll follow you to Oblivion and beyond. \n\nGaryn trusted you. I only wish I had done the same.
Target: Holgunn, Walks-In-Ash, the Vanguard, and myself. We'll follow you to Oblivion and beyond. \n\nGaryn trusted you. I only wish I had done the same.

Source: I cannot be named queen without the Mane's blessing. That, however, is my worry.\n\nFor now, you should rest. We must honor our fallen and learn the fate of our troops at the Moon Gate. And after that, we will celebrate a new dawn for Elsweyr.
Target: I cannot be named queen without the Mane's blessing. That, however, is my worry.\n\nFor now, you should rest. We must honor our fallen and learn the fate of our troops at the Moon Gate. And after that, we will celebrate a new dawn for Elsweyr.

Target: 너에게 보상을 하고 싶군. 그리 많지는 않지만, 그들의 야영지에서 훔친 것들이다. 이젠 너의 것이다.\n\n이제 나머지 침략자들을 고통스럽게 만들어줄 것이다.

Source: So that is the Dragonhorn? It is much smaller than I thought it would be, and it looks fragile. Sound it once and it will probably crumble to dust. What are we supposed to do with such a thing?\n\nAs always, you have my thanks, five-claw.
Target: 그럼 이게 드래곤 뿔 나팔이야? 내가 생각했던 것 보다 훨씬 작고, 약해보이는데. 한번 불어서 소리를 내고 나면 먼지가 될 것 처럼 생겼어. 우리가 이걸 어떻게 사용해야 하는거지?\n\n언제나 생각하는 거지만, 네게 고마워, 다섯-발톱.

Source: Based on recent events, only one course of action makes sense. We must strike at Rimmen and remove my half-sister from the throne before she rallies her forces.\n\nFirst, however, take this. Compensation for stopping the undead and killing a Dragon.
Target: 최근 사건들을 바탕으로 이야기하자면, 오직 하나의 방법만이 이 일을 끝낼 수 있어. 우리는 림멘을 공격하고 내 이복-여동생이 그녀의 군대들을 불러모으기 전에, 그녀를 왕좌에서 제거해야 해. \n\n하지만, 우선은, 이걸 받아라. 언데드를 막고 용을 죽인 것에 대한 보상이다.

Target: You won't see much of Duke Sebastien anymore. He's a werewolf, so they locked him up and threw away the key.

Source: The cat can do as she pleases. Based on the skills she has already demonstrated, however, I am not averse to having her along. Just realize that I plan to utilize the weapon, despite her protestations.\n\nNow take this. For your efforts.
Target: 그건 저 고양이가 좋다면 상관없어. 지금까지 그녀가 보여준 기술들을 보면 그녀는 이미 자신의 기량을 보여준거나 다름없으니,동행에 반대하지는 않겠지만, 이것만은 있지 않아줬으면 좋겠군. 난 무기 사용하는걸 반대하더라도 무기를 이용 해야겠어. \n\n우선 이걸 받아라. 네게주는 보상이다.

Source: We were in pain. Your kindness saved us from a tormented existence.\n\nI sent my husband to Camp Tamrith. If you happen to meet him, tell him what happened here. Tell him not to return. Let Crestshade be forgotten.
Target: 우리는 고통 받고 있었어요. 당신의 호의가 우리를 고통에서 구해주었어요.\n\n제 남편을 탐리스 야영지로 보냈습니다. 만약 당신이 그를 우연히 만난다면, 여기서 무슨 일이 있었는지 전해 주세요. 그에게 돌아오지 말라고 말해 주세요. 크레스트셰이드가 잊혀지게 해 주세요.

Source: As my next sermon shall proclaim, "Modesty is the false cloak of a flatterer or the sincere garment of the humble."\n\nAgain, you have my gratitude and that of all my people. Indeed, even those who rail against the Tribunal owe you their lives.
Target: 다음 설교에서는 \\"깊은 신중함은 추종자가 쓰기 위한 망토나 진정한 겸양이 두르는 장식이니\"\"라고 말하겠네.\n\n한번 더 그대에게 감사를 표하노라. 나와 우리 백성으로부터 말이지. 트라이뷰널에 반대하는 자의 목숨조차 구해주었네."

Source: The liberator of Satakalaam! I salute you!
Target: The liberator of Satakalaam! I salute you!

Source: Finally, a competent worker! You'd be surprised how difficult those are to come by these days. You should sleep better knowing that creature won't be ruining anymore careers. And I'm sure the extra gold in your pocket doesn't hurt either.
Target: 드디어 유능한 사람을 발견했어! 요즘에는 그런 사람을 찾는게 얼마나 어려웠던지. 저 괴물이 이제 더이상 어떠한 사람의 인생도 파괴할 수 없다는걸 알게되면 좀 더 푹 잠 잘수 있을거야. 추가 보수가 호주머니에 들어오는 것도 나쁜건 아닐거야.

Source: They did. Numaia's sweet boy is a little shaken. Hopefully a hearty meal and a nice, long chin scratch will settle his nerves, yes?\n\nYou have this one's deepest thanks, walker. Milksop's too! Say thank you, sweet boy! Go ahead, now. Oh, never mind!
Target: They did. Numaia's sweet boy is a little shaken. Hopefully a hearty meal and a nice, long chin scratch will settle his nerves, yes?\n\nYou have this one's deepest thanks, walker. Milksop's too! Say thank you, sweet boy! Go ahead, now. Oh, never mind!

Source: You follow the path and honor the hunt. Continue this course and you'll always find a place at our fires, Outlander.\n\nFor now, take this as a token of our mutual respect.
Target: 자네는 길을 따르고 사냥에 경의를 표했네. 이 과정을 계속하면 자네는 항상 우리의 모닥불을 찾을 수 있을거야, 이방인.\n\n 지금은 이것을 상호 존중의 표식으로 삼아주게.

Source: An impressive trophy from a worthy hunt! I'm beginning to forget you're an Outlander.\n\nAllow me to honor you, in turn, with this humble reward.
Target: 가치있는 사냥의 인상적인 전리품이로고! 자네가 이방인이라는 사실을 잊어 버리기 시작했네.\n\n이 보잘것없는 보상으로 자네에 대한 존경심을 표하는걸 허락해주게나.

Source: Stupid Hadaz. Always thought he'd die from something silly, like falling down a privy. I'll let his family know.\n\nAnd this hammer? Scary business, right? I'll deliver it to the Mane's priests. They'll know what to do with it. Thanks again, rhook.
Target: Stupid Hadaz. Always thought he'd die from something silly, like falling down a privy. I'll let his family know.\n\nAnd this hammer? Scary business, right? I'll deliver it to the Mane's priests. They'll know what to do with it. Thanks again, rhook.

Source: Excellent! The tribe will eat well tonight and praise your hunting prowess with every delicious morsel.\n\nSuch effort does not go unrewarded. Take this, with our compliments.
Target: 훌륭하군! 부족은 오늘 밤, 배불리 먹을 것이고 자네의 사냥감으로 맛있는 요리를 만들어 칭찬할 걸세.\n\n그런 노력이 무시되면 안 되지. 여기 받게, 우리의 호의일세.

Source: A trophy from a greater hive golem? Impressive. A word of advice, though. The stink of fetcherflies clings to you like a tangled shawl. Soak in a hot spring and eliminate that scent before you hunt again.\n\nHere's your reward.
Target: 큰 벌집 골렘의 전리품인가? 인상적이군. 그래도 충고 한마디 하자면. 페치 플라이 악취가  얽힌 목도리처럼 자네에게 달라 붙어 있네. 다시 사냥을 나서기 전에 온천에 몸을 담그고 그 냄새를 없애게나.\n\n 여기 보상일세.

Source: I do not know. I must reflect on this.\n\nStill, I thank you for all that you've done. You saved my companions, found my egg-mother's research, and helped the oasis begin to heal. No small feats to accomplish, traveler-friend.

Source: This note, along with the other evidence you uncovered, clearly implicates the Governor as working with the slavers. Well done!\n\nYou have provided a great service to Seyda Neen. I'll take it from here.
Target: 이 쪽지는 당신이 발견한 다른 증거와 함께 총독이 노예상인들과 함께 일한다는 것을 분명히 암시하고 있어. 잘 했어!\n\n세이다 닌에 훌륭한 봉사를 해줬어. 내가 여기부터 맡지.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Capital! Hmm, the cover's a bit bent and the pages are showing some boxing. Still, I appreciate your efforts.\n\nI'll need more of these pages recovered eventually. I did bring several dozen copies of the book, after all. I hope you'll be available.
Target: 최고야! 흠, 표지가 약간 구부러졌고 복싱의 흔적이 보이네요. 그래도, 노력해줘서 고마워요.\n\n결국 이 페이지들을 더 복구 해봐야겠네요. 저는 이 책의 복사본을 수십권 가져 왔었거든요. 어쨋든, 다음에도 당신에게 시간이 있었으면 좋겠네요.

Source: Nothing yet! I need to catalog them, study the ancient script, and make suitable translations. But given time, the Great Houses will see the value in this project and reward our efforts accordingly.\n\nIn the meantime, take this with my gratitude.
Target: 아직 아무것도 하지 않았어! 목록을 작성해서 고대문자를 조사하고 적절하게 번역하는 거지. 그러는동안 대가문이 이 계획의 가치를 알아주겠지. 노력에 걸맞는 보수를 줄거야.\n\n먼저, 감사의 표시로서 이걸 받아주게.

Source: Bah! Are you always so damn noble? You need to lighten up, my friend. \n\nPerhaps this will lighten your spirits. It's a small token of my appreciation, but one I hope will serve you as you have served me. You're a hero … and now, a friend too.
Target: 하하! 자네 항상 그렇게 고귀하게 행동할 건가? 자네는 심각하게 받아들이지 않을 필요가 있어, 친구.\n\n아마도 이게 자네 영혼의 긴장을 폴어줄 지도 모르지. 내 감사의 작은 증표일세. 자네가 나를 섬겼듯 이 증표가 자네를 도와주길 바란다네.  자네는 영웅이고 ... 또한 이제, 내 친구이기도 하다네.

Source: Do you feel it within your own heart—that righteous simmer of hatred? It is the gift you earned today. \n\nGo. Avenge yourself of every slight and transgression. Spread my wrath!
Target: Do you feel it within your own heart—that righteous simmer of hatred? It is the gift you earned today. \n\nGo. Avenge yourself of every slight and transgression. Spread my wrath!

Source: You have done well, but we can ill afford complacency! More corruption will come to threaten the wild, I know it. We must be prepared. \n\nI will remain here … unless they stop serving this bread. Farewell.
Target: You have done well, but we can ill afford complacency! More corruption will come to threaten the wild, I know it. We must be prepared. \n\nI will remain here … unless they stop serving this bread. Farewell.

Source: Yes. Eoki may curse me, but he'll see the wisdom in this eventually. I'll sweep his role in the escape under the rug—keep him safe from reprisals. One day, he'll thank me.\n\nI appreciate your help in all of this, sera. You're a true friend.
Target: 그래. 에오키는 나를 저주 할지도 모르지만, 결국 이게 현명한 일이었다는 걸 알게 될 거야. 나는 그의 역할을 은폐하고 보복으로부터 그를 안전하게 지켜줄거야. 언젠가 내게 고마워하겠지.\n\n이 모든 것을 도와줘서 고마워 감사합니다. 당신은 진정한 친구야.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: Today you rekindled the simmer of hatred at the heart of the Orcs. May it fuel their vengeance for another generation.\n\nGo. Spread my wrath to the corners of the world!
Target: 오늘 너는 오크들의 마음에 증오를 다시금 불러일으켰다. 그들의 원한이 후대에까지 전해지길.\n\n 가라. 세상 끝까지 나의 진노를 퍼뜨리라.

Source: I suppose I did, but it brings me no joy. Little wonder that other members of my House do the wrong thing so often.\n\nThank you for all you've done, sera. I will never forget your loyalty and friendship.
Target: 그랬다고 생각하지만, 기쁘지는 않아. 우리 가문의 다른 사람들이 그렇게 자주 나쁜 일을 하는 것은 놀랄 일이 아니지만.\n\n고마워, 나는 결코 당신의 충의와 우정을 잊지 않을 거야.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: Well done.\n\nHow easily our people forget the past. How eager they are to bury it in the endless ash. We never forget. We never forgive. Now take this, with our thanks.
Target: 잘 하셨어요.\n\n우리 사람들은 얼마나 쉽게 과거를 잊고 있을까요. 그들은 그것을 끝없는 재 속에 묻어버리기를 얼마나 간절히 바라고 있을까요. 우리는 결코 잊지 않습니다. 우리는 결코 용서하지 않습니다. 이제 이것을 가져가세요, 우리의 감사와 함께.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: Thanks to you, the worship of Mehrunes Dagon shall be preserved for future generations, when all Dark Elves willingly return to the true faith.\n\nThis small reward is inconsequential compared to the service you have provided, Outlander.
Target: 덕분에 메이룬스 데이건의 숭배는 모든 다크 엘프가 기꺼이 진정한 믿음으로 돌아갈 때 까지 미래 세대를 위해 보존 될 것입니다.\n\n이 작은 보상은 당신의 봉사에 비하면 하찮습니다. 이방인.

Source: Of course, of course! Your share, as promised. After all, Mizzik would never have been able to solve this investigation without your aid.\n\nPleasure working with you, walker. Do not be a stranger, yes?
Target: 물론이지, 물론이야! 여기 약속한 네 몫이야. 결국, 네가 없었다면 미지크는 이 사건을 해결할 수 없었을 거야. \n\n너와 같이 일하게 되어서 정말 다행이야, 여행자. 다음에도 날 보면 부담 갖지 말고 말 걸어줘, 알았지?

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: It pains me to see our brethren fall, but they brought this fate upon themselves.\n\nThank you. I will see these relics placed under the care of our Wise Woman.
Target: 우리 동족이 몰락하는 걸 보는것은 괴롭지만, 그들이 자초한 운명이에요.\n\n감사합니다. 이 유물들은 우리 현명한 여인이 관리하게 될 것입니다.

Source: You cut the forest and the forest cuts back. Bet those witches had something to do with all these nature problems.
Target: 당신은 숲을 자르고 숲은 줄어들죠. 저 마녀들이 이 모든 자연의 문제들과 관련이 있는 것 같아요.

Source: You have done my tribe and all our people a great service, Outlander. One day, these relics shall be returned and the Daedric shrines will be opened. One day.\n\nIn the meantime, take this humble reward with our thanks.
Target: 당신은 우리 부족과 모든 백성에게 훌륭한 봉사를 해주었습니다. 언젠가는,이 유물들을 돌려놓고 데이드라 신전을 열 수 있겠죠. 언젠가는.\n\n 그 동안의 노고에 대한 우리의 감사와 함께 이 누추한 보상을 받아주세요.

Source: Every piece of history tells a part of the story. Thank you for retrieving these. I will have the taint of the vampires removed from them as soon as possible.\n\nThank you for your help, Outlander. Take this in gratitude for your efforts.
Target: 역사의 모든 조각이 이야기의 한 부분을 들려줍니다. 이것들을 찾아줘서 감사합니다. 가능한 한 빨리 뱀파이어에게 묻은 더러움을 지워야겠습니다.\n\n 도움을 주셔서 감사합니다. 당신의 노력에 감사드립니다.

Source: Someone told me that Gloria Fausta gave her life to cure Duke Sebastien of the werewolf's curse.
Target: Someone told me that Gloria Fausta gave her life to cure Duke Sebastien of the werewolf's curse.

Source: Pieces of history once thought lost are found again. Thank you.\n\nAnd for you, please accept this humble reward.
Target: 한때 잃어버린 것으로 여겨진 역사의 조각이 다시 발견되었군요. 감사합니다.\n\n 그리고 보잘것없지만 당신을 위한 이 보상을 받아주세요.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: Heard what you did at the at-Tura Estate. Tava bless you.
Target: Heard what you did at the at-Tura Estate. Tava bless you.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: You saved these relics from dark cultists. We shall purify them and preserve them for future generations, thanks to you.\n\nAccept this humble token as a symbol of our gratitude.
Target: 당신이 어둠의 신자들로부터 이 유물들을 구해내었습니다. 당신 덕분에 그것들을 정화하고 미래 세대를 위해 보존 할 수 있게 되었습니다. 감사합니다.\n\n초라하지만 저희들의 감사의 상징으로 이 표식을 드리니 받아주십시오.

Source: Ah, the Akaviri spirit has blessed you. Kiseravi can tell. How else would you have succeeded where Kiseravi has failed?\n\nPlease accept this gift. And the spirit's blessings.
Target: Ah, the Akaviri spirit has blessed you. Kiseravi can tell. How else would you have succeeded where Kiseravi has failed?\n\nPlease accept this gift. And the spirit's blessings.

Source: This note clearly implicates the governor. Along with the other evidence you uncovered, it's obvious that he was working with the slavers. Well done!\n\nSeyda Neen owes you for this great service, but I'll take it from here.
Target: 이 메모는 총독과 분명히 관련이 있어. 네가 밝혀낸 다른 증거들과 같이 보면 , 그가 노예상들과 일하고 있다는 것은 명백해. 잘해줬어!\n\n세이다 닌은 이 훌륭한 봉사로 인해 네게 빚을 졌어.여기부터 내가 맡을게.

Source: It's unusual for an outsider to seek to honor our customs and follow our traditions. Continue on this path and never show weakness, and you will always be welcome among the Erabenimsun.\n\nAccept this as a token of our mutual respect.
Target: 외부인이 우리의 관습을 존중하고 전통을 따르는 것을 보는 건 드문 일이지. 그 길을 항상 따르며 약점을 보여주지 말게나, 자네는 항상 에라베님선(Erabenimsun) 가운데서 환영받을 것이네.\n\n 이것을 상호 존경의 표식으로 생각하게나.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Someone has finally defeated that old crone, Mother Murk. Maybe the Hag Fen will be safer now.
Target: Someone has finally defeated that old crone, Mother Murk. Maybe the Hag Fen will be safer now.

Source: A King Razor-Tusk trophy serves as a great talisman for hunters about to set off into the wild. Our crafters will make good use of this specimen.\n\nAnd for you, this gift. As is our custom when a hunter successfully returns to camp.
Target: 면도날 어금니 왕(King Razor-Tusk)의 전리품은 야생으로 뛰어들려는 사냥꾼에게 큰 부적으로 작용하지. 우리의 장인들은 이 표본을 유용하게 쓸거야.\n\n 그리고 이 선물을 받게. 사냥꾼이 캠프에 성공적으로 돌아 올 때의 우리의 관례야.

Source: Yes. This one will stay. But I will not lie about what happened here. Silhu-jo made an impossible choice, but the people deserve to hear the truth.\n\nThank you, walker. We only just met, but you are the closest thing to family that Vazbi has left.
Target: Yes. This one will stay. But I will not lie about what happened here. Silhu-jo made an impossible choice, but the people deserve to hear the truth.\n\nThank you, walker. We only just met, but you are the closest thing to family that Vazbi has left.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Old Stomper falls and my people rejoice. Most impressive, hunter. You show your respect for our tribe and this land with every hunt you complete. Perhaps you have Ashlander blood flowing through you, after all.\n\nTake this with our thanks.
Target: 늙은 발구르기(Old Stomper)가 쓰러지자 우리 백성이 기뻐하고 있다네.자넨 가장 인상적인 사냥꾼이야. 자네는 이 모든 사냥들로 우리 부족과 이 땅에 대한 자네의 존경심을 보여줬네. 혹시 애쉬랜더의 피가 자네에게도 흐를지도 모르지.\n\n 감사와 함께 이걸 받게.

Source: Yes, you are right. Silhu-jo was a good Khajiit, but I cannot live within these walls knowing that we denied their security to people in desperate need.\n\nThank you, walker. We only just met, but you are the closest thing to family that I have left.
Target: Yes, you are right. Silhu-jo was a good Khajiit, but I cannot live within these walls knowing that we denied their security to people in desperate need.\n\nThank you, walker. We only just met, but you are the closest thing to family that I have left.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Sage advice. I've had my fill of schemes for now. I plan to dedicate myself to my studies and try to patch things up with Eoki. The last time I saw him, I said some … hurtful things.\n\nAgain, thank you. Next time you're in Sadrith Mora, come visit.
Target: 현명한 조언이야.당분간 계획이 꽉 차 있어. 공부에 전념하고 에오키와 화해할거야, 마지막으로 그를 봤을때... 내가 상처를 주는 말을 했어\n\n고마워. 다음에 사드리스 모라에 오시면 들러줘.

Source: Gharesh-ri has already gone to the Moon Gate of Anequina to take charge of the forces there. We will join him shortly.\n\nThank you for helping with my attunement, five-claw. With you and my ancestors beside me, we will find a way to stop the Dragons.
Target: Gharesh-ri has already gone to the Moon Gate of Anequina to take charge of the forces there. We will join him shortly.\n\nThank you for helping with my attunement, five-claw. With you and my ancestors beside me, we will find a way to stop the Dragons.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Thank you, Outlander. Hopefully I can sell these items for a fair price to some scholars within the city. Not that I'm too worried about haggling, mind you. I've been at this for a long time.\n\nKeep the ash from your eyes.
Target: 고맙네, 이방인. 다행이도 이 물건들은 도시에 있는 학자들에게 적절한 가격으로 팔 수 있을 걸세. 흥정할 것을 걱정할 필요는 없네. 난 이 일을 오랫동안 해 왔거든.\n\n당신의 앞길에 재가 존재하지 않기를.

Source: The war is far from over. Even a queen needs to consult with such learned personages as Gharesh-ri and Abnur Tharn every now and then.\n\nTake this in recognition of your efforts on our behalf, five-claw. Then talk to Gharesh-ri. I need … to think.
Target: 전쟁은 계속 될거야. 그리고 여왕도 가레쉬-리와 아브너 탄 같은 학식이 높은 사람들과 상의하고 의견을 나눌 필요가 있어. \n\n지금까지 우리의 대의를 도와줘서 고마워, 다섯-발톱. 그럼 난 가레쉬-리와 이야기를 하러 갈게. 생각 할 시간이 좀 … 필요해.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Terrible what happened to Thane Unnvald. I hope it was worth it.
Target: Thane Unnvald에게 무슨 일이 있었는지 모르겠지만 끔찍하군요. 그것이 가치 있었기를 바랍니다.

Source: I heard you saved the life of Thane Unnvald. Too bad his worthless adviser escaped.
Target: I heard you saved the life of Thane Unnvald. Too bad his worthless adviser escaped.

Source: For now, help the Khajiiti prepare for the Dragon invasion. And take this as recompense for your service.\n\nIn the meantime, I have plans to formulate and arrangements to make. When the moment to deal with the Dragons comes, I will contact you.
Target: For now, help the Khajiiti prepare for the Dragon invasion. And take this as recompense for your service.\n\nIn the meantime, I have plans to formulate and arrangements to make. When the moment to deal with the Dragons comes, I will contact you.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: I'm grateful that we were able to solve this through peaceful measures. I'll start my research on his notes straight away. I'm sure to find some clue about how he came about this knowledge in the first place.
Target: 평화적인 수단으로 해결해줘서 고마워. 곧장 쪽지를 보고 연구를 시작할 참이야. 애초부터 어째서 그가 이 정보를 얻게 되었을까?

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: You—you actually did it? You defeated the Hunger? I'll be honest, I didn't expect that. Thank you for the help! We'll be sure to contact you if any other horrifyingly grotesque creatures show up.\n\nMaybe I should start saving up for that bakery.
Target: 정말... 정말로 해낸거야? 헝거를 쓰러뜨린거야? 솔직히 기대하지 않았어. 도와줘서 고마워! 또 무서운 괴물이 나타나면 꼭 연락할께.\n\n빵집을 위해서 저축을 시작해야할지도 몰라.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: What happened at Firebrand Keep was downright embarrasing. Glad you restored order.
Target: What happened at Firebrand Keep was downright embarrasing. Glad you restored order.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: I can only imagine Tanval's grief at losing his son. Good thing you were there to defeat General Serien though.
Target: I can only imagine Tanval's grief at losing his son. Good thing you were there to defeat General Serien though.

Source: The Morag Tong isn't one to leave loose threads, even one that's been dangling for over a century. Luckily for Feina-Darak, my grandfather was able to complete his writ.\n\nHere, a reward for services rendered.
Target: The Morag Tong isn't one to leave loose threads, even one that's been dangling for over a century. Luckily for Feina-Darak, my grandfather was able to complete his writ.\n\nHere, a reward for services rendered.

Target: <공고문을 읽는다>
