Source: You're the one who rooted out that spy and united the Ebonheart Pact!
Target: You're the one who rooted out that spy and united the Ebonheart Pact!

Source: If you have the respect of Clan Murtag, you have mine too.
Target: If you have the respect of Clan Murtag, you have mine too.

Source: That stubborn fool! At least Normar has finally found proof for his wild claims of necromancy.
Target: 그 고집 센 바보같으니라고! 적어도 노마르는 마침내 그의 엄청난 비밀 유지에 대한 증거를 찾아냈네.

Source: Tell my daughter I'm sorry. Tell her she needs to stay away until I can calm things down. I don't want to see anything happen to her. Promise me.\n\nAnd take this. Consider it payment for your efforts thus far.
Target: 딸에게 미안하다고 전해주게. 내가 사태를 안정시킬때까지 떨어져있도록 말이야. 무슨일이 있어서는 안돼. 약속해주게.\n\n그리고 이걸 가져가게. 지금까지의 노력에 대한 보수라고 생각해주게.

Source: I've made my decision about Sir Hughes. He will be exiled.
Target: 휴즈 경에 대해 결정을 내렸네. 그는 추방 당할 거야.

Source: Oh, Puddles, what kind of trouble did you get yourself into? \n\nThank you so much for bringing my adorable Puddles home, friend. Here's a small reward. I know it's not much, but I want you to have it.
Target: Oh, Puddles, what kind of trouble did you get yourself into? \n\nThank you so much for bringing my adorable Puddles home, friend. Here's a small reward. I know it's not much, but I want you to have it.

Source: I hoped your defeat of the Mad Architect would allow us to pass from this plane. Seems that was not the case.\n\nWe'll have to determine a new course of action—but we'll not trouble you with that. You have my thanks, friend. For everything.
Target: I hoped your defeat of the Mad Architect would allow us to pass from this plane. Seems that was not the case.\n\nWe'll have to determine a new course of action—but we'll not trouble you with that. You have my thanks, friend. For everything.

Source: Then we'll finish repairs and shove off at high tide. Oh, your marine friends fended off Sea Vipers while you rescued my crew. They're welcome aboard as long as they want.\n\nPerhaps we'll see you at <<1>>. You'll always have a place on the Prowler.
Target: 그렇다면 수리를 끝내고 만조때 떠날 수 있겠군. 참, 네가 선원들을 구해주는 동안 해병 친구들이 바다 독사 놈들을 막아 주었지. 저들이 원하기면 하면 승선을 환영해 줄거야.\n\n어쩌면 <<1>>에서 다시 만날지도 모르겠군. 넌 부랑자 호에서 항상 환영받을 거야.

Source: Excellent! Once the tide rises we'll get the Prowler out of here. Your marine friends are welcome to recuperate, as long as they need. \n\nWe'll head to <<1>> soon. You're always welcome aboard the Prowler.
Target: Excellent! Once the tide rises we'll get the Prowler out of here. Your marine friends are welcome to recuperate, as long as they need. \n\nWe'll head to <<1>> soon. You're always welcome aboard the Prowler.

Source: I found all the items the Artisan stole.
Target: 장인이 훔쳐간 물건을 전부 찾아냈어요.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어 기쁘군.

Source: I think we're done here.
Target: 이제 문제는 해결된 것 같네요.

Source: You are the master to which the Hollow are only copies.
Target: 넌 비어있는 자들의 주인이고 나머지는 네 복제품일 뿐이야.

Source: I'm glad I found your things.
Target: I'm glad I found your things.

Source: Your soul was placed in this body of stone and soil. From you, the Hollow were made.
Target: 네 영혼이 돌과 흙으로 만들어진 이 육체에 들어갔어. 너로부터 비어있는 자들이 만들어진 거야.

Source: I managed to get the silks.
Target: 비단을 찾아왔어요.

Source: I have it right here. Manthir says he's done dealing with you.
Target: 여기 있어요. 만티어는 다시는 당신이랑 엮일 일 없을 거라더군요.

Source: They will try, but without the Daedra or the link to Coldharbour, destroying the remaining Worm Cultists will be quick work.\n\nI will warn the Dominion of what they attempted with the Fangs of Chaos. It will not be allowed to happen again.
Target: 그렇게 하겠지만, 데이드라나 콜드하버와의 연결이 없으니 남은 벌레 광신도들은 신속하게 처치할 수 있을 거요.\n\n난 자치령에게 혼돈의 송곳니에 대한 사실을 경고해 줘야겠소. 그런 일이 다시 일어나게 둘 수는 없으니까.

Source: Is that so? \n\nHunh. We'll see. Tell you what: I've got a task that needs doing, but it might get ugly. Take care of it for me, and you're in.
Target: 그래?\n\n흠. 보자. 좋은 생각이 있군. 해야할 일이 좀 있는데, 안 좋은 꼴을 당할 지도 몰라. 나를 위해 이 일을 해준다면 받아주도록 하지.

Source: The Lava Queen is defeated.
Target: 용암 여왕이 쓰러졌군요.

Source: I'll bury my friends. Then, I suppose I'll seek out more companions in the next vampire lair.\n\nI can't rest until this scourge is wiped from Tamriel. Zungarg and Agalir felt the same. Thank you for your help, friend.
Target: 내 친구들을 묻어 줘야지. 그 다음에는 다른 뱀파이어 소굴에서 더 많은 동료들을 찾아다닐 것 같네.\n\n나는 탐리엘에서 이 역겨운 것들을 쓸어버리기 전까지는 쉴 수가 없어. 준가그와 아갈리어도 같은 심정이었지. 도와줘서 고마웠네, 친구여.

Source: How can I stop them?
Target: How can I stop them?

Source: I'm a friend of the Green Lady.
Target: 전 녹색 여군주의 친굽니다.

Source: The small army of Maulborn that got away. Is it still on the loose?
Target: The small army of Maulborn that got away. Is it still on the loose?

Source: I'm ready, Shalidor.
Target: I'm ready, Shalidor.

Source: Whether it's wise or not isn't for me to say. All I can say is that if Emeric wants to push on, I hope you will go with him.\n\nIt's clear that any undertaking you're a part of is more than likely to succeed.
Target: 그게 현명한 일인지 아닌지는 내가 말할 것이 아닐세. 내가 말할 수 있는 것은 만약 에머릭이 계속 밀고 나가기를 원한다면, 자네가 그와 함께 간다면 좋겠다는 거야.\n\n자네가 맡는 일이 성공 가능성이 더 크다는 것은 분명한 사실이니까.

Source: There's trouble at the Deepcrag Den kwama mine. I'd steer clear of the area if I were you.
Target: There's trouble at the Deepcrag Den kwama mine. I'd steer clear of the area if I were you.

Source: Your plan was to wait around for a stranger to help you?
Target: Your plan was to wait around for a stranger to help you?

Source: Why would Molag Bal even give her the possibility of escape?
Target: 왜 몰라그 발이 그녀가 탈출할 수 있게 내버려둔 걸까요?

Source: So it's not strange at all the lunar priest knew you'd be here?
Target: 그럼 달사제가 당신이 여기 있는 걸 알고 있었다는 것도 전혀 신기하지 않나?

Source: What am I supposed to do?
Target: 내가 뭘해야하니?

Source: Why didn't you tell me Arenthia had been invaded?
Target: 아렌시아가 침략 당했다고 왜 말하지 않았어요?

Source: Even if you hadn't destroyed those shipments, I'm sure the Tribunal would have stopped the plague before it reached Mournhold.
Target: Even if you hadn't destroyed those shipments, I'm sure the Tribunal would have stopped the plague before it reached Mournhold.

Source: They say Shadowscales are killers in the night. Then how do they explain Murkwater?
Target: They say Shadowscales are killers in the night. Then how do they explain Murkwater?

Source: Yes, for my duty is to protect innocents from predation. A spider's poison wears off, but research and collection by the untrained can never be healed.\n\nI see  <<1>> walks with you. You will share my wage for doing my job.
Target: 그렇소. 내 의무는 포식으로부터 순수한 것들을 보호하는 것이니까. 거미의 독은 치유될 수 있지만, 훈련되지 않은 연구와 수집은 절대로 치유될 수 없소.\n\n<<1>>가 당신과 함께 오는 걸 봤소. 일을 대신 해준 대가로 내 임금을 나눠드리리다.

Source: I have stopped the Spider Cult's plot in Fungal Grotto.
Target: 나는 곰팡이 동굴에서 거미 교단의 음모를 멈췄다.

Source: I tracked down Rama and killed him.
Target: I tracked down Rama and killed him.

Source: Actually, a priestess of the lunar clergy told me to come help you.
Target: 사실, 어떤 달의 여사제가 당신을 도우라고 했습니다.

Source: Rama is dead. Here's his sword as proof.
Target: Rama is dead. Here's his sword as proof.

Source: I'm ready. We stood together at Grimwatch.
Target: I'm ready. We stood together at Grimwatch.

Source: I just returned from Narsis. The Maulborn were causing trouble there, too.
Target: I just returned from Narsis. The Maulborn were causing trouble there, too.

Source: I presume it was quick for the Silvernar's advisor, in the end. You have my sympathies.
Target: 실베나의 조언자가 겪은 고통은 빠르게 끝났을 거야. 조의를 표하지.

Source: Actually, a priestess of the lunar clergy told me to come help you.
Target: Actually, a priestess of the lunar clergy told me to come help you.

Source: Here's the key.
Target: Here's the key.

Source: I'm starting to think the Skald-King is invincible. Not even poison can kill the smug bastard!
Target: I'm starting to think the Skald-King is invincible. Not even poison can kill the smug bastard!

Source: I met <<1>> at his estate in southern Menevia.
Target: I met <<1>> at his estate in southern Menevia.

Source: Yes. Here they are.
Target: 네. 여기 있어요.

Source: Praise Vivec, you were there to stop Alexandra Conele from capturing the coral heart!
Target: 비벡을 찬양하라. 당신은 그곳에서 알렉산드라 코넬레가 산호 심장을 갖는 걸 막았군요!

Source: I'll do what I can.
Target: 최대한 노력해 보죠.

Source: I'll see what I can do.
Target: 할 수 있는건 해보지.

Source: I heard that you were there when the Reachmen released Sinmur's ghost.
Target: I heard that you were there when the Reachmen released Sinmur's ghost.

Source: Thank you, Tazia. Shuzura said something about a few coins?
Target: 고마워요, 태지아. 슈주라가 수고비인지 뭔지 이야기 하던데요?

Source: Thanks … I think.
Target: 고맙습니다... 라고 해야겠군요.

Source: What now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 하죠?

Source: I'm not Tazia. Actually, <<1>> sent me to help you.
Target: 전 태지아가 아니에요. 실은 <<1>>가(이) 당신을 도와달라고 해서 왔어요.

Source: I'll see what I can do.
Target: 뭘 할 수 있을지 알아보죠.

Source: We'll get him, Shazah.
Target: 우리가 놈을 잡을 거에요, 샤자.

Source: I don't think so. I don't know. Maybe if I hadn't confronted him, he wouldn't have killed her….\n\nAt least the hostages are all right. You did your part, and you did it well.
Target: 그런 것 같지는 않아. 모르겠어. 만약 내가 놈을 대면하지 않았다면, 놈은 그녀를 죽이지 않았을 거야...\n\n최소한 인질들은 모두 무사해. 넌 네 일을 잘 해냈어.

Source: You know, the spell web. A pretty elegant trap, really. I think the spell's catalyst has something to do with an interest in knowledge. I'd be insulted, but what can I say. I'm in this for adventure, not scholarly pursuits.\n\nAnd thanks, by the way.
Target: 그 있잖아요. 주문 망 말이에요. 정말이지 꽤 우아한 함정이죠. 제가 보기엔 주문의 촉매가 지식에 대한 흥미와 관련된 것 같아요. 기분 나쁘긴 하지만, 무슨 말을 하겠어요. 전 학구적인 일이 아니라 모험을 찾아 왔다고요.\n\n그나저나, 고마워요.

Source: During our time together, we determined that the Dwarven device operates on the same principles as Molag Bal's Planemeld. Zur will honor the Dark Elf's memory and give him credit for this discovery.\n\nThank you again for saving us, my friend.
Target: 우리가 함께 하는 동안에, 드워븐 장치가 몰라그 발의 차원융합과 같은 원리로 작동한다는 것을 밝혀냈지. 절은 다크 엘프의 기억을 기리고 이 발견에 대한 공을 그에게 넘길거야.\n\n다시 한 번 우리를 구해줘서 고마워, 친구.

Source: Thank you! Thank you, so much! I'll just … I'll just gather my wits and then pack these out of here.\n\nBlessings of the Divines be upon you.
Target: 고맙습니다! 정말로 고맙습니다! 전 이제... 이제 정신을 차리고 유물을 챙겨서 여길 빠져나가야겠군요.\n\n디바인님들의 축복이 당신께 임할 겁니다.

Source: Shor's bones, you did it! Thank you. With this, Marien will make a full recovery. I know it. I may even get up the nerve to ask for her hand. Heh!
Target: Shor's bones, you did it! Thank you. With this, Marien will make a full recovery. I know it. I may even get up the nerve to ask for her hand. Heh!

Source: I return to my work. The corruption fades, and the penitents will need guidance now more than ever. \n\nYou, gods-touched. You must seek and stop the blasphemer. Her profanity must be ended.
Target: 난 내 일로 돌아갈 것이오. 타락이 희미해지면, 고해자들은 그 어느 때보다도 더 지도가 필요하게 될 것이라오.\n\n당신은 신들의 손길을 받으셨구려. 반드시 그 모독자를 찾아서 막아 주시오. 그녀의 신성 모독은 반드시 끝나야만 하오.

Source: Renegade Ashlanders tunneled into the temple, taking the monks and their defenders by surprise. I ventured into the tunnels and weakened its supports. Before the tunnel collapsed, I had to face down <<1>>.
Target: Renegade Ashlanders tunneled into the temple, taking the monks and their defenders by surprise. I ventured into the tunnels and weakened its supports. Before the tunnel collapsed, I had to face down <<1>>.

Source: You see what horrors the gods have visited upon Bruma and all who dwell here? I have nothing for Leono. He should pray to be spared our fate.\n\nYou have kept faith with Leono. What the gods have left me, I share with you.
Target: 신들께서 브루마와 여기 사는 모든 이들에게 어떤 공포를 내리셨는지는 보셨어요? 레오노한테 줄 물건이 없어요. 그는 우리의 운명을 겪지 않게 해 달라고 기도해야 한다고요.\n\n당신은 레오노와의 약속을 지키셨군요. 신들께서 제게 남겨주신 것을 나눠 드리죠.

Source: What's wrong?
Target: 무슨 문제인가요?

Source: At great cost, their leader Vardan separated his spirit from his flesh.
Target: At great cost, their leader Vardan separated his spirit from his flesh.

Source: Thank you for showing me the holy sites of <<1>>.
Target: <<1>>의 신성한 장소들을 보여주셔서 고마워요.

Source: What now?
Target: 이제 어쩔 셈이야?

Source: You're welcome.
Target: 천만에요.

Source: I disenchanted it. The second blade in "Two-Blades" refers to my magic.\n\nI don't always get to put it to use, but I'd prefer not trying that again. Fortunately for us, you were here to handle Theran.
Target: 그것의 마법을 풀어버렸네. 내 이름의 \\"투-블레이드(Two-Blades)\"\"에서 두번째 검은 내 마법을 의미하지.\n\n항상 사용할 수 있는 건 아니지만
column4: 다시 사용하고 싶진 않아. 자네가 데란을 처리해 줘서 다행이네."

Source: Oh yes, Adusa is fine. Nothing to worry about. Let's take a look at that list.\n\nOf course. Verandis. Adusa. And Gwendis. We're at the top of the list! That would certainly explain why they attacked the castle, yes?
Target: Oh yes, Adusa is fine. Nothing to worry about. Let's take a look at that list.\n\nOf course. Verandis. Adusa. And Gwendis. We're at the top of the list! That would certainly explain why they attacked the castle, yes?

Source: Now? We fight back! These villains, they think they can strike at us where we live? They are fools and less than fools!\n\nWe will take the fight to them. Thanks to the information you have gathered, we know where the worm behind this hides.
Target: Now? We fight back! These villains, they think they can strike at us where we live? They are fools and less than fools!\n\nWe will take the fight to them. Thanks to the information you have gathered, we know where the worm behind this hides.

Source: Yes. Without the Spirit Healer's control, the giants will no longer seek us out. I extend my gratitude.
Target: Yes. Without the Spirit Healer's control, the giants will no longer seek us out. I extend my gratitude.

Source: This threat, yes. But don't worry. Another will appear before you know it.\n\nYou have been a friend to Adusa. And to Rivenspire. Stay fragrant, Five-Claw. This one is sure we will meet again some day.
Target: This threat, yes. But don't worry. Another will appear before you know it.\n\nYou have been a friend to Adusa. And to Rivenspire. Stay fragrant, Five-Claw. This one is sure we will meet again some day.

Source: No good comes from dwelling on the past. <<1>> lives, which means there's hope.\n\nHe's a great man, a good man. I don't care how long it takes. I'll find a way to free him from that monster.
Target: 과거를 되씹는 것은 좋을 것이 없죠. <<1>>님이 살아 계신다는 것은 희망이 있다는 뜻이에요.\n\n그분은 위대하고, 좋은 분이세요. 얼마나 걸리든 상관 없어요. 그 괴물로부터 스승님을 구해낼 방법을 찾겠어요.

Source: Excellent! By what power I hold, I name you an agent in my employ. You are now an Eye of the Queen, bonded to my service.\n\nAuri-El keep you safe and Xarxes guard your words.
Target: 훌륭하군! 내가 지닌 권한으로써, 내 그대를 나의 고용인으로 임명하노라. 그대는 이제 여왕의 눈이며, 나에게 충성을 다할 지어다.\n\n아우리엘께서 그대를 보호하시고 작서스께서 그대의 말을 지켜 주시길.

Source: During our time together, Zur and I determined that the Dwemer device has similarities to the method Molag Bal uses to perform the Planemeld. I will honor Zur's memory and give him credit for this discovery.\n\nThank you again, friend, for saving us.
Target: 우리가 함께 하는 동안, 절과 나는 드워븐 장치와 몰라그 발이 차원융합을 형성하는데 쓴 방법의 유사점을 밝혀냈소. 나는 절의 기억을 기리고 이 발견에 대한 공을 그에게 넘길 것이오.\n\n다시 한번 우리를 구해줘서 고맙소, 친구여.

Source: Good call. We'll see that this man is taken to a cell. With respect, of course.
Target: 동감이오. 우린 이 남자를 감옥에 집어넣겠소. 물론 정중하게 말이오.

Source: I signed a new treaty with <<1>> moments ago. He assured me the Dominion will defend our little island from any reprisals, Maormer or otherwise.\n\n<<2>> will see much change to come. We must grow together, or we shall die apart.
Target: 방금 전에 <<1>>과 새 조약문에 서명했소. 자치령이 우리 작은 섬을 모든 보복으로부터 지켜줄 것이라고 장담했지. 마오머든 다른 자들이든 말이오.\n\n<<2>>에 더 많은 기회가 찾아오겠구려. 우리는 함께 성장하거나, 아니면 따로 죽어야 할 것이오.

Source: I think I, er, we have accomplished quite a bit in this short time! \n\nWith Stibbons rescued, and our notes gathered, I think it's time we returned to civilization and compiled our conclusions. It will be a scholarly sensation!
Target: 그럴 것 같은데. 나는, 어, 우리는 이 짧은 시간동안 꽤 많은 일을 해냈잖아!\n\n스티븐스를 구해내고, 우리 노트도 되찾았으니 문명세계로 돌아가서 결론을 정리할 시간인것 같군. 학구적인 센세이션이 될거야!

Source: Yes, the Great Shackle. Where the Planemeld begins and ends. I thought I could deal with it on my own, but I was wrong.\n\nYou have restored me, released me from captivity. With your continued help, we can end this threat once and for all.
Target: 그렇다네. 거대한 걸쇠이지. 차원융합의 시작과 끝인 장소일세. 나 혼자서도 처리할 수 있을 줄 알았지만, 내가 틀렸지.\n\n자네가 날 회복시켜 주고, 속박에서 풀어 주었지. 자네가 계속 도와 준다면 이 위협을 완전히 끝장낼 수 있을 거라네.

Source: I've rarely encountered a creature of <<1>>'s power. There may be a way to separate him from <<2>>, but it will take much time and study.\n\nShe's not just an apprentice, she's my friend. If there's a way to free her, I swear I'll find it.
Target: <<1>>같은 힘을 가진 괴물은 거의 본 적이 없다네. 놈을 <<2>>으로부터 분리해낼 방법이 있겠지만, 수많은 시간과 연구가 필요하겠지.\n\n그 애는 그냥 견습생이 아닐세. 내 친구이지. 그 애를 풀어줄 방법이 있다면, 내 맹세코 찾아낼 것일세.

Source: Best news this one has heard all day. Rivenspire will sleep easier without that monster lurking in the shadows. Maybe we should change his name to No-Blades, yes? Get it?\n\nAnyway, thanks for your help. It's good to see Verandis was right about you.
Target: Best news this one has heard all day. Rivenspire will sleep easier without that monster lurking in the shadows. Maybe we should change his name to No-Blades, yes? Get it?\n\nAnyway, thanks for your help. It's good to see Verandis was right about you.

Source: You were at Faldar's Tooth, when Thallik tried to open a portal to Oblivion!
Target: You were at Faldar's Tooth, when Thallik tried to open a portal to Oblivion!

Source: Sounds good. Now where's my coin?
Target: Sounds good. Now where's my coin?

Source: I'm glad you put an end to this Hound business. All Bosmer are in your debt.
Target: I'm glad you put an end to this Hound business. All Bosmer are in your debt.

Source: I've fought it.
Target: 난 그것과 싸웠어요.

Source: I watched as he died, alone and miserable. I envied him though, for I knew I would be trapped in the centurion. And for centuries I was, until you freed me.\n\nYou have my gratitude. I will rest now, join my family and perhaps, even, my long-lost love.
Target: 난 그이가 외롭고 비참하게 죽는 것을 지켜봤어요. 하지만 난 그이가 부러웠죠. 난 내가 백부장에 갇혀 있어야 한다는 것을 알았으니까요. 그리고는 당신이 날 풀어 줄 때까지 수 세기 동안 백부장에 갇혀있었어요.\n\n감사드려요. 난 이제 안식에 들어야겠군요. 내 가족과 함께, 어쩌면 오랫동안 헤어졌던 내 사랑과 함께할 지도 모르죠.

Source: Here, a little present.\n\nI can't make you a Vinedusk Ranger, but I can give you something to show you're an honorary member. They represent the king's trust, knowing we uphold the Green Pact despite our exemption from it. You've more than earned it.
Target: 여기, 작은 선물일세.\n\n자네를 덩굴그늘 유격대에 가입시켜줄 순 없지만, 자네가 우리 명예 대원임을 보여줄 물건은 줄 수 있지. 이건 폐하의 신뢰를 상징함과 동시에 우리가 녹색 조약을 면제받았음에도 그것을 인정한다는 사실을 보여주는 물건일세. 자넨 이걸 받을 자격이 충분해.

Source: Here, a little present.\n\nI can't make you a Vinedusk Ranger, but I can give you something to show you're an honorary member. They represent the king's trust, knowing we uphold the Green Pact despite our exemption from it. You've more than earned it.
Target: 여기, 작은 선물일세.\n\n자네를 덩굴그늘 유격대에 가입시켜줄 순 없지만, 자네가 우리 명예 대원임을 보여줄 물건은 줄 수 있지. 이건 폐하의 신뢰를 상징함과 동시에 우리가 녹색 조약을 면제받았음에도 그것을 인정한다는 사실을 보여주는 물건일세. 자넨 이걸 받을 자격이 충분해.

Source: A Dominion of peace. The fair and just rule of Tamriel, beneath an Aldmeri banner. A future I hope to build.\n\nAnd you, standing at my side. Come, help me build the future.
Target: 평화로운 자치령을. 알드메리의 휘장 아래서 공정하고 정의로운 지배를 받는 탐리엘을. 내가 만들고 싶은 미래를.\n\n그리고 내 옆에 서 있는 그대를 보았지. 자, 내가 그 미래를 만드는 걸 도와주게.

Source: I feared as much. Alas for Edweg's weakness and the evil deeds of the bandits.\n\nYour efforts are greatly appreciated. I have rewards for your bravery and skill in Arkay's cause.
Target: I feared as much. Alas for Edweg's weakness and the evil deeds of the bandits.\n\nYour efforts are greatly appreciated. I have rewards for your bravery and skill in Arkay's cause.

Source: I got a portion of the debt from <<1>>.
Target: I got a portion of the debt from <<1>>.

Source: What now?
Target: 이제 뭘 하면 되죠?

Source: As promised, I have your drawings.
Target: 약속대로, 여기 도면을 받아.

Source: You suppose? Isn't that good news?
Target: '아무래도' 라고요? 그거 좋은 소식인가요?

Source: We must rebuild. The Imperials tore apart our fine city, but we will rise from the sands.\n\nYou have given us this chance. Forever will Hallin's Stand remember your work and your sacrifices!
Target: 우리는 반드시 도시를 재건할 거에요. 제국놈들이 우리의 훌륭한 도시를 부숴놓았지만, 우리는 모래에서 다시 일어설 겁니다.\n\n당신은 우리에게 이 기회를 주셨어요. 할린의 저항은 당신이 한 일과 당신의 희생을 영원히 기억할 것입니다!

Source: Shada is dead. She wanted more thralls to fight the Celestials above.
Target: Shada is dead. She wanted more thralls to fight the Celestials above.

Source: Yes. I collected these seeds for you.
Target: 네. 이 씨앗을 모아왔어요.

Source: Niro Gratas? By the Divines, what does he want now? Uh, th-thank you. \n\nOh … here's some coin. It's all I have. I hope it's enough.
Target: 니로 그라타스? 디바인들이시여! 이젠 뭘 원하는 거지? 어, 고... 고맙소.\n\n참... 여기 금화가 좀 있소. 내가 가진 전부요. 이걸로 충분했으면 좋겠군.

Source: By Mara's golden tresses! Never expected to see those. Ordered them to woo Domitia here but turns out she married me anyway. I suppose I owe you for bringing them. Maybe Dommy will want them, wet though they are.
Target: 마라의 황금 머리칼이시여! 이걸 볼 거라곤 생각지도 않았는데. 도미시아한테 구혼하려고 주문했던 물건들이지만, 어쨌건 그녀는 나와 결혼했다오. 당신에게 빚을 진 것 같구려. 도미가 이걸 갖고 싶어할지도 모르겠소. 젖어 있기는 하지만.

Source: Rasha! Many years have passed since we warred together. The sands of Sentinel, where we met—two young warriors who faced the world together.\n\nThe smell of this sand evokes golden days. But those times are done, for me at least.
Target: 라샤! 우리가 같이 싸운지도 오랜 세월이 흘렀군. 센티넬의 모래라. 우리는 바로 거기서 만났었다오. 젊은 두 전사들이 함께 세상을 마주봤었지.\n\n이 모래 냄새를 맡으니 한창 때가 떠오르는군. 하지만 그 시절은 끝났소. 적어도 나한테는 말이오.

Source: Thank the Divines. I don't even want to think what might have happened if the Engine's affliction had spread outside of the caverns.\n\nThank you for your help. We can handle it from here. Barring any more attacks from the cavern wildlife.
Target: 디바인께 감사를. 엔진의 영향력이 동굴 바깥으로 퍼져나가면 어떻게 될 지는 상상조차 하고싶지 않았거든.\n\n도와줘서 고마워. 여기서부턴 우리가 해결할 수 잇을거야. 동굴의 야생동물들이 더 공격해오지 않는다면 말이지.

Source: You have no idea. I hope to never see another dead thing for as long as I live.
Target: You have no idea. I hope to never see another dead thing for as long as I live.

Source: I helped put missing stars back into the Planisphere's sky.
Target: 제가 이 사라졌던 별들을 평면 천체도의 하늘에 돌려두는걸 도왔었는데요.

Source: I helped Leiborn of the Solitude Bards College recover a famous lute called Petraloop, the first of many missing legendary instruments.
Target: I helped Leiborn of the Solitude Bards College recover a famous lute called Petraloop, the first of many missing legendary instruments.

Source: They say Molag Grunda guarded the gatehouse on the Chasm. I didn't see her. Nor did I want to.
Target: They say Molag Grunda guarded the gatehouse on the Chasm. I didn't see her. Nor did I want to.

Source: Bakkhara says you convinced her to put down her brother. He was always arrogant, that one.
Target: Bakkhara says you convinced her to put down her brother. He was always arrogant, that one.

Source: My fertilizer! Sylvain's late as usual. But maybe it'll still help my pumpkins. Though that'll just mean more fried pumpkin to eat, I suppose.\n\nHere's a little coin for your trouble.
Target: 내 비료잖아! 실베인이 평소처럼 늦었군. 그래도 내 호박들에 도움이 될 거요. 그 말은 곧 먹어야 될 호박볶음이 더 많아졌다는 뜻이겠지만.\n\n여기 수고해준 것에 대한 작은 답례요.

Source: Leki's Blade's well-run now, and I hear it's thanks to you. May Tall Papa bless your way.
Target: Leki's Blade's well-run now, and I hear it's thanks to you. May Tall Papa bless your way.

Source: Rumor has it you saved Leki's Blade from its old master. Well done!
Target: Rumor has it you saved Leki's Blade from its old master. Well done!

Source: Take it, just don't hurt me.
Target: Take it, just don't hurt me.

Source: Take care of yourself, Neramo.
Target: 몸 조심해, 네라모.

Source: My doll! I thought it was lost forever. I hired a man to cart some things from my old home in Hackdirt. I heard his caravan had been attacked and all my goods stolen.\n\nI can't ever thank you enough!
Target: 내 인형! 영원히 사라진줄 알았어요. 해크더트에 있는 예전 집에서 물건들을 몇가지 가져와달라고 사람을 고용했었거든요. 그 사람의 캐러밴이 공격당해서 물건들을 전부 도둑맞았다고 들었어요.\n\n감사를 이루 표현할 수 없네요!

Source: She's a bright light. She might be able to shine even in Coldharbour.\n\nWe'll mop up the remaining Daedra and start rebuilding the outpost. Thanks to you, we won't have to fight a war on two fronts.
Target: 그 사람은 밝은 빛 같은 사람입니다. 콜드하버에서조차 빛날 수 있죠.\n\n저희는 남은 데이드라를 소탕하고 전초 기지를 복구하겠습니다. 당신 덕분에 양쪽에서 전쟁을 치를 걱정은 없겠군요.

Source: If only Silent-Wind had listened to me. He could have had a good life here. Thank you for bringing this to me, friend.
Target: 사일런트-윈드가 내 말을 듣기만 했다면, 여기서 좋은 삶을 살 수 있었을 텐데. 이걸 가져다줘서 고맙군, 친구.

Source: Will you be all right?
Target: 괜찮으신가요?

Source: I knew someone would find me, eventually. But you don't seem like a bounty hunter.\n\nThe one who wrote this tried to force me to marry his son. I ran instead. Take this coin and forget you ever saw me.
Target: 누군가 결국에는 절 찾아낼 줄 알았죠. 하지만 당신은 현상금 사냥꾼처럼 보이진 않네요.\n\n이걸 쓴 자는 절 강제로 자기 아들이랑 결혼시키려 했던 사람이었죠. 이 금화를 받으시고 절 본 기억은 지워 주세요.

Source: What was the plan you mentioned?
Target: 전에 무슨 계획에 대해서 언급하지 않았어?

Source: Excellent work. Being in the Eyes isn't always about high profile hijinks, eh?\n\nStill, I think you'll agree. Even support can be rewarding. Thank you, my new friend.
Target: 아주 잘 했소. 눈들이 항상 난잡하게 주변의 이목을 끄는 일을 하지는 않지. 그렇지 않소?\n\n하지만, 당신도 동의할 거라고 생각하오. 지원만으로도 가치가 있을 수 있다고 말이오. 고맙소, 내 새로운 친구여.

Source: <<1>>! How can I ever thank you?
Target: << 1 >>! 정말 고마워!

Source: What a relief! I can't tell you how good it feels to see <<1>> back in its rightful place.
Target: What a relief! I can't tell you how good it feels to see <<1>> back in its rightful place.

Source: I defeated the betrayer, Abelazar of the Scaled Court.
Target: I defeated the betrayer, Abelazar of the Scaled Court.

Source: My Nathalye? Worried about me? Hah! I'll make sure to tell her about that when I get back. If you help me up, Xandier can lead me back home.\n\nDivines watch over you, traveler.
Target: 나의 나탈리가? 날 걱정해? 허! 돌아가면 그녀에게 이걸 확실히 말할 겁니다. 일어서는 걸 도와주시면, 잰디어가 절 집으로 인도할겁니다.\n\n디바인이 당신을 지켜보기를, 여행자여.

Source: I signed a new treaty moments ago. <<1>> assured me the Dominion will protect our little island.\n\nIt's a new beginning for <<2>>. We will prosper or fall—together.
Target: 방금 전에 새 조약문에 서명했소. <<1>>은 자치령이 우리 작은 섬을 보호할 것이라고 장담했지.\n\n<<2>>에 새로운 시작이 찾아왔구려. 우리는 번영하거나 몰락할 것이오. 함께 말이오.

Source: My … husband? Armin? Gods, I believed him dead long ago!\n\nHe-he finally found his ancestor's remains? I-I cannot believe it. This is good news …? Yes, it is just … I need time to digest this. Thank you, though. Thank you so much.
Target: My … husband? Armin? Gods, I believed him dead long ago!\n\nHe-he finally found his ancestor's remains? I-I cannot believe it. This is good news …? Yes, it is just … I need time to digest this. Thank you, though. Thank you so much.

Source: Wish I could have helped. But I had to, you know, guard the portal and everything.
Target: 나도 도와주고 싶었지만.포털과 모든 것을 보호해야 했어요.

Source: By the Eight! That crystal! It is a Light of Meridia! It is said that these orbs of power once allowed Meridia to transport an entire city into Coldharbour.\n\nIf an agent of Meridia harnesses this power for us, we shall gain a distinct advantage.
Target: 여덟 디바인이시여! 그 수정체는! 메리디아의 빛이로군! 이야기에 따르면 이 힘의 구체들은 과거 메리디아가 도시 전체를 콜드하버로 전송하게 했다고 하지.\n\n메리디아의 대행자가 이 힘을 우리를 위해 사용한다면 뚜렷한 이점을 얻을 수 있을 것이오.

Source: Dead, eh? I hope he squealed like a pig. Nice work. Here's yer payoff. \n\nBut if I hear that Varnedo's still alive, I'll hunt you down and carve yer ears off!
Target: Dead, eh? I hope he squealed like a pig. Nice work. Here's yer payoff. \n\nBut if I hear that Varnedo's still alive, I'll hunt you down and carve yer ears off!

Source: I brought the mushrooms and Salas's notes like you asked.
Target: 네가 전에 말한 버섯과 살라스의 노트를 가지고 왔어.

Source: I heard you let that woman at Phaer have real justice. Auri-el would approve.
Target: I heard you let that woman at Phaer have real justice. Auri-el would approve.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Thank you, Brengolin. I'm sure I will.
Target: Thank you, Brengolin. I'm sure I will.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Our ritual was a success—a bitter one, to be sure. We died, but our Hist tree lives. As we return to the Hist, so will the tree heal. \n\nSomeday, there will be a new clutch hatched here. If ever you return, they will remember your courage.
Target: Our ritual was a success—a bitter one, to be sure. We died, but our Hist tree lives. As we return to the Hist, so will the tree heal. \n\nSomeday, there will be a new clutch hatched here. If ever you return, they will remember your courage.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: A hundred years with the Marines and never before have I failed in my duty. Until today.\n\nI know myself, though. I would have come to regret killing Eranamo. Thank you.
Target: 내가 해병으로 복무했던 지난 백 년 동안 내 의무에 실패했던 적은 한 번도 없었다네. 오늘까지는 말일세.\n\n하지만 나도 내 자신을 알지. 에라나모를 죽였다면 후회했을 게야. 고맙네.

Source: Yes, by Vivec! Sadal is trapped between this realm and Oblivion. With the final ward down, his prison is vulnerable.\n\nNow we can strike. We'll undo the mistakes of House Indoril.
Target: Yes, by Vivec! Sadal is trapped between this realm and Oblivion. With the final ward down, his prison is vulnerable.\n\nNow we can strike. We'll undo the mistakes of House Indoril.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: At least he was slain by the sword of his father. In private, rather than in public by a hooded executioner.\n\nCold comfort. Thank you.
Target: 적어도 아비의 검에 죽었구만. 공개적으로 복면 쓴 사형 집행인에게 죽는 것 보다는 보는 눈이 없는 곳에서 죽는게 더 낫겠지.\n\n달갑지 않은 위로로군. 고맙네.

Source: Leave these pigs to your slaughter. May they rot.\n\nThank you for your help. Shadowfen awaits!
Target: 저 돼지들이 당신에게 학살당하도록 해야지. 썩어 가도록 말이야.\n\n도와줘서 고마워. 섀도우펜아, 기다려라!

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Thank you.
Target: 고마워요.

Source: May the swamp give you bountiful fruit, plentiful fish, and sharp stones, my friend.\n\nYou've done a great service for our egg-brother, and it will not be forgotten.
Target: May the swamp give you bountiful fruit, plentiful fish, and sharp stones, my friend.\n\nYou've done a great service for our egg-brother, and it will not be forgotten.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I found her about to be co-opted into a Bosmer tribe.  I convinced her to return.
Target: 약혼녀분이 보스머 부족에 합류하려고 하던 것을 찾아냈어요. 돌아오라고 설득해 뒀고요.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Here's the Root Liqueur you asked for.
Target: Here's the Root Liqueur you asked for.

Source: I found her, but she wouldn't return. She's been co-opted by a Bosmer tribe.
Target: 약혼녀분을 찾았지만, 돌아오진 않을 거에요. 보스머 부족과 함께 한다더군요.

Source: Ugh, what a disgusting mess you get when you put a bunch of Dremora hearts in a sack.  \n\nBut thanks for bringing them to me. The potions I can make with these will help a lot.
Target: 윽, 당신이 이 드레모라 심장을 자루에 넣었을때 얼마나 역겹고 더러웠을지.\n\n그러나  이것들을 가져오다니 고맙군요. 이게 있으면 더 좋은 물약을 만들 수 있을것입니다.

Source: Go now, exalted by my blessing, to Eidolon's Hollow. \n\nStop Magistrix Vox and put an end to her madness.
Target: 나의 축복을 받고 망령의 동굴로 가거라.\n\n 매지스트릭스 복스를 막아내고 그녀의 광기를 끝내라.

Source: I heard there was a fight at the entrance to Sovngarde. I wish I could have seen such a thing!
Target: I heard there was a fight at the entrance to Sovngarde. I wish I could have seen such a thing!

Source: I will discover what powers the Judgment of Veloth possesses and why Vox has stolen it. In the meantime, you must pursue Magistrix Vox.\n\nFor your heroism and service this day, I name you a Hand of Almalexia. Go with my blessing upon you.
Target: 나는 벨로스의 심판이 가지고 있는 힘과 왜 복스가 그것을 훔쳤는지를 알아낼것이다. 그 동안에, 매지스트릭스 복스를 추적해야한다.\n\n오늘은 너의 봉사와 영웅적인 행동을 위해, 나는 너를 아말렉시아의 핸드라 칭하겠다. 나의 축복이 너와 함께 할것이다.

Source: <<1>>! Yes, it's one of the relics the Reach stole from us during their raid. I never thought I'd see it again!
Target: <<1>>! Yes, it's one of the relics the Reach stole from us during their raid. I never thought I'd see it again!

Target: 이제 무엇을 해야 할까?

Target: I'll avenge you!

Source: High-King Jorunn rules unopposed and Fildgor yet lives. The divines truely smile on the sons of Skyrim.
Target: High-King Jorunn rules unopposed and Fildgor yet lives. The divines truely smile on the sons of Skyrim.

Source: I completed a contract.

Source: I did nothing. She was planning to betray you from the start.\n\nBut you, I can't control. It's as if you don't have a proper soul. What a pair we are! Me trapped in my crown, you trapped in your soulless husk. I hope you're better company than Ulfnir.
Target: 난 아무것도 안 했다. 그 녀석은 처음부터 널 배신할 계획이었단 말이다.\n\n하지만 넌 내가 조종할 수 없군. 마치 제대로 된 영혼이 없는 것처럼 말이야. 우리는 얼마나 비슷한가! 난 내 왕관에 갇혔고, 넌 네 영혼 없는 껍질에 갇혔으니. 너는 울프니어보다 더 나은 동료이길 바란다.

Source: Glowflies? Sure, hand 'em here. I could use these. Nothing is biting today.\n\nHere's some coin for your trouble. Just a little trouble warrants just a little coin, I reckon.
Target: 빛나는 파리? 물론이지, 이리 줘. 이걸 써봐야겠어. 오늘은 아무것도 물지 않았거든.\n\n 여기 고생한 댓가야.  고생이 적으면 보상도 적지. 내 생각이야.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Hey, I wouldn't want the death of the last Kothringi on my conscience. Far as I'm concerned, the keystone was lost to the swamps.
Target: Hey, I wouldn't want the death of the last Kothringi on my conscience. Far as I'm concerned, the keystone was lost to the swamps.

Source: You saw the pain that drove Vox to unleash the plague and rally the Maulborn to glorious acts of violence. Now you understand her motives and are finally ready to face her.\n\nWell, except for the power of Veloth's hammer. You can't overcome that.
Target: 너는 복스를 움직이게 하는 고통과 역병을 일으키며 마울본에게 영광스러운 폭력을 휘두르게끔 하는것을 봤어. 이제 너는 그녀의 동기를 이해하고 마침내 그녀를 마주할 준비가 됬지.\n\n벨로스의 망치의 힘을 뺀다면 말이지. 너가 이기진 못할거야.

Source: Ha! That'd do it for most around here. Polish their egos to a fine sheen.\n\nRelatives of one of Nilwen's victims went looking for her a few months ago, three big Nord men. They turned up in the river, slit from ear to ear.
Target: Ha! That'd do it for most around here. Polish their egos to a fine sheen.\n\nRelatives of one of Nilwen's victims went looking for her a few months ago, three big Nord men. They turned up in the river, slit from ear to ear.

Source: My eyes are round with wonderment! Look what you have brought us. We accept these fantastic gifts.\n\nWe now show our respect for the excellent Dunmer culture. Wait a moment while we change into this stylish Dunmer garb.
Target: 이거 정말 놀랍군! 가져온 물건들 좀 봐. 정말 환상적인 선물들을 받았어.\n\n그럼 이 멋진 던머 문화에 대한 존경심을 표하도록 하지. 우리가 이 멋진 던머 복장으로 갈아입을 동안 조금만 기다려 줘.

Source: I helped the Dragon Bridge Garrison stop a Reachmen plot to blow up the Dragon Bridge.
Target: I helped the Dragon Bridge Garrison stop a Reachmen plot to blow up the Dragon Bridge.

Source: Well, you know. Goblins, giants—they're all great big beasts to little me.\n\nBut what's important is you saved me. My hero! Thank you so very much. Here, have some coins.
Target: Well, you know. Goblins, giants—they're all great big beasts to little me.\n\nBut what's important is you saved me. My hero! Thank you so very much. Here, have some coins.

Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Dinwenel sent me. She said you could use some help.
Target: Dinwenel이 나를 보냈습니다. 그녀가 너를 도와 줄 수 있다고 했어.\n

Source: Sounds like Dinwenel sent me just in time.
Target: Dinwenel이 나에게 시간을두고 보낸 것처럼 들린다.\n

Source: You did? I have to go see him!\n\nAnd, thank you. I can't ever possibly repay you.
Target: 구해왔어요? 그를 봐야겠어요!\n\n 그리고 고마워요. 무슨 일을 해도 이 일은 갚을 수 없을거에요.

Source: Captain Kaleen needs help with a heist. You in?
Target: 칼린 선장이 저지르려는 도둑질에 도움이 필요해. 너도 같이할래?

Target: Ziddak's fatal flaw was rage, not cowardice. Now there is no male in our tribe fit to take his place.\n\nSome of the housemen at the temple want revenge. They will hunt our people, so Tirinaat and I are leaving.

Target: 도시로 향하는 포탈을 열어놨소. 원한다면 얼마든지 사용해도 좋소.\n\n당신께 빚을 졌구려. 당신의 도움이 없었다면 다른 이들은 아직도 같혀 있었거나 더 심한 일을 겪었겠지. 안전을 확보하고 나면 곧장 넌과 통하는 포탈을 안정화시킬 것이오.

Source: <Malsia doesn't respond. It seems her fears have come to fruition—her soul has been torn from her body.>
Target: <말시아는 반응이 없다. 공포에 질린 나머지 영혼이 그녀의 몸에서 찢겨져 나간 것 같다.>

Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: That was simply a consequence. They needed Tribunal energy to locate the Clockwork City … I was the easiest target. If Barbas enters Sotha Sil's city … disaster will follow.\n\nI appreciate your help, but I must conserve what remains of my energy.
Target: 그것은 단순히 결과였을 뿐이야. 그들이 클락워크 시티를 찾기 위해서는 삼신의 힘이 필요했거든... 내가 가장 쉬운 먹잇감이었지. 바르바스가 소사 실의 도시에 들어간다면, 재앙이 벌어질거야.\n\n도와줘서 고마워. 하지만 난 남은 힘을 쥐어짜서 대화를 해야해.

Source: My thanks, Rootmender. I will make sure his loved ones receive it.\n\nDespite our loss, I am relieved you were able to find the other envoys in good health. Next time, I'll insist they are accompanied by guards.
Target: My thanks, Rootmender. I will make sure his loved ones receive it.\n\nDespite our loss, I am relieved you were able to find the other envoys in good health. Next time, I'll insist they are accompanied by guards.

Source: Hmm? Oh, yes. With this machine shutdown the threat to Tel Fyr is contained. Keep whatever valuables you collected as compensation.
Target: 흠? 오, 그래 안전해. 이 기계를 정지한 덕분에 텔 피르에 대한 위협은 저지할 수 있어. 얻은 물건은 감사의 표시로 가져가게나.

Target: 곧 그럴 것이오. 투'와카께서 공기 안에 계시고 그분의 숨결을 보내시는 것 같군.\n\n이곳에 있는 메마른 손은 곧 바스러질 것이고, 그 조각들은 바람에 날리는 모래처럼 흩어져버릴 것이오.

Target: 가련하고도 깜찍한 녀석. 어느정도의 가치가 있는지 알고.. 뭐 됐어. 끝난건 끝난거지. 하지만 그 이상은 기대하지 말게. 말러를 죽인 만큼만 주지. 그 이상의 드레이크는 없어.\n\n이 돈은 입막음을 위한거야. 잊지말게.

Target: Any time I can cheer when a Dark Elf dies, I'll do it. Especially a Dark Elf as vile as Magistrix Vox.

Source: You did? Hm. It has occurred to me that the Withered Hand might seek to use the wards to raise the consecrated dead at Tu'whacca's Throne. \n\nI am relieved that you stopped them.
Target: 당신이요? 흠. 메마른 손이 투'와카의 왕좌에서 봉헌된 죽은 이들을 되살리기 위해 와드를 사용할 것 같다는 생각이 지금 막 든 참인데요.\n\n당신이 그들을 막았다니 정말 다행이군요.

Source: Tu'whacca says you should not worry. He says you will find them. I can watch over The Ward of Ansei Radan for now. \n\nTu'whacca has much faith in you, my friend. He wants me to give you this. You should be honored.
Target: 투'와카께서는 당신이 걱정할 필요가 없다고 하십니다. 그분께서는 당신이 그들을 찾을 거라고 하십니다. 지금은 제가 안세이 라단의 와드를 가지고 있을 수 있겠군요.\n\n투'와카께서는 당신께 큰 믿음을 가지고 계십니다, 내 친구여. 그분께서는 제가 당신께 이걸 드리기를 바라십니다. 당신께 정말로 명예로운 일입니다.

Source: That was it?
Target: That was it?

Source: <<1>> is your new chief.
Target: <<1>> is your new chief.

Source: Arith assures me that the Council will accept my petition now. So yes, I'd call this a success. Hopefully, no one will give me cause to do this again in the future.\n\nOnce again, you have my thanks, sera.
Target: 아리스는 이제 평의회가 나의 청원을 받아 들일 것이라고 보증해줬어. 그래서 그래, 나는 이것을 성공이라고 부르지. 바라건대, 아무도 나에게 이 일을 다시하라고 하지 않았으면 해.\n\n 다시 한번, 네게 감사를 표하지.

Source: Then you've fulfilled the duty of the Ash'abah here, and saved me a dungheap of trouble.\n\nAs we Ash'abah always say, true honor need not be named. I hope we cross paths again.
Target: 그럼 당신은 여기서 아샤'바의 의무를 수행하고 이 엉망진창에서 날 구해준 거로군.\n\n아샤'바가 언제나 이야기하듯, 진정한 명예는 이름이 필요가 없지. 우리가 다시 만나길 바라지.

Source: As Lord Vivec has written, "The bravest heart never falters." You are truly Vivec's champion.\n\nI didn't know if the Blessing Stone was going to work, but I appreciate your help. Now go and talk to Lord Vivec. I'm sure he has a plan to share with us.
Target: 비벡 님이 기술하셨던 것처럼, \\"가장 용감한 영혼은 망설임이 없다\"\". 넌 실로 비벡 님의 용사야.\n\n축복의 돌이 효과가 있을지는 모르겠지만
column4: 도와줘서 고맙네. 비벡 님과 이야기하러 가지. 아마 계획이 있으실거야."

Source: I did. But only because you wouldn't have done it otherwise. Ralasa would have killed Eoki and me eventually. She forced my hand. A Telvanni must act or die.\n\nPlease, take this and my apologies. I hope you'll see the wisdom in this eventually.
Target: 그래. 하지만 당신이 하지 않았다면 랄라사는 결국 에오키와 나를 죽였을 거야. 그녀는 내 손을 꽉 쥐었어. 텔바니는 행동하지 않으면 죽게되는 곳이지.\n\n제발, 이것과 내 사과를 받아줘. 나는 당신이 결국 이 결정이 현명했다는 걸 알기바래.

Source: I'm almost afraid to do so. What couldn't he just say to us all this time?\n\nStill, these were his last wishes. Thank you for making that possible.
Target: 그러고 싶지 않아. 이제와서 왜 그러는거지?\n\n하지만 아버지의 마지막 소원이라면 해드려야겠지. 그 일을 가능하게 해주어서 고마워.

Source: Did you really meet Ysgramor himself?
Target: 정말 이스그라모어와 만난 겁니까?

Source: I did what I had to do.
Target: I did what I had to do.

Source: We can discuss that in a moment. First, we owe you a significant sum. It's only right that we settle the books on that first.\n\nI hope this is sufficient? I assure you, there will be much more if you choose to join us. Once again, you have my thanks.
Target: We can discuss that in a moment. First, we owe you a significant sum. It's only right that we settle the books on that first.\n\nI hope this is sufficient? I assure you, there will be much more if you choose to join us. Once again, you have my thanks.

Source: We can discuss that in a moment. First, we owe you a significant sum. It's only right that we settle the books on that first.\n\nI hope this is sufficient? I assure you, there will be much more if you choose to join us. Once again, you have my thanks.
Target: We can discuss that in a moment. First, we owe you a significant sum. It's only right that we settle the books on that first.\n\nI hope this is sufficient? I assure you, there will be much more if you choose to join us. Once again, you have my thanks.

Target: House Dres has spread your name far and wide.

Source: Here are the medallions I found.
Target: 여기 제가 찾은 메달리온 입니다.

Source: Nothing will control those constructs again.
Target: 이 기계들을 다시는 조종할수 없을것입니다.

Source: I made the mixture. The wasps became very angry.
Target: 그 혼합물을 만들었습니다. 말벌들이 굉장히 화를 내더군요.

Source: I found this Ayleid relic in the Temple of Sul. It awakens the pilasters inside.
Target: 설의 사원 안에서 에일리드 유물을 발견했습니다. 그것은 사원 안의 pilasters를 깨웁니다.

Source: I've recovered the keystone, so to speak. I seem to have absorbed it.
Target: 말하자면, 키스톤을 되찾았어. 내가 그걸 흡수한것 같아.

Source: Drillk, I need that keystone.
Target: Drillk, 내겐 키스톤이 필요해.

Source: Hope none of this stuff is cursed. You don't want to hear the stories about what they were used for.\n\nHere's your gold. Try not to get buried with it.
Target: Hope none of this stuff is cursed. You don't want to hear the stories about what they were used for.\n\nHere's your gold. Try not to get buried with it.

Source: Shiri? I do not know this name. Nor do I know anything about any Ansei Ward. I know only that Satakal will soon devour himself—devour us all!\n\nWe must warn them … or must we? No. It matters not.
Target: Shiri? 난 그런 이름은 몰라. 안세이 와드에 대해서도 아무것도 모르지. 내가 아는 유일한 건 사타칼이 곧 스스로를 집어삼킬거라는 거야. 우리 전체를 말이야!\n\n우리는 그들에게 경고해야만 해... 그래야만 하나? 아니. 그건 중요치 않아.

Source: <<1>> sent me. I've collapsed the scamp cave entrances.
Target: <<1>>가  보냈습니다. 스캠프 동굴들 입구를 무너 뜨렸어요.

Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Target: 나는 아트로나크 수호자들을 물리쳤어. 우리가 그들을 부를 수 있을거야.

Source: You're the one that saved Jorunn the Skald-King in Windhelm. Hail, hero!
Target: You're the one that saved Jorunn the Skald-King in Windhelm. Hail, hero!

Source: I don't care what you say, the killer in Stormhold was a Shadowscale!
Target: I don't care what you say, the killer in Stormhold was a Shadowscale!

Source: I've brought you a letter from <<1>>.
Target: I've brought you a letter from <<1>>.

Source: Another sibling? But who could that be …? Wait, Suturah did have another child, a very young daughter. \n\nI remember her now, nipping at her brothers' heels … but I do not remember her name. Somehow we must find her though.
Target: Another sibling? But who could that be …? Wait, Suturah did have another child, a very young daughter. \n\nI remember her now, nipping at her brothers' heels … but I do not remember her name. Somehow we must find her though.

Source: Here, take this. Without you, we'd still be dragging half-mad miners out of there.\n\nIt'll take some time to get the mine up and running, but with a new queen, I bet we'll be even more prosperous than before. Thanks, friend, and safe travels.
Target: 자, 이걸 받게. 네가 없었다면 지금쯤 이상해진 녀석들을 저곳에서 아직 끌어내고 있겠지.\n\n광산을 재건하고 가동하기 위해서는 시간이 걸리겠지만, 새로운 여왕이 있으면 분명 이전보다도 더 번영하겠지. 고마워, 친구여. 조심하게.

Source: And it's all thanks to you. You've helped me greatly throughout this entire ordeal. I hope you find this a suitable gift for all of your troubles!\n\nAnd feel free to visit the Xinchei-Konu whenever you please.
Target: And it's all thanks to you. You've helped me greatly throughout this entire ordeal. I hope you find this a suitable gift for all of your troubles!\n\nAnd feel free to visit the Xinchei-Konu whenever you please.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: Oh yes! Before you arrived, he was telling us all about it. I am certain it's going to make for a great story—his best yet! And he was so feisty!\n\nAllow me to pay you for your service. It is the standard rate for Narsis's apprentices.
Target: 좋아! 당신이 도착하기 전에, 그가 그 모험에 관해 우리 모두에게 이야기하고 있었어. 훌륭한 이야기라는 확신이 들었지. 현재로써는 최고의 이야기야. 그리고 그는 너무 열정적이었어!\n\n 당신의 도움에 대한 비용을 지불할게. 나르시스의 견습생들을 위한 표준 요금이야.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: Halinjirr? I thought him a clueless sugar-sop. If he's managed to grow moon-sugar here in Vvardenfell, he's more cunning than he seems. Make no mistake, we'll find him.\n\nThe Tribunal thanks you for your help, Outlander. Take this as your reward.
Target: 하린지르? 나는 그가 사탕 발림을 할 줄 모르는 자인줄 알았는데. 만약 그가 문슈가를 바덴펠에서 재배한게 맞다면, 보기보다 교활한 것이로군. 우리가 부주의했군, 그를 곧 찾아낼 거야.\n\n트라이뷰널은 너의 도움에 감사를 표하도록 하지, 이방인. 이 보상을 가져가도록.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: Oh, a hundred blessings on you, walker! It is good to see that not everyone in Vvardenfell is an uptight prude.\n\nPlease, take this for your trouble.
Target: 오, 백개의 축복을! 바덴펠의 모든 사람이 새침데기이지 않아서 다행이군.\n\n수고를 해준 댓가는 이걸세.

Target: You're free!

Source: An Ashlander? That seems unlikely, but I trust your instincts. We need to find out more about this Chodala and the ancient enemy that aids him.\n\nTake this. Another token of my appreciation. And look, here comes the Archcanon now.
Target: 한 애쉬랜더? 그럴것 같지는 않지만, 자네의 본능을 믿겠네. 우리는 초달라와 그를 돕는 고대의 적에 대해서 더 알아내야 하네.\n\n이것을 받게. 내가 주는 또 다른 감사의 표시일세. 그리고 보게, 저기 아크캐논이 오고있네.

Source: Yes, yes, we'll get to that. But first, payment for services rendered! You helped me acquire the Kajin-Jat Crystal and recovered three Argonian treasures besides! Peerless work, my friend. Peerless!\n\nPlease, take this payment with my compliments.
Target: Yes, yes, we'll get to that. But first, payment for services rendered! You helped me acquire the Kajin-Jat Crystal and recovered three Argonian treasures besides! Peerless work, my friend. Peerless!\n\nPlease, take this payment with my compliments.

Source: Most excellent! Only eleven more tablets, and the Xinchei-Konu will be complete. And though I can no longer aid you, I do wish you luck.\n\nPlease, take this reward. You have done much to earn it.

Target: I've freed Damrina, a Covenant scout, from Imperial clutches, and helped her get her lost orders back.

Source: I have freed both Bakkhara and Kargand from the mysterious Daedric Realm under Elden Hollow.
Target: I have freed both Bakkhara and Kargand from the mysterious Daedric Realm under Elden Hollow.

Source: I know you will—I'm counting on it. Without you, this castle would already be flying Imperial banners. \n\nYou've saved the kingdom, and now its queen. If there's one person I believe in, it's you. Still, I don't know how we're going to do it alone.
Target: 자네가 그럴 줄 알았네. 그럴 거라고 확신했지. 자네가 없었다면 이 성에 이미 제국의 깃발이 휘날리고 있었을 것이야.\n\n자네는 왕국을 구했었고, 이제는 여왕을 구했군. 내가 믿는 사람이 있다면, 그건 자네일세. 아직 우리만으로 뭘 어떻게 해야 할지는 모르겠지만 말일세.

Source: What's next?
Target: 다음은 뭐지?

Source: Is that the last of them?
Target: 이제 끝인가?

Target: 뭘 해야할까?

Source: HAHAHHA!!  You've made a wise decision.  As promised, here's your reward.  I hope you enjoy it.... MWHAHAH
Target: 하하 히야!! 현명한 결정을 했군. 약속한 대로, 여기에 너의 보상이 있어. 네가 그것을 즐기길 바래… 므하하\n

Source: <Search the backpack.>
Target: <배낭을 뒤져본다>

Source: This one doesn't grasp the Hound's goals, but thanks you for thwarting them.
Target: This one doesn't grasp the Hound's goals, but thanks you for thwarting them.

Source: Is it true you saved those priceless relics from the Worm Cultists in Rulanyil's Fall? What a brave gesture!
Target: Is it true you saved those priceless relics from the Worm Cultists in Rulanyil's Fall? What a brave gesture!

Source: Praise the Divines!  You've returned... and with the tome! I can feel its magic! You have my eternal graditude adventurer - I promise to use this to cure all of Tamriel's ills.
Target: 디바인들을 찬양하라! 돌아왔구나... 그리고 Tome과 함께! 나는 Tome의 마법이 느껴지네! 넌 나의 영원한 위대한 모험가야-나는 Tome을 탐리엘의 모든 병을 치료하는데 사용할 것을 약속한다.\n

Source: I, for one, am as grateful to you as the flowers are to the sun. You brought life back to these lands when it was nearly choked out.\n\nThough we may never officially call an outsider a friend, I think we can at least consider you an ally.
Target: 개인적으로는 당신에게 꽃이 태양에게 하는 것과 같은 감사를 표하겠어요. 당신은 절체절명의 순간 이 땅에 다시 생명을 가져왔어요.\n\n우리가 공식적으로 외부인을 친구라고 부르지는 않을지라도, 최소한 당신을 동맹이라고 생각할 수는 있을 거에요.

Source: Well met, noble Numinous! May Xarxes, God of Ancestry and Secrets, commemorate you! In this hour the Altmer need your aid.
Target: 잘 만났어요, 고귀한 누미노스! 조상과 비밀의 신인 May Xarxes가 여러분을 추모하기를! 이 알트머는 당신의 도움이 필요해요.\n

Source: You've made me soo happy! Thank you so much for finding him.
Target: 넌 날 정말 행복하게 해 주는구나! 그를 찾아 주셔서 정말 고마워.

Source: I got the wine for <<1>>
Target: I got the wine for <<1>>

Source: I suppose I might be able to. I would need a little blood. Stibbons, hold out your arm. This won't hurt a bit.
Target: 할 수 있을 것 같아. 약간의 피가 좀 필요할거야. 스티븐스, 네 팔을 내밀어 봐. 하나도 안 아플 거야.

Source: I want to join the Fighters Guild.
Target: 파이터 길드에 가입하고 싶어요.

Source: No matter what the future holds, Evermore is deeply indebted to you, as I am too.\n\nIn times like these, we all need a hero like you … to remind us that no matter how bad things get, there's always hope.
Target: No matter what the future holds, Evermore is deeply indebted to you, as I am too.\n\nIn times like these, we all need a hero like you … to remind us that no matter how bad things get, there's always hope.

Source: I want to join the Fighters Guild.
Target: I want to join the Fighters Guild.

Source: I wish to join the Mages Guild.
Target: 메이지 길드에 가입하고 싶습니다.

Source: Right. The book?
Target: 알았어. 그 책?\n

Source: I wish to join the Mages Guild.
Target: I wish to join the Mages Guild.

Source: Bring the <<1>> to <<2>>.
Target: Bring the <<1>> to <<2>>.

Source: I want to join the Fighters Guild.
Target: 파이터 길드에 가입하고 싶어.

Source: I came to offer my assistance.
Target: I came to offer my assistance.

Source: It's all here!  I was worried all of the research we completed would be lost.  The death that happened here won't be in vain.
Target: 여기에 다 있어요! 우리가 해온 모든 연구가 없어질까 봐 걱정했어. 여기서 일어난 죽음은 헛되지 않을 거야.\n

Source: Your deeds are not going unnoticed.  You have been a brave soul to battle this evil.
Target: 네가 한 일들은 모든 이가 알게 될거야. 넌 악과 싸우는 용감한 사람이야.\n

Source: You're welcome.
Target: 천만에요.

Source: I saved <<1>> and put an end to <<2>>, once and for all.
Target: I saved <<1>> and put an end to <<2>>, once and for all.

Source: Good riddance to those mad cultists and their Bad Man tree.
Target: Good riddance to those mad cultists and their Bad Man tree.

Source: The miasma covering the Great Tree cleared up. <<1>> assures me everything will be fine.
Target: The miasma covering the Great Tree cleared up. <<1>> assures me everything will be fine.

Source: I have the key that opens the way to the Labyrinth.
Target: 미궁으로 가는 길을 열어줄 열쇠를 가져왔습니다.

Source: We Nords will route out that bastard Fildgor. He won't be able to hide in the hills for very long.
Target: We Nords will route out that bastard Fildgor. He won't be able to hide in the hills for very long.

Source: I must take stock of our assets and resources. Determine just how much might we can bring to bear. Only then can I develop a strategy that shall allow us to win this war.\n\nBut forgive me. I wanted to convey that you performed admirably at the tower.
Target: 우리의 강점과 자산을 확인해 봐야겠다. 어느 정도의 힘을 쓸 수 있을지 알아보는 게지. 그렇게 해야만 이 전쟁에서 승리할 작전을 계획할 수 있는 것이니라.\n\n하지만 그 전에, 탑에서의 감탄할 만한 행동에 대한 보상을 하고 싶구나.

Source: Now it is time for you to leave and for me to reap what I've sown. I was a successful jeweler in my day—take this for your troubles and go on with your life.
Target: 이제 자네는 떠나고 나는 내가 뿌린 것을 거둬야 할 시간이군. 나는 왕년엔 성공적인 보석 세공인이었다네. 수고의 대가로 이걸 받고 자네의 삶을 살아가게나.

Source: I have met with Queen Ayrenn after gaining my Alinor medallion. She wishes the Numinous to aid the High Elves against the Maormer.
Target: 나는 알리노르 메달을 획득한 후에 아이렌 여왕을 만났어. 아이렌여왕은 누미노스가 Maormer에 맞서는 하이 엘프들을 돕기를 바라고 있어.\n

Source: The Dominion ambushed us. I'd be ashamed to call it a rout, if I wasn't considering how in Oblivion they knew.\n\nAt least we've learned where they are, even if it's butcher's work to get them out of that place.
Target: The Dominion ambushed us. I'd be ashamed to call it a rout, if I wasn't considering how in Oblivion they knew.\n\nAt least we've learned where they are, even if it's butcher's work to get them out of that place.

Source: You are welcome, Ansei Halelah.
Target: 천만의 말씀입니다, 할레라.

Source: The mines at Crosswych are invaluable. I'm not surprised the Red Rooks tried to take control of the place.
Target: Crosswych의 광산은 매우 가치 있지. Red Rooks가 그곳을 장악하려 했다는 것이 놀랍진 않아.

Source: No one else should suffer my folly. Thank you, and please take this for your troubles.
Target: 누군가 내 어리석음으로 고통받게 할 수는 없지. 고맙네. 그리고 수고해준 대가로 부디 이걸 받아 주게나.

Source: How thoughtful! I can hardly turn down such a generous gift.\n\nEspecially with the trouble brewing in <<1>>.
Target: 여왕께선 아주 사려 깊으시군! 그런 관대한 선물을 거절할 수는 없지.\n\n특히 <<1>>에서 태동하는 문제에 관한 것이라면 말이야.

Source: I thought I'd lost it forever to the mire. When you have so little, everything you have carries meaning.\n\nI erect the spine of gratitude for helping me.
Target: I thought I'd lost it forever to the mire. When you have so little, everything you have carries meaning.\n\nI erect the spine of gratitude for helping me.

Source: You have vanquished all evil from Blacheart Crypt
Target: 블랙 하트 묘지 지하실에서 모든 악을 제거했습니다\n

Source: We've done all we can here, but it's clear that Naemon still seeks to harm Valenwood, so our work is not finished.\n\nI suggest we spread out and search for signs of darkness. When Auri-El wills it, I am certain the Green will bring us together again.
Target: 여기서 할 수 있는 일은 다 했지만, 네이몬이 지금도 발렌우드를 해치려 한다는 사실은 명백하니, 우리 일은 아직 끝난 것이 아니오.\n\n따로 떨어져서 어둠의 흔적을 찾아보는 것이 좋겠소. 아우리엘께서 원하실 때, 분명 녹색이 우리를 다시 만나게 해 줄 것이오.

Source: We've done all we can here, but it's clear that Naemon still seeks to harm Valenwood, so our work is not finished.\n\nI suggest we spread out and search for signs of darkness. When Auri-El wills it, I am certain the Green will bring us together again.
Target: 여기서 할 수 있는 일은 다 했지만, 네이몬이 지금도 발렌우드를 해치려 한다는 사실은 명백하니, 우리 일은 아직 끝난 것이 아니오.\n\n따로 떨어져서 어둠의 흔적을 찾아보는 것이 좋겠소. 아우리엘께서 원하실 때, 분명 녹색이 우리를 다시 만나게 해 줄 것이오.

Source: I have solved the mystery of Direfrost and defeated Drodda of Icereach.
Target: I have solved the mystery of Direfrost and defeated Drodda of Icereach.

Source: You have recovered the pages of Vestrial's research book.
Target: 당신은 Vestrial의 연구 일지를 회수했다.\n

Source: The people you were paid to look for are all dead.
Target: 당신이 돈을 받고 찾던 사람들은 모두 죽었어요.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 해야하지?

Source: You saved my life, traveler. I was in Dune the day of the attack. Thank you.
Target: 여행자님이 제 인생을 구해 주셨어요. 저는 공격 당일 듄에 있었습니다. 고마워요.

Source: The liberator of Fallowstone Hall! Your bravery is legendary.
Target: The liberator of Fallowstone Hall! Your bravery is legendary.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: A letter? From my cousin? That's wonderful news! I'm glad to hear he made it to Stonefalls safely.\n\nThanks for bringing this to me, friend.
Target: A letter? From my cousin? That's wonderful news! I'm glad to hear he made it to Stonefalls safely.\n\nThanks for bringing this to me, friend.

Source: The wilderness of Stonefalls was rife with predators and hostile creatures. The citizens of the region can now sleep better knowing I've slain the worst of them.
Target: 스톤폴스의 황야는 포식자와 적대적인 생물로 가득 차 있습니다. 이 지역의 시민들은 최악의 위협중 하나가 죽었다는 것을 알면 편히 잘 수 있을겁니다.

Source: That monster practiced necromancy? The Baron's death is more than just a boon for us - the Nine would smile on even us for our actions today. Rest easy tonight, for you have done work that even priests would approve of.
Target: 저 괴물이 강령술을 연습했다고? 남작의 죽음은 우리에게 있어 그저 축복일 뿐이야. the Nine은 오늘날 우리의 행동에 대해서도 미소를 지을거야. 여러분은 제사장들도 인정할 만한 일을 하였으므로, 오늘 밤에는 안심하십시오.

Source: You don't remember anything? Even <<1>>?
Target: 너 기억 안나? << 1 >>도?\n

Source: It's more than spiders. They were taken by a spider Daedra.
Target: 그것은 거미 이상입니다. 그들은 거미 Daedra에 의해 잡혔습니다.\n

Source: Why'd you give Tavo's treasure to the debt collector? Such a shame.
Target: Why'd you give Tavo's treasure to the debt collector? Such a shame.

Source: That wasn't the tricky part?
Target: 그건 까다로운 부분이 아니었나요?

Source: You're the one who sent that debt collector in Kozanset packing. Your chivalry has no equal!
Target: You're the one who sent that debt collector in Kozanset packing. Your chivalry has no equal!

Source: Where is everyone?
Target: 모두들 어디에 있죠?

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: A modest sum, yes? And I will tell our associates of your daring plunder! Greedy Khajiit from all over Elsweyr will stumble over themselves contracting your services!
Target: A modest sum, yes? And I will tell our associates of your daring plunder! Greedy Khajiit from all over Elsweyr will stumble over themselves contracting your services!

Source: There are still matters that must be considered.
Target: 아직 생각해봐야 할 문제가 남았어요.

Source: So my fears were true. Well, you did your best. Thank you for finding my men, I will let thier families know that they died defending our lands.
Target: 제 두려움은 사실이었어. 글쎄, 넌 최선을 다했어. 내 병사들을 찾아 줘서 고마워, 그들의 가족들에게 그들이 우리 땅을 지키다 죽었다고 알려 줄게.\n

Source: You can do it. Just speak to them from your heart.
Target: You can do it. Just speak to them from your heart.

Source: Yes! This is exactly the component I've been needing. Thank you.
Target: 네! 이것이 바로 제가 필요로 했던 부품입니다. 감사합니다.\n

Source: I was able to replace the water filters.
Target: I was able to replace the water filters.

Source: Thanks to your help, we have vanquished the major threat coming from within the keep and will surely win this fight after all.
Target: 귀하의 도움 덕분에 저희는 주요 위협을 극복했고 결국 이 싸움에서 이기게 될 것입니다.\n

Source: I was able to replace the commutators.
Target: I was able to replace the commutators.

Source: I recovered these halo fragments from the Saints.
Target: I recovered these halo fragments from the Saints.

Source: I recovered these halo fragments from the Saints.
Target: I recovered these halo fragments from the Saints.

Source: The Stormfist Brigade made a critical mistake at Cradlecrush. They should have left the mammoths alone.
Target: The Stormfist Brigade made a critical mistake at Cradlecrush. They should have left the mammoths alone.

Source: You have completed all the talking objectives.
Target: You have completed all the talking objectives.

Source: It's done. The wispmother is dead.
Target: 끝났어요. 위습어미는 죽었어요.

Source: I hear you taught the Reachman Stral a bloody lesson.
Target: I hear you taught the Reachman Stral a bloody lesson.

Source: Thank you. I think we've contained the Dro-m'Athra.
Target: 고마워요. 드로 마스라는 이제 억제된 것 같네요.

Source: His Captain of the Guard was a werewolf? I knew Blackmoore was brazen, but that goes farther than I thought even he dared. Good work. Should anyone try to make the Baron seem a victim, this information will remove any question of his guilt.
Target: 그의 경비 대장이 늑대 인간이었다고? 나는 블랙 무어가 뻔뻔하다는 것을 알고 있었지만, 그것은 내가 생각했던 그의 용기보다도 훨씬 더 심했군. 잘했어요. 누군가 남작을 희생자처럼 보이게 하려고 한다면, 이 정보는 그의 죄에 대한 모든 질문을 제거할 것입니다.\n

Source: I recovered these halo fragments from the Saints.
Target: I recovered these halo fragments from the Saints.

Source: You've done it. I heard his pleas from here. Now, he troubles no one. Let us away from this place, and let the Dark Brotherhood's name become the stuff of nightmares for those who would follow Blackmoore's path.
Target: 네가 해냈어 그가 여기서 탄원하는 것을 들었다 이제, 그는 아무도 곤란하게 하지 않아요. 우리를 이곳에서 멀어지게 하고, 블랙 모어의 길을 따를 사람들에게 다크 브라더스의 이름이 악몽의 대상이 되도록 하자.\n

Source: Poor <<1>>. I wondered what became of him after Sinmur attacked Riften.\n\nThank you. It's a relief to know at last.
Target: Poor <<1>>. I wondered what became of him after Sinmur attacked Riften.\n\nThank you. It's a relief to know at last.

Source: It should be safe to remove the Saints' soul gems now.
Target: It should be safe to remove the Saints' soul gems now.

Source: I have his book! I mean … the library has his book! Wait a minute. He said what? In a graveyard? Daedric poetry? You're kidding!\n\nHe's not what I thought he was. Thank you for opening my eyes.
Target: I have his book! I mean … the library has his book! Wait a minute. He said what? In a graveyard? Daedric poetry? You're kidding!\n\nHe's not what I thought he was. Thank you for opening my eyes.

Source: It should be safe to remove the Saints' soul gems now.
Target: It should be safe to remove the Saints' soul gems now.

Source: It should be safe to remove the Saints' soul gems now.
Target: It should be safe to remove the Saints' soul gems now.

Source: I heard that poor Lord Diel met a tragic end in the Shrieking Scar. About time someone took care of that bastard.
Target: I heard that poor Lord Diel met a tragic end in the Shrieking Scar. About time someone took care of that bastard.

Source: Thank you for saving the Mane at Driladan Pass.
Target: Thank you for saving the Mane at Driladan Pass.

Source: I'll return to Evermore to serve the crown. I am still a knight. It's my duty.\n\nFirst though, I will do what I came here to do. I will lay the prince to rest.
Target: 에버모어로 돌아가서 왕실을 섬길 거에요. 난 아직 기사에요. 그건 내 의무죠.\n\n그래도 일단은 여기서 하려던 일을 해야겠죠. 왕자님을 안장해 드릴 거에요.

Source: I will. I can't wait to see him again.\n\nPlease, take this. It isn't much, for I could never repay what you've done for me, but I hope it will suffice.
Target: 그럴게요. 그이를 빨리 다시 보고 싶네요.\n\n부디, 이걸 받아 주세요. 많지는 않고, 절 위해 해주신 일은 무엇으로도 보답할 수 없겠지만, 이걸로 충분하다면 좋겠네요.

Source:
Vampires, here? Sickening. Hunted in our own hunting grounds.

We'll be more vigilant of their kind now. I'll see to it personally that every last one of them is destroyed.

Thank you for helping us.
Target:
여기에 뱀파이어가? 소름돋는구려. 우리 사냥터에서 사냥을 하다니.

지금부터 그놈들을 더 주의해야겠소. 마지막 놈까지 파괴당하는 모습을 내가 직접 봐야겠구먼.

우릴 도와줘서 고맙소.

Source: Well, here's your brassilisk.
Target: 음, 여기 당신의 브레시리스크(brassilisk)입니다.

Source: Excellent! Thank you so much for recovering the cup from that terrible Nord ruffian.\n\nStibbons! Oh, Stibbons! Be a dear and drink from the Emerald Chalice. I want to see how its magic works before we return it to the Mages Guild.
Target: 굉장한데! 그 끔찍한 노드 깡패들한테서 잔을 되찾아줘서 정말로 고마워.\n\n스티븐스! 어이, 스티븐스! 에메랄드 성배로 뭘 좀 마셔줬으면 정말 고맙겠는데. 이걸 메이지 길드로 가져가기 전에 그 마법이 어떻게 작동하는지 보고 싶어.

Source: Is there a reward for returning them?
Target: 이것들을 돌려준 보상같은 건 없어?

Source: <You add the names "Linele Skullcarver" and "Lolann" to Aera's logbook. The book includes the names of many Worm Cult members Aera has brought to justice.\n\nInterestingly, all of them have died either during their arrest or soon after.>
Target: <You add the names "Linele Skullcarver" and "Lolann" to Aera's logbook. The book includes the names of many Worm Cult members Aera has brought to justice.\n\nInterestingly, all of them have died either during their arrest or soon after.>

Source: Is there anything I can do to help deal with this threat?
Target: 이 위협에 대처하기 위해 제가 도울 수 있는 일이 있을까요?

Source: Another mouth to feed and house. You'd better be good!
Target: 또 다른 식객이군. 당신 그것보단 잘해야 될꺼야!

Source: Now you understand. I've read those two silly books over and over again.\n\nI think I'll stay right where I am, though. Better than world you know then the world you don't. You should be on your way.
Target: Now you understand. I've read those two silly books over and over again.\n\nI think I'll stay right where I am, though. Better than world you know then the world you don't. You should be on your way.

Source: Dulza wanted the sword to be returned to your clan.
Target: Dulza wanted the sword to be returned to your clan.

Source: Will you take care of Jona?
Target: 당신이 조나를 돌봐줄 수 있나요?

Source: I've recovered your tabards.
Target: 내가 네 tabards를 되찾았어.\n

Source: This mission needs a leader. I want you to lead the assault across the Chasm.\n\nWe have asked so much of you and you have already accomplished the impossible, but you are one of a very small few that I would trust with this task.
Target: 이 임무에는 지도자가 필요하노라. 네가 균열로의 공격을 이끌어줬으면 한다.\n\n우리는 너에게 많은 것을 부탁했고 넌 이미 불가능한 일을 이루어냈지만, 너야말로 내가 이 과업을 맡길 수 있는 극소수 중 한 명이니라.

Source: Thanks to you, we have an excellent start here in Shornhelm, and I will devote my resources to fortifying the city as quickly as possible.\n\nWe're secure here now and we have to ensure it remains that way.
Target: 고맙네, 우리는 여기 숀헬름에서 훌륭하게 출발할 거고, 나는 도시를 최대한 빨리 보강할 수 있도록 자원을 쏟아부을 걸세.\n \n우리는 이제 여기서 안전하고 이 상태를 계속 유지해야만 해.

Source: What happens to the Oracle now?
Target: 이제 예언자는 어떻게 되는건가요?

Source: The Ayleid text referred to an outpost in the hills. I need to find out where that is. It may be that the answer to defeating Montclair can be found in this hidden location.\n\nBut first things first. There is a more urgent matter for you to deal with.
Target: 에일리드 문서는 언덕에 있는 보루를 언급했소. 나는 그 장소를 알아내야 하오. 그 숨겨진 장소에 있는 것이 몽클레어를 물리칠 답이 되어줄 지도 모르오.\n\n하지만 그보다 먼저 당신이 처리해야 할 더 긴급한 문제가 있소.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I can't believe—that little fool! With the Queen traveling the countryside! Do you have any idea what could happen if word that the Grove trucks with Daedra gets out?\n\nIf this is true, Merormo must die.
Target: 믿을 수가 없구먼. 어리석은 멍청이 녀석! 여왕님께서 순방중이신 이 때에! 우리 숲이 데이드라와 거래를 했다는 말이 알려지면 무슨 일이 일어날지 알기는 하는 겐가?\n\n이게 사실이라면, 메로모는 반드시 죽어야 하네.

Source: A Flame Atronach. My spell should have sent it screaming back to Oblivion.\n\nBut something else interfered.
Target: 화염 아트로나크요. 내 주문이 놈을 오블리비언으로 돌려보냈어야 했지.\n\n하지만 뭔가 다른 것이 간섭했소.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: The Covenant's leader should've been King Fahara'jad. No one would dare attack him as they do King Emeric.
Target: 언약의 지도자는 King Fahara'jad 이었을 것입니다. 그들이 King Emeric에게 하는것처럼 아무도 그를 공격하지 않을 것입니다.\n

Source: You have returned the Nightmare Dust to High Mage Dilborn.
Target: 당신은 Nightmare Dust를 고위 마법사 딜보른에게 보냈다.\n

Source: I appreciate it. Those supply caches are worth more than gold to me. Take this in thanks.
Target: 고마워. 그 보급품 은닉처는 나한테 있어선 황금보다 더 가치있는 것이거든. 감사의 표시를 받아줘.

Source: The legend of Captain Blackheart ends where yours begins. Sailors will murmur your name in awe and thanks. No less than I would expect from Undaunted.\n\nTake your rightful prize. Tomorrow we may continue to nurture your living myth.
Target: 블랙하트 선장의 전설은 자네의 이야기가 시작되는 곳에서 끝나네. 선원들은 경외심과 감사로 자네의 이름을 속삭일 것이야. 내가 언던티드에게 원하는 것 이상이네.\n\n정당한 상을 받게나. 내일도 우리가 자네의 살아있는 신화를 계속 키워 나갈 수 있기를.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source:
You have killed all the bosses in the Halls of the Damned.
X Nazgol the Undying
X General Ripfang
X Bone Colossus
X Orutu
X Anarose Direblood
X Therion Direblood
Target:
당신은 저주받은 홀(Halls of the Damned)의 모든 두목들을 죽였다.
X 죽지않는 자 나즈골 (Nazgol the Undying)
X 장군 립팽 (General Ripfang)
X 뼈 거상 (Bone Colossus)
X 오루투 (Orutu)
X 아나로즈 다이어블루드 (Anarose Direblood)
X 테리온 다이어블루드 (Therion Direblood)

Source: You have found Commander Lafavre's soldiers. Sadly, none of them survived.
Target: 사령관 라파브레의 병사들을 찾으셨군요 안타깝게도, 그들 중 누구도 살아남지 못 했습니다.\n

Source: Exploding arrows? They really worked? That's cheating! I knew I should have disqualified them when I had the chance.\n\nA bet's a bet, though. Take your winnings and go gloat somewhere else.
Target: Exploding arrows? They really worked? That's cheating! I knew I should have disqualified them when I had the chance.\n\nA bet's a bet, though. Take your winnings and go gloat somewhere else.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Are you concerned about the Valenwood?
Target: 발렌우드가 걱정되나요?

Source: After turning down the mage's offer and fending off his attacks, I returned to Discheveled NPC and gave him the tome. He was relieved to finally have it and promised to use it to save the Tamriel.
Target: 마법사의 제안을 거절하고 그의 공격을 물리쳤을 때, 나는 Discheveled NPC에게 돌아와서 그에게 Tome을 주었다. 그는 마침내 그것을 갖게 되어 안심이 되었고 탐리엘을 구하기 위해 그것을 사용하겠다고 약속했다.\n

Source: What will the Hollow do now?
Target: 비어있는 자들은 이제 뭘 할거지?

Source: I heard that people were beaten and starving down in that Tower of Lies prison. I wonder if they were hungry enough to...never mind.
Target: I heard that people were beaten and starving down in that Tower of Lies prison. I wonder if they were hungry enough to...never mind.

Source: This one lost friends in Haven. But you avenged them, I hear. Many owe you their thanks.
Target: This one lost friends in Haven. But you avenged them, I hear. Many owe you their thanks.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: As am I, my friend. But there is much to do. \n\nThe Worms hide inside Trolhetta. Mark my words—Mannimarco's spawn dies today.
Target: As am I, my friend. But there is much to do. \n\nThe Worms hide inside Trolhetta. Mark my words—Mannimarco's spawn dies today.

Source: Thankfully, your efforts within the Shadow Wood saved many of them. But there is still much corruption in the forest; I can feel it. Our work is far from finished.\n\nHere. I'll take the Heart now.
Target: 당신이 그림자 숲에서 해준 노력 덕분에 많은 나무를 구할 수 있었소. 하지만 이 숲은 여전히 많이 오염되어 있지. 그걸 느낄 수 있소. 우리 일이 끝나려면 한참 먼 것 같구려.\n\n자. 이제 심장을 가져가겠소.

Source: I completed my first contract.
Target: 제 첫 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I decided to give the Tome to the mage, who started giggling uncontrollably after reciving it.  He gave me a handsome reward and then abruptly dissapeared.
Target: 나는 그 마법사에게 Tome을 주기로 결정했다. 그 마법사는 Tome을 받은 후 킥킥거리기 시작했고. 그리곤 내게 후한 보수를 주고 갑자기 사라졌다.

Source: Sanessalmo? Now that name I remember. Used to be a member of the Queen's inner circle! \n\nYou have my deepest gratitude for your service today. I'll be sure the Queen learns of your bravery.
Target: 사네살모라고요? 이제 이름이 기억나네요. 여왕님의 측근 중에 한 명이었어요!\n\n오늘 당신이 해 주신 일에 가장 깊은 감사를 표할게요. 여왕님께 당신의 용기를 확실하게 전해드리겠어요.

Source: Thank you. I intend to take great care of this last little spriggan.\n\nWith Hircine's blessing, I hope she might be the seed to spawn many more, and that someday, a multitude of spriggans will again frolick in the waters of Jackdaw Cove.
Target: Thank you. I intend to take great care of this last little spriggan.\n\nWith Hircine's blessing, I hope she might be the seed to spawn many more, and that someday, a multitude of spriggans will again frolick in the waters of Jackdaw Cove.

Source: I had no doubts you'd triumph.\n\nThis may not be a stronghold, but there are people who need me. We'll fight back until the Imperials are beaten, or we die in glorious battle!
Target: 너의 승리에는 의심의 여지가 없지.\n\n여기가 오크 요새는 아니겠지만, 나를 필요로 하는 사람들이 있어. 우리는 제국놈들을 몰아낼 때까지 다시 싸울거야. 아니면 영광스런 전투에서 죽음을 맞겠지!

Source: Thank Vivec, some good news! We'll bring the eggs to <<1>> where they'll be safe.\n\nYou handled yourself admirably against such odds. The Dominion would've killed half a generation of Argonians without your help!
Target: Thank Vivec, some good news! We'll bring the eggs to <<1>> where they'll be safe.\n\nYou handled yourself admirably against such odds. The Dominion would've killed half a generation of Argonians without your help!

Source: Here are the items you requested.
Target: Here are the items you requested.

Source: Of course, gladly. And you have the enduring friendship of the Rothalen family. Let us never speak of this incident again.
Target: Of course, gladly. And you have the enduring friendship of the Rothalen family. Let us never speak of this incident again.

Source: Yes, Evermore needs this alliance. But I need ….\n\nIsabeth's sacrifice will be remembered. You've proven yourself as a great ally to Evermore. I'll agree to this alliance. Together, we'll drive out the Reachmen.
Target: Yes, Evermore needs this alliance. But I need ….\n\nIsabeth's sacrifice will be remembered. You've proven yourself as a great ally to Evermore. I'll agree to this alliance. Together, we'll drive out the Reachmen.

Source: Yes. I think I judged the Baandari too soon. Silver-Paws is actually quite a gentleman … or is it a gentle-cat?\n\nI just hope he doesn't expect me to pay for this mead. No way. This one's on the house, and by "the house," I mean "the Baandari."
Target: Yes. I think I judged the Baandari too soon. Silver-Paws is actually quite a gentleman … or is it a gentle-cat?\n\nI just hope he doesn't expect me to pay for this mead. No way. This one's on the house, and by "the house," I mean "the Baandari."

Source: I'll need to confer with Abnur regarding what he knows. His defection is a surprise, but it will serve only to benefit us. Mannimarco did not dispose of this asset quickly enough and now it is ours to utilize.
Target: 난 아브너가 무엇을 아는지 상의를 해 볼 필요가 있네. 그의 탈주는 놀라운 일이지만, 우리에게 도움을 주기 위해서네. 매니마코는 이 일에 빨리 대응을 못할 걸세. 그러니 지금 바로 적절하게 처리할 때이네.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: You brought hope to the Gray Mire. There is so little, for my people. Thank you.
Target: 당신이 회색 진창에 희망을 가져다줬군. 우리 민족에겐 아주 부족한 것이지. 고마워.

Source: What's happening now?
Target: 지금 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는 거야?

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Here are the items you requested.
Target: Here are the items you requested.

Source: You exposed the Magistrate in Bergama. Thank you for seeing justice was served.
Target: 당신은 벌가마의 치안관의 잘못을 폭로했습니다. 정의가 실현되는 것을 보여주셔서 감사합니다.

Source: Justice Istah still languishes in the stocks in Bergama! With no evidence, how can this be?
Target: Justice Istah still languishes in the stocks in Bergama! With no evidence, how can this be?

Source: I take no pleasure in being right. The Dominion must have learned <<1>>'s knowledge of <<A:2>>.\n\nIt is imperative we learn <<A:3>>'s true role in the Dominion's plans. They bring nothing to this land but abomination.
Target: I take no pleasure in being right. The Dominion must have learned <<1>>'s knowledge of <<A:2>>.\n\nIt is imperative we learn <<A:3>>'s true role in the Dominion's plans. They bring nothing to this land but abomination.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: I've found the midget!  I should return to Quest Giver NPC.
Target: 그 난쟁이를 찾았다! Quest Giver NPC에게 돌아가보자.\n

Source: Thank you. You've given me much peace. \n\nI think I'll to make it my personal crusade to repopulate the spriggans here. I'll find some in Glenumbra and Viridian Wood to bring back. So perhaps we will cross paths again.
Target: 고맙네. 당신은 내게 큰 평안을 주는군.\n\n나는 스프리건들이 여기 다시 살 수 있도록 개인적인 성전을 해야 할것 같아. 글렌움브라와 비리디안의 나무를 좀 가져와야겠어. 우리가 길에서 다시 만날지도 모르겠군 그래.

Source: You must gather those who were lost. King Dynar and Vanus Galerion have vital roles to play, and they must be at your side.\n\nRescue your missing companions. Return the Hollow City to its former glory and we can begin the assault on Molag Bal.
Target: 넌 길을 잃은 자들을 모아야 한다. 다이나 왕과 바누스 갈레리온에겐 필수적인 역할이 있고, 반드시 네 옆에 있어야 한다.\n\n실종된 네 동료들도 구출하거라. 공허한 도시에 과거의 영광을 되돌리면 몰라그 발에 대한 공격을 시작할 수 있다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: I was right about you. You've been strong enough to help me see my own weakness.\n\nWell. Back to work then. I'm sure I'll be able to find a way.
Target: 제 판단이 맞았네요. 당신은 정말 강한 사람이에요. 제 자신의 나약함을 직시하게 해줄 정도로요.\n\n뭐, 그럼 다시 일하러 가야겠네요. 분명 방법을 찾을 수 있을 거에요.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: What do we do now?
Target: What do we do now?

Source: She told us everything you did for her. Glad to hear you got that murdering Dunmer. \n\nTake this as a reward for saving my niece and solving the murders.
Target: 그녀가 당신이 어떤 일을 해줬는지 말했소. 던머를 죽였다고 들었는데 다행이지.\n\n 조카를 구해주고 살인사건을 해결한 보상으로 삼아주시오.

Source: We did everything we could. And Nilyne seems to know what she's doing.
Target: 우리가 할 수 있는 건 전부 했어. 그리고 닐린은 그녀가 뭘 하는지 알고 있는것처럼 보였고.

Source: Ha! Such is life, my friend. <<1>> and I will make other arrangements eventually.\n\nAnd <<2>> won't get his hands on my treasure, gold or otherwise. That works for me.
Target: 하! 인생이란 그런 것이라네, 친구. 결국 <<1>>랑 내가 다른 준비를 해야겠구만.\n\n그리고 <<2>>도 금화든 뭐든, 내 보물에 손을 대지 않을 테니 말이야. 난 그거면 됐네.

Source: The rumor is that some stranger helped route the Stormfist Brigade from Fort Morvunskar.
Target: 소문에 의하면 누군가의 덕택으로 모분스카 요새로부터 폭풍주먹 여단이 그 자리에서 쫓겨났다고 한다.

Source: You're the one who stopped the Maormer offensive! Divines bless you!
Target: You're the one who stopped the Maormer offensive! Divines bless you!

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: Azrath said to give you this. The sacred words of Malacath.
Target: Azrath가 이걸 네게 건내주라고 했었다. 이 말라카스의 sacred words를 말이야.

Source: What now?
Target: What now?

Source: What happens now?
Target: What happens now?

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: Saw that group that calls itself the Daggers earlier. Never seen people drink so much. Wonder what they're celebrating.
Target: Saw that group that calls itself the Daggers earlier. Never seen people drink so much. Wonder what they're celebrating.

Source: I'm not sure. It certainly sounds like the Serk was just the beginning of what they had planned.
Target: 확실치는 않아. 서크는 그놈들 계획의 시작에 불과할지도 몰라.

Source: Here you go. But I'm pretty sure this elixir won't cure anything.
Target: 여기 있어. 하지만 이 엘릭서가 아무 것도 치료하지 못할거라고 확신해.

Source: You saw a spectral wolf that spoke like a man? Takes all kinds, I guess.
Target: You saw a spectral wolf that spoke like a man? Takes all kinds, I guess.

Source: A weapon once gifted to the wasp-children! Bound in blood, it slips through the Hist's dreams. Tree-blood burns, and Tree dies a lonely death, removed from its sisters.\n\nThe guar thanks the mighty wamasu for its mercy.
Target: A weapon once gifted to the wasp-children! Bound in blood, it slips through the Hist's dreams. Tree-blood burns, and Tree dies a lonely death, removed from its sisters.\n\nThe guar thanks the mighty wamasu for its mercy.

Source: Chief Bazrag is safe. You have my word on that.
Target: Chief Bazrag is safe. You have my word on that.

Source: That's a relief. Now to give Harnald a piece of my mind!
Target: That's a relief. Now to give Harnald a piece of my mind!

Source: We'll need it.
Target: 그런게 필요했어요.

Source: Take the sword back to Cyrodiil.
Target: 칼을 Cyrodiil로 가져 가라.

Source: I wish to join the Mages Guild.
Target: 메이지 길드에 가입하고 싶습니다.

Source: I never meant for anyone to get hurt. And the lesson here is clear—Daedra are never the answer. I'll never attempt this kind of ritual again.\n\nYou probably hear this kind of thing all the time. But again, thank you, traveler.
Target: 누군가를 해칠 뜻은 절대 없었소. 그리고 이번 일의 교훈은 명백하지. 데이드라는 절대 답이 될 수 없다는 것이오. 다시는 그런 의식을 하지 않을 거요.\n\n당신은 이런 말을 항상 듣고 다닐지도 모르겠군. 하지만 다시 말하겠소. 고맙소, 여행자여.

Source: I'm ready. What do you want me to do next?
Target: I'm ready. What do you want me to do next?
