Source: I … don't know for sure. I'm not sure which would cause my mother less pain.\n\nI'll stay until she gets better. And … the others deserve to know what I've done. I won't run like a coward. I won't be like my father.
Target: 전... 잘 모르겠어요. 어떻게 해야 어머니의 고통을 덜어 드릴지 모르겠네요.\n\n어머니가 나으실 때까진 머물러야죠. 그리고... 다른 사람들도 제가 한 짓을 알아야 하고요. 겁쟁이처럼 도망가진 않겠어요. 아버지처럼 될 수는 없으니까요.

Source: He's alive, wounded, but alive.
Target: 그는 살아 있고 상처 받았지만 살아 있습니다.

Source: About the sword ….
Target: 칼에 대해서 ....

Source: I gathered the items you requested for your hoard.
Target: I gathered the items you requested for your hoard.

Source: Wait. Should only one of us walk from these ruins, you must allow me to thank you on behalf of Shadowfen's citizens. Sithis guide your steps in the darkness, and refrain his embrace until you will it.
Target: Wait. Should only one of us walk from these ruins, you must allow me to thank you on behalf of Shadowfen's citizens. Sithis guide your steps in the darkness, and refrain his embrace until you will it.

Source: How long before we can attempt to breach the barrier?
Target: 장벽을 뚫으려면 얼마나 더 있어야 할까요?

Source: So the breach is sealed?
Target: So the breach is sealed?

Source: So the breach is sealed?
Target: So the breach is sealed?

Source: I found this book in the abandoned house to the north. It was written by a member of your order.
Target: I found this book in the abandoned house to the north. It was written by a member of your order.

Source: You wouldn't catch me anywhere near that Crypt of Hearts! Leave that to braver folk like yourself.
Target: 너는 Crypt of Hearts 근처 어디에서도 나를 잡을 수 없을 것이다! 그걸 너와 같은 용감한 사람에게 남겨줘!

Source: What now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 하나요?

Source: Wait. If only one of us makes it out, know that your efforts are incomparable. May Sithis guide your steps through darkness, and spare his touch until you wish it.
Target: Wait. If only one of us makes it out, know that your efforts are incomparable. May Sithis guide your steps through darkness, and spare his touch until you wish it.

Source: So that's it then?
Target: So that's it then?

Source: My soldiers recovered us from the ruins and kept you safe while you slept. Now I've been asked to bring <<A:1>> to the Pact, but it seems an empty shell at best.\n\nHence the ship. Soon it departs Shadowfen for Skyrim.
Target: My soldiers recovered us from the ruins and kept you safe while you slept. Now I've been asked to bring <<A:1>> to the Pact, but it seems an empty shell at best.\n\nHence the ship. Soon it departs Shadowfen for Skyrim.

Source: So the breach is sealed?
Target: So the breach is sealed?

Source: After my soldiers retrieved us from the ruins, I was asked to bring <<A:1>> to the Pact. Hence, the ship. It soon departs Shadowfen for Skyrim.\n\nXuth, does your head hurt? Mine feels like an overused drum!
Target: After my soldiers retrieved us from the ruins, I was asked to bring <<A:1>> to the Pact. Hence, the ship. It soon departs Shadowfen for Skyrim.\n\nXuth, does your head hurt? Mine feels like an overused drum!

Source: So is Emile free to resume his studies?
Target: So is Emile free to resume his studies?

Source: Yes. But I do so knowing that the legacy of the Scarlet Judge is in good hands.\n\nWe Dark Elves are beset on all sides by greed and scheming malice. I fought it all my life, but now it falls to you. Keep up the work, and be the hero Vvardenfell needs.
Target: 그래. 하지만 진홍의 심판관의 유산은 좋은 이에게 넘어갔다고 생각해.\n\n우리 다크 엘프들은 탐욕과 음모에 시달리고 있어. 나는 내 인생 전부를 그것과 싸워왔지만, 그 임무가 앞으로 네게 넘어갔군. 열심히 하고, 바덴펠이 필요로하는 영웅이 되게.

Source: Hmm. You did smash up the domain of a Daedric Prince. And stole from her. And showed her a few choice fingers along the way. Yeah, I'd say that merits a key or two.\n\nThe day is yours, Meridia be damned.
Target: Hmm. You did smash up the domain of a Daedric Prince. And stole from her. And showed her a few choice fingers along the way. Yeah, I'd say that merits a key or two.\n\nThe day is yours, Meridia be damned.

Source: What happened?
Target: 무슨 일이야?

Source: Sticking it to Meridia—and all her self-righteous puppets—to claim the treasures of Garlas Malatar is worth a key. Not every day you get to thumb your nose to a Daedric Prince. Maybe next time you'll bare your arse for good measure.
Target: Sticking it to Meridia—and all her self-righteous puppets—to claim the treasures of Garlas Malatar is worth a key. Not every day you get to thumb your nose to a Daedric Prince. Maybe next time you'll bare your arse for good measure.

Source: What do I need to do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 하면 되죠?

Source: Thank you, Feluni.
Target: 고마워요, 펠루니.

Source: If Galgalah is truly banished, he won't torment anyone else again. Farwen must have known that.\n\nHere's your payment. You did everything I could have asked for, so thank you for that. I'm going to find Sharz after this and give him the news.
Target: 갈가라가 정말 처리되었다면, 녀석이 누군가를 괴롭게하는 일도 더이상 없어. 파웬은 그걸 알고 있겠지.\n\n보수를 지불하지. 요청한 것은 모두 해주었어. 정말 고맙네. 나머지는 샤즈를 찾아서 그에게 말해두지.

Source: You fulfilled your part of our agreement. It's not every day that I defy a Daedric Prince, but if I make a habit of it I'll be sure to get in touch.\n\nTake this as a bonus—and retainer—for whatever comes next.
Target: You fulfilled your part of our agreement. It's not every day that I defy a Daedric Prince, but if I make a habit of it I'll be sure to get in touch.\n\nTake this as a bonus—and retainer—for whatever comes next.

Source: Thank you, Feluni.
Target: 고마워요, 펠루니.

Source: Thank goodness. Luring cats to his door everyday would have gotten awfully tiresome.\n\nIn the end he'll see it's for the best. Collaboration always yields better results than competition. You and I are proof of that, right? Thanks again, sera.
Target: 다행이야. 매일 녀석의 집 문에 고양이 유도제를 뿌리는건 꽤나 골치아픈 일이야.\n\n마지막에는 녀석도 이게 최선이라는걸 알겠지. 협력은 경쟁보다 좋은 결과를 일으켜. 너도 내가 그 증거이겠지? 다시 말하겠지만, 정말 고마워.

Source: They probably thought it was dangerous.
Target: They probably thought it was dangerous.

Source: That's good news indeed! You must understand that discretion is paramount here. No need for word to get around of our little mishap. You keep quiet, and I'll see that more work comes your way.
Target: 그건 정말 좋은 소식이군! 무거운 입이 중요한 사항인 것을 이해해주게. 약간의 불운의 사고에 대한 소문이 퍼져서는 곤란해지거든. 잠자코 있어준다면 더 많은 의뢰를 하지.

Source: Maybe they kept it hidden for good reason.
Target: 어쩌면 그럴만한 이유가 있어서 숨겨두었을지도 모르죠.

Source: But what of Rhea's vision? What does it mean?
Target: 하지만 레아의 환상은 뭐였지? 무슨 뜻이지?

Source: For kicking Meridia's shiny-heinie out of Garlas Malatar and returning Undaunted, you've earned your key and cut. Keep your boots polished. There's sure to be more Daedra in need of a swift kick soon.
Target: For kicking Meridia's shiny-heinie out of Garlas Malatar and returning Undaunted, you've earned your key and cut. Keep your boots polished. There's sure to be more Daedra in need of a swift kick soon.

Source: I defeated the Dragons.
Target: 드래곤을 무찔렀습니다.

Source: And we're done! You are now one of the Undaunted. Divines help you.
Target: 우리가 할일은 끝났다!너도 지금부턴 언던티드의 일원이다.디바인이 널 도와주길.

Source: Let me have a look. Definitely Imperial. Most certainly First Era. And the armor is in excellent condition, except for a few unseemly dents and cracks.\n\nHere's your pay. But don't get too comfortable. I'll probably have more work before too long.
Target: Let me have a look. Definitely Imperial. Most certainly First Era. And the armor is in excellent condition, except for a few unseemly dents and cracks.\n\nHere's your pay. But don't get too comfortable. I'll probably have more work before too long.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Thank you, friend! You've done me, nay, the world, a huge favor today. I already know that the breakthroughs I'll make with these specimens will be talked about across the ages.\n\nAnd I'll of course make sure to credit you in my dissertation.
Target: 고맙네! 오늘은 나를 위해, 아니 세계를 위해 아주 멋진 일을 해주었어. 이 표본을 이용할 대발견은 세대를 넘어 이어지리라 나는 확신하고 있어.\n\n물론, 논문의 감사인사 부분에는 네 이름을 적을께! 고마워!

Source: Peryite is powerful.
Target: Peryite is powerful.

Source: Wiping a thousand years of smugness off the Kinlord's face in front of his servants is reward in its own right, but I've got something more tangible for you. Take this and claim your prize!\n\nTomorrow we'll find a way to make good use of it!
Target: 부하들의 눈앞에서 혈족군주의 수천 년 묵은 자만심을 짓밟는 것만 해도 가치가 있지. 하지만 그 외에도 널 위한 보상이 있어, 여기 보수야!\n\n내일도 좋은 일감을 줄게!

Source: Thank you, friend-outsider.\n\nFor an ojel, you made an excellent Naga-Kur warrior. Please, take this as a symbol of my appreciation. You have done a wonderful thing for me and my tribe.
Target: Thank you, friend-outsider.\n\nFor an ojel, you made an excellent Naga-Kur warrior. Please, take this as a symbol of my appreciation. You have done a wonderful thing for me and my tribe.

Source: I've decided to accept your offer.
Target: I've decided to accept your offer.

Source: Yes, I know! I've already received applications from several adventurers who watched your performance in Mournhold. Quite a spectacle, I hear! \n\nThank you for all your help. Please, take this. Cyrodilic Collections grows stronger by the day!
Target: Yes, I know! I've already received applications from several adventurers who watched your performance in Mournhold. Quite a spectacle, I hear! \n\nThank you for all your help. Please, take this. Cyrodilic Collections grows stronger by the day!

Source: What you didn't know didn't hurt you, and now we have the anti-venom. This payment includes a sum for non-disclosure of our trade secret.\n\nYour help is appreciated, as always.
Target: What you didn't know didn't hurt you, and now we have the anti-venom. This payment includes a sum for non-disclosure of our trade secret.\n\nYour help is appreciated, as always.

Source: Only fools follow Peryite.
Target: Only fools follow Peryite.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: They say the Wyresses drove an old witch out of the Hag Fen. Even so, the Wyrd Sisters make me nervous.
Target: They say the Wyresses drove an old witch out of the Hag Fen. Even so, the Wyrd Sisters make me nervous.

Source: If you hadn't defeated that nasty little Elf, Vox, I'm sure our great King Jorunn would have taken care of her.
Target: If you hadn't defeated that nasty little Elf, Vox, I'm sure our great King Jorunn would have taken care of her.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: I collected the ancient scrolls.
Target: I collected the ancient scrolls.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: The ancient temple? What business would the Imperials have there?\n\nIf we had knights to spare, we could send them, but right now, any soldiers will have to come from Evermore. I'll see to it. Thank you for the message.
Target: The ancient temple? What business would the Imperials have there?\n\nIf we had knights to spare, we could send them, but right now, any soldiers will have to come from Evermore. I'll see to it. Thank you for the message.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: There is very little I can do unfortunately. We barely have enough men to secure the city even with Uela's defeat. They will just have to make do with what they have.
Target: There is very little I can do unfortunately. We barely have enough men to secure the city even with Uela's defeat. They will just have to make do with what they have.

Source: I found your trinkets.
Target: I found your trinkets.

Source: For Undaunted who leave no stone unturned, no challenge unanswered, no foe unbutchered? Only the best is due! Take your cut and return tomorrow. I will find you another worthy challenge.
Target: 언던티드로서 모든 수단을 동원해서, 모든 도전에 응해, 모든 적을 물리쳤나? 오직 최고만이 보상받을 자격이 있지! 네 몫을 받고 내일 다시 돌아와! 또 다른 가치있는 도전을 준비해 놓을 테니.

Source: Yes, the house is yours "in deed."\n\nDo you … oh, never mind.
Target: 이 계약으로 이 집은 드디어 완전히 네 것이 되었어.\n\n아.. 아니, 신경쓰지마.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Yes, the house is yours "in deed."\n\nDo you … oh, never mind.
Target: 이 계약으로 이 집은 드디어 완전히 네 것이 되었어.\n\n아.. 아니, 신경쓰지마.

Source: Well, that was quick-quick! Thank you, my friend.\n\nI also want to thank you for handling Tamira. I hear she can be difficult to work with. But, as they say, an aged wamasu has the longest fangs. Wait, they do say that, right?
Target: Well, that was quick-quick! Thank you, my friend.\n\nI also want to thank you for handling Tamira. I hear she can be difficult to work with. But, as they say, an aged wamasu has the longest fangs. Wait, they do say that, right?

Source: There will always be a place among our tribe for these two, and for you, beeko. I would be honored to call you root-kin for what you've done for our tribe.\n\nMake yourself at home here. You have earned a rest.
Target: There will always be a place among our tribe for these two, and for you, beeko. I would be honored to call you root-kin for what you've done for our tribe.\n\nMake yourself at home here. You have earned a rest.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Well, that makes two of us! I took no pleasure in spending all that coin, but as a retainer, I'll be able to double that sum before long.\n\nNow if you'll excuse me, I have a writ to deliver! Thank you again, my friend.
Target: 글쎄, 이걸로 서로 만족하겠지! 저만큼이나 많은 돈을 사용하는것엔 마음이 끌리지만, 신입 계급이 된다면 저것의 배는 금방 벌수 있어.\n\n추천장을 전해줘야하니 이만 실례할께! 정말 고마워.

Source: Some of my Dark Elf friends are still upset that Saint Veloth's shrine was attacked. And by one of their own, no less.
Target: 저의 다크 엘프 친구들중 일부는 여전히 성자 벨로스의 신전이 공격당했다는 사실에 화가 나 있습니다. 그리고 그들과 마찬가지로 저 역시 화가 나 있습니다.

Source: Atia? I think this belongs to you.
Target: 아티아? 이게 당신 물건인 것 같은데요.

Source: So am I worthy of a reward?
Target: So am I worthy of a reward?

Source: The Ordinators seem on edge. What are the Dark Elves so nervous about?
Target: The Ordinators seem on edge. What are the Dark Elves so nervous about?

Source: I'm glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어 기뻤습니다.

Source: I expect my fair share of the reward too.
Target: I expect my fair share of the reward too.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: You and me? Goodness, what could I possibly do? You're the hero—I'm just the oft-imperiled bookworm!\n\nEven so, I would trust Xukas with my life. Jaxsik-Orrn too. If they say we go together, then we go together! If that's all right with you, I mean.
Target: You and me? Goodness, what could I possibly do? You're the hero—I'm just the oft-imperiled bookworm!\n\nEven so, I would trust Xukas with my life. Jaxsik-Orrn too. If they say we go together, then we go together! If that's all right with you, I mean.

Source: I honored Hircine, as requested.
Target: I honored Hircine, as requested.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Good job, my friend! I'll send the skull to my sister in Murkmire. She'll make sure it's safe.\n\nIf you ever get out that way, Famia would love to meet you. And Cyrodilic Collections can always use your help. For now, take this with my thanks.
Target: Good job, my friend! I'll send the skull to my sister in Murkmire. She'll make sure it's safe.\n\nIf you ever get out that way, Famia would love to meet you. And Cyrodilic Collections can always use your help. For now, take this with my thanks.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: We'll continue to protect Summerset from all that would harm it. Once my companions rebuild their strength, of course. In the meantime, we'll oversee the efforts of rebuilding Cloudrest.\n\nI couldn't have done this without all your help. Thank you.
Target: We'll continue to protect Summerset from all that would harm it. Once my companions rebuild their strength, of course. In the meantime, we'll oversee the efforts of rebuilding Cloudrest.\n\nI couldn't have done this without all your help. Thank you.

Source: The Wilderking told me to find you.
Target: 윌더킹이 당신을 찾으라더군요.

Source: So this is Volenfell? I followed your journal entries.
Target: 그래서 여기가 볼렌펠입니까? 전 당신의 기록을 따라 왔습니다.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: I found your tea.
Target: I found your tea.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Gods! She's still trying to control me! That's why I left! I'm not taking orders from Cousin Freyda anymore, and I'll be staying in Evermore whether she likes it or not.\n\nThanks for the message. Thanks for reminding me why I'm here.
Target: Gods! She's still trying to control me! That's why I left! I'm not taking orders from Cousin Freyda anymore, and I'll be staying in Evermore whether she likes it or not.\n\nThanks for the message. Thanks for reminding me why I'm here.

Source: Lighter than it looks. I make this vow: while Xukas leads these souls to rebirth, Tsojei and I will form a new tribe here. A tribe of strength, yes, but joy and cleverness also.\n\nWhen Xukas returns, we will be here to welcome him home.
Target: Lighter than it looks. I make this vow: while Xukas leads these souls to rebirth, Tsojei and I will form a new tribe here. A tribe of strength, yes, but joy and cleverness also.\n\nWhen Xukas returns, we will be here to welcome him home.

Source: I dispelled the magic on the relics.
Target: I dispelled the magic on the relics.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: <He appears to have been killed by numerous small wounds caused by either very precise weapons or a giant flock of birds.>
Target: <He appears to have been killed by numerous small wounds caused by either very precise weapons or a giant flock of birds.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: For now, I think. But I can't hold this for long.\n\nThis belongs … it belongs to someone else.
Target: For now, I think. But I can't hold this for long.\n\nThis belongs … it belongs to someone else.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: I had to kill <<1>>. He was selling guests at the Caravan into slavery.
Target: <<1>>을 죽여야 했어요. 그놈이 상단에 온 손님들을 노예로 팔아치우고 있더군요.

Source: Yes, yes, we'll get to that. But first, payment for services rendered! You helped me recover the Kajin-Jat Crystal and saved the entire expedition many times over. Without you, we'd certainly be dead.\n\nPlease, take this payment with my compliments.
Target: Yes, yes, we'll get to that. But first, payment for services rendered! You helped me recover the Kajin-Jat Crystal and saved the entire expedition many times over. Without you, we'd certainly be dead.\n\nPlease, take this payment with my compliments.

Source: I do not miss hauling glorified bricks out of sinking deathtraps. I do miss the weight of a bountiful reward in my hand though.\n\nCheck back later. Sure to be more where that came from.
Target: I do not miss hauling glorified bricks out of sinking deathtraps. I do miss the weight of a bountiful reward in my hand though.\n\nCheck back later. Sure to be more where that came from.

Source: Seems odd that such a large keg went missing.
Target: Seems odd that such a large keg went missing.

Source: She's dead.
Target: 죽었어요.

Source: How do I set you free?
Target: 어떻게 풀어드려야 하죠?

Source: Let me see. Yes, yes, these look to be Imperial. And they appear to belong to the right era. Very good. Tia Doran will be pleased.\n\nHere's your pay. If you're interested, I might need your help again later.
Target: Let me see. Yes, yes, these look to be Imperial. And they appear to belong to the right era. Very good. Tia Doran will be pleased.\n\nHere's your pay. If you're interested, I might need your help again later.

Source: He was possessed by a dark spirit, but it seems like he's returned to normal.
Target: 메인은 어둠의 영혼에 사로잡혀 있었는데, 이제 정상으로 돌아온 것 같아요.

Source: I heard that Duke Sebastien was a werewolf, so they killed him.
Target: I heard that Duke Sebastien was a werewolf, so they killed him.

Source: What's the play, Jakarn?
Target: What's the play, Jakarn?

Source: I acquired the offerings you requested.
Target: I acquired the offerings you requested.

Source: For all their ingenuity, those Dwarves still haven't managed to build a death trap deathy enough to keep Undaunted out of their business. Frostvault was a good effort though.\n\nCracking the Vault of Mhuvnak and returning Undaunted gets you a key.
Target: For all their ingenuity, those Dwarves still haven't managed to build a death trap deathy enough to keep Undaunted out of their business. Frostvault was a good effort though.\n\nCracking the Vault of Mhuvnak and returning Undaunted gets you a key.

Source: Imperial dogs! I thank Ruptga we have people like you to protect us.
Target: Imperial dogs! I thank Ruptga we have people like you to protect us.

Source: Thank you, Feluni.
Target: 고마워요, 펠루니.

Source: Where some see a locked door, you see an opportunity—to blow it to pieces! For making a proper Undaunted entrance into the Vault of Mhuvnak, smashing its defenses, and splattering a horde of Goblins for good measure, you've earned your key and cut.
Target: Where some see a locked door, you see an opportunity—to blow it to pieces! For making a proper Undaunted entrance into the Vault of Mhuvnak, smashing its defenses, and splattering a horde of Goblins for good measure, you've earned your key and cut.

Source: Thank you, Feluni.
Target: 고마워요, 펠루니.

Source: Study it, obviously. Very carefully, if that's what you're wondering. I've been doing this long enough to be cautious with my meddling.
Target: Study it, obviously. Very carefully, if that's what you're wondering. I've been doing this long enough to be cautious with my meddling.

Source: True Undaunted can't resist mashing a button. So what if it turns the entire place into a piping hot steam bath, or charges up some giant death contraption? Just keeps us loosened up for the fight!\n\nHere's your reward for smashing the Stonekeeper!
Target: True Undaunted can't resist mashing a button. So what if it turns the entire place into a piping hot steam bath, or charges up some giant death contraption? Just keeps us loosened up for the fight!\n\nHere's your reward for smashing the Stonekeeper!

Source: Take it, my friend. You do damned good work, and we are proud to count you among our number. Take your cut, and be sure to speak with me again tomorrow.
Target: Take it, my friend. You do damned good work, and we are proud to count you among our number. Take your cut, and be sure to speak with me again tomorrow.

Source: It's for the best, I believe.
Target: It's for the best, I believe.

Source: Right here, as always. You didn't think that I doubted you could best an empowered dwarven construct, did you? \n\nHave a seat at the fire and regale us with the tale of how you felled it, then tomorrow we'll find a new story to tell!
Target: 언제나 그랬듯이, 여기 있어. 설마 네가 드워븐 기계들을 쓰러뜨릴거라는 사실을 내가 의심하고 있었다고 생각하는 건 아니지? \n\n불가에 앉아서 그것들을 어떻게 쓰러뜨렸는지 이야기하자, 그럼 내일 새로운 네 이야깃거리가 될 만한 일을 가져올게.

Source: I heard that Duke Sebastien was a werewolf, but they cured him.
Target: I heard that Duke Sebastien was a werewolf, but they cured him.

Source: Tertius is still looking for your son.
Target: Tertius is still looking for your son.

Source: I'm happy to have been of service.
Target: 도움이 되었다니 기쁘네요.

Source: I left Fjar behind.
Target: 프얄을 남겨두고 왔죠.

Source: QUEST: Caught in the Web
Target: 퀘스트: 거미줄에 잡히다

Source: All three officers are dead.
Target: 장교 셋은 모두 죽었어요.

Source: I'll let you give the cuttle to Boril.
Target: 그 갑각을 보릴에게 가져다 주도록 할게요.

Source: Who are you?
Target: 당신은 누군가요?

Source: I'm just glad there were some survivors at the Mill. It could have been so much worse.
Target: 제분소에 생존자 몇 명이 있어서 기뻤어요. 상황이 훨씬 안 좋을 수도 있었어요.

Source: Take your key and your cut. And come back tomorrow. Maybe next time you won't have to blast and cut your way through bloodthirsty undead to earn your prize!
Target: Take your key and your cut. And come back tomorrow. Maybe next time you won't have to blast and cut your way through bloodthirsty undead to earn your prize!

Source: Well this has been an ugly business, hasn't it? A talented breedsman dead, a brood exterminated, mercenaries slaughtered … sometimes I miss the academy.\n\nPlease, take this. House Hlaalu owes you a great debt. Safe travels, sera.
Target: 참 지저분한 일이었지? 재능있는 번식가가 죽고 피의 숙청이 이뤄지고, 용병들이 학살되고... 가끔 학문의 세계가 무서워져.\n\n이걸 받아줘. 할루 가문은 네게 큰 빚을 졌어. 안전한 여행이 되길.

Source: Yes, I think our work here is done. Now we must turn our attention to Baron Montclair. That traitor needs to be dealt with.\n\nBut before we go, know that I appreciate all that you have done. My sister died in the Light, thanks to you.
Target: Yes, I think our work here is done. Now we must turn our attention to Baron Montclair. That traitor needs to be dealt with.\n\nBut before we go, know that I appreciate all that you have done. My sister died in the Light, thanks to you.

Source: You think Anais will make good on her threat to track you down?
Target: 아나이스가 널 추적하려고 협박을 할 거라고 생각해?

Source: Can I have my cake now?
Target: 이제 케이크를 받아도 될까요?

Source: Your key, Undaunted! Enjoy your cut. Air out your tunic, wash your hair, and be sure to see me again tomorrow.
Target: Your key, Undaunted! Enjoy your cut. Air out your tunic, wash your hair, and be sure to see me again tomorrow.

Source: You two have a lot of catching up to do.
Target: 당신 둘 밀린 얘기가 많으시겠어요.

Source: Ha! Easier said than done, I'm afraid. But I'm glad to hear Emeric gives a damn. We thought maybe our dispatches weren't getting through.\n\nI was about to walk to Wayrest myself, but you saved me that trouble. And I suspect you can help me further.
Target: 하! 말만 하는 건 쉽지, 난 두려워. 하지만 에머릭이 그 빌어먹을 명령을 했다니 듣기 좋은 걸. 우린 전령이 왕에게 도착하지 않았을 거라 생각했다고.\n\n 지금 막 웨이레스트까지 직접 걸어갈 참이었는데, 네가 날 그 문제에서 구해줬네. 그리고 난 네가 날 더 도와줄 수 있을 거라 생각해.

Source: Home. The ritual of sacrifice is almost complete, and the Daedra Lords you so foolishly ignore will, we hope, spare us their wrath for another decade.\n\nWe will hope they turn their dire gaze upon Molag Mar before we return again.
Target: 고향이지. 제물 의식은 거의 완료했다. 너희들이 어리석게도 무시한 데이드릭 프린스의 분노는 이제 곧 우리들을 향하지 않겠지.\n\n우리들이 다시 돌아오기 전에, 녀석들의 무서운 시선이 몰라그 발로 향하면 될 것이다.

Source: I charged the amulet and used its energy to repair the great seal.
Target: 아뮬렛을 충전했고 그 에너지를 위대한 봉인을 고치는 데 사용했어요.

Source: They are in the looks of admiration. The hearty cheers. And the chests in our camp. For casting down the Lava Queen and claiming her crown, you have earned the lion's share of all.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Tomorrow you may defend your throne.
Target: They are in the looks of admiration. The hearty cheers. And the chests in our camp. For casting down the Lava Queen and claiming her crown, you have earned the lion's share of all.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Tomorrow you may defend your throne.

Source: You are not one to let adversity chill the passion in your blood. The ice witch was no match.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Tomorrow I will stoke the fire in your veins once again.
Target: 자네 핏속의 열정은 적도 얼리지 못했군. 얼음 마녀가 상대가 될 리가 없었다.\n\n열쇠와 자네 몫을 가져가게. 내일 다시 한 번 자네의 피를 끓게 하겠네.

Source: I was able to stop the Order from initiating more of the Red Sails.
Target: I was able to stop the Order from initiating more of the Red Sails.

Source: Thanks.
Target: 고맙군요.

Source: I found these robes in a bandit camp.
Target: I found these robes in a bandit camp.

Source: Rathisa says your wish has come true.
Target: Rathisa says your wish has come true.

Source: Why won't you listen to reason?
Target: Why won't you listen to reason?

Source: Tanion is dead.
Target: 타니온은 죽었어요.

Source: I need to take the crystal shards back to <<1>>
Target: I need to take the crystal shards back to <<1>>

Source: So you're not organizing the expedition?
Target: 탐험대는 조직하지 않는건가?

Source: Will Shatul accept <<1>> as chief?
Target: Will Shatul accept <<1>> as chief?

Source: So it has, so it has! Are you feeling enlightened? Lighter? Lit?\n\nWhy you would want to keep mucking around in Tamriel is quite beyond me. Nasty place. How—how do you get the smell out of your clothing?
Target: 그래, 그랬겠지! 깨달음을 얻은 것 같나? 불은? 켜졌어?\n\n왜 자네가 탐리엘을 계속 돌아다니고 싶어 하는지 모르겠어. 고약한 곳. 자네 옷의 냄새는 어떻게 없앨거야?

Source: Of course! They're different all over. I've taken part in cliff jumping, anchor tossing, and even drunken echatere racing … though Orsinium had to cancel that one.\n\nSimply ask, and I'll send you to the best celebrations in Tamriel!
Target: Of course! They're different all over. I've taken part in cliff jumping, anchor tossing, and even drunken echatere racing … though Orsinium had to cancel that one.\n\nSimply ask, and I'll send you to the best celebrations in Tamriel!

Source: So it has, so it has! Are you feeling enlightened? Lighter? Lit?\n\nWhy you would want to keep mucking around in Tamriel is quite beyond me. Nasty place. How—how do you get the smell out of your clothing?
Target: 그래, 그랬겠지! 깨달음을 얻은 것 같나? 불은? 켜졌어?\n\n왜 자네가 탐리엘을 계속 돌아다니고 싶어 하는지 모르겠어. 고약한 곳. 자네 옷의 냄새는 어떻게 없앨거야?

Source: Hah! As if I would let your bounty get away from me that easy! Take your key and your cut! Tomorrow I'll have another song worthy battle awaiting you!
Target: Hah! As if I would let your bounty get away from me that easy! Take your key and your cut! Tomorrow I'll have another song worthy battle awaiting you!

Source: Not the whole world! Never the whole world.\n\nBut, quite a bit, yes. Now I've got something for you, for all your trouble.
Target: Not the whole world! Never the whole world.\n\nBut, quite a bit, yes. Now I've got something for you, for all your trouble.

Source: Indeed, I must atone for doubting you. You took up the Frigid Tome and slew Valkyn Skoria without hesitation. The mark of true Undaunted.\n\nMay this key and your cut help you forgive any offense my undeserved skepticism might have caused.
Target: 물론, 네 실력을 의심해서 미안하군. 극한의 서를 사용해서 발킨 스콜리아를 망설임 없이 쓰러뜨렸어. 언던티드의 귀감이 될 만하지.\n\n근거도 없이 자네의 실력을 의심한 것에 대한 사과와 함께 이 열쇠를 받아주게.

Source: So what's next for Naryu Virian?
Target: 다음은 뭐지 나류 비리안?

Source: Not the whole world! Never the whole world.\n\nBut, quite a bit, yes. Now I've got something for you, for all your trouble.
Target: Not the whole world! Never the whole world.\n\nBut, quite a bit, yes. Now I've got something for you, for all your trouble.

Source: All yours, my friend. Come back tomorrow. Perhaps we'll send you to combat a vicious kitten rebellion! But then again … maybe not.
Target: 모두 당신 거에요. 내일 또 오세요. 영악한 새끼 고양이의 반란에 파견할 수 있을지도 모르죠! 뭐... 못할 수도 있고요.

Source: The new Guildmaster was merciful to let that Argonian traitor stay in the Fighters Guild, don't you think?
Target: The new Guildmaster was merciful to let that Argonian traitor stay in the Fighters Guild, don't you think?

Source: Now. When you have returned home the victor to the cheers of your cohorts. \n\nHold your prize high and show you are mightier than the storm. Enjoy it while you can, tomorrow the winds may not show you their favor.
Target: 바로 지금이야. 자네가 승자로서 환호를 받으며 집으로 돌아왔을 때.\n\n상을 높이 들고 폭풍보다 더 강하다는 것을 보여주게. 즐길 수 있을 때 즐겨. 내일은 바람이 자네에게 호의를 보이지 않을지도 모르니까.

Source: Oh, my. I think we may need to acquire bigger barrels ….\n\nBut you've brought enough for one day! I hope this is adequate compensation.
Target: Oh, my. I think we may need to acquire bigger barrels ….\n\nBut you've brought enough for one day! I hope this is adequate compensation.

Source: Is there anything else I can do?
Target: 내가 할 수 있는 다른 일이 있습니까?

Source: Yes, the house is yours "in deed."\n\nDo you … oh, never mind.
Target: 이 계약으로 이 집은 드디어 완전히 네 것이 되었어.\n\n아.. 아니, 신경쓰지마.

Source: I erect the spine of gratitude—ah, I mean, thank you, my friend!\n\nWith such help, our expedition should be prepared for whatever weather Murkmire has in store for us!
Target: I erect the spine of gratitude—ah, I mean, thank you, my friend!\n\nWith such help, our expedition should be prepared for whatever weather Murkmire has in store for us!

Source: Garyn sent me. How can I help?
Target: 가린이 날 보냈어. 뭘 도와줄까?

Source: Happy to help, Master.
Target: Happy to help, Master.

Source: It's only because of you, friend. I'll raise a bottle of mead to you every night, from now until World's End.\n\nPlease, take this. You've more than earned it for what you've done.
Target: 모두 네 덕분이야. 지금부터 세상이 끝날때까지 매일 밤 벌꿀주를 들어올리지.\n\n자, 이걸 받아주게. 네 공적은 이 보수보다 훨씬 클거야.

Source: She did. Kassandra seeks to claim the Remnant for herself. I extend the quill of deep surprise. That is a joke.\n\nYou saw the Remnant's history—a seed born in blood and sorrow. It cannot belong to Kassandra. We must stop her before it is too late.
Target: She did. Kassandra seeks to claim the Remnant for herself. I extend the quill of deep surprise. That is a joke.\n\nYou saw the Remnant's history—a seed born in blood and sorrow. It cannot belong to Kassandra. We must stop her before it is too late.

Source: We've won?
Target: 우리가 이겼나요?

Source: I hope the Mages Guild can help him.
Target: I hope the Mages Guild can help him.

Source: Strangers in black helped House Hlaalu at the Gorge. Do you think ... No, that's impossible. They're all gone now.
Target: Strangers in black helped House Hlaalu at the Gorge. Do you think ... No, that's impossible. They're all gone now.

Source: I heard rumors you found a keystone. To hold such power!
Target: I heard rumors you found a keystone. To hold such power!

Source: I put the spirits to rest.
Target: 영혼들한테 안식을 줬어요.

Source: I think this note is about you.
Target: 이 편지는 당신에 대한 것 같은데요.

Source: I'm glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어 기뻤어.

Source: So you left Anais in the hands of the pirates?
Target: 그래서 아나이스를 해적들의 손에 두고 온 거야?

Source: Not the whole world! It's rather larger than it looks. But, you've seen quite a lot of it, to be sure!\n\nWell done. Well done, indeed. Now, I've a little something for you. Hardly suitable recompense for all your efforts, but there you are.
Target: Not the whole world! It's rather larger than it looks. But, you've seen quite a lot of it, to be sure!\n\nWell done. Well done, indeed. Now, I've a little something for you. Hardly suitable recompense for all your efforts, but there you are.

Source: Yes. Sounds like an Undaunted to me. Welcome to the group!\n\nWhat? Were you expecting a big ceremony, full of pomp and confetti? We do things a bit different here.
Target: 그래. 나에게는 언던티드처럼 들리는군. 단체에 가입한 것을 환영하네!\n\n 뭐? 화려함과 색종이로 가득 찬 큰 환영식을 기대하고 있었다고? 우리는 여기서 조금 더 다른 것을 한다네.

Source: Excellent! Oh yes, I can tell, this is a frisky one! Our explorers will have nothing to fear with this chubby little fellow along for the ride.\n\nThank you, my friend!
Target: Excellent! Oh yes, I can tell, this is a frisky one! Our explorers will have nothing to fear with this chubby little fellow along for the ride.\n\nThank you, my friend!

Source: So there were Imperial remains in the cavern? I suppose that will make Tia happy. From a historical perspective, of course. Not because there are dead Imperials.\n\nAnyway, here's your payment. If you're lucky, I'll have more work soon.
Target: So there were Imperial remains in the cavern? I suppose that will make Tia happy. From a historical perspective, of course. Not because there are dead Imperials.\n\nAnyway, here's your payment. If you're lucky, I'll have more work soon.

Source: How'd we do?
Target: 어땠어?

Source: Dipping your toes into Oblivion would merit some respect, but bringing home a souvenir Daedra head more than earns your cut.\n\nTake your prize and I'll see if I can't send you through the gates again tomorrow!
Target: Dipping your toes into Oblivion would merit some respect, but bringing home a souvenir Daedra head more than earns your cut.\n\nTake your prize and I'll see if I can't send you through the gates again tomorrow!

Source: Yes. I will join the tribe.
Target: 그러죠. 부족에 합류하겠습니다.

Source: You'll have more than a few battered cogs to show for your effort today. Take your key and your cut. Tomorrow we'll find you something equally as fun to break!
Target: You'll have more than a few battered cogs to show for your effort today. Take your key and your cut. Tomorrow we'll find you something equally as fun to break!

Source: I put the spirit to rest.
Target: 영혼들한테 안식을 줬어요.

Source: I would be remiss not to reward one who walks boldly through flames to face their foe. You have left Razor Master Erthas as broken as brittle brambles.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Quench your hot blood tonight, for tomorrow the world may burn.
Target: 적과 맞서기 위해 대담하게 불길을 걷는 사람에게 보상하지 않을 수 없지. 자네는 칼날 주인 에르타스를 연약한 딸기처럼 짓이겨 놨어.\n\n열쇠와 자네 몫을 가져가. 오늘 밤 뜨거운 피를 토해내게. 내일은 세상이 불타 버릴지도 모르니.

Source: I heard there's a crater in the middle of Selfora now and not much else.
Target: 현재 셀포라 한 가운데에는 큰 구멍 하나만 있을 뿐, 남아있는 게 거의 없다고 하더군요.

Source: You have sundered the twins and the chains they held upon the dead. What reward can compare to the world set right? I do not know. Perhaps this will suffice.\n\nTake what's yours and return to me tomorrow to set right the world again.
Target: 넌 쌍둥이를 쓰러뜨리고 망자를 묶은 사슬을 부쉈어. 어떤 보상이 이에 맞먹을 수 있을까? 모르겠군. 이 정도면 충분하지 않을까 싶네.\n\n보상을 받고 세상을 바로잡기 위해 내일도 오게.

Source: The sun shines on my scales! Five vossa-satls! I am going to need so many frogs.\n\nNo worries, beeko. I will gather the little croakers myself. The next few days will be very busy, but very profitable! Speaking of profit, this is for you. Thank you!
Target: The sun shines on my scales! Five vossa-satls! I am going to need so many frogs.\n\nNo worries, beeko. I will gather the little croakers myself. The next few days will be very busy, but very profitable! Speaking of profit, this is for you. Thank you!

Source: Thank you.
Target: 고마워요.

Source: Thanks. I think.
Target: 고맙습니다, 라고 해야겠군요.

Source: Thanks.
Target: 고마워요.

Source: Is there anything I can do?
Target: 제가 할 수 있는 다른일이 있나요?

Source: I have a letter for you from your cousin, Gungrim.
Target: 당신 사촌 건그림이 보낸 편지가 있어요.

Source: What happened back there?
Target: What happened back there?

Source: Are you sure the kwama won't harm the Great Tree?
Target: 크와마들이 거대한 나무를 해치지 않을 거라고 확신하시나요?

Source: Are you certain?
Target: 확실한가요?

Source: It's all true. I saw it with my own eyes.
Target: It's all true. I saw it with my own eyes.

Source: What is it?
Target: What is it?

Source: He was totally useless.
Target: He was totally useless.

Source: Thanks.
Target: 고마워요.

Source: Is this yours? It bears your name.
Target: 이거 당신 물건인가요? 당신 이름이 적혀있는데요.

Source: What's the score on the sepulcher heist?
Target: 묘지 도둑질로 몇 점을 땄어?

Source: What's the score on the sepulcher heist?
Target: 묘지 도둑질로 몇 점을 땄어?

Source: You pried open the jaws of death and tempted it with your bare throat. For sending the lamia queen to her grave without the taste of your blood on her scaly lips, you are deserving of the name Undaunted.\n\nTake your reward. Tomorrow we begin again.
Target: You pried open the jaws of death and tempted it with your bare throat. For sending the lamia queen to her grave without the taste of your blood on her scaly lips, you are deserving of the name Undaunted.\n\nTake your reward. Tomorrow we begin again.

Source: So it has, so it has! Are you feeling enlightened? Lighter? Lit?\n\nWhy you would want to keep mucking around in Tamriel is quite beyond me. Nasty place. How—how do you get the smell out of your clothing?
Target: 그래, 그랬겠지! 깨달음을 얻은 것 같나? 불은? 켜졌어?\n\n왜 자네가 탐리엘을 계속 돌아다니고 싶어 하는지 모르겠어. 고약한 곳. 자네 옷의 냄새는 어떻게 없앨거야?

Source: Take it, and remember to return tomorrow. The bards have been asking for someone to sing about, and I know your exploits will be fitting for a new tale.
Target: 이걸 받아. 그리고 내일 돌아오는 것을 잊지 마. 음유 시인은 노래 부를 소재가 필요한데 너의 공적은 새로운 이야기에 잘 어울릴 거야.

Source: Thanks, Fa'ren-dar.
Target: 고마워, 파'렌-다르.

Source: The path ahead of us is a dark one, but it pleases me to know that I shall walk that path with friends. \n\nMay we all rest a little easier tonight. I know I shall.
Target: 우리 앞에 놓인 길은 어둡지만, 그 길을 친구와 같이 걸을 수 있다는 것을 알게되어 기쁘구료.\n\n우리 모두 오늘 밤은 좀 더 편히 쉴 수 있겠군. 그래야만 하고.

Source: You are owed more than respect. Being the first to set foot in the ancient earth takes mettle. To survive its unknown dangers takes skill. You have both.\n\nAdd your key and your cut to your new found treasures. Tomorrow you may face uncertainty again.
Target: 자네는 존경 그 이상을 받아야 해. 고대의 땅을 맨 처음 밟으려면 패기가 있어야 되고, 그런 알려지지 않은 위험에서 생존하려면 기술이 필요하지. 자네는 둘 다 가졌네.\n\n열쇠와 새로 발견한 보물의 자네 몫을 받게나. 내일 자네는 또다시 불확실성에 직면할 수도 있을 걸세.

Source: Undaunted seek glory and treasure. Good deeds are not chief among our concerns. You have managed to find room for both today. It is to be commended.\n\nTake your key and cut. The dead rest now, as you should. A new day approaches. It may be your last.
Target: Undaunted seek glory and treasure. Good deeds are not chief among our concerns. You have managed to find room for both today. It is to be commended.\n\nTake your key and cut. The dead rest now, as you should. A new day approaches. It may be your last.

Source: Cultists are some of the peskiest vermin to be rid of. Your cut will reflect that.\n\nTake your key and return tomorrow! We'll find you something more exciting than clearing cobwebs.
Target: 숭배자들은 제거해야 할 귀찮고 위험한 해충들 중 하나 입니다. 당신이 한 일은 그것을 반영할 것입니다.\n\n열쇠를 가지고 내일 돌아오세요! 거미줄을 치는것 보다 더 신나는 일을 찾아 드릴게요.

Source: Your gem buyer come through?
Target: 보석 구매자가 온 거야?

Source: Your gem buyer come through?
Target: 보석 구매자가 온 거야?

Source: We will go somewhere safe—a place where we won't be a danger to others.\n\nMy friends still have much to learn. I can't risk others until I know they can control their temptations. No one will fall victim to our people again.
Target: We will go somewhere safe—a place where we won't be a danger to others.\n\nMy friends still have much to learn. I can't risk others until I know they can control their temptations. No one will fall victim to our people again.

Source: I hope this haul was worth slinking through sewer filth.
Target: 이번에 수확한 게 하수구 오물을 몰래 헤쳐 나온 보람이 있었으면 좋겠는데.

Source: I'm tired, dirty, and damp. Tell me there's good news.
Target: 나는 지금 지치고, 피곤하고, 지저분해. 좋은 소식이 있다고 말해줘.

Source: I'll make sure of it. Thanks to you, Rilis will never see Tamriel again.\n\nThe situation would be dire had he escaped to the surface.
Target: 내가 장담하건데, 당신 덕분에 릴리스는 다시는 탐리엘을 볼 수 없을걸세. \n\n그가 지상으로 탈출했었다면 정말 끔찍한 상황이 되었겠지.

Source: You were there. Did Indaenir really rise from the dead?
Target: 그대는 거기에 있었지. 인대니어가 정말 죽음에서 되살아났느냐?

Source: The Bad Man! The Bad Man! The Bad Man is dead!
Target: The Bad Man! The Bad Man! The Bad Man is dead!

Source: QUEST: Queen's Emissary - Orrery
Target: 퀘스트: 여왕의 특사- Orrery

Source: There's the hero who freed the researchers from the Library of Dusk. Well done, friend!
Target: There's the hero who freed the researchers from the Library of Dusk. Well done, friend!

Source: QUEST: Queen's Emissary - Isque
Target: 퀘스트: 여왕의 특사- isque

Source: QUEST: Queen's Emissary - Dusk
Target: 퀘스트: 여왕의 특사- Dusk

Source: So you actually rescued Anais from the pirates?
Target: 그러니까 넌 정말로 아나이스를 해적들한테서 구한 거네?

Source: There aren't many that would've helped us out. I'm grateful. Grateful enough to share some of our payment. As a thank you for all your help.
Target: There aren't many that would've helped us out. I'm grateful. Grateful enough to share some of our payment. As a thank you for all your help.

Source: Are you all right sharing Narahni with Tashmin?
Target: 타시민과 나라니를 공유해도 괜찮겠어요?

Source: Are we ready to attack then?
Target: 공격할 준비가 되었나?

Source: Yes, I remember you! A familiar face is a welcome one in dire times.\n\nYou see, I'm trapped in <<1>>, and need assistance to free myself and those captured with me.
Target: 물론, 당신을 기억하고 있소! 끔찍한 시기에 친숙한 얼굴을 만나는건 환영할 일이지.\n\n그러니까, 내가 지금 <<1>>에 갇혀 있소. 나와 함께 붙잡힌 사람들도 구해내려면 도움이 필요한 상황이오.

Source: So the battle's over?
Target: 싸움이 끝난건가?

Source: <You find <<1>>'s reward nestled underneath the first layer of stones.>
Target: <You find <<1>>'s reward nestled underneath the first layer of stones.>

Source: After I return it to the Orrery? Perhaps I can research its properties once the ceremony is complete.\n\nIf the queen allows, of course. I'm not one to stand in the way of royalty.
Target: 심장을 태양계의에 돌려놓은 다음 말인가요? 의식이 끝나면 심장의 성질을 연구할 수 있을지도 모르죠.\n\n물론 여왕님이 허락하신다면요. 난 왕실에 거역하는 사람은 아니거든요.

Source: I'll bear that in mind. Can I get started now?
Target: 염두에 두도록 하지. 이제 시작해도 될까?

Source: They put out the lighthouse signal fire so ships would crash on the rocks!\n\nDamn it! That could've been much worse, I'm sure. I'm glad you were able to stop them. Thank you for letting us know.
Target: They put out the lighthouse signal fire so ships would crash on the rocks!\n\nDamn it! That could've been much worse, I'm sure. I'm glad you were able to stop them. Thank you for letting us know.

Source: Thanks to you. Don't worry, friend. Next time we'll be a lot more careful. Never would've expected Daedra-worshipers in a bandit lair.\n\nThanks. We owe you.
Target: 고맙습니다. 걱정마요, 친구. 다음에는 훨씬 더 조심할겁니다. 도적단 수굴에 데이드라 숭배자들이 있을거라고는 상상도 못했어요\n\n 감사합니다. 우리가 당신에게 빚을 졌군요.

Source: Found you toiling about in the forest, did she? Welcome to our little party. We could definitely use some help.
Target: Found you toiling about in the forest, did she? Welcome to our little party. We could definitely use some help.

Source: If only we'd known, we could have hired you instead of them. I'm sure they mean well, but I've never seen such incompetence before!\n\nWe do not have much, but please take this as a token of our gratitude.
Target: 그걸 알았다면 저들 대신 당신을 고용했을텐데요. 그들은 잘 하려 했겠지만, 저런 무능함은 처음 봅니다!\n\n우린 가진 게 별로 없지만, 이걸 감사의 표시로 받아 주십시오.

Source: I've delivered the items to the client.
Target: 고객에게 물품을 배달했습니다.

Source: Mess with the mammoths and you get the giants rilled up. Just look at what happened at Cradlecrush.
Target: Mess with the mammoths and you get the giants rilled up. Just look at what happened at Cradlecrush.

Source: You rescued the Green Lady's sister? Is she unmarried? You should introduce me.
Target: You rescued the Green Lady's sister? Is she unmarried? You should introduce me.

Source: Say, you're the one who exposed that swindler Endarwe, aren't you? Ha! Ayleid warlord my arse.
Target: Say, you're the one who exposed that swindler Endarwe, aren't you? Ha! Ayleid warlord my arse.

Source: I helped <<1>> decide the fate of the Argonian tribe. I should speak with her.
Target: <<1>>이 아르고니안 부족의 운명을 결정하는 것을 도왔다. 그녀와 대화해야 한다.

Source: I've heard tell of your devout work at the holy site of Torinaan. Divines bless you.
Target: I've heard tell of your devout work at the holy site of Torinaan. Divines bless you.

Source: Knights of the Flame came very near dissolution, were it not for you.
Target: Knights of the Flame came very near dissolution, were it not for you.

Source: Ah, you truly are deserving of my gift. The grotto belongs to the Wyrd once again, but more importantly, to you.\n\nI'll be watching you, mortal. A larger hunt looms in your future, one I'll watch with great interest.
Target: Ah, you truly are deserving of my gift. The grotto belongs to the Wyrd once again, but more importantly, to you.\n\nI'll be watching you, mortal. A larger hunt looms in your future, one I'll watch with great interest.

Source: QUEST: Blightbane
Target: 퀘스트: 블라이트베인(Blightbane)

Source: You saved our high-and-mighty Queen, eh? Pah, Naemon should have had the crown!
Target: You saved our high-and-mighty Queen, eh? Pah, Naemon should have had the crown!

Source: My plan worked! I sent the caravan containing <<1>>'s wine down a road frequented by the bandits, in the hope that they would steal it and fall under its curse. Thank you for clearing them out.
Target: My plan worked! I sent the caravan containing <<1>>'s wine down a road frequented by the bandits, in the hope that they would steal it and fall under its curse. Thank you for clearing them out.

Source: I'm glad I was able to help.
Target: 내가 도울 수 있어서 기뻐.

Source: I sent the caravan with <<1>>'s wine down a road frequented by the bandits, in the hope that they would steal it and fall under its curse. I'm sorry you got caught in the trap as well.
Target: I sent the caravan with <<1>>'s wine down a road frequented by the bandits, in the hope that they would steal it and fall under its curse. I'm sorry you got caught in the trap as well.

Source: I'm as in charge of this madhouse as anyone, but I have no time for diplomats.
Target: 내가 이 난장판을 책임지고 있는 건 맞지만, 외교관한테 쓸 시간은 없소이다.

Source: Yes, I remember you! A familiar face is a welcome one in dire times.\n\nYou see, I'm trapped in <<1>>, and need assistance to free myself and those captured with me.
Target: Yes, I remember you! A familiar face is a welcome one in dire times.\n\nYou see, I'm trapped in <<1>>, and need assistance to free myself and those captured with me.

Source: Then all of Ivarstead owes you thanks. He could've been the end of this village if left to his own devices. Here, it's not much, but take this as a token of my appreciation.
Target: 그렇다면 온 아이바스테드가 당신에게 빚을 진 게로군. 놈이 하는대로 내버려뒀다면 이 마을은 종말을 맞았을 거요. 자, 많지는 않지만 내 감사의 표시로 받아 주시오.

Source: Destroying those Undead Knights will help out greatly.
Target: 언데드 기사단들을 물리치면 굉장히 도움이 될 것입니다.

Source: I state a fact. Baxilt-Gah is a necromancer. Death is a hindrance, nothing more. Still, with the grave-stakes returned, we can once again remember our ancestors.\n\nThe Naga-Kur would thank you, but they dislike outsiders. So take this reward instead.
Target: I state a fact. Baxilt-Gah is a necromancer. Death is a hindrance, nothing more. Still, with the grave-stakes returned, we can once again remember our ancestors.\n\nThe Naga-Kur would thank you, but they dislike outsiders. So take this reward instead.

Source: You showed those Wood Orcs. It's what they get for betraying the Green Lady.
Target: You showed those Wood Orcs. It's what they get for betraying the Green Lady.

Source: I express genuine surprise and admiration. Whether the necromancer stays dead, hard to say. But very good that roots were destroyed.\n\nThe Naga-Kur do not hug or show any kind of affection toward outsiders. Instead, take this reward and go away.
Target: I express genuine surprise and admiration. Whether the necromancer stays dead, hard to say. But very good that roots were destroyed.\n\nThe Naga-Kur do not hug or show any kind of affection toward outsiders. Instead, take this reward and go away.

Source: I praise your skills, outsider. I hated the thought of Naga-Kur warriors enthralled by that necromancer. Now we can show their remains proper respect and craft them into good, strong weapons.\n\nTake this reward. You earned it.
Target: I praise your skills, outsider. I hated the thought of Naga-Kur warriors enthralled by that necromancer. Now we can show their remains proper respect and craft them into good, strong weapons.\n\nTake this reward. You earned it.

Source: I speak truth. I expected the miregaunt to break your bones and leave your body to sink into the swamp. A pleasant surprise that you survived. And that you succeeded.\n\nHere. The Naga-Kur thank you for your service.
Target: I speak truth. I expected the miregaunt to break your bones and leave your body to sink into the swamp. A pleasant surprise that you survived. And that you succeeded.\n\nHere. The Naga-Kur thank you for your service.

Source: I look upon you with newfound respect. I assumed the miregaunt would smash you to bits and destroy the relics. Cyrodilic Collections will be happy. They really love that old junk.\n\nHere. Your share. The Naga-Kur thank you for your assistance.
Target: I look upon you with newfound respect. I assumed the miregaunt would smash you to bits and destroy the relics. Cyrodilic Collections will be happy. They really love that old junk.\n\nHere. Your share. The Naga-Kur thank you for your assistance.

Source: Heard you found some witch raising Draugr in the Hall of the Dead. We live in dangerous times.
Target: Heard you found some witch raising Draugr in the Hall of the Dead. We live in dangerous times.

Source: I admit surprise to see that you still live, ojel. The Naga-Kur may raise their tails to outsiders, but I erect the spine of respect. You have done a great thing for my tribe.\n\nTake this and know that you have my gratitude.
Target: I admit surprise to see that you still live, ojel. The Naga-Kur may raise their tails to outsiders, but I erect the spine of respect. You have done a great thing for my tribe.\n\nTake this and know that you have my gratitude.

Source: Those Worms! Trying to enslave my spirit, then sacrifice me to enhance Sinmur's powers. A foolish plan, attempted by idiots. Even you were able to defeat them!\n\nThat shard is mine, by the way.
Target: 그 벌레들! 내 영혼을 노예로 삼으려고 하고, 신무르의 힘을 키우기 위해 나를 희생시키려 했지. 멍청이들이 시도한 멍청한 계획이야. 심지어 너 같은 것도 놈들을 물리칠 수 있었잖나!\n\n어쨌든 그 조각은 내가 갖겠어.

Source: Thanks. I'm grateful that the mine is once again safely under our control.\n\nI sure would like to learn more about this mysterious metal, though.
Target: Thanks. I'm grateful that the mine is once again safely under our control.\n\nI sure would like to learn more about this mysterious metal, though.

Source: Then the last remnants of the old ways have finally been shed and the story of Shuxaltsei ends as it was always meant to: with a new beginning.\n\nWe are grateful for your help. The Hist were wise to guide you to us.
Target: Then the last remnants of the old ways have finally been shed and the story of Shuxaltsei ends as it was always meant to: with a new beginning.\n\nWe are grateful for your help. The Hist were wise to guide you to us.

Source: The mine is as good as ours again, thanks to you!\n\nI could use your help against the Stormfist leader, though.
Target: The mine is as good as ours again, thanks to you!\n\nI could use your help against the Stormfist leader, though.

Source: Not only will this evidence restore the honor of my egg-family, our actions have helped save all of Murkmire. And I couldn't have done any of this without you!\n\nPlease, accept this small gift as a token of my appreciation.
Target: Not only will this evidence restore the honor of my egg-family, our actions have helped save all of Murkmire. And I couldn't have done any of this without you!\n\nPlease, accept this small gift as a token of my appreciation.

Source: He's dead? Damn. At least he died knowing you'd rescued this lot. I'll keep smuggling slaves out of Vvardenfell, sure. And I'll make sure they know why, too.\n\nTake this. Khartag would want you to have it. Good luck on the road, friend.
Target: 그가 죽었어? 조금도. 최소한 그는 당신이 이 많은 것들을 구한 사실을 알고 죽었어. 나는 바덴펠에서 노예를 몰래  빼내는 일을 계속 할꺼야. 그리고 그 사람들도 그 이유를 알게 할 거야\n\n 가져가. 카르타그는 당신이 그것을 갖길 원할거야. 길에서 행운을 빌어, 친구.

Source: Good food, good drink, and good times are the heart of Betnikh's celebration of the New Life. I'm glad <<1>> could show you herself.\n\nI do miss the adventures we had in our younger days. I'd tell stories, but I don't want to burn your ears off.
Target: 좋은 음식, 좋은 술, 그리고 좋은 시간은 베스닉 새 생명 축제의 핵심이지. 네가 <<1>>과 만나고 왔다니 기쁜걸.\n\n우리가 어렸을 적에 했던 모험이 그립구만. 그 얘기를 해 주고 싶지만, 귀에 못박히게 만들고 싶지는 않아서 말이야.

Source: QUEST: Forbidden Worship - Old Ver.
Target: 퀘스트: 금지된 숭배 -  Old ver.

Source: Immediately. I hate to set out in such a hurry, as careless haste can be fatal in this profession. Unfortunately, we cannot afford to wait.\n\nThank you for all you've done, my friend. The Remnant of Argon is almost within our grasp.
Target: Immediately. I hate to set out in such a hurry, as careless haste can be fatal in this profession. Unfortunately, we cannot afford to wait.\n\nThank you for all you've done, my friend. The Remnant of Argon is almost within our grasp.

Source: I have freed the City of Ash from the clutches of Razor Master Erthas, though the victory came with a price. Gilraen, the leader of the Bosmer, sacrificed herself to close the Oblivion Gate that threatened the entire forest.
Target: I have freed the City of Ash from the clutches of Razor Master Erthas, though the victory came with a price. Gilraen, the leader of the Bosmer, sacrificed herself to close the Oblivion Gate that threatened the entire forest.

Source: Deepcrag kwama mine had some trouble recently. I always wondered why they call it a mine? They just harvest eggs.
Target: Deepcrag kwama mine had some trouble recently. I always wondered why they call it a mine? They just harvest eggs.

Source: You let that woman murder that doctor in Phaer, didn't you? Shame on you.
Target: You let that woman murder that doctor in Phaer, didn't you? Shame on you.

Source: I will be. It seems I can only trust you and my last ambassador. I must get to the town of Silvenar, and the Green Lady, quickly.\n\nAs soon as my magicka returns, we'll be on our way.
Target: 그리 하겠소. 보아하니 믿을 수 있는 사람은 당신이랑 내 마지막 대사 뿐인것 같구려. 빨리 실베나 마을과 녹색 여군주에게 가봐야겠소.\n\n내 매지카가 회복되는 대로 길을 떠나리다.

Source: Fildgor and his Stormfist Brigade have gone to the dragonshrine of Skuldafn. The Prince and I must go to the camps at the foot of the mountain and plan our counter move.\n\nI need to leave now. The people need their King.
Target: Fildgor and his Stormfist Brigade have gone to the dragonshrine of Skuldafn. The Prince and I must go to the camps at the foot of the mountain and plan our counter move.\n\nI need to leave now. The people need their King.

Source: Well. They'll be stuck in there for Y'ffre knows how long. At least the sphere's safe from the Sea Vipers.\n\nThe stormwardens won't forget your help. May the storm travel before you, as they say.
Target: 이런. 감시자들이 그 안에 얼마나 오래 있을지는 이프레께서만 아시겠죠. 적어도 바다 독사놈들이 구체에 손대진 못하겠네요.\n\n폭풍감시자들은 당신의 도움을 잊지 않을 거에요. 감시자들 말처럼, 폭풍이 당신 앞에서 거닐기를 빌게요.

Source: "We may have suffered a significant setback in losing the keeps along our border, but through superior strategy and discipline we have regained all that was lost and more. For that you are to be commended and rewarded. \n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin"
Target: "We may have suffered a significant setback in losing the keeps along our border, but through superior strategy and discipline we have regained all that was lost and more. For that you are to be commended and rewarded. \n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin"

Source: Only one conclusion makes sense. Margus seeks the Golden Skull of Beela-Kaar. Whatever was inside the idol could lead him right to it!\n\nA worry for later. Right now, know that Cyrodilic Collections appreciates your help. Take this with our thanks.
Target: 단 하나의 결론만이 말이 되겠군요. 마르구스는 빌라-카의 황금 두개골을 찾으러 다니고 있는 겁니다. 그 안에 뭐가 들어있던간에, 그것이 바로 그 두개골로 이끌 거예요!\n\n뭐, 그 걱정은 잠시 뒤에 하도록 하죠. 우선 지금은, 시로딜 유물 복원단이 당신의 도움을 감사해 한다는 것을 알아 주세요. 저희의 감사한 마음과 함께 이 보상을 받아주세요.

Source: The King and his councilors are camped at Jorunn's Stand, getting ready to move against Fildgor Orcthane. It's about time, I say.
Target: The King and his councilors are camped at Jorunn's Stand, getting ready to move against Fildgor Orcthane. It's about time, I say.

Source: <The Fighters Guild has set aside a coffer and a note of thanks as a reward.> \n\n"The value of your work is measured in slain Daedra. Many thanks."
Target: <The Fighters Guild has set aside a coffer and a note of thanks as a reward.> \n\n"The value of your work is measured in slain Daedra. Many thanks."

Source: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"Your time is our coin, and we just love our coin. Keep up the good work, friend."
Target: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"Your time is our coin, and we just love our coin. Keep up the good work, friend."

Source: <The consortium has supplied a coffer of rewards for your efforts, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n"The finest wares bring the best profit. Thank you for your excellent work."
Target: <The consortium has supplied a coffer of rewards for your efforts, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n"The finest wares bring the best profit. Thank you for your excellent work."

Source: <Alliance representatives have left a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The future of our alliance is carved from the runes of our enchanters. Many thanks."
Target: <Alliance representatives have left a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The future of our alliance is carved from the runes of our enchanters. Many thanks."

Source: <Alliance representatives have left a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The future of our alliance is carved from the runes of our enchanters. Many thanks."
Target: <Alliance representatives have left a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The future of our alliance is carved from the runes of our enchanters. Many thanks."

Source: <The Fighters Guild has set aside a coffer and a note of thanks as a reward.> \n\n"The value of your work is measured in slain Daedra. Many thanks."
Target: <파이터 길드가 쪽지와 함께 보급품 상자를 보상으로 지급했습니다.>\n\n\\"데이드라를 죽일 때 당신이 만든 방어구가 많은 도움이 되었습니다. 감사합니다.\"\""

Source: <The refugee organization has scrounged a coffer of rewards and left a note of thanks.> \n\n"Know that you have given more than material goods. You have given hope. Please accept our gratitude, what little it's worth."
Target: <The refugee organization has scrounged a coffer of rewards and left a note of thanks.> \n\n"Know that you have given more than material goods. You have given hope. Please accept our gratitude, what little it's worth."

Source: <The consortium has supplied a coffer of rewards for your efforts, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n"The finest wares bring the best profit. Thank you for your excellent work."
Target: <The consortium has supplied a coffer of rewards for your efforts, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n"The finest wares bring the best profit. Thank you for your excellent work."

Source: Then the draugr should slowly return to their graves. In the meantime, we'll stay in here until they go away.\n\nI curse the Covenant for what it's done. Thank you for helping us.
Target: Then the draugr should slowly return to their graves. In the meantime, we'll stay in here until they go away.\n\nI curse the Covenant for what it's done. Thank you for helping us.

Source: Fildgor's dead? Then the villain has paid for his crimes. \n\nYou've been by my father's side and have persevered when others would have faltered. From now on, you shall be known as the High King's Arrow, for you lead the way and always strike true.
Target: Fildgor's dead? Then the villain has paid for his crimes. \n\nYou've been by my father's side and have persevered when others would have faltered. From now on, you shall be known as the High King's Arrow, for you lead the way and always strike true.

Source: <The refugee organization has scrounged a coffer of rewards and left a note of thanks.> \n\n"Know that you have given more than material goods. You have given hope. Please accept our gratitude, what little it's worth."
Target: <The refugee organization has scrounged a coffer of rewards and left a note of thanks.> \n\n"Know that you have given more than material goods. You have given hope. Please accept our gratitude, what little it's worth."

Source: Did you hear? Someone stole Queen Nurnhilde's body from the Royal Tombs.
Target: Did you hear? Someone stole Queen Nurnhilde's body from the Royal Tombs.

Source: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"Your time is our coin, and we just love our coin. Keep up the good work, friend."
Target: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"Your time is our coin, and we just love our coin. Keep up the good work, friend."

Source: I knew the risk, the minute I joined the Silver Dawn. And I'm honored to have done my part, no matter the outcome.\n\nI was able to find this in the keep's stores. You've done more than enough to earn it.
Target: I knew the risk, the minute I joined the Silver Dawn. And I'm honored to have done my part, no matter the outcome.\n\nI was able to find this in the keep's stores. You've done more than enough to earn it.

Source: My uncle lives? My father's mercy knows no bounds! \n\nYou've been by his side and have persevered when others would have faltered. From now on, you shall be known as the High King's Arrow, for you lead the way and always strike true.
Target: My uncle lives? My father's mercy knows no bounds! \n\nYou've been by his side and have persevered when others would have faltered. From now on, you shall be known as the High King's Arrow, for you lead the way and always strike true.

Source: Fildgor has forced his way into Sovngarde. He is close to accomplishing his goal. Soon he shall steal my essence and convince the Crown of Freydis to accept him.\n\nPlease! You must stop him!
Target: Fildgor has forced his way into Sovngarde. He is close to accomplishing his goal. Soon he shall steal my essence and convince the Crown of Freydis to accept him.\n\nPlease! You must stop him!

Source: You would do this? And for a man you barely know? Your life could be forfeited by doing this.\n\nVery well. The decision is yours. I can use what remains of the Dreamwalker's magic to send you into the Dreamstride. From there you will be on your own.
Target: You would do this? And for a man you barely know? Your life could be forfeited by doing this.\n\nVery well. The decision is yours. I can use what remains of the Dreamwalker's magic to send you into the Dreamstride. From there you will be on your own.

Source: I heard Southpoint's been quiet lately. Maybe we'll drop in and liven things up a bit!\n\nNext show is free for you, though. We'll remember your face, don't worry!
Target: 최근에 사우스포인트가 꽤 조용해졌다고 하던데. 잠깐 들러서 떠들썩하게 만들어줄지도 모르겠네!\n\n어쨌든 당신한테는 다음 공연을 무료로 보여줄게. 얼굴은 기억할 테니까 걱정 말고!

Source: What? That ship was our home. All of our props and supplies are in the Shrikes' hands now.\n\nIt'll be tough going for a while, no doubt about that!
Target: 뭐? 그 배는 우리 집이었다고. 우리 소품이랑 물자가 전부 때까치놈들 손에 있다니.\n\n잠시동안은 힘들어지겠어. 불 보듯 뻔하지!

Source: If the Maiden's Breath wasn't rotting on the beach, I'd happily oblige, considering all you've done for us. But no ship, no ride.\n\nI do know someone who might give us a job, though. A job that just might get us both off this rock.
Target: 처녀의 숨결호가 해변에서 썩지만 않았다면 당신에게서 받은 도움을 기꺼이 보답할텐데, 배가 없으니 아무것도 할수 없어. \n\n 하지만 우리에게 일자리를 줄 사람을 알고 있어. 우리 둘 다 이 바위에서 벗어나게 할 수 있는 일이지.

Source: She's a bit too obsessed with old Fahara'jad for me, but I like her style. Seeing as I need a new ship, gold will come in handy.\n\nI'm in. Can't let what you did for us go unrewarded. See you back in town.
Target: 그녀는 늙은 파하라자드와 있었던 일 이후로 나한테 조금 집착하는 경향이 있어, 그래도 그녀 방식은 마음에 들어. 마침 새로운 배가 필요하기도 하니, 너를 도와주면 돈을 벌기도 좋겠군.\n\n나도 참여하지. 네가 우리에게 해 준 일을 생각하면, 가만있을 수는 없으니까. 마을에서 다시 만나자.

Source: If the Maiden's Breath wasn't rotting on the beach, I'd happily oblige, considering all you've done for us. But no ship, no ride.\n\nI do know someone who might give us a job, though. A job that just might get us both off this rock.
Target: 처녀의 숨결호가 해변에서 썩지만 않았다면 당신에게서 받은 도움을 기꺼이 보답할텐데, 배가 없으니 아무것도 할수 없어. \n\n 하지만 우리에게 일자리를 줄 사람을 알고 있어. 우리 둘 다 이 바위에서 벗어나게 할 수 있는 일이지.

Source: I regret I must complete my work here before considering additional opportunities. I must find a way inside Bthzark!
Target: 유감이지만 나는 이곳에서의 일을 먼저 처리해야 해. Bthzark안으로 들어갈 방법을 찾으면 좋으련만!

Source: Our ship's sunk and Captain Lerisa's missing. I didn't sign on for this!
Target: 우리 배가 침몰했고 레리사 선장은 실종됐어. 이런걸 바란 게 아닌데!

Source: I used the keystone to free the prisoners. We won't have it against the Dominion.
Target: 죄수들을 풀어주기 위해 키스톤을 사용했다. 우리는 자치령에 대항하기 위해 그것을 사용하진 않을것이다.

Source: <<1>> sent me. These supplies are for you.
Target: <<1>>이 나를 보냈다. 이 보급품들은 널 위한 것이다.

Source: I have them. Saervild wasn't a traitor. A Dominion spy stole his skin.
Target: 그것들을 가져왔다. 세어빌드는 반역자가 아니었다. 자치령 첩자가 그의 흉내를 낸거였어.

Source: What are you?
Target: What are you?

Source: Let's see what you have here.\n\nAh, very good. I'm glad these survived. You and Dulini have done Tamriel a great service by returning these to us.
Target: 어디 뭘 가져왔나 볼까.\n\n아. 아주 좋아. 이것들이 살아남았다니 기쁘군. 당신과 둘리니는 탐리엘을 위해 커다란 공헌을 한 거라고.

Source: Hah, my brother was at your final match at Thizzrini! Well done!
Target: Hah, my brother was at your final match at Thizzrini! Well done!

Source: One must discard what makes the scales tip. This is the truth of Z'en. <<1>> no longer wished for balance. Thus, he was no longer a follower of Z'en.\n\nFarewell, mortal. Z'en has turned his back from this world. Until the scales tip once again.
Target: 저울을 기울게 하는 것은 버려야 한다. 그것이 젠'님의 진리이다. <<1>>는 더 이상 균형을 바라지 않았지. 그러니 그는 더 이상 젠'님의 추종자가 아니었던 것이다.\n\n작별이다, 필멸자여. 젠'께서는 이 세상에 등을 돌리셨다. 저울이 다시 한번 기울어질 때까지는 말이다.

Source: First, I will find my daughter. Hold her one last time, and try to remember the lessons she taught me. Then … I must rebuild.\n\nPerhaps I will find the concept of balance once again. If that is to be my burden, I carry it gladly.
Target: 우선 우리 딸을 찾아야지. 마지막으로 한번 안아주고, 그 애가 가르쳐준 교훈을 기억하려 노력할 걸세. 그 다음엔... 재건을 해야겠구먼.\n\n어쩌면 다시 한번 균형의 개념을 찾게 될지도 모르겠군. 그것이 내 짐이라면, 내 기쁘게 받아들이겠네.

Source: She did? I find that hard to believe. Delphique knows how I feel about outsiders.\n\nRegardless, whatever your reasons for coming, they'll have to wait.
Target: Delphique가? 그건 믿기 힘들구만. Delphique는 내가 외부인들을 어떻게 여기는지 알고 있는데 말이지.\n\n어쨌든, 여기 온 이유가 무엇이든간에 기다려야 할 거야.

Source: I know. I felt his life force depart when you struck him down. Go in peace, Giant-Friend. You have our thanks.
Target: I know. I felt his life force depart when you struck him down. Go in peace, Giant-Friend. You have our thanks.

Source: Is that it? Is it over?
Target: 그게 다입니까? 이제 정말 끝인건가요?

Source: The portal is open.
Target: The portal is open.

Source: I suppose it was a fitting end.
Target: 나는 그것이 적절한 결말이었다고 생각한다.

Source: Other kings step back, but High King Emeric charges ahead! He's lucky someone keeps saving him from disaster.
Target: 다른 왕들은 뒤로 물러나지만, High King Emeric은 전진하지! 그는 운이 좋다.\n

Source: I regret I must complete my work here before entertaining additional opportunities. I must find a way inside Bthzark!
Target: 다른 흥미로운 일들을 제쳐두고 이 곳에서 일을 끝마쳐야 한다는 점은 개인적으로 대단히 유감이지만. 나는 Bthzark 내부로 들어갈 방법을 찾아야만 해!

Source: <You spot a small pouch beside Lothgar's body.>
Target: <로스가르의 몸 옆에 작은 주머니가 보인다.>

Source: Well, that's perfect! Get me out of here and I'm at your service. You'll find me a man of many talents!
Target: 그거 잘됐군! 내가 여기를 벗어나게 도와주면 그렇게 하지. 나같은 재주꾼이야 말로 꼭 필요하지!

Source: Sneak up on you? It's what I do. Howler draws all the attention, I do all the sneaking.
Target: 몰래 네 뒤를 밟는 거 말이야? 그게 내가 하는 일이니까 말이야. 하울러는 모든 관심을 집중하고 있고, 나는 그 관심을 피해 숨어 다니는 것 뿐이지.

Source: Well done! Once banished, the Dremora will never be able to return to Nirn. \n\nThank you for your assistance. I hope this ritual will somehow make amends for my part in this whole sordid affair.
Target: Well done! Once banished, the Dremora will never be able to return to Nirn. \n\nThank you for your assistance. I hope this ritual will somehow make amends for my part in this whole sordid affair.

Source: Ha! Shazah managed to get her head out of a book long enough to break through, eh? Well done, well done. Khali has some White-Eye brandy in her pack. You've more than earned some!
Target: 하! 샤자가 결국에는 책에서 장벽을 통과해낼 방법을 찾아낸 모양이죠? 잘 됐네요, 잘 됐어. 칼리가 가방에 하얀눈 브랜디를 넣어 뒀어요. 당신이라면 그 술을 마실 자격이 충분해요!

Source: I've heard that name before, I think. But it fades when I try to remember, like a bad dream.\n\nStill, gloomy thoughts do not become us now! The spinners will sing your story with gusto! A tale of harrowing adventure, and wealth beyond measure!
Target: 그 이름을 들은 적이 있는 것 같은데. 그런데 기억해보려 하면 마치 악몽처럼 희미해지는군.\n\n그래도 지금 우울한 생각을 할 순 없겠지! 방적공들이 자네의 이야기를 열정적으로 노래할 거라네! 끔찍한 모험과 측정할 수 없는 부에 대한 이야기를 말일세!

Source: Sharp claws, traveler. It's been an honor to fight by your side. And I think I know why Rid-Thar appeared to you. Good thing those monks were so insistent on our lessons. I'm pretty sure you're the Moon-Hallowed! Amazing.
Target: 예리한 발톱이로군요, 여행자님. 당신과 함께 싸워서 영광이었어요. 그리고 왜 리드-타 님이 당신한테 나타나셨는지 알 것 같네요. 수도승들한테 억지로라도 수업을 받았던게 다행이었어요. 당신은 분명 달의 성자일 거에요! 놀랍네요.

Source: Brek and his crew no longer have to worry about Daedra threats.  Brek says they'll be able to take back the mine eventually.
Target: Brek과 그의 동료들은 더이상 데이드라의 위협에 대해 걱정하지 않아도 될거야.

Source: You! You were the one who helped Lieutenant Fairfax and the guard at Hinault Farm. You have my thanks.
Target: You! You were the one who helped Lieutenant Fairfax and the guard at Hinault Farm. You have my thanks.

Source: Montclair bastards! Attacked the Shornhelm Guard at Hinault Farm! But I heard everything turned out fine.
Target: 몽클레어 개자식들! 히널트 농장에서 숀헬름 경비대를 공격했지! 하지만 모든 게 괜찮아졌다고 들었어.

Source: You've broken their power here. They may find another way, but we will be ready for them this time.\n\nFor now, we must rest. Thank you for aiding us, though we are outcast. Perhaps we will meet again.
Target: 네가 여기서 놈들의 힘을 깨뜨려 줬잖아. 놈들이 다른 방법을 찾겠지만, 그 때는 우리도 준비가 되어있을 거야.\n\n지금은 일단 안식에 들어야 해. 우리는 추방자인데도 도와줘서 고마워. 언젠가 다시 만날지도 모르겠네.

Source: Let's see what you have here.\n\nAh, very good. I'm glad these survived. You and Dulini have done Tamriel a great service by returning these to us.
Target: 어디 뭘 가져왔나 볼까.\n\n아. 아주 좋아. 이것들이 살아남았다니 기쁘군. 당신과 둘리니는 탐리엘을 위해 커다란 공헌을 한 거라고.

Source: It's my duty. Her spirit will linger a little while longer, along with the Oathbreakers disturbed by the Worm Cult. I'll have to use that time to learn as much as I can.\n\nOnce the cultists leave, all of the spirits can enjoy their endless rest again.
Target: 그게 내 의무요. 그분의 영혼은 벌레 교단에게 방해받은 맹세파괴자들과 함께 잠시동안 머무르실 것이오. 그 시간을 활용해서 최대한 많은 것을 배워야겠지.\n\n교단놈들이 떠나고 나면 모든 영혼들이 다시 끝없는 안식을 즐길 수 있을 거요.

Source: Thanks! I never thought I'd get rid of him.
Target: Thanks! I never thought I'd get rid of him.

Source: I realized that, if the Worm Cult managed to raise Nanwen, my secret would be known.\n\nWhich is why I sent you to stop them. For what good that did me. I hope I can trust you to keep your mouth shut.
Target: 벌레 교단이 난웬을 일으켜 세운다면, 내 비밀이 드러나게 된다는 것을 깨달았으니까.\n\n그게 바로 놈들을 막으라고 당신을 보낸 이유요. 내가 한 일을 숨기려고. 당신이 입을 닫고 있어준다면 좋겠소.

Source: Joyous news! The Green Lady must hear of this. I sent a Jaqspur scout to her when <<1>> returned, and now we must send another with this report.\n\nYou've done us a service, and have our deepest gratitude.
Target: 기쁜 소식이로군! 녹색 여군주가 에게 이 소식을 전해야겠네. <<1>>가 돌아왔을 때 작스퍼 정찰병을 보냈었는데, 이 소식을 전할 사람을 또 보내야겠구만.\n\n정말 큰 도움이 되어 주었네. 깊은 감사를 표하지.

Source: Raston will remain our guest while we finalize details with the female trader. We have ways to make sure he never speaks of us again. But have no fear. He will be released shortly.\n\nPity. He would have served the Ghost Snake well.
Target: 우리가 그 여자 상인과 세부사항을 의논하는 동안 라스턴은 우리의 손님으로 남을 거야. 우리는 그가 결코 다시 우리를 모욕하게 하지 않을 방법이 있지. 그러나 두려워 말게 그는 곧바로 풀려날거야.\n\n안타깝군. 그가 유령 뱀에게 공물이 될 수도 있었는데.

Source: No. Well, I've spoken to them, but gotten no answers.\n\nThis may take a little more effort than I first estimated.
Target: 해 봤죠. 뭐, 말은 해 봤지만, 대답을 얻지는 못했어요.\n\n처음 예상했던 것보다는 약간 더 수고를 들여야겠군요.

Source: You! Kargand died because of you! Who's going to care for our cub now?
Target: You! Kargand died because of you! Who's going to care for our cub now?

Source: Your father died defending Selfora. The town is safe now.
Target: Your father died defending Selfora. The town is safe now.

Source: Are you at peace?
Target: 이제 만족하니?

Source: Not one in a million can claim they've slain a Maormer Stormreeve. Damned impressive!
Target: Not one in a million can claim they've slain a Maormer Stormreeve. Damned impressive!

Source: Yes. I … absorbed it.
Target: Yes. I … absorbed it.

Source: I took care of it. Carina is dead and I've retrieved your orders.
Target: 내가 처리했소. 카리나는 죽었고 당신의 명령서를 되찾아왔소.

Source: Here are your remains. May they bring you peace.
Target: 여기 너의 유해야. 그들이 너에게 평안을 가져다주길.

Source: Excellent! We're holding things down as best we can here, but we need to move quickly. I fear the usurper is close to achieving his goal.
Target: Excellent! We're holding things down as best we can here, but we need to move quickly. I fear the usurper is close to achieving his goal.

Source: No. Well, I've spoken to them, but gotten no answers.\n\nThis may take a little more effort than I first estimated.
Target: No. Well, I've spoken to them, but gotten no answers.\n\nThis may take a little more effort than I first estimated.

Source: I was nervous, thinking of trying to take the Chasm. It was tough, but we did it.
Target: I was nervous, thinking of trying to take the Chasm. It was tough, but we did it.

Source: Excellent! We couldn't have gathered this information without you. Now, with your continued help, we can take back Cradlecrush and drive off the Stormfist invaders.
Target: Excellent! We couldn't have gathered this information without you. Now, with your continued help, we can take back Cradlecrush and drive off the Stormfist invaders.

Source: Was it difficult? No matter. You did well. You've avenged Golun and all the others Aera lied to and murdered. Nimalten is safe.\n\nWe owe you a great debt. The Worms will find no shelter in the shadow of Nimalten!
Target: 힘들지 않았나? 상관없지. 잘 했네. 아에라가 거짓말을 하고 살해한 골런과 모든 사람에 대한 복수를 해줬군. 니말텐은 안전하네.\n\n 우리는 큰 빚을 졌어. 벌레들은 니말텐의 그늘에서 피난처를 찾을 수 없을 것이야!

Source: Of course. You have earned it. \n\nI would be surprised if we crossed paths again, but you never know. Anything is possible.
Target: Of course. You have earned it. \n\nI would be surprised if we crossed paths again, but you never know. Anything is possible.

Source: QUEST: Sealed Spirits
Target: 퀘스트: 봉인된 영혼들

Source: Have you heard about the Daggers? They killed an entire flock of harpies with their bare hands. Makes the Fighters Guild look like amatuers.
Target: Have you heard about the Daggers? They killed an entire flock of harpies with their bare hands. Makes the Fighters Guild look like amatuers.

Source: Curse those Reachmen for releasing Sinmur's ghost. It's a good thing you were there to warn the Pact.
Target: Curse those Reachmen for releasing Sinmur's ghost. It's a good thing you were there to warn the Pact.

Source: I found <<1>>. They've taken her eyes, but at least she's still alive.
Target: I found <<1>>. They've taken her eyes, but at least she's still alive.

Source: Excellent. I'll hold onto the jewels in case the potion doesn't work. We might have to pay the ransom. \n\nNow, here's a reward. There's more where that came from if you'll help with the rest of my plan.
Target: 좋아. 수면제가 효과가 없을 경우를 대비해서 보석은 일단 가지고 있지. 몸값을 지불해야 할 수도 있으니.\n\n여기 보수야. 만약 더 도와준다면, 더 많은 보수를 주도록 하지.

Source: Whatever your motives, if not for you, I would never have survived. I owe you my life. Please, accept this reward.
Target: 무엇 때문에 그러셨는지는 모르지만, 당신이 아니었다면, 저는 분명 죽었겠죠. 제 목숨을 빚졌습니다. 이 것을 받아 주세요.

Source: <You've taken the money. Donel Fontbonne will never know what his father left him.>
Target: <나는 돈을 챙겼다. Donel Fontboone은 아버지가 그에게 남긴 편지를 결코 알 수 없을 것이다.>

Source: I give you this as payment for services rendered. You are strong and I respect that.\n\nFeel free to visit as often as you like. I shall happily provide you with power whenever you wish.
Target: I give you this as payment for services rendered. You are strong and I respect that.\n\nFeel free to visit as often as you like. I shall happily provide you with power whenever you wish.

Source: We will leave this place. Losing Rala … I see now that my friends aren't ready to be on their own.\n\nI'll continue to train those new to this life. Temper them. Teach them not to succumb to the maddening bloodlust.
Target: We will leave this place. Losing Rala … I see now that my friends aren't ready to be on their own.\n\nI'll continue to train those new to this life. Temper them. Teach them not to succumb to the maddening bloodlust.
