Source: You really think so? She has been talking about how stuffy the mages are. How they'd hamper our creativity. It's just … hard to let go, I guess.\n\nWell, I guess this is exciting. And thanks for all your help, by the way. I really appreciate it.
Target: You really think so? She has been talking about how stuffy the mages are. How they'd hamper our creativity. It's just … hard to let go, I guess.\n\nWell, I guess this is exciting. And thanks for all your help, by the way. I really appreciate it.

Source: Hey, I had everything under control until … no, you're right. I don't have the best track record. I keep needing help.\n\nMaybe the Mages Guild will teach us how to be proper adventurers. Or Shad Astula. We should be able to write our own ticket now!
Target: Hey, I had everything under control until … no, you're right. I don't have the best track record. I keep needing help.\n\nMaybe the Mages Guild will teach us how to be proper adventurers. Or Shad Astula. We should be able to write our own ticket now!

Source: You helped the Clanmother retake Arenthia! Bright moons and well done!
Target: You helped the Clanmother retake Arenthia! Bright moons and well done!

Source: Lady Lleraya was a vampire? I'm glad you defeated her and saved Northpoint.
Target: Lleraya 여사는 뱀파이어 였나요? 그녀를 이기고 Northpoint를 구해 줘서 기쁘다.\n

Source: Raynor sent you? Well, that was nice of him since it's his fault I'm stuck down here! His stupid invisibility device stopped working and now the constructs won't stop chasing me!\n\nAnyway, you have my thanks.
Target: Raynor sent you? Well, that was nice of him since it's his fault I'm stuck down here! His stupid invisibility device stopped working and now the constructs won't stop chasing me!\n\nAnyway, you have my thanks.

Source: Believe me, you won't regret this.\n\nPoor Scales burns with the blood fever. She'll be trying to eat every face she sees soon enough. Who would wish that fate upon her? Well, I suppose my father would, but you'll learn more about him shortly.
Target: Believe me, you won't regret this.\n\nPoor Scales burns with the blood fever. She'll be trying to eat every face she sees soon enough. Who would wish that fate upon her? Well, I suppose my father would, but you'll learn more about him shortly.

Source: We wiped out the cultists and stopped the ritual.
Target: 추종자들을 쓸어버리고 의식을 중단했습니다.

Source: I found this note. I thought you might want it.
Target: 이 기록을 찾았어요. 당신이 가지고 싶어할 것 같더군요.

Source: I found this letter about you, Wardiya.
Target: 당신에 대한 이 편지를 발견했어요, 왈디야.

Source: That's fantastic. The Backstreet Gang will scatter to the wind without the Grinder to hold them together. \n\nYou just made my job so much easier. I guess you made Wayrest safer too. Take care, friend.
Target: 멋지군. 뒷골목 깡패들은 그라인더가 사라졌으니 알아서 해체될 거야.\n\n네 덕분에 일이 편해지겠는 걸. 네가 웨이레스트의 치안 향상에 한몫 했어. 고마워, 친구.

Source: So you've officiaIly joined the Dominion?
Target: 그럼 공식적으로 자치령에 합류하신 건가요?

Source: Your wife sent me. She was worried about you.
Target: 당신 부인이 날 보냈어. 그녀가 널 걱정하고 있어.

Source: Some of the troops made it off the field, and we destroyed their supply hut.
Target: 병사들 몇 명이 현장을 빠져나갔어요. 그리고 놈들의 보급 막사도 파괴했죠.

Source: Armin wants you to know he succeeded and will soon be home.
Target: Armin wants you to know he succeeded and will soon be home.

Source: Here's <<1>>.
I've brought <<1>> back.
Target: << 1 >>을 가져 왔습니다.\n

Source: You were right. I found this on the other side of the portal.
Target: 당신이 옳았더군요. 이걸 포탈 반대쪽에서 찾았습니다.

Source: Yes. S'rashi is very relieved and boss will be happy.\n\nYou are a better enforcer than my brother ever was. From now on, I will think of you as family. What is mine is also yours.
Target: 그렇다. 스'라시는 매우 안심했고 상관은 기뻐할 거다.\n\n너는 지금까지 내 어떤 형제보다 훌륭한 집행자였다. 이제부터, 나는 너를 가족으로 생각할 것이다. 내 것은 또한 너의 것이다.

Source: Job's done, Gorgath. Varnedo is dead.
Target: Job's done, Gorgath. Varnedo is dead.

Source: I don't want to trade my soul for power.
Target: I don't want to trade my soul for power.

Source: Lady Izza awarded you with an honorary collar and bell.
Target: Lady Izza awarded you with an honorary collar and bell.

Source: Ready to get out of here?
Target: Ready to get out of here?

Source: What do you want me to say? \n\nI'll give them their land back and compensate them for this … minor inconvenience. After that, I'm leaving! I refuse to live in the mud. Emeric can find a swineherd to rule his pen of pigs.
Target: What do you want me to say? \n\nI'll give them their land back and compensate them for this … minor inconvenience. After that, I'm leaving! I refuse to live in the mud. Emeric can find a swineherd to rule his pen of pigs.

Source: A woman named <<1>> wanted you to have this.
Target: <<1>>라는 사람이 이걸 전해달라고 하더군요.

Source: I saved Steve from bondage.
Target: I saved Steve from bondage.

Source: Yes. It won't trouble the mine any longer.
Target: 네. 광산에는 더 이상 문제 없을 거에요.

Source: Here's a letter from <<1>>. He said you'd pay.
Target: 여기 <<1>>가 보낸 편지가 있어요. 당신이 보상을 줄거라고 하던데요.

Source: I have some items intended for you.
Target: 당신을 위한 물건들이 좀 있어요.

Source: Good. War destroys what it touches, especially a family. The High Elves of <<1>> see their celebration as necessary to restore the spirit and renew the hope of lost children. \n\nAnd they hope that one day, they will never have the need to celebrate.
Target: 잘 했어. 전쟁은 손에 닿는 것을 파괴하지. 특히 가족 말이야. <<1>>의 하이 엘프들은 이 축제를 영혼을 회복하고 잃어버린 아이들의 희망을 이어주기 위해 필요한 것으로 생각하는 거야.\n\n그리고 언젠가는 기념할 필요가 없게 될 날이 오길 바라는 거지.

Source: The Daedra is no more. I owe my life to you.\n\nYou'll still have to fight your way out, but once I'm confident no trace of the Daedra remains, Gerard and I will disperse the cultists and return to Pariah Abbey.
Target: The Daedra is no more. I owe my life to you.\n\nYou'll still have to fight your way out, but once I'm confident no trace of the Daedra remains, Gerard and I will disperse the cultists and return to Pariah Abbey.

Source: Is there a reward for returning them?
Target: 이것들을 돌려준 보상같은 건 없어?

Source: I saved his son.
Target: I saved his son.

Source:
You're right. I'm sorry. I know it's wrong to blame you for what happened.

Why didn't he listen to me? The sacrifice would have worked. He didn't have to die.

I'm not fit to be a Spirit Warden. I think I'm going to be a wanderer … like you.
Target:
You're right. I'm sorry. I know it's wrong to blame you for what happened.

Why didn't he listen to me? The sacrifice would have worked. He didn't have to die.

I'm not fit to be a Spirit Warden. I think I'm going to be a wanderer … like you.

Source: I met Sanzagh. He told me to tell you that these fields belong to him.
Target: 산자흐를 만났어. 이 들판이 자기 것이라고 말하라고 하던데.

Source: <It was too late to save Miranda. Serge's plot to kill her was a success.>
Target: <Miranda를 구하기에는 너무 늦었다. Serge의 음모가 성공하였다.>

Source: Sinien stayed behind to destroy the other Moonhenge.
Target: 시니엔은 다른 문헨지 유적을 파괴하려고 뒤에 남았어요.

Source: I have a delivery for you from <<1>>.
Target: <<1>>이 보낸 배달품이 있어요.

Source: That'll have to do.
Target: That'll have to do.

Source: I have something that belongs to you.
Target: 당신 물건을 가져왔어요.

Source: Should have told you to pack these in salt. I need to get these to the locals before they completely rot. They were very specific.\n\nYou earned your pay. Consider spending it on soap and a long bath.
Target: 이것들을 소금에 넣어서 가져오란 말을 해 줬어야 했는데. 완전히 썩어버리기 전에 현지인들한테 전해줘야겠어. 아주 구체적인 요구를 했었거든.\n\n여기 네 몫이야. 이걸로 비누를 사서 느긋하게 목욕하는 것을 고려해 보라고.

Source: Then you truly understand the War Orphan's Sojourn. The children have lost everything. Providing what you can, and then even more, gives them New Life in a new year.\n\nIt is not easy. But it eases their burden, which is all they know.
Target: 그렇다면 전쟁 고아 순례를 진정으로 이해한 것이로군. 아이들은 모든 것을 잃었어. 너는 줄 수 있는 것을 준 것 뿐만 아니라 더 나아가서 아이들에게 새해의 새로운 생명을 준 셈이야.\n\n그건 쉬운 일이 아니지. 하지만 모두가 알고 있는 짐을 덜어 준거야.

Source: I killed <<1>> and found the scrolls.
Target: I killed <<1>> and found the scrolls.

Source: The Fish Boon Feast reminds us that it warms the heart to fill a hungry belly, especially when it isn't your own.\n\nAnd if you're truly in need? Well … the smallest kindness of others can help you survive and thrive.
Target: 생선의 은혜 축제는 굶주린 배를 채우는 것이 마음을 따뜻하게 해 준다는 것을 상기시켜 주지. 특히 다른 사람의 배를 채울 때 말이야.\n\n정말 궁핍한 상황이라면 어떻겠어? 뭐... 가장 작은 친절이라도 살아남아 번창하는 것을 도와줄 수 있는거라고.

Source: Good food, good drink, and good times are the heart of Betnikh's celebration of the New Life. I'm glad <<1>> could show you herself.\n\nI do miss the adventures we had in our younger days. I'd tell stories, but I don't want to burn your ears off.
Target: 좋은 음식, 좋은 술, 그리고 좋은 시간은 베스닉 새 생명 축제의 핵심이지. 네가 <<1>>과 만나고 왔다니 기쁜걸.\n\n우리가 어렸을 적에 했던 모험들이 그립구만. 그 얘기를 해 주고 싶지만, 귀에 못박히게 만들고 싶지는 않구나.

Source: I've made my decision about Sir Hughes. He will be executed.
Target: 난 결정을 내렸네. 휴즈 경에게 사형을 내리겠네

Source: I defeated <<1>>. And here are the mementos you asked for.
Target: <<1>>을 물리쳤습니다. 그리고 당신이 부탁한 기념물입니다.

Source: I followed through on the Duke's request to seek the counsel of the Spirit Wardens on this "Omen of Fear." It was suggested that I speak directly to Abbot Durak, as he would be most likely to know.
Target: I followed through on the Duke's request to seek the counsel of the Spirit Wardens on this "Omen of Fear." It was suggested that I speak directly to Abbot Durak, as he would be most likely to know.

Source: I killed Wily Kee'va and set the traders' camels free.
Target: I killed Wily Kee'va and set the traders' camels free.

Source: I've made all of the exchanges.
Target: 모든 교류를 완료했어.

Source: Odunn said you might want these glowflies.
Target: 오둔이 당신이 이 빛나는 파리들을 원할 수도 있다고 말했어.

Source: You turned <<1>> against me.
Target: 네가 <<1>>를 조종했잖아.

Source: What about my reward?
Target: 내 보상은 뭐지?

Source: Drillk would've died had I taken the keystone from him. We can't use it.
Target: Drillk would've died had I taken the keystone from him. We can't use it.

Source: Smart? Because I reported Nilwen?
Target: 똑똑한? 내가 닐웬에게보고했기 때문에?\n

Source: How does this help me stop Vox?
Target: 어떻게 하면 복스를 멈출 수 있을까요?

Source: Don't worry. I brought <<1>> the herb she needs.
Target: 걱정마요. 그녀가 필요로하는 약초 << 1 >>를 구해왔어요.

Source: I killed Zalsheem and returned the urns.
Target: 잘쉼(Zalsheem)을 죽이고 항아리를 되돌려 놓았습니다.

Source: Malsia! Can you hear me? Malsia?
Target: 말시아! 내 말 들려요? 말시아?

Source: So we're finished?
Target: 그럼 이걸로 끝이지?

Source: I killed Na'ruzz and dug up his cursed charms.
Target: I killed Na'ruzz and dug up his cursed charms.

Source: Yes. I killed Khralek.
Target: Yes. I killed Khralek.

Source: I couldn't find any evidence as to who placed the vials of noxious fumes.
Target: 유독 가스가 담긴 유리 병을 누가 풀었는지 어떠한 증거도 찾을 수 없었습니다.

Source: He didn't surrender. He fought to his last breath.
Target: He didn't surrender. He fought to his last breath.

Source: Ready to join your friends and head back to the surface?
Target: Ready to join your friends and head back to the surface?

Source: They are spirited.
Target: 활발한 사람들이더군요.

Source: You can make it to the Hollow City from here?
Target: 여기서 공허한 도시까지 갈 수 있겠습니까?

Source: I accept, Lord Vivec.
Target: 받아들이겠습니다, 비벡 경.

Source: I killed Thannar and settled the restless dead.
Target: I killed Thannar and settled the restless dead.

Source: I killed Akumjhargo and Zav'i and destroyed their contraband.
Target: I killed Akumjhargo and Zav'i and destroyed their contraband.

Source: I defeated the Dragons.
Target: 드래곤을 무찔렀습니다.

Source: Actually, she said I could keep the payment.
Target: 그녀는 보수를 받아도 좋다고 말했어.

Source: It had to be done.
Target: 해야만 하는 일이었습니다.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군.

Source: You did the right thing.
Target: 옳은 일을 하신 겁니다.

Source: I think that's the last of them.
Target: I think that's the last of them.

Source: Let's end this.
Target: Let's end this.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 할건가요?

Source: Is this staff yours?
Target: 이 스태프가 니것인가?

Source: Acolyte Eldri said you needed these Dremora hearts.
Target: 조수 Eldri는 당신에게 드레모라 심장이 필요할것이라 말했습니다.

Source: I'll do my best to defeat Vox.
Target: 복스를 이기기 위해 최선을 다할 것입니다.

Source: The Maulborn sacrificed their own troops so that Vox could escape with the Judgment of Veloth.
Target: 마울본은 복스가 벨로스의 심판을 가지고 탈출 할 수 있도록 자신의 군대를 희생했습니다.

Source: I watched from a dream as a nightmarish reflection of myself committed mad crimes of blood. I killed so many … I threatened my own parents ….\n\nRighting the wrongs I did here will take years—but thanks to you, I can at least start.
Target: 나는 나를 비추는 악마 같은 꿈에서 피의 범죄를 저지르는 나를 봤다. 나는 많은 사람들을 죽였고 ... 내 부모님까지 위협했다 ...\n\n내가 저질렀던 잘못된 일을 바로 잡으려면 몇 년이 걸리겠지ㅡ하지만 고맙다. 이제 나는 최소한 시작은 할 수 있다.

Source: If Hosni stole the Dream Shard, he did it for Adima … and if so, he'll never give it to you.\n\nAnd you are here to recover the Dream Shard, aren't you? If you help me clear Hosni's name, I'll help you get it.
Target: 호스니가 꿈의 조각을 훔쳤다면, 아디마를 위해서 그랬을 거야 ... 그리고 만약 그렇다면, 그 애는 그걸 자네에게 절대 주지 않을 걸세.\n\n그리고 자네는 여기 꿈의 조각을 되찾으러 왔지. 만약 자네가 호스니의 오명을 씻어준다면, 자네가 꿈의 조각을 얻을 수 있도록 도와주겠네.

Source: I'm interested in taking a job.
Target: 일거리에 관심이 있어.

Source: Mara's heart! This is exactly what we needed. With this in hand my husband and I can escape this place and go to seek help.\n\nI have one final favor to ask.
Target: 세상에! 정확히 내가 찾던 것이네. 이걸 가지고 내 남편과 나는 이 장소를 탈출해서 도움을 구하러 갈 수 있을 걸세.\n\n마지막으로 부탁할 것이 있다네.

Source: I'll go and speak with them.
Target: 가서 그들과 이야기해 보지.

Source: I'm sorry. I don't mean to be rude. I've just been under a lot of stress with this whole situation.\n\nHere's something for your help. It's not much, but we have a long trip ahead of us. I'm sure you understand.
Target: 죄송합니다. 무례하게 굴려던 건 아니었어요. 저는 그저 이 모든 상황에 대해 많은 스트레스를 받고 있을 뿐이었어요.\n\n여기 당신의 도움에 대한 사례입니다. 많지는 않지만, 우리는 긴 여행을 떠나야 해요. 이정도밖에 안되는 것을 당신이 이해해 주실 거라고 생각합니다.

Source: NEVER SEE
Target: 보이지 않는다

Source: Your mercenaries have recovered nicely.
Target: Your mercenaries have recovered nicely.

Source: Someone told me that Duke Sebastien is a werewolf. Can you believe it?
Target: Someone told me that Duke Sebastien is a werewolf. Can you believe it?

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <상금을 청구한다>

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <상금을 청구한다>

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <상금을 청구한다>

Source: I found the old woman's ring.
Target: 노파의 반지를 찾았어.

Source: I retrieved the captain's spyglass as requested.
Target: 부탁했던 대로 선장의 작은 망원경을 찾아 왔어.

Source: I was able to recover what they took from you.
Target: 네, 그들이 가져간 것 을 되찾았어요.

Source: I have the necklace.
Target: I have the necklace.

Source: I stopped the experiment and gathered research notes. Dubdil Alar didn't survive.
Target: 실험을 중단시키고 연구 쪽지를 모았어. 덥딜 알라르는 살아남지 못했어.

Source: She is in no shape to fight. I can't imagine what tortures she must have endured under the Imperials' reign.\n\nYou are our symbol, friend. Our symbol of freedom.
Target: 그녀는 싸울만한 상태가 아니라네. 제국놈들의 지배 아래에서 어떤 고문을 견뎌내야 했을지 상상도 가지 않는군.\n\n자네는 우리의 상징이라네, 친구여. 우리 자유의 상징 말일세.

Source: I fulfilled the stipulations of a contract.
Target: I fulfilled the stipulations of a contract.

Source: Don't you recognize the old beggar without his rags? I've been following you for quite a while! Even my own followers suspected nothing.\n\nDhakir and Qismah will never forget what you've done for them.
Target: 누더기가 없으니 그 늙은 거지를 몰라보겠나? 자네를 꽤 오랫동안 따라다녔는데! 내 추종자들조차 아무것도 의심하지 못했지.\n\n다키어와 키스마는 자네가 해준 일을 절대 잊지 않을 것일세.

Source: I found the old sailor's pipe.
Target: 늙은 선원의 담뱃대를 찾았어.

Source: The <<1>> was designed to protect caretakers, yet it puts them in even greater danger from their inmate's rage. Such a morbid object.
Target: <<1>>는 간호인을 보호하려고 만들어졌지만, 환자들의 분노 때문에 더 큰 위험에 처하게 만들지. 정말이지 병적인 물건이야.

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: Abhorrent. I rarely question the Order's commitment. It is essential to prepare for dangers from the Shivering Isles.\n\nStill … some tools of the Daedra are best thrown onto a pyre.
Target: 혐오스럽군. 난 조직의 책임에는 의문을 거의 갖지 않는다네. 쉬버링 아일즈의 위험을 대비하는 것은 반드시 필요한 일이지.\n\n그렇긴 하지만... 어떤 데이드라 도구는 장작더미에 던져넣는게 최선이라네.

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: You can't know what this means to me. This was my life's work. Everything I've learned in twenty years of studying kwama.\n\nI thought I was going to have to give up, find something new. Thank you so much.
Target: 이게 저한테 얼마나 의미있는 일인지 모르실 거에요. 이건 제 평생의 작업이었죠. 20년 동안 배운 것이라곤 크와마에 대한 것 뿐이었어요.\n\n포기하고 뭔가 새로운 일을 찾아야 하나 생각했었죠. 정말 감사해요.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Yes, of course. To Oblivion with this whole campaign folly, and the Seventh Legion. \n\nAs you can see, my men are securing their gear and preparing for the march back to Cyrodiil. It's a long journey, but it'll be good to fight where we're needed.
Target: 그럼, 물론이야. 이 멍청한 작전과 7군단은 전부 오블리비언에나 떨어지라지.\n\n당신이 보는 대로, 내 부하들은 장비를 챙기고 시로딜로 돌아갈 준비를 하고 있어. 긴 여행이 되겠지만, 우리가 필요한 곳에서 싸우는 것이 좋을거야.

Source: There must be some way to reach the floating island.
Target: There must be some way to reach the floating island.

Source: Captain Curran told me of how you helped him in Koeglin Village. Well done.
Target: Captain Curran told me of how you helped him in Koeglin Village. Well done.

Source: It sounds like you have a plan.
Target: It sounds like you have a plan.

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: I'm not sure that's what happened ….
Target: I'm not sure that's what happened ….

Source: Will you continue to work with <<1>>?
Target: Will you continue to work with <<1>>?

Source: Yes, of course. I'm sorry … for everything. Gods, what have I done ….
Target: 물론, 그렇겠지. 미안하오... 전부 다. 신들이시여. 제가 무슨 짓을 했나이까...

Source: Is there anything else you need right now?
Target: 그 외에 당장 필요한게 있나요? [2]

Source: I hope that she is. Perhaps killing me will grant her some solace. She deserves justice. \n\nI deserve to die.
Target: 그랬으면 좋겠군. 날 죽이는 것이 그녀에게 약간의 위안이 된다면 말이오. 그녀는 정의를 구현할 자격이 있지.\n\n난 죽어도 싸고 말이오.

Source: How utterly pedestrian. There is nothing special about this—nothing at all. To think, something so ordinary could draw forth dark seducers and golden saints from a wheel of eidar cheese.\n\nOr it's just a cheese knife.
Target: 완전히 평범하군. 특별한 것이 아무것도 없네. 이... 아무것도 아닌 물건에는 말일세. 생각해 보게나. 지극히 평범한 물건이 둥그런 에이다 치즈에서 다크 세듀서와 골든 세인트를 이끌어낼 수 있다니.\n\n아니면 그냥 치즈칼일지도 모르지만.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Do you really think the Order of the Hour will attack the Sanctuary, Matron?
Target: Do you really think the Order of the Hour will attack the Sanctuary, Matron?

Source: Merciful Divines! It's so horrid in person. To think, this can drive a person to euphoric heights or wretched depths—depending on which face is worn.\n\nYou may want to wash your hands. Perhaps visit a temple.
Target: 자비로운 디바인들이시여! 직접 보니 정말 진저리나는군. 생각해 보면, 이 얼굴은 사람을 행복한 도취로도, 비참한 절망으로도 몰아갈 수 있겠어. 어떤 얼굴을 쓰느냐에 따라 말일세.\n\n아마 손을 씻고 싶을 테지. 신전을 방문해 보게.

Source: You're not angry? We never actually received permission to go to Venom's former Sanctuary.
Target: 화 안내시네요? 배놈의 예전 성소에 허락도 없이 다녀왔었는데.

Source: Governor Fortunata is dead.
Target: Governor Fortunata is dead.

Source: We don't have the Dragonhorn yet.
Target: We don't have the Dragonhorn yet.

Source: How innocuous. A poorly crafted instrument to most, but the mad few will hear perfectly tuned notes. The more one hears it play, the better it sounds.
Target: 얼마나 무해한가. 대부분의 사람들에게는 조잡하게 만들어진 악기이지만, 몇몇 광인들은 완벽하게 조율된 음색을 들을 것일세. 더 많은 자들이 연주를 들을수록 소리가 더 좋아지지.

Source: Hideous. Stories say this creature was born to one of Sheogorath's favored mortals. Its second face whispered dark secrets and terrible prophecies to those touched by the Mad God.\n\nPerhaps it's best the poor soul did not survive to adulthood.
Target: 흉측하군. 이야기에 따르면 이 생물은 쉐오고라스의 호의를 받는 필멸자 중 하나로 태어났다고 하지. 그 두 번째 얼굴은 미친 신의 손길을 받은 자들에게 어둠의 비밀과 끔찍한 예언을 속삭였다고 하네.\n\n어쩌면 이 불쌍한 영혼이 성인이 될 때까지 살아남지 못한 게 최선이었을지도 모르겠군.

Source: I hope Vijari made his journey.
Target: I hope Vijari made his journey.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Of course, Matron.
Target: 물론입니다, 주인님.

Source: Tharn saved us all. I can't help but wonder, what comes next?
Target: Tharn saved us all. I can't help but wonder, what comes next?

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Absolutely tasteless. I mean the very concept, not the <<1>> itself. I have no idea how it tastes. Er, nor will I. Ever.\n\nWhat I mean to say is the Order thanks you for your valiant efforts.
Target: 완전히 무미건조하군. 내 말은 <<1>> 자체가 아니라, 그 개념이 말일세. 어떤 맛이 날지는 모르겠네만. 에, 맛보진 않을 걸세. 절대로.\n\n내가 하려던 말은 조직이 자네의 용맹한 노력에 감사한단 말이었네.

Source: That's excellent news! Despite my misgivings, it seems the Queen's decree has been more of a blessing than a curse. I'm not sure what we would have done without the help of newcomers like you. You have my thanks and the gratitude of all of Summerset.
Target: That's excellent news! Despite my misgivings, it seems the Queen's decree has been more of a blessing than a curse. I'm not sure what we would have done without the help of newcomers like you. You have my thanks and the gratitude of all of Summerset.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Chanter Nemus tricked Hildegard and I killed him for it. It won't happen again.
Target: Chanter Nemus tricked Hildegard and I killed him for it. It won't happen again.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: <<1>> followed me back here, just like you said she would.
Target: <<1>> followed me back here, just like you said she would.

Source: Yes. I stopped the ritual and freed your crewmen.
Target: 맞아요. 제가 의식을 멈추고 선원들을 풀어줬거든요.

Source: Exactly. Each time breach you seal brings us closer to recovering the remaining fragments.\n\nI knew you would be an asset to the Order, but you have exceeded even my expectations. You are clearly prepared for greater things. Take this, and my thanks.
Target: Exactly. Each time breach you seal brings us closer to recovering the remaining fragments.\n\nI knew you would be an asset to the Order, but you have exceeded even my expectations. You are clearly prepared for greater things. Take this, and my thanks.

Source: I stopped the ritual and freed your crew.
Target: I stopped the ritual and freed your crew.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Many tasks yet remain. Even with the Staff of Towers here on Artaeum, the time-storms continue to rage on Tamriel.\n\nBut for now, let us give proper recognition to your success. Take this knowledge, initiate. You have most certainly earned it.
Target: Many tasks yet remain. Even with the Staff of Towers here on Artaeum, the time-storms continue to rage on Tamriel.\n\nBut for now, let us give proper recognition to your success. Take this knowledge, initiate. You have most certainly earned it.

Source: It is rare for General Thoda to offer word of praise, but he speaks highly of you.
Target: It is rare for General Thoda to offer word of praise, but he speaks highly of you.

Source: There's more. They're mounting an attack on a place called Pridehome.
Target: There's more. They're mounting an attack on a place called Pridehome.

Source: And now we're negotiating with a Dragon.
Target: And now we're negotiating with a Dragon.

Source: What's your next move, Sai?
Target: What's your next move, Sai?

Source: Chanter Nemus tricked Hildegard and I killed him for it, but her actions endangered us all.
Target: Chanter Nemus tricked Hildegard and I killed him for it, but her actions endangered us all.

Source: Is there anything else we need to do, Speaker?
Target: Is there anything else we need to do, Speaker?

Source: Now you reap the harvest of your good works.\n\nThrough your dedication and heroism you have proved your worthiness. So, I present this final gift. Beyond this, there is nothing I can teach you.  Let the Old Ways proclaim—you are now a true Psijic.
Target: Now you reap the harvest of your good works.\n\nThrough your dedication and heroism you have proved your worthiness. So, I present this final gift. Beyond this, there is nothing I can teach you.  Let the Old Ways proclaim—you are now a true Psijic.

Source: What are you going to do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 할 생각이죠?

Source: I see that! You have a glow about you. <<1>> celebrates this way to show they don't fear what the cold brings. At the end of a winter's journey is a warm fire, good mead, and wonderful company.\n\nAlso, it lets them compare tattoos!
Target: 그런 것 같군! 네 얼굴에 화색이 돌거든. <<1>>은 이런 기념 방식으로 추위가 몰고오는 것을 두려워 않는다는 걸 보여주는 거야. 겨울 여행의 끝에는 따뜻한 불가, 좋은 벌꿀술, 그리고 훌륭한 친구들이 있지.\n\n서로 문신도 비교해보고 말이야!

Source: Now you reap the harvest of your good works.\n\nThrough your dedication and heroism you have proved your worthiness. So, I present this final gift. Beyond this, there is nothing I can teach you.  Let the Old Ways proclaim—you are now a true Psijic.
Target: Now you reap the harvest of your good works.\n\nThrough your dedication and heroism you have proved your worthiness. So, I present this final gift. Beyond this, there is nothing I can teach you.  Let the Old Ways proclaim—you are now a true Psijic.

Source: Won't the Worm Cult just try to reclaim this place?
Target: 벌레 교단이 여길 다시 점거하려 하지 않을까요?

Source: I'll consider helping you.
Target: I'll consider helping you.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 하실건가요?

Source: I'll consider helping you.
Target: 널 돕는 걸 고려해 보지.

Source: I gathered the items you requested for your hoard.
Target: 당신이 요청한 물건들 여기 있어요.

Source: All right, I'll help you.
Target: All right, I'll help you.

Source: Do you think that's wise?
Target: 그것이 현명한 일이라고 생각하십니까?

Source: Unnerving. How many people were clad in this garment? Why does an ancient, mad king wish to speak through them? Worse, how many would follow?\n\nAlways more questions than answers. Perhaps that's the lure of the Mad God.
Target: 무시무시하군. 얼마나 많은 사람들이 이 옷에 싸여 있었을까? 고대의 미친 왕은 왜 그들과 대화하고 싶어했을까? 더 심한 것은, 얼마나 많은 자들이 왕을 따랐을까?\n\n항상 질문은 대답보다 많다네. 어쩌면 그게 미친 신의 함정일지도 모를 일이지.

Source: I killed Ironfang and acquired these ledgers.
Target: I killed Ironfang and acquired these ledgers.

Source: So what do you plan to do?
Target: 그럼 무슨 계획 있나요?

Source: I destroyed Exulus and retrieved the pauldrons of your fallen comrades.
Target: 액설러스를 쓰러뜨리고 타락한 형제들의 견갑을 되찾아 왔습니다.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 하실건가요?

Source: What will you do next?
Target: 이 다음엔 뭘 하실 거죠?

Source: <<1>> will no longer be a problem.
Target: <<1>>은(는) 더이상 문제가 되지 않을거야.

Source: I'll need it. You didn't ask for anything, but I want you to have this. Just the gold I managed to hide away over the years, minus what I'll need for passage.\n\nNot payment, a gift. For a friend. Goodbye … and thank you, so much.
Target: 내가 원해서 그러는거야. 당신은 아무 것도 바라지 않았지만, 이걸 주고 싶어. 이건 그저 수년간 조금씩 숨겨뒀던 골드 중에서 제 여행 경비를 뺀 금액이야.\n\n 보수가 아니라 친구에게 주는 선물이야.잘 있어... 정말 고마워.

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: So you brought some much needed joy into the dour lands of Stonefalls? This is why the Lava Foot Stomp occurs each year. At least for a time, the warm feeling comes from within—and not all the nearby volcanoes.
Target: 스톤폴스의 음침한 땅에 절실하게 필요한 즐거움을 가져다 줬단 말이군? 이래서 용암 발구르기가 매년 열리는 거지. 적어도 당분간은 따뜻한 느낌이 마음 속에서 피어날거야. 근처의 화산에서만 나오는게 아니라 말이야.

Source: The site has been cleared and I recovered your relics.
Target: 발굴 현장은 정리됬고 너의 유물을 되찾아왔어.

Source: So you've officially joined the Dominion?
Target: 그럼 공식적으로 자치령에 합류하신 건가요?

Source: Are you going to continue your research?
Target: 당신의 연구를 계속할겁니까?

Source: So, this is the Great Shackle?
Target: 그래서, 이게 거대한 걸쇠인가요?

Source: What happened to Klathzgar?
Target: Klathzgar에게 무슨일이 일어났나요?

Source: Gascone is dead. We need to move forward.
Target: 개스콘은 죽었습니다. 우리는 앞으로 계속 나아가야 해요.

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: We'll perform our hearts out! The Wood Elves will see there's more to the Summerset Isles than stuffy politicians.\n\nReturn anytime you wish. If there's enough call for it, we may have new performances to share!
Target: 마음껏 공연을 해야죠! 우드 엘프들은 서머셋 군도에 딱딱한 정치인들보다 더 많은 것이 있다는 사실을 알게 될 거랍니다.\n\n원하시면 언제든 돌아오세요. 요청이 많이 들어오면, 새로운 공연을 보여드릴 수도 있으니까요!

Source: So you brought some much needed joy into the dour lands of Stonefalls? This is why the Lava Foot Stomp occurs each year. At least for a time, the warm feeling comes from within—and not all the nearby volcanoes.
Target: 스톤폴스의 음침한 땅에 절실하게 필요한 즐거움을 가져다 줬단 말이군? 이래서 용암 발구르기가 매년 열리는 거지. 적어도 당분간은 따뜻한 느낌이 마음 속에서 피어날거야. 근처의 화산에서만 나오는게 아니라 말이야.

Source: "Well done, warriors of the Pact! Your assault on the Covenant forces today once again proves that they are no match for our fearless host! Take this, and their humiliation, as your reward.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"
Target: "Well done, warriors of the Pact! Your assault on the Covenant forces today once again proves that they are no match for our fearless host! Take this, and their humiliation, as your reward.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"

Source: I was able to sabotage a number of the Order's preparations.
Target: I was able to sabotage a number of the Order's preparations.

Source: I suppose so. Furthermore, I'm grateful now that Septima never returned my affections. Mara's mercy, that woman did not age well!\n\nShe's irrelevant now though, thanks to you. I suspect, however, that we can't afford to rest on our laurels just yet.
Target: 그런 것 같군. 뿐만 아니라, 셉티마가 내 애정을 돌려주지 않아서 감사하고 있다네. 마라의 자비에 맹세컨대, 그 여자는 나이도 먹지 않았더라니까!\n\n어쨌든 그 여자는 이제 상관없지. 자네 덕분에 말일세. 하지만 우리는 아직 월계관을 쓸 여유가 없는 것 같네.

Source: "Warriors of the Pact, your dominance over Dominion was all but an inevitability. They are soft as their gold-gilt armor. What hope did they have against your battle tempered steel? Take your reward, however easily won.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"
Target: "Warriors of the Pact, your dominance over Dominion was all but an inevitability. They are soft as their gold-gilt armor. What hope did they have against your battle tempered steel? Take your reward, however easily won.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"

Source: Edouard Celd? Really? It's always the ones you least suspect. We'll learn much from Edouard, though he may not be a willing teacher.\n\nThank you for your help.
Target: Edouard Celd? Really? It's always the ones you least suspect. We'll learn much from Edouard, though he may not be a willing teacher.\n\nThank you for your help.

Source: I'm here to claim my reward.
Target: I'm here to claim my reward.

Source: Wonderful! Mud on the face reminds us that life is not always so self-important. With New Life comes a bit of fun, for those who aren't too proud to take part.
Target: 훌륭해! 얼굴에 묻은 진흙은 생명이 항상 근엄한 것은 아니라는 사실을 상기시켜주지. 자존심이 너무 강하지만 않다면, 새 생명은 약간의 즐거움과 함께 찾아오는 법이야.

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: "The Pact scatter like undisciplined cowards before the might of true warriors. When we see them again, I have no doubt the the result will be the same. But your deeds deserve more than praise. Take your reward. \n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"
Target: "The Pact scatter like undisciplined cowards before the might of true warriors. When we see them again, I have no doubt the the result will be the same. But your deeds deserve more than praise. Take your reward. \n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: "This was a well-executed assault by any measure. Ragged as they are, taking all of the Pact's fortifications is no mean feat. You are a credit to the Dominion and will be rewarded as such.\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin"
Target: "This was a well-executed assault by any measure. Ragged as they are, taking all of the Pact's fortifications is no mean feat. You are a credit to the Dominion and will be rewarded as such.\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin"

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: "Thanks to your efforts the Dominion now has a significant foothold in Covenant territory and their ambitions toward Imperial City have been severely hampered. Claim your rightful reward for this feat.\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin"
Target: "Thanks to your efforts the Dominion now has a significant foothold in Covenant territory and their ambitions toward Imperial City have been severely hampered. Claim your rightful reward for this feat.\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin"

Source: Is there anything else you need right now?
Target: 그 외에 당장 필요한 거 있어?

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: "Today was a battle to behold. My heart swelled with pride as I watched our foes crumble under the unyielding charge of our warriors. For this gift, I offer one in return. Claim your prize.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"
Target: "Today was a battle to behold. My heart swelled with pride as I watched our foes crumble under the unyielding charge of our warriors. For this gift, I offer one in return. Claim your prize.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"

Source: That would be your opinion, wouldn't it? My path is clear. A Daedric pact may seem a grim choice, but I'm prepared for the consequences.\n\nNow, you adventurers love trinkets and gold, yes? I trust this will suffice. Farewell.
Target: 그런 의견도 있네. 그래도, 내가 나아가는 길은 분명해. 데이드라와의 거래는 좋지 않은 선택으로 보이지만, 그 결과는 준비되어 있어.\n\n자. 너와 같은 모험자는 장식이나 금을 좋아하지? 그럼, 이걸로 괜찮겠지. 안녕.

Source: Matthiaume is dead, and Edweg deserted your cause.
Target: Matthiaume is dead, and Edweg deserted your cause.

Source: What a relief. With Mistress Dratha's approval, I'll send runners to nearby towns and let the people know it's safe to return. Thank you, my friend. Truly.\n\nTake this. And I believe my Mistress Dratha would like a proper word as well.
Target: 안심했어. 드라사 귀부인의 허가를 얻고 근처 마을에 전령을 파견하는거네. 사람들에게 돌아가도 안전하다고 전해둘께. 정말 고마워.\n\n이걸 받아줘. 드라사 귀부인도 말씀하실 게 있을거야.

Source: It appears so, Your Majesty. What did you see in <<c:1>>?
Target: 그런 것 같습니다, 폐하. <<c:1>>에서 무엇을 보셨습니까?

Source: You were at the Green Lady's wedding, weren't you? She must have been resplendent.
Target: You were at the Green Lady's wedding, weren't you? She must have been resplendent.

Source: "Our past failures are redeemed today. The vengeance we visited on those who took our keeps was swift and brutal. Others will think twice about claiming victory in a siege upon the Pact after this victory.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"
Target: "Our past failures are redeemed today. The vengeance we visited on those who took our keeps was swift and brutal. Others will think twice about claiming victory in a siege upon the Pact after this victory.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"

Source: Ah, Zoreh's tale is a lovely one. <<1>>'s celebration honors the sacrifices we must sometimes make, so that others may enjoy a new dawn.\n\nA toast to your swift legs!
Target: 아, 조레의 이야기는 아름답지. <<1>>의 축제는 우리가 가끔은 해야만 하는 희생을 기리고 있어. 그 희생 덕분에 다른 이들이 새로운 여명을 즐길 수 있는거야.\n\n네 재빠른 다리를 위해 건배하지!

Source: "The enemy has been sent howling in terror from our borders by the efforts of you resolute warriors. Always remember that no battle is over while the will to fight endures. Claim your reward and return to the fray!\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"
Target: "The enemy has been sent howling in terror from our borders by the efforts of you resolute warriors. Always remember that no battle is over while the will to fight endures. Claim your reward and return to the fray!\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: Is there anything else you need?
Target: Is there anything else you need?

Source: Is there anything else you need?
Target: 다른 일은 없나요?

Source: What's next for Hallin's Stand?
Target: 할린의 저항은 이제 어떻게 될까요?

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: It is <<1>>'s duty to send those who measure up to our standards. She doesn't take her task lightly.
Target: It is <<1>>'s duty to send those who measure up to our standards. She doesn't take her task lightly.

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: The dead had risen at Tu'whacca's throne, but you returned them to their rest. Thank you.
Target: The dead had risen at Tu'whacca's throne, but you returned them to their rest. Thank you.

Source: Oh, I see. My apologies then. She had been after me to aid her, but I saw it as her usual nagging. Maybe she really does need someone. I should go and see her. You have my thanks for the kindness you showed her. I'll tell her you kept your word.
Target: 아, 그렇군요. 그렇다면 사과드리죠. 어머니가 저한테 도와달라고 하셨는데, 전 평소의 잔소리라고 생각했거든요. 어쩌면 정말로 도움이 필요하신지도 모르겠네요. 가서 어머니를 봐야겠어요. 친절에 감사드리죠. 어머니한테는 당신이 약속을 지켰다고 말씀드릴게요.

Source: Did you hear that Thallik tried to open a portal to Oblivion?
Target: Did you hear that Thallik tried to open a portal to Oblivion?

Source: Then you know its importance to <<1>>. Imagine a castle recovering from a terribly bloody war. Parents lost, siblings scarred, children buried.\n\nAfter such tragedy, they celebrate the New Life as a chance to laugh and wonder once more.
Target: 그렇다면 그 축제가 <<1>>에서 중요하단 걸 알았겠군. 성이 끔찍한 피투성이 전쟁에서 회복되는 걸 상상해 보라고. 부모를 잃고, 형제자매는 상처입고, 아이들은 묻혔지.\n\n그런 비극이 있은 후에 저들은 다시 한 번 웃음과 경탄을 얻기 위해 새 생명을 기념하는 거야.

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>

Source: Peculiar. Shivering Isles residents are said to drink the stuff because it reveals secret truths to them.\n\nThe Order will research its function as a "madness curative," something best to have at hand when dealing with the Mad God.
Target: Peculiar. Shivering Isles residents are said to drink the stuff because it reveals secret truths to them.\n\nThe Order will research its function as a "madness curative," something best to have at hand when dealing with the Mad God.

Source: So unassuming. The simplest relics can hold great power within. If the Order is right, this button was once worn by the Mad God himself.\n\nAnd if not, it will end up in a jar with a hundred others like it.
Target: 정말이지 겸손하군. 가장 단순한 유물이 그 안에 거대한 힘을 담을 수 있다니. 조직이 맞다면, 이 단추는 한때 미친 신 본인이 착용했던 것이라네.\n\n만약 그렇지 않다면, 다른 백 가지 물건과 마찬가지로 항아리 속에 들어가게 되겠지.

Source: You didn't open the cage, did you? Regardless of what it told you? The Order was quite adamant.\n\nThough I suppose if you had, you wouldn't be standing here. Never mind—job well done.
Target: 자네 그 우리를 열어보지는 않았겠지? 그게 하던 말도 무시했고? 조직은 꽤나 무정하다네.\n\n자네가 그랬다면 여기 서 있지도 못했을 것 같긴 하지만 말일세. 신경 쓰지 말게. 잘 해 주었네.

Source: "When my orders are executed without question or hesitation, victory is the result. To all who followed my command and brought down those keeps today—the Pact honors your victories! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"
Target: "When my orders are executed without question or hesitation, victory is the result. To all who followed my command and brought down those keeps today—the Pact honors your victories! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>

Source: The magicka matrix?
Target: 매지카 망?

Source: Is anyone else hurt?
Target: 다친 사람이 있나요?

Source: I picked some pockets like you asked.
Target: I picked some pockets like you asked.

Source: <Claim Bounty>
Target: <Claim Bounty>

Source: I picked a few pockets like you asked.
Target: I picked a few pockets like you asked.

Source: I picked some pockets like you asked.
Target: I picked some pockets like you asked.

Source: The hero of Davon's Watch. What I wouldn't have given to see Balreth destroy the Daggerfall army.
Target: 다본의 감시대의 영웅. 발레스가 대거폴 군대를 파괴하는 것을 보고 싶었어.

Source: "The Pact now holds Vlastarus, Cropsford, and Bruma! Our enemies will find no respite within their borders, but your rest is well-earned! As is your reward.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"
Target: "The Pact now holds Vlastarus, Cropsford, and Bruma! Our enemies will find no respite within their borders, but your rest is well-earned! As is your reward.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"

Source: I picked a few pockets like you asked.
Target: I picked a few pockets like you asked.

Source: Virmaril the Betrayer sought to create an undead army. I destroyed the foul creature.
Target: Virmaril the Betrayer sought to create an undead army. I destroyed the foul creature.

Source: Shrouded Pass? That means Montclair is in the Doomcrag! Then the time has come to strike down the traitor and restore peace to our shores!\n\nBut first, I want to thank you for helping the people of Northpoint. I won't forget your bravery.
Target: Shrouded Pass? That means Montclair is in the Doomcrag! Then the time has come to strike down the traitor and restore peace to our shores!\n\nBut first, I want to thank you for helping the people of Northpoint. I won't forget your bravery.

Source: Troubling. The Order believes there are hidden patterns among the recipes and cheese-related observations.\n\nAs for me, I prefer the simplicity of rice and fish.
Target: 곤란하군. 조직에서는 조리법과 치즈에 대한 논평들 사이에 관련된 숨겨진 양식이 있다고 생각했는데 말일세.\n\n내 경우에는, 소박한 쌀과 생선을 더 선호한다네.

Source: I picked every pocket I could find.
Target: I picked every pocket I could find.

Source: Curious. This doesn't seem so strange at all. It's almost … comforting to look at.\n\nRight, can't let my guard down. I'll have it crated up immediately.
Target: 별난 일이군. 이건 전혀 이상해 보이지 않는데. 보고 있노라니 거의... 편안해질 정도일세.\n\n자, 경계심을 풀면 안 되겠지. 내 즉시 상자에다 넣어야겠네.

Source: "On this grand and glorious day, three more keeps of Cyrodiil fly the banners of our proud Dominion! Grand Warlord Sorcalin's rewards are yours!\n\n- Scribe Fireluin"
Target: "On this grand and glorious day, three more keeps of Cyrodiil fly the banners of our proud Dominion! Grand Warlord Sorcalin's rewards are yours!\n\n- Scribe Fireluin"

Source: "I count nine new additions to our resource supply chain thanks to the efforts of our finest warriors. Take this reward with my utmost respect.\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin"
Target: "I count nine new additions to our resource supply chain thanks to the efforts of our finest warriors. Take this reward with my utmost respect.\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin"

Source: Fascinating. Perhaps absolute truth is too much for mortal minds.\n\nOr perhaps they were simply too tight for the old sage. Poorly-fitted spectacles would drive me mad.
Target: 매혹적이군. 완전한 진실은 필멸의 정신으로는 감당하기 너무 힘든 것일지도 모르지.\n\n아니면 그냥 늙은 현자에겐 너무 꽉 조였을 수도 있고. 한심할 정도로 안 맞는 안경은 날 미치게 만드니까 말일세.

Source: "Warriors of the Pact, there are no finer raiders in all of Tamriel and the plunder you reaped today will help supply our war effort for some time! Claim your share of the spoils!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"
Target: "Warriors of the Pact, there are no finer raiders in all of Tamriel and the plunder you reaped today will help supply our war effort for some time! Claim your share of the spoils!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron"

Source: <Attached to the Conquest board is a message from General Dar-Liurz.>\n\n"Word of your whole-sale slaughter of our enemies has reached my ears. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron, take this bounty as a token of respect for your prowess in combat."
Target: <Attached to the Conquest board is a message from General Dar-Liurz.>\n\n"Word of your whole-sale slaughter of our enemies has reached my ears. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron, take this bounty as a token of respect for your prowess in combat."

Source: I picked every pocket I could find.
Target: I picked every pocket I could find.

Source: Absolutely terrifying. To think, <<Ac:1>> was found among rogue soldiers. What a terrible thing to confuse for a canteen.
Target: 굉장히 무섭군. 생각해 보면, <<1>>가 불한당 병사들 사이에서 발견된 것이 아닌가. 군용 수통과 헷갈렸다면 정말 끔찍했을 것일세.

Source: <Nailed to the Conquest board is a scrawled note from General Khamagash.>\n\n"You lot like your gold if the bodies counted on the battlefield are any measure. Take your spoils. You earned them."
Target: <Nailed to the Conquest board is a scrawled note from General Khamagash.>\n\n"You lot like your gold if the bodies counted on the battlefield are any measure. Take your spoils. You earned them."

Source: "There is no greater honor for me than to reward excellence. Those of you who fought to cleanse the keeps of Cyrodiil of our enemies today: claim what's yours.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"
Target: "There is no greater honor for me than to reward excellence. Those of you who fought to cleanse the keeps of Cyrodiil of our enemies today: claim what's yours.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"

Source: How did you do that?
Target: 방금 어떻게 한 거지?

Source: I have a list of supplies that Leono needs.
Target: 레오노한테 필요한 보급품 목록이 있는데요.

Source: You've proven to be a reliable assistant. House Hlaalu values reliability. I would say it's been a pleasure, but this whole affair has left me with quite a headache. Still, I may call upon you again in the future.\n\nHere. Double pay, as promised.
Target: 넌 신뢰할 수 있는 조수야. 할루 가문은 신뢰를 소중히하지. 이건 참 기뻐할만한 일이지만, 이 문제는 두통의 일종이야. 그래도 언젠가 힘을 빌릴때가 올지도 모르겠지.\n\n자, 약속한대로 보수는 두 배로 주지.

Source: Capturing Vlastarus, Bruma and Cropsford has loosened the enemies grasp on Cyrodiil! The Dominion thanks you! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalain
Target: Capturing Vlastarus, Bruma and Cropsford has loosened the enemies grasp on Cyrodiil! The Dominion thanks you! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalain

Target: <Pinned to the Conquest board is a note from General Thoron.>\n\n"Forty-to-one and victorious. You set a fine example! Accept this bonus pay with the Grand Warlord's thanks."

Source: I should report in to her, right?
Target: 그녀에게 보고해야겠죠?

Target: 아까 메이지 길드를 위한 정보가 있다고 했었죠.

Source: Then our Glenumbra chapter can breathe easier. The turmoil in their region will keep them busy for quite some time. Best the Worm Cult isn't a part of that turmoil.
Target: 그렇다면 우리 글렌움브라 지부에 숨통이 좀 트이겠군. 그 지역의 혼란은 앞으로도 가끔 우리 지부를 꽤나 바쁘게 만들 거야. 벌레 교단이 그 소란에 끼어들지 못하게 하는 게 최선이지.

Source: I accept, your Majesty.
Target: 받아들이겠습니다, 여왕 폐하.

Source: But they will now?
Target: But they will now?

Source: Yes, here it is.
Target: Yes, here it is.

Source: Is this threat eliminated, then?
Target: Is this threat eliminated, then?

Source: What now, Aldarch?
Target: 이제 어떻게 하죠, 알다크님?

Source: What do we do now, Adusa?
Target: What do we do now, Adusa?

Source: Yes, here they are.
Target: 네, 여기 있어요.

Source: What will you do next?
Target: 이 다음엔 뭘 할 거죠?

Source: You mentioned information for the Mages Guild earlier.
Target: 아까 메이지 길드를 위한 정보가 있다고 했었죠.

Source: I have the list. Are you all right?
Target: I have the list. Are you all right?

Source: Of course, Matron.
Target: 물론입니다, 주인님.

Source: Are those creatures actually locked away again?
Target: Are those creatures actually locked away again?

Source: We stopped Regent Cassipia from becoming the Exalted Viper.
Target: We stopped Regent Cassipia from becoming the Exalted Viper.

Source: You bet your arse there is. Queen Maraya's messenger said she had heard rumors, and I guess they were true … or something.\n\nGo talk to Captain Marck. He actually walked a little ways down the dock. Better he tells you about it himself.
Target: 틀림없어요. 마라야 여왕의 전령은 그녀가 소문을 들었다고 말했고, 나는 그 소문들이 진짜... 라고 생각해요.\n\n 마르크 선장과 이야기하세요. 그는 부두로 조금 걸어 내려 갔어요. 그가 당신에게 더 자세히 말해 줄거예요.

Source: "The people of Vlastarus, Cropsford and Bruma are freed from the oppression of both the Pact and the Dominion! Let them raise cheers to you, liberators, and take this reward as my thanks.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"
Target: "The people of Vlastarus, Cropsford and Bruma are freed from the oppression of both the Pact and the Dominion! Let them raise cheers to you, liberators, and take this reward as my thanks.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: Regent Cassipia sent me to help you with your Iron Orc problem.
Target: Regent Cassipia sent me to help you with your Iron Orc problem.

Source: <The consortium has supplied a coffer of rewards for your efforts, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n"The finest wares bring the best profit. Thank you for your excellent work."
Target: <The consortium has supplied a coffer of rewards for your efforts, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n"The finest wares bring the best profit. Thank you for your excellent work."

Source: Then accept the gift of Eidetic Memory. Remember now every tome, every book, every scrap of paper you have ever read.\n\nAnd remember, too, the tale of Eyevea's return to Tamriel, and the story of the Adept who made it happen.
Target: 그렇다면 이 완전기억 능력의 선물을 허용해 주게나. 이제부터 자네가 읽은 모든 주문, 모든 책, 모든 종이 쪼가리들이 기억날걸세.\n\n그리고 또 기억해 주도록, 탐리엘로 돌아온 아이비아의 이야기와, 그것을 가능케 했던 숙련가의 이야기를 말이네.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: "Thanks to your exceptional efforts today, our troops' bellies are full and our smiths and siege engineers are well supplied. This victory will be the first of many. Take this reward for your service.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"
Target: "Thanks to your exceptional efforts today, our troops' bellies are full and our smiths and siege engineers are well supplied. This victory will be the first of many. Take this reward for your service.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene"

Source: What did <<1>> ask you to do? Retrieve the coins from the chest, or from the victor's purse?\n\nNo, don't tell me—I'll ask her when she visits.
Target: <<1>>가 뭘 하라고 했어? 주화를 상자에서 회수하라고 했어, 아니면 지갑에서 회수하라고 했어?\n\n아니, 대답하지 마. 투미라가 오면 물어볼 테니까.

Source: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"Your time is our coin, and we just love our coin. Keep up the good work, friend."
Target: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"Your time is our coin, and we just love our coin. Keep up the good work, friend."

Source: <The refugee organization has scrounged a coffer of rewards and left a note of thanks.> \n\n"Know that you have given more than material goods. You have given hope. Please accept our gratitude, what little it's worth."
Target: <The refugee organization has scrounged a coffer of rewards and left a note of thanks.> \n\n"Know that you have given more than material goods. You have given hope. Please accept our gratitude, what little it's worth."

Source: You sound just like Mother. Well, both of you are going to see how wrong you are.\n\nNothing can keep us apart now!
Target: 어머니처럼 말하는 군. 그동안 자신이 얼마나 틀렸는지 알았겠지.\n\n지금, 우리들을 떼 놓을수 있는건 아무것도 없어!

Source: <Alliance representatives have left a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The future of our alliance is carved from the runes of our enchanters. Many thanks."
Target: <Alliance representatives have left a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The future of our alliance is carved from the runes of our enchanters. Many thanks."

Source: What has foiling the Kinlord's escape earned me?
Target: 혈족군주의 탈출을 막은 보상은 뭐지?

Source: If you hadn't stopped the Covenant from summoning Sadal, we'd all be dead.
Target: 동맹이 사달을 소환하는 것을 저지하지 않았다면, 우리는 모두 죽었을 것입니다.

Source: No need to fear on that account. I have just the spell to assure Stromgruf's total cooperation for the rest of the trip to Vivec City. My clients need their potions, after all.\n\nThank you again for your assistance. I really do appreciate good help!
Target: No need to fear on that account. I have just the spell to assure Stromgruf's total cooperation for the rest of the trip to Vivec City. My clients need their potions, after all.\n\nThank you again for your assistance. I really do appreciate good help!

Target: <파이터 길드에서 쪽지와 함께 보급품을 보상으로 남겼습니다.>\n\n\\"데이드라를 죽이는 데 당신의 장신구가 많은 도움이 되었습니다. 감사합니다.\"\""

Target: All right. All right. I don't need to hear any more. I'm not going to pretend I understand any of this, and I don't really want to.\n\nHere's your half of the payment. I'll make sure the mage gets safely to his destination.

Source: Reaper's March? You're pulling this one's hind leg! Did she say where in—no, wait, of course she didn't.\n\nWell, this one thanks you anyway. To expect a better result would be folly.
Target: 리퍼스 마치라고요? 지금 농담하시는 거겠죠! 그녀가 정확히 어디로 가겠다고 말... 아니, 잠깐. 당연히 말 안 했겠네요.\n\n뭐, 어찌됐든 이 몸은 감사드려요. 더 나은 결과를 바라는 것은 어리석은 일이겠죠.

Source: You saw the first Mane, and walked the Path! Hallowed be praised!
Target: 당신은 최초의 메인(Mane)을 보고 길을 걸었습니다! 거룩하게 찬양 받으십시오!

Source: The loss of my husband's other wives is a recent tragedy. It does our village no good to drag their names through the mud.\n\nPlease, tell no one what you found. I'll inform my husband eventually, when he's ready.
Target: 내 남편의 다른 아내들을 잃었던 것은 최근에 있었던 비극일세. 그 이름에 먹칠을 하는 것은 우리 마을에 좋지 않아.\n\n부탁이니 이건 아무한테도 말하지 말아주게. 남편이 받아들일 준비가 되면 내가 직접 알리도록 하지.

Target: 거미 숭배자들을 파괴한 대가로 얻는 것은 무엇입니까?

Target: 거미 숭배자들을 파괴한 대가로 얻는 것은 무엇입니까?

Source: Nobody comes out of Crypt of Hearts alive. Nobody. How'd you do it?
Target: Crypt of Hearts를 살아나온 사람은 아무도 없어. 아무도 없다고. 어떻게 할 거야?

Source: You've found the notes! Oh, superb. I'm sure I can cobble these together and keep the high points on the voyage.\n\nI might even make the two of them my co-authors—no, no that's absurd! Here, a pittance for your trouble.
Target: 일지를 찾았군! 오, 훌륭해. 분명 이걸 함께 끼워 맞춰서  여행에서 유리한 위치를 지킬 수 있겠지.\n\n그 두명을 내 공동 저자로 할 수도... 아니, 그건 말도 안되는 소리지! 자, 고생해준 대가야.

Source: Hurry along then. You will find the king just up the road.  \n\nI am going to scale this wall and try to get more details on the Imperials' defenses. I will join you shortly.
Target: 그럼 서두르세요. 폐하는 길 바로 위에서 찾을 수 있을 거에요.\n\n전 이 벽에 올라가서 제국놈들의 방어를 더 자세히 살펴야겠어요. 금방 합류할게요.

Source: I'm ready to be certified as a blacksmith.
Target: 저는 대장장이로서 인증을 받을 준비가 되었습니다.

Source: May Ruuvitar rot. Do we slaughter Dominion children in their cribs? It is not done!
Target: May Ruuvitar rot. Do we slaughter Dominion children in their cribs? It is not done!

Source: How exciting! We still have much to learn about the Ayleids that settled here. I am most glad you sought me out with this.
Target: 정말 흥분되네요! 우리는 아직도 여기 정착했던 에일리드에 대해서 알아내야 할 것이 너무나도 많아요. 이걸 가져다 주셔서 정말로 기쁘네요.

Source: No gold, no relics, just a silly old blade! I'm sorry, but I was counting on something of value! I can't pay you much now.\n\nI don't shave though, so I guess I'll sell the blade. Maybe I can get something for it.
Target: No gold, no relics, just a silly old blade! I'm sorry, but I was counting on something of value! I can't pay you much now.\n\nI don't shave though, so I guess I'll sell the blade. Maybe I can get something for it.

Source: QUEST: A Greater Threat than Vignette
Target: QUEST: A Greater Threat than Vignette

Source: I heard a rumor that someone braved the Lightless Oubliette and saved the last Ayleid King.
Target: I heard a rumor that someone braved the Lightless Oubliette and saved the last Ayleid King.

Source: Hmph. Don't care to keep company with your old granny Alyxe? Or is it the smell of the boiling kwama? A little too heady for your delicate sensibilities?\n\nOh, well. I'll enjoy it all for myself. I always do!
Target: 허? 네 늙은 할미의 조수로 남지 않아줄거야? 아니면 끓는 크와마의 냄새 때문이야? 네 섬세한 감성에 아직 조금 이르니?\n\n뭐, 좋아.. 나는 이 요리를 완전히 즐길거야. 내가 항상 하는 일이지!

Source: Without Naruk, the Children of Yokuda will crumble. No one can say King Fahara'jad did not deal them justice. The Daggerfall Covenant is safe, and so am I, thanks to you.\n\nNow have a drink with us and celebrate our victory.
Target: 나룩이 없으니 요쿠다의 아이들은 무너질 거야. 아무도 파하라'자드 왕이 그들을 처벌하지 않았다고 말하지 못하겠지. 대거폴 연맹은 안전하고, 나도 그래. 고마워.\n\n이제 같이 한잔 하면서 우리 승리를 축하하자고.

Source: Yes. The blood-curse is gone from you.\n\nTerrible dangers, such as werewolves and vampires, crawl in the darkness. Should you fall victim to their infection, know I will lift the evil with the light of Arkay.
Target: 그렇다네. 피의 저주는 자네에게서 사라졌네.\n\n어둠 속에서 기어다니는 늑대인간과 뱀파이어는 끔찍한 위험이지. 놈들에게 감염된 희생자가 된다면, 내가 그 악을 아케이의 빛으로 사라지게 해 줄 것일세.

Source: Shiri said you might know about the third Ansei Ward.
Target: Shiri의 말로는 니가  third Ansei Ward에 대해 알고 있을거라던데?

Target: QUEST: Meeting of the Minds

Target: 달의 성자여! 빛나는 달들이 당신의 길을 이끕니다.

Source: If you plan to go battle, take this blade. The Warrior wants you to wield it.
Target: If you plan to go battle, take this blade. The Warrior wants you to wield it.

Source: I'm ready to be certified.
Target: I'm ready to be certified.

Source: I'm ready to be certified.
Target: 전 인증받을 준비가 됐어요.

Source: Enough? This is more than I even dreamed of. I think this might even allow me to piece together the complete tablet! Variations in the runes, slightly altered structure … yes, yes, this is very exciting!
Target: 충분하냐구요? 이건 제가 기대했던 것 이상으로 훨씬 더 많은 양이에요. 제가 생각하기에 이것들을 합쳐서 완벽한 석판을 만들어 낼 수 있을 것 같아요! 룬 문자의 변형, 구조에서 약간의 변화 ... 맞아, 맞아, 이건 정말 흥미롭군요!

Source: I'd love my reward.
Target: I'd love my reward.

Source: I'd love my reward.
Target: I'd love my reward.

Source: Excellent work, I knew I could count on you.\n\nWith the reinforcements here, we can see to the Goblins as peacefully as we can. There will be restrictions, of course, but their willingness to stay out of the fighting may well save them.
Target: 아주 훌륭하군. 당신에게 맡기면 될 줄 알았소.\n\n지원병이 왔으니, 가능한 평화적으로 고블린들을 처리할 수 있을거요. 물론 제한적이겠지만, 녀석들에게 싸움을 피하려는 의도가 있으니 괜찮겠지.

Source: Huh. I always imagined it a tad … bigger. Well, if it's stuffed with diamonds, I guess it doesn't much matter what size the box is.\n\nThanks for grabbing it. Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm going to crack this beauty open.
Target: Huh. I always imagined it a tad … bigger. Well, if it's stuffed with diamonds, I guess it doesn't much matter what size the box is.\n\nThanks for grabbing it. Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm going to crack this beauty open.

Source: As long as Summerset needs us, my order will remain. \n\nI'll rebuild. Train new riders to honor our traditions. We'll come back from this defeat, stronger than ever. I assure you, this isn't the end of the Welkynars.
Target: As long as Summerset needs us, my order will remain. \n\nI'll rebuild. Train new riders to honor our traditions. We'll come back from this defeat, stronger than ever. I assure you, this isn't the end of the Welkynars.

Source: We'll continue to protect Summerset from all that would harm it. Once my companions rebuild their strength, of course. In the meantime, we'll oversee the efforts of rebuilding Cloudrest.\n\nI couldn't have done this without all your help. Thank you.
Target: We'll continue to protect Summerset from all that would harm it. Once my companions rebuild their strength, of course. In the meantime, we'll oversee the efforts of rebuilding Cloudrest.\n\nI couldn't have done this without all your help. Thank you.

Source: As long as Summerset needs us, my order will remain. \n\nI'll rebuild. Train new riders to honor our traditions. We'll come back from this defeat, stronger than ever. I assure you, this isn't the end of the Welkynars.
Target: As long as Summerset needs us, my order will remain. \n\nI'll rebuild. Train new riders to honor our traditions. We'll come back from this defeat, stronger than ever. I assure you, this isn't the end of the Welkynars.

Source: This is quite the find! I can already feel Z'Maja's power within the gem. With this, I'll be able to analyze her magic and learn how to possibly counter it.\n\nThank you greatly for bringing me this.
Target: This is quite the find! I can already feel Z'Maja's power within the gem. With this, I'll be able to analyze her magic and learn how to possibly counter it.\n\nThank you greatly for bringing me this.

Source: A curious find. Perhaps some residue of her power still persists on it. If I can analyze that magic, I'll be better prepared to counter it in future battles.\n\nThank you for bringing me this.
Target: A curious find. Perhaps some residue of her power still persists on it. If I can analyze that magic, I'll be better prepared to counter it in future battles.\n\nThank you for bringing me this.

Source: King Jorunn is truly merciful to let his traitorous brother live.
Target: King Jorunn is truly merciful to let his traitorous brother live.

Source: Amazing. I feel the presence of Z'Maja's power within it, though it's faint. If I can analyze that magic, I'll be better prepared to counter it in future battles.\n\nThank you for bringing me this.
Target: Amazing. I feel the presence of Z'Maja's power within it, though it's faint. If I can analyze that magic, I'll be better prepared to counter it in future battles.\n\nThank you for bringing me this.

Source: Sud-Hareem told me what happened in Spindleclutch - you helped him make a hard choice. The right choice.
Target: Sud-Hareem told me what happened in Spindleclutch - you helped him make a hard choice. The right choice.

Source: Sud-Hareem's a friend of mine - I want to thank you for saving him and his son.
Target: Sud-Hareem's a friend of mine - I want to thank you for saving him and his son.

Source: Though Dro-Dara is sad to see Murk-Watcher leave us, he is happy to know this evil man is dead.\n\nPerhaps someday this plantation may flourish again. Not by Dro-Dara's hand though. Knarstygg and I are leaving. Goodbye, and thank you.
Target: Though Dro-Dara is sad to see Murk-Watcher leave us, he is happy to know this evil man is dead.\n\nPerhaps someday this plantation may flourish again. Not by Dro-Dara's hand though. Knarstygg and I are leaving. Goodbye, and thank you.

Source: You stood against the Daedra in Dune. Bright moons be praised!
Target: 당신은 듄에서 데이드라와 맞서 싸웠습니다. 빛나는 달들을 기립시다!

Source: The people who did this to me will pay!
Target: The people who did this to me will pay!

Source: That ring belonged to Raerana's mother! It's got her name inscribed on it. Damned bandits willing to murder for gold. Bastards. Poor Raerana!\n\nWell, I appreciate you getting to the bottom of this.
Target: That ring belonged to Raerana's mother! It's got her name inscribed on it. Damned bandits willing to murder for gold. Bastards. Poor Raerana!\n\nWell, I appreciate you getting to the bottom of this.

Source: Excellent! Just what Nayya asked for, though I wouldn't be surprised if she says she needs more.\n\nHere is your payment, as promised.
Target: 아주 좋아요! 딱 나야가 원하던 대로군요. 비늘이 더 필요하다고 말한대도 놀랄 일은 아니지만 말이죠.\n\n여기 약속드렸던 보수에요.

Source: We should leave this place. With the Daedra banished, the glen will collapse in upon itself. Thank you for all you've done!\n\nUm … I hope you'll have the good taste to not mention that I was involved in all this.
Target: We should leave this place. With the Daedra banished, the glen will collapse in upon itself. Thank you for all you've done!\n\nUm … I hope you'll have the good taste to not mention that I was involved in all this.

Source: Good news. Good news indeed. I was feeling a bit parched on this beach. Ale's run dry, you see.\n\nI've a slew of hard-working lads I mentored back in Anvil, and many the contact who might … help <<1>>. My thanks for your service.
Target: 좋은 소식이군. 정말 좋은 소식이야. 이 해변가에 있으려니 목이 좀 마르던 참이거든. 여긴 술도 없지 않나.\n\n앤빌에 돌아가면 내가 가르쳤던 근면한 젊은이들이 많이 있다네. 그 많은 연줄들이... <<1>>를 도와 주겠지. 도와줘서 고맙네.

Source: Magrus surely watched over you among those dangerous ruins. I worried that I'd never see this crystal again.\n\nThank you for your bravery and willingness to help in our time of need.
Target: 분명 마그루스께서 그 위험한 유적지에 임하시어 당신을 지켜주셨던 것이로군요. 이 수정을 다시는 보지 못할까 걱정했었답니다.\n\n이 어려운 시기에 저희를 기꺼이 용감하게 도와주셔서 고마워요.

Source: Seeing as it's you asking, sure. If she's planning a job, I'm in. All I ask is a trip off this rock after it's over.
Target: 네가 원한다면 물론 그래야지. 그녀가 무슨 일을 꾸미고 있다면, 나도 참여 하겠어. 내가 원하는 건 단지 그 일을 마무리한 후에 무사히 이 섬을 떠나는 것 뿐이야.

Source: By the Empyrean Light, it's the savior of the Keepers!
Target: By the Empyrean Light, it's the savior of the Keepers!

Source: I'd speak to Olorime, if you wish to help. She may have a task for you.\n\nDon't worry about my son. I'll send a message with the next mer to evacuate. And here's a little something for your troubles, of course.
Target: 돕고 싶다면 오로리메와 얘기해 보게. 자네가 할 일을 있을 지도 몰라.\n\n내 아들 걱정은 하지 말게. 다음에 대피하는 머를 통해 전갈을 보낼 테니 말일세. 그리고 물론 여기 자네가 곤경을 무릅써 준 데에 대한 약소한 보상이 있다네.

Source: Guildmaster at-Aswala truly has the mercy of Tall Papa. He let that Argonian traitor leave the guild with her life!
Target: Guildmaster at-Aswala는 참으로 Tall Papa의 자비를 가지고 있습니다. 그는 Argonian 반역자가 그녀의 인생 길드에서 떠나도록했습니다!\n

Source: Not well. But she will see the wisdom in it. Avoidance of temptation is a crucial element of moral action. In her heart, she knows this—perhaps better than most.\n\nBut we digress. You have more than earned this reward. Use it wisely, initiate.
Target: Not well. But she will see the wisdom in it. Avoidance of temptation is a crucial element of moral action. In her heart, she knows this—perhaps better than most.\n\nBut we digress. You have more than earned this reward. Use it wisely, initiate.

Source: Bergama's Magistrate should be taken into the desert and stoned to death. That is all.
Target: 벌가마의 치안관은 사막으로 끌려가 죽을 때가지 돌을 맞아야 합니다. 그게 전부입니다.

Source: The scryers are already clamoring about all the information coming back from the Psijic Seals you placed. We'll locate the last four pieces of the staff soon, I know it.\n\nIn the meantime, take this. I'm sure you will put it to good use.
Target: The scryers are already clamoring about all the information coming back from the Psijic Seals you placed. We'll locate the last four pieces of the staff soon, I know it.\n\nIn the meantime, take this. I'm sure you will put it to good use.

Source: They never learned what happened to all those missing people in Bergama. What a mystery!
Target: They never learned what happened to all those missing people in Bergama. What a mystery!

Source: I heard some of the stories of <<1>> from <<2>>.
Target: <<2>>의 <<1>>에게서 이야기를 들었다.

Source: Listen, I thought I contracted corpus from the Skeever cookies she gave me last year! She'll be fine! Thanks again, that was a great trick. I'm sure Baan Dar is well pleased.
Target: 저기요, 저는 작년에 알데스가 준 스키버 과자 때문에 몸이 줄어든 적도 있거든요! 저 정도는 괜찮을 거에요! 다시 한번 고마워요. 굉장한 장난이었어요. 분명 반 다르께서도 기뻐하실 거에요.

Source: The Green Lady is my betrothed. Well met! If you are her friend, you can help me.\n\nYou see, I'm trapped in <<1>>, and need assistance to free myself and those captured with me.
Target: The Green Lady is my betrothed. Well met! If you are her friend, you can help me.\n\nYou see, I'm trapped in <<1>>, and need assistance to free myself and those captured with me.

Source: Good. Make sure the way is clear for our assault. Speak to General Noramil. He's been coordinating our efforts to scout the area for another way in.\n\nThe Ebonheart Pact stands together to defeat the Orcthane!
Target: 좋은 대답이다. 공격을 위해서 도중의 적을 처리해 줘. 노라밀 장군과 이야기 해봐라. 주변의 정찰은 그가 담당하고 있다. 별도의 입구를 찾기 위해서.\n\n오크종사를 물리치기 위해 에본하트 조약은 함께 맞서야 한다!

Source: Indeed we do. And quickly.\n\nTake this, initiate. You will need it during the trials ahead.
Target: Indeed we do. And quickly.\n\nTake this, initiate. You will need it during the trials ahead.

Source: That took far too long!  But thank you for bringing back what is rightfully mine.
Target: That took far too long!  But thank you for bringing back what is rightfully mine.

Source: I hope she listens to reason. She acts like she's in charge, but she wouldn't even listen to my proposal. Trade proposal, mind you. Not a marriage proposal!\n\nThose snake hides would earn them plenty of gold. Plenty of gold for all of us!
Target: 나는 그녀가 이성에 귀을 기울이기를 바라는 중이야. 그녀는 자기가 책임자인 것처럼 행동하지만 내 제안을 들으려 하지 않아. 여기 무역 제안서야. 결혼 제안서가 아니고!\n\n뱀 가죽은 그들에게 많은 돈을 가져다 줄 거야. 우리 모두를 위한 충분한 돈을 말이지!

Source: Yes. Yes, I do. I know someone on the island who can make us both rich.\n\nIf you're up for another job, I think it's time you met her.
Target: Yes. Yes, I do. I know someone on the island who can make us both rich.\n\nIf you're up for another job, I think it's time you met her.

Source: That's all you need to know for now. You'll learn more as you use them. \n\nSeveral of the Pact military leaders are stationed here. Speak with them and they will give you your first real assignment. Welcome to the War.
Target: That's all you need to know for now. You'll learn more as you use them. \n\nSeveral of the Pact military leaders are stationed here. Speak with them and they will give you your first real assignment. Welcome to the War.

Source: You saved the King. You are a friend to all Nord people this day.
Target: You saved the King. You are a friend to all Nord people this day.

Source: What was the Silvenar's advisor, the one who died? Terrible shame.
Target: 죽은 사람이 실베나의 조언자였다고? 정말 끔찍한 일이군.

Source: You don't trust me. I understand that and I don't blame you. A vampire helping strangers at an isolated manor house. What's not suspicious about that?\n\nLike I said, I need your help. And you may not know it yet, but you need mine.
Target: You don't trust me. I understand that and I don't blame you. A vampire helping strangers at an isolated manor house. What's not suspicious about that?\n\nLike I said, I need your help. And you may not know it yet, but you need mine.

Source: Good, though it seems he never stays at rest. All I can do is continue to have him put down each time he arises. Something about that ancient ruin refuses to let the dead lie in peace.
Target: 좋소. 주라스는 절대 안식에 들지 않는 것 같긴 하지만 말이오. 내가 할 수 있는 일이라곤 그가 일어날 때마다 다시 쓰러뜨리는 것 뿐이지. 그 고대 유적의 뭔가가 망자들이 안식에 들지 못하게 하는 모양이오.

Source: At last. It took you long enough, but at least you brought it back unharmed. I won't display this anymore, since it has proven so irresistible to thieves.
Target: 드디어 오셨군. 오래 걸리긴 했지만, 그래도 상처 없이 되찾아 왔구려. 이 깃발은 더 이상 드러내놓지 않을 거요. 도둑놈들이 꾄다는 사실이 드러났으니까.

Source: By the Egg, that will show the pompous Elf. Vlastarus will never fly Dominion colors!
Target: 알에 대고 맹세컨대, 그 거만한 엘프놈이 한방 먹었군요. 블라스타루스에는 자치령의 깃발이 결코 휘날리지 못할 거에요!

Source: Keep the amulet. You earned it. And as long as you carry it, we will always be connected.
Target: Keep the amulet. You earned it. And as long as you carry it, we will always be connected.

Source: Nothing I like more than the smell of dead Goblin. As long as we keep the Rock Bone numbers down, Vlastarus should be safe, from them at least.
Target: 내가 죽은 고블린의 냄새보다 더 좋아하는 것은 없다오. 우리가 바위뼈 놈들의 머릿수를 계속 줄여나갈 수 있다면, 블라스타루스는 분명 안전할 거요. 적어도 녀석들로부턴 말이오.

Source: I heard someone gave Fildgor a warrior's death. Was that you?
Target: I heard someone gave Fildgor a warrior's death. Was that you?

Source: The moors outside of Long Haven were home to vampires. Can you imagine!
Target: The moors outside of Long Haven were home to vampires. Can you imagine!

Source: You're free now, Fadeel.
Target: Fadeel, 넌 자유야.

Source: Shornhelm is safe, thanks to you! We'll make sure those Montclairs never come back!
Target: 당신 덕에 숀헬름이 안전합니다! 저 몽클레어들이 다시는 돌아오지 못하도록 할 겁니다!

Source: Yes, once his suffering was greater than his need to see his revenge made manifest. Keep the trophy, if you wish. \n\nThe idea that waving a stolen hat would somehow restore the Old Tower to us was nothing but a dying Orc's folly.
Target: 그렇소. 그의 고통이 복수의 갈망보다 더 커지는 게 분명했거든. 원한다면 전리품은 가지시오.\n\n훔친 모자를 흔들어 보이면 우리가 어떻게든 오래된 탑을 탈환할 수 있다는 생각은, 결국 죽어가는 오크의 어리석음이었던 게지.

Source: Not terribly long, but long enough that he has formulated a plan of attack.\n\nThis plan requires someone to take quite a bit of risk. I tried to volunteer for the duty, but he insists that you be the one, so I wish you good luck, my friend.
Target: 끔찍하게 오래 된 건 아니지만, 폐하께서 공격 계획을 세우시기에는 충분했습니다.\n\n이 계획은 누군가가 큰 위험을 짊어져야 합니다. 저는 자원자를 찾아보려 했지만, 폐하께서는 당신이 해야 한다고 고집하시더군요. 그러니까, 행운을 빕니다, 친구.

Source: This one has heard how you saved the Mane at Driladan Pass.
Target: This one has heard how you saved the Mane at Driladan Pass.

Source: You did? I mean, good! Good. Well, now. Hopefully we can pack up and move out before another Imperial patrol finds us.\n\nYes. Thank you for your help. Thanks.
Target: 그랬나? 내 말은, 잘했어! 잘했다고. 글쎄, 이제. 바라건대 또 다른 제국 정찰대가 우리를 찾기 전에 짐을 싸서 이동할 수 있었으면 좋겠군.\n\n참. 도와줘서 고마워. 감사를 표하지.

Source: Someone said the Daggers have gone north to look for work. Anyone know who  the Daggers are, by the way?
Target: Someone said the Daggers have gone north to look for work. Anyone know who  the Daggers are, by the way?

Source: I have to face the Hound. If I can reason with him, then there'll be no need to go after the Silvenar.\n\nEven after all he's done, I need to give him that chance.
Target: 사냥개를 대면해야겠어요. 녀석을 설득할 수 있다면 실베나를 뒤쫓아갈 필요도 없게 되겠죠.\n\n녀석이 저지른 짓이 있긴 하지만, 그래도 기회를 줘야 해요.

Source: Isn't it obvious? Open the door! They must be hiding something good down there.\n\nLet's go see!
Target: 몰라서 물어? 문을 열어야지! 저기에 뭔가 좋은 걸 숨기고 있는게 틀림없다니까!\n\n가서 보자!

Source: I take it you have seen to what I have asked of you? Good.
Target: I take it you have seen to what I have asked of you? Good.

Source: Interesting; we'll have to make plans to ensure that farm is denied to our enemies.
Target: Interesting; we'll have to make plans to ensure that farm is denied to our enemies.

Source: Less savages walks the world. It is a good day indeed.
Target: Less savages walks the world. It is a good day indeed.

Source: When will I speak to you again?
Target: When will I speak to you again?

Source: I rejoice to know Bangkorai Garrison is under Covenant control once more.
Target: I rejoice to know Bangkorai Garrison is under Covenant control once more.

Source: With the Ebonheart Pact busy replacing their losses; we have time to plan a decisive attack against their leadership.
Target: With the Ebonheart Pact busy replacing their losses; we have time to plan a decisive attack against their leadership.

Source: I wager the brute died screaming. Victory and glory both are yours this day.
Target: I wager the brute died screaming. Victory and glory both are yours this day.

Source: Remember, we stand together in this Covenant. If the enemy strikes at one of us, they strike at us all.
Target: Remember, we stand together in this Covenant. If the enemy strikes at one of us, they strike at us all.

Source: That's a start. A good start. The Shadowed Path is always recruiting new scum to fill their ranks, but you've weakened them for now. I appreciate it.
Target: 첫 걸음부터 시작하는 법이지. 좋은 출발이오. 그림자의 길 놈들은 언제나 새로운 쓰레기를 모집하지만, 당신 덕분에 당분간은 약해질거요. 감사하오.

Source: You have done well, recruit. We'll make good use of the information you have brought us.
Target: You have done well, recruit. We'll make good use of the information you have brought us.

Source: You have done well, recruit. You might just live to see this war to the end.
Target: You have done well, recruit. You might just live to see this war to the end.

Source: I'm sorry. I got back here and I had to tell my parents and my friends about the slaver attack down at the village ….\n\nAnd then it just completely slipped my mind. Not much point in doing it now.
Target: I'm sorry. I got back here and I had to tell my parents and my friends about the slaver attack down at the village ….\n\nAnd then it just completely slipped my mind. Not much point in doing it now.

Source: We have to establish a firm grip over the resources here in Balfiera, lest we allow the enemy an advantage over us.
Target: We have to establish a firm grip over the resources here in Balfiera, lest we allow the enemy an advantage over us.

Source: Good work; soon we will have that mine, thanks to you.
Target: Good work; soon we will have that mine, thanks to you.

Source: One by one our enemies shall fall, until all are defeated.
Target: One by one our enemies shall fall, until all are defeated.

Source: You did it? Excellent. That will put the fear of the Ebonheart Pact into them.
Target: You did it? Excellent. That will put the fear of the Ebonheart Pact into them.

Source: "Driven off?" You mean she's not dead? I hope you know what you're doing.\n\nWe'll oversee the Goblins from here. Their continued cooperation will ensure that they are spared.
Target: "Driven off?" You mean she's not dead? I hope you know what you're doing.\n\nWe'll oversee the Goblins from here. Their continued cooperation will ensure that they are spared.

Source: Well done. The lake will be cleansed in a matter of days - my alchemy is beyond reproach. We have worked well together.
Target: 잘 했네. 그 호수는 수일 내에 정화될 거야. 나의 연금술은 완벽해. 우린 함께 잘 일해 왔어.\n

Source: Well fought, Lakhazga.
Target: 잘 싸우더군요, 라카즈가.

Source: Bet the dead of Tanzelwil had a lot to say about Ayrenn.
Target: Bet the dead of Tanzelwil had a lot to say about Ayrenn.

Source: The queen's a strong woman. Glad she's taking care of the city, not some regent.
Target: The queen's a strong woman. Glad she's taking care of the city, not some regent.

Source: Always happy to kill Worm Cultists.
Target: 벌레 교도들을 죽일 수있어서 항상 기쁘군요.

Source: What do we do now, Raz?
Target: 이제 뭘 해야하죠, 라즈?

Source: Hail, Stral-killer!
Target: 여, 스트랄킬러!

Source: She'd be proud, Raz. She didn't die in vain.
Target: 피스텔도 자랑스러워 할거에요, 라즈. 그녀의 죽음은 헛되지 않았어요.

Source: Did you hear about Duke Renchant? Dead! And well-deserved, may he rot forever!
Target: Did you hear about Duke Renchant? Dead! And well-deserved, may he rot forever!

Source: With the materials flowing in from the mine we can affect proper repairs on our fortifications. You very well might have saved some lives, recruit.
Target: With the materials flowing in from the mine we can affect proper repairs on our fortifications. You very well might have saved some lives, recruit.

Source: You have done adequately. Every enemy dead brings us that much closer to taking control of Balfiera Island.
Target: You have done adequately. Every enemy dead brings us that much closer to taking control of Balfiera Island.

Source: With this latest acquisition, our enemies will have to fight on our terms. Your service will not be soon forgotten.
Target: With this latest acquisition, our enemies will have to fight on our terms. Your service will not be soon forgotten.

Source: With fresh supplies of lumber at our disposal repairs to our keeps will be that much easier. You have proven your worth to the Dominion.
Target: With fresh supplies of lumber at our disposal repairs to our keeps will be that much easier. You have proven your worth to the Dominion.

Source: Today guards, tomorrow their leaders. We may call on you again soon.
Target: Today guards, tomorrow their leaders. We may call on you again soon.

Source: Well done. You will fit in quite nicely here.
Target: Well done. You will fit in quite nicely here.

Source: Saving our lives is a little more than just "help." Next time you see us, we'll be privateers!\n\n<<1>> and I are going to miss you. We scrounged a bit and came up with something. I hope it serves you well.
Target: 우리를 구해준건  \\"도움\"\" 그 이상의 의미를 지니지.  우리가 다음에 만났을때
column4: 우리는 민간해병이 되있을거야!\n\n<<1>>과 나는 너를 매우 그리워 할거야. 우리가 전리품 좀 긁어왔어. 이게 도움이 된다면 좋겠다."

Source: It's going to be a long day, my friend. \n\nGet ready for some dirty work.
Target: 긴 하루가 될 것입니다, 친구.\n\n 지저분한 일들을 할 준비하세요.

Source: My soldiers are stalwart, yet the enemy is formidable, guided by unseen hands.
Target: 나의 군인들은 건장하지만, 보이지 않는 손에  안내를 받는 적들은 무시무시하다.\n

Source: My soldiers fight with renewed vigor - you have turned the tide, champion. Thanks to you, we will hold the Redoubt - no matter the cost! Your efforts have saved Camlorn.
Target: 내 병사들은 원기를 회복하고 싸우고 있어요. 당신이 형세를 일변시켰어요, 영웅이여. 덕분에, 우리는 어떠한 대가를 치르더라도 보루를 지킬겁니다! 당신의 노력이 캠론을 구했어요.\n

Source: I've heard tales of your valor at Ezduiin. Bravely done!
Target: I've heard tales of your valor at Ezduiin. Bravely done!

Source: This one wonders if Captain Khammo enjoys Anvil. You must visit him sometime.
Target: This one wonders if Captain Khammo enjoys Anvil. You must visit him sometime.

Source: You fought beside Lord Gharesh-ri in Haven? This one should be so lucky!
Target: You fought beside Lord Gharesh-ri in Haven? This one should be so lucky!

Source: Apparently a group of Fighters Guild soldiers got ambushed and taken to a prison. Tower of torture, flies, lies...something like that.
