Target: Apparently a group of Fighters Guild soldiers got ambushed and taken to a prison. Tower of torture, flies, lies...something like that.

Source: It's as I said. This is the realm of Baan Dar himself! To many he is the Pariah, an outcast. But we Bosmeri and the Khajiit know him for what he is. The Legend, the Robber Baron, Master of Shadows—he who is called the Bandit God! Baan Dar!
Target: 내가 말했잖아. 여긴 반 다르님의 영역이야! 많은 사람들은 그분을 부랑자이자 추방자로 알고 있지. 하지만 우리 보스메리랑 카짓은 그분이 누구신지를 알고 있어. 전설이자 강도 남작이며, 그림자의 주인... 도적 신이라 불리우는 반 다르라고 말이야!

Source: I'm going to give this warrior stuff a try! Maybe I'll see you again, if I survive.
Target: 전사가 되기 위해서 노력할테야! 내가 살아남는다면, 널 다시 만날 날이 오겠지.

Source: Thank you. Some of Lower Yorgrim's refugees will sleep warmly tonight.\n\nPlease, take this for your troubles.
Target: Thank you. Some of Lower Yorgrim's refugees will sleep warmly tonight.\n\nPlease, take this for your troubles.

Source: You said it. I'm not fighting anymore. I'll make weapons for others. Mother will just have to get used to it. Thanks for everything!
Target: 네 말대로 해야겠어. 더 이상 싸우지 않겠어. 다른 이들을 위해서 무기를 만들테야. 결국 엄마도 이걸 받아들여야 할 거야. 정말 고마워!

Source: A few. We scattered. Some barred themselves inside, but the Daggers put everything to the torch.\n\nIf it wasn't for that crazy Dark Elf, I'd be fattening fish.
Target: 조금. 우린 흩어졌어. 몇몇은 건물 안으로 숨었지만, 대거폴 동맹군이 불을 질렀어.\n\n만약 그 미친 다크 엘프가 아니었다면, 나도 물고기 밥이 됐겠지.

Source: Excellent … "The Circus of Cheerful Slaughter?" That's quite a title!\n\nI'll begin my research immediately. Can't wait to get to it.
Target: 훌륭하군... \\"유쾌한 학살의 서커스?\"\" 정말 훌륭한 제목이네!\n\n내 연구를 바로 시작해야겠어. 무슨 뜻일지 정말 알고싶군."

Source: I will tell the troops; morale will improve greatly. Sometimes I feel more like a nursemaid than a troop commander.\n\nThank you.
Target: 내가 병사들에게 알리지. 사기가 크게 오를 거야. 가끔은 내가 지휘관이라기보단 애들 봐 주는 보모같다니깐.\n\n고마워.

Source: It might be ugly, but nothing says security like an Orc's head on a pike. \n\nHaraldar will be pleased that I … um, that we … took care of Kazok. It's small comfort for the loss of his wife, but he'll appreciate anything that helps the meadery.
Target: It might be ugly, but nothing says security like an Orc's head on a pike. \n\nHaraldar will be pleased that I … um, that we … took care of Kazok. It's small comfort for the loss of his wife, but he'll appreciate anything that helps the meadery.

Source: Indeed, and even better. It will flourish … for all time.  \n\nWe have you to thank for this. As much as I would like to keep you here, to bind you to me, I won't even try. Take this and go. I'll summon a whirlpool to whisk you away. Goodbye.
Target: Indeed, and even better. It will flourish … for all time.  \n\nWe have you to thank for this. As much as I would like to keep you here, to bind you to me, I won't even try. Take this and go. I'll summon a whirlpool to whisk you away. Goodbye.

Source: Whether you want it or not is irrelevant. I like to reward those who amuse me, and this is your reward. \n\nYou will take it.
Target: 네가 원하건 원하지 않건 간에, 상관 없는 일이다. 나는 나를 즐겁게 해준 자들에게 보상하는 것을 좋아하지.  여기 네 보상이다.\n\n넌 받게 될 것이다.

Source: Let me look at those orders.\n\nI see. Those dogs came up through the crypts! That's how they surprised us. It says something here about their true prize being in the crypts below. I wonder what they could be after.
Target: 그 명령서들을 좀 볼게.\n\n알겠어. 이 더러운 것들은 지하실을 통해서 올라왔군! 그렇게 우리도 모르게 온거야. 아래 지하실에 있는 진짜 상(prize)이 있다고 쓰여있네. 그게 뭘지 궁금하군.

Source: What's the world coming to when a rag-tag group of bandits like the Red Rooks can take over a town?
Target: Red Rooks 같은 거지 같은 도적떼가 마을 하나를 점령할 수 있을 정도면 세상이 도대체 어떻게 돌아가는 거야?

Source: I feel safer knowing that the Black Forge was destroyed.
Target: I feel safer knowing that the Black Forge was destroyed.

Source: I recovered one of the wards at Tu'whacca's Throne.
Target: Tu'Whacca의 왕실에 있는 ward중 한곳을 복구했다.\n

Source: What about the other Ansei Wards?
Target: What about the other Ansei Wards?

Source: Inquisitor Blarae praised my efforts with rallying his defenders - he believes the Redoubt will now hold against the undead. With Camlorn saved, I must now go to Thrandor's Portal and stop Morholdt from sending Ranser's body to Oblivion.
Target: 심문관 블라레는 그의 수비대를 결집시킨 나의 노력을 칭찬했어요. 그는 보루가 이제 언데드를 막을 수 있을 거라고 믿습니다. 캠론을 구했으니 이제 트랜도르의 포탈로 가서 모홀트가 랜서의 시체를 오블리비언으로 보내는 것을 막아야 합니다.\n

Source: I have little to offer by way of reward, other than my thanks. \n\nI doubt you'll remember two simple fishermen, but we'll never forget you.
Target: 보상으로 줄 것이 감사의 말 밖에 없네.\n\n자네는 평범한 어부 두명을 구했다는 사실을 기억하진 않겠지만, 우리는 절대 잊지 않을 거야.

Source: Good job!
Target: Good job!

Source: Captain Blanche Geves, unable to leave the Redoubt camp to locate her missing squad members, sent me to locate them. The four squad members I found are now safely back at the Redoubt.
Target: 블랑쉬 게브스 선장은 실종된 팀원들을 찾기 위해 Redoubt 캠프를 떠날 수 없어서, 나를 보내 그들을 찾아 보라고 했다. 내가 찾은 네명의 팀원들은 이제 Redoubt로 무사히 돌아왔다.\n

Source: That's a relief. Though necromancers sometimes come back from the dead, unfortunately. We'll keep an eye out for him from now on.
Target: 다행이네요. 유감스럽게도 강령술사들은 이따금 죽음에서 되살아나긴 하지만 말이죠. 이제부터 놈을 주의깊게 지켜봐야겠어요.

Source: That's good to hear. You don't know how relieved I am by this news.\n\nYou risked your life, even though you had no duty to uphold or vow to keep. To me, that makes you the champion of the day.
Target: 듣기 좋은 소식이군. 이 소식에 내가 얼마나 마음을 놓게 되는지 당신을 모를거야.\n\n당신은 당신의 목숨을 걸었어. 지켜기로 한 맹세나 의무가 없는데도 말이야. 나에게 당신은 오늘의 진정한 승리자요.

Source: King Jorunn's exiled brother, Fildgor, used to run the Stormfist Brigade. That's his symbol, added to the Stormfist emblem. And these orders ….\n\nFildgor has returned to Skyrim! King Jorunn must be told. Hopefully, it's not too late.
Target: 요룬 왕의 추방된 형제, 필드고어. 그는 폭풍주먹 여단을 운영했었지. 덧붙인 이게 바로 폭풍주먹의 상징이야. 그리고 이 명령들....\n\n필드고어가 스카이림으로 돌아왔어! 왕에게 알려야 해. 아직 늦지 않았기를.

Source: Another blasted attack! You showed compassion, abandoning the race to aid another. Empathy is worth as much as strength, in my opinion.\n\nNow, about Hadring. We need to find his killers and bring them to justice.
Target: Another blasted attack! You showed compassion, abandoning the race to aid another. Empathy is worth as much as strength, in my opinion.\n\nNow, about Hadring. We need to find his killers and bring them to justice.

Source: You caused quite a stir. I'm impressed that you outraced our finest runners. You've done well for Windhelm and the Pact.\n\nSadly, Hadring was murdered during the race. Felled by a poisoned arrow of Orcish design. I'm sure the Stormfists are involved.
Target: 당신으로 인해 꽤나 소동이 벌어졌어요. 난 당신이 우리의 가장 훌륭한 주자들을 앞지른 것에 감명받았습니다. 윈드헬름과 조약을 위해 잘 해주었어요.\n\n슬픈 일이지만, 해드링은 경기 중에 살해당했습니다. 오크 양식의 독 화살에 쓰러졌지요. 폭풍주먹과 연관되어있을 겁니다.

Source: Cheating at the Konunleikar? And the Stormfist clan? They haven't caused this much trouble since ….\n\nOh, no. This is worse than I feared. We need to determine what's really going on here.
Target: 코눈레이카르에서 음모를 꾸민다고? 그리고 폭풍주먹 부족? 그 때 이후로 이렇게 문제를 일으킨 적은 없었는데 ....\n\n오, 안돼. 이건 내가 우려했던 것 보다 훨씬 나쁘군. 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는지 알아내야 해.

Source: Yes. They are dead.
Target: 그래, 그들은 죽었어.

Source: You were the one that helped Count Ravenwatch explore the Lorkrata ruins? Did you find something to stop the blood-curse?
Target: 레이븐워치 백작이 로크타라 폐허를 탐험할 수 있게 도와준 사람이 당신이었나요? 피의 저주를 막아줄 물건을 찾으셨나요?

Source: Those bastard Imperials killed my dog, so I took as many of their lives as I could. Now they'll fear the name Hallin's Stand.
Target: Those bastard Imperials killed my dog, so I took as many of their lives as I could. Now they'll fear the name Hallin's Stand.

Source: You aided Queen Ayrenn in her ratification, correct? You do look like someone to know.
Target: 당신 아이렌 여왕님의 승인식을 도우셨죠? 제가 아는 사람이랑 닮으신 것 같아요.

Source: Is he going to cleanse the temple now?
Target: 그가 사원을 정화하러 가고 있나요?

Source: Truly Stendarr's mercy has descended on my family today. My son has been returned to me, and <<1>> is recovering from her wounds.\n\nPlease take this as a reward. Without your help, <<2>> might not have survived. Go in peace.
Target: Truly Stendarr's mercy has descended on my family today. My son has been returned to me, and <<1>> is recovering from her wounds.\n\nPlease take this as a reward. Without your help, <<2>> might not have survived. Go in peace.

Source: The only correct choice. War should be honorable. There is no honor in the use of such a device.\n\nYou have saved my tribe and my island. For this, I owe you a great debt.
Target: 유일한 선택이야. 전쟁은 명예로워야 해. 그런 장치를 사용하는 데는 명예가 없다.\n\n넌 내 부족과 내 섬을 구했어. 이것 때문에, 나는 너에게 큰 빚을 졌다.

Source: Droi's fate is in Kyne's hands, but his chances are better now. I'll continue to watch over him until he wakes up.\n\nSince he was here before us, it's possible that Droi knows what happened to the Keepers. We need to find out what he saw.
Target: Droi's fate is in Kyne's hands, but his chances are better now. I'll continue to watch over him until he wakes up.\n\nSince he was here before us, it's possible that Droi knows what happened to the Keepers. We need to find out what he saw.

Source: It is clear to me that we are in over our heads. I urge you to flee, hero, unless you can bring enough force to bear to take on that monster in its own lair.
Target: 우리가 감당할 수 없는 수준이라는 건 분명해. 네가 그 짐승의 은신처에서 괴물을 잡을 수 있을 만큼\n 강하지 않다면 지금이라도 떠나.\n

Source: Scouts: Turn in your report and collect your reward.\n\n- General Khamagash
Target: 정찰병에게 공지함: 보고서를 제출하고 보상을 받아가게.\n\n-  다-리우르즈 장군

Source: I disapprove. Many of my people had their souls consumed by that thing. You have condemned others to the same fate.\n\nEven so, you saved my tribe. For that, I will respect your decision. Without you, we would all be dead.
Target: I disapprove. Many of my people had their souls consumed by that thing. You have condemned others to the same fate.\n\nEven so, you saved my tribe. For that, I will respect your decision. Without you, we would all be dead.

Source: I suppose I always knew he wasn't coming back. But this letter …. He left us to keep us safe. "I will sing of you in the halls of Sovngarde." Oh, father ….\n\nThank you. I have peace at last.
Target: I suppose I always knew he wasn't coming back. But this letter …. He left us to keep us safe. "I will sing of you in the halls of Sovngarde." Oh, father ….\n\nThank you. I have peace at last.

Source: I feel so … violated. What that thing did to my soldiers … what it did to me! I may never sleep soundly again.\n\nThank you. If you hadn't come along … well, I don't even want to imagine.
Target: I feel so … violated. What that thing did to my soldiers … what it did to me! I may never sleep soundly again.\n\nThank you. If you hadn't come along … well, I don't even want to imagine.

Source: You've earned this coin then. If all sellswords were more like you, they'd find a warmer welcome!
Target: You've earned this coin then. If all sellswords were more like you, they'd find a warmer welcome!

Source: No trouble from giants, eh? Well, you have my thanks and that of the good patrons here. They'll eat and drink well tonight because of you.
Target: 거인들은 문제없던가, 응? 그래, 나와 단골들의 감사를 받아주게.자네 덕분에 오늘은 잘 먹고 마실 수 있게 되었네.

Source: Everyone's talking about what you did for Nahrina, driving off that debt collector. That was so brave!
Target: 모두 당신이 나리나를 위해 한 일에 대해 이야기하고 있어요. 정말 용감했습니다!

Source: Did you hear? Someone found that poor fool Tavo dead in an old ruin.
Target: Did you hear? Someone found that poor fool Tavo dead in an old ruin.

Source: QUEST: Spy Hunter
Target: 퀘스트: 스파이 사냥꾼

Source: We'll head back to Windhelm and rest before marching to join the rest of the army.\n\nTake this. It was a charm to bring me luck in the war. Thanks to you, my luck has been pretty good. I want you to have it.
Target: We'll head back to Windhelm and rest before marching to join the rest of the army.\n\nTake this. It was a charm to bring me luck in the war. Thanks to you, my luck has been pretty good. I want you to have it.

Source: And I've got your payment! Jilan-dar always keeps some squirreled away in the bottom of the boat. The Goblins overlooked it, thankfully.\n\nPleasure doing business with you, and thanks for saving Khajiit.
Target: 그리고 내겐 네 보상이 있지! 질란-다르는 항상 배 밑에 쓸만한 걸 감춰 두거든. 고맙게도 고블린들이 못 보고 지나쳤지.\n\n같이 일해서 즐거웠어. 그리고 카짓을 구해줘서 고마워.

Source: Oh, I will. And the sooner I can rest and recover, the sooner I can head to the front line and fight for our king. That's where we all should be right now.\n\nHere, please take this. It was Droi's. He would want you to have it.
Target: Oh, I will. And the sooner I can rest and recover, the sooner I can head to the front line and fight for our king. That's where we all should be right now.\n\nHere, please take this. It was Droi's. He would want you to have it.

Source: With the Ebonheart Pact busy replacing their losses; we have time to plan a decisive attack against their leadership.
Target: With the Ebonheart Pact busy replacing their losses; we have time to plan a decisive attack against their leadership.

Source: In honor of your selfless dedication, your unwavering courage, and the incredible service you have done the kingdom, I have a gift.\n \nThis was one of Sentinel's greatest treasures. Now it is yours. I know you will use it well.
Target: In honor of your selfless dedication, your unwavering courage, and the incredible service you have done the kingdom, I have a gift.\n \nThis was one of Sentinel's greatest treasures. Now it is yours. I know you will use it well.

Source: Today a guard, tomorrow their leaders. We may call on you again soon.
Target: 오늘은 경비를, 내일은 그들의 지도자들을. 조만간 다시 보도록 하죠.

Source: With every enemy dead, the Covenant moves closer to claiming these lands!
Target: With every enemy dead, the Covenant moves closer to claiming these lands!

Source: My brother was with you when you retook Fallowstone Hall.
Target: Fallowstone Hall을 다시봤을 때 오빠가 너와 함께했다.\n

Source: The dead will rest peacefully, thanks to you. We Gravebinders thank you for your help.
Target: 덕분에 죽은 자들이 편안히 잠들 수 있을 겁니다. 저희들 Gravebinder는 당신의 도움에 감사 드립니다.\n

Source: Farm scouting reports are to be posted to this board. Then collect your reward.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: 모든 농장 정찰 보고서는 이 임무 게시판에 게시하십시오. 그리고 당신의 보상을 받으십시오.\n\n- 드리트-휠름의 대리인

Source: Scouts: Post reports to this board. Dreet-Wulm will collect them.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz
Target: 정찰병에게 공지함: 이 게시판에 보고서를 게시하라. 드리트-휠름이 모아갈 것이다.\n\n- 드리트-휠름 장군

Source: That's a relief! Dremora can't be killed, but you've banished her from our plane for a time; thanks to you we can breathe a little easier today.
Target: 다행이로군! 드레모라를 죽일 수는 없지만, 잠시 동안은 우리 차원에서 추방당했을 것이오. 당신 덕분에 오늘은 좀 더 우리 숨통이 트이겠구려.

Source: Post all farm scouting reports to this board.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: 이 게시판에 모든 농장 정찰 보고서를 게시하시오.\n\n- 드리트-휠름 서기관

Source: I don't know. With the ritual ended, the undead in this facility should slowly fade with time. As for myself, well … I suppose I could approach the Mages Guild, see if my services could be of use.\n\nI'm sure I'll figure something out.
Target: 나도 모르겠네. 의식이 사라졌으니, 이 시설의 언데드도 시간과 함께 천천히 사라져 가겠지. 나는 글쎄... 메이지 길드랑 만나볼 수 있을지 알아봐야겠구만. 내 도움을 필요로 할지도 모르지.\n\n분명 어떻게든 될 거라네.

Source: Yes, soldier. Thank you. We're giving the Covenant a good fight. \n\nWithout your warning, Davon's Watch would be in their hands. Feels good to save a city, doesn't it?
Target: 그렇네, 병사. 고맙네. 우린 대거폴 동맹에게 본때를 보여줄걸세.\n\n자네의 경고가 없었다면, 다본의 감시대는 그들의 손에 들어갔겠지. 도시를 구해서 기분이 좋지 않나?

Source: Post all farm scouting reports to this board.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: 이 게시판에 모든 농장 정찰 보고서를 게시하시오.\n\n- 드리트-휠름 서기관

Source: Farm scouting reports are to be posted to this board. Then collect your reward.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: 모든 농장 정찰 보고서는 이 임무 게시판에 게시하십시오. 그리고 당신의 보상을 받으십시오.\n\n- 드리트-휠름의 대리인

Source: Yes. I took care of him. He was a mage named Sanessalmo.
Target: 네. 처리했어요. 사네살모라는 남자더군요.

Source: I'm ready to put an end to the Worm Cult.
Target: I'm ready to put an end to the Worm Cult.

Source: Golden Jack is dead. I win.
Target: 골든 잭은 죽었다. 내가 이겼어.

Source: What about the corruption in the trees?
Target: 나무들의 오염은 어떻게 되었나요?

Source: I dropped them off.
Target: 넣어두고 왔죠.

Source: You did it!! That Pesky Wolf man got his butt kicked!! Would you happen to have picked up my laundry?
Target: 니가 해냈어!

Source: I have destroyed one of the vampires in Silvermist Castle. The Mistress of the Castle still survives, but it will be up to me to put together a force capable of combating her. Even the Ashen Order thinks that this may be a lost cause.
Target: 실버 미스트 성에서 뱀파이어 한마리를 죽였어요 성의 여주인은 여전히 살아 있지만, 그녀와 싸울 수 있는 병력을 모으는 것은 나에게 달려 있어요. 심지어 Ashen Order조차도 이 전투가 승산이 없다고 생각해요.\n

Source: <<1>> is dead. What'll happen now?
Target: <<1>>는 죽었어. 이제 어떻게 될까?

Source: <<1>> bought us enough time to save some of the eggs.
Target: <<1>> bought us enough time to save some of the eggs.

Source: Yes. The spriggans are avenged.
Target: 그렇소. 스프리건들의 복수가 이루어졌소.

Source: So you two are getting along now?
Target: 그래서, 당신들 두명은 이제 사이가 좀 좋아졌습니까?

Source: A job well done, then! No good would have come from such an unholy alliance.\n\nWhile you were gone, I decided to let Kip and his family go. Couldn't stand seeing his wife and daughter so distressed. I even tossed him a shirt and a pair of pants.
Target: A job well done, then! No good would have come from such an unholy alliance.\n\nWhile you were gone, I decided to let Kip and his family go. Couldn't stand seeing his wife and daughter so distressed. I even tossed him a shirt and a pair of pants.

Source: Is there anything else you need right now?
Target: 그 외에 당장 필요한게 있나요? [1]

Source: She wanted this alliance. It will save Evermore.
Target: She wanted this alliance. It will save Evermore.

Source: A job well done, then! No good would have come from such an unholy alliance.\n\nI suppose I'll let the poor sap go. In a bit. Teach him not to skulk around Lion Guard camps. And maybe I'll toss him a pair of pants to wear while I'm at it.
Target: A job well done, then! No good would have come from such an unholy alliance.\n\nI suppose I'll let the poor sap go. In a bit. Teach him not to skulk around Lion Guard camps. And maybe I'll toss him a pair of pants to wear while I'm at it.

Source: Glad to be of service. About my payment…
Target: Glad to be of service. About my payment…

Source: Yes. The spriggans are avenged.
Target: 그렇소. 스프리건들의 복수가 이루어졌소.

Source: What's my next step?
Target: 다음 단계는 뭐죠?

Source: What happened?
Target: 무슨 일이야?

Source: To think that necromancer at Tava's Blessing had such dark plans. Thank the gods you stopped him!
Target: 타바의 축복에 있던 강령술사에게 그런 사악한 계획이 있었다니! 당신이 그를 막아준 것에 대해 신께 감사드려요!

Source: Yes, our work here is done. Now we must turn our attention to the traitorous Baron Montclair.\n\nBut before we go, know that I am grateful you saved my sister. I just hope that your mercy doesn't turn out to be a terrible mistake.
Target: 그래, 여기서 우리가 할 일은 다 했어. 이제 배신자 몽클레어 남작에게 주의를 돌려야 해.\n\n하지만 떠나기 전에, 내 동생을 구해줘서 고마워. 네 자비가 나중에 끔찍한 실수가 되지 않길 바랄 뿐이야.

Source: I've always found that werewolves aren't too hard to kill. Nasty brutes, sure, but they're always dumb as the curs they take after.\n\nStill, you've certainly bloodied your hands to my satisfaction. And that deserves a key.
Target: 난 늑대인간이 항상 죽이기 힘든 상대가 아니라는 걸 알았어. 물론, 불쾌한 짐승들이긴 하지만 그들이 기르는 똥개들만큼이나 멍청했지.\n\n그래도, 네 피 묻은 손을 보니 만족스러워. 그러니 열쇠를 받아 마땅해.

Source: Slaughtering your way through a bunch of cursed curs is one thing. But defeating Vykosa? If the legends are true, she's been hunted for centuries. And here you are, the one who finally put her down.\n\nHere's your spoils. You certainly earned them.
Target: 네가 지나온 길에 도살한 저주받은 무리는 무난해. 하지만 비코사를 쓰러뜨렸다고? 전설이 사실이라면, 그녀는 수 세기 동안 사냥 당했어. 그리고 네가 마침내 그 사냥의 종지부를 찍었지.\n\n여기 보상이야. 넌 받을 자격이 있어.

Source: I spoke with <<1>> before he died. He would have wanted you to have this.
Target: I spoke with <<1>> before he died. He would have wanted you to have this.

Source: You're welcome. Now, go back to your husband.
Target: 천만에요. 이제 남편분께 돌아가세요.

Source: I got an autographed book for you … but I discovered something.
Target: I got an autographed book for you … but I discovered something.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: Hircine's little challenge was nothing against your might. And hey, not everyone has the guts to wade through a Daedric Prince's backyard of monstrosities for bragging rights. \n\nThat earns you a key, I'd say.
Target: 허씬의 작은 과제는 네 힘 앞에 아무것도 아니구나. 그리고 이봐, 모두가 괴물로 가득한 데이드라 군주의 뒷마당을 헤치고 나갈 베짱이 있는 건 아니야.\n\n그러니 넌 내게 열쇠를 받을 자격이 있어.

Source: Chasing down a ferocious beast in a Daedric realm while being hounded by werewolves and worse is no easy task. Here's your well-earned key and cut.
Target: 데이드라 영역에서 늑대인간과 그보다 심한 것들과 함께  흉포한 짐승을 사냥하는 것은 쉬운 일이 아니야. 여기 네 열쇠와 보상금이야.

Source: You heard the fetching stag. It's me or him.\n\nStill, none of this is your fault. I may not be able to grant you a boon, but here. You deserve a reward for helping me so greatly.
Target: 화려한 사슴이 하는 소리를 들었지. 나 아니면 그를 선택해야 해.\n\n어쨌든, 이건 네 잘못이 아니야. 네게 허씬의 축복을 줄 수는 없지만, 이거 받아. 나를 도와준 것에 대한 보답이야.

Source: Hunting down a murderous indrik, tearing out its heart, and then taking that trophy back from your strongest rival? Now that's a worthy tale.\n\nTake your spoils. You earned them.
Target: 살인적인 인드릭을 사냥하고, 심장을 찢어 내고, 그리고 강력한 적수에게서 다시 전리품을 되찾았다고? 그거 참 가치있는 이야기구나.\n\n여기 전리품 가져가. 받을 자격이 있어.

Source: I am. But first we should take a moment to acknowledge your achievement. A Psijic must never sacrifice the present at the cost of an uncertain future.\n\nTake this as a reward, ceruval. I suspect you will find a use for it before long.
Target: I am. But first we should take a moment to acknowledge your achievement. A Psijic must never sacrifice the present at the cost of an uncertain future.\n\nTake this as a reward, ceruval. I suspect you will find a use for it before long.

Source: Excellent! You won't regret this decision, I swear.\n\nHere's the deed and key to the room. Took me a while, but I finally was able to take them back from the last tenant. Required more time in the sewers than I had hoped for, but hey, that's business.
Target: Excellent! You won't regret this decision, I swear.\n\nHere's the deed and key to the room. Took me a while, but I finally was able to take them back from the last tenant. Required more time in the sewers than I had hoped for, but hey, that's business.

Source: Let me see their orders. Yes, yes. Very interesting. This is excellent work. Excellent!\n\nThe King, his son, and the other Pact leaders can safely focus on dealing with Orcthane Fildgor now, thanks to you.
Target: Let me see their orders. Yes, yes. Very interesting. This is excellent work. Excellent!\n\nThe King, his son, and the other Pact leaders can safely focus on dealing with Orcthane Fildgor now, thanks to you.

Source: I received word that General Yeveth Noramil and Eyes-of-Steel will meet with me. I'll show them the respect they deserve and work to strengthen our alliance.\n\nOnce again, your aid advances our cause. You have my gratitude.
Target: 예베스 노라밀 장군과 아이즈-오브-스틸이 나를 만날 것이라는 소식을 들었다. 나는 그들에게 그들이 마땅히 받아야 할 존경을 보여주고 우리의 동맹을 강화하기 위해 노력할 것이다.\n\n다시 한 번, 당신의 원조는 우리의 대의에 도움이 된다. 고맙게 생각한다.

Source: This may be your last chance to.
Target: This may be your last chance to.

Source: Wonderful! The refugees will be delighted. I'll find out who these items belong to and hand them back.
Target: 훌륭하군요! 피난민들이 기뻐하겠어요. 이것들이 누구 물건인지 알아내서 되돌려주도록 할게요.

Source: What was that?
Target: 그건 뭐였죠?

Source: Vampires were using the mist to create thralls of your hunters.
Target: 뱀파이어들이 안개를 이용해서 사냥꾼들을 노예로 만들었더군요.

Source: Here's the cup.
Target: 여기 잔이에요.

Source: We are very close now. The servants of Hermaeus Mora and their insatiable hunger for hoarding knowledge are all that stand in our way.\n\nYou have already diverted the tides in our favor, and you shall be rewarded.
Target: We are very close now. The servants of Hermaeus Mora and their insatiable hunger for hoarding knowledge are all that stand in our way.\n\nYou have already diverted the tides in our favor, and you shall be rewarded.

Source: You can ask his assistant Anenwen if you don't believe me.
Target: 못믿으시겠다면 메로모의 조수인 아넨웬한테 물어 보세요.

Source: Know this as well—Hermaeus Mora is generous with his servants.\n\nYou will be rewarded greatly if we rid these ruins of that foul creature and her half-witted followers.
Target: Know this as well—Hermaeus Mora is generous with his servants.\n\nYou will be rewarded greatly if we rid these ruins of that foul creature and her half-witted followers.

Source: Good work. Bears just seem attracted to that area, for some reason. A new one will show up sooner or later. But at least we can add another bear-skin rug to the pile.
Target: 잘 해 주었소. 이유는 몰라도, 곰들이 그 지역에 꾀어드는 것 같소. 새로운 녀석이 머잖아 나타나겠지. 하지만 적어도 곰가죽 양탄자를 하나 더 깔아놓을 수는 있을 것이오.

Source: I don't know. I just heard you needed help.
Target: 몰라. 난 니가 도와달란 말만 들었어.

Source: What happens now?
Target: 그래서 이제 어떻게 되는 거지?

Source: <Add Linele and Lolann's names to the logbook.>
Target: <Add Linele and Lolann's names to the logbook.>

Source: TALK
Target: TALK

Source: I'm listening.
Target: 말씀하십시오.

Source: I've read those two books and talked to your very odd friend.
Target: I've read those two books and talked to your very odd friend.

Source: I'll help you however I can, Your Majesty.
Target: 제가 할 수 있는 무엇이든지 돕겠습니다, 폐하.

Source: Thetis is confident the lake will be pure in a matter of days, and does not need further help.
Target: 테티스는 호수가 며칠 안에 깨끗하게 될 것이고 더 이상 도움이 필요하지 않을 것이라고 확신한다.

Source: That was an admirable showing. Even in defeat, you represented Windhelm and the Pact with honor.\n\nSadly, Hadring was murdered during the race. Felled by a poisoned arrow of Orcish design. I'm convinced the Stormfists are responsible.
Target: 아주 대단했어요. 비록 패배했지만 당신은 윈드헬름과 에본하트 팩트를 아주 영광스럽게 대표했습니다.\n\n슬프게도 해드링은 경기중에 살해당했어요. 독이 묻은 오크의 화살에 맞고 쓰러졌어요. 폭풍주먹 부족이 거기에 대한 책임이 있다고 확신합니다.

Source: I have the <<zA:1>>.
Target: I have the <<zA:1>>.

Source: I'm here to help.
Target: 도와주러왔어요.

Source: I think your Worm Cult problems are settled, for now at least.
Target: I think your Worm Cult problems are settled, for now at least.

Source: I meant it. You were trying to save lives, right?
Target: 진심으로 한 말이었어요. 당신은 생명을 구하려 했잖아요. 그렇죠?

Source: I'll go immediately.
Target: I'll go immediately.

Source: The box has been clicked, meaning has flooded your life.
Target: The box has been clicked, meaning has flooded your life.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 하실 건가요?

Source: I have the <<zA:1>>.
Target: I have the <<zA:1>>.

Source: So Count Hosni's back to normal -- thanks to you, eh, stranger?
Target: So Count Hosni's back to normal -- thanks to you, eh, stranger?

Source: I have the <<zA:1>>.
Target: I have the <<zA:1>>.

Source: I'll go immediately.
Target: I'll go immediately.

Source: Why am I on a ship?
Target: Why am I on a ship?

Source: Why am I on a ship?
Target: Why am I on a ship?

Source: Bought your way out of some trouble at Dreughside, I hear.
Target: Bought your way out of some trouble at Dreughside, I hear.

Source: So, you threw Baron Sorick to the wolves! He deserved it.
Target: So, you threw Baron Sorick to the wolves! He deserved it.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I have the sap.
Target: I have the sap.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I completed a contract.
Target: 계약을 마쳤습니다.

Source: I have <<zA:1>>.
Target: I have <<zA:1>>.

Source: I'm sure your faith will be rewarded someday.
Target: 분명 당신의 믿음은 언젠가 보상받을 거에요.

Source: I'm glad to hear it. Raerana said you might reward me.
Target: 말씀을 들으니 다행입니다. 레라나는 당신이 나에게 보상을 줄지도 모른다고 하던데요.

Source: Sorry, I couldn't work out a deal for you.
Target: 죄송하지만, 협상을 성사시키지 못했어요.

Source: I have the <<zA:1>>s.
Target: I have the <<zA:1>>s.

Source: <Hand over the instructions.>
Target: <Hand over the instructions.>

Source: Can I have my cake now?
Target: Can I have my cake now?

Source: Why do you think the Litany of Blood contains targets?
Target: Why do you think the Litany of Blood contains targets?

Source: Variah died, but I destroyed a shadow array and freed her soul.
Target: Variah died, but I destroyed a shadow array and freed her soul.

Source: What happens now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 되는 거죠?

Source: Yes, I'm ready.
Target: 준비 됐어요.

Source: We'll show Marieve the hospitality of the Mages Guild. Make sure she's fully recovered from her ordeal. Then I get her back home.\n\nThanks for your aid in this matter. I may not be an oracle, but I have a feeling we'll see each other again, my friend.
Target: 우리 메이지 길드가 마리브를 돌봐줄 것이네. 반드시 그녀를 완전히 회복시킬 걸세. 그 후에는 그녀를 집에 돌려보내 주어야겠지.\n\n이 일을 도와주어 고맙네. 이제 서머셋에 가서도 최선을 다해주게, 친구!

Source: Very well. I hereby authorize you to execute duties on behalf of the Divine Prosecution.\n\nSeek Justiciars Farowel and Tanorian for your first assignments. They handle the administration of all contracts.
Target: Very well. I hereby authorize you to execute duties on behalf of the Divine Prosecution.\n\nSeek Justiciars Farowel and Tanorian for your first assignments. They handle the administration of all contracts.

Source: The most valuable gift—knowledge! Please, use it carefully. When I learned my first spell, I accidentally banished a toad to the far ends of time! At least I think I did. It hasn't come back yet.\n\nCongratulations! You've earned it—and my thanks.
Target: 가장 가치있는 선물이지 — 바로 지식이야! 제발 신중하게 사용해야해. 난 처음에 마법을 배웠을때, 실수로 두꺼비를 시간의 끝으로 추방해 버렸거든! 적어도 난 그렇게 생각했지. 아직도 그 두꺼비는 돌아오지 못했어. \n\n암튼 축하해! 넌 그걸 받을 만 해 — 그리고 고마워.

Source: Talk to <<1>>
Target: <<1>>와(과) 대화하기

Source: QUEST: Out of the Camp
Target: QUEST: Out of the Camp

Source: You have a plan for how to deal with Euraxia?
Target: 유라시아를 끝장 계획이 뭔가요?

Source: The assassin killed the Dragonguard, but we did acquire the Anequina Dragonhorn.
Target: 암살자들이 드래곤가드를 죽였어, 하지만 우리가 아네퀴나의 드래곤 뿔 나팔을 회수해왔어.

Source: This particular danger has passed, but I will alert my colleagues in the Psijic Order to be on their guard. I suggest that you and these others remain vigilant as well.\n\nIn the meantime, take this as a token of my appreciation.
Target: This particular danger has passed, but I will alert my colleagues in the Psijic Order to be on their guard. I suggest that you and these others remain vigilant as well.\n\nIn the meantime, take this as a token of my appreciation.

Source: Normally, I'd dispatch every soldier at my disposal to deal with these geysers. However, the ongoing war has depleted our forces. It might be time to reach out to more people like you and Cainar's adventurers.\n\nFor now, take this with my thanks.
Target: Normally, I'd dispatch every soldier at my disposal to deal with these geysers. However, the ongoing war has depleted our forces. It might be time to reach out to more people like you and Cainar's adventurers.\n\nFor now, take this with my thanks.

Source: I brought four Dark Acolytes to the central altar in Glaes Maar, where they were overcome by spirits.  In gratitude for my actions, Claude combined the souls within Crystalwan with the Maarsword, giving me an item of great power.
Target: 난 4개의 다크 아콜라이트를 글레이스 마아르의 중앙 제단으로 가져갔고, 거기서 그들은 영혼에 의해 극복되었어. 내가 한 행동에 기뻐하며 클로드는 크리스탈완 안에 있는 영혼들을 마르스 워드 퍼드와 결합하였고 나에게 엄청난 힘을 주었어.\n

Source: Thank you for asking. I'm feeling better already. It's certainly a relief to know the other Wardens are safe.\n\nI'll be able to get back to the abbey soon. Perhaps I'll see you there.
Target: Thank you for asking. I'm feeling better already. It's certainly a relief to know the other Wardens are safe.\n\nI'll be able to get back to the abbey soon. Perhaps I'll see you there.

Source: Now that you've removed the <<1>>, the Stone Chewer goblins will retrieve the <<2>> and return to their cave. \n\nIn addition to helping <<3>> get revenge, I've helped save Cumberland's Watch!
Target: Now that you've removed the <<1>>, the Stone Chewer goblins will retrieve the <<2>> and return to their cave. \n\nIn addition to helping <<3>> get revenge, I've helped save Cumberland's Watch!

Source: I defeated the nereid and recovered these goods.
Target: 네레이드를 쓰러뜨리고 물건을 회수했어.

Source: Hadaz didn't make it, but I wrecked the cultists' operation and took their enchanted hammer.
Target: Hadaz didn't make it, but I wrecked the cultists' operation and took their enchanted hammer.

Source: Here's a trophy from my kill.
Target: 여기 사냥 전리품이야.

Source: I rescued the animals. Did they all make it back safely?
Target: I rescued the animals. Did they all make it back safely?

Source: Here's a trophy from my kill.
Target: 여기 사냥 전리품이야.

Source: I'm sure the people still believe in you.
Target: I'm sure the people still believe in you.

Source: And you're all right with Khamira accompanying us?
Target: 카미라가 우리랑 동행해도 괜찮을까요?

Source: I did what I could.
Target: 제가 할 수 있는 것을 했을 뿐입니다.

Source: That's excellent news! Despite my misgivings, it seems the Queen's decree has been more of a blessing than a curse. I'm not sure what we would have done without the help of newcomers like you. You have my thanks and the gratitude of all of Summerset.
Target: That's excellent news! Despite my misgivings, it seems the Queen's decree has been more of a blessing than a curse. I'm not sure what we would have done without the help of newcomers like you. You have my thanks and the gratitude of all of Summerset.

Source: Here's the cup. Do you think you can break the spell?
Target: 잔은 여기 있어요. 주문을 깨뜨릴 수 있을 것 같아요?

Source: Cake? I don't know. This one came out so well, I might just keep it for myself.\n\nJust kidding! You earned this special cake. Wait until you taste it! I think you're going to be pleasantly surprised.
Target: 케이크? 잘 모르겠는걸. 이건 너무 잘 만들었어. 나 혼자만 먹어야겠는데.\n\n농담일세! 이 특별 케이크를 가져가게나. 어서 먹어 보게! 분명히 그 맛에 깜짝 놀라게 될 게야.

Source: What will you do then?
Target: What will you do then?

Source: I hope so.
Target: 그랬으면 좋겠소.

Source: Here's a trophy from my kill.
Target: 여기 사냥 전리품이야.

Source: Here's a trophy from my kill.
Target: 여기 사냥 전리품이야.

Source: High Priest Canning has survived the mysterious assassin's attack, but the ritual's failure unleashed evil spirits upon Camlorn. High Priest Canning is too weak to face the fiends himself - I must stop them.
Target: 고위 사제 케닝은 수수께끼의 암살자의 공격에서 살아 남았지만, 의식의 실패로인해 캠론에는 악령이 풀려났어. 케닝은 너무 약해서 자신을 감당할 수가 없어. 나는 악령들을 멈춰야해.\n

Source: I'm with you. Do you have a plan for stopping the Dragons?
Target: 너와 함께 있을게. 드래곤을 막을 계획이 있어?

Source: You might want to lie low for a while, Sun-in-Shadow.
Target: 잠깐 눈좀 붙이는건 어때. 그림자-속의-태양.

Source: I have the items you asked for.
Target: 여기 요청했던 물건들이야.

Source: What do we do now, Khamira?
Target: 이제 우린 어쩌지, 카미라?

Source: You should stay. Your dream of being a healer still means something. History can't change that.
Target: You should stay. Your dream of being a healer still means something. History can't change that.

Source: You should leave. You can't let this place or its failings define you.
Target: You should leave. You can't let this place or its failings define you.

Source: Here's a trophy from my kill.
Target: 여기 사냥 전리품이야.

Source: Here's a trophy from my kill.
Target: 여기 사냥 전리품이야.

Source: Here's a trophy from my kill.
Target: 여기 사냥 전리품이야.

Source: Most certainly. I hereby ordain you officially certified in the art of jewelry crafting. You may begin fulfilling writs immediately.\n\nHere's a small reward to get you started in your journey.
Target: Most certainly. I hereby ordain you officially certified in the art of jewelry crafting. You may begin fulfilling writs immediately.\n\nHere's a small reward to get you started in your journey.

Source: Yes, given your experience with the craft, that seems to be in order. \n\nI am pleased to officially certify you in the art of jewelry crafting. You are free to fulfill any writs you may find at your leisure.
Target: Yes, given your experience with the craft, that seems to be in order. \n\nI am pleased to officially certify you in the art of jewelry crafting. You are free to fulfill any writs you may find at your leisure.

Source: Your cousin asked me to give you this letter.
Target: Your cousin asked me to give you this letter.

Source: About my reward ….
Target: About my reward ….

Source: I killed the cultists and stopped their rituals.
Target: 광신도들을 죽이고 의식을 막아냈어요.

Source: I dealt with the Hunger.
Target: 헝거를 처리했어.

Source: I was able to stop Dubdil Alar and gather his research notes.
Target: 덥딜 알라르를 멈추고 연구메모를 모았어.

Source: Yes, he commissioned this on the announcement of our wedding … gaudy thing. He's dead you say? Just like Durell to leave me a mess to clean up.\n\nKeep that bauble for your trouble. It must be worth something to someone.
Target: Yes, he commissioned this on the announcement of our wedding … gaudy thing. He's dead you say? Just like Durell to leave me a mess to clean up.\n\nKeep that bauble for your trouble. It must be worth something to someone.

Source: You did? Well, I'll be taking that. Wouldn't want it to go to waste, after all.\n\nThanks again for all you've done. These two would have never been able to make it out, if not for you. This reward isn't much, but it's the best I can do.
Target: You did? Well, I'll be taking that. Wouldn't want it to go to waste, after all.\n\nThanks again for all you've done. These two would have never been able to make it out, if not for you. This reward isn't much, but it's the best I can do.

Source: So what do we do about the Dragons?
Target: So what do we do about the Dragons?

Source: Well, that's a relief. For now, at least.\n\nI'm afraid the situation has grown more … complicated. But we can discuss that later. For now, you've done the Order proud. You're clearly ready to take your next steps. Use this wisely.
Target: 그래, 우선은 잘 됐어.\n\n상황이 보다 복잡해지는 것 같지만... 그건 나중에 논의하자. 넌 시직의 자랑이야. 다음 단계로 갈 준비가 되어있는 건 분명해. 이걸 현명하게 쓰도록 해.

Source: Someone was going to be executed?
Target: Someone was going to be executed?

Source: It's about time someone put a stop to the skooma trade here. You are a hero, my friend.
Target: It's about time someone put a stop to the skooma trade here. You are a hero, my friend.

Source: There is too much skooma coming into the Alik'r. Someone needs to stop these Bandaari!
Target: There is too much skooma coming into the Alik'r. Someone needs to stop these Bandaari!

Source: What else do you need me to do, Councilor?
Target: 달리 필요한게 있나, 평의원?

Source: With <<1>> appeased, we will continue to do what we do best. While I am sure Jode's Chariot will try to stop us, they will never blot us out entirely, no?\n\nThank you, my friend. We would not be here without your help.
Target: <<1>>를 달래주고 나면 최선을 다해서 우리 일을 계속해 나가야지. 조드의 전차대가 분명 우리를 막으려 하겠지만, 우릴 완전히 엎어버리진 않을 테니까. 안 그래?\n\n고마워, 친구. 당신 도움이 없었으면 이렇게 해낼 순 없었을 거야.

Source: I found this note on the island.
Target: 이 쪽지를 섬에서 발견했어.

Source: She did? That is funny, but I do not expect she will follow through.\n\nRegardless of her path though, I am grateful she will not interfere with mine, and for that, I have you to thank.
Target: She did? That is funny, but I do not expect she will follow through.\n\nRegardless of her path though, I am grateful she will not interfere with mine, and for that, I have you to thank.

Source: The Winterborn took the stolen supplies to Frostbreak Fortress.
Target: 윈터본이 서리붕괴 요새로 도난당한 물품들을 가져갔습니다.

Source: The grumps have been cheered, my queen.
Target: 투덜이들이 환호성을 질렀나이다, 여왕이시여.

Source: Consider it returned. The grotto belongs to the Wyrd once again, but more importantly, to you.\n\nI'll be watching you, mortal. A larger hunt looms in your future, one I'll watch with great interest.
Target: 보상이라고 생각하거라. 암굴은 다시 한번 위어드의 것이 되었지만, 더 중요한 건 너이니라.\n\n널 지켜볼 것이다, 필멸자여. 네 미래에 더 큰 사냥이 어렴풋이 보이는구나. 큰 관심을 가지고 지켜볼 것이다.

Source: As long as the two of you weren't injured. That would have been tragic.\n\nWell, we'll all sleep a little better knowing that the dead have been laid to rest. Take this as a token of my appreciation.
Target: As long as the two of you weren't injured. That would have been tragic.\n\nWell, we'll all sleep a little better knowing that the dead have been laid to rest. Take this as a token of my appreciation.

Source: Just give me a second, and I'll head back home. I knew <<1>> wouldn't leave me here to rot.\n\n<<2>> will be worried sick. Thank you!
Target: 그냥 조금만 쉬다가 집으로 돌아가겠소. <<1>>가 날 여기 썩어두도록 내버려두지 않을 줄 알았지.\n\n<<2>>가 엄청 걱정하겠군. 고맙소!

Source: Yes. I was able to find something suitable within the keep's stores.\n\nTake it, along with the knowledge that you have done both the Silver Dawn and all of Tamriel a great service. Your actions today have saved many. Be proud.
Target: 네. 요새의 창고에서 쓸만한 것을 찾을 수 있었어요.\n\n받아요, 실버 던과 탐리엘 전체를 위해 한 사실들과 함께 가져가세요. 당신은 오늘 많은 이를 구했어요. 자랑스러워 하세요.

Source: I've got to admit, the Moon Hunter Pack was something else. It's not everyday that werewolves are able to take over a Silver Dawn base! But in the end, even they couldn't go up against a true Undaunted.\n\nYour key and cut, as promised.
Target: 그래 인정할께, 문 헌터 무리는 뭔가 있어. 늑대인간이 실버 던의 기지를 점령하는 건 일상적인 일이 아니지! 하지만 결국, 진정한 언던티드에게는 당해내지 못 하는 군.\n\n여기 약속대로 열쇠와 보상이야.

Source: I'll help you however I can.
Target: 할 수 있는 만큼 도와드리겠습니다.

Source: The threats we face are grave indeed. Fortunately, the Old Ways always provide. Wisdom in the face of uncertainty. Patience in the face of turmoil. And of course, strength in the face of danger.\n\nTake this, initiate. And my thanks.
Target: The threats we face are grave indeed. Fortunately, the Old Ways always provide. Wisdom in the face of uncertainty. Patience in the face of turmoil. And of course, strength in the face of danger.\n\nTake this, initiate. And my thanks.

Source: What happens now?
Target: 무슨일이야?

Source: I retrieved the meat and got rid of the poachers.
Target: 나는 고기를 꺼내서 밀렵꾼들을 처치했다.\n

Source: What happens now?
Target: 무슨일이야?

Source: What happened?
Target: 무슨 일이야?

Source: Excellent. And by your own admission, he's dead. I honestly can't think of a better conclusion to this whole affair. I'll just say he was kidnapped or some such.\n\nHere's a reward, both for delivering the letter and keeping this matter … discreet.
Target: Excellent. And by your own admission, he's dead. I honestly can't think of a better conclusion to this whole affair. I'll just say he was kidnapped or some such.\n\nHere's a reward, both for delivering the letter and keeping this matter … discreet.

Source: My, don't these beauties look tempting. Perhaps I'll have a few sips. Just to get me going before I set off on the road. \n\nHere's your reward, for services rendered and all that.
Target: My, don't these beauties look tempting. Perhaps I'll have a few sips. Just to get me going before I set off on the road. \n\nHere's your reward, for services rendered and all that.

Source: Here's your book. And <<1>> is dead.
Target: 자 여기 네 책. 그리고 <<1>>는 죽었어.

Source: What do the genealogies tell you?
Target: 계보로 뭘 알수 있지?

Source: Do you have a plan?
Target: 계획이 있으십니까?

Source: All right.
Target: 알겠어요.

Source: Are you going to be all right?
Target: 괜찮으시겠나요?

Source: <<1>> sent me to help deal with the unrest.
Target: <<1>>께서 이 불만을 해소할 수 있도록 저를 보내셨습니다.

Source: What does that mean?
Target: 그게 무슨 소리야?

Source: <<1>> knew his monks could not defend <<2>> from the Kahgesh Ashlanders. He asked me to appeal to the Tribunal for aid. Almalexia's messenger told me how to summon and gain the aid of the Ordinators who previously defended the temple.
Target: <<1>> knew his monks could not defend <<2>> from the Kahgesh Ashlanders. He asked me to appeal to the Tribunal for aid. Almalexia's messenger told me how to summon and gain the aid of the Ordinators who previously defended the temple.

Source: Here are the relics I recovered.
Target: 여기 되찾은 유물이야.

Source: Here are the relics I recovered.
Target: 여기 되찾은 유물이야.

Source: The corruption is cleansed and Corintthac is dead.
Target: 타락은 정화되고 코린 택은 죽었다.\n

Source: Here are the relics I recovered.
Target: 여기 되찾은 유물이야.

Source: What does that mean?
Target: 그게 무슨 소리야?

Source: Here are the relics I recovered.
Target: 여기 되찾은 유물이야.

Source: Then it's decided. Thank you for your counsel. Both King Alard and myself will be in your debt.\n\nAfter all you've done, there's no reward that can express my gratitude, but please accept this gift. I'd feel guilty if I didn't give you something.
Target: Then it's decided. Thank you for your counsel. Both King Alard and myself will be in your debt.\n\nAfter all you've done, there's no reward that can express my gratitude, but please accept this gift. I'd feel guilty if I didn't give you something.

Source: I think you did the right thing, Sun-in-Shadow.
Target: 당신은 옳은 일을 한거야. 그림자-속의-태양.

Source: Then it's decided. Thank you for your counsel. Both Queen Eselde and myself will be in your debt.\n\nAfter all you've done, there's no reward that can express my gratitude, but please accept this gift. I'd feel guilty if I didn't give you something.
Target: Then it's decided. Thank you for your counsel. Both Queen Eselde and myself will be in your debt.\n\nAfter all you've done, there's no reward that can express my gratitude, but please accept this gift. I'd feel guilty if I didn't give you something.

Source: A bonus you're willing to share?
Target: 보수는 나눠 줄 거지?

Source: Are you sure this is what you want?
Target: 이게 정말 당신이 원하는거야?

Source: Here are the relics from the shrine.
Target: 여기 되찾은 유물이야.

Source: Here are the relics I recovered.
Target: 여기 되찾은 유물이야.

Source: I found it in a <<z:1>>.
Target: I found it in a <<z:1>>.

Source: What should we do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 해야 하죠?

Source: What should we do now?
Target: What should we do now?

Source: Here are the relics I recovered.
Target: 여기 되찾은 유물이야.

Source: I'm not sure, but here are the relics.
Target: I'm not sure, but here are the relics.

Source: I found this note on the island.
Target: 이 쪽지를 섬에서 발견했어.

Source: Sure enough. This looks like my cousin's writing. He was supposed to return yesterday.\n\nThank you. I know you didn't have to do this. I … I'm going to need some time to think about this.
Target: Sure enough. This looks like my cousin's writing. He was supposed to return yesterday.\n\nThank you. I know you didn't have to do this. I … I'm going to need some time to think about this.

Source: I accept your statement and will render judgement accordingly. Whether or not he intended to do harm, his actions are in violation of acceptable conduct.\n\nGiven his lack of remorse, he will be imprisoned until his debt to society is repaid.
Target: I accept your statement and will render judgement accordingly. Whether or not he intended to do harm, his actions are in violation of acceptable conduct.\n\nGiven his lack of remorse, he will be imprisoned until his debt to society is repaid.

Source: Yes, I disrupted the obelisks and destroyed <<1>>.
Target: 예, 나는 오벨 리스크를 파괴하고 << 1 >>을 파괴했습니다.\n

Source: I present your Princess, majesty.
Target: 폐하의 공주를 드리나이다.

Source: I heard you helped the Deepcrag miners. That was mighty brave of you.
Target: I heard you helped the Deepcrag miners. That was mighty brave of you.

Source: Given that your testimony is the only real evidence I have, I see no reason to continue dragging out this affair. Eslion will be fined for trespassing and criminal mischief then released.\n\nIf I see him here again, he will be jailed.
Target: Given that your testimony is the only real evidence I have, I see no reason to continue dragging out this affair. Eslion will be fined for trespassing and criminal mischief then released.\n\nIf I see him here again, he will be jailed.

Source: Yes, I defeated <<1>>.
Target: 맞아, 내가 <<1>>을(를) 처리했어.

Source: Some of the lizard folk were attacked in Silent Mire. It's just an old swamp, so at least nothing valuable was ruined.
Target: 도마뱀 촌놈들 몇 놈이 사일런트 마이어 (Silent Mire)에서 공격당했습니다. 그것은 오래된 늪 일 뿐이니, 파괴될 귀중한 것도 없죠.

Source: I had a brother at Firebrand Keep. I mourn his loss, but I am grateful you restored order there.
Target: 파이어 브랜드에 내 형제가 있었다. 그의 손실을 애도하지만, 당신이 명령을 내려 주어서 감사하네.

Source: They escaped with the Ansei Wards.
Target: 그들은 Ansei Wards와 함께 탈출했다.

Source: I'm not sure. There are so many memories here, but we can't keep the farm in good order with just the two of us.\n\nMayla and I might travel for awhile. Visit Shornhelm. Or Wayrest. We'll make a new life for ourselves, thanks to you.
Target: 잘 모르겠군요. 여기에 저희들의 많은 기억들이 남아있긴 하지만, 저희 둘만으로는 이 농장을 잘 운영되게 할 수는 없어요.\n\n말리아와 저는 아마 얼마 정도 여행을 떠날 것 같군요. 숀헬름이나, 웨이레스트를 발문하면서요. 저희들 스스로 새로운 인생을 만들어 나가야겠죠. 정말 감사드려요.

Source: I killed the three hunters and the gryphon.
Target: 세명의 헌터들과 그리폰을 잡아왔어.

Source: <<1>>'s dead? Sad news, even if he did steal this bow from me.\n\nIt's a good thing you found it. I sort of owed it to a local treethane. Long story. I hope you'll accept this for a reward.
Target: <<1>>'s dead? Sad news, even if he did steal this bow from me.\n\nIt's a good thing you found it. I sort of owed it to a local treethane. Long story. I hope you'll accept this for a reward.

Source: Were you indeed?\n\n<<1>> sent you from <<2>>, did she? A bit dramatic of her, but she does have an eye for talented people. Perhaps you could put your talents to use.
Target: Were you indeed?\n\n<<1>> sent you from <<2>>, did she? A bit dramatic of her, but she does have an eye for talented people. Perhaps you could put your talents to use.

Source: Why did the Mane send an envoy?
Target: Why did the Mane send an envoy?

Source: Evidence we uncovered suggests Captain Brivan was somehow involved in Ulran's troubles.
Target: 우리가 밝혀낸 증거는 브리반 대장이 울란의 문제에 어떻게든 연관되어 있었다는 것을 암시해.

Source: If Bazrag ordered the attack on the temple, what should we do?
Target: Bazrag가 성전 공격을 명령했다면 우리는 무엇을해야합니까?\n

Source: Right …. I have your dog.
Target: Right …. I have your dog.

Source: The Riekr chieftain is dead, and I've rescued a few of your lost travelers.
Target: 리클의 우두머리는 죽었고, 당신의 실종된 여행자들 몇 명을 구해 줬습니다.

Source: I'm just glad I found you, Your Highness.
Target: 당신을 찾아서 영광입니다, 높으신 분이여.

Source: So Fildgor poisoned his own brother? And he expects the Nords to follow him? He's more foolish than I imagined.
Target: So Fildgor poisoned his own brother? And he expects the Nords to follow him? He's more foolish than I imagined.

Source: I'm searching for a hunter named Gloria Fausta.
Target: 글로리아 파우 스타(Gloria Fausta)라는 사냥꾼을 찾고 있습니다.

Source: Yes, I have it here.
Target: Yes, I have it here.

Source: <<1>> remains true to its name, then. I'm sorry to hear it. <<2>> might have been a dunderheaded double-crosser, but he was still my friend.\n\nI figure I owe you what the treethane paid me for the bow. Some thief I turned out to be, eh?
Target: 그럼 <<1>>이 그 이름대로 되어 버렸군요. 그 소식은 유감이네요. <<2>>는 무식한 배신자였을지는 몰라도, 그는 여전히 내 친구였습니다.\n\n나무 종사한테 받아야 할 활 값을 당신에게 빚진 것 같군요. 제가 도둑이라는걸 밝히는 값이라고 생각하시면 되겠군요, 안그래요?

Source: Not much. You've done extraordinary work. And just in time for <<1>>'s arrival!
Target: 거의 없어요. 놀라운 일을 해내셨네요. 그리고<<1>>님도 딱 좋은 때에 도착하셨고요!

Source: What's the next step?
Target: 다음 단계는?

Source: I have the stolen taxes and records right here.
Target: 도난당한 세금과 기록을 가져왔어.

Source: But what of Rhea's vision? What does it mean?
Target: 하지만 레아의 환영은? 그건 무슨 뜻이지?

Source: Because of you, the Pact was able to defend Vivec's Antlers.
Target: Because of you, the Pact was able to defend Vivec's Antlers.

Source: We'll interrogate <<1>> until we know the extent of her treason. Then she'll die, as all traitors must.\n\nBut no matter. Your efficiency in resolving this matter was commendable, and the Dominion rewards its servants.
Target: 반역의 정도를 알 때까지 <<1>>를 심문할 것이니라. 그리고 모든 반역자가 그렇듯 죽어야겠지.\n\n하지만 상관 없다. 이 문제를 해결한 네 유능함은 인정할 수 밖에 없구나. 그리고 자치령은 그 신하에게 보상을 주노라.

Source: That's a strange way to put it, but Adusa will not pry. I'm disappointed we can't interrogate the informer, but the threat has been taken care of.\n\nThank you.
Target: That's a strange way to put it, but Adusa will not pry. I'm disappointed we can't interrogate the informer, but the threat has been taken care of.\n\nThank you.

Source: My friend Sela's been talking about you! Thanks for helping her, and kicking out those corpse-eating lunatics.
Target: My friend Sela's been talking about you! Thanks for helping her, and kicking out those corpse-eating lunatics.

Source: That's my sister's journal. So sweet but so young and foolish. She was obsessed with the idea that trolls could be socialized.\n\nI knew this day would eventually come. I think it's time for another cup of mead. Thanks.
Target: That's my sister's journal. So sweet but so young and foolish. She was obsessed with the idea that trolls could be socialized.\n\nI knew this day would eventually come. I think it's time for another cup of mead. Thanks.

Source: I wish there was something I could give you by way of gratitude. But I'm an Elf of little means, and this pittance is all I have. It will have to be enough. Thank you.
Target: 감사의 표시로 뭔가 드릴 것이 있었으면 좋았을 텐데. 하지만 전 보잘것없는 엘프이고, 제가 가진 거라곤 이 푼돈이 전부네요. 이걸로 충분하다면 좋겠어요. 고마워요.

Source: I heard you drove those cannibals out of the Forgotten Crypts. Must've been a horrifying scene down there.
Target: I heard you drove those cannibals out of the Forgotten Crypts. Must've been a horrifying scene down there.

Source: You defended Fort Virac against General Serien. A friend of mine fought there!
Target: 당신이 세이렌 장군에 맞서 비락요새를 방어했지요.제 친구도 거기서 싸웠습니다.

Source: Can I have my cake now?
Target: 이제 케이크를 받아도 될까요?

Source: You're the one who killed Skull Crusher, aren't you? Brave Meeting!
Target: You're the one who killed Skull Crusher, aren't you? Brave Meeting!

Source: Taking the Chasm was necessary, but by the soul of Tu'whacca I would prefer never to have to fight over ground like that again.
Target: Taking the Chasm was necessary, but by the soul of Tu'whacca I would prefer never to have to fight over ground like that again.

Source: So was I meant to learn my true nature?
Target: 그래서 제가 제 본성에 대해 배워야만 했다는 건가요?

Source: It won't be me.
Target: 그건 내가 아니야.

Source: I found this note on the island.
Target: 이 쪽지를 섬에서 발견했어.

Source: I found this note on the island.
Target: 이 쪽지를 섬에서 발견했어.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I've eliminated my target.
Target: 나는 표적을 제거했다.

Source: Your people loved the dazzlers, majesty.
Target: 백성들이 폐하의 반짝이를 정말로 좋아했나이다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: I think so. All in one piece, anyway. If it weren't for you, I'd be spider meat. Thanks again.
Target: I think so. All in one piece, anyway. If it weren't for you, I'd be spider meat. Thanks again.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Here's your pay. Now get out of here. \n\nI got work to do. These samples need to be tested. And, uh, there's some damn dishes to wash.
Target: Here's your pay. Now get out of here. \n\nI got work to do. These samples need to be tested. And, uh, there's some damn dishes to wash.

Source: QUEST: Killed Lumpy
Target: QUEST: Killed Lumpy

Source: House Redoran spotted Orcs at Malak's Maw. They were harassing travelers. Everything's under control now, praise Almalexia!
Target: 레도란 가문은 말락의 나락에서 오크들을 목격했습니다. 그들은 여행객들을 괴롭히고 있었습니다. 지금은 모든 상황이 통제 하에 있습니다,아말렉시아를 찬양하라!

Source: The Sacrament is fulfilled.
Target: 검은성사를 마쳤습니다.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I reported Lord Sorick's crime to Padier Renoit, who grew even more furious upon hearing his suspicions confirmed. I do not think Sorick will live another day.
Target: 나는 귀족 소릭의 범죄를 Padier Renoit에게 보고했고 그는 혐의가 굳어진 것을 듣자 더욱 분노했다. 나는 소릭이 살아남지 못할 거라고 생각한다.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: You really can't hold your mead. Roruld's latest batch must have been pretty potent!\n\nThe Voljar name has always stood for fine mead. In memory of my wife, we plan to continue that tradition. Thanks for your help.
Target: You really can't hold your mead. Roruld's latest batch must have been pretty potent!\n\nThe Voljar name has always stood for fine mead. In memory of my wife, we plan to continue that tradition. Thanks for your help.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: It's beautiful! It'll definitely go on my mantle at home, if I ever get my house back from the Imperials.
Target: 아름다운데! 집에 있는 내 외투랑 딱 어울리겠어. 먼저 제국군한테서 내 집을 되찾아야 하겠지만 말이야.

Source: Excellent, yes? I'll let the commanders here know of our success.\n\nI hope we'll see each other again. Stay moist.
Target: 훌륭해, 그렇지? 지휘관에게 우리의 성공을 알려야겠어.\n\n다시 만날 수 있으면 좋겠어. 촉촉함을 유지하도록 해.

Source: I had it in my hands … and it vanished in that blinding light! Blasted Dwemer magic.\n\nThen those undead came, crawling from the ground. Perhaps the Eye woke them. Sep's tongue, something awful has befallen this place. We need to get clear.
Target: I had it in my hands … and it vanished in that blinding light! Blasted Dwemer magic.\n\nThen those undead came, crawling from the ground. Perhaps the Eye woke them. Sep's tongue, something awful has befallen this place. We need to get clear.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I hear Kaleen intends to head toward the isle of Betnikh. The ruins there greatly interest me. But first, I will assist you in this heist.
Target: 칼린 선장이 베스닉의 섬으로 향하려 한다는 얘기가 들리던데. 그 곳의 폐허는 나도 관심이 있던 참이야. 하지만 먼저, 네가 부탁한 일을 도와줄께.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: They'll build more, but you've slowed them down. The Shadowed Path will be a problem as long as this civil war lasts. After that, they're my next target.\n\nYou've earned this reward.
Target: 놈들이 더 세우겠지만, 네가 시간을 벌어준 셈이군. 그림자의 길은 내전이 지속되는 한은 문제거리가 될 거야. 내전이 끝나면, 놈들은 내 다음 목표물이 되겠지.\n\n이 보상을 받으라고.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: It's like the sun on your scales, isn't it? We almost lost these docks. All these people would have died without your intervention.\n\nThank you. Saving lives is never a small victory.
Target: 비늘을 비추는 태양과 같지, 그렇지 않나? 우린 거의 이 부두를 잃을 뻔 했어. 자네가 아니었다면 이 곳의 모든 사람들은 죽었을 거야.\n\n고맙네. 여러 목숨을 살린 것은 절대 사소한 승리가 아니지.

Source: The Summerset Isles are abuzz with the name Valaste. I'm proud a sister of Auridon would go so far in the Mages Guild!
Target: The Summerset Isles are abuzz with the name Valaste. I'm proud a sister of Auridon would go so far in the Mages Guild!

Source: Yes. This potion will turn you back.
Target: Yes. This potion will turn you back.

Source: Relish this new life I have given you. Feed and grow powerful.\n\nFind others of our kind. Form families. Bring new children into the fold!
Target: 내가 너에게 준 이 새로운 삶을 사랑하거라. 사냥하고 강하게 자라나거라.\n\n 우리와 같은 이들을 찾거라. 가족을 형성하거라. 새로운 아이들을 데려오너라!

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Excellent. To be honest, I wasn't sure you would return at all. \n\nThis is a favorable turn. Now we can secure this area and ensure it is not a weak link in our defense of the region. You have my gratitude.
Target: 굉장하군. 솔직히 말해서, 당신이 돌아올 수 있을지 전혀 확신하지 못했소.\n\n상황이 나아졌군. 이제 이 지역을 확보하고 지역 방어에 약점이 되지 않도록 조치를 취할 수 있겠소. 내 감사를 받아 주시구려.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I heard what happened at Moonmont, Hallowed. Moons be praised for your bravery.
Target: 달언덕에서 일어난 일을 들었습니다. 당신의 용감함에 달들의 찬사가 있길!

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: We'll proceed as planned. These ruins are too interesting to leave, despite our unhappy first impression.\n\nYou there, take this pittance as a reward. I need to have a word with my guide.
Target: We'll proceed as planned. These ruins are too interesting to leave, despite our unhappy first impression.\n\nYou there, take this pittance as a reward. I need to have a word with my guide.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: A gruesome trophy, to be sure, but we've thought him dead twice before, only to learn how painfully wrong we were.\n\nThere are many grieving families who will rejoice to hear of Sgolag's death. Here's your reward. It's well-earned.
Target: 확실히 섬뜩한 전리품이로군. 우린 전에도 두 번이나 놈이 죽었다고 생각했지만, 우리가 틀렸다는 사실을 뼈저리게 알게 되었을 뿐이었소.\n\n스골라그가 죽었다는 소식을 듣고 기뻐할 가족들이 정말 많소. 여기 보상이오. 받아 마땅하지.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Of course. He couldn't risk being captured.\n\nYou lived to tell the tale. I hear gold heals all wounds.
Target: 당연하지. 붙잡힐 위험을 감수할 수는 없는 사람이니까.\n\n넌 살아남아서 소식을 전해 줬지. 금화는 모든 상처를 치유할 수 있다던데.

Source: Can you believe the Reachmen raised Sinmur's ghost? It's a good thing you were there.
Target: Can you believe the Reachmen raised Sinmur's ghost? It's a good thing you were there.

Source: QUEST: What Little Aid
Target: 퀘스트: 미력한 지원

Source: Something no mortal's ever seen, until that nasty woman went in there, of course … and who knows what she might have done to the place …?\n\nI guess you'll be finding out soon enough though.
Target: 필멸자가 한번도 보지 못한 무언가가 펼쳐져 있지. 물론 그 고약한 여자가 들어가기 전까지는 말이지만... 그리고 그 여자가 거기서 무슨 짓을 했을지 누가 알겠는가...?\n\n곧 충분히 보게 될 것 같지만 말이야.

Source: I'll join the Thieves Guild.
Target: 도둑 길드에 들어 갈게요.

Source: I'll join the Thieves Guild.
Target: 도둑 길드에 들어 갈게요.

Source: You are free of Hircine's corruption. You were brave to face and kill his horrific beasts. Should you become infected again, you need only return to me and receive my blessing.
Target: You are free of Hircine's corruption. You were brave to face and kill his horrific beasts. Should you become infected again, you need only return to me and receive my blessing.

Source: Once a pup, now a wolf. Once prey, now a hunter. The blood of the true hunter, and the pack, is now yours. They are your only family, your only allegiance.\n\nHunt well.
Target: Once a pup, now a wolf. Once prey, now a hunter. The blood of the true hunter, and the pack, is now yours. They are your only family, your only allegiance.\n\nHunt well.

Source: I'll keep you in mind if anyone else gets captured. The soldiers insisted I give you this reward.
Target: 다른 녀석들이 붙잡힌다면 널 떠올려야겠어. 그 병사들이 너한테 이 보상을 줘야 한다고 우기더라고.

Source: Look here. If it isn't King Emeric's own champion. The hero of the Covenant!
Target: Look here. If it isn't King Emeric's own champion. The hero of the Covenant!

Source: Good. I hope we can take advantage of the confusion you've caused. But we must act soon, as they will quickly promote a new lieutenant from the ranks.
Target: 좋아. 네가 만들어낸 혼란으로 이득을 취할 수 있으면 좋겠군. 하지만 빨리 행동해야 해. 놈들이 자기네 중에서 누군가를 잽싸게 새로운 부관으로 승진시킬 테니까.

Source: Did you hear the tale of Sees-All-Colors? She betrayed the Fighters Guild to a Daedra!
Target: Did you hear the tale of Sees-All-Colors? She betrayed the Fighters Guild to a Daedra!

Source: Wonderful! This one hopes you found something that interests you.\n\nToo often, this harsh world becomes isolating. Finding companions can make it bearable, mm?  Here, a little something for your time.
Target: Wonderful! This one hopes you found something that interests you.\n\nToo often, this harsh world becomes isolating. Finding companions can make it bearable, mm?  Here, a little something for your time.

Source: Judging by this bag, it looks like he died for nothing. Figures. Now I got to find a miner who actually knows how to prospect. \n\nWell, I said I'd pay you, so here you are.
Target: Judging by this bag, it looks like he died for nothing. Figures. Now I got to find a miner who actually knows how to prospect. \n\nWell, I said I'd pay you, so here you are.

Source: QUEST: Join the Tavern Brawl
Target: 퀘스트: Tavern Brawl에 참가하기\n

Source: Nobody's going to find anything. Whatever Ghamborz thought he found, I'm running everything clean. His letter is worthless. I washed the dishes, thanks to you.\n\nIt's over. Nobody wins. Lessons learned for the both of us, that's all.
Target: Nobody's going to find anything. Whatever Ghamborz thought he found, I'm running everything clean. His letter is worthless. I washed the dishes, thanks to you.\n\nIt's over. Nobody wins. Lessons learned for the both of us, that's all.

Source: Yes, I do, thanks to you. \n\nYou've likely ensured my family will survive the winter. Thank you. Here, take this. I know it's not much but I can't let you walk away empty handed.
Target: Yes, I do, thanks to you. \n\nYou've likely ensured my family will survive the winter. Thank you. Here, take this. I know it's not much but I can't let you walk away empty handed.

Source: You take your money and get out of here.\n\nA shame Inguya won't be coming around anymore. I liked when she was nearby, if you know what I mean.
Target: You take your money and get out of here.\n\nA shame Inguya won't be coming around anymore. I liked when she was nearby, if you know what I mean.

Source: Good enough. You can figure the liz— I mean, Reeh-La didn't die for nothing. This batch of samples looks promising.\n\nHere's your money. Hopefully you don't find any more of my miners.
Target: Good enough. You can figure the liz— I mean, Reeh-La didn't die for nothing. This batch of samples looks promising.\n\nHere's your money. Hopefully you don't find any more of my miners.

Source: QUEST: The Battlebarge
Target: QUEST: The Battlebarge

Source: His lordship, the Baron over there, wants us to head inside, see what's going on, and secure the area. He wants us to be slow and careful so as not to damage his precious city.\n\nGood job getting that key, by the way. Now let's go save Northpoint.
Target: His lordship, the Baron over there, wants us to head inside, see what's going on, and secure the area. He wants us to be slow and careful so as not to damage his precious city.\n\nGood job getting that key, by the way. Now let's go save Northpoint.

Source: Ah, thrilling. I can just imagine the heroics. I'm sorry—most of the pleasures of old age are vicarious. \n\nAt least I still have my research, which you've helped immensely, I must add. Thank you.
Target: 아, 흥분되는구먼. 영웅들에 대한 이야기가 떠오를 지경이야. 미안하네. 늙은이는 대부분 즐거움을 간접적으로 느끼거든.\n\n아직도 연구할 것들이 남았지만, 자네가 크게 도와 주었지. 그 사실은 반드시 추가하겠네. 고맙군.

Source: Did you hear some cultists found an old Daedric shrine in Fungal Grotto? Killed all the Dreugh just to get at it.
Target: 당신은 몇몇 교단원들이 곰팡이 동굴에서 데이드릭 성소를 발견했다는 소문을 들으셨나요? 그 때문에 드레그 전부를 죽였다고 하네요.

Source: When I find Nedras, he's going to have some explaining to do!\n\nThank you for telling me. If you'll excuse me, I need to start planning how to track down my good-for-nothing brother!
Target: When I find Nedras, he's going to have some explaining to do!\n\nThank you for telling me. If you'll excuse me, I need to start planning how to track down my good-for-nothing brother!

Source: I need time to deal with this. I can't believe I'll never see Nedras again.\n\nThank … thank you for telling me the truth about him. Green keep you, stranger.
Target: I need time to deal with this. I can't believe I'll never see Nedras again.\n\nThank … thank you for telling me the truth about him. Green keep you, stranger.

Source: Good luck on the road, traveler. And if you find Kala's brother before she does, tell him he will need the blessings of Jone and Jode both to avoid my claws. Bah!
Target: 길에서 행운을 빌어요, 여행자님. 그리고 그녀가 찾기 전에 오빠를 찾으면 말해주세요. 내 발톱을 피하기 위해 존과 조드의 축복이 필요할 거라고. 하하!

Source: May Jone, Jode, and Yenadar watch you on the road, traveler. Kala's brother will be guiding your steps. She can feel it.
Target: 존, 조드 그리고 예나다르가 당신을 길에서 지켜주기를. 칼라의 오빠가 당신의 걸음을 인도 할 것입니다. 그녀는 그것을 느낄 수 있습니다.

Source: No, no. You know what? Don't apologize. This is just what I needed to hear. I'll go straight away to talk to Lorbash at the smithy. This is a new chapter for me!\n\nThank you for setting me straight, stranger.
Target: No, no. You know what? Don't apologize. This is just what I needed to hear. I'll go straight away to talk to Lorbash at the smithy. This is a new chapter for me!\n\nThank you for setting me straight, stranger.

Source: That's it, I've decided. Men are all mules. I'm going to march right over to the Dead Wolf, get ripping drunk. Maybe tomorrow I'll join the city guard. Bah!\n\nThanks for telling me, I guess. If you'll excuse me?
Target: That's it, I've decided. Men are all mules. I'm going to march right over to the Dead Wolf, get ripping drunk. Maybe tomorrow I'll join the city guard. Bah!\n\nThanks for telling me, I guess. If you'll excuse me?

Source: Ha! I look forward to the sounds of puking coming from across the river. Should make things safer around here for a day or two. Great job!
Target: 하! 강 건너편에서 토하는 소리가 들려오길 기대해야겠네. 하루이틀 정도는 이 주변 상황이 더 안전해질거야. 아주 잘 해 줬어!

Source: I don't know what we'd have done, living out the rest of our lives as cheese-eating rodents. Yech!\n\nIf I ever find that mage, I'm going to show him what it means to be vermin!
Target: 만약 네가 도와주지 않았으면, 우린 남은 생애를 치즈 먹는 설치류로 살았겠지. 웩!\n\n만약 그 마법사를 다시 만난다면, 스키버가 어떻게 사람을 무는지 가르쳐주겠어!

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Their worth is considerable. And we'd be able to keep our quotas as we build back up.\n\nYou're right. Thank you for letting me see beyond my rage.
Target: 이것들의 가치는 상당할테지. 그리고 우리의 몫을 채우는데 도움이 될거고.\n\n네 말이 맞아. 내 분노 너머를 보게 해줘서 정말 고마워.

Source: The spies drank from the goblet.
Target: 첩자들이 잔을 받았어.

Source: Very. What's our next move?
Target: 엄청나게 쾌활하던데요. 다음은 뭔가요?

Source: All of Wayrest is talking about you. You're a hero for taking down those Pellingares.
Target: 온 웨이레스트가  당신에 대해 이야기하고 있어요. 당신은 그 펠링게어 가족을 쓰러뜨린 영웅입니다.

Source: You've passed the challenges of the Mad God, restored me to sanity, and reclaimed this sanctuary for the Mages Guild. Somehow, my thanks seem small in comparison. But you have them. Thank you, adept. For all you've done.
Target: 당신은 미친 신의 도전을 통과하고, 내 정신을 회복 시켜 주었으며, 메이지 길드의 성소를 되찾아 주었네. 여하튼, 자네가 한 일에 비해 작은 감사이지만,정말이지 고맙네 . 자네가 한 모든 일들이 감사하네.

Source: Shor's bones! Thank you! I'd like to kill every one of those bandits, but I'm no fighter. I'm glad you are!\n\nKill a few for Dedring. I'll buy you a drink back at the village.
Target: 쇼어의 뼈이시여! 고맙네! 이 도적놈들을 전부 다 죽여버리고 싶지만, 난 전사가 아니야. 자네는 싸울 줄 알아서 다행이군!\n\n데드링을 위해 몇 놈을 죽여줘. 마을로 돌아가면 술 한잔 사지.

Source: The Heritance has expanded beyond Auridon? Damnit. \n\nI'll make sure the boss hears about your good work. Thanks for your service.
Target: 계승단이 아우리돈 너머까지 확장했단 말인가? 젠장.\n\n당신이 일을 잘 해냈다고 대장에게 확실히 말해주겠소. 도움에 감사드리오.

Source: Just glad I could help, Thane.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁩니다, 종사님.

Source: I'm glad to have entertained.
Target: I'm glad to have entertained.

Source: Why was the shard so vital to Gullveig?
Target: Why was the shard so vital to Gullveig?

Source: That's it?
Target: 그건가?

Source: A map.
Target: 지도야.

Source: Drillk, I need that keystone.
Target: Drillk, 내겐 키스톤이 필요해.

Source: Thank you, I think.
Target: Thank you, I think.

Source: What do you have to say?
Target: 무슨 말을 하려는 거지?

Source: What's wrong?
Target: 뭐가 문제야?

Source: Is it true? Did you really explore the Crypt of Hearts?
Target: 정말이야? 너 정말로 Crypt of Hearts를 탐험했어?

Source: I can't believe any of this. He wouldn't betray us. Would he?\n\nThank you for your help, but I need to be alone.
Target: 모든게 믿기지 않는군. 그가 우릴 배신했을 리 없어. 그가 우릴 배신했나?\n\n고맙네. 난 이제 혼자 있어야겠어.

Source: Kyne's gift! We'll head back to the village right now. Rana's going to flay his fool hide! I can't properly repay you, but please, take this. It was our mother's.
Target: 카인님의 선물이로군요! 저흰 일단 마을로 돌아갈게요. 라나가 이녀석의 멍청함을 꾸짖을 거에요! 정당한 보상을 할 방법이 없지만, 부디 이걸 받아주세요. 저희 어머니의 물건이에요.

Source: Yes. You've done as we agreed. Take this for your work.\n\nNow you will leave. Immediately. The secrets of the Spinner's shrine are not for outsiders.
Target: 그래. 우리가 합의했던 대로 일을 끝내 줬군. 여기 너의 보상이다.\n\n이제 여길 떠나라. 당장. 실을 잣는 분의 성소에 대한 비밀은 외부인을 위한 것이 아니다.

Source: The Covenant? Here? Troll's blood! I have to warn the village.\n\nI'll head back. See if you can find any of the other villagers on the island. We may have to evacuate soon.
Target: 대거폴 동맹이? 여기에? 트롤 피같으니! 이걸 마을에 알려야겠어.\n\n난 돌아가겠네. 섬에 다른 주민들이 더 남아있는지 확인해 주게. 어쩌면 곧 대피해야 할지도 모르겠어.

Source: We sprint. If we act quickly, we might be able to alert Davon's Watch before the Covenant ships arrive.\n\nYou ready?
Target: 뛰어야지. 만약 재빠르게 행동한다면, 대거폴 동맹군의 배가 오기 전에 다본의 감시대에 경고할 수 있을걸세.\n\n준비됐나?

Source: I'm sorry to hear that. But at least you found the parts.\n\nI'll fix Leggy up good as the day he was forged. From where my heartwater wells up, I thank you.
Target: 그건 유감이네요. 하지만 적어도 부품을 찾으셨잖아요.\n\n레기를 고쳐서 처음 제작되었던 날처럼 좋게 만들겠어요. 제 심수가 솟아나는 곳에서부터 감사를 표할게요.

Source: A Covenant contract? I smell a distraction. That ship we spotted might be the start of an invasion.\n\nWe've got to get back to the village!
Target: 대거폴 동맹과 계약을? 양동 작전의 냄새가 나는군. 우리가 포착했던 배는 침략의 선봉이었을지도 모르겠어.\n\n즉시 마을로 돌아가야 해!

Source: Nicely done! I knew I could count on you.\n\nI'll get these pelts to market just as soon as I finish my drink. Thanks again, friend.
Target: Nicely done! I knew I could count on you.\n\nI'll get these pelts to market just as soon as I finish my drink. Thanks again, friend.

Source: Good! Those filthy traitors dishonor High-King Emeric and the Lionguard. The sooner we're rid of them, the better.\n\nI doubt this raid will scatter them for good, but I'm sure it rattled the cages. You have my thanks, and that of the Covenant.
Target: Good! Those filthy traitors dishonor High-King Emeric and the Lionguard. The sooner we're rid of them, the better.\n\nI doubt this raid will scatter them for good, but I'm sure it rattled the cages. You have my thanks, and that of the Covenant.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Planting my Alliance banner here will mark the rally point as secure.>
Target: <여기에 동맹의 깃발 달면 집결 지점이 확보 되었다는 것을 알릴 수 있을것이다.>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Excellent! Wow, they're much larger than I expected. Much fleshier, too. Mara's heart.\n\nWell, I suppose that's that! Here's your payment. Thanks for all your help. I'm sure these will make someone very happy.
Target: Excellent! Wow, they're much larger than I expected. Much fleshier, too. Mara's heart.\n\nWell, I suppose that's that! Here's your payment. Thanks for all your help. I'm sure these will make someone very happy.

Source: Thank you for saving Glenumbra! Thank you so much.
Target: Thank you for saving Glenumbra! Thank you so much.

Source: <Planting my Alliance banner here will mark the rally point as secure.>
Target: <여기에 동맹의 깃발 달면 집결 지점이 확보 되었다는 것을 알릴 수 있을것이다.>

Source: <Planting my Alliance banner here will mark the rally point as secure.>
Target: <여기에 동맹의 깃발 달면 집결 지점이 확보 되었다는 것을 알릴 수 있을것이다.>

Source: Wonderful! I'm certain that this time I have the data I need to complete my experiments. And don't worry—I'll cite your contribution when the results are published.\n\nMany thanks, friend!
Target: 훌륭합니다! 이번 실험을 완료하기 위해서는 이 정보들이 꼭 필요하다고 확신합니다. 그리고 걱정마세요- 이 실험의 결과가 출판된다면 당신의 기여를 꼭 써드리죠.\n\n감사합니다. 친구여!

Source: Yes, you'll find him there.
Target: 네. 거기서 찾을 수 있을 거에요.

Source: I told Bar-Neeus of your scheme. He gave me a package for you.
Target: I told Bar-Neeus of your scheme. He gave me a package for you.

Source: Did you hear what happened to that treasure hunter who looted Badwater mine? Dead. Strange, eh?
Target: Did you hear what happened to that treasure hunter who looted Badwater mine? Dead. Strange, eh?

Source: You're the one who helped that treasure hunter at Badwater mine. Must have been exciting.
Target: You're the one who helped that treasure hunter at Badwater mine. Must have been exciting.

Source: The Black Daggers need to set better ambushes.
Target: 검은 단검단은 더 나은 매복 장소를 찾아야 할 거에요.

Source: I spoke to all three of them. Are they ill?
Target: 세 명 모두와 말해 봤어요. 그 사람들이 병에 걸린 건가요?

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.\n

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Oh, you did. And, as promised, here's your share of the winnings. Finally things are looking up for Firtoril!
Target: Oh, you did. And, as promised, here's your share of the winnings. Finally things are looking up for Firtoril!

Source: The Hallowed that walked the Path. This one is not worthy to stand before you.
Target: 그 길을 걸은 신성한 자여. 이 카짓은 당신 앞에 서기에 합당하지 않습니다.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: May your scales stay moist. By the way, we're not heading back to the village. We have our own boat, and we're getting off this cursed rock.\n\nIf you're ever in Davon's Watch, you should consider joining the guild. I'd put in a good word for you.
Target: 네 비늘이 항상 촉촉하길. 그나저나, 우린 마을로 돌아가지 않을 거야. 우리 배가 있거든. 이 저주받은 바위를 빨리 떠날 거야.\n\n만약 다본의 감시대로 오게 되면, 길드에 가입하는 걸 고려해 보라고. 내가 좋은 말을 해주지.

Target: <여기에 동맹의 깃발 달면 집결 지점이 확보 되었다는 것을 알릴 수 있을것이다.>

Source: What a relief. Getting folks to trust durzogs is hard enough without some half-crazed Nord sicking them on people.\n\nI'll put this food to good use. If you meet anyone who's in the market for a good strong hound, you send them my way, all right?
Target: What a relief. Getting folks to trust durzogs is hard enough without some half-crazed Nord sicking them on people.\n\nI'll put this food to good use. If you meet anyone who's in the market for a good strong hound, you send them my way, all right?

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: You've done us a tremendous service, friend. There are still many lost souls bound to that wretched place, but we can be proud that at least a few have made it to the Ashen Forge. You have my thanks.
Target: 너 우리 한테 엄청난 봉사를 해 줬어, 친구. 그 비참한 장소에 묶여있는 많은 잃어버린 영혼이 여전히 존재하지만, 적어도 소수만이 Ashen Forge에 그것을 자랑스럽게 생각할 수 있습니다. 너는 고맙다.\n

Source: Thank you, your Grace.
Target: 감사합니다, 폐하.

Source: I killed some of the flame atronachs.
Target: 화염 아트로나크를 좀 죽였어요.

Source: You are the Hallowed! Bright moons be praised!
Target: 당신이 신성한 달입니다! 빛나는 달들이시여, 찬양받으라!

Source: I heard the Jade Dragoons were nearly destroyed by frost trolls. Frost trolls!
Target: 서리 트롤이 비취 용기병을 거의 괴멸시켰다고 들었어요. 서리 트롤들이란!

Source: Auri-el bless and keep you, traveler. You have no idea how much this means to an old woman. Now I can find peace myself. \n\nI'll be with my babies soon. It's been so long since I've seen their faces.
Target: 아우리엘께서 당신을 축복하고 지켜 주시길, 여행자여. 이 늙은이에게 얼마나 큰 일을 해줬는지 모를 걸세. 이제 나도 안식을 찾을 수 있겠구먼.\n\n나는 곧 아가들과 함께할 걸세. 그 애들 얼굴을 못 본지도 너무 오래 되었어.

Source: <Read Notice>
