Source: We will have to position our forces to make proper use of this new information. You have done well.
Target: 우리는 이 새로운 정보들을 적절히 활용하여 병령을 재 배치 할 예정이네. 잘해주었네.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: I take it you have seen to what I have asked of you? Good.
Target: I take it you have seen to what I have asked of you? Good.

Source: Excellent! These should help fund us for a few more days, at least. Here's your share.
Target: 훌륭해! 이게 있으니 적어도 며칠은 더 자금을 댈 수 있겠어. 여기 네 몫이야.

Source: None of the logistics of war can be considered trivial, recruit. The thing you ignore may very well be the thing that kills you.
Target: 전쟁에서의 계획들은 그 어느것 하나도 사소한 것으로 받아드려서는 안되네, 신병. 네가 무시하였던 사소한 것으로 때문에 죽음을 맞이 할 수도 있네.

Source: I'm amazed the Imperials hadn't stolen it already. I suspect they left it in the hopes of trapping me if I came to get it. You foiled that plan. Well done.
Target: 제국군이 진작 훔쳐가지 않았다니 놀라운데. 아마 그걸 미끼로 써서 날 잡으려고 놓아둔 것 같아. 네가 그 계획을 망쳐 주었군. 잘 했어.

Source: It brings me joy to hear the traitor is dead. I must remain at Virolynn's side, but you should go north to the town of Crosswych in Dwynnen to see if they can shed any light on the Shrouded Throne. See Warden Godwin, he is a good and loyal man.
Target: 반역자가 죽었다는 소식을 들으니 기쁘네요. 저는 비롤린의 편에 머물러야 합니다. 하지만 당신은 북쪽 드윈넨에 있는 크로스위치 마을로 가서 그들이 가려진 왕자(shroubed Throne)를 밝혀줄 수 있는지 알아봐주세요. 관리인 고드윈을 만나세요, 그는 착하고 충성스러운 사람입니다.

Source: We have to establish a firm grip over the resources here in Balfiera, lest we allow the enemy an advantage over us.
Target: We have to establish a firm grip over the resources here in Balfiera, lest we allow the enemy an advantage over us.

Source: I paid an enchanter to ensure I could come back and be with her even in death.\n\nUnfortunately, it was the jackals that got me. They scattered my bones all over and I couldn't come back, but my Musi came through … with your help. Thank you!
Target: I paid an enchanter to ensure I could come back and be with her even in death.\n\nUnfortunately, it was the jackals that got me. They scattered my bones all over and I couldn't come back, but my Musi came through … with your help. Thank you!

Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: You have seen but a glimpse of the Veil, but you've returned to us mostly unharmed. That alone is an accomplishment most cannot speak of.\n\nI apologize for the suddenness of that. We had to test you to see if your body would withstand the entering.
Target: 당신은 베일(Veil)을 잠깐 보았을 뿐이지만, 거의 다치지 않고 우리에게 돌아왔습니다.  그리고 그것은 말할 수 없을 정도의 훌륭한 업적입니다.¶\n¶\n갑작스러웠던 일에 대해서는 사과드립니다. 우리는 당신의 몸이 그 입구를 견딜 수 있는지 테스트해야 했습니다.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source:
One final word of advice... hero. 

For every statue you strike, it will cry out as if a living, breathing creature. Any who are near will rush to it's aid, attempting to stop its destruction. 

Remember this, though I doubt it help.

Sly is waiting.
Target:
영웅이여....마지막으로 충고 한 마디하겠다.¶
¶
당신이 그것을 때리면, 그것은 살아 숨쉬는 생물처럼 울어 댈 것이다. 또한 근처에 있는 사람은 누구든 그것을 도와 그것의 파괴를 막으려고 할 것이다. ¶
¶
이 말을 기억하시오, 비록 도움이 되리라고는 생각하지 않지만.¶
¶
Sly가 기다리고 있다.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Tempest Island has been invaded and those that would do harm have been destroyed. Tamriel is now safe from the Maormer menace, for the time being.
Target: Tempest Island has been invaded and those that would do harm have been destroyed. Tamriel is now safe from the Maormer menace, for the time being.

Source: They say Argonians can smell skin-stealers. Must be why they went after the lizards first.
Target: They say Argonians can smell skin-stealers. Must be why they went after the lizards first.

Source: You slayed Captain Blackheart! Thank the divines for brave souls like you.
Target: You slayed Captain Blackheart! Thank the divines for brave souls like you.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: You have done adequately. Every enemy dead brings us that much closer to taking control of Balfiera Island.
Target: You have done adequately. Every enemy dead brings us that much closer to taking control of Balfiera Island.

Source: I'm just glad I was able to help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군요.

Source: With fresh supplies of lumber at our disposal repairs to our keeps will be that much easier. You have proven your worth to the Dominion.
Target: With fresh supplies of lumber at our disposal repairs to our keeps will be that much easier. You have proven your worth to the Dominion.

Source: Baron Dorell and Countess Tamrith led the assault against Baron Montclair! We never would have taken the Shrouded Pass without their leadership!
Target: Dorell 남작과 Tamrith 백작은 Baron Montclair에 대한 공격을 이끌었습니다! 우리는 리더십 없이는 Shrouded Pass를 가져 가지 않았을 것입니다!\n

Source: With the materials flowing in from the mine we can affect proper repairs on our fortifications. You very well might have saved some lives, recruit.
Target: With the materials flowing in from the mine we can affect proper repairs on our fortifications. You very well might have saved some lives, recruit.

Source: Oh, no. I hoped we would join together in one last embrace, before triggering our death with my voice. But I whispered his name aloud as I waited … was that enough to collapse the stones?\n\nI should … go now ….
Target: 아, 이럴수가. 내 목소리로 죽음을 불러오기 전에 마지막으로 그이를 안아보고 싶었는데. 기다리는 동안 그이 이름을 소리 내어 속삭였던 것이... 그게 석재를 무너뜨릴 정도였단 말인가요?\n\n난 이제... 떠나야 해요...

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: We will have to position our forces to make proper use of this new information. You have done well.
Target: 우리는 이 새로운 정보들을 적절히 활용하여 병령을 재 배치 할 예정이네. 잘해주었네.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: With this latest acquisition, our enemies will have to fight on our terms. Your service will not be soon forgotten.
Target: With this latest acquisition, our enemies will have to fight on our terms. Your service will not be soon forgotten.

Source: I suppose I'll write a paper about it. This hunk of crystal will occupy the next five years of my life.\n\nIt's a bit sad when I say it out loud.
Target: I suppose I'll write a paper about it. This hunk of crystal will occupy the next five years of my life.\n\nIt's a bit sad when I say it out loud.

Source: We can't kill the Duke. Camlorn needs him.
Target: 우린 공작을 죽일 순 없어. 캠론에는 그가 필요해.

Source: Yes, the cure worked perfectly.
Target: Yes, the cure worked perfectly.

Source: I just wish we could have done more.\n\nWell, then! Are you ready to get off this rock?
Target: 더 할 수 없는게 아쉬울 뿐이지.\n\n아무튼 출발할 준비는 되었나?

Source: The King set aside this armor for the champion who defeated Angof. It was a treasure of Daggerfall. And now it belongs to you. \n\nIt's your reward for all you've done for this land and its people. May luck follow you wherever you go.
Target: The King set aside this armor for the champion who defeated Angof. It was a treasure of Daggerfall. And now it belongs to you. \n\nIt's your reward for all you've done for this land and its people. May luck follow you wherever you go.

Source: Good. Seeing Imperials floating downstream brightens my day. The reward is yours.
Target: 좋아. 제국놈들이 하류에 떠내려가는 모습을 보니 하루가 즐거워지는군. 보상은 네 것이야.

Source: Did you hear that someone is leading the giants that overran Lower Yorgrim?
Target: Did you hear that someone is leading the giants that overran Lower Yorgrim?

Source: From what I've heard, the Orcthane deserved a traitor's death.
Target: From what I've heard, the Orcthane deserved a traitor's death.

Source: Daedric magic at the Edrald estate? I'm just glad you were able to close that portal!
Target: Edrald의 땅에서 데이드릭 마술을? 그 포털을 닫을 수있어서 다행입니다!\n

Source: Daedric magic at the Edrald estate? I'm just glad you were able to close that portal!
Target: Edrald의 땅에서 데이드릭 마술을? 그 포털을 닫을 수있어서 다행입니다!\n

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: The gemstones … ? Thank you so much! \n\nI am surprised you … well, I am simply grateful. I have spent so many years searching in the darkness and found nothing. My luck has finally changed.
Target: The gemstones … ? Thank you so much! \n\nI am surprised you … well, I am simply grateful. I have spent so many years searching in the darkness and found nothing. My luck has finally changed.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Cursed? They were …? I don't understand …. \n\nBut perhaps it is better if I don't. Perhaps this is what I deserve anyhow. Thank you for helping me, and for sparing me the curse.
Target: Cursed? They were …? I don't understand …. \n\nBut perhaps it is better if I don't. Perhaps this is what I deserve anyhow. Thank you for helping me, and for sparing me the curse.

Source: The new lizard is just the draw this track needs. And, I spoke with <<1>> as well. She'll help me with the track for a small investment.\n\nMeeting you turned my life around! May Tall Papa guide your steps!
Target: 새로운 도마뱀이 경주장에 필요한 것들을 끌어모을거요. 그리고, <<1>>와도 얘기해 뒀지. 날 도와 경주장에 작은 투자를 하겠다더군.\n\n당신을 만나 내 인생이 바뀌었구려! 톨 파파께서 당신의 발걸음을 인도하시길!

Source: Thank you for helping return my men. Here is a token of my graditude.
Target: 내 부하들을 돌려보내줘서 고마워. 이건 내 감사의 표시야.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Just give me a second, and I'll head back home. I'll lean on Rexus when I get tired. \n\n<<1>> will be worried sick. Thank you!
Target: 그냥 조금만 쉬다가 집으로 돌아갈게. 내가 지치면 렉수스에게 기대면 돼.\n\n<<1>>가 몹시 걱정하겠군. 고마워!

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: It's time for me to move on.
Target: 그럼 이제 떠나야 할 시간이야.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: You were at Fort Zeren. All those refugees. Good thing you were there.
Target: 제렌 요새에 있었군요. 그 모든 난민들. 당신이 거기 있었던 건 잘한 일입니다.

Source: Daedric magic at the Edrald estate? I'm just glad you were able to close that portal!
Target: Edrald의 땅에서 데이드릭 마술을? 그 포털을 닫을 수있어서 다행입니다!\n

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Daedric magic at the Edrald estate? I'm just glad you were able to close that portal!
Target: Edrald의 땅에서 데이드릭 마술을? 그 포털을 닫을 수있어서 다행입니다!\n

Source: Captain Thayer certainly found a bumper crop of guard recruits at Hoarfrost Downs. I wonder how he did it.
Target: Captain Thayer certainly found a bumper crop of guard recruits at Hoarfrost Downs. I wonder how he did it.

Source: Captain Thayer certainly found a bumper crop of guard recruits at Hoarfrost Downs. I wonder how he did it.
Target: 데이어 지휘부관은 서리 구릉(Hoarfrost Downs)에서도 틀림없이 경비대 모집에 성공했을 거야. 어떻게 해냈는지 궁금해.

Source: I see you made it out alive.
Target: I see you made it out alive.

Source: What just happened? Where did she go?
Target: 방금 어떻게 된 거죠? 아라나이아스는 어디 갔어요?

Source: I can understand if you're dubious. Skeptical. I would be. All I ask is that you go to the districts and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.
Target: I can understand if you're dubious. Skeptical. I would be. All I ask is that you go to the districts and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.

Source: Fildgor is dead, and the Ebonheart Pact is sealed.
Target: Fildgor is dead, and the Ebonheart Pact is sealed.

Source: You're the one who discovered Vicereeve Pelidil's involvement with the Veiled Heritance.
Target: You're the one who discovered Vicereeve Pelidil's involvement with the Veiled Heritance.

Source: I found this urn with your name on it.
Target: I found this urn with your name on it.

Source: For now, we stay watchful. This book is obviously connected to a greater plot. I'll be in touch once I figure out what the Sublime Brazier has to do with the invasion.\n\nSo, yes. I'm reading now. Can you go, please? You're in my light.
Target: For now, we stay watchful. This book is obviously connected to a greater plot. I'll be in touch once I figure out what the Sublime Brazier has to do with the invasion.\n\nSo, yes. I'm reading now. Can you go, please? You're in my light.

Source: So. Yes. I'll hold onto the key for now. I suspect we'll need it sooner rather than later.\n\nThank you for recovering it—and for finding Regilus. I'm glad someone was there. At the end.
Target: So. Yes. I'll hold onto the key for now. I suspect we'll need it sooner rather than later.\n\nThank you for recovering it—and for finding Regilus. I'm glad someone was there. At the end.

Source: There's the one that made peace with the giants in Lower Yorgrim.
Target: There's the one that made peace with the giants in Lower Yorgrim.

Source: They chose to desecrate the Direnni, this was their lot. Perhaps now they'll leave it be.  As thanks, let me fuse the souls harvested in Crystalwan with an item you may find useful...
Target: 그들은 디레니를 모독하기로 결정했는데, 그것은 그들의 몫이야. 아마도 이제 그들은 떠날 거야. 고마움의 표시로, 내가 Crystalwan에서 수확한 영혼들을 유용하다고 생각되는 것들과 융합시킬게...\n

Source: Of course, of course. You've certainly been more useful than these hired hands.\n\nThe Baelbornes are once again on their way to the top, and I have you to thank for that. I'll always remember the small part you played to make this happen.
Target: Of course, of course. You've certainly been more useful than these hired hands.\n\nThe Baelbornes are once again on their way to the top, and I have you to thank for that. I'll always remember the small part you played to make this happen.

Source: The Keepers teach us it is an honor to die defending our homeland. That's what they preach.\n\nForsaking the teachings of Kyne dishonors us all!
Target: 파수꾼들은 우리 고향을 지키기 위해 죽는 것이 영광임을 가르쳐줍니다. 그것이 그들이 설교하는 것입니다.\n\nKyne의 가르침을 포위하는 것은 우리 모두를 불명예스럽게 만듭니다!

Source: I found this diary. I think it belonged to your cousin.
Target: I found this diary. I think it belonged to your cousin.

Source: I'm not sure what to say.
Target: 뭐라고 말씀드려야 할지 모르겠네요.

Source: There will be feasting this night! Good work, our bellies thank you.
Target: There will be feasting this night! Good work, our bellies thank you.

Source: If you've seen a man starve to death, you'd know it's not a fate any man should face. However, the Ebonheart and Aldmeri are little more than beasts in my eyes so it's completely acceptable.
Target: If you've seen a man starve to death, you'd know it's not a fate any man should face. However, the Ebonheart and Aldmeri are little more than beasts in my eyes so it's completely acceptable.

Source: Damn their hides, yes! <<1>> is still in Pact hands. \n\nThe refugees wouldn't have made it without you. I hate to think what must have happened at the docks.
Target: 빌어먹을 놈들! <<1>>가 아직 동맹의 손에 있습니다.\n\n 난민들은 당신 없이는 살아남지 못했을 거예요. 부두에서 무슨 일이 생겼을지 생각하기 싫습니다.

Source: Even the Wyrd don't know what will happen?
Target: Even the Wyrd don't know what will happen?

Source: Ten enemies of Daggerfall dead you say? Well done, yet again.
Target: Ten enemies of Daggerfall dead you say? Well done, yet again.

Source: So your injuries—they're cured?
Target: 그래서 당신 상처는... 치유된 겁니까?

Source: With this Chalice, and the power in the Soulstone of Brall, I believe my invocations may at last reach Ranser's spirit, wherever it may be. I must prepare myself. You should as well. When you feel ready, return to me and we shall begin.
Target: 이 성배와 브롤의 영혼석에 있는 힘으로, 랜서의 영혼이 어디에 있든지 내 주문이 닿을 수 있다고 믿습니다. 준비를 해야 합니다. 당신도 준비하세요. 준비가 되면 나에게 다시 오십시오.

Source: I'm not sure what to say.
Target: 뭐라고 말씀드려야 할지 모르겠네요.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: You did, guar-friend! They're all back. <<1>> is already ruling the roost. \n\nWhere would they be without me? I'll get them fed and ready to carry our things.
Target: 그래, 구아-친구! 모두 다 돌아왔어. <<1>>은 이미 무리를 이끌고 있지.\n\n내가 없다면 그들은 어디 있을 수나 있겠어? 밥을 먹이고 짐 실을 준비를 해야겠어.

Source: I'll smuggle these people out through the sewers. Eight willing, I'll be back again tomorrow to take a few more. Here's your gold, as promised.\n\nBe careful out there.
Target: I'll smuggle these people out through the sewers. Eight willing, I'll be back again tomorrow to take a few more. Here's your gold, as promised.\n\nBe careful out there.

Source: What is the Heart of Valenwood?
Target: 발렌우드의 심장은 뭡니까?

Source: They've gone to war. \n\nAnd they're outnumbered. I fear everyone we know will be dead before the day is out.
Target: 그들은 싸우러 갔어.\n\n그리고 그들이 수적으로 불리해. 난 오늘이 가기 전에 우리가 알던 사람들이 전부 죽어버릴까봐 무서워.

Source: Excellent! Let's see what the Worm Cult is planning.
Target: 훌륭하군! 이제 Worm Cult가 뭘 계획하고 있는지 보자구.

Source: We did, thanks to you. We are forever in your debt. \n\nWe will think of you always in our passage down the river.
Target: 그래요, 당신 덕분이죠. 당신에게 갚을 수 없는 빛을 졌네요.\n\n강 아래로 지날 땐 항상 당신을 기억하겠습니다.

Source: Ha! That it was.\n\nLet Malacath gaze upon you. Let him see you are strong enough to deny the will of a Daedric Prince. May he never forget.
Target: Ha! That it was.\n\nLet Malacath gaze upon you. Let him see you are strong enough to deny the will of a Daedric Prince. May he never forget.

Source: You're dubious. Skeptical. That's good. All I ask is that you consider it and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.
Target: 의심이 많고 남을 잘 믿지 않는군요. 좋아요. 내가 부탁하는건 이 제안을 잘 생각해 보고 계속 경계하라는 것 뿐이에요. 나도 똑같이 할 거에요. 작은 것부터 시작하는 거에요. 간단하죠.\n\n당신이 내 생각의 반 만큼만 유능하다면, 우린 곧 다시 만나게 될 거에요.

Source: And I you.\n\nTake this. It belonged to Kurog, but you earned it. I hope I can do as much for my people as you did for Orsinium. I will do my best to live up to the faith that you and the clan chiefs have seen in me.
Target: And I you.\n\nTake this. It belonged to Kurog, but you earned it. I hope I can do as much for my people as you did for Orsinium. I will do my best to live up to the faith that you and the clan chiefs have seen in me.

Source: Our true enemy has revealed himself - some thrall of the Daedra, no doubt. I am unhurt, but his spells weakened me. Ranser's body is gone! \n\nWorse, the ritual has gone awry - angry spirits roam Camlorn, and I am too weak to face them alone!
Target: 우리의 진정한 적이 정체를 드러 냈습니다. 몇몇 데이드라의 노예들이 말이죠. 전 다치진 않았지만, 그의 주문은 나를 약화시켰어요. 랜서의 시신이 없어졌어요!\n\n더 나쁜 것은 의식이 잘못되어 버렸다는 겁니다. 화가난 영혼이 캠론을 배회하고있고, 나는 너무 약해 혼자 상대하지 못합니다!

Source: Yes, yes! If you cannot make a trade in good faith, what will the world come to? Besides, us newcomers must band together on an island this cruel.
Target: Yes, yes! If you cannot make a trade in good faith, what will the world come to? Besides, us newcomers must band together on an island this cruel.

Source: You aren't a Baelborne. Besides, we believed that you would do the right thing.\n\nI hope my child grew up with the same virtues that you demonstrated here. Thank you.
Target: You aren't a Baelborne. Besides, we believed that you would do the right thing.\n\nI hope my child grew up with the same virtues that you demonstrated here. Thank you.

Source: High King Emeric needs to know about this cult. With their nightmare magic, these Daedric madmen could plunge Stormhaven into chaos.\n\nBut you … thank you for saving me.
Target: High King Emeric needs to know about this cult. With their nightmare magic, these Daedric madmen could plunge Stormhaven into chaos.\n\nBut you … thank you for saving me.

Source: The giants are mine to control! No one will dare cause trouble for Lower Yorgrim now that we have our own herd of giants!\n\nThank you for your help. If you ever want to share a meal, just stop by the manor.
Target:
거인들은 내 통제 하에 있네! 아무도 Lower  Yorgrim에게 감히 문제를 일으키지 못할걸세!

도와 줘서 고마워. 식사를 같이하고 싶다면 저택 옆에 들르십시오.

Source: Sheogorath, in Southpoint? The tales can't be true, can they? No, of course not.
Target: Sheogorath, in Southpoint? The tales can't be true, can they? No, of course not.

Source: You're right. We can't wait any longer.\n\nVivec preserve us all.
Target: 자네가 맞아. 우린 더 지체할 수 없어.\n\n비벡께서 우릴 지켜주시기를.

Source: Yes, but they won't come back here.
Target: 네. 하지만 여기로 돌아오진 않을 겁니다.

Source: I wonder how long Southpoint's mayor will survive in the Shivering Isles. Hopefully, not very.
Target: I wonder how long Southpoint's mayor will survive in the Shivering Isles. Hopefully, not very.

Source: Verandis saved us all, Gwendis. Now it's time to go.
Target: Verandis saved us all, Gwendis. Now it's time to go.

Source: The High Elf <<1>> brought it to a place of power. I don't know where.
Target: The High Elf <<1>> brought it to a place of power. I don't know where.

Source: First Madja steals my crew, then my only means of survival? Oh, how will this one tell Nubani. He promised her a life of riches and luxury. Now we'll have to sell the ship just to get by.\n\nStill, you've done much. Thank you, walker.
Target: 마드자가 내 선원을 훔치고, 내 유일한 생계수단까지 빼앗아가버렸다고? 오, 이 몸이 누바니에게 뭐라고 말하겠습니까. 그는 그녀에게 부유한 삶을 약속했는데. 이제 들러서 배를 팔아야만 합니다.\n\n그래도 당신은 많은 일을 해주었습니다. 고맙습니다, 여행자.

Source: If Nubani is willing to go so far, she must truly be unhappy. How can Renzir force her to continue on with such a life? \n\nThis one will use these goods to retire from smuggling, just as his Nubani wishes.
Target: 계속 이렇게 살면 누바니는 결국 불행해질겁니다. 어떻게 란지르가 그녀에게 그런 삶을 계속하도록 강요하겠습니까?\n\n이 몸은 누바니가 바란대로 이 물건을 밀수에서 은퇴하는데 사용하겠습니다.

Source: We? We didn't stop the attack. You did.\n\nYou've given us crucial time to bring in reinforcements. Now we can repel this invasion before it gains a foothold. We owe you one for this. Good job!
Target: We? We didn't stop the attack. You did.\n\nYou've given us crucial time to bring in reinforcements. Now we can repel this invasion before it gains a foothold. We owe you one for this. Good job!

Source: You have done adequately. Every enemy dead brings us that much closer to taking control of Balfiera!
Target: You have done adequately. Every enemy dead brings us that much closer to taking control of Balfiera!

Source: There's a necromancer here, but I can't find him. He must be in the catacombs beneath the shrine. That's the only place that makes sense.
Target: 그곳엔 강령술사가 있지만, 어디 있는지는 모르겠네. 그는 성지 아래의 묘실에 있는게 틀립없어. 거기밖에 숨을 곳이 없으니.

Source: Today guards, tomorrow their leaders. We may call on you again soon.
Target: Today guards, tomorrow their leaders. We may call on you again soon.

Source: With the Ebonheart Pact busy replacing their losses; we have time to plan a decisive attack against their leadership.
Target: With the Ebonheart Pact busy replacing their losses; we have time to plan a decisive attack against their leadership.

Source: I take it you have seen to what I have asked of you? Good.
Target: I take it you have seen to what I have asked of you? Good.

Source: Today a guard, tomorrow their leaders. We may call on you again soon.
Target: 오늘은 경비를, 내일은 그들의 지도자들을. 조만간 다시 보도록 하죠.

Source: Brennoc sent you to me, did he?  Good, I may have use of you...
Target: 브레녹이 당신을 제게 보냈죠, 그렇죠? 좋아요, 내가 당신을 이용할 수있겠어요...\n

Source: Interesting; you have done the Dominion a service recruit. We will make use of the information you have brought us to the benefit of our cause.
Target: 흥미롭군요: 당신이 도미니언 신병으로서 봉사해주다니. 우리는  당신이 우리를 위해 가져온 정보를 이용할 것입니다. 감사합니다.

Source: Your problem was a spriggan matron. I took care of it for you.
Target: Your problem was a spriggan matron. I took care of it for you.

Source: A great service to Malacath. He shall not forget. He never forgets.\n\nAnd now his eye is upon you. Do great works of vengeance in his name.
Target: A great service to Malacath. He shall not forget. He never forgets.\n\nAnd now his eye is upon you. Do great works of vengeance in his name.

Source: Here is Blackheart's Skull.
Target: Here is Blackheart's Skull.

Source: I knew that you would see the veracity of my claim. Now my dear Alani will have to accept my proposal and marry me!\n\nThank you for believing in me. Now just hand over the pendant and we can put this business behind us.
Target: I knew that you would see the veracity of my claim. Now my dear Alani will have to accept my proposal and marry me!\n\nThank you for believing in me. Now just hand over the pendant and we can put this business behind us.

Source: The <<1>> is yours. Wear it at your breast … let it bathe in the spattering blood of your enemies. Feed it your wrath, your hatred, your vengeance!\n\nUntil someone stronger takes your place.
Target: The <<1>> is yours. Wear it at your breast … let it bathe in the spattering blood of your enemies. Feed it your wrath, your hatred, your vengeance!\n\nUntil someone stronger takes your place.

Source: You should tell the others that <<1>> is dead.
Target: You should tell the others that <<1>> is dead.

Source: Your belief in me is gratifying. I thought I had lost the pendant forever, and with it my one remaining connection to my home and my parents.\n\nThank you for your help. Now give me my pendant so I can make sure I won't lose it again.
Target: 네가 날 믿어줘서 정말 기뻐. 나는 내 집과 부모님에 대한 단 하나의 연결고리인 펜던트를 영원히 잃어버렸다고 생각했었어.\n\n도와줘서 정말 고마워. 이제 내 펜던트를 돌려줘 내가 다신 안 잃어버리도록.

Source: These animals deserve better than to be left to fend for themselves. I owe them that much.\n\nI'll do everything I can for them. You have my word.
Target: These animals deserve better than to be left to fend for themselves. I owe them that much.\n\nI'll do everything I can for them. You have my word.

Source: Captain Thayer certainly found a bumper crop of guard recruits at Hoarfrost Downs. I wonder how he did it.
Target: Captain Thayer certainly found a bumper crop of guard recruits at Hoarfrost Downs. I wonder how he did it.

Source: Captain Thayer certainly found a bumper crop of guard recruits at Hoarfrost Downs. I wonder how he did it.
Target: Captain Thayer certainly found a bumper crop of guard recruits at Hoarfrost Downs. I wonder how he did it.

Source: That's refreshing. Most days, it's just Rana and me against the world. \n\nWe have some work to do.
Target: 힘이 나는군. 보통은 대장님이랑 나만이 세상에 맞서는 느낌이거든.\n\n우리가 해야 할 일이 있어.

Source: Thank you. I just hope we're not too late.
Target: 고맙습니다. 나는 우리가 너무 늦지 않았 으면 좋겠다.\n

Source: But she's coming with Andur to destroy you.
Target: 하지만 아라나이아스는 안더와 함께 당신을 파괴하려고 오는 겁니다.

Source: High Priest Canning believes we can summon Ranser's soul using the Chalice of Gwedrun and Soulstone of Brall. He is now preparing himself for the ritual, and advised me to prepare myself as well. I must speak to him again when I am ready.
Target: 고위 사제 케닝은 궤드런의 성배와 브롤의 영혼석을 사용하여 랜서의 영혼을 소환할 수 있다고 믿고있지. 케닝은 지금 의식을 준비하고 있고, 나에게도 준비하라했어. 준비가 되면 그에게 말해야 해.

Source: Yes, it's gone.
Target: 네, 리치는 죽었어요.

Source: That's why you asked me to get it for you.
Target: That's why you asked me to get it for you.

Source: Is there anything more I can do?
Target: Is there anything more I can do?

Source: Here, take it.
Target: 여기요. 가져가세요.

Source: The party's in full swing. Now's your best chance.
Target: 파티가 지금 최고조에요. 지금이 가장 좋은 기회에요.

Source: Sorry, Mael. He was killed by trolls. I have your supplies though.
Target: 유감이에요, 메일. 루시우스는 트롤에게 죽었어요. 그래도 여기 보급품을 가져왔죠.

Source: Ah, excellent. These pelts look perfect! Well, maybe not perfect—but it's not as if the werewolves were happy to hand their skins over, am I right? Well done.\n\nHere's your payment. I hope we can work together again soon.
Target: Ah, excellent. These pelts look perfect! Well, maybe not perfect—but it's not as if the werewolves were happy to hand their skins over, am I right? Well done.\n\nHere's your payment. I hope we can work together again soon.

Source: I'm glad I was able to help.
Target: I'm glad I was able to help.

Source: Well done! You accomplished what we couldn't. Cumberland's Watch is in your debt.\n\nWe'll drive out the remaining Goblins. But while we're doing that, Rama's just going to be getting farther away.
Target: Well done! You accomplished what we couldn't. Cumberland's Watch is in your debt.\n\nWe'll drive out the remaining Goblins. But while we're doing that, Rama's just going to be getting farther away.

Source: You found them!
Target: 그들을 찾았구나!

Source: This is goodbye then.
Target: This is goodbye then.

Source: I recovered your amulet of Azurah.
Target: 당신의 아주라의 아뮬렛을 되찾아 왔어요.

Source: Rajhin's Shadow stole the pieces and gave me a book of riddles to find them all.
Target: Rajhin's Shadow stole the pieces and gave me a book of riddles to find them all.

Source: None of the logistics of war can be considered trivial, recruit. The thing you ignore may very well be the thing that kills you.
Target: 전쟁에서의 계획들은 그 어느것 하나도 사소한 것으로 받아드려서는 안되네, 신병. 네가 무시하였던 사소한 것으로 때문에 죽음을 맞이 할 수도 있네.

Source: You have blood on your hands, recruit. You may make a real soldier, after all.
Target: You have blood on your hands, recruit. You may make a real soldier, after all.

Source: Perhaps there will be gold and silver to be had along with that stone.
Target: Perhaps there will be gold and silver to be had along with that stone.

Source: I filled all the empty soul gems you gave me.
Target: I filled all the empty soul gems you gave me.

Source: Good work recruit, you seem to have a knack this sort of work.
Target: Good work recruit, you seem to have a knack this sort of work.

Source: Ah, you warm this one's heart. I pity any Daedra foolish enough to touch those casks now. You have my thanks, walker.\n\nI will likely return to the Temple District soon—perhaps in a day or two. If you wish to aid me again, you'll find me there.
Target: Ah, you warm this one's heart. I pity any Daedra foolish enough to touch those casks now. You have my thanks, walker.\n\nI will likely return to the Temple District soon—perhaps in a day or two. If you wish to aid me again, you'll find me there.

Source: There will be plenty of opportunity for bloodshed, there are other aspects of this war that we must concern ourselves with
Target: There will be plenty of opportunity for bloodshed, there are other aspects of this war that we must concern ourselves with

Source: Interesting; you have done the Dominion a service recruit. We will make use of the information you have brought us to the benefit of our cause.
Target: 흥미롭군요: 당신이 도미니언 신병으로서 봉사해주다니. 우리는  당신이 우리를 위해 가져온 정보를 이용할 것입니다. 감사합니다.

Source: I spoke with Inquistor Roche at Brennoc's behest.
Target: 난 브레녹의 요청에 따라 심문자 로슈와 이야기했어요.\n

Source: What's next?
Target: 다음은 뭐지?

Source: You have blood on your hands, recruit. You may make a real soldier, after all.
Target: You have blood on your hands, recruit. You may make a real soldier, after all.

Source: You're dubious. Skeptical. That's good. All I ask is that you consider it and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.
Target: You're dubious. Skeptical. That's good. All I ask is that you consider it and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.

Source: You have done what was asked of you? Good.
Target: You have done what was asked of you? Good.

Source: So you returned the helm and slew the creature that took his life. Huh.\n\nYou did Corgrak a great honor. Here, he'd want you to have this. Walk in Malacath's shadow.
Target: 그러니까 당신은 헬름을 되찾아온데다 할아버지의 생명을 가져간 그 놈을 무찌른거군요. 허.\n\n크로그낙에게 큰 명예를 안겨주신겁니다. 여기, 할아버지께선 당신이 이걸 가지시길 원했을겁니다. 말라카스의 그림자를 따라 걷기를.

Source: Yes, she's dead again.
Target: 그래요. 민웨가 또 다시 죽었군요.

Source: Have faith! A sculpture begins as a block of stone. A masterful painting? Nothing but canvas on the board.\n\nTime to assemble this for <<1>>. Soon, all shall witness my glorious homage to Wrothgar's ogres!
Target: 믿음을 가지세요! 조각품의 시작은 돌덩어리에 지나지 않습니다. 명화? 판자위의 캔버스 말고는 아무것도 없습니다.\n\n <<1>>를 위해 이것들을 조립할 시간입니다. 머지않아, 모두가 저의 영광스러운 로스가의 오거들 앞에 경의를 표할겁니다!

Source: Yes. They should be dying like flies.
Target: 네. 놈들은 파리처럼 죽어있을 거에요.

Source: Well done, and thanks for all the help!\n\nEr … the commander, here, would like to have a word with you.
Target: Well done, and thanks for all the help!\n\nEr … the commander, here, would like to have a word with you.

Source: What now?
Target: What now?

Source: Ah, well some is better than none. These are in remarkable condition, all things considered.\n\nYou've done me a great service. No—you've done all of Tamriel a great service, though they may never know it. You have my deepest thanks.
Target: Ah, well some is better than none. These are in remarkable condition, all things considered.\n\nYou've done me a great service. No—you've done all of Tamriel a great service, though they may never know it. You have my deepest thanks.

Source: Hopefully, Rajhin won't bother you any further.
Target: Hopefully, Rajhin won't bother you any further.

Source: Elsweyr certainly seems to have its share of troubles.
Target: 엘스웨어가 확실히 문제에 처한 것 같네요.

Source: What should we do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 해야 하죠?

Source: Good. We can destroy them, and Arum-Khal, with this weapon—the Moonlight Blade.
Target: Good. We can destroy them, and Arum-Khal, with this weapon—the Moonlight Blade.

Source: There will be new weapons and armor forged with the ore we're pulling from our mine.
Target: There will be new weapons and armor forged with the ore we're pulling from our mine.

Source: I have hunted down and slain the beast known as Gargast. His very presence implies greater forces at work behind the scenes. I should travel to Crosswych and see if I can uncover any further secretive workings.
Target: 나는 가르가스트로 알려진 짐승을 사냥하여 죽였습니다. 그의 존재 자체가 배후에 더 큰 힘이 있다는 것을 암시합니다. 크로스위치로 가서 더 이상 비밀스러운 일이 없는지 알아봐야겠어요.

Source: That we did, thanks to you.\n\nNow that we're all back together, we have a better chance to put an end to this Dominion incursion.
Target: That we did, thanks to you.\n\nNow that we're all back together, we have a better chance to put an end to this Dominion incursion.

Source: Expertly done. The Ebonheart claims one more keep this day.
Target: Expertly done. The Ebonheart claims one more keep this day.

Source: So, what happens now?
Target: So, what happens now?

Source: My heart plummets at the news you bring, and all the light departs from my sky.\n\nI will take the <<1>>, though. I do not know if I can do this without my Jaeloreh, but I won't let her dream die, too. Thank you.
Target: 당신이 가져온 소식에 제 심장이 곤두박질치고, 제 하늘의 모든 빛이 멀어지는 군요.\n\n 그래도 저는  <<1>>을 받겠습니다. 제가 잘로레없이 이 일을 해낼 수 있을 진 모르겠습니다만, 그녀의 꿈을 꺾지는 않을 겁니다. 고맙습니다.

Source: You have shown me that I am as much a relic as the objects in this vault. A thing of the past. Adrift. It is time to go. I shall find Aetherius.\n\nAnd, at long last, peace.
Target: You have shown me that I am as much a relic as the objects in this vault. A thing of the past. Adrift. It is time to go. I shall find Aetherius.\n\nAnd, at long last, peace.

Source: Truer words have rarely been spoken. Thank you for setting me free.\n\nBut heed this bit of advice before I depart. Not everything you meet in ancient ruins shall be as cordial as I. Fare you well.
Target: Truer words have rarely been spoken. 날 풀어줘서 고맙네.\n\n하지만 내가 떠나기 전에 충고 하나 해 주지. 이 고대 유적에서 만나는 모든 이들이 나처럼 친절하진 않을 걸세. 잘 있게.

Source: I knew you could do it! I wish I could see the look on their smug, glowy-eyed faces. Priceless!\n\nI'm going to gather some supplies. Should be headed back out there in a day or so. If you're looking to cause a little more havoc, meet me there.
Target: I knew you could do it! I wish I could see the look on their smug, glowy-eyed faces. Priceless!\n\nI'm going to gather some supplies. Should be headed back out there in a day or so. If you're looking to cause a little more havoc, meet me there.

Source: There will be an answer for what's happened today. The firstborn of an Orc chief is dead. The stronghold will come for me. But my anger runs deeper than they'll expect. I'll gladly pit my rage against theirs.\n\nThank you for all you've done.
Target: 오늘 있었던 일에 대한 응답이 있을 거야. 오크 족장의 맏아들이 죽었어. 요새에서 날 잡으러 올 거야. 하지만 나의 분노는 그들이 생각하는거보다 더 깊지. 나는 기꺼이 그들에게 내 분노를 쏟아내겠어.\n\n너가 해준 모든일에 감사해.

Source: Thank you.
Target: Thank you.

Source: So you did! And here's your payment, as promised. \n\nIf you find yourself in the Nobles District again anytime soon, keep an eye out for me. Reliable partners are hard to come by out here. Take care.
Target: So you did! And here's your payment, as promised. \n\nIf you find yourself in the Nobles District again anytime soon, keep an eye out for me. Reliable partners are hard to come by out here. Take care.

Source: <Check for signs of life.>
Target: <생명의 징후를 확인한다.>

Source: Ah. Though the return of this document means we can legally set up shop in Orsinium, it brings no joy to my heart. <<1>> was more than our partner, she was my love.\n\nStill, you have my gratitude. May the sun and stars shine a light upon your path.
Target: 아. 이 허가증이 반환되면 합법적으로 오시니움에 상점을 차릴 수 있을테지만, 제 마음에 아무런 기쁨도 가져다 주지 않는군요. <<1>>는 저희의 파트너 이상이었고, 그녀는 제 사랑이었습니다.\n\n그렇다 하더라도, 당신에게 감사를 표합니다. 당신의 길에 태양과 별이 빛나기를.

Source: Now you can get back to relaxing.
Target: Now you can get back to relaxing.

Source: Yes, but his work didn't turn out well. He resurrected his pet senche, and things went very poorly.
Target: 그래, 하지만 그의 일은 잘 되지 않았어. 그는 그의 펫이였던 센치를 되살려냈는데, 일이 잘 안풀렸거든.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <Finish the job.>

Source: Oh, wait, we're not done yet! I promised you compensation for your help, and I'm a Breton of my word. I know it's not much, but take this.\n\nAnd may we never see dragons over Solitude.
Target: Oh, wait, we're not done yet! I promised you compensation for your help, and I'm a Breton of my word. I know it's not much, but take this.\n\nAnd may we never see dragons over Solitude.

Source: Excellent. I had a good feeling about you, and as usual, I was right.\n\nFrom now on, consider yourself free to pursue any antiquities that interest you. We will catalog your findings for study, and together we will uncover the mysteries of this world.
Target: Excellent. I had a good feeling about you, and as usual, I was right.\n\nFrom now on, consider yourself free to pursue any antiquities that interest you. We will catalog your findings for study, and together we will uncover the mysteries of this world.

Source: Oh, wait, we're not done yet! I promised you compensation for your help, and I'm a Breton of my word. I know it's not much, but take this.\n\nAnd may we never see dragons over Solitude.
Target: Oh, wait, we're not done yet! I promised you compensation for your help, and I'm a Breton of my word. I know it's not much, but take this.\n\nAnd may we never see dragons over Solitude.

Source: Inquisitor Roche has prepared a ritual which will summon the courier's spirit.  This will be the only way for me to discover where the murder weapon was hidden.
Target: 심문관 Roche는 급사의 영혼을 소환할 준비를 마쳤습니다.이 방법만이 살해할때 쓰인 살인 무기가 어디에 있는지 알 수 있는 마지막 방법입니다.

Source: I showed your new recruits a thing or two.
Target: I showed your new recruits a thing or two.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <Finish the job.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <Finish the job.>

Source: <<1>> will be grateful to have his goats back, but you'll have more than a goatherd's thanks for dealing with those werewolves. Left unchecked, their pack would grow and they'd make bolder attacks than simple goat-snatching.\n\nHere's your pay.
Target: <<1>> will be grateful to have his goats back, but you'll have more than a goatherd's thanks for dealing with those werewolves. Left unchecked, their pack would grow and they'd make bolder attacks than simple goat-snatching.\n\nHere's your pay.

Source: Another honor?
Target: Another honor?

Source: I suspected as much. Well, at least now I can put this whole incident behind me.\n\nHere's your payment, for completion of this task as well as your … discretion. There's no need for the torrid details of this affair to get out.
Target: I suspected as much. Well, at least now I can put this whole incident behind me.\n\nHere's your payment, for completion of this task as well as your … discretion. There's no need for the torrid details of this affair to get out.

Source: I knew I was sending them to their deaths, but still. I couldn't let Avanaire get away.\n\nIf not for you, the surrounding towns would have been overrun with yaghra. You've saved many today … even if some were lost. Here, take this for your service.
Target: 내가 그들을 죽음에 이르게 했다는 걸 알고 있네. 할 말이 없군. 아바나이레가 도망가게 둘 수 없었네.\n\n자네가 없었다면, 주변 마을들은 야그라로 넘쳐 났을 걸세. 자네는 오늘 많은 이들을 구했네 ... 비록 몇몇을 잃긴 했지만 말일세. 여기, 이걸 대가로 가져 가게.

Source: Even now, I still feel for them. What a miserable fate. I wish it could have been different. That Corgrad might have been redeemed ….\n\nI used up most of my means traveling here, but take this with my gratitude.
Target: Even now, I still feel for them. What a miserable fate. I wish it could have been different. That Corgrad might have been redeemed ….\n\nI used up most of my means traveling here, but take this with my gratitude.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <Finish the job.>

Source: Well, that is troublesome. Still, I expect Narilin knows well enough to keep away. And no one else need know of her change.\n\nHere's your payment. And, of course, discretion is key here. As far as you and I are concerned, Niralin died in that grove.
Target: 음, 그거 곤란하군요. 하지만 니랄린이 멀리 떨어져 있어야 한다는 건 아는 것 같네요. 그리고 아무도 그녀의 변화를 알 필요가 없겠지요.\n\n여기 보수입니다. 그리고 물론 입을 다무는 게 중요하지요. 당신과 제가 알기로, 니랄린은 그 숲에서 죽은 겁니다.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <Finish the job.>

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <Finish the job.>

Source: This should appease the Orcs of Mor Khazgur. They can embrace Skreg's defeat without considering it a slight on their honor. Hopefully their next champion is less controversial.\n\nHere's something to celebrate your victory.
Target: This should appease the Orcs of Mor Khazgur. They can embrace Skreg's defeat without considering it a slight on their honor. Hopefully their next champion is less controversial.\n\nHere's something to celebrate your victory.

Source: I have found evidence of the werewolves where abouts and reported my findings to Dr. Holcombe.
Target: 나는 늑대인간의 행방에 대한 흔적을 발견했고, 나의 조사 결과를 Holcombe 박사에게 알렸습니다.

Source: Will you remain as the Moon-Bishop?
Target: Will you remain as the Moon-Bishop?

Source: The return of Arch-Mage Shalidor! Truly a reason for all sons of Skyrim to smile.
Target: The return of Arch-Mage Shalidor! Truly a reason for all sons of Skyrim to smile.

Source: I see. Well, at least I won't have to begin my marriage negotiations anew. As long as Niralin's willing to put this incident behind her, all will be well.\n\nHere's your payment, for a task well completed and your … discretion on the matter.
Target: 그렇군요. 음, 최소한 제 결혼 협상을 새로 시작하지는 않아도 되겠네요. 니랄린이 이 사건을 잊을 의지가 있는 한 모든 게 잘 될 겁니다.\n\n여기 임무를 완수하고 ... 이 일을 사려 깊게 처리한 대에 보수입니다.

Source: That should prove to some of these cowards that there are better ways to deal with witchcraft than sprinkling salt over their shoulders and pray to the divines.\n\nThe Swords of Solitude are honored by your victory. Take this with our gratitude.
Target: That should prove to some of these cowards that there are better ways to deal with witchcraft than sprinkling salt over their shoulders and pray to the divines.\n\nThe Swords of Solitude are honored by your victory. Take this with our gratitude.

Source: People often forget to return Guild property. What a welcome surprise. And even better, you didn't bring that shifty mud-mouth with you! It brings me no small measure of joy to know he found nothing.\n\nTake this. News like this is worth every drake!
Target: People often forget to return Guild property. What a welcome surprise. And even better, you didn't bring that shifty mud-mouth with you! It brings me no small measure of joy to know he found nothing.\n\nTake this. News like this is worth every drake!

Source: You helped the High King select King Alard? What an excellent choice, friend!
Target: You helped the High King select King Alard? What an excellent choice, friend!

Source: So, the mud-mouth opportunist finally gets his just desserts? Ha! The Mages Guild would happily take that off your hands.\n\nI will reverse the spell … eventually. Why rush a teachable moment, eh? Take this. You have more than earned it, I think.
Target: So, the mud-mouth opportunist finally gets his just desserts? Ha! The Mages Guild would happily take that off your hands.\n\nI will reverse the spell … eventually. Why rush a teachable moment, eh? Take this. You have more than earned it, I think.

Source: All hail Queen Eselde, ruler of Shornhelm! May her wisdom and beauty guide us for years to come!
Target: All hail Queen Eselde, ruler of Shornhelm! May her wisdom and beauty guide us for years to come!

Source: This festival seems interesting. How do I join in?
Target: 재밌어 보이는 축제네요. 제가 어떻게 참여할수 있을까요?

Source: This festival seems interesting.  How do I join in?
Target: 재밌어 보이는 축제네요. 제가 어떻게 참여할수 있을까요?

Source: This festival seems interesting.  How do I join in?
Target: 재밌어 보이는 축제네요. 제가 어떻게 참여할수 있을까요?

Source: Of course you did, young blood. I never had a doubt.\n\nYou've earned your reward and some rest. I expect to see you bright eyed and bushy tailed when these coven witches rear their ugly heads again.
Target: Of course you did, young blood. I never had a doubt.\n\nYou've earned your reward and some rest. I expect to see you bright eyed and bushy tailed when these coven witches rear their ugly heads again.

Source: You've done more than enough for a broken old man. I'd like to see the faces of everyone when I tell them. It'll take a while with this limp, but I've got something to live for now.\n\nAll I can offer you is this. Thank you.
Target: You've done more than enough for a broken old man. I'd like to see the faces of everyone when I tell them. It'll take a while with this limp, but I've got something to live for now.\n\nAll I can offer you is this. Thank you.

Source: My friend Mordroc said you helped him...wouldn't share specifics though...
Target: My friend Mordroc said you helped him...wouldn't share specifics though...

Source: I participated in a Battleground game.
Target: 나는 배틀그라운드 게임에 참여했어.

Source: What now?
Target: 이제 어떡하죠?

Source: How can I help you complete the rest of the model?
Target: 모형의 나머지 부분을 완료하기 위해선 내가 어떻게 도와줄수 있을까?

Source: Thank the Three! All three of them! This wine is perfect for selling. To other people.\n\nYou are my new and bestest friend. If you ever have need of wine, remember my name—Drothan. The Winemaster.
Target: Thank the Three! All three of them! This wine is perfect for selling. To other people.\n\nYou are my new and bestest friend. If you ever have need of wine, remember my name—Drothan. The Winemaster.

Source: About time there was a strong Redguard leading the Fighters Guild. He'll keep the outlanders in line!
Target: About time there was a strong Redguard leading the Fighters Guild. He'll keep the outlanders in line!

Source: An excellent decision. Mastering the Eye is no small endeavor. But with Gabrielle's tutelage and my rigorous oversight, we may make a true scholar of you yet.\n\nWelcome to the Circle, Antiquarian.
Target: An excellent decision. Mastering the Eye is no small endeavor. But with Gabrielle's tutelage and my rigorous oversight, we may make a true scholar of you yet.\n\nWelcome to the Circle, Antiquarian.

Source: No, I convinced her. She said she would be here.
Target: 아니요, 전 벨사를 설득했어요. 그녀는 여기 올 거라고 말했어요.

Source: Take care of yourself, Naryu.
Target: 조심해. 나류

Source: We had a deal.
Target: 거래를 했었잖아.

Source: The buyers still around?
Target: 구매자가 아직 있어?

Source: We had a deal.
Target: 거래를 했었잖아.

Source: <<1>> wanted you to have this ledger.
Target: <<1>>는 네가 이 장부를 가지길 바라.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떡할 거야?

Source: That's a very meaningful gesture from a newcomer. The Office of Divine Prosecution will have to handle their official return, of course, to preserve the integrity of the fallen, but I'm sure the families will be grateful for their return.
Target: 신참으로서는 매우 의미있는 행동이군. 물론 디바인의 종사 사무국이 공식적으로 그들의 귀환을 처리해야 할 것이네. 사망자들의 순결을 유지하기 위해서지. 하지만 가족들은 귀환에 대해 고마워할 것이라고 확신하네.

Source: Where will she stay?
Target: 레이디 술리마는 어디에 머무를 거야?

Source: You know, facing off against a foe? Well, that's just another day for us. Facing off against a plague? Now that takes some guts.\n\nThere's a few Undaunted who would even consider this pledge, but here you are. I'd say a reward is in order.
Target: You know, facing off against a foe? Well, that's just another day for us. Facing off against a plague? Now that takes some guts.\n\nThere's a few Undaunted who would even consider this pledge, but here you are. I'd say a reward is in order.

Source: Why not try that? Let's go talk to your half-sister in Rimmen?
Target: 시도해보지 그래요? 이복 여동생이 림멘에 있다고 했잖아요.

Source: Heard those creatures in that mountain aren't right. Seems this disease has them riled up, aggressive as all Oblivion. Would have been just my type of pledge, if not for all the pus.\n\nI'd say you earned yourself a reward … and a good scrub down.
Target: Heard those creatures in that mountain aren't right. Seems this disease has them riled up, aggressive as all Oblivion. Would have been just my type of pledge, if not for all the pus.\n\nI'd say you earned yourself a reward … and a good scrub down.

Source: Raz did indeed! On behalf of Queen Ayrenn, this is for you.\n\nIronic how Summerset was saved by one of the newcomers it so distrusts. This is a good lesson for the High Elves, yes? Maybe now they'll realize that change is not so bad after all.
Target: 라즈는 그랬지! 아이렌 여왕님을 대신해, 이건 널 위한 거야.\n\n그렇게 불신하는 신입자가 서머셋을 구원하다니 얼마나 모순적인지. 이건 하이 엘프들에게 좋은 교훈이 될 거야, 그렇지? 아마 이제 그들은 변화가 결국 그렇게 나쁘지만은 않다는 걸 깨닫게 될 거야.

Source: I can just imagine it. You and Scalecaller, weapons raised, clashing on the snowy mountaintop in a battle for the ages …. Well damn, maybe I should have been a bard.\n\nHere's your reward, and a promise that I won't be taking up poetry anytime soon.
Target: I can just imagine it. You and Scalecaller, weapons raised, clashing on the snowy mountaintop in a battle for the ages …. Well damn, maybe I should have been a bard.\n\nHere's your reward, and a promise that I won't be taking up poetry anytime soon.

Source: I wish to join the Dark Brotherhood. I accept.
Target: 다크 브라더후드에 들어가고 싶습니다. 받아 들이죠.

Source: I'll tell Yisareh she'll need to find more than brittle bones and pasty necromancers for future pledges. They don't put up enough of a fuss.\n\nFor turning Fang Lair back into a plain old graveyard. You've earned your key and your cut.
Target: I'll tell Yisareh she'll need to find more than brittle bones and pasty necromancers for future pledges. They don't put up enough of a fuss.\n\nFor turning Fang Lair back into a plain old graveyard. You've earned your key and your cut.

Source: When I sent you to kill that lot of necromancers, I didn't expect you'd get to tangle with anything as nasty as a Dragon! Dead or not, I'm jealous.\n\nYou're gonna tell me all about it over drinks sometime. Take your key and cut, Dragon Slayer.
Target: When I sent you to kill that lot of necromancers, I didn't expect you'd get to tangle with anything as nasty as a Dragon! Dead or not, I'm jealous.\n\nYou're gonna tell me all about it over drinks sometime. Take your key and cut, Dragon Slayer.

Source: I don't think it gets better than letting a schemer finish their master plan to perfection, then kicking the whole thing over! Did he cry? Haha!\n\nFor killing Orryn the Black and smashing his pet Thurvokun to pieces, you've earned your key and cut!
Target: I don't think it gets better than letting a schemer finish their master plan to perfection, then kicking the whole thing over! Did he cry? Haha!\n\nFor killing Orryn the Black and smashing his pet Thurvokun to pieces, you've earned your key and cut!

Source: I thought I might be sending you on a wild goose chase, but it seems Winfred wasn't exaggerating her discovery. I wish more of these troubling claims turned out to be nothing at all.\n\nHere's your payment. Hope you won't be spending it all on repairs.
Target: I thought I might be sending you on a wild goose chase, but it seems Winfred wasn't exaggerating her discovery. I wish more of these troubling claims turned out to be nothing at all.\n\nHere's your payment. Hope you won't be spending it all on repairs.

Source: I've completed your challenge.
Target: 도전을 완료했어.

Source: And get my soul back.
Target: And get my soul back.

Source: I've completed your challenge.
Target: 도전을 완료했어.

Source: I've completed your challenge.
Target: 도전을 완료했어.

Source: Is there anything else I can do to help?
Target: 내가 도울 것이 있나?

Source: Thanks, Fa'ren.
Target: 고마워, Fa'ren.

Source: Excellent! The furnace is the only suitable place for any Daedric scripture. And destroying those cocoons should put an end to those Daedras' dark machinations. \n\nYou've done Summerset a great service, deputy. And so quickly too! My.
Target: 잘 했네. 데이드라의 경전이 있을 곳은 불구덩이 뿐이지. 그리고 그 고치를 파괴한 것은 데이드라의 어두운 음모에 종지부를 찍어 줄 것이야.\n\n서머셋을 위해 아주 큰 수고를 했네, 대리인. 그리고 정말 신속했어!

Source: Oh course you did, young blood. I never had a doubt.\n\nYou've earned your reward and some rest. I expect to see you bright eyed and bushy tailed when these coven witches rear their ugly heads again.
Target: Oh course you did, young blood. I never had a doubt.\n\nYou've earned your reward and some rest. I expect to see you bright eyed and bushy tailed when these coven witches rear their ugly heads again.

Source: Fantastic! One less unwanted nuisance to worry about on our fair shores.\n\nThank you for your contribution to keeping our home pure.
Target: 훌륭하군! 우리의 잔잔한 해변에서 걱정해야 할 원치 않는 성가신 한 가지였어.\n\n이 땅을 청결하게 유지하는 데 기여해줘서 고맙네.

Source: Well done. Let's hope those vile things are sealed away for good.\n\nYou have the thanks of the Office of Divine Prosecution—and the Psijic Order, I suspect. If Esulo recovers any more of those books, I'll know who to call.
Target: 훌륭하군요. 이번 일로 그 사악한 것들이 봉인되었기를 바랍니다.\n\n예상컨데 디바인의 종사 사무실과 시직 결사의 감사를 받을 자격이 있어요. 만약 Esulo가 그런 책을 더 되찾으면, 누구에게 말해야 할지 알겠군요.

Source: Let's split the loot.
Target: 전리품을 분할합시다.\n

Source: Ah, very good! The Sapiarchs will be pleased to hear it. From what I've heard, their 58th Day of the Divine Reverence to Mara is soon to take place. These roses are vital to that ceremony!\n\nYour diligence is duly noted by the Divine Prosecution.
Target: 아, 아주 좋아! 새피아크들이 이 소식을 들으면 기뻐할 거야. 내가 들은 바로는, 마라에 대한 그들의 58번째 신성한 경배일이 곧 거행될 것이라는군. 이 장미들은 그 의식에 꼭 필요한 것이야!\n\n디바인의 종사는 자네의 성실함을 정식으로 기록해두고 있네.

Source: What do you need me to do?
Target: 제가 뭘 하면 될까요?

Source: You saw my dream. Clearly Vaermina's cult, the Supernal Dreamers, is behind this betrayal by the Midnight Union.\n\nThe outlaws of the Union took the Dream Shard, but I fear it's for Vaermina's evil purposes. We must recover it.
Target: 당신은 제 꿈을 봤죠. 분명 베르미나의 신도인 숭고한 몽상가들은 미드나잇유니언에 의한 배신의 배후에 있어요.\n\n연합의 무법자들이 꿈의 조각을 가져갔지만, 저는 베르미나의 사악한 목적이 두려워요. 우리는 반드시 되찾아야 해요.

Source: And collected the plans as well! Very good. These will be useful for tracking their movements. As soon as we have the resources, we'll rid Summerset of this filth, once and for all.\n\nI thank you for your service. Live well and serve, deputy.
Target: 그리고 계획도 수집했군! 아주 좋아. 그들의 움직임을 추적하는데 유용할 거야. 여력이 생기는 즉시 서머셋에서 이 쓰레기들을 제거할 거라네.\n\n자네의 노고에 감사하네. 수고하게, 대리인.

Source: What a relief. I thought my Argonian colleague might try to skin me instead if I didn't procure her samples. I can assure you, Wood Elves are not made of wood.\n\nHere you go. Fair market value, I promise.
Target: What a relief. I thought my Argonian colleague might try to skin me instead if I didn't procure her samples. I can assure you, Wood Elves are not made of wood.\n\nHere you go. Fair market value, I promise.

Source: Yes. I destroyed them.
Target: 네. 전부 파괴해버렸죠.

Source: Oh, he put you up to that, didn't he? Papa always loves to embellish his journeys.\n\nWhatever the truth is, I'm just glad you brought him home safe. If all newcomers are so kind, Summerset will be fortunate to have you.
Target: 오, 아빠가 널 그렇게 만들었지, 그렇지? 아빠는 항상 자신의 여정을 꾸미기를 좋아하셔.\n\n진실이 무엇이든, 네가 아빠를 집에 안전하게 데려 와줘서 기뻐. 모든 신입자들이 친절하다면, 서머셋에 너를 행운으로 여길거야.

Source: Yes, it has.
Target: Yes, it has.

Source: Your trust is well placed.
Target: Your trust is well placed.

Source: It's done. The giants appear to have accepted the offering.
Target: It's done. The giants appear to have accepted the offering.

Source: No, but I did fulfill the contract.
Target: No, but I did fulfill the contract.

Source: So you are the one King Fahara'jad has placed his faith in? I hope it is well-founded.
Target: 그래서 자네가 Fahara'jad 왕이 신임하는 자인가? 사람을 제대로 본 거였으면 좋겠군.

Source: The cultists need a new leader.
Target: 광신도들은 새로운 지도자를 찾아야 할 겁니다.

Source: They have.
Target: They have.

Source: That's what Laryaril said.
Target: 라리아릴이 그렇게 말하더군요.

Source: I played my part.
Target: I played my part.

Source: This one never trusted Ambassador Tarinwe. At least we'll have an embassy in Elden Root.
Target: This one never trusted Ambassador Tarinwe. At least we'll have an embassy in Elden Root.

Source: I found the lost instrument and recovered the stolen money.
Target: I found the lost instrument and recovered the stolen money.

Source: Thanks for pitching in. I think we've saved enough crops to make it through the winter.\n\nBut why did this happen? What's it all about?
Target: Thanks for pitching in. I think we've saved enough crops to make it through the winter.\n\nBut why did this happen? What's it all about?

Source: With Admiral Viscarne dead, now is the time to strike. I shall rally my people and call Sunnawel to my side. We'll form a resistance the likes of which these sea snakes have never known.\n\nThank you for making this all possible.
Target: With Admiral Viscarne dead, now is the time to strike. I shall rally my people and call Sunnawel to my side. We'll form a resistance the likes of which these sea snakes have never known.\n\nThank you for making this all possible.

Source: Excellent! You won't regret this decision, I swear.\n\nHere's the deed and key to the room. Took me a while, but I finally was able to take them back from the last tenant. Required more time in the sewers than I had hoped for, but hey, that's business.
Target: 훌륭해! 이 결정에 후회하지 않을거야, 맹새해.\n\n여기 방 열쇠와 증명서야. 시간이 좀 걸리긴 했지만, 마지막 입주자 한테서 방 열쇠와 증명서를 결국 되찾았어.  내가 기대했던것 보다 시궁창에서 그 이상의 시간이 걸리긴 했어. 하지만 이봐, 이런게 사업이라구.

Source: You've proven quite adept with strange mechanisms. We could use more like you in the Coterie. I'm more partial to the workings of living things, but I am fascinated by the lifelike behavior of Dwemer constructs.\n\nHere's your commission. Well done!
Target: You've proven quite adept with strange mechanisms. We could use more like you in the Coterie. I'm more partial to the workings of living things, but I am fascinated by the lifelike behavior of Dwemer constructs.\n\nHere's your commission. Well done!

Source: Take care of yourself, Naryu.
Target: 조심해, 나류.

Source: Frankly, I'm uncertain about the merits of this avenue of research, but the Coterie is about the pursuit of academic excellence, so I must trust in the process.\n\nI thought you were crazy to do it, but I admire your bravery! Here, your reward.
Target: Frankly, I'm uncertain about the merits of this avenue of research, but the Coterie is about the pursuit of academic excellence, so I must trust in the process.\n\nI thought you were crazy to do it, but I admire your bravery! Here, your reward.

Source: Gray Vipers. I've met my quota of them.
Target: Gray Vipers. I've met my quota of them.

Source: Not really. But I fulfilled the contract.
Target: Not really. But I fulfilled the contract.

Source: Yeah. Normally I'd put on a show, but this was personal. Honestly, I took it easy on him. If I'd really poured it on, he'd be breathing through his ear hole.\n\nAnyway, thanks for all the help. You ever need somebody knocked out, you let me know, eh?
Target: Yeah. Normally I'd put on a show, but this was personal. Honestly, I took it easy on him. If I'd really poured it on, he'd be breathing through his ear hole.\n\nAnyway, thanks for all the help. You ever need somebody knocked out, you let me know, eh?

Source: I cut some down for you.
Target: I cut some down for you.

Source: Yes, I have.
Target: Yes, I have.

Source: Yes.

Source: We are the jungle. We were trapped in the city of stone by the Elf-things, unable to drink from the sun. But you have freed us. Even now the green calls us back to the fold. We will … do what we can to atone.\n\nWe thank you.

Source: You fought the agents of Mehrunes Dagon, and won! The savior of Firsthold!

Source: Well, you're full of surprises! You weren't followed here, were you?\n\nNo, no, never mind, I'm sure everything's fine. Thank you for delivering this! Good for the crew's morale.
Target: 이런, 언제나 사람을 놀라게 하는구만! 뒤에 붙은 사람은 없었겠지?\n\n아니, 아니, 신경쓰지 마. 분명 전부 괜찮을 테니까. 이걸 전해줘서 고마워! 승무원들의 사기에 좋은 물건이거든.

Source: Oh, excellent! Let me see. Oh my, look at this gibberish. Driven insane by ancient ruins? This is a gold mine! The pseudo-intellectuals of Elden Root love this stuff.\n\nThe commentary volumes alone will keep me employed for years to come.
Target: 아, 멋지네요! 어디 봐요. 세상에, 이 횡설수설 좀 보세요. 고대의 유적 때문에 미쳐버린 걸까요? 이거 완전 노다지네요! 엘든 루트의 사이비 지식인들이 이런 물건을 엄청 좋아하거든요.\n\n해설서만 따로 내도 몇 년은 벌어먹을 수 있을 거에요.

Target: 저는 당신이 최선을 다한것을 알고 있으며 정말로 감사하고 있습니다.\n\n우리는 함께 붙어 다니면서 가까운 요새를 찾을 것입니다. 경호원을 몇 명 고용해서 오시니움으로 갈 생각입니다. 우리 모두 당신이 해준일을 절대 잊지 않을거에요. 우리 중 누구라도 말이죠.

Source: I must get as far away from here as possible before <<1>> captures me again. \n\nPerhaps I'll stow away on a merchant's ship. I doubt anyone else would show me such kindness. Goodbye. And thank you.

Source:
At this point? We stay patient and watchful. Also quiet. If Molag Bal catches our scent, we may lose him completely. 

We have motive now, but the bones of a plot aren't enough. We need plans, names, timetables ….

Keep watching. I'll do the same.
Target:
At this point? We stay patient and watchful. Also quiet. If Molag Bal catches our scent, we may lose him completely. 

We have motive now, but the bones of a plot aren't enough. We need plans, names, timetables ….

Keep watching. I'll do the same.

Target: 드레모라 몇 놈들을 만나서 죽였죠.

Target: 풀어주어서 고마워!

Source: I have heard rumors of such a place. We shall go there at once. And have no fear. I will make sure that your friends arrive safely.\n\nPerhaps the city will provide me more clues as to the magic I seek.
Target: 그곳에 대한 소문은 들어 봤다. 즉시 거기로 가야겠군. 그리고 걱정은 마라. 네 친구들을 안전하게 데려가겠다고 약속하겠다.\n\n도시에서 내가 찾는 마법의 단서를 더 얻을 수 있을지도 모르지.

Source: At least I get to stretch my legs. Thanks for that.

Source: No details, please!\n\nWith <<1>> and my ruby back, I just may survive this trip. I kept a few coins for expenses. Here, take them with my thanks.
Target: No details, please!\n\nWith <<1>> and my ruby back, I just may survive this trip. I kept a few coins for expenses. Here, take them with my thanks.

Source: Ha ha! Got your nose!
Target: 하하! Got your nose(*어린 아이들 놀이)!\n

Source: Okay, that's done.
