Source: Wonderful! And I do believe the prophecy is fulfilled. Did I … forget to mention the prophecy?\n\nAhem. "<<1>> shall return in the hour of Wrothgar's greatest need, to a hero worthy of <<2>>'s legacy." Seems rather direct, as these things go.
Target: Wonderful! And I do believe the prophecy is fulfilled. Did I … forget to mention the prophecy?\n\nAhem. \\"<<1>> shall return in the hour of Wrothgar's greatest need
column4: to a hero worthy of <<2>>'s legacy.\"\" Seems rather direct

Source: Clearly, you were meant to help us out. Jone and Jode have a sense of humor, yes? And, of course, Raz thinks discretion deserves a reward.
Target: 정말로 우리를 도와줄 의사가 있었던 거로군. 존과 조드께서 유머 감각이 있으신 모양이야? 그리고 물론, 라즈는 행동에 보상이 따라야 한다고 생각하지.

Source: You've done more for me and my people than I could have ever expected. Thank you.\n\nNow get to the temple and make sure Eveli and the high priestess are all right.
Target: You've done more for me and my people than I could have ever expected. Thank you.\n\nNow get to the temple and make sure Eveli and the high priestess are all right.

Source: Well, with or without the scroll, Egnatius is an asset. He speaks a dozen dead languages, can read a dozen more. He knows the city better than I do. He's also remarkably spry for an old person.\n\nWe'll find a use for him.
Target: Well, with or without the scroll, Egnatius is an asset. He speaks a dozen dead languages, can read a dozen more. He knows the city better than I do. He's also remarkably spry for an old person.\n\nWe'll find a use for him.

Source: No, I don't want that foul thing. I want to remember Khoruzoth as my son, not as Thukhozod's legacy. I should never have let him read his father's letter.\n\nYou keep the amulet. As a thank you for letting me know what happened to my son.
Target: 아뇨, 전 그런 나쁜 짓을 하고 싶진 않아요. 저는 제 아들을 쓰쿠조드의 유산이 아닌 제 아들로서 기억하길 원해요. 저는 그 아이가 그의 아버지의 편지를 읽지 못하게끔 했었어야 했는데.\n\n당신이 그 목걸이를 지니고 다녀주세요. 제 아들에게 무슨 일이 일어났는지 알려주셔서 감사합니다.

Source: A pleasure doing business with you. It's a shame about Khoruzoth, but there's nothing we can do about that. Better that his mother lives with the hope that he might come home some day.\n\nAs for Bardun and me, we'll be off soon. Best of luck to you.
Target: 당신과 일을 할수 있어서 기뻤습니다. 코루자스에 대한 일은 유감이지만, 우리가 할 수 있는 일은 없습니다. 언젠가 그가 집에 돌아올 것이라는 희망을 가지고 그의 어머니가 살아 가게끔 두는것이 나을 것입니다.\n\n바둔과 저는, 곧 있으면 떠날것입니다. 행운을 빌어요.

Source: They'll need some more recruits.
Target: 놈들은 신병을 더 뽑아야 할 거에요.

Source: You came to Wrothgar to help Kurog unite our people and rebuild this great city. Despite how we got here, you accomplished everything the king asked of you.\n\nNow I have a request, if you're willing to provide one more service to the Orcs.
Target: You came to Wrothgar to help Kurog unite our people and rebuild this great city. Despite how we got here, you accomplished everything the king asked of you.\n\nNow I have a request, if you're willing to provide one more service to the Orcs.

Source: Well met. I have urgent news for Thane Fjora.
Target: 잘 됐네요. 피요라 종사에게 전할 급한 소식이 있습니다.

Source: Yes. But I burned their bodies.
Target: 네. 하지만 제가 시신들을 불태웠습니다.

Source: I destroyed the lute and left the bard in a cage.
Target: I destroyed the lute and left the bard in a cage.

Source: Did you really destroy the Daedric portal at Moonhenge all by yourself?
Target: Did you really destroy the Daedric portal at Moonhenge all by yourself?

Source: I've already lost everything. The Pact killed my father for dissenting, and my mother died of grief. What you see here is all I have left in this world.\n\nBut I certainly don't need your pity. Leave me.
Target: I've already lost everything. The Pact killed my father for dissenting, and my mother died of grief. What you see here is all I have left in this world.\n\nBut I certainly don't need your pity. Leave me.

Source: And not a moment too soon.\n\nI managed to subdue one of the tomes. It's proven most enlightening.
Target: 아슬아슬한 시점에 해내셨네요.\n\n책 하나를 간신히 붙잡았거든요. 가장 도움이 되는 책이었죠.

Source: Most certainly. Thanks to your efforts, my children are free. They won't give you any more trouble.\n\nAnd, as I promised, my children will aid you when you need it most.
Target: 확실히 그럴 것이다. 네 노력 덕분에 내 아이들이 풀려났으니까. 더는 문제를 일으키지 않을 것이다.\n\n그리고 약속했던 대로, 내 아이들이 정말 필요한 때에 널 도와줄 것이다.

Source: Almost joined the Maulborn myself. They seemed like good people doing good work. Did they fool me!
Target: Almost joined the Maulborn myself. They seemed like good people doing good work. Did they fool me!

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: I think the Guard can manage a reward.\n\nHere you go, compliments of the king.
Target: I think the Guard can manage a reward.\n\nHere you go, compliments of the king.

Source: Aren't you the one who defeated the ghost of Sinmur?
Target: Aren't you the one who defeated the ghost of Sinmur?

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: It's absolutely delicious, though. Oh well.
Target: 정말 맛있군, 와.

Source: I know, I know—it's a tough sell. But trust me, you're missing out.
Target: 나는 압니다. 힘든 판매입니다. 하지만 날 믿어. 너 빠져있어.\n

Source: I understand. Some people can't eat food with a face on it.
Target: 이해 했어. 어떤 사람들은 얼굴이있는 음식을 먹을 수 없습니다.

Source: Valenwood still exists because you defeated the Veiled Heritance. I honor you.
Target: Valenwood still exists because you defeated the Veiled Heritance. I honor you.

Source: Took your time, didn't you? Olvyia mentioned she sent a recruit to fetch these. Since you're here, we could show you the siege weapons.
Target: Took your time, didn't you? Olvyia mentioned she sent a recruit to fetch these. Since you're here, we could show you the siege weapons.

Source: I returned Mercano's journal to Mercano, who was deeply upset to learn that his studies had been used by the Veiled Heritance for such evil ends.
Target: 멜카노의 일지를 그에게 돌려 주었다. 그는 자신의 연구가 베일의 계승단이 꾸미는 사악한 목표를 위해 사용되었다는 사실에 깊이 분노했다.

Source: Your time here is done; others need to speak to you.
Target: Your time here is done; others need to speak to you.

Source: There's always more to learn, but the battlefields will be your teacher from this point on. The mission boards await. Start with a Scouting mission; you're less likely to die on one of those.\n\nWelcome to the war.
Target: There's always more to learn, but the battlefields will be your teacher from this point on. The mission boards await. Start with a Scouting mission; you're less likely to die on one of those.\n\nWelcome to the war.

Source: Finally! Zahreh promised these yesterday; we're always running low.\n\nThank you for delivering them.
Target: 드디어 왔군! 자레가 어제 약속했던 물건이지. 언제나 부족하거든.\n\n가져다줘서 고마워.

Source: Yes, yes. Shall I slap it down on the table so everyone can hear the coins clink?\n\nI pray you are more discrete in your departure.
Target: Yes, yes. Shall I slap it down on the table so everyone can hear the coins clink?\n\nI pray you are more discrete in your departure.

Source: Others need to speak with you now, warrior.
Target: 지금 당신과 말해봐야 하는 사람들이 있답니다, 전사님.

Source: Battle is the best teacher, warrior. Accept missions posted to the boards, experience the lands of Cyrodiil, and advance the Covenant cause. I suggest you start with a Scouting mission.\n\nHonor and faith be with you always!
Target: 전투는 최고의 스승이다, 전사여. 게시판에 게시된 임무를 받아들이고 시로딜의 땅을 경험하면서 대거폴 동맹의 이상을 확장시켜라. 정찰 임무부터 시작하는 것을 추천하지.\n\n언제나 명예와 신뢰를 가지도록!

Source: Flies and I will go warn Chief Bazrag. This whole thing … it's stranger even than any Investigator Vale story I've ever read.\n\nHere, take this. I found it and thought you should have it. For protecting Tal. I appreciate that.
Target: Flies and I will go warn Chief Bazrag. This whole thing … it's stranger even than any Investigator Vale story I've ever read.\n\nHere, take this. I found it and thought you should have it. For protecting Tal. I appreciate that.

Source: Indubitably! You've got a talent for relic hunting, and I'd be remiss if I didn't take advantage of that.\n\nHere's a list of the relics I believe await us in the wilds of Wrothgar. Find them, bring them here, and the museum will reward you handsomely.
Target: Indubitably! You've got a talent for relic hunting, and I'd be remiss if I didn't take advantage of that.\n\nHere's a list of the relics I believe await us in the wilds of Wrothgar. Find them, bring them here, and the museum will reward you handsomely.

Source: Then the bandits gave their answer. Heartless dogs! They were knights, once.\n\nWhen the Lion Guard marches, they'll receive an honorable death.
Target: 그렇다면 도적들이 그들의 답변을 보여준거군. 심장이 없는 개들 같으니! 그들은 한 때는 기사였어.\n\n라이온 가드가 행진할때면, 그들은 명예로운 죽음을 맞이하게 되겠지.

Source: I have the herbs and the case, just as you asked.
Target: 부탁했던 약초랑 상자를 가져왔어요.

Source: We'll get him, Khali.
Target: 우리가 놈을 잡을 거에요, 칼리.

Source: The Dominion never should've gone to Loriasel. The lamias ate them for breakfast!
Target: The Dominion never should've gone to Loriasel. The lamias ate them for breakfast!

Source: Thanks to you, Vicereeve Pelidil is dead and the Dominion has one enemy fewer.
Target: Thanks to you, Vicereeve Pelidil is dead and the Dominion has one enemy fewer.

Source: There's the one that uncovered the plot against Jorunn the Skald-King.
Target: There's the one that uncovered the plot against Jorunn the Skald-King.

Source: It's good you killed that skin-stealing alchemist. Paid him back for Hrondar, eh?
Target: It's good you killed that skin-stealing alchemist. Paid him back for Hrondar, eh?

Source: I'm amazed it worked at all, but thanks to you, I've made remarkable strides today. Neramo will be thrilled!\n\nPlease take this for your good work.
Target: 이게 제대로 작동하다니 나도 꽤 놀랐다네, 자네한테는 물론 감사한다네. 나는 오늘 놀라운 도약을 했다네. 네라모가 아주 좋아하겠어!\n\n사례로 이 물건을 받아주게나.

Source: This one knows the truth. The Argonians in the Gray Mire were spies. You did well to send them away.
Target: 이 몸은 진실을 알아. 회색 진창에 있는 아르고니안들은 첩자였다고. 놈들을 보내버린 것은 잘 한 일이야.

Source: That Sea Drake attack was the last straw. Iriana and I are going back to town and not leaving until we find a ship off this damned island.
Target: 지난 밤의 바다 드레이크 무리들로부터의 공격이 아마 마지막이었을 겁니다. 이리아나와 나는 마을로 돌아가서 이 망할 섬을 빠져나갈 배가 올 때까지 기다릴 작정입니다.

Source: Give you my gratitude.\n\nThe Daedra drove Nerien'eth to do this. I know it. I would leave this plane, but I cannot, knowing Nerien'eth is still out there. He may return, and on that day, I will do everything I can to free him from Daedric influence.
Target: 당신에게 감사를 표해요.\n\n데이드라가 Nerien'eth를 이런 짓을 하도록 몰아갔어요. 저는 알아요. 저는 이 차원을 떠나고 싶지만, Nerien'eth가 여전히 여기 있는걸 알면서도 그럴 수는 없어요. 남편이 돌아올지도 몰라요. 그가 돌아오면 저는 데이드라의 영향에서 벗어날 수 있도록 제가 할 수 있는 모든 일을 할 거에요.

Source: Good work. With this I can convince my superiors of the Imperial threat.  The Dominion needs more soldiers like you. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have an ambush to plan.
Target: 잘 하셨소. 이게 있으면 내 상관에게 제국의 위협을 확신시킬 수 있겠지. 자치령에는 당신같은 병사들이 더 필요하다오. 자, 양해해 주겠다면, 난 매복 계획을 짜야겠소.

Source: We did. And we truly cannot thank you enough. Without your help, none of us would have escaped that horrible place.
Target: 우리가 해냈어요. 이루 말할 수 없이 감사해요. 당신의 도움이 없었다면, 누구도 그 끔찍한 곳에서 벗어날 수 없었을 거예요.

Source: This confirms it. The Maulborn need to be wiped out.\n\nThanks for bringing this news, traveler. I'll inform the house leaders at once.
Target: 이것으로 확실해졌습니다. 마울본을 종식시켜야 합니다.\n\n소식을 가져다 주셔서 감사합니다. 가문의 지도자들께 바로 보고하도록 하죠.

Source: You have my thanks. These vine-twisted abominations may yet prove useful.
Target: You have my thanks. These vine-twisted abominations may yet prove useful.

Source: Yes, I am Oron Nassir, investigator for the Fahara'jad, ruler of the Nine Crowns. Although the missive is a bit late, I could use your help...
Target: 예, 저는  Fahara'jad의 조사관이자 Nine Crowns의 통치자인 Oron Nassir라네. 편지가 조금 늦었지만, 당신의 도움을 받을 수 있네 ...

Source: You're a liar and a cheat, Enthis.
Target: 넌 거짓말쟁이에 사기꾼이야,엔티스.

Source: You're a liar and a cheat, Turil.
Target: 넌 거짓말쟁이이고 사기꾼이야, Turil.

Source: You had no choice. You did what you had to.
Target: 선택권이 없었어. 넌 해야만했던 일을 한거야.

Source: Garil is dead.
Target: 가릴은 죽었어요.

Source: What am I missing?
Target: 내가 놓친게 뭐지?

Source: Garil is dead.
Target: 가릴은 죽었어요.

Source: You should be safe here. I'll find your husband.
Target: 여기선 안전할거에요. 남편분은 제가 찾아보죠.

Source: It's not safe here. You should get out now.
Target: 여긴 안전하지 않아요. 당장 나가셔야 합니다.

Source: <Claim bounty.>
Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: <Plant the Pact banner for Melril!>
Target: <Plant the Pact banner for Melril!>

Source: You've done good and holy work. \n\nTroubled souls must be put to rest so they do not rise again. You have my thanks for taking care of this for me.
Target: You've done good and holy work. \n\nTroubled souls must be put to rest so they do not rise again. You have my thanks for taking care of this for me.

Source: What? There's no fabulous treasure? There's no gold? I died for a bunch of moldy old books?\n\nAh, cruel fate! I wish I had a book before all this that would have told me what was in this stupid old keep!
Target: 뭐? 전설적인 보물이 없다고? 금이 없어? 내가 지겨운 낡은 책다발때문에 죽었다고?\n\n아, 잔혹한 운명이여! I wish I had a book before all this that would have told me what was in this stupid old keep!

Source: Wish we could have tossed Reachmen into the fire. Burn them like cordwood, add a little color to the smoke! Hah!
Target: Wish we could have tossed Reachmen into the fire. Burn them like cordwood, add a little color to the smoke! Hah!

Source: Pelidil? Then it's true. He's betrayed us. My brother's body didn't make it to Marbruk either. I knew he loved Naemon dearly, but I didn't think he'd stoop to this.\n\nI will once again require your aid.
Target: 펠리딜이? 그렇다면 사실이겠군. 놈은 우리를 배신했다. 내 동생의 시신 역시 마브룩에 도착하지 않았지. 펠리딜이 네이몬을 몹시 사랑했다는 건 알고 있었지만, 이 정도일 줄은 몰랐구나.\n\n다시 한번 너에게 도움을 청해야 할 것 같다.

Source: Oh, bitter fate. Now my crystal is my only friend.
Target: 오, 쓴 운명. 이제 내 결정은 내 유일한 친구 야.\n

Source: I am too … now.\n\nIf you would though, I still would prefer to keep this quiet. I do have a reputation to uphold, you know.
Target: 저도 그래요... 지금 이 순간 말이죠.\n\n그래도 이 일을 비밀로 하고 싶군요, 당신이 그래주신다면 말이에요. 당신도 아시다시피... 저는 지켜야 할 명성이 있거든요.

Source: Get out of here!
Target: 꺼져!

Source: I will vanish like Artaeum.
Target: 나는 Artaeum처럼 사라질 것이다.\n

Source: Blaise? Dead? That's good news.\n\nI've sent some of the miners to Councilor Virgile to recover. As soon as they're able, they'll return to the mine and clear out the rest of the Red Rooks. Well done, my friend.
Target: Blaise? 죽었다고? 그거 좋은 소식이군.\n\n광부들 중 몇 명을 의원 Virgile에게 보내서 회복하도록 했어. 가능한 한 빨리 광산으로 돌아가 나머지 Red Rook들을 쓸어버릴 거야 잘했어, 친구.

Source: You're a real piece of work. Here, don't expect my favor in the future.
Target: 너는 진짜 일하는 사람이야. 여기, 장래에 내 부탁을 기대하지 마라.\n

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: I see.\n\nI take no pleasure in my brother's death. I know he blamed me for his loss, but to come after his bloodkin in this way? It was what must be done.
Target: 그렇군.\n\n내 형의 죽음이 기쁘지는 않다네. 자기가 졌다는 사실을 두고 날 비난한 것은 알지만, 그렇다고 혈족들을 이렇게 만들다니? 이건 반드시 했어야만 하는 일이라네.

Source: Sorry for the pain, just give me the reward.
Target: 보상을주십시오.\n

Source: I think we can spare the men for that. Thank you for bringing this to my attention.
Target: 내 생각엔 우리가 그 사람들을 구할 수 있을 것 같아. 이걸 내게 알려줘서 고마워.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: What has the fool girl done?\n\nNever mind that. <<1>> has almost finished his antidote. Once <<2>> recovers, our warriors will find these bandits and crack open their skulls.
Target: 그 어리석은 여자애가 무슨 짓을 한 거람?\n\n신경쓰지 말게. <<1>>이 해독제를 거의 다 만들었으니까. <<2>>가 회복되고 나면, 우리 전사들이 저 도적놈들을 찾아내서 골통을 쪼개버릴 걸세.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Did you hear about the town of Long Haven? Vampires were luring the villagers into the mist.
Target: Did you hear about the town of Long Haven? Vampires were luring the villagers into the mist.

Source: I knew we never should have trusted Baron Montclair. Thanks for saving the city.
Target: 나는 몽클레어 남작을 신뢰해서는 안 된다는 것을 알고 있었습니다. 도시를 구해주셔서 감사합니다!

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: Go forth from this place with the blessings of the Bright Moons. We will always remember the honor you did the dead today.
Target: 빛나는 달님들의 축복과 함께 나아가세요. 저희는 오늘 당신이 망자들을 위해 보여주신 명예를 언제나 기억할 거랍니다.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: So the rumors are true?\n\nDumac take the Maulborn and the trouble they've caused! We won't let the Gorge fall again.
Target: 그래서 그 소문이 사실이라고?\n\n듀맥(Dumac)이 머울본과 그들이 일으킨 문제를 살펴보도록 할겁니다!우리는 협곡을 다시는 무너지게 만들지 않을 것입니다.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: About damn time we got some help out here. We're outmatched!\n\nCaptain Diiril will give you a little more insight into what's happening here.
Target: About damn time we got some help out here. We're outmatched!\n\nDiiril 대위는 이곳에서 무슨일이 일어났는지에 대한 조금 더 깊은 통찰력을 너에게 키워줄것이다.

Source: Selene's soul is mine, now. Today is a historic one for the Guild.\n\nI'll ensure my fallen colleagues receive honorable mentions in the next codex I write.
Target: Selene's soul is mine, now. Today is a historic one for the Guild.\n\nI'll ensure my fallen colleagues receive honorable mentions in the next codex I write.

Source: I knew you were the one I was waiting for!\n\nWhatever your purpose here, I can help you. Especially if it has anything to do with ruining Molag Bal's day. I have heard many secrets during my time here, and I shall share them with you.
Target: 내가 기다리던 자가 바로 너였을 줄 알았느니라!\n\n몰라그 발이 날 가둔 것은 다 이유가 있다. 날 두려워하지. 날 풀어 준다면 놈이 우리를 적으로 돌렸던 날을 후회하게 만들어줄 수 있을 것이니라.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <공고문을 읽는다>

Source: I-I should thank you, but I don't even think this is what I wanted. \n\nIt's been so long since my life was my own … this is all I know. I don't want to leave.
Target: 나, 나는 자네에게 감사해야 하겠지. 하지만 내가 뭘 원했는지도 생각나지 않는군.\n\n내 삶이 내 손을 떠난지 너무 오래 되었네... 이게 내가 아는 전부지. 이곳을 떠나기 싫네.

Source: You could've just taken care of your own business in there and left us to our fate. But you didn't. \n\nI owe you. If that strange city over there has a tavern, the first drink's on me. And … thanks.
Target: 당신은 저 안에서 자기 일만 처리하고 우리를 운명에 내버려둘 수도 있었소. 하지만 그러지 않았지.\n\n내가 빚을 졌소. 저기 있는 저 이상한 도시에 여관이 있다면 첫 잔은 내가 사지. 그리고... 고맙소.

Source: Yes, I believe it is. Akatosh be praised. Molag Bal will lash out, but the Dragonfires are safe, thanks to you.\n\nI only wish the price had been less dear. Centuries of lonely service is a heavy burden. I will pray for the Drake—and for you.
Target: Yes, I believe it is. Akatosh be praised. Molag Bal will lash out, but the Dragonfires are safe, thanks to you.\n\nI only wish the price had been less dear. Centuries of lonely service is a heavy burden. I will pray for the Drake—and for you.

Source: Thank you—I appreciate your trust. We'll have to act fast, but the loyal troops and I will get this camp cleaned up on the double. \n\nI think the Covenant will be proud of us.
Target: Thank you—I appreciate your trust. We'll have to act fast, but the loyal troops and I will get this camp cleaned up on the double. \n\nI think the Covenant will be proud of us.

Source: So that's how they did it …. I've been watching that garrison since the beginning. Caudex is difficult to read. Talented, but stubborn. Honestly, I'm surprised he gave this to you.\n\nI'll hold onto it for now. We'll find a use for it eventually.
Target: So that's how they did it …. I've been watching that garrison since the beginning. Caudex is difficult to read. Talented, but stubborn. Honestly, I'm surprised he gave this to you.\n\nI'll hold onto it for now. We'll find a use for it eventually.

Source: It seems fewer people than I'd hoped know of our cause. We have a lot of work to do to spread the word. It heartens me to know that those who know of our cause are mostly supportive, though.
Target: 우리의 목적을 알고 있을 거라고 생각했던 것보다 사람들이 더 적은 것 같아요. 우리는 소문을 퍼뜨리기 위해 해야 할 일이 많아요. 하지만 우리의 명분을 알고 있는 사람들 대부분에게 도움을 주고 있다는 사실을 알게 되어 나는 매우 기쁩니다.

Source: The Crestshade refugees are safe and Captain Janeve survived the battle. You had something to do with that, didn't you?
Target: 크레스트셰이드의 난민들이 안전해졌고 지휘부관 제네브가 전투에서 살아 남았어요. 당신이 도와줬던 거죠, 그렇죠?

Source: Oh noes! Well, here's your reward anyway.
Target: Oh noes! 어쨌든 여기에 보상이 있네.\n

Source: Then I'll distill an antidote immediately. With so many poisoned, we couldn't have repelled the bandits without your help.
Target: 그렇다면 당장 해독제를 증류해야겠군. 중독된 사람이 너무 많았으니, 당신이 없었으면 도적놈들을 물리칠 수 없었을 거야.

Source: No, you fool! Now Test Realm will be subjugated by summoned daedra for ages!\n\nJust take what I have left and go.
Target: No, you fool! Now Test Realm will be subjugated by summoned daedra for ages!\n\nJust take what I have left and go.

Source: This means three things. First, you were instrumental in crushing the pirate invasion of <<1>>. Second, the Dominion's leadership owes you a debt of thanks.\n\nAnd third, I am privileged to be the one who pays it. An honor to fight beside you.
Target: 이건 세 가지를 의미하네. 첫 번째, 자네는 <<1>>을 침략한 해적들을 분쇄하는데 중요한 일을 했다는 것. 두 번째, 자치령 지도부는 자네에게 감사의 빚을 지고 있다는 것.\n\n그리고 세 번째, 나는 그 보답을 내어주는 자가 되는 특권을 누린다는 것일세. 자네 옆에서 싸워 영광이었네.

Source: Excellent! He'll be perfectly safe. Well, assuming he avoids its gaping maw and other pointy bits, that is.
Target: 훌륭하군요! 그는 더할 나위 없이 안전할겁니다. 흠, 다르게 말하면 그가 그것의 벌어진 틈새와 뾰족한 부분들을 피한다고 가정한다면 말이죠.

Source: Rest in peace shape shifter.
Target: 평화롭게 쉬기를, shape shifter.

Source: I'm impressed. In truth I didn't expect you to surive.
Target: 인상적이군. 사실 나는 당신이 살아남을거라고 기대하지 않았네.\n

Source: Yes, I know of the place. My former master spoke of it once. Its presence annoyed him so.\n\nI'll go with the mages. Perhaps I'll even help them if they run into trouble. You never know. Find me when you're ready to do something significant.
Target: Yes, I know of the place. My former master spoke of it once. Its presence annoyed him so.\n\nI'll go with the mages. Perhaps I'll even help them if they run into trouble. You never know. Find me when you're ready to do something significant.

Source: The Hatching Pools recover, due to your efforts. You are truly a friend to the Hist.
Target: The Hatching Pools recover, due to your efforts. You are truly a friend to the Hist.

Source: Hah! The Hero of Coldharbour walks among us.
Target: Hah! The Hero of Coldharbour walks among us.

Source: You've done it! We have them all. Now I just need to closely study the books, together as a set.\n\nAnd we should be able to find Shalidor's island!
Target: 해냈구나! 이제 책들 전부를 가지고 있군. 이제 이 책들을 한 세트로서  연구할 일만 남았네.\n\n그리고 우리는 샬리도어님의 섬을 찾아낼 수 있을거야!

Source: A city? Ah, what an excellent idea. A warm bath, a glass of fine wine. I don't remember the last time I had such luxuries.\n\nThese dear mages and I will keep each other company along the way. We should have no problems reaching the place!
Target: A city? Ah, what an excellent idea. A warm bath, a glass of fine wine. I don't remember the last time I had such luxuries.\n\nThese dear mages and I will keep each other company along the way. We should have no problems reaching the place!

Source: Quelle horreur! When I said kill him, I didn't mean "kill him."
Target: Quelle horreur! When I said kill him, I didn't mean "kill him."

Source: Good, without their leader they won't be summoning anything.
Target: 선장 없이는 아무 것도 소환하지 않을 것입니다.\n

Source: A noble notion, I suppose, but nothing can justify the murder of innocents. She will pay for her crimes.\n\nYou've done quite a service for our fair city. I'm not one for emotional displays of appreciation, but you have my gratitude.
Target: 고귀한 생각이기는 하지만, 그 무엇도 무고한 이들을 살해한 죄를 정당화할 수는 없습니다. 그녀는 그녀의 죗값을 치를 것입니다.\n\n당신은 우리의 멋진 도시를 위해 큰 일을 해주셨습니다. 저는 감사의 마음을 겉으로 드러내는 성격이 아니지만, 당신은 제 감사를 받으실 자격이 있으시군요.

Source: Yes, yes. That's all of them. Now, let's see. If I toss Tanamo into a cabin and set sail today, I should just make Velyn ahead of the news.\n\nGood luck, drylegs.
Target: 그래, 그래, 그게 다야. 어디 보자. 타나모를 선실에 던져 놓고 오늘 출항하면, 그 소식보다 Velyn으로 앞서갈 수 있겠군.\n\n행운을 빈다. 이 자식아.

Source: Well, then I'm done here.
Target: 음, 그럼 여기서 끝났어.\n

Source: I would encourage you to finish whatever business you have in Bergama and then be on your way.\n\nIn time, it will become clear that we have done the right thing. Until then, gods be with you.
Target: I would encourage you to finish whatever business you have in Bergama and then be on your way.\n\nIn time, it will become clear that we have done the right thing. Until then, gods be with you.

Source: Thank you for dealing with Remelie. Here is a little something for your work.
Target: 레멜리에를 처리해줘서 고맙네. 여기 작은 보답을 받게.

Source: Well done! Now the Supernal Dreamers should trouble us no more.
Target: 잘 했어! 이제 숭고한 몽상가들은 더 이상 우리를 괴롭히지 못하겠지.\n

Source: Ah, I wondered about that. It seems the device will require more testing before it's perfected.\n\nHowever, you've helped my research immensely. For that, I express thanks.
Target: 아, 그게 궁금했지. 장치는 완벽해지기 전에 많은 시험이 필요하거든.\n\n하지만, 넌 내 연구를 많이 도와줬어. 고마워.

Source: Oh, happy days! I've tied my crystal back together with string and you've murdered several human beings with very little prodding. Hooray!
Target: 오, 행복한 날이군! 난 내 크리스탈을  묶었고, 당신은 인간을 거의 죽이지 않았군요. 만세!\n

Source: The story never changes, never shifts as do the stars and the sands! You've done your part, and I must do mine.\n\nKnow this: so it begins again. Satak was the First Serpent ….
Target: The story never changes, never shifts as do the stars and the sands! You've done your part, and I must do mine.\n\nKnow this: so it begins again. Satak was the First Serpent ….

Source: I need to get all the relics rounded up, but my fool son has run off into the swamp again. No help, that one.\n\nI swear he takes after his mother's side of the family.
Target: I need to get all the relics rounded up, but my fool son has run off into the swamp again. No help, that one.\n\nI swear he takes after his mother's side of the family.

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: The order has been delivered to Blacksmith Oges in Camlorn, and the Hands of Northmoor will help escort the smith's supplies to the camp when they're ready.
Target: 주문은 Camlorn에 있는 대장장이 Oges에게 전달되었고, Hands of Northmoor는 그 대장장이가 준비한 물품을 캠프에 호송하는 것을 도울 것입니다.

Source: At last, Sternis Gelves has paid for his crimes against Crosswych, Eagle's Brook, and my family. \n\nThis town—and I—owe you for that.
Target: 마침내 Sternis Gelves는 Crosswych, Eagle's Brook 그리고 내 가족에게 저지른 범죄에 대한 값을 치렀어.\n\n이 마을—그리고 나는—너에게 빚을 졌어.

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: Daedra killed him. But he died blessed and at peace.
Target: Daedra killed him. But he died blessed and at peace.

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: Daedra. Before he died, he blessed me so I could do what he could not.
Target: Daedra. Before he died, he blessed me so I could do what he could not.

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: I'll not allow the wounded to become food for lamias. Pact or Dominion, I don't care. None deserve such a fate.
Target: I'll not allow the wounded to become food for lamias. Pact or Dominion, I don't care. None deserve such a fate.

Source: This next bit is critical. I've seen what you can do, so I know you're up to it.\n\nBesides, we'd never have made it this far if not for you.
Target: 다음 단계는 정말 중요해요. 전 당신이 무엇을 할 수 있는지 봤으니, 당신이 해낼 수 있다는 걸 알아요.\n\n게다가, 당신이 아니었다면 여기까지 오지도 못했을 거예요.

Source: I've always wanted to be a healer. Feyne and I can go anywhere once my training is complete.\n\nThank you for helping me decide.
Target: I've always wanted to be a healer. Feyne and I can go anywhere once my training is complete.\n\nThank you for helping me decide.

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: Did you hear that someone actually escaped from the Lightless Oubliette?
Target: Did you hear that someone actually escaped from the Lightless Oubliette?

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: Exactly. You'll just need to find the properly labeled display case in the Vault of Moawita and place the relic within it. That should help safely bind its curse.\n\nWell, it looks like you're all set! And here's a little something for your trouble.
Target: 정확하네. 모와이타의 금고에서 적절한 라벨이 붙은 진열장을 찾아낸 다음, 그 안에 유물을 보관하면 되네. 그 진열장들이 저주들을 안전하게 봉인 하는데에 도움을 줄걸세.\n\n음, 준비가 다 된 것 같군! 그리고 여기 자네의 문제에 대한 작은 도움이 되길 바라네.

Source: Good. I'll get these tokens back to the Thieves Guild. Honestly, this is one of the smoother operations I've been a part of … sad as that is. \n\nMaybe one day we'll do another job together. Not likely, but maybe.
Target: Good. I'll get these tokens back to the Thieves Guild. Honestly, this is one of the smoother operations I've been a part of … sad as that is. \n\nMaybe one day we'll do another job together. Not likely, but maybe.

Source: Baron Winoc was nonplussed to find Camlorn's people fairly divided between the Magis Order and Hands of Northmoor, and believes he must do more to promote the organization. He thanked me for my work in gathering data about public opinion.
Target: 위녹 남작은 캠론의 사람들을 매지스 결사와 노스무어의 지배자에 공평하게 나누었고, 각 조직을 촉진하기 위해 그가 더 많은 일을 해야 한다고 믿고 있어요. 그리고 그는 내가 여론에 대한 자료를 수집하여 보여준 것에 대해 감사하고 있습니다.

Source: Probably so. I'm here to help.
Target: 아마 그럴 것 같군요. 도움을 드리러 왔습니다.

Source: It's as I feared, then. Wuuthrad is the only weapon we know that can send Sinmur back to Oblivion. Trolls take every one of them!
Target: 내가 두려워했던 대로군, 우쓰라드는 신무르를 오블리비언으로 되돌려 보낼 수있는 유일한 무기야. 트롤들이 그놈들 모두를 데려가길!

Source: I see my husband is safe... I worried greatly for him with the wound he took to his leg. We are all safe now, thanks in no small part to your efforts. Please, take this as a gesture of our gratitude.
Target: 남편이 안전하단 걸 알아요... 저는 그가 다리에 입은 상처때문에 크게 걱정했었어요. 당신의 노력 덕분에 이제 우리는 모두 안전합니다. 이것을 감사의 표시로 받아 주세요.

Source: The progenitor mantikora is dead and the prisoners are free.
Target: The progenitor mantikora is dead and the prisoners are free.

Source: No. I've spoken with him enough.
Target: No. I've spoken with him enough.

Source: Another wild theory? That's the third one today.\n\nJust don't get in the way. We've got enough trouble as it is.
Target: Another wild theory? That's the third one today.\n\nJust don't get in the way. We've got enough trouble as it is.

Source: Welcome back to Aldcroft.  There was no pause to our werewolf troubles.  Perhaps the Magis Order will track down your Chamberlain's associates and halt this war.
Target: Aldcroft에 돌아온 걸 환영해요. 늑대인간 문제때문에 쉴 틈이 없어요. 아마도 Magis Order가 당신의 체임벌린의 동료들을 추적해서 이 전쟁을 멈출 거예요.

Source: Get out of here.
Target: Get out of here.

Source: Wonderful! It should stand out in the competition.
Target: 훌륭하군! 그것은 경쟁에서 두드러 져야합니다.\n

Source: I found your contract in Barrow Trench. I have your ingredients.
Target: 무덤 고랑에서 당신이 쓴 계약서를 찾았어요. 제가 당신 재료를 가져왔죠.

Source: I found the remains of four members and a note that mentioned you. Here are their rings as proof.
Target: 길드원 네 명의 유해랑 당신이 언급된 편지를 찾았어요. 여기 반지가 그 증거고요.

Source: Why should I be? You're concerned enough for both of us! But come on, you're worse than my shield-wives! Have a drink. Have the whole damn keg, if you want!\n\nAnd take this. For services rendered. Now all we have to do is sit back and wait.
Target: Why should I be? You're concerned enough for both of us! But come on, you're worse than my shield-wives! Have a drink. Have the whole damn keg, if you want!\n\nAnd take this. For services rendered. Now all we have to do is sit back and wait.

Source: Every legend has some truth behind it. Perhaps this tomb will help us find the truth in <<1>>'s legend.\n\nAnd <<2>>, as well. He was different than I expected. But I suppose that's the point.
Target: 모든 전설 뒤에는 숨겨진 진실들이 담겨있는 법이죠. 어쩌면 이 무덤은 <<1>>의 전설을 알아내는데 도움이 될지도 몰라요.\n\n 그리고 <<2>>,도 마찬가지로요. 그는 제가 예상했던 것과는 달랐습니다. 하지만 그게 핵심인것 같습니다.

Source: I know you did your best and I'm ever so grateful.\n\nWe're going to stick together and find the nearest stronghold. We'll hire some bodyguards and make our way to Orsinium. We won't forget what you did for us. None of us will.
Target: 저는 당신이 최선을 다한것을 알고 있으며 정말로 감사하고 있습니다.\n\n우리는 함께 붙어 다니면서 가까운 요새를 찾을 것입니다. 경호원을 몇 명 고용해서 오시니움으로 갈 생각입니다. 우리 모두 당신이 해준일을 절대 잊지 않을거에요. 우리 중 누구라도 말이죠.

Source: Well thank goodness for that. I did notice the sky cleared up a bit. Maybe I'll finally be able to go home.\n\nI'll take that key off your hands if you'll part with it. The justiciar would find a use for it, no doubt. We have a deal?
Target: Well thank goodness for that. I did notice the sky cleared up a bit. Maybe I'll finally be able to go home.\n\nI'll take that key off your hands if you'll part with it. The justiciar would find a use for it, no doubt. We have a deal?

Source: Let's keep our voice down, shall we?\n\nSo, the hulkynd disappoints once again. How utterly expected. As the one who delivered my parcel, I suspect you'll want the reward. Have it and be off with you.
Target: Let's keep our voice down, shall we?\n\nSo, the hulkynd disappoints once again. How utterly expected. As the one who delivered my parcel, I suspect you'll want the reward. Have it and be off with you.

Source: I never thought of it like that. So he truly believes our association would ruin my career, does he? Then I'll have to respect his wishes. For now, at least.\n\nThank you for all the help you've been. Even if the outcome isn't quite what I wished for.
Target: I never thought of it like that. So he truly believes our association would ruin my career, does he? Then I'll have to respect his wishes. For now, at least.\n\nThank you for all the help you've been. Even if the outcome isn't quite what I wished for.

Source: You've been an able guide to heroism. Keeping me on the righteous road in the face of adversity! When I sing of the divine messenger who set me on this path, know that it's your praises I sing!\n\nOh, I like that.
Target: 당신은 날 영웅적인 길로 이끌어 주었소. 내가 역경에 직면하여 옳은 길을 걷도록 해 주었지! 나를 이 길에 세운 신성한 사자를 노래할 때, 내가 찬양하는 것이 당신이란 것을 알아 주시오!\n\n오, 좋은 걸.

Source: I … suppose you're right.\n\nTableau has shown me nothing but kindness, despite my status. Besides, she's gone through such great lengths just to see me again. If this is what she wishes, I shall continue to be by her side.
Target: I … suppose you're right.\n\nTableau has shown me nothing but kindness, despite my status. Besides, she's gone through such great lengths just to see me again. If this is what she wishes, I shall continue to be by her side.

Source: She did? I mean, of course she did! Rigurt had every confidence in you!\n\nThank you, my friend. Take this with the gratitude of the Nord Cultural Exchange. I think you'll like it better than that stinky Essence of Mammoth that I saw you ogling.
Target: She did? I mean, of course she did! Rigurt had every confidence in you!\n\nThank you, my friend. Take this with the gratitude of the Nord Cultural Exchange. I think you'll like it better than that stinky Essence of Mammoth that I saw you ogling.

Source: This is just the thing we need to inspire the people.\n\nNow the resistance can get to work on getting rid of the Red Rooks.
Target: 그게 우리가 사람들을 고무하기 위해 필요한 거야.\n\n이제 저항군은 Red Rooks를 제거하기 위해 움직일 수 있어.

Source: Another mouth to feed and house. You'd better be good!
Target: 먹이를 줄 입과 집. 당신이 더 잘 될거야!\n

Source: Next? Every action we take can tip the balance of the flow of time. Bask in the moment and realize that you have done well, my mortal friend. You have saved the Crystal Tower. Saved Summerset. Saved reality itself.\n\nEven I could not have done better.
Target: 다음? 우리가 취하는 모든 행동들이 시간 흐름의 균형을 흔들 수 있단다. 그러니 때를 기다리렴. 그리고 그 순간에 네가 일을 잘 처리했다는 걸 알아줬으면 좋겠구나, 필멸자 친구야. 넌 수정 탑을 구했단다. 서머셋을 구했지. 이 현실 자체를 구했어.\n\n심지어 나조차 너만큼 해내지 못했을 거란다.

Source: Don't turn on me now! The Eye gave us glimpses of Mannimarco's work. With time we might be able to learn more about his process! Know your enemy, right?\n\nI hope I can count on you to keep this a secret. Here's a little something for the effort.
Target: 지금 당장 나를 비난하진 마! 그 눈은 매니마코의 작품들을 잠깐 볼 수 있게 해줬지. 시간이 지나면 우리는 그의 행적에 대해 더 알 수 있을 거야! 적에 대해 알아야지.그렇지?\n\n이 일을 비밀로 해줬으면 해. 여기 노력에 대한 작은 보상이야.

Source: I don't know what to say. You bring gifts from the gods in my time of sorrow.
Target: 무슨 말을 해야 할 지 모르겠네요.슬픔의 시간을 겪고 있을 때 당신의 선물은 신이 주신 것 같아요.

Source: I opposed this line of reasoning when Leythen first suggested it, as bargains with the Princes don't often end well. But what choice do we have?\n\nStill, thanks for finding a way forward. While it's a long shot, at least it represents a chance.
Target: 레이선이 처음 제안했을 때, 군주들과의 거래는 자주 좋게 끝나지 않기 때문에 이걸 반대했어. 하지만 다른 선택의 여지가 있을까?\n\n그래도 앞으로 나아갈 길을 찾아 줘서 고마워. 승산이 없긴 하지만 적어도 가능성은 있겠지.

Source: Oh, Tavo! Why did you take such foolish chances? We could have found another way.\n\nThank you for your kindness. Such courtesy is uncommon in these times. At least, now I can move on without the shadow of debt hanging over me.
Target: Oh, Tavo! Why did you take such foolish chances? We could have found another way.\n\nThank you for your kindness. Such courtesy is uncommon in these times. At least, now I can move on without the shadow of debt hanging over me.

Source: These should help.
Target: 이게 도움이 될 겁니다.

Source: Truly? This is wonderful!\n\nPlease, accept a meager payment for your trouble. And if a strangler-infested marsh doesn't frighten you, perhaps we should speak of additional work.
Target: 정말요? 아주 잘 됐네요!\n\n부디, 수고해 주신 대가로 부족하지만 보답을 받아 주세요. 그리고 만약 교살초가 우글대는 습지에 겁먹지 않으셨다면, 추가적인 일에 대한 얘기도 해봐야겠네요.

Source: What has the fool girl done?\n\nNever mind that. <<1>> has almost finished his antidote. Once <<2>> recovers, our warriors will find these bandits and crack open their skulls.
Target: 그 어리석은 여자애가 무슨 짓을 한 거람?\n\n신경쓰지 말게. <<1>>이 해독제를 거의 다 만들었으니까. <<2>>가 회복되고 나면, 우리 전사들이 저 도적놈들을 찾아내서 골통을 쪼개버릴 걸세.

Source: I killed the vampire commander. His name was Maldred.
Target: 뱀파이어 사령관을 죽였어요. 그의 이름은 말드레드였습니다.

Source: They were marched off to the east. My first mate went after them, but I can't imagine she'll be able to free them alone.\n\nIf you travel in that direction, keep an eye out for her. If she doesn't return soon, I may just have to track her down myself.
Target: 그들은 동쪽으로 출발했어. 내 가장 친한 친구가 그들을 따라 갔지만, 그녀가 혼자서 포로들을 자유롭게 할 수 있을 것이라고는 생각되지 않는군.\n\n당신도 동쪽으로 갈 거라면, 그녀를 주시해 줘. 만약 그녀가 제때에 돌아오지 않는다면, 난 내 스스로 그녀를 찾으러 나서야만 할 거야.

Source: And the spell remains intact?
Target: And the spell remains intact?

Source: Iniel stayed behind to destroy the other Moonhenge.
Target: 이니엘은 다른 문헨지 유적을 파괴하려고 뒤에 남았어요.

Source: So you'll leave with us?
Target: 그럼 우리와 함께 갈거야?

Source: Iniel stayed behind to destroy the other Moonhenge.
Target: 이니엘은 다른 문헨지 유적을 파괴하려고 뒤에 남았어요.

Source: Iniel stayed behind to destroy the other Moonhenge.
Target: 이니엘은 다른 문헨지 유적을 파괴하려고 뒤에 남았어요.

Source: Excellent! You won't regret this decision, I swear.\n\nHere's the deed and key to the room. Took me a while, but I finally was able to take them back from the last tenant. Required more time in the sewers than I had hoped for, but hey, that's business.
Target: 좋아요! 이 결정을 후회하지 않을 거에요, 맹세해요.\n\n여기 증서와 열쇠예요. 시간이 좀 걸렸지만, 마침내 지난번 세입자로부터 그것들을 돌려 받을 수 있었죠. 기대했던 것보다 많은 시간을 쓸데없이 보내야 했지만, 그게 사업 아니겠어요.

Source: I heard the Great Shackle was destroyed! I hope that means the Planemeld has been stopped.
Target: I heard the Great Shackle was destroyed! I hope that means the Planemeld has been stopped.

Source: I heard the Great Shackle was destroyed! I hope that means the Planemeld has been stopped.
Target: I heard the Great Shackle was destroyed! I hope that means the Planemeld has been stopped.

Target: Aye, Lord Falgravn's forces are in full retreat. The few you left alive, anyway! We'll rid ourselves of the rest within the hour.\n\nThis tale would have had a very different ending if you and your allies hadn't shown up. Thank you, my friend.

Source: Shor's bones! Don't have to be a wizard to feel the magic on this. Thank you for bringing it to me. I'll hand it over to the town's clever woman for disposal.\n\nWe owe you a debt, friend. Take this. You more than earned it.
Target: Shor's bones! Don't have to be a wizard to feel the magic on this. Thank you for bringing it to me. I'll hand it over to the town's clever woman for disposal.\n\nWe owe you a debt, friend. Take this. You more than earned it.

Source: And here is your payment, as contracted. I am pleased you chose to honor our arrangement instead of siding with that scoundrel. \n\nOh, I see it now. You! You're the perfect subject for my masterpiece! Your shining loyalty, your pure heart. Perfect!

Target: Aye, Lord Falgravn's forces are in full retreat. The few you left alive, anyway! We'll rid ourselves of the rest within the hour.\n\nThis tale would have had a very different ending if you and your allies hadn't shown up. Thank you, my friend.

Source: I knew I'd sway you to my side. After all, my charisma is only matched by my artistic talent.\n\nWith these, I'll have an even easier time persuading the royal court to hire me as their personal artist. Tindoria will never overshadow me again!
Target: I knew I'd sway you to my side. After all, my charisma is only matched by my artistic talent.\n\nWith these, I'll have an even easier time persuading the royal court to hire me as their personal artist. Tindoria will never overshadow me again!

Target: 무슨 일이 일어난지는 잘 몰라. 장로들이 마을의 한가운데 모여 있엇어.\n\n그런다음 빛이 번쩍이더니 갑자기 영혼들이 곳곳에 나타났지.

Source:
They're putting out the lighthouse signal fire so ships will crash on the rocks! 

Someone's got to warn the lighthouse keeper—Tyree. Damn it! If only we could spare the men!

Thanks for at least letting me know. Safe travels, friend.
Target:
그들은 등대의 신호용 불을 꺼서 배들을 암석에 충돌시키려고 해!

 누군가가 등대지기 인 Tyree에게 경고해야 해. 젠장! 우리에게 남는 인원이 더 있었다면!

 적어도 내가 알게 해주어서 고맙네. 안전한 여행이 되기를, 친구여.

Source: <This vessel is coated in frost, like the knight's sword you found earlier. Tiny cracks radiate across its surface.>
Target: <This vessel is coated in frost, like the knight's sword you found earlier. Tiny cracks radiate across its surface.>

Source: I knew you would help me! I'll show you how to get into the tower, but first you need to convince my people to end their service to Molag Bal.\n\nAnd to do that, you have to prove yourself to my clan.
Target: 절 도와주실 줄 알았어요! 탑에 들어가는 법을 알려 드리죠. 하지만 먼저 우리 부족이 몰라그 발에 대한 봉사를 끝내도록 설득하셔야 해요.\n\n그렇게 하려면 우리 부족에게 스스로를 증명해야 하죠.

Source: Excellent! You won't regret this decision, I swear.\n\nHere's the deed and key to the room. Took me a while, but I finally was able to take them back from the last tenant. Required more time in the sewers than I had hoped for, but hey, that's business.
Target: 훌륭해요! 결정을 후회하지 않을 거예요, 보장해요!\n\n자 여기 증서와 방 열쇠를 받으세요. 시간이 좀 걸리긴 했지만 지난 번 세입자에게서 결국 찾아 왔죠. 생각했던 것보다 하수도에서 더 지체가 됐지만 뭐 그런게 사업이죠.

Source: Ugh. I don't even want to think about how much innocent blood filled this cup! We'll find a use for it, or we'll destroy it. Hopefully the latter!\n\nWe owe you a debt, friend. Take this. You more than earned it.
Target: Ugh. I don't even want to think about how much innocent blood filled this cup! We'll find a use for it, or we'll destroy it. Hopefully the latter!\n\nWe owe you a debt, friend. Take this. You more than earned it.

Source: You will? We have waited such a long time for someone to aid us in our struggle. You have made me very happy, outsider! \n\nNow we can get our children back! Now we can have our revenge!
Target: 정말인가? 우리는 정말 오랫동안 우리의 투쟁을 도울 누군가를 기다려 왔다. 날 아주 행복하게 만들어 주는구나, 외부인!\n\n이제 우리의 아이들을 돌려받을 수 있다! 우리의 복수를 할 수 있다!

Source: I'm looking for Angof.
Target: I'm looking for Angof.

Source: Is there anything more I can do?
Target: 제가 할 수 있는 일이 또 있을까요?

Source: I'm taking this straight to King Fahara'jad in Sentinel. It will take time to translate all of this, but the results will be worth it.\n\nYou made this all possible. Thank you, my friend.
Target: 괜찮나?

Source: <<1>> and I will marry. We'll rebuild our homes here, once the Daedra leave. And of course, <<2>> will live with us.\n\nNone of this would be possible without your help.
Target: <<1>>와 나는 결혼할 것이오. 데이드라가 떠나면 여기에 우리 집을 다시 지어야지. 물론, 장인어른도 우리와 함께 살 것이고.\n\n당신 도움이 없었다면 이 모든 일이 불가능했을 것이오.

Source: Is this book really going to help us?
Target: 이 책이 정말 도움이 될까?

Source: The question is settled now.
Target: The question is settled now.

Source: That won't happen. Braadoth is dead and the process has been disrupted.
Target: That won't happen. Braadoth is dead and the process has been disrupted.

Source: Yes … though it's the Wilderqueen now.
Target: 그랬죠... 이제는 윌더퀸이지만요.

Source: The question is settled now.
Target: The question is settled now.

Source: The Red Rook enforcers have been dealt with.
Target: The Red Rook enforcers have been dealt with.

Source: The nerve of the Imperials to attack Satakalaam! You gave them what they deserved!
Target: The nerve of the Imperials to attack Satakalaam! You gave them what they deserved!

Source: Talk to Thane Ogvar. He's there by the gate. He's tried to organize a few counterattacks, but we haven't gotten far.\n\nWith you and your allies' help, we might finally be able to turn these bastards back.
Target: Talk to Thane Ogvar. He's there by the gate. He's tried to organize a few counterattacks, but we haven't gotten far.\n\nWith you and your allies' help, we might finally be able to turn these bastards back.

Source: Your word will not suffice, but in light of these allegations I will take command of Sea Keep until the matter is settled by court marshal.\n\nNow excuse me, I must see to it.
Target: Your word will not suffice, but in light of these allegations I will take command of Sea Keep until the matter is settled by court marshal.\n\nNow excuse me, I must see to it.

Source: You helped me remember my true encounter with K'Tora and his Abyssal Cabal. I remember how they defeated me three hundred years ago. Compelled me to do their bidding. Made me forget.\n\nFor now, I need solitude to seek the memories that still elude me.
Target: 자넨 크토라와 놈의 심해 밀계와의 진짜 만남을 기억하게 해 주었네. 3백년 전에 놈들이 날 어떻게 처치했는지 기억이 났지. 내가 놈들의 명령을 수행하도록 강요했고 그 기억을 잊도록 만들었다네.\n\n지금으로선, 여전히 날 피하고 있는 그 기억들을 찾으려면 혼자 있어야 할 것 같네.

Source: Another noble soul lost to the Sea Elves. They've claimed too many in their relentless raiding. Vipers.\n\nWe will take things from here. You are to be commended for your service to the crown.
Target: Another noble soul lost to the Sea Elves. They've claimed too many in their relentless raiding. Vipers.\n\nWe will take things from here. You are to be commended for your service to the crown.

Source: I'll note your remarks for the inquiry to follow. The sack of Sea Keep under Pandermalion's watch will reflect poorly, though his heroics today will temper the attitudes of the court.\n\nYour service to the crown is appreciated.

Source: Excellent! You won't regret this decision, I swear.\n\nHere's the deed and key to the room. Took me a while, but I finally was able to take them back from the last tenant. Required more time in the sewers than I had hoped for, but hey, that's business.

Target: 나는 백부장의 임무를 확실히 할겁니다 ... 조약이 스트랄의 패배를 알도록. 다자힐과 벨론은 그 짐승을 죽이기 위해 희생했습니다.\n\n 그들의 희생이 기억 될 겁니다.

Source: Of course! They're different all over. I've taken part in cliff jumping, anchor tossing, and even drunken echatere racing … though Orsinium had to cancel that one.\n\nSimply ask, and I'll send you to the best celebrations in Tamriel!
Target: Of course! They're different all over. I've taken part in cliff jumping, anchor tossing, and even drunken echatere racing … though Orsinium had to cancel that one.\n\nSimply ask, and I'll send you to the best celebrations in Tamriel!

Target: 드레산 색인? 맙소사! 전 리차드가 죽어서 슬프지만, 성에 보관되어 있는 지식은 우리 학자들에게 매우 귀중한 자료가 될 것입니다.\n\n감사합니다. 하지만 약간의 문제가 있습니다.

Source: Y'ffre's mercy …. How could you—why didn't you save him? Damn this place! Damn the Prosecution!\n\nHere, take this thing. I found it under Celan's bed. I never want to see it again! I never want to see you again! I … gods help me.
Target: 이프레여 자비를 ... 어떻게 그럴수가 있어 — 왜 그를 구해주지 않은거야? 저주받을 땅 같으니라고! 망할 종사놈들!\n\n자, 이걸 가져가. 켈란의 침대 아래에서 찾은거야. 그 물건을 다시는 보고 싶지 않아! 너도 다시는 보지 않았으면 좋겠어! 난 ... 신이시여 저를 도우소서.

Source: I found the scroll you wanted.
Target: I found the scroll you wanted.

Target: 우리가 Aldcroft에 도착했을 때,  Aurore Bagot은 내가 그녀의 가족을 다시 만날 수 있도록 도와준 일에 대해 고마워 했어요.  Tristan이 다시 걸을 수 있을 만큼 회복하면, 그들을 보호하기 위한 Aurore의 강력한 검이 있기에 그들의 가족들은 괜찮을 거에요.

Target: What happens now?

Source: Good, that's … it's a good thing. If she was a Boethiah cultist, she'd have fled. A blood price paid means there is no grudge between us.\n\nI'll speak with her, widow to widow. We'll both need to figure out what we are to Shatul.
Target: 좋아, 그건 ... 좋은 일이다. 만약 그녀가 보에시아의 광신자였다면, 그녀는 도망쳤을거다. 피로 값을 치른다는 것은 서로에게 더 이상의 유감은 없다는게 된다.\n\n그녀와 과부대 과부로 이야기를 나눠보겠다. 우리가 샤툴에 있어 무엇인지 알아보겠다.

Source: I found the scroll you wanted.
Target: I found the scroll you wanted.

Source: Good, good. Then my point is made.\n\nDid you break her tusk? I have a remedy for that. Perhaps I'll stop by and offer it to her … show her there's no grudge.
Target: Good, good. Then my point is made.\n\nDid you break her tusk? I have a remedy for that. Perhaps I'll stop by and offer it to her … show her there's no grudge.

Source: So it worked?
Target: 효과가 있었나요?

Source: I come with a message from your brother.
Target: I come with a message from your brother.

Source: I … you're right. I was just so angry … if she had been there beside him, he'd still be alive. We'd still be a family.\n\nI'll speak with <<1>>. We both lost someone important to us.
Target: 나는 ... 네 말이 맞아. 나는 너무 화가난 상태였어 ...만약 그녀가 그의 곁에 있었다면, 그는 여전히 살아있었을테지. 우린 여전히 가족이다.\n\n <<1>>와 대화를 나눠보겠다. 우리는 서로 우리에게 소중한 사람을 잃었으니.

Source: I bring a petition. Chief Tazgol wishes to join the Daggerfall Covenant.
Target: 청원서를 가져왔습니다. 타즈골 족장이 대거폴 동맹에 가입하고 싶어 합니다.

Source: Impressive. Weep not for Istraga. She was a menace, devouring travelers and livestock alike.\n\nCelebrate, for fate's hand means nothing. Not for those who are willing to grip the till of destiny.
Target: 인상적이군요. 이스트라가를 애도하지는 마시오. 그놈은 악의에 차서 여행자들과 가축들을 집어삼키는 흉물이었소.\n\n축하드리오. 운명의 손아귀는 결국 아무것도 쥐지 못했군요. 운명을 이겨내려는 의지가 없는 이들은 손아귀에서 벗어나지 못하겠지만요.

Source: Good luck to you.
Target: 행운을 빌게.

Source: They say it's a real tusk-cleaner. It should round out the meal nicely.
Target: They say it's a real tusk-cleaner. It should round out the meal nicely.

Source: So you didn't know anything about this?
Target: So you didn't know anything about this?

Source: I'm glad to hear it. I hope the king's hearth-wife has a similar experience!
Target: I'm glad to hear it. I hope the king's hearth-wife has a similar experience!

Source: Pay up. I beat your record.
Target: 지불 해. 나는 네 기록을 이겼어.\n

Source: I'm glad they made it back.
Target: 무사히 돌아왔다니 다행이네요.

Source: I'll tell him. \n\nWatch yourself down there. Angof has the entire place rigged with traps. We'll be lucky if any of us get out of here alive.
Target: I'll tell him. \n\nWatch yourself down there. Angof has the entire place rigged with traps. We'll be lucky if any of us get out of here alive.

Source: What happens now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 되는 건가요?

Source: Where did you get the extra coin?
Target: 이 많은 돈은 어디서 난 거지?

Source: Very true! You know, you're the best assistant I've ever had? Far better than <<1>> … though there's really no comparison.
Target: Very true! You know, you're the best assistant I've ever had? Far better than <<1>> … though there's really no comparison.

Source: I'm glad I was here to help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군요.

Source: I worked things out. He'll still transport you to Anvil Island.
Target: I worked things out. He'll still transport you to Anvil Island.

Source: I'm not hurt, but I'd be dead without you. The dreugh were keeping us for food and feeding us to their young!\n\nThe little ones would gnaw through the mud and … it doesn't matter now. I'm going to find whoever's responsible for this.
Target: 다치진 않았어요. 하지만 당신이 없었다면 죽었겠죠. 드레그가 우리를 먹이로 준비해 어린 개체에게 먹이려고 했어요!\n\n작은 것들은 진흙을 갉아서 구멍을 냈고 그리고 ... 이제 그건 중요하지 않죠. 나는 이 상황을 만든 사람을 찾을 겁니다.

Source: What's my reward for clearing Moongrave Fane?
Target: What's my reward for clearing Moongrave Fane?

Source: What's my reward for cleansing Moongrave Fane?
Target: What's my reward for cleansing Moongrave Fane?

Source: What's my reward for clearing Moongrave Fane?
Target: What's my reward for clearing Moongrave Fane?

Source: What's my reward for killing Maarselok?
Target: What's my reward for killing Maarselok?

Source: You saw through their deception eventually.
Target: You saw through their deception eventually.

Source: Nerien'eth has been defeated and the souls of Alanwe and her students have been freed from their torment within the Crypt of Hearts.
Target: 네리에네스를 물리쳤고 알란웨와 학생들의 영혼이 마음의 묘실 안의 고통에서 벗어났습니다.

Source: I'm not surprised Duke Renchant's dead, but I didn't think the queen would...take care of things herself.
Target: Duke Renchant가 죽은 것은 놀랍지 않지만 여왕이 ... 자신을 돌볼거라고 나는 생각하지 않았어.\n

Source: Thank you.
Target: 고마워요.

Source: I have your mushrooms.
Target: 버섯을 가져왔어요.

Source: That's too bad. More for me, then!
Target: 유감 이네. 더 많이줘!\n

Source: What's my reward for defeating Maarselok and Selene?
Target: What's my reward for defeating Maarselok and Selene?

Source: I'll do that. With luck, we'll regroup and follow right behind you. \n\nGood luck, friend.
Target: I'll do that. With luck, we'll regroup and follow right behind you. \n\nGood luck, friend.

Source: What's my reward for killing Maarselok?
Target: What's my reward for killing Maarselok?

Source: Yes, my Queen.
Target: 그렇습니다. 여왕이시여.

Source: Excellent. This will buy us some time. If the Dragonfire Cathedral actually exists, we need to make sure it doesn't fall into Molag Bal's hands, right? Yes. \n\nTake this for your trouble, and stay in touch. There's more to Molag Bal's plan, I know it.
Target: Excellent. This will buy us some time. If the Dragonfire Cathedral actually exists, we need to make sure it doesn't fall into Molag Bal's hands, right? Yes. \n\nTake this for your trouble, and stay in touch. There's more to Molag Bal's plan, I know it.

Source: I have killed the bears as Teddy asked.
Target: 테디의 부탁대로 곰들을 죽였어요

Source: I can't argue with evidence. I'll turn this over to the Guard and release the prisoner.\n\nAnd, uh … ignore what I said about the mug, all right? Here's a little something to help you forget.
Target: 증거로 논쟁하는건 불가능하겠군. 이걸 경비대에 돌려주고 죄수를 석방하도록 하지.\n\n그리고, 어 ... 내가 머그컵에 대해 말한건 잊어줬으면 하는군, 알겠지? 여기 네가 이걸 잊는데 작은 도움이 될 거다.

Source: I saw several Reachmen run north, headed home. May a werewolf devour them before they get there!
Target: 나는 여러 명의 Reachmen이 북쪽으로 달려가는 것을 보았다. 그들이 늑대 인간들이 도착하기 전에 그들을 멸망 시키길 바랍니다!\n

Source: Here, take this. There is honor among thieves. Some of us, at least.\n\nPerhaps I'll see you around the Outlaws Refuge.
Target: Here, take this. There is honor among thieves. Some of us, at least.\n\nPerhaps I'll see you around the Outlaws Refuge.

Source: That's good, very good. Not such a rotting waste now, are ya? I promised you gold and here it is.
Target: 좋아요, 아주 좋아요. 이제 그렇게 썩어 가는 쓰레기가 아니죠? 황금을 약속했었는데 여기 있어요.\n

Source: You saw through their deception eventually.
Target: You saw through their deception eventually.

Source: You saw through their deception eventually.
Target: You saw through their deception eventually.

Source: I took this trophy from the false Alkosh. I thought you should have it.
Target: I took this trophy from the false Alkosh. I thought you should have it.

Source: I took this trophy from the false Alkosh. I thought you should have it.
Target: I took this trophy from the false Alkosh. I thought you should have it.

Source: Jora-ri is in the royal tomb. He would have given you treasure if you had brought the urn yourself.
Target: Jora-ri is in the royal tomb. He would have given you treasure if you had brought the urn yourself.

Source: That's it—the Jeweled Crown of Anton. Why, you are quite the capable dungeon delver. \n\nPlease, place the crown on the table so that I can gaze upon its majesty.
Target: That's it—the Jeweled Crown of Anton. Why, you are quite the capable dungeon delver. \n\nPlease, place the crown on the table so that I can gaze upon its majesty.

Source: I took this trophy from the false Alkosh. I thought you should have it.
Target: I took this trophy from the false Alkosh. I thought you should have it.

Source: I would like to prove myself.
Target: I would like to prove myself.

Source: You're right. I'll tell Sir Lanis and the others that you found us. \n\nBe on your guard, friend. Angof isn't like anyone you've ever faced.
Target: You're right. I'll tell Sir Lanis and the others that you found us. \n\nBe on your guard, friend. Angof isn't like anyone you've ever faced.

Source: What will you two do now?
Target: 당신들 둘은 이제 어떻게 할 겁니까?

Source: It means … it means … what does it mean?\n\nI had it all figured out. Something very important, very profound … but now … I can't remember. I'm going to stay here until I remember.
Target: It means … it means … what does it mean?\n\nI had it all figured out. Something very important, very profound … but now … I can't remember. I'm going to stay here until I remember.

Source: I wish you luck.
Target: I wish you luck.

Source: You must tell the workers the truth.
Target: You must tell the workers the truth.

Source: What do you mean?
Target: 그게 무슨 뜻이죠?

Source: I have Makela Leki's Memory Stone.
Target: 내게 마켈라 레키의 기억석이 있습니다.

Source: It involves my missing memories. I've recalled an important detail and I need to show it to you.\n\nFor now, let me compensate you for your efforts so far. I appreciate your help in all this.
Target: 그건 내 잃어버린 기억과 관련이 있다네. 난 중요한 세부 사항을 기억해 냈고 자네에게 그걸 보여줄 필요가 있네.\n\n지금은 이제까지 자네의 노력을 보상하게 해 주게. 이 모든 일을 도와줘서 고맙네.

Source: This journey hasn't played out quite like I imagined, but it would have been impossible without your timely intervention.\n\nSince I'm going to be making it up anyway, I think I'll model the hero of this epic after you. Remind me to send you a copy.
Target: This journey hasn't played out quite like I imagined, but it would have been impossible without your timely intervention.\n\nSince I'm going to be making it up anyway, I think I'll model the hero of this epic after you. Remind me to send you a copy.

Source: This is grave news, but will stop us finding the weapon. Before his unclean spirit departs fully from this world, I think we can get the information we seek from it.\n\nFirst, let me reward you for your efforts.
Target: 이것은 중대한 소식이네요. 하지만 이 소식은 우리가 무기를 찾는 것을 멈추게 할 것입니다. 그의 더러운 영혼이 세상에서 완전히 벗어나기 전에, 나는 우리가 찾는 정보를 얻을 수 있다고 생각합니다.¶\n¶\n 먼저, 당신의 노력에 대한 보상을 하게 해주십시오.

Source: Take a moment to rest, but once you've shaken off any residual effects of the spell I might require your assistance. \n\nAnd take this. I assume it belongs to you. It was near your unconscious body when I found you.
Target: Take a moment to rest, but once you've shaken off any residual effects of the spell I might require your assistance. \n\nAnd take this. I assume it belongs to you. It was near your unconscious body when I found you.

Source: A hunter with the heart of Ysgramor! Here's the coin I promised. I'll sing your praises next time I see the inside of a mead hall.\n\nDon't worry about me. I know the way back to town, wound or no wound.
Target: 이스그래머의 심장을 가진 사냥꾼이로군! 내가 약속한 보상이야. 다음 축제 때에는 자네를 칭송하는 노래를 부르도록 하지.\n\n난 걱정하지 마. 상처가 있건 없건 마을로 가는 길은 알고 있으니까.

Source: Is it really wise to let Stibbons read the Mad God's scrolls?
Target: 스티븐스가 광기의 신의 두루마리를 읽는게 현명한 일일까?

Source: I've found Oron and I am ready to render what aid I can in the investigation of the murder.
Target: \n나는 오론을 찾았네. 그리고  살인 혐의 조사에서 도움을 줄 준비도 되어 있네.

Source: Ulrich was my father? Can that be true? Mother adored him, but so did we all. And he died a hero?\n\nAt least he's at peace now. Thank you. If my … my father could lead us, maybe it's my turn now to do the same.
Target: Ulrich was my father? Can that be true? Mother adored him, but so did we all. And he died a hero?\n\nAt least he's at peace now. Thank you. If my … my father could lead us, maybe it's my turn now to do the same.

Source: The Worm Cult has made a mess of this dig site. We arrived in time to blunt their first assault, but they'll be back. I don't know if we'll live through another one, but I won't abandon these people.
Target: 벌레 교단이 발굴지를 엉망으로 만들었습니다. 우리는 제시간에 도착해서 첫번째 공격을 꺾는데 성공했지만 다시 공격해 오겠죠. 다음 공격에서도 살아남을 수 있을지 모르겠습니다. 하지만 이 사람들을 포기하지 않을 겁니다.

Source: I'm sure the people still believe in you.
Target: I'm sure the people still believe in you.

Source: I don't know what happened to us. We're mountain folk and miners. We shouldn't be so easily cowed. \n\nYou've given us back our courage. Thank you.
Target: 이게 다 무슨 일인지. 우리는 산 사람이자 광부들이야. 우리는 쉽게 겁먹어선 안돼.\n\n넌 우리에게 용기를 줬어. 고마워.

Source: You've been a lifesaver, literally. Charadin and I are going to publish a report about our adventures here. Your heroism will figure prominently!
Target: 당신은 말 그대로 생명의 은인입니다. 샤라딘과 전 우리의 모험에 대한 보고서를 출판할 거에요. 당신의 영웅적 모습을 강조해서요!

Source: I'm sure the people still believe in you.
Target: I'm sure the people still believe in you.

Source: No, don't worry about it. This kind of thing happens to us all the time. I'll take care of it.\n\nIf you hear a loud boom in the distance, it was probably us. But thanks anyway. I'm sure we couldn't have gotten to this point without you.
Target: No, don't worry about it. This kind of thing happens to us all the time. I'll take care of it.\n\nIf you hear a loud boom in the distance, it was probably us. But thanks anyway. I'm sure we couldn't have gotten to this point without you.

Source: Any time, my Queen.
Target: 언제든 하명하십시오, 여왕이시여.

Source: Yes, I stopped them.
Target: 네, 막아냈습니다.

Source: Will you take her back to Evermore yourself?
Target: Will you take her back to Evermore yourself?

Source: Yes, that took care of the creepy little construct.\n\nRaynor's going to be upset with me for a while, but he'll get over it. I just need to find him a new project to focus on. Maybe something a little less volatile this time. Thanks for your help!
Target: Yes, that took care of the creepy little construct.\n\nRaynor's going to be upset with me for a while, but he'll get over it. I just need to find him a new project to focus on. Maybe something a little less volatile this time. Thanks for your help!

Source: You'll find all the proof you need, inside.
Target: 필요하시다면 안에 모든 증거가 있을겁니다.

Source: I have your gear.
Target: 장비를 가져왔습니다.

Source: The queen sent me to see how I can help.
Target: The queen sent me to see how I can help.

Source: The Queen asked me to meet her here.
Target: 여왕님께서 여기서 만나자고 청하셨습니다.

Source: The Vosh Rakh are strong enough to do all that? It's even worse than we feared. You tell the king about the moot. We'll go warn Bazrag and Solgra.\n\nAfter that, I'm leaving. I don't want to be in a place where the only person I can depend on is me.
Target: The Vosh Rakh are strong enough to do all that? It's even worse than we feared. You tell the king about the moot. We'll go warn Bazrag and Solgra.\n\nAfter that, I'm leaving. I don't want to be in a place where the only person I can depend on is me.

Source: I disrupted the Daedric summoning rituals.
Target: I disrupted the Daedric summoning rituals.

Source: Very good. Give me a moment to triangulate thier location based on the information you have provided me.
Target: 아주 좋아요. 당신이 나에게 제공한 정보에 기초하여 그들의 위치를 삼각 측량할 시간을 주세요.

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"Nordic tribes living in Skyrim's harshest environments thank you, and we wish you a fruitful New Life Festival." — FC
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n\\"Nordic tribes living in Skyrim's harshest environments thank you
column4: and we wish you a fruitful New Life Festival.\"\" — FC"

Source: Here are the pelts you requested.
Target: 니가 부탁한 가죽들이야.

Source: Your mother is right. Keep at this and you'll make a great fighter.
Target: 엄마 말이 옳아. 계속 이 길로 나가면 위대한 전사가 될 수 있겠어.

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"Nordic tribes living in Skyrim's harshest environments thank you, and we wish you a fruitful New Life Festival." — FC
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n\\"Nordic tribes living in Skyrim's harshest environments thank you
column4: and we wish you a fruitful New Life Festival.\"\" — FC"

Source: What is this place?
Target: 여긴 어딘가요?

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"The Orsinium Home for Displaced Children wishes you a blessed and bountiful New Life Festival, as you have provided for our wards." — Oorga gra-Shazgul, Headmistress

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"Nordic tribes living in Skyrim's harshest environments thank you, and we wish you a fruitful New Life Festival." — FC
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n\\"Nordic tribes living in Skyrim's harshest environments thank you
column4: and we wish you a fruitful New Life Festival.\"\" — FC"

Source: You're not cut out for warfare. Follow your passion and make weapons.
Target: 전사가 될 자질은 없어보여. 열정이 이끄는 대로 무기를 만드는 게 좋겠어.

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"Nordic tribes living in Skyrim's harshest environments thank you, and we wish you a fruitful New Life Festival." — FC
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n\\"Nordic tribes living in Skyrim's harshest environments thank you
column4: and we wish you a fruitful New Life Festival.\"\" — FC"

Source: I'm glad I could help.
Target: 도움이 되었다니 기쁘네요.

Source: I'm with you, Darj.
Target: 당신과 함께하겠습니다, 다지.

Source: Can Dark Elves, Nords, and Argonians actually work together? If not, this alliance is doomed.
Target: Can Dark Elves, Nords, and Argonians actually work together? If not, this alliance is doomed.

Source: The Eyes see all, my friend. That doesn't mean they speak. Go talk to Cariel. She'll get you hooked up with our friends in the resistance.
Target: 눈은 모든 것을 봅니다, 내 친구. 그렇다고 그들이 말하는 것은 아닙니다. 가서 캐리와 얘기해. 그녀는 당신을 우리 친구들과 저항에 빠지게 할 것입니다.

Source: You have been drawn here to participate in a great ceremony, Hallowed. Up the stairs behind me you will find the priest Hadam-do. He is a respected member of our order. He will lead you to the temple within.
Target: 여러분은 거룩한 의식에 참여하기 위해 여기에 끌려 왔습니다. 나 뒤에 계단을 올리면 사당인 하담을 발견할 수 있습니다. 그는 우리 교단의 존경받는 회원입니다. 그는 너를 안에 있는 성전으로 인도 할 것이다.

Source: When you've lived your life in the shadow of the Bright Moons, nothing is strange any longer. I'm just glad you're here with us now, Hallowed.
Target: 빛나는 달들의 그림자에서 살아온 자에게는 이제 이상한 일이 아무것도 없어요. 지금 당신과 함께 있어서 기뻐요, 성자님.

Source: Perhaps it was simply arrogance. Perhaps it was all part of his grand scheme. Who can know the logic of a Daedric Prince? \n\nI will call upon you again when the time is right. Farewell, Vestige.
Target: 어쩌면 그건 단순한 오만이였을지도 모르지. 혹은 어쩌면 그것은 그저 그의 계획의 일부에 지나지 않을지도 몰라. 누가 데이드릭 프린스의 논리를 알겠나?\n\n시간이 좀 지난 후에 다시 보기로 하지. 안녕히 가게, 잔존자여.

Source: Did anyone else survive?
Target: 다른 사람들도 살아남았나요?

Source: Nothing ventured, nothing gained! And it worked, did it not?\n\nDo me one last favor, will you? Don't mention my experiments to the locals. The last one I ran into wasn't as open minded as yourself. Although, he did make a good volunteer ….
Target: Nothing ventured, nothing gained! And it worked, did it not?\n\nDo me one last favor, will you? Don't mention my experiments to the locals. The last one I ran into wasn't as open minded as yourself. Although, he did make a good volunteer ….

Source: Yes, here's the book.
Target: 예, 여기 있습니다.

Source: My sister was among the soldiers you saved at Driladan Pass.
Target: My sister was among the soldiers you saved at Driladan Pass.

Source: I hope that sends the message you wanted.
Target: 그 메세지가 니가 원하는것이기를 바라.

Source: I delivered the petitions, despite an Imperial ambush.
Target: 제국군의 매복이 있었지만, 기도문을 가져다뒀어요.

Source: A chillwind mushroom, a patch of deep lichen, and an unfertilized chaurus egg … perfect! With these, it's only a matter of time before Hedrynne is as good as new. Thank you!\n\nPlease, accept this humble gift along with my gratitude.
Target: A chillwind mushroom, a patch of deep lichen, and an unfertilized chaurus egg … perfect! With these, it's only a matter of time before Hedrynne is as good as new. Thank you!\n\nPlease, accept this humble gift along with my gratitude.

Source: I recognize you! Donel Fontbonne sends his thanks for finding his inheritance.
Target: 당신이군요! Donel Fontbonne이 그의 유산을 찾은 것에 대해 감사하며 보냈습니다.

Source: You helped Arithiel stop Mauloch? If only I could walk in her shadow!
Target: 당신이 아리씨엘을 도와서 말락을 막아냈다고요? 내가 아리씨엘처럼 될 수만 있다면!

Source: So Diel messes with the harpies to try to turn a profit, and they find his body covered in claw marks? I'd call that justice.
Target: So Diel messes with the harpies to try to turn a profit, and they find his body covered in claw marks? I'd call that justice.

Source: Narsis? Damn! I have family in Narsis.\n\nWell, keep an eye out for anymore of those Maulborn fetchers. There's bound to be more of them skulking about the countryside.
Target: Narsis? Damn! I have family in Narsis.\n\nWell, keep an eye out for anymore of those Maulborn fetchers. There's bound to be more of them skulking about the countryside.

Source: A priestess of the … what? We were attacked here! A dark creature, I think it was a Khajiit! The Mane attacked us!
Target: A priestess of the … what? We were attacked here! A dark creature, I think it was a Khajiit! The Mane attacked us!

Source: Thank Kynareth! I thought I'd get eaten by a Goblin for sure.\n\nThey de-bone you, then carve your thigh-bones into flutes. It's true, I swear!
Target: Thank Kynareth! I thought I'd get eaten by a Goblin for sure.\n\nThey de-bone you, then carve your thigh-bones into flutes. It's true, I swear!

Source: I don't rejoice at this news. Rama was a fine officer once. \n\nAt least it is over. Thank you.
Target: I don't rejoice at this news. Rama was a fine officer once. \n\nAt least it is over. Thank you.

Source: A priestess of the … what? We were attacked here! A dark creature, I think it was a Khajiit! The Mane attacked us!
Target: 여사제가... 뭐라구요? 우리는 공격 받았어요! 어두운 생물, 카짓이었던 것 같아요! 메인이 우리를 공격했다고요!

Source: I don't rejoice at this news. Rama was a fine officer once. \n\nAt least it is over. Thank you.
Target: I don't rejoice at this news. Rama was a fine officer once. \n\nAt least it is over. Thank you.

Source: This one knows, Hallowed. Your bravery fills us all with pride. \n\nPreparations have already begun. Your path to the Two Moons Dance begins here, and now.
Target: 이 카짓은 압니다, 성자님. 당신의 용기는 우리 모두를 긍지로 채워줍니다.\n\n 준비는 이미 시작됐습니다. 두 달의 춤의 길은 여기에서 시작이예요.

Source: My head hurts.
Target: 내 머리가 아퍼.

Source: Your idea worked great.
Target: 당신의 아이디어는 훌륭했어요.

Source: I found this.
Target: 이걸 찾았는데요.

Source: The Daedric Princes require minions to carry out their will, and the Sload have always had an interest in the green and pleasant island. It isn't hard to see why they might work together.\n\nFor now, you have my thanks for assisting Valsirenn.
Target: 데이드라 군주들에겐 자신들의 의지를 수행해 줄 하수인이 필요하다네. 그리고 바다 슬로드는 항상 푸르고 아름다운 섬에 관심을 가지고 있었지. 놈들이 협력한 이유를 알기는 어렵지 않네.\n\n지금으로선 자네가 발시렌을 도와주어 고맙다네.

Source: You make a good point. \n\nI need to show my clan that I don't just offer a new approach to mining. I offer a new approach to what life in the clan means. And that starts now—with mercy. Thank you. Please, take this as a token of our friendship.
Target: You make a good point. \n\nI need to show my clan that I don't just offer a new approach to mining. I offer a new approach to what life in the clan means. And that starts now—with mercy. Thank you. Please, take this as a token of our friendship.

Target: Victory for the Covenant!

Target: Victory for Daggerfall!

Target: Victory for Daggerfall!

Source: Yes. There are fewer Shadowed Path necromancers now.
Target: 네. 이제 그림자의 길 강령술사들의 머릿수가 좀 줄었죠.

Source: Victory for Daggerfall!
Target: Victory for Daggerfall!

Source: Victory for the Covenant!
Target: Victory for the Covenant!

Source: Glad you found Sela and stopped those cannibals that killed her husband.
Target: Glad you found Sela and stopped those cannibals that killed her husband.

Source: Victory for the Covenant!
Target: Victory for the Covenant!

Source: So you exposed Danus' little cannibal caravan, did you? Makes me sick to my gut just thinking about it.
Target: So you exposed Danus' little cannibal caravan, did you? Makes me sick to my gut just thinking about it.

Source: We'll see about that. But you have done as was asked, and will have your gold as we agreed. The noble Bashshi-ra appreciates your service … and your discretion.
Target: 두고 보면 알겠지. 어쨌든 부탁한 대로 잘 해 줬으니, 합의한 대로 금화를 줄게. 고귀하신 바시-라도 당신 도움에 감사해할 거야... 그 일처리에도 말이야.

Source: Excellent. I wish I could see the look on Angore's face when I take these to market. I bought them, fair, after all.\n\nThank you for your help. Here's what I owe you. Unlike Angore, I keep to a deal.
Target: 훌륭해요. 이걸 시장에 내놓으면 안고르가 어떤 얼굴을 할지 기대되는데요. 어쨌든 전 비단을 정당하게 구입했으니까요.\n\n도와줘서 고마워요. 여기 당신한테 빚진 몫이에요. 안고르랑은 다르게 전 약속을 지킨답니다.

Source: Words of gratitude are nice and all, but as a fellow adventurer I know they don't fill the belly. Here, some coin for your trouble.
Target: Words of gratitude are nice and all, but as a fellow adventurer I know they don't fill the belly. Here, some coin for your trouble.

Source: The past, present, and future are stark, stripped of illusion. And I am left with more questions.\n\nI will have to find a new way to exist, neither living nor dead, neither doubting nor believing.
Target: 과거, 현재, 미래가 드러나고 환영이 벗겨지는구나. 그리고 내겐 더 많은 질문들이 남았다.\n\n나는 존재하는 새로운 방식을 찾아야 할 것이다. 산 것도 죽은 것도 아닌, 의심하지도 믿지도 않는 방식 말이다.

Source: I would say thank you, but I think you've done enough.
Target: 고맙다는 말을 드려야겠지만, 아무리 말해도 모자랄 것 같네요.

Source: All of what you have told me, I somehow knew. I felt it to be true. I hoped it would be true.\n\nI will no longer dread the unknown. You have lifted darkness out of me. Thank you.
Target: 네가 말해 준 모든 것, 어쨌든 알겠다. 진실이라는 느낌이 드는군. 진실이기를 바란다.\n\n난 더 이상 모르는 것을 두려워하지 않을 것이다. 내 어둠을 걷어 주었구나. 고맙다.

Source: This is all we can spare, please, take it and we'll be on our way. Thanks to you, I think we'll be all right.
Target: 이게 저희가 드릴 수 있는 전부에요. 저희가 떠나기 전에 받아 주세요. 당신 덕분에 이제 괜찮을 거에요.

Source: Thank Stendarr! Things were getting tense. I know you're not the Artisan, thanks to our careful investigations. You're free to go now.\n\nWe'll return the items back to their original owners.
Target: 스텐다르시여, 감사합니다! 상황이 점점 심각해지고 있었거든요. 당신이 장인이 아니라는건 압니다. 우리의 주의깊은 수사 덕분이죠. 가셔도 좋습니다.\n\n물건들은 원래 주인에게 돌려주도록 하겠습니다.

Source: <You open the treasure chest, revealing the riches inside.>
Target: <당신은 궤짝을 열었습니다, 그 안에서 보물이 모습을 드러냈습니다.>

Source: Good! I spoke with my fellow bards and we are in agreement. The instruments shall stay on display and every year we will host a celebration of their return. This way everyone can play and hear them.\n\nI reserved the Seat of Honor for you. Enjoy!
Target: Good! I spoke with my fellow bards and we are in agreement. The instruments shall stay on display and every year we will host a celebration of their return. This way everyone can play and hear them.\n\nI reserved the Seat of Honor for you. Enjoy!

Source: Victory for the Pact!
Target: Victory for the Pact!

Source: Remarkable! Really, just amazing! You're the new Champion of the Blessed Crucible, inheritor of the Brimstone Crown! \n\nLet all in attendance know that the Champion walks here. Let no one bar your path!
Target: 놀랍구만! 정말이지 굉장해! 자네는 축복받은 시련의 새로운 투사이자 유황 왕관의 상속인이야!\n\n참가자 모두에게 여기 투사가 나타났다는 것을 알게 하게. 누구도 자네 길을 막지 못하게 말일세!

Source: There were rumors of Dark Elves disappearing near Malak's Maw. Turns out a gang of Orcs were behind it.
Target: There were rumors of Dark Elves disappearing near Malak's Maw. Turns out a gang of Orcs were behind it.

Target: Victory for the Ebonheart!

Target: Victory for the Ebonheart Pact!

Target: Victory for Daggerfall!

Source: Victory for the Covenant!
Target: Victory for the Covenant!

Target: Victory for Daggerfall!

Source: I'm inclined to agree.\n\nThulsgreg always argues in favor of tradition. The Code of Malacath demands repayment in blood. Without discipline and accountability, this stronghold falls apart. Thank you. Please, take this as a token of our friendship.
Target: I'm inclined to agree.\n\nThulsgreg always argues in favor of tradition. The Code of Malacath demands repayment in blood. Without discipline and accountability, this stronghold falls apart. Thank you. Please, take this as a token of our friendship.

Target: Victory for the Pact!

Target: Then accept the penance of Eidetic Memory. Remember now every tome, every book, every scrap of paper you have ever read.\n\nAnd remember, too, the tale of Eyevea's return to Tamriel, and your role in that tale.

Source: The Ayleid relic is the key, but my memories have faded with time. I no longer remember its location. I know only that you must find it before the Bloodthorn.\n\nI offer this knowledge as payment for the souls you saved today.
Target: 에일리드 유적이 그 열쇠지만, 내 기억은 시간이 지남에 따라 퇴색하고있네. 나는 더 이상 그 위치를 기억하지 못해. 나는 그대가 핏빛가시단보다 먼저 찾아야 한다는 것만 알고있네.\n\n나는 이 지식을 오늘 네가 구한 영혼에 대한 보상으로 제공하겠네.

Source: The Green Lady is my betrothed. Well met! If you are her friend, you can help me.\n\nYou see, I'm trapped in <<1>>, and need assistance to free myself and those captured with me.
Target: The Green Lady is my betrothed. Well met! If you are her friend, you can help me.\n\nYou see, I'm trapped in <<1>>, and need assistance to free myself and those captured with me.

Source: So Almalexia believes. \n\nI was told to convey upon you the gratitude of the Tribunal. And to inform you that the Sacred Lady still has need of your services.
Target: 그래서 아말렉시아는 믿고 있습니다.\n\n저는 당신에게 트라이뷰널의 감사의 뜻을 전하기 위해 왔습니다 . 그리고 성녀께선 여전히 당신의 봉사를 필요로하고 있음을 당신에게 알려드립니다.

Target: <Read Notice.>

Source: So what does all this mean? What is Margus Derius actually looking for?
Target: 그렇다면 이게 무슨 의미일까요? 마르구스 드리어스가 정말로 찾고 있는게 뭘까요?

Source: Wonderful! Now my experiment can continue without interruption. You make a fine assistant, I'm glad my trust in you was not misplaced. \n\nPlease, take this as an expression of my gratitude. You've more than earned it.
Target: Wonderful! Now my experiment can continue without interruption. You make a fine assistant, I'm glad my trust in you was not misplaced. \n\nPlease, take this as an expression of my gratitude. You've more than earned it.

Source: Yes, darling, thanks to you. My rather enviable body is restored and those sorry excuse for cultists no longer have a hold of me. \n\nPlease, take this. It's not every hero that stops to help a talking doll. You've more than earned a reward.
Target: Yes, darling, thanks to you. My rather enviable body is restored and those sorry excuse for cultists no longer have a hold of me. \n\nPlease, take this. It's not every hero that stops to help a talking doll. You've more than earned a reward.

Target: Looks like someone got bitten by the hunting bug on this little adventure. Savor your victory, killer. Cey-Tarn Keep is safe again thanks to you. \n\nJudging by these results, I should rope random strangers into my work more often. Kidding, kidding.
