Source: Yngrel is a lot bloodier now.
Target: Yngrel is a lot bloodier now.

Source: I found his remains … and this letter addressed to you.
Target: I found his remains … and this letter addressed to you.

Source: Ugh. Look, I don't know how you do things … wherever it is you come from, but here on Summerset, we try not to set evil spirits loose. At least the weather cleared a bit.\n\nHere, I'll pay you for that key and we'll pretend this never happened. Fair?
Target: Ugh. Look, I don't know how you do things … wherever it is you come from, but here on Summerset, we try not to set evil spirits loose. At least the weather cleared a bit.\n\nHere, I'll pay you for that key and we'll pretend this never happened. Fair?

Source: I'm sorry to hear that.
Target: 유감이에요.

Source: Ha! A partner after my own heart. Here's your cut. My client will be purring in delight!
Target: Ha! A partner after my own heart. Here's your cut. My client will be purring in delight!

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Yes, I agree. You've gone above and beyond protecting me during this expedition, though the details seem a bit complicated. To think I would have been trapped here!\n\nI'd say our contract is concluded. Thank you for all you've done.
Target: 응. 나도 그렇게 생각해. 넌 이번 탐험 동안 날 보호하는 것 이상의 것을 해왔지만, 자세한 사항들이 다소 복잡해 보이네. 내가 여기 갇혔었다니!\n\n우리 계약을 끝맺자. 네가 해 준 모든 일에 감사해.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: <<1>> is dead.
Target: <<1>>는 죽었어요.

Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: We've repelled the Covenant attack there. Did the signal fires work?
Target: 우린 그 곳에서 대거폴 동맹의 습격을 막아냈어. 봉화가 제대로 전달되었나?

Source: I will fulfill my grandfather's wish and take up the mantle he entrusted to me. Morokei must never be allowed to escape this tomb.\n\nI learned a great deal watching you fight. When the time comes again, I will be ready. Thank you for everything.
Target: I will fulfill my grandfather's wish and take up the mantle he entrusted to me. Morokei must never be allowed to escape this tomb.\n\nI learned a great deal watching you fight. When the time comes again, I will be ready. Thank you for everything.

Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Oh, indeed. I'm sure in time the Arbordawn will return to themselves. It's just … it's a shame we didn't discover where the Falinesti have gone. It may have to remain one of Tamriel's great mysteries.\n\nThank you, assistant!
Target: 아, 당연하지. 분명 시간이 지나면 수목여명도 정상으로 돌아올 걸세. 다만... 팔리네스티가 어디로 갔는지 알아내지 못한건 유감이군 그래. 탐리엘 최대의 수수께끼는 그대로 남아 있을 모양이야.\n\n고마웠네, 조수!

Source: And won, apparently.\n\nSpeak with Gaston. He'll want to know his spell can be completed. It's just as well. That beast needs to be contained. And I still want to split Gaston's skull open for sending us down there—if it weren't for you ….
Target: 그리고 분명히 승리했겟지.\n\n가스톤과 얘기해 보시오. 그는 그의 주문이 완성될 수 있는지 알고 싶어할 거요. 그 짐승을 가둬서 다행이오. 당신이 없었다면 난 우리를 저 아래로 보낸 가스톤의 머리를 아직도 쪼개고 싶었을 거요.

Source: The schematics are mine at last! Splendid.\n\nThis places me in your debt. I have an idea how I can repay you.
Target: 훌륭해! 마침내 설계도를 손에  넣었군!\n\n이거 큰 빚을 지게 되었군. 빚을 갚을 좋은 생각이 있네.

Source: I killed the guardian of the Hollow and collected the nightbloom vines.
Target: I killed the guardian of the Hollow and collected the nightbloom vines.

Source: I killed the guardian of the Hollow and collected the Argonian antiquities.
Target: I killed the guardian of the Hollow and collected the Argonian antiquities.

Source: You've bought us some time and taken out a significant portion of the Colovian forces. Now it's our turn to strike back.
Target: 우리는 시간을 좀 벌었고 콜로비안 군대의 상당한 부분을 빼냈지. 이제 반격할 시간이야.

Source: I killed the necromancer and burned the corrupted heart-roots.
Target: I killed the necromancer and burned the corrupted heart-roots.

Source: I killed the necromancer and recovered the bones of several Dead-Water warriors.
Target: 강령술사를 죽이고 죽은-물 부족 전사의 뼈를 되찾아 왔어요.

Source: Rigurt is as ready as ever! Of course, King Jorunn told Rigurt not say anything during the meeting, so mostly he is ready to nod. And smile!\n\nYou have been such a good friend to Rigurt. Take this, with his thanks!
Target: Rigurt is as ready as ever! Of course, King Jorunn told Rigurt not say anything during the meeting, so mostly he is ready to nod. And smile!\n\nYou have been such a good friend to Rigurt. Take this, with his thanks!

Source: I fulfilled the last request of <<1>>, by killing the Seventh Legion <<2>> who devastated his Orcish brethren and taking the helm. However, he was dead by the time I returned and so Captain Helenus's Helm was left to me to do with as I please.
Target: I fulfilled the last request of <<1>>, by killing the Seventh Legion <<2>> who devastated his Orcish brethren and taking the helm. However, he was dead by the time I returned and so Captain Helenus's Helm was left to me to do with as I please.

Source: I killed the necromancer of Bok-Xul and returned the stolen grave-stakes.
Target: I killed the necromancer of Bok-Xul and returned the stolen grave-stakes.

Source: Huh. I was certain this formula was the one. Perhaps the snowberries weren't the right catalyst. Maybe mammoth milk ….\n\nLive and learn—that's the Coterie motto—and you've done both! Take this for your assistance.
Target: Huh. I was certain this formula was the one. Perhaps the snowberries weren't the right catalyst. Maybe mammoth milk ….\n\nLive and learn—that's the Coterie motto—and you've done both! Take this for your assistance.

Source: I heard you were there when Molag Grunda was defeated. Well done.
Target: I heard you were there when Molag Grunda was defeated. Well done.

Source: I've done it.
Target: I've done it.

Source: Good to see she's safe.
Target: 그녀가 무사해서 다행입니다.

Source: <<1>> represents the Coterie. Odd work, but it pays well. <<2>> handles the Militia's assignments. Dangerous work. Don't do it alone.\n\nHere's an advance. Make sure you're prepared for the job they offer you. You're no good to anyone dead.
Target: <<1>> represents the Coterie. Odd work, but it pays well. <<2>> handles the Militia's assignments. Dangerous work. Don't do it alone.\n\nHere's an advance. Make sure you're prepared for the job they offer you. You're no good to anyone dead.

Source: Yes. I found Atirion and killed him.
Target: 네. 아티리온을 찾아내서 죽였어요.

Source: Splendid! Aren't the state of these just fascinating? They've been stored for centuries, but they look as fresh as those you'd find in a bowl of Valenwood stew.\n\nHere's your payment. Well done!
Target: Splendid! Aren't the state of these just fascinating? They've been stored for centuries, but they look as fresh as those you'd find in a bowl of Valenwood stew.\n\nHere's your payment. Well done!

Source: I burned the supply caches and killed the guardian of the Hollow.
Target: I burned the supply caches and killed the guardian of the Hollow.

Source: I can't imagine...all those people killed at Dune. Thank you, traveler.
Target: 믿을 수 없어요... 그 많은 사람들이 듄에서 살해당했다는 걸. 고마워요, 여행자님.

Source: Oh my, these aren't like anything I've seen before. Doesn't look terribly Goblin to me, but that's for Landal to determine. Either way, the existence of undiscovered peoples is quite an accomplishment. We're most pleased. Most pleased!
Target: Oh my, these aren't like anything I've seen before. Doesn't look terribly Goblin to me, but that's for Landal to determine. Either way, the existence of undiscovered peoples is quite an accomplishment. We're most pleased. Most pleased!

Source: Is this gift something I actually want?
Target: Is this gift something I actually want?

Source: Halskar's dead. I found these orders in a lockbox, along with these relics.
Target: Halskar는 죽었어. 상자에서 이 유물들과 함께 명령서들을 찾았어.

Source: So Lake Halcyon will be safe?
Target: So Lake Halcyon will be safe?

Source: I helped <<1>> find his delayed shipment of tainted goods from Redfur and delivered them to <<2>>, a seemingly friendly hag.
Target: <<1>>를 도와 붉은모피 교역소에서 오염되어버린 수송품을 찾아냈고, 겉보기에는 우호적인 마녀, <<2>>에게 배달해 줬다.

Source: I won't let her live like this, Hallowed. I won't. You and I are going to walk the Path together. We'll destroy Tharn and I will return with the most powerful sages in Tamriel. Together we'll free my sister from this torment.
Target: 칼리를 이렇게 내버려두진 않을 거에요, 성자님. 절대로요. 저흰 함께 길을 걷게 되겠죠. 탄 놈을 없애버린 다음 탐리엘에서 가장 강력한 현자들과 함께 돌아오겠어요. 함께 동생을 이 고문에서 풀어줄 거에요.

Source: I destroyed the sacrificial altars and put an end to the high priestess.
Target: I destroyed the sacrificial altars and put an end to the high priestess.

Source: You've bought us some time and taken out a significant portion of the Colovian forces. Now it's our turn to strike back.
Target: 귀관이 시간을 벌어준 데다가 콜로비아 군대도 상당히 많이 처리해 줬다. 이제 우리가 반격할 차례야.

Source: She did, eh? I don't know what she told you to get you out here. But I guess I can't turn down help.
Target: 부족 대모가? 널 여기까지 보낸다고 무슨 말을 했을지 모르겠군. 그래도 도움을 거절할 순 없겠지.

Source: Good. You should know, little one, that you've helped one of the most respected members of our small community.\n\nAnd you have his gratitude. Hmph.
Target: 좋지. 이건 알아둬라, 꼬마야. 넌 방금 우리 작은 공동체에서 가장 존경받는 사람을 도와준 거라고 말이야.\n\n그리고 도와줘서 고마웠다. 흠.

Source: Good! Now get gone. Ezzag has many chores to do, and has already spent too much time jawing with you.
Target: 좋아! 이제 가 봐. 에자그는 해야 할 잡일이 너무 많은데, 너랑 수다떠느라 시간을 너무 많이 보냈어.

Source: I took part in the Stonetooth Bash.
Target: 돌이빨 축제에 참여하고 왔죠.

Source: Thank you, for all that you have done. May bright moons light your path … as they have not done for my family.
Target: 여러가지로 고마워요. 빛나는 달님들이 당신의 길을 비춰주시길... 우리 가족은 비춰주지 못했지만...

Source: When do we set out for the Swallowed Grove?
Target: When do we set out for the Swallowed Grove?

Source: Here you are. I know Shuzura is hard to deal with, so Tazia will say what she cannot. S'ren-ja's path is lit by bright moons. All because of you, traveler.\n\nFrom this day forward, you are always welcome in our little town.
Target: 여기 있어요. 슈주라는 참 대하기 어려운 사람이죠. 그녀가 못한 말을 대신 해 줄게요. 스렌-자의 길은 밝은 달빛으로 빛납니다. 모두 여행자 당신 때문입니다.\n\n 앞으로 당신은 우리의 작은 마을에서 언제라도 환영받을 것입니다.

Source: It may be hard for an outsider to understand. But we Rangers take our heritage very seriously. \n\nHonoring the memory of the Founder … it's everything. I'm sure Nendaer would agree—you'd make a good Ranger.
Target: 외부인은 이해하기 어려울지도 모르지. 하지만 우리 유격대는 우리의 유산을 아주 진지하게 받아들인다.\n\n창립자님의 기억을 예우하는 것... 그게 전부야. 분명 넨데어님께서도 동의하실 거다. 귀관은 정말 좋은 유격대원이 되겠는걸.

Source: Thank you, traveler. The Falinesti will remember your stewardship.\n\nAs a reward, I offer you the chance to see a ritual few outsiders have ever seen.
Target: 고마워요, 여행자님. 팔리네스티도 당신의 도움을 기억해줄 거에요.\n\n보답으로 외부인들은 거의 보지 못한 의식을 볼 수 있는 기회를 제공해 드리죠.

Source: One of the Camonna Tong stabbed him with a poisoned blade. He wants you to continue his work.
Target: 카모나 통 놈들 중 하나가 독을 바른 칼로 그를 찔렀습니다. 당신이 계속 그가 하던 일을 잇기를 바라더군요.

Source: If he's willing to talk in a letter, why can't he talk to me in person? No matter. This is no longer your concern, but you did aid me. You deserve recompense. Take this and consider our business concluded.
Target: 그 애가 기꺼이 편지로 이야기하겠다면, 왜 직접 내게 말할 수 없는 거야? 상관 없지. 이건 더 이상 네 알 바가 아니지만, 넌 날 도왔어. 넌 보상을 받을 가치가 있어. 이걸 가져가. 그리고 우리 일을 결말 짓도록 하자.

Source: No, Nel … why'd you choose them? What'd they ever do to deserve you?\n\nThank you for bringing me this. For letting me know. It's worth what little the Frostbite left me.
Target: No, Nel … why'd you choose them? What'd they ever do to deserve you?\n\nThank you for bringing me this. For letting me know. It's worth what little the Frostbite left me.

Source: Will this clear the traitor's mark from your egg-family?
Target: Will this clear the traitor's mark from your egg-family?

Source: I'm not sure there is another way. With the Heart of Transparent Law, Nocturnal can control the Crystal Tower. And with the Crystal Tower, she can … well, I'm not sure why she wants the tower.\n\nWe'll need to consult a few experts about that.
Target: 다른 방법이 있을지 모르겠어. 투명한 법의 심장이 있으면, 녹터널은 수정 탑을 통제할 수 있어. 그리고 수정 탑으로 그녀는 ... 음, 그녀가 왜 탑을 원한 건지 모르겠네.\n\n우린 거기에 대한 전문가 몇 명과 상의해봐야 해.

Source: Thank the Divines.\n\nYou know, Glardir finally solved the mystery of why I was spared. The Illuminated One thought I was too boring. Imagine that! I guess it pays to be dull sometimes. And to have strong allies like you. Take care, ceruval.
Target: Thank the Divines.\n\nYou know, Glardir finally solved the mystery of why I was spared. The Illuminated One thought I was too boring. Imagine that! I guess it pays to be dull sometimes. And to have strong allies like you. Take care, ceruval.

Source: I don't understand any of this, but I do know you involved yourself in a matter that you had no need to. And I suppose you were trying to help. That deserves some recompense.\n\nTake this for your efforts. I won't trouble you again.
Target: 이 모든 게 이해되지 않지만, 네가 그럴 필요 없는 상황에 개입했다는 걸 알고 있어. 그리고 네가 도와주려 했다는 것도 알고 있고. 넌 보상 받을 가치가 있어.\n\n이걸 네 노력에 대한 대가로 가져가. 널 다시는 괴롭히지 않을게.

Source: You wanted to speak to me?
Target: You wanted to speak to me?

Source: I found these notes in weapon caches hidden around the city.
Target: 도시 주변에 숨겨져 있던 보관함에서 이 메모들을 발견했어요.

Source: King Jorunn sent me to tell you he's fine.
Target: King Jorunn sent me to tell you he's fine.

Source: I found a camp outside the city. You should see these.
Target: I found a camp outside the city. You should see these.

Source: Hadring was attacked during the race. I had a chance to speak with him before he died.
Target: Hadring was attacked during the race. I had a chance to speak with him before he died.

Source: Now I've got to return to Telenger empty handed. Believe it or not, the old sage was pulling for that little fool. So it goes. The Stars turn in the sky and with them turn the whims of Telenger the Artificer. Good luck.
Target: 이제 텔렌저님께는 빈 손으로 돌아가야겠군요. 믿기 힘들어요. 그 나이드신 현자께서 저런 쬐끄만 바보한테 끌려다니셨다니. 세상 별일이에요. 명장 텔렌저님의 변덕이 하늘의 별들따라 바뀌니 원. 행운을 빌죠.

Source: Psst! I hear you helped get the latest batch of skooma into Sentinel. Thank you.
Target: Psst! I hear you helped get the latest batch of skooma into Sentinel. Thank you.

Source: I'm always happy to share our stories. It's the least I could do to thank you for saving me from those werewolves.\n\nWe're proud of our history in Deepwoods.
Target: 저희의 이야기는 언제든지 기쁘게 알려드릴 수 있어요. 늑대인간들한테서 구해주셨데 감사의 표시로 이 정도는 해 드려야죠.\n\n저희는 깊은숲의 역사를 자랑스러워한답니다.

Source: I understand you helped authorities crack down on the Bandaari. Very much appreciated.
Target: I understand you helped authorities crack down on the Bandaari. Very much appreciated.

Source: Head into town and get a drink! This is home and we'll be here for a while.\n\nHere's your cut of the take from the heist.
Target: 마을로 가서 술이나 퍼먹자! 이 곳은 우리 고향이라고 할 수 있어. 여기서 한동안 머무를 계획이야.\n\n여기 네 몫을 받아.

Source: I recovered the cursed skull. You should take it for safekeeping.
Target: I recovered the cursed skull. You should take it for safekeeping.

Source: I can't even begin to understand what just happened, but I think we have you to thank for keeping us from being tossed around all of creation with no rhyme or reason.\n\nOnce the room stops spinning, we're leaving. Even if I have to carry Raynor out.
Target: I can't even begin to understand what just happened, but I think we have you to thank for keeping us from being tossed around all of creation with no rhyme or reason.\n\nOnce the room stops spinning, we're leaving. Even if I have to carry Raynor out.

Source: What about the Welkynars?
Target: What about the Welkynars?

Source: The city is closed against me! The ancient wards and guardians all see me as hostile.\n\nI could force my way inside, but that might hurt the people of Silvenar. This is supposed to be a celebration, not a war. I'll need your help once again.
Target: 도시가 날 들여보내주질 않소! 고대의 장벽과 수호자들이 모두 날 적대적으로 보더군.\n\n강제로 길을 열어서 들어갈 수도 있지만, 그러면 실베나 사람들이 다치게 될 거요. 이건 축하 행사가 되어야지, 전쟁이 되면 안 되지 않겠소. 다시 한번 당신의 도움이 필요하오.

Source: The dangers that face us become clearer. I will try to convince Chief Tazgol of this, though I doubt he will accept the word of an outsider. Your efforts on our behalf bring you honor.
Target: 우리를 마주하는 위험이 더욱 분명해졌군. 타즈골 족장이 외부인의 말을 받아들일지는 의문스럽지만, 나는 이 사실을 타즈골 족장에게 반드시 납득시키겠어. 우리를 대신해서 이 일들을 해줘서 정말 영광이야.

Source: They said that the Hist wants you and me to finish this.
Target: They said that the Hist wants you and me to finish this.

Source: Here's the writ of endorsement. Firuth seemed pleased with the deal.
Target: 추천장이야. 피루스는 거래에 만족하는것 같았어.

Source: Difficult to say. The fact that he's been fraternizing with apraxics won't reflect well on him. But at least you proved he's not a murderer. That's something, right?\n\nYou've done far more than rescue a stray High Elf, cerum. Take this, and my thanks.
Target: 말하기 힘들군. 그 애가 에이프랙스들과 친하게 지냈다는 사실은 그 애를 잘 반영하지 못할 거야. 하지만 최소한 넌 그 애가 살인자가 아니란 걸 증명했지. 그거면 돼, 그렇지?\n\n넌 길 잃은 하이 엘프를 구하는 것 이상의 일을 했어, 케룸. 내 감사의 표시로 이걸 가져가도록 해.

Source: I took care of the informer.
Target: I took care of the informer.

Source: Are you all right?
Target: 괜찮아?

Source: I found this research journal in Crestshade Mine.
Target: I found this research journal in Crestshade Mine.

Source: Here. The Remnant is yours, Jaxsik-Orrn.
Target: Here. The Remnant is yours, Jaxsik-Orrn.

Source: If you say so.
Target: 그러시군요.

Source: What will happen to <<1>>?
Target: <<1>>는 어떻게 됩니까?

Source: Returning from a scouting mission? Post your report here!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Returning from a scouting mission? Post your report here!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Scouts: Leave lumbermill reports on this board. I will collect them.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Scouts: Leave lumbermill reports on this board. I will collect them.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Scouts: Leave lumbermill reports on this board. I will collect them.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Scouts: Leave lumbermill reports on this board. I will collect them.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Here's what I found in Tsofeer Cavern.
Target: Here's what I found in Tsofeer Cavern.

Source: Scouts—this board awaits your lumbermill reports. Your rewards await as well.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz
Target: Scouts—this board awaits your lumbermill reports. Your rewards await as well.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz

Source: Returning from a scouting mission? Post your report here!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Returning from a scouting mission? Post your report here!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: You mentioned another job for me?
Target: You mentioned another job for me?

Source: Scouts: Leave lumbermill reports on this board. I will collect them.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Scouts: Leave lumbermill reports on this board. I will collect them.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: I have a tablet from the Teeth of Sithis for you.
Target: I have a tablet from the Teeth of Sithis for you.

Source: Scouts—this board awaits your lumbermill reports. Your rewards await as well.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz
Target: Scouts—this board awaits your lumbermill reports. Your rewards await as well.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz

Source: Scouts—this board awaits your lumbermill reports. Your rewards await as well.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz
Target: Scouts—this board awaits your lumbermill reports. Your rewards await as well.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz

Source: Returning from a scouting mission? Post your report here!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Returning from a scouting mission? Post your report here!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: The Veiled Heritance is broken, there is a new Silvenar, and we have you to thank!
Target: The Veiled Heritance is broken, there is a new Silvenar, and we have you to thank!

Source: Are you going to be all right?
Target: Are you going to be all right?

Source: What are you going to do with it?
Target: What are you going to do with it?

Source: What's my reward for raiding Frostvault?
Target: What's my reward for raiding Frostvault?

Source: What's my reward for raiding Frostvault?
Target: What's my reward for raiding Frostvault?

Source: What's my reward for raiding Frostvault?
Target: What's my reward for raiding Frostvault?

Source: Scouts: Leave lumbermill reports on this board. I will collect them.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Scouts: Leave lumbermill reports on this board. I will collect them.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Scouts—this board awaits your lumbermill reports. Your rewards await as well.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz

Source: We're not done quite yet. The spell will require a few moments to fully take effect.\n\nBut I can handle things from here.

Source: We're not so proud that we'd turn down gold. But this isn't my first hunt. I know the Dark Elf's not doing this out of the goodness of his heart. It's only fair that you share in our profit.
Target: We're not so proud that we'd turn down gold. But this isn't my first hunt. I know the Dark Elf's not doing this out of the goodness of his heart. It's only fair that you share in our profit.

Source: A problem he created! We could deal with a few draugr, but we try to avoid constantly fighting with our neighbors.\n\nHere. Since I'm sure you did all the work, take the gold I was going to pay him.
Target: 그가 만든 문제이지! 우리가 약간의 드로거들을 다룰순 있겠지만, 우리의 이웃들과 끊임없이 싸우는 것을 피하려고 노력하지.\n\n여기. 네가 모든 일을 다했으니, 내가 그에게 지불할 돈을 가져가도록 해.

Source: Now, I name you bloodkin to Morkul clan. Last thing I'll do before heading to Orsinium. The king needs a clan who can work its great forge.\n\nAnd it will keep our clan away from Morkuldin until I find a better way to use the blood-forge.
Target: 이제, 너는 모쿨 클랜의 혈족이나 다름없어. 우리가 오시니움으로 가기전 마지막으로 할 일이 있어. 왕에겐 커다란 대장간에서 일할 부족들을 필요로 하거든.\n\n 그리고 피-대장간을 사용할 수 있는 더 좋은 방법을 찾기 전까진 우리 부족들은 모쿨딘을 멀리 할 생각이야.

Source: Woolly crab cheese, special ale, an Orcish love poem! Even a stinky Orc perfume! My gratitude and wonderment know no bounds!\n\nAnd here comes Lazdutha, my sweet emerald coquette! Hurry, my good friend, you must hide!
Target: 울리의 게살 치즈, 특별한 에일, 오크의 사랑의 시! 게다가 냄새나는 오크 향수까지! 내 고마움과 경이로움엔 끝이 없을지경이야!\n\n그리고 라즈두싸, 내 달콤한 에메랄드빛 요부가 오는군! 어서, 내 친구, 넌 어디 숨어 있어야해!

Source: Now, I name you bloodkin to Morkul clan. Last thing I'll do before heading to Orsinium. The king needs a clan who can work its great forge.\n\nYou think we'd let Shatul embarrass us with their inferior iron? Pah!
Target: 이제, 너는 모쿨 클랜의 혈족이나 다름없어. 우리가 오시니움으로 가기전 마지막으로 할 일이 있어. 왕에겐 커다란 대장간에서 일할 부족들을 필요로 하거든.\n\n넌 샤툴이 열등한 강철들로 우리들을 당황스럽게 만드는걸 가만히 냅둘거라 생각해? 하!

Source: Someone at the Mages Guild will help me thaw out Stibbons. It may take weeks to warm him up, but he'll be fine.\n\nThis didn't turn out as planned, but it'll do. Lady Laurent, founder of the Shrine of Sorrow. It has a nice ring to it, don't you think?
Target: 메이지 길드의 누군가 스티븐스를 녹이는데 도움을 줄 수 있겠지. 녹이는데 몇 주가 걸릴지 모르지만, 괜찮을거야.\n\n이 일은 계획대로 되진 않았지만, 그렇게 될 거야. 레이디 로런트, 슬픔의 성소의 발견자. 정말 듣기 좋은걸, 그렇지 않아?

Source: I plan to continue to study these relics and ascertain why the Nords built a tomb in Wrothgar. I'll conduct proper scholarly research—not that popular claptrap that Narsis Dren had me write!\n\nAnd never fear! You will receive the credit you deserve.
Target: 저는 이 유물을 계속 연구하고 왜 노드가 로스가에 무덤을 지었는지 알아볼 생각입니다. 저는 적절한 학문적 연구를 할거에요—나르시스 드렌이 제게 쓰라고 한 인기 좋은 쓰래기는 말고요!\n\n그리고 걱정하지 마세요! 당신은 마땅히 받아야 할 돈을 받을 거에요.

Source: Someone at the Mages Guild will be able to help me thaw out poor Stibbons. It may take weeks for him to warm up, but he'll be fine.\n\nBut you should be pleased! The Orcs will sing my praises, and they're sure to say nice things about you, as well.
Target: 메이지 길드의 누군가가 가여운 스티븐스를 녹이는 것을 도와줄 수 있을거야. 몸을 녹이는데 몇 주가 걸릴지 모르지만, 괜찮을거야.\n\n하지만 넌 기뻐해야해! 오크들이 날 찬양할테고, 틀림없이 너에대해 좋은 말들이 오고 갈 테니 말이야.

Target: 제재소 보고서가 급히 필요하다. 복귀하는 대로 여기에 보고서를 게시하라.\n\n- 카마가시 장군

Source: The Doomcrag! It collapsed! I just hope that terrible Montclair was under it when it fell.
Target: The Doomcrag! It collapsed! I just hope that terrible Montclair was under it when it fell.

Source: I think King Alard will be an excellent ruler.
Target: I think King Alard will be an excellent ruler.

Source: I think Queen Eselde will be an excellent ruler.
Target: I think Queen Eselde will be an excellent ruler.

Source: I found evidence that proved <<1>> is working with the Supernal Dreamers and manipulating Hosni at-Tura.
Target: 나는 <<1>>이 숭고한 몽상가들과 함께 움직이고 있고 호스니 앳-투라를 조종했다는 증거를 찾았다.

Source: I rescued <<1>> from the <<2>> and retrieved the Dream Shard.
Target: I rescued <<1>> from the <<2>> and retrieved the Dream Shard.

Source: Ah, my spellbook! Excellent.\n\nIf you're hungry later, come back. I have a delightful recipe for roast chicken.
Target: 아, 내 마법책! 훌륭해.\n\n나중에 배가 고프면 돌아와. 나는 구운 치킨에 대한 아주 좋은 요리법을 가지고 있거든.

Source: From Count Hosni's parents, I learned he has no intention of handing over the Dream Shard. He wants the signet ring so he can dispose of his parents without consequence.
Target: From Count Hosni's parents, I learned he has no intention of handing over the Dream Shard. He wants the signet ring so he can dispose of his parents without consequence.

Source: I'd heard tales of Nairume, but you freed her from Rajhin's prison! To become part of legend...I can't imagine!
Target: 네루메의 이야기를 들었지만, 당신이 그녀를 라진의 감옥에서 구해주셨다면서요! 전설의 일부가 되었다니 ... 상상이 안 되네요!

Source: I found this on Hubert.
Target: 이것을 Huber에서 찾았다.

Source: You've revived my memories of the Barons Who Move Like This! I must go and re-corporate them while the memories are still fresh. Then, we shall begin to conquer the Aurbis!\n\nOh! And thank you. Please accept an award appropriate to your station.
Target: You've revived my memories of the Barons Who Move Like This! I must go and re-corporate them while the memories are still fresh. Then, we shall begin to conquer the Aurbis!\n\nOh! And thank you. Please accept an award appropriate to your station.

Source: When I threatened to kill Lord Sorick, he relented. He agreed to have his men remove dreugh eggs from the slums. The attacks will end. He also agreed to compensate the peasants for their losses and leave from the slums forever.
Target: When I threatened to kill Lord Sorick, he relented. He agreed to have his men remove dreugh eggs from the slums. The attacks will end. He also agreed to compensate the peasants for their losses and leave from the slums forever.

Source: Excellent work! Thanks to you, the miners' deaths have been avenged. Here's some coin as promised.
Target: 훌륭하군!  광부의 죽음에대해 복수를 해주어 고마워. 여기에 약속한 돈이야.

Source: You located the stolen supplies and uncovered our betrayer? Trinimac surely sent you to us in our time of need! Take this reward for helping our people. And you must present yourself to Forge-Mother Alga.\n\nLook, here she comes now.
Target: 당신이 도난당한 물품의 위치를 밝혀내고, 배신자를 색출했다구요? 트리니막께서 제 때에 당신을 보내셨군요! 저희 사람들을 도와준 보상을 가져가시죠. 그리고 당신은 대장간대모 알가님에게 자신을 소개하시는게 좋을것 같네요.\n\n저기 오시는 군요.

Source: After I make sure we get back to the clan safely? Maybe I'll go and see the new city they're building. I've heard it's quite grand.\n\nIn spite of my mistakes, we got the Riekr's totem and saved most of the hunting party. Thanks to you.
Target: 우리가 부족으로 무사히 돌아간다음 말이야? 아마 나는 그들이 새로 짓고 있는 도시를 보러 갈것 같아. 그곳이 꽤 크다는걸 들었거든.\n\n내 실수에도 불구하고, 우리는 리클 토템을 얻었고 사냥꾼 파티의 대부분을 구출해냈어. 정말 고마워.

Source: So you returned the helm and slew the creature that took his life. Huh.\n\nYou did Corgrak a great honor. Here, he'd want you to have this. Walk in Malacath's shadow.
Target: So you returned the helm and slew the creature that took his life. Huh.\n\nYou did Corgrak a great honor. Here, he'd want you to have this. Walk in Malacath's shadow.

Source: I hear you helped drive the damned Imperials out of Satakalaam. Long live the Covenant!
Target: I hear you helped drive the damned Imperials out of Satakalaam. Long live the Covenant!

Source: Now that they're united, the Nords will excellent good allies.
Target: Now that they're united, the Nords will excellent good allies.

Source: Yes, it is, isn't it? Maybe I'll contact someone in Mistral. Ask about Zayshara and Azin. I'd like to learn more about them.\n\nI'm going to stay here a while longer. Pay my respects, you know? Then I really have to go find my cat.
Target: 그래, 정말 그렇지 않아? 아마 미스트랄에 있는 사람과 연락을 할거야. 제이샤라와 아진에 관해 물어봐야지. 그들에 대해 더 알고싶어.\n\n난 여기 좀 더 있을 생각이다. 내 존경을 표하지, 너도 알지? 그런다음 내 진짜로 내 고양이를 찾아야겠어.

Source: The Grand Warlord needs mine scouting reports! Post them here.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: 위대한 전쟁군주께서 정찰 보고서가 급히 필요하다고 하시네! 이곳에 게시해주게.\n\n- 드리트-휠름의 서기관

Source: Returning scouts: This board awaits your reports.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Returning scouts: This board awaits your reports.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Returning scouts: This board awaits your reports.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Returning scouts: This board awaits your reports.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Scouts: Turn in your report and collect your reward.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz
Target: 정찰병에게 공지함: 보고서를 제출하고 보상을 받아가게.\n\n-  다-리우르즈 장군

Source: I collected S'Rashi's debts from two men, and we worked out the issues surrounding the money Captain Marck owed. S'rashi should be able to pay of his own debt to his boss in the Midnight Union now.
Target: 나는 두 남자에게서 스'라시의 빚을 받았어요. 그리고 우리는 마르크 선장이 진 빚 문제를 해결했습니다. 스'라시는 이제 자정 연합(Midnight Union)에 있는 그의 상관에게 빚을 갚을 수 있을 것입니다.

Source: Returning scouts: This board awaits your reports.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Returning scouts: This board awaits your reports.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Poor Hrondar. I'm going to miss sharing a cask with him.
Target: Poor Hrondar. I'm going to miss sharing a cask with him.

Source: The Grand Warlord needs mine scouting reports! Post them here.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: 위대한 전쟁군주께서 정찰 보고서가 급히 필요하다고 하시네! 이곳에 게시해주게.\n\n- 드리트-휠름의 서기관

Source: Scouts: Turn in your report and collect your reward.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz
Target: 정찰병에게 공지함: 보고서를 제출하고 보상을 받아가게.\n\n-  다-리우르즈 장군
