Target: 위대한 전쟁군주께서 정찰 보고서가 급히 필요하다고 하시네! 이곳에 게시해주게.\n\n- 드리트-휠름의 서기관

Source: You're going to be fine, <<1>>.
Target: 괜찮아질 겁니다, <<1>>.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 하실 건가요?

Source: Brigibeth said she might follow your lead.
Target: Brigibeth said she might follow your lead.

Source: Yes, here's the briar heart.
Target: 그렇습니다. 여기 찔레 심장입니다.

Source: We finished sanctifying the bodies of the dead soldiers, but we ran into a bloodfiend.
Target: We finished sanctifying the bodies of the dead soldiers, but we ran into a bloodfiend.

Source: I lost a brother to Captain Blackheart and his murderous crew. Thank you, for serving them justice.
Target: I lost a brother to Captain Blackheart and his murderous crew. Thank you, for serving them justice.

Source: Scouts: Turn in your report and collect your reward.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz
Target: 정찰병에게 공지함: 보고서를 제출하고 보상을 받아가게.\n\n-  다-리우르즈 장군

Source: The Grand Warlord needs mine scouting reports! Post them here.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: 위대한 전쟁군주께서 정찰 보고서가 급히 필요하다고 하시네! 이곳에 게시해주게.\n\n- 드리트-휠름의 서기관

Source: At last. Although it does not end the suffering of my fellow Sword-Disciples, at least the Serpent's foul poison will spread no more.\n\nFor my part, I will wait here until it is safe to enter, bury the dead, and see if I can carry on their legacy.
Target: At last. Although it does not end the suffering of my fellow Sword-Disciples, at least the Serpent's foul poison will spread no more.\n\nFor my part, I will wait here until it is safe to enter, bury the dead, and see if I can carry on their legacy.

Source: So we stopped the attack?
Target: So we stopped the attack?

Source: I always knew them Pellingares were up to no good. Well done.
Target: 나는 항상 펠링게어 가족이 나쁜 짓을 꾸미고 있다고 생각했어요. 잘 했어요.

Source: At least now you're free. What will you do now?
Target: At least now you're free. What will you do now?

Source: What happens now?
Target: 무슨일이야?

Source: I freed <<1>> from the Supernal Dreamers.
Target: 숭고한 몽상가들로부터 <<1>>을 해방시켰습니다.

Source: Why didn't the curse affect me?
Target: Why didn't the curse affect me?

Source: It's time to evacuate.
Target: 탈출할 시간이야.

Source: I'll give him the burial he seeks, so we can both finally get some rest, but it'll be an unmarked grave. His name can stay buried down here. Call it mercy, not forgiveness.\n\nBut at least I won't join him. I never could have done this without you.
Target: I'll give him the burial he seeks, so we can both finally get some rest, but it'll be an unmarked grave. His name can stay buried down here. Call it mercy, not forgiveness.\n\nBut at least I won't join him. I never could have done this without you.

Source: I've arrived in Dra'bul.
Target: 드라불에 도착했습니다.

Source: I'm here to help you. Captain Rana sent me.
Target: 도와주러 왔습니다. 라나 대장님이 보냈는데요.

Source: Captain Rana sent me. I'm here to help.
Target: 라나 대장이 나를 보냈어. 나는 여기에 도움이된다.\n

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: I've arrived in Dra'bul.
Target: I've arrived in Dra'bul.

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Just tell me what's going on.
Target: 그냥 무슨 일인지 이야기해 줘.

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Geirmund's Guardian. You have my respect.
Target: Geirmund's Guardian. You have my respect.

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: 자치령에 승리를!

Source: None of us would be here to sing dirges for the dead or celebrate the living if not for you. I certainly wouldn't be here, ready to lead my hold.\n\nYou've supported me since I started down this path. I'm honored to have you here at the end.
Target: None of us would be here to sing dirges for the dead or celebrate the living if not for you. I certainly wouldn't be here, ready to lead my hold.\n\nYou've supported me since I started down this path. I'm honored to have you here at the end.

Source: I used my wits, my faithful dog, and my grappling hook to rescue those who needed rescuing, and made it back in one piece! Best of all, I made a new friend. It was everything I hoped for and more!\n\nHere, take this as a token of my appreciation.
Target: I used my wits, my faithful dog, and my grappling hook to rescue those who needed rescuing, and made it back in one piece! Best of all, I made a new friend. It was everything I hoped for and more!\n\nHere, take this as a token of my appreciation.

Source: What mad sorcery. Better that she's gone and the water cleansed.\n\nThank you for this. Maybe this will give us a chance to do proper research and find out what really happened to this city.
Target: What mad sorcery. Better that she's gone and the water cleansed.\n\nThank you for this. Maybe this will give us a chance to do proper research and find out what really happened to this city.

Source: There was a problem at Deepcrag and I heard the owner sent his wife away.  Very curious.
Target: There was a problem at Deepcrag and I heard the owner sent his wife away.  Very curious.

Source: She's strong, she will be fine. Anyway, it was an honor to work with you. If you ever find yourself tangled in the world of spirits again, I do hope you 'll seek us out. \n\nHere, take this for your time. You undoubtedly deserve it.
Target: She's strong, she will be fine. Anyway, it was an honor to work with you. If you ever find yourself tangled in the world of spirits again, I do hope you 'll seek us out. \n\nHere, take this for your time. You undoubtedly deserve it.

Source: Take this. Call it a keepsake for everything you've done for House Ravenwatch. And for me.\n\nThe vampiric threat still looms large here in Skyrim, but with Essenia out of the way, I think we've got a fighting chance.
Target: Take this. Call it a keepsake for everything you've done for House Ravenwatch. And for me.\n\nThe vampiric threat still looms large here in Skyrim, but with Essenia out of the way, I think we've got a fighting chance.

Source: It's funny. The flowers meant so much to us when we were young, but at the end, we didn't need the flowers any more. We had the memories.\n\nThese seeds are wonderful though. I realize now their true significance.
Target: 재밌구먼. 젊었을 적에는 이 꽃이 그렇게나 큰 의미가 있었는데, 결국에는 더 이상 꽃이 필요 없다니 말일세. 우리한텐 추억이 있으니까.\n\n그래도 이 씨앗들은 정말 멋지군. 이 꽃의 진정한 의미를 이제 알겠네.

Source: Excellent. Hopefully after all this trouble, we can convince Solitude to make our lives a little easier. \n\nThank you, friend. Your actions likely saved the western holds. I promise you, your triumph will not go unsung.
Target: Excellent. Hopefully after all this trouble, we can convince Solitude to make our lives a little easier. \n\nThank you, friend. Your actions likely saved the western holds. I promise you, your triumph will not go unsung.

Source: Victory for the Covenant!
Target: Victory for the Covenant!

Source: Did I get them all?
Target: 제가 전부 다 데려왔나요?

Source: They've all lost children to the war. They blame Kyne.
Target: 그들은 전쟁에서 모두 잃어버린 아이들이었습니다. 그들은 Kyne을 비난합니다.\n

Source: You mentioned payment for services rendered?
Target: You mentioned payment for services rendered?

Source: A Daedric cult called the Supernal Dreamers stole a Crystal of Power from <<1>>.  The cult shattered the Crystal in five <<m:2>> and attempted to use them in Daedric rituals.\n\nI thwarted their plans and took back the <<m:2>> for <<1>>.
Target: 숭고한 몽상가들이라 불리는 데이드릭 광신도들은 <<1>>에서 '힘의 수정'을 훔쳤습니다. 광신도들은 그 수정을 <<m:2>>5개로 쪼개고 데이드릭 의식에서 그것을 사용하려 했습니다.\n\n 나는 그들의 음모를 막고 <<m:2>>를<<1>>로 되찾았습니다.

Source: Victory for the Covenant!
Target: Victory for the Covenant!

Source: Victory for the Pact!
Target: Victory for the Pact!

Source: We've won the day?
Target: 우리가 이겼나요?

Source: Where have they gone, Aera?
Target: 그들이 어디로 갔습니까, 아에라?

Source: Did you all make it back safely?
Target: 모두 안전하게 돌아왔나요?

Source: I'll take them to a temple for consecration and see that he gets a proper burial. It won't be a jarl's funeral, but hopefully it'll allow him to reach Sovngarde.\n\nThen I can finally get some rest. You've spared us both. Thank you.
Target: I'll take them to a temple for consecration and see that he gets a proper burial. It won't be a jarl's funeral, but hopefully it'll allow him to reach Sovngarde.\n\nThen I can finally get some rest. You've spared us both. Thank you.

Source: Then my odds of getting off this rock without being incinerated are looking much better. My employer should be pleased as well.\n\nHere's your cut of my pay. I should subcontract more often.
Target: Then my odds of getting off this rock without being incinerated are looking much better. My employer should be pleased as well.\n\nHere's your cut of my pay. I should subcontract more often.

Source: That's horrible! But there must be more to this than simply turning my people into monsters.\n\nWell, I'll do what I can to help you. Mother would have wanted me to. What you've done and discovered will be enough to convince my father. It has to be.
Target: That's horrible! But there must be more to this than simply turning my people into monsters.\n\nWell, I'll do what I can to help you. Mother would have wanted me to. What you've done and discovered will be enough to convince my father. It has to be.

Source: You did it!
Target: 네가 한짓이군!

Source: Victory for the Pact!
Target: Victory for the Pact!

Source: You did it!
Target: You did it!

Source: Victory for the Pact!
Target: Victory for the Pact!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Victory for the Pact!
Target: Victory for the Pact!

Source: How could you let that alchemist from Phaer live? He was a monster!
Target: How could you let that alchemist from Phaer live? He was a monster!

Source: Victory For the Pact!
Target: Victory For the Pact!

Source: Victory for the Pact!
Target: Victory for the Pact!

Source: I burned their markers, as you asked. Is there something else?
Target: 니가 요청한대로 그들의 표식을 지웠어.  더 할것이 있나?

Source: Victory For the Pact!
Target: Victory For the Pact!

Source: Victory for the Covenant!
Target: Victory for the Covenant!

Source: Lady Estre was our true Queen! Damn you for killing her!
Target: Lady Estre was our true Queen! Damn you for killing her!

Source: Victory for the Daggerfall Covenant!
Target: Victory for the Daggerfall Covenant!

Source: I knew she wouldn't forget me! I hope things are going better for her then they are for me.
Target: I knew she wouldn't forget me! I hope things are going better for her then they are for me.

Source: Just like Dinie to send someone after the fun is over! Well at least for the Veiled Heritance anyway.\n\nStill, it's good that you're here.
Target: Just like Dinie to send someone after the fun is over! Well at least for the Veiled Heritance anyway.\n\nStill, it's good that you're here.

Source: Ah Dinie. Can't get me out of her head, can she? I knew she cared.
Target: 아 디니. 그녀를 그녀의 머리에서 빼낼 수는 없습니까? 나는 그녀가 돌 보았다는 것을 알았다.\n

Source: Did you hear that someone purged the corruption from the Wyrd Tree?
Target: 누군가 위어드 나무에서 오염을 몰아냈다던데 들었나요?

Source: Seeing as it's you asking, sure. If she's planning a job, I'm in. All I ask is a trip off this rock after it's over.
Target: 네가 원한다면 물론 그래야지. 그녀가 무슨 일을 꾸미고 있다면, 나도 참여 하겠어. 내가 원하는 건 단지 그 일을 마무리한 후에 무사히 이 섬을 떠나는 것 뿐이야.

Source: Yes. Yes, I do. I know someone on the island who can make us both rich.\n\nIf you're up for another job, I think it's time you met her.
Target: Yes. Yes, I do. I know someone on the island who can make us both rich.\n\nIf you're up for another job, I think it's time you met her.

Source: You're leaving? And without a proper send off? We don't even have a bottle of wine!\n\nBut in all sincerity, thanks for helping us. You really are an inspiration. And I should know, seeing as I'm pretty inspirational myself.
Target: You're leaving? And without a proper send off? We don't even have a bottle of wine!\n\nBut in all sincerity, thanks for helping us. You really are an inspiration. And I should know, seeing as I'm pretty inspirational myself.

Source: You saved countless lives, uncovering Rhavil Urano's treachery.
Target: You saved countless lives, uncovering Rhavil Urano's treachery.

Source: You should leave while you can.
Target: You should leave while you can.

Source: General Godrun says he owes his life to you...and his honor.
Target: General Godrun says he owes his life to you...and his honor.

Source: Are you prepared to move on?
Target: Are you prepared to move on?

Source: Victory for the Pact!
Target: Victory for the Pact!

Source: Victory for the Pact!
Target: Victory for the Pact!

Source: I see you all made it back safely.
Target: I see you all made it back safely.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: The hero who defeated General Serien is always a welcome sight.
Target: The hero who defeated General Serien is always a welcome sight.

Source: Dammit, Fanrel. She should have gotten our help. The Faithful should be avenged—but she will never succeed on her own.\n\nBut I can't blame you for wanting to keep your hands clean. You've done more than we can repay. Thank you.
Target: 젠장, 판렐. 우리 도움을 받아야 했을텐데. 신앙인들의 복수는 이루어져야 하지만, 판렐 혼자서는 절대 성공할 수 없을 걸세.\n\n그래도 자네 손을 더럽히지 않았다고 해서 비난할 순 없지. 우리가 갚을 수 있는 것보다 더 큰 일을 해 줬으니까. 고맙네.

Source: The butchers got what they had coming to them. Word will spread, and the Wood Orcs will think twice about settling the Falinesti sites and slaughtering the faithful.\n\nThank you for your help.
Target: 도살자놈들이 받아야 할 대가를 치른거지. 소문이 퍼질테니 우드 오크놈들은 팔리네스티 땅에 자리잡고 신앙인을 학살하는 일을 두 번은 다시 생각하게 될 거야.\n\n도와줘서 고마워.

Source: Talk to the Vinedusk. Bodring is in command here. He'll know best what needs to be done.\n\nMay the gods be with you, friend. May the gods be with us all.
Target: 덩굴그늘쪽 사람이랑 말해 보세요. 보드링이 여길 지휘하고 있죠. 뭘 해야 가장 좋을지 알 거에요.\n\n신들께서 당신과 함께 하시길, 친구. 우리 모두와 함께 하시길.

Source: This is a blight on our community. Our own innkeeper, responsible for leading visitors to bandits? Bad hospitality.\n\nThank you for bringing him to us. We'll see he gets what he deserves.
Target: 이건 우리 공동체의 어두운 그림자로군. 우리 여관 주인이 방문객을 도적놈들에게 이끈 주범이라니? 나쁜 접대구려.\n\n넬로어를 데려다줘서 고맙소. 받아 마땅한 처벌을 받게 할 거요.

Source: She … what? Where is this tribe? I can't just let her go. I … I will join her. I can live in the forest. I … who am I kidding? \n\nThis is my fault. Our relationship was always harder on her than it was on me. At least I know she's okay.
Target: 에리넬이... 뭐라고? 그 부족은 어디 있소? 그냥 보낼 순 없다고. 난... 나도 함께 하겠소. 숲에서 살아갈 수 있단 말이오. 난... 내가 무슨 소릴 하는 거람?\n\n이건 내 잘못이오. 에리넬은 항상 우리 관계를 나보다 더 힘들어했었지. 적어도 에리넬이 무사하다는건 알게 됐구려.

Source: I wish you'd accompanied her, but she is strong. Like … like a stampede of mammoths.\n\nI know, I should stick to administrative work. Thank you so much.
Target: 당신이 에리넬과 함께 왔다면 좋았겠지만, 그녀는 강한 사람이오. 마치... 마치 몰려드는 매머드같지.\n\n나는 문서나 붙잡는 일에 매달리는 사람이지만 말이오. 정말 고맙소.

Source: You were at Fullhelm Fort. You save Thane Unnvald's life!
Target: You were at Fullhelm Fort. You save Thane Unnvald's life!

Source: You're the one who caught the traitor Thorulf. Too bad about Thane Unnvald - but Hallfrida's a good leader.
Target: You're the one who caught the traitor Thorulf. Too bad about Thane Unnvald - but Hallfrida's a good leader.

Source: Yes, the Stonechewer Goblin tribe will no longer be a problem for your outpost.
Target: 그래, Stonechewer 고블린 부족은 더이상 문제가 되지 않을거야.

Source: The slayer of high kinlady Estre. Here, among us!
Target: 고위 혈족부인 에스트리의 살해자잖아. 그런 사람이 우리 사이에 있다니!

Source: I'd ask you what you saw there, but that would ruin the surprise.\n\nMy allies and I will be the first to slay whatever lurks in the Citadel. Soon as they get here.
Target: I'd ask you what you saw there, but that would ruin the surprise.\n\nMy allies and I will be the first to slay whatever lurks in the Citadel. Soon as they get here.

Source: At last. And the more beautiful for the longed-for rest it brings.\n\nWhen I was young, I implored Hircine to let me hunt his finest beast. That ensured I was restless and deathless. Until today. Thank you.
Target: 드디어. 간절히 기다려온 휴식보다 더 아릅답군.\n\n내가 젊었을 적에, 허씬께 최고의 짐승을 사냥할 수 있게 해달라고 간청했었지. 그 때문에 난 쉴 수도 죽을 수도 없게 되었어. 오늘까지는 말이야. 고맙네.

Source: By Shor's prickly hairs—I wanted to be the first to tell the tale of the Citadel.\n\nYou've beat us, my friend. You've daunted the Undaunted.
Target: By Shor's prickly hairs—I wanted to be the first to tell the tale of the Citadel.\n\nYou've beat us, my friend. You've daunted the Undaunted.

Source: QUEST: A Father's Plea
Target: 퀘스트: 아버지의 애원

Source: I was sad to hear about the troubles in Silent Mire. Pirates, kidnapping. Is no place safe anymore?
Target: I was sad to hear about the troubles in Silent Mire. Pirates, kidnapping. Is no place safe anymore?

Source: You did it!
Target: You did it!

Source: You've done the Dominion a great service. No doubt he was feeding the Pact information about our troop movements. That's lives saved.\n\nWe'll clear out any Pact dumb enough to remain in the area. Thank you.
Target: You've done the Dominion a great service. No doubt he was feeding the Pact information about our troop movements. That's lives saved.\n\nWe'll clear out any Pact dumb enough to remain in the area. Thank you.

Source: I never had a chance. They drugged us. Then the Hagraven came. Its breath on my face! It sucked out my eyes. I'll never see again.
Target: I never had a chance. They drugged us. Then the Hagraven came. Its breath on my face! It sucked out my eyes. I'll never see again.

Source: You were with Dajaheel and Belron when Stral was defeated.
Target: You were with Dajaheel and Belron when Stral was defeated.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군요.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군.

Source: Omin Dres won't shut up about you.
Target: Omin Dres won't shut up about you.

Source: I ran into some trouble, but it was nothing I couldn't handle.
Target: 약간의 문제를 마주치기도 했지만, 전부 처리할 수 있었죠.

Source: The bandits were contracted by the Daggerfall Covenant to steal a Daedric artifact.
Target: 그 도적들은 대거폴 동맹과 계약해서 데이드릭 유물을 훔치고 있더군요.

Source: Now all that remains is to finish my last few paragraphs, and go speak to Meldil. I'm sure he'll be annoyed with me. But with the relics in-hand and my sterling prose, I'm sure this is the start of a brave new chapter in my life. All thanks to you!
Target: 이제 남은건 마지막 단락 몇 개만 끝내고서 멜딜한테 말하는 것 뿐이네요. 분명 짜증을 엄청나게 내겠죠. 그래도 유물이 제 손에 있고 훌륭하게 써둔 글도 있으니까, 제 인생의 멋지고도 새로운 장이 열릴 거에요. 전부 당신 덕분이에요!

Source: Someone found a magical talisman that will allow the Lion Guard to get into Angof's stronghold.
Target: 누군가 사자 근위대를 앵고프의 근거지에 들어가게 해 줄 부적을 찾았대.

Source: Not everything is as grim as it appears. We did create an elixir. That's our best chance of protecting the people from the harrowstorm. We just need to distribute it.\n\nIn the meantime, take this. It may not seem like much, but you earned it.
Target: Not everything is as grim as it appears. We did create an elixir. That's our best chance of protecting the people from the harrowstorm. We just need to distribute it.\n\nIn the meantime, take this. It may not seem like much, but you earned it.

Source: I don't know, truly. Freiwen's return will raise many questions in Morthal. The jarl and I must discuss what to say. If we say anything at all about what happened here.\n\nI promised you payment at the beginning of this. Here. I'm deeply grateful.
Target: I don't know, truly. Freiwen's return will raise many questions in Morthal. The jarl and I must discuss what to say. If we say anything at all about what happened here.\n\nI promised you payment at the beginning of this. Here. I'm deeply grateful.

Source: I thought as much. But thanks to you, my people are safe.\n\nI will not let your help go to waste, nor will I let this tragedy sour the dream Skor and I created here. Take this. We don't have much to offer, but we will never forget what you did for us.
Target: I thought as much. But thanks to you, my people are safe.\n\nI will not let your help go to waste, nor will I let this tragedy sour the dream Skor and I created here. Take this. We don't have much to offer, but we will never forget what you did for us.

Source: Looks that way, thanks to you. With any luck we might even be able to salvage the Cormorant. She's a fine ship.\n\nPlease, take this. I wish I had more to give.
Target: Looks that way, thanks to you. With any luck we might even be able to salvage the Cormorant. She's a fine ship.\n\nPlease, take this. I wish I had more to give.

Source: They're all at peace now.
Target: 이제 모두 안식에 들었습니다.

Source: You helped strengthen the Pact in Stormhold. Thank you.
Target: You helped strengthen the Pact in Stormhold. Thank you.

Source: I invoked the Scroll of Glorious Battle and defeated Stormreeve Neidir, but I have other enemies to deal with before I can call my pledge complete.
Target: I invoked the Scroll of Glorious Battle and defeated Stormreeve Neidir, but I have other enemies to deal with before I can call my pledge complete.

Source: How odd that the Dremora aided us against her kyn and Molag Bal. She must have had a powerful thirst for vengeance.\n\nAnyway, it appears as if we are once again in your debt. Thank you, my brave friend.
Target: 드레모라가 자기네 킨과 몰라그 발에 맞서는 우릴 도와주다니 이상하군 그래. 분명히 복수에 대한 강한 갈증을 가졌던 게지.\n\n아무튼, 우리가 다시 한번 자네에게 빚을 진 것 같군. 고맙네, 내 용감한 친구여.

Source: So what's your plan to stop them?
Target: So what's your plan to stop them?

Source: You're welcome, Valaste.
Target: 환영하네, 발라스테.

Source: So what's your plan to stop them?
Target: So what's your plan to stop them?

Source: Here, let me untie you.
Target: 자, 풀어드리죠.

Source: I'm just glad I could help.
Target: 도와줄 수 있어서 기쁠 뿐이에요.

Source: <You rummage through the backpack and find the payment Thonoras pledged to provide.>
Target: <배낭을 뒤져서 토노라스가 주기로 했던 보상을 찾아냅니다.>

Source: <You rummage through the backpack and find the payment Thonoras pledged to provide.>
Target: <배낭을 뒤져서 토노라스가 주기로 했던 보상을 찾아냅니다.>

Source: Is it true Wuuthrad was stolen from Fallowstone Hall?
Target: Is it true Wuuthrad was stolen from Fallowstone Hall?

Source: We've taken them down a notch! The more bones they send us, the more we'll have to fight them. Bet the Wormies never thought they'd be on the other end of it, eh?
Target: 우리가 그놈들 콧대를 꺾어 버렸잖아! 놈들이 더 많은 뼈를 보내면 우린 더 많이 싸워야겠지. 벌레놈들은 분명 이걸로 끝이라고 생각하지 않을 테니까. 안 그래?

Source: See the world, I expect. Folks may not take kindly to chattering Elf bones, but it's better than stomping everything to jelly, eh?
Target: 아마 세상을 돌아다닐거 같아. 사람들이 말하는 엘프 뼈를 좋아하지 않겠지만, 뭐 다 곤죽을 내버리는거 보단 낫겠지.

Source: For now. These necromancers seem slow to learn and deserve everything we give them.\n\nBut we'll keep watch for another decade, just to be certain.
Target: For now. These necromancers seem slow to learn and deserve everything we give them.\n\nBut we'll keep watch for another decade, just to be certain.

Source: The caverns are safe, now.
Target: 동굴은 이제 안전해요.

Source: Then let me welcome you as an Associate of the Fighters Guild! Get out there and take the fight to the Daedra!\n\nYou're in luck, too. Sees-All-Colors herself is here, upstairs. She often has tasks for new recruits. Why don't you introduce yourself?
Target: 그럼 파이터 길드의 동료가 된 걸 환영하네! 밖으로 나가 데이드라와 싸우게나!\n\n 자넨 운도 좋군. 씨-올-컬러스가 여기 윗층에 있네. 그녀는 종종 신입들에게 임무를 내준다네. 그녀에게 자신을 소개해보는 게 어떤가?

Source: I found evidence of a necromancer working with the Covenant.
Target: 강령술사가 대거폴 동맹과 함께 일한다는 증거를 찾았어요.

Source: I'm ready, Rana. What do we do now?
Target: 전 준비되었습니다, 라나. 우리가 뭘 해야하죠?

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 뭘 할거죠?

Source: The Frozen Man had him. He's all right now.
Target: 얼어붙은 남자한테 잡혀있더군요. 이제 괜찮아요.

Source: I've brought ritual objects recovered from the Teeth of Sithis.
Target: I've brought ritual objects recovered from the Teeth of Sithis.

Source: You exposed Captain Cularalda's true colors. Velyn Harbor owes you for that.
Target: You exposed Captain Cularalda's true colors. Velyn Harbor owes you for that.

Source: I got all but Aranias. She fled the island for Greenshade.
Target: 디 잡았는데 아라나이아스만 놓쳤어요. 섬을 떠나서 그린셰이드로 도망쳤더군요.

Source: To me? You mean like fetching water and cleaning my fruit? Oh, that is really sweet, but it would be selfish of me to accept. \n\nThere are others who are in much greater need. Like that Khajiit Hazazi. He seriously needs help. I can manage on my own.
Target: To me? You mean like fetching water and cleaning my fruit? Oh, that is really sweet, but it would be selfish of me to accept. \n\nThere are others who are in much greater need. Like that Khajiit Hazazi. He seriously needs help. I can manage on my own.

Source: Excellent! Welcome to the Mages Guild! I suggest you begin by talking to Valaste, our Mistress of Incunabula. \n\nShe's in the stacks on the floor below, and often has tasks for new recruits. Good luck!
Target: 훌륭해요! 메이지 길드에 오신 것을 환영합니다! Incunabula의 여선생 Valaste와 이야기하는 것이 좋겠어요.\n\n 그녀는 아래층의 창고에 있어요. 보통 신입 길드원을 위한 일을 하는 경우가 많죠. 행운을 빌어요!

Source: I brought the remains that you asked for.
Target: I brought the remains that you asked for.

Source: Then let me be the first to officially welcome you as an Associate of the Fighters Guild! Get out there and take the fight to the Daedra!\n\nYou're in luck, comrade. Sees-All-Colors herself is here today. Why don't you go introduce yourself?
Target: Then let me be the first to officially welcome you as an Associate of the Fighters Guild! Get out there and take the fight to the Daedra!\n\nYou're in luck, comrade. Sees-All-Colors herself is here today. Why don't you go introduce yourself?

Source: Thank you, Jofnir.
Target: 고맙습니다, 요프니어.

Source: Then welcome to the family, as an Associate of the Fighters Guild. Get out there and take the fight to the Daedra!\n\nSees-All-Colors herself often has tasks for new recruits. Why don't you introduce yourself?
Target: 그렇다면 가족이 된 걸 환영하네, 파이터 길드에 가입한 걸 말이야. 밖으로 나가 데이드라와 싸우게나!\n\nSees-All-Colors는 가끔 신참들에게 과제를 내주기도 하지. 그녀에게 자네를 소개하는 것은 어떤가?

Source: Here you go, mortal! Don't go around saying Sheogorath cheats on a deal. He does, sometimes. But not today! It's been … fun. Let's do this again real soon, all right?
Target: 여기있다, 필멸자여! Sheogorath가 협상을 속이고 있다고 말하지 마라. 때로는 속이지만. 그러나 오늘은 아니었어! 그동안 .. 재미 있었어. 곧 다시하자. 알았지?\n

Source: Excellent! Allow me to welcome you as a Student of the Guild! \n\nI suggest you begin by talking to Valaste, our Mistress of Incunabula. She's at the back of the hall, and often has tasks for new recruits. Good luck!
Target: 좋아요! 당신을 길드의 학생으로 환영합니다!\n\n먼저 Incunabula의 여주인, 발라스트와 이야기하는 것이 좋습니다. 그녀는 홀 뒤쪽에 있고, 종종 신입들에게 임무를 주기도 해요. 행운을 빌어요!

Source: I hope this will be the end to the Bright-Throats troubles.
Target: 이걸로 밝은-목 부족의 문제가 해결 되길 바랍니다.

Source: What a relief! I heard that the Lion Guard has taken back Camlorn.
Target: 정말 다행이야! 라이언 가드가 캠론을 되찾았데!

Source: As promised, I found a winner.
Target: 약속대로 우승할 만한 도마뱀을 찾았습니다.

Source: Thank you, Xukas. The Remnant is yours.
Target: Thank you, Xukas. The Remnant is yours.

Source: I have the supply pack, but the gemstones were cursed. I left them.
Target: I have the supply pack, but the gemstones were cursed. I left them.

Source: I think I have what you really wanted all along.
Target: I think I have what you really wanted all along.

Source: The archers should be less of a problem now.
Target: 궁수들은 이제 문제를 덜 일으킬 거에요.

Source: Reward?
Target: Reward?

Source: Then we've done everything we can.
Target: 할 수 있는건 다 한 셈이군요.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: Individually, the leaders are rational, even reasonable. But get them together, and … well, you'll see soon enough.
Target: 따로따로 만나면, 지도자들은 이성적이고 심지어는 꽤 괜찮은 편이지. 하지만 그들을 함께 모으면... 뭐, 곧 보게 될걸세.

Source: Rotten luck. They arrived in Coldharbour, but in entirely different locations. Bloody unpredictable, portals to Oblivion. Not to mention Molag Bal's defenses.\n\nNasty beasties abound. Off you go. Over the bridge and head inland. There's a good chap!
Target: 재수에 옴 붙었지. 콜드하버에 도착하긴 했는데, 완전히 다른 곳에 떨어졌어. 오블리비언으로 향하는 포탈은 빌어먹게 예측할 수 없거든. 몰라그 발의 방어는 말할 것도 없고 말이야.\n\n더러운 짐승들이 사방에 깔렸어. 움직이라고. 다리를 건너 내륙으로 들어가. 거기 좋은 친구가 있다고!

Source: A spider Daedra? Could these mines be any more cursed? This was a fool's errand. Once I return to Sentinel I'll never leave again!\n\nSep's coils are never-ending, friend. I'm sure you did what you could for them.
Target: A spider Daedra? Could these mines be any more cursed? This was a fool's errand. Once I return to Sentinel I'll never leave again!\n\nSep's coils are never-ending, friend. I'm sure you did what you could for them.

Source: You mentioned another job for me?
Target: You mentioned another job for me?

Source: Who? That's a silly name. I don't owe him money, do I?\n\nSorry. I don't know you or your buddy <<1>>. Guess you did something to help me, though, or you wouldn't be talking to me.
Target: Who? That's a silly name. I don't owe him money, do I?\n\nSorry. I don't know you or your buddy <<1>>. Guess you did something to help me, though, or you wouldn't be talking to me.

Source: And I can't wait to hear all the details. In the meantime, let's take a look at what you found and try to devise a plan. Lyris didn't say much, but she indicated that time is short.\n\nHere, take this. You deserve a lot more, but it's all I can spare.
Target: And I can't wait to hear all the details. In the meantime, let's take a look at what you found and try to devise a plan. Lyris didn't say much, but she indicated that time is short.\n\nHere, take this. You deserve a lot more, but it's all I can spare.

Source: You mentioned another job for me?
Target: You mentioned another job for me?

Source: I think that an Ashlander named Chodala might be responsible for your condition.
Target: 초달라라는 이름의 애쉬랜더가 당신의 문제와 관련있을지도 몰라.

Source: You mentioned another job for me?
Target: You mentioned another job for me?

Source: Reach witches summoning magical storms to create feral vampires? That's horrible, but to what purpose? Well, that's the next puzzle to solve. First, we need to get this information to the queen.\n\nHere. This was for Brondold, but it's yours now.
Target: Reach witches summoning magical storms to create feral vampires? That's horrible, but to what purpose? Well, that's the next puzzle to solve. First, we need to get this information to the queen.\n\nHere. This was for Brondold, but it's yours now.

Source: I have been expecting it.
Target: 보상을 바라고 있었습니다.

Source: What have I earned for besting the Vaults of Madness?
Target: 광기의 금고에서 이기고 돌아온 보상은 무엇입니까?

Source: Shor's bones. Reachmen are stubborn, so they may come after her again. Fenrar and I will see these people to safety. The hold is gone, but we can protect our family.\n\nThanks again. Take this, and be careful out there. Dark times surround us.
Target: Shor's bones. Reachmen are stubborn, so they may come after her again. Fenrar and I will see these people to safety. The hold is gone, but we can protect our family.\n\nThanks again. Take this, and be careful out there. Dark times surround us.

Source: Lady Twilight?
Target: Lady Twilight?

Source: Yes, I placed the tablet into the calendar.
Target: Yes, I placed the tablet into the calendar.

Source: I grew up in Narsis. I can't be this stupid plague almost turned the place into a ghost town.
Target: I grew up in Narsis. I can't be this stupid plague almost turned the place into a ghost town.

Source: They say Ysgramor himself appeared after the ghost of Sinmur was defeated.
Target: They say Ysgramor himself appeared after the ghost of Sinmur was defeated.

Source: You're going to be fine, Geilund.
Target: 괜찮아질 겁니다, 게일룬드.

Source: Bright moons! It's been a privilege to fight by your side. I know now why Rid-Thar would choose you. Why he appeared to us. You are the Moon Hallowed. You must be!
Target: 빛나는 달들이시여! 당신과 함께 싸워서 영광이었어요. 왜 리드-타 님이 당신을 선택하셨는지 이제 알겠네요. 우리에게 나타나신 이유도요. 당신이 달의 성자인 거에요. 확실해요!

Source: I heard some Redguard woman turned her husband into a dog! Imagine that!
Target: I heard some Redguard woman turned her husband into a dog! Imagine that!

Source: I've actually found the other 11 tablets as well.
Target: I've actually found the other 11 tablets as well.

Source: You did it? You must be stronger than you look. \n\nThank you for avenging my hunting party and making the area safer for all. I don't have much, but take this as my thanks to you.
Target: 해냈다고? 당신, 보기보다 더 강한게 분명하군.\n\n우리 사냥꾼들의 복수를 해 주고 여길 안전하게 만들어 줘서 고마워. 가진건 별로 없지만, 감사의 표시로 이걸 받아줬으면 좋겠어.

Source: So, because you're now male, you can't bond with Kud-Nakal?
Target: So, because you're now male, you can't bond with Kud-Nakal?

Source: Of course it will be! We will use the instruments, too. They should be revered yes, but used for special occasions. \n\nBut first, more instruments! You'll have expenses. Let me weigh you down with some gold before you go.
Target: Of course it will be! We will use the instruments, too. They should be revered yes, but used for special occasions. \n\nBut first, more instruments! You'll have expenses. Let me weigh you down with some gold before you go.

Source: I suppose this will make another exciting tale for the famous Narsis Dren.
Target: 이번 모험이 유명한 나르시스 드렌의 또 다른 재미있는 이야기가 될거야.

Source: Looks like the Gnisis Egg-Mine is back in business.
Target: 그니시스 알 광산은 다시 일에 착수한듯하군.

Source: Yes, seems it all worked out.
Target: Yes, seems it all worked out.

Source: I won't report you. Here's your notes. You're free to go.
Target: 보고는 하지 않을 거야. 여기 쪽지야. 가도록 해.

Source: A Khajiit named Halinjirr is growing moon-sugar in Zainsipilu. Here's the proof.
Target: 하린지르라는 이름의 카짓이 자인시필루에서 문슈가를 재배 하고 있어. 여기 그 증거야.

Source: No, but we saved Morthal and stopped the coven from getting the gray reliquaries at Karthwatch. And we brought the hold leaders here. All of that matters.\n\nTake this. My royal allowance. I was going to buy wine, but you can make better use of it.
Target: No, but we saved Morthal and stopped the coven from getting the gray reliquaries at Karthwatch. And we brought the hold leaders here. All of that matters.\n\nTake this. My royal allowance. I was going to buy wine, but you can make better use of it.

Source: Your wife sent me to find you. She was worried when you were gone so long.
Target: Your wife sent me to find you. She was worried when you were gone so long.

Source: Now we celebrate our victory and let Jorunn's scouts do what they do best. Meanwhile, I'll work with the Skald-King to figure out how to approach Svargrim with this news.\n\nIn the meantime, take this. You earned it. I'll be in touch soon.
Target: 이제 우리는 우리의 승리를 축하하고,요룬의 정찰병들은 그들의 최선을 다하도록 두십시오. 그사이에, 스칼드 왕과 함께 이 소식들을 가지고 어떻게 스바그림(Svargrim)에 접근할수 있는지 알아낼것입니다.\n\n그동안에, 이것을 가져가십시오. 당신은 그럴만한 자격이 있습니다. 곧 연락 드리겠습니다.

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: I found it.
Target: 찾았어요.

Source: Yes, and I brought back some of your valuables.
Target: 네. 그리고 당신네 귀중품도 좀 찾아왔죠.

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: 자치령을 위하여 승리를!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: 자치령에 승리를!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: If I am not mistaken, you are a friend to Prince Azah. Safe roads to you then.
Target: 내가 잘못 본 게 아니라면, 자네는 Azah 왕자의 친구겠군. 안전한 여행이 되길.

Source: I love the trained bugs at Sarandel's Carnival. They're just so colorful!
Target: 사란델의 축제에 있는 훈련받은 벌레들이 너무 좋아. 정말 화려하거든!

Source: Through you, the Ansei Wards have been recovered, and so it will be through you they are restored.
Target: 당신을 통해  Ansei Ward가 회복되었습니다.\n

Source: So you planned for them both to die?
Target: So you planned for them both to die?

Source: Bright moon, you are the one who chased down Pelidil's ship and defeated him!
Target: Bright moon, you are the one who chased down Pelidil's ship and defeated him!

Source: Of course. After all, aren't you a part of this village now?
Target: Of course. After all, aren't you a part of this village now?

Source: First, on behalf of Western Skyrim, take this with my thanks. We would have been lost without you. Then rest. Check on our friends. Injuries must be tended to, buildings repaired. Other wounds … will take longer.\n\nWe'll have more to do soon enough.
Target: First, on behalf of Western Skyrim, take this with my thanks. We would have been lost without you. Then rest. Check on our friends. Injuries must be tended to, buildings repaired. Other wounds … will take longer.\n\nWe'll have more to do soon enough.

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: They say Lord Gharesh-ri saved Haven from pirates. But this one knows it was you.
Target: They say Lord Gharesh-ri saved Haven from pirates. But this one knows it was you.

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: 자치령에 승리를!

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: No. Your lover is long dead.
Target: 아니요. 당신의 연인은 오래전에 죽었습니다.

Source: Victory for the Dominion!
Target: Victory for the Dominion!

Source: I invoked the Scroll of Glorious Battle and defeated Selene, but I have other enemies to deal with before I can call my pledge complete.
Target: I invoked the Scroll of Glorious Battle and defeated Selene, but I have other enemies to deal with before I can call my pledge complete.

Source: How did this happen?
Target: How did this happen?

Source: I can't say, but you may not want to be so quick to forgive in the future.
Target: I can't say, but you may not want to be so quick to forgive in the future.

Source: I will continue my quest to find relics for my master and acquire the knowledge to defeat the Celestials.\n\nYou might do the same. If you find curious relics from Craglorn's lost history, bring them here and Hermaeus Mora will reward you.
Target: I will continue my quest to find relics for my master and acquire the knowledge to defeat the Celestials.\n\nYou might do the same. If you find curious relics from Craglorn's lost history, bring them here and Hermaeus Mora will reward you.

Source: You must have found the murderer himself. Since you're still alive, I assume he's dead.\n\nGood. I've been trying to find him for years. You've earned the pay I took from the families.
Target: 바로 그 살인범을 찾아내신 거군요. 아직 살아계신걸 보니, 그놈이 죽은 모양이고요.\n\n좋아요. 전 몇 년동안 그놈을 찾으려 했었죠. 그 가족들한테서 받은 돈은 당신이 가져가세요.

Source: In time, our city will recover. Perhaps we'll parley with the Dominion and return to our people.\n\nBut for now, we'll have our hands full trying to close this damned Oblivion Gate.
Target: In time, our city will recover. Perhaps we'll parley with the Dominion and return to our people.\n\nBut for now, we'll have our hands full trying to close this damned Oblivion Gate.

Source: I placed the grave-stake and a tree appeared.
Target: I placed the grave-stake and a tree appeared.

Source: This one was glad he was not in a hole in the ground called the Tower of Lies. Only in Coldharbour is a hole called a tower.
Target: This one was glad he was not in a hole in the ground called the Tower of Lies. Only in Coldharbour is a hole called a tower.

Source: And my reward?
Target: And my reward?

Source: I'll work with our remaining priests. Try to use the relic to purge the corruption and seal the temple. If that doesn't work … well, let's hope that it does.\n\nThank you, my friend. You stood with us while Meridia turned away. We won't forget that.
Target: I'll work with our remaining priests. Try to use the relic to purge the corruption and seal the temple. If that doesn't work … well, let's hope that it does.\n\nThank you, my friend. You stood with us while Meridia turned away. We won't forget that.

Source: The Hleran's settled here after the battle. Your ancestor wanted you to know it is your home.
Target: 흘레란 가문은 전투 후에 여기에 정착했지. 조상은 이곳이 고향이라 말해주고 싶었던것 같아.

Source: You walked into the Crypt of Hearts...and survived? I don't believe it!
Target: 너 Crypt of Hearts로 걸어 들어갔고... 살아 남았어? 믿을 수 없어!

Source: Yes. Try not to choke again.
Target: Yes. Try not to choke again.

Source: You mentioned splitting profits ….
Target: 이익을 분배한다고 했는데...

Source: Your daughter is safe. Just let me handle this and I'll try to get her to agree to meet with you.
Target: 네 딸은 안전해. 이 문제를 처리하도록 하지. 그녀가 당신과 만나는걸 동의하도록 노력할께.

Source: Post scouting reports on the board for collection by Scribe Grulzul. Then take your pay below.\n\n- Gen. Khamagash
Target: 그룰줄 서기관이 모아갈 수 있도록 게시판에 정찰 보고서를 게시하라. 그 다음 아래에 있는 보상을 받아가도록.\n\n- 카마가시 장군

Source: I heard that someone closed the portal at Moonhenge, and escaped while the Daedric realm was collapsing.
Target: I heard that someone closed the portal at Moonhenge, and escaped while the Daedric realm was collapsing.

Source: Scouts: Post your report on this board and take your reward.\n\n- Scribe Grulzul
Target: 정찰병에게 공지함: 이 게시판에 보고서를 게시하고 보상을 받으시오.\n\n- 서기관 그룰줄

Source: Post reports here. Grulzul will collect them.\n\n- Gen. Khamagash
Target: 여기에 보고서를 게시하라. 그룰줄이 모아갈 것이다.\n\n- 카마가시 장군

Source: I believe so.
Target: I believe so.

Source: I don't know. I should stay here, if <<1>> will allow it. No other place will give me safe haven, and my people will want to execute me for treason.\n\nI can still study. Perhaps someday, I can even be forgiven.
Target: I don't know. I should stay here, if <<1>> will allow it. No other place will give me safe haven, and my people will want to execute me for treason.\n\nI can still study. Perhaps someday, I can even be forgiven.

Source: Post reports here. Grulzul will collect them.\n\n- Gen. Khamagash
Target: 여기에 보고서를 게시하라. 그룰줄이 모아갈 것이다.\n\n- 카마가시 장군

Source: I've collected the aloe.
Target: I've collected the aloe.

Source: Post scouting reports on the board for collection by Scribe Grulzul. Then take your pay below.\n\n- Gen. Khamagash
Target: 그룰줄 서기관이 모아갈 수 있도록 게시판에 정찰 보고서를 게시하라. 그 다음 아래에 있는 보상을 받아가도록.\n\n- 카마가시 장군

Source: Walks-in-Ash, eh? A wise lizard, or so the lads say. Well, you're welcome here. The Captain has a lot in his trencher, and we're not sure how to get it all down.
Target: 워크스-인-애쉬, 흠? 지혜로운 도마뱀이라고 친구들이 말했었지. 그래, 이 곳에 잘 왔다네. 대장은 참호 안에 많은걸 가지고있는데, 우린 어떻게 그걸 다 내려야할지 모르겠군.

Source: Post scouting reports on the board for collection by Scribe Grulzul. Then take your pay below.\n\n- Gen. Khamagash
Target: 그룰줄 서기관이 모아갈 수 있도록 게시판에 정찰 보고서를 게시하라. 그 다음 아래에 있는 보상을 받아가도록.\n\n- 카마가시 장군

Source: Just as the moon cycles through the month, true evil cannot be destroyed.\n\nBut there was more to this wispmother than evil. There was love. Its love was twisted, but I think it cared for him.
Target: Just as the moon cycles through the month, true evil cannot be destroyed.\n\nBut there was more to this wispmother than evil. There was love. Its love was twisted, but I think it cared for him.

Source: Post your report on this board and take your reward.\n\n- Scribe Grulzul
Target: 이 게시판에 보고서를 게시하고 보상을 받으시오.\n\n- 서기관 그룰줄

Source: We discredited Chodala as the Nerevarine, but he escaped with Sunna'rah.
Target: 우리는 초달라가 네레바린으로써는 불명예스럽다는걸 입증했지만, 그는 순나'라와 함께 탈출했어.

Source: Yes, Balreth is defeated. Argonians, Dunmer, and Nords working together—one might almost think we had formed a Pact!
Target: 맞아요, 발레스를 쓰러뜨렸죠. 아르고니안, 던머, 그리고 노드까지 함께 행동해서 말이죠— 거의 우리가 조약을 체결했다는 생각까지 했었다니까요!

Source: Is there any way to restore Stibbons to his usual self?
Target: Is there any way to restore Stibbons to his usual self?

Source: Narsis is doing quite well. He wanted to check out one more hole in the ground.
Target: 나르시스는 멋진 일을 하고 있어. 그는 구멍 하나 더를 조사하고 싶은듯하더군.

Source: So you helped out <<1>>, all by yourself?\n\nThat's the best news I've heard all day. If the lot of us don't die tonight, I'll buy you a drink.
Target: 그러니까 당신 혼자서 <<1>>를  도왔다는 건가요?\n\n하루 종일 들었던 가장 좋은 소식이군요. 오늘 밤 우리 중 많은 사람들이 죽지 않는다면, 술 한 잔 사주죠.

Source: Post reports here. Grulzul will collect them.\n\n- Gen. Khamagash
Target: 여기에 보고서를 게시하라. 그룰줄이 모아갈 것이다.\n\n- 카마가시 장군

Source: Cool rain on my scales. We'll reforge the shackles Garyn and his father destroyed. The Brother of Strife will be returned to his rest.
Target: 제 비늘에 시원한 비가 내리는군요. 우린 가린과 그의 아버지가 부순 족쇄를 다시 채울겁니다. 투쟁의 형제는 다시금 쉬게 되는거죠.

Source: Post your report on this board and take your reward.\n\n- Scribe Grulzul
Target: 이 게시판에 보고서를 게시하고 보상을 받으시오.\n\n- 서기관 그룰줄

Source: You...you are the Hallowed. You walked the Path with the Mane!
Target: 당신... 당신은 신성합니다. 당신은 메인과 함께 길을 걸었습니다!

Source: I couldn't stand by and do nothing.
Target: 전 아무것도 한 게 없어요.

Source: I've collected the mushrooms.
Target: I've collected the mushrooms.

Source: Is the rift secure now?
Target: 리프트는 이제 안전한건가?

Source: Good. But I won't forgive that Khajiit for Tiril's death. Even if he does forgive me for the death of his wife.\n\nBut I suppose there's been enough killing.
Target: Good. But I won't forgive that Khajiit for Tiril's death. Even if he does forgive me for the death of his wife.\n\nBut I suppose there's been enough killing.

Source: Is the rift secure now?
Target: 균열은 이제 안전한건가?

Source: You should take the vessel to the wispmother. She is powerful right now, so first, you must weaken her.\n\nThen open the vessel, so it can take in her corrupted soul.
Target: You should take the vessel to the wispmother. She is powerful right now, so first, you must weaken her.\n\nThen open the vessel, so it can take in her corrupted soul.

Source: Ah, yes! <<1>>. That one is stronger than she knows. She hid from the Dominion soldiers for days before we snuck her out.\n\nI'm glad you're here. There's plenty that needs doing.
Target: Ah, yes! <<1>>. That one is stronger than she knows. She hid from the Dominion soldiers for days before we snuck her out.\n\nI'm glad you're here. There's plenty that needs doing.

Source: Plan? They tried to kill you!
Target: 계획이라구요? 저들은 당신을 죽이려고 했다고요!

Source: No, she is not destroyed. Only silenced for a time.\n\nShe is old, perhaps as old as the swamps themselves. I do not know what caused her to take an interest in the living, but this does not bode well for any of us.
Target: No, she is not destroyed. Only silenced for a time.\n\nShe is old, perhaps as old as the swamps themselves. I do not know what caused her to take an interest in the living, but this does not bode well for any of us.

Source: I found two of the envoys alive, but one died. Here's his ring.
Target: I found two of the envoys alive, but one died. Here's his ring.

Source: Is the rift secure now?
Target: 리프트는 이제 안전한건가?

Source: I'll wear it always, to remember my beautiful, brave Risa.\n\nThank you so much for easing an old woman's grief.
Target: 전 제 아릅답고, 용감했던 딸 리사를 기억하기 위해 항상 아뮬렛을 차고 다닐것입니다.\n\n노파의 슬픔을 덜어주어서 정말 감사합니다.

Source: The Daedra will be back, I'm sure. Whether they bring a pretend empress again is anyone's guess. For now, victory!\n\nClaim your key and your cut. Tomorrow we can take bets on who'll sit on the Ruby Throne.
Target: The Daedra will be back, I'm sure. Whether they bring a pretend empress again is anyone's guess. For now, victory!\n\nClaim your key and your cut. Tomorrow we can take bets on who'll sit on the Ruby Throne.

Source: If the Ruby Throne wasn't really red, it had better be now … or whatever color the Daedric imposter bled. You get the idea.\n\nHave your key and your cut. Tomorrow there'll be more carnage. Promise.
Target: If the Ruby Throne wasn't really red, it had better be now … or whatever color the Daedric imposter bled. You get the idea.\n\nHave your key and your cut. Tomorrow there'll be more carnage. Promise.

Source: I found the three offerings.
Target: I found the three offerings.

Source: I have this artifact for you.
Target: 이 아티팩트를 전달하러 왔어.

Source: I have this artifact for you.
Target: 이 아티팩트를 전달하러 왔어.

Source: I have this artifact for you.
Target: 이 아티팩트를 전달하러 왔어.

Source: It's best that no one can use it again.
Target: 누구도 사용할 수 없게 하는것이 제일좋아.

Source: What? I haven't heard from her in years! Why did she decide to write me after all this time? She and Keenash, my wife, did not get along.\n\nBut now Keenash is dead. It's comforting to know <<1>> still thinks fondly of me.
Target: What? I haven't heard from her in years! Why did she decide to write me after all this time? She and Keenash, my wife, did not get along.\n\nBut now Keenash is dead. It's comforting to know <<1>> still thinks fondly of me.

Source: You've protected <<1>> from weak thinking and necromantic tyranny. More than anything, you've given us a future. Possibly beyond these huts in this swamp.\n\nWe're our own people now, and we couldn't have been without your help.
Target: You've protected <<1>> from weak thinking and necromantic tyranny. More than anything, you've given us a future. Possibly beyond these huts in this swamp.\n\nWe're our own people now, and we couldn't have been without your help.

Source: It is the calm after the storm. We must pick up the pieces and continue, despite all the things we lost.
Target: It is the calm after the storm. We must pick up the pieces and continue, despite all the things we lost.

Source: I have the hackwing hides.
Target: I have the hackwing hides.

Source: I recovered the bantam guar from Claw's Strike.
Target: 발톱의 습격에서 밴텀 구아를 되찾아왔어요.

Source: Well done! Another menace successfully overcome. I love it when that happens.\n\nCan I have the resonators? I want to examine them. Maybe I can figure out a way to craft a defense against the constructs, in case something like this happens again.
Target: 잘했어요!또 다른 위협을 성공적으로 이겨냈군요.전 그런 일이 일어나는게 너무 좋아요.\n\n제가 공명기를 사용해도 될까요? 그것들을 실험해 보고 싶습니다. 어쩌면 이런 일이 다시 일어날 경우를 대비하여 구조물을 방어하는 방법을 찾아 낼 수 있습니다.

Source: Thank you. Once the relic is safe and the Ashlanders are gone, we'll be able to resume our work. \n\nI may not be brave, but if I can help my order treat the afflicted, I will.
Target: 고맙습니다. 유물의 안전이 확보되고 애쉬랜더가 떠난다면 그제서야 작업을 재개할 수 있겠군요.\n\n저는 용감하지는 않지만, 만약 제 지휘로 고통받는 사람들이 줄어들수면 있다면...해낼겁니다.

Source: Absorbed it? I'm not sure how I'll report that to the vicecanons, but you recovered it. That's all that matters.
Target: 그걸 흡수했다고? 이걸 바이스캐넌즈에 어떻게 보고해야할지 모르겠어, 하지만 너가 그걸 되찾았다고 했으니. 그게 가장 중요한거야.

Source: Very interesting! One can learn much from Ayleid ruins. I must visit this place myself!\n\nA grand discovery. You did the right thing to bring these to Hissmir. I will guard this treasure and keep it safe.
Target: 매우 흥미롭군요! 사람들은 에일리드 유적에서 많은 것을 배우곤 하죠. 그 장소에 직접 가봐야 겠습니다.\n\n굉장한 발견입니다.당신이 이걸 히스미르에 가져온건 잘한 일입니다. 이 보물을 안전하게 지킬것입니다.

Source: You don't wish to become captain of the royal army? We apologize, but the only other position is royal consort. Though we seek to cause no offense, you simply don't intrigue us in that fashion.
Target: 너는 왕실군의 대위가 되고 싶은것이 아니었나?? 사과드리지, 이제 남은건 왕실군의 영사뿐이다. 우리에게 악의는 없지만, 너는 그런 식으로 우리를 음해하려 들면 안된다.

Source: I heard their angry buzzing from here! And the yelps of the Khajiit! That's wonderful.\n\nYou would make a good alchemy apprentice—but some other time. I've too much to do right now.
Target: 이곳에서 그들의 분노가 윙윙거리는 소리를 들었습니다! 그리고 울려퍼지는 카짓들의 비명소리! 정말 근사하더군요.\n\n당신은 좋은 연금술 견습생이 될수 있을테지만—지금은 아니겠죠. 지금은 할 일이 너무 많네요.

Target: Huzzah!  You did it! Well done <<1>>.

Source: <A cast-off vessel of supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n"It's amazing what you find just lying around in Coldharbour—especially after your flame blasts reduce the locals to dust."
Target: <A cast-off vessel of supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n\\"It's amazing what you find just lying around in Coldharbour—especially after your flame blasts reduce the locals to dust.\"\""

Source: Yes, the Eastmarch chapter said your name would be carved into the halls of Sovngarde.\n\nBut they didn't send gold. Your deeds are good enough to commemorate for all time, yet they left me to pay the reward. Typical for the Eastmarch chapter.
Target: 그래. 이스트마치 지부가 자네 이름이 소븐가르드의 회랑에 새겨질 것이라고 하더군.\n\n그런데 골드를 보내지 않았어. 자네 위업은 영원히 기념할 만 하다고 하고서는 보상금 지불은 나에게 떠넘기다니. 이스트마치 지부는 늘 이런 식이지.

Source: Scouts: Post your reports to this board. Fireluin will collect them for Grand Warlord Sorcalin.\n\n- General Thoron
Target: Scouts: Post your reports to this board. Fireluin will collect them for Grand Warlord Sorcalin.\n\n- General Thoron

Source: <<1>> will be happy to hear we've jammed a thumb in the eye of Molag Bal. If we're lucky, he'll throw us a feast.
Target: 우리가 몰라그 발의 눈에 대고 엄지손가락을 내밀어 줬다는 걸 <<1>>이 알면 기뻐하겠군. 운이 좋다면 우리에게 잔치를 벌여 줄 지도 몰라.

Source: I heard. The Auridon chapter has received dozens of complaints for "jamming our noses in High Elf affairs."\n\nThat's what they call a Summerset thank you. Good work.
Target: I heard. The Auridon chapter has received dozens of complaints for "jamming our noses in High Elf affairs."\n\nThat's what they call a Summerset thank you. Good work.

Source: The spinner's warning was real, then? I bet the hall steward he'd ingested one too many Valenwood mushrooms. Good for Tamriel, but bad for my coin purse.
Target: 그렇다면 방적공의 경고가 사실이었단 말인가? 난 청지기가 발렌우드 버섯을 너무 많이 먹은 건줄 알았는데. 탐리엘에는 좋은 일이지만, 내 지갑에는 나쁜 일이군.

Source: Good. I'll make certain the Malabal Tor chapter learns of your aid. We can't afford to let trivial concerns distract us from our goal.
Target: 좋아. 말라발 토르 지부가 자네 도움을 확실히 알도록 할거야. 사소한 걱정 때문에 우리의 목표가 방해받게 할 여유는 없으니까.

Target: 어찌되었든, 네게 빚을 졌군.\n\n꽤 대단했지, 안그래? 화재가 일어나고, 노예상인들은 사방팔방으로 뛰어다니고, 모든 노예들을 풀어주고.. 꽤나 대단한 모험이었어. 다시 보길 바라, 내 친구.

Source: By the Three, let's hope the Vereansu go home now. I just pray I haven't made things worse. I left the army to get the blood off my hands, but look how that turned out. You killed him, but I let the arrow fly.\n\nStill, you have my thanks.
Target: 오 신들이시여, 이제 베레안스가 돌아가길 빌어보죠. 저는 그저 상황이 더 나빠지지 않기를 기도하겠습니다. 저는 제 손에서 피를 떨쳐내기 위해 군대를 떠났지만, 어떻게 됬는지 보세요. 당신이 그를 죽였지만, 화살을 날린건 바로 저 입니다.\n\n그럼에도, 당신에게 감사합니다.

Source: Hey, I'm not an alchemist. I can only tell you what Varon told me. \n\nThat stuff is potent. It spreads like wildfire. As soon as it touches skin, people transform into husks.
Target: 저기,전 연금술사가 아니에요.저는 Varon이 당신에게 말하란것만 말해줄수 있어요.\n\n그 물건은 강력합니다.산불처럼 빠르게 퍼져나갑니다.피부에 닿으면 얼마 안있어 사람들을 허스크로 변형시킵니다.

Source: Doesn't look like a bloodfiend gnawed off any of your limbs. Even better, you weren't hopelessly lost in the mountains. That's victory in my book.
Target: 혈귀가 팔다리를 물어뜯진 않은 것 같군. 더 좋은 사실은 자네가 산맥에서 절망적일 정도로 길을 잃지 않았다는 거지. 내가 보기에 그건 승리로군.

Source: <The Guild has provided a vessel of Alchemy supplise as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"What's small and in a glass bottle and keeps us in the fight? Your goods! Yeah!"
Target: <길드에서 쪽지와 함께 연금술 보급품 상자를 보상으로 지급헀습니다.>\n\n\\"작은 병에 들어있고 우리를 전투에서 지켜주는 것은 무엇일까요? 당신이 제작한 물약이지요! 그렇고 말고요!\"\""

Source: And nothing from the Lion Guard, which doesn't surprise me. Wayrest politics is all about displaying wounds that were self-inflicted. If the Lion Guard complains about their missed opportunity, I'll send them a mallet.
Target: 그리고 사자 근위대로부터는 아무런 소식이 없어. 놀라울 것도 없군. 웨이레스트의 정치는 대부분 스스로 자초한 상처를 보여주지. 만약 사자 근위대가 자기네 기회를 놓쳤다고 불평한다면 뒷처리용 빗자루나 보내줘야겠어.

Source: QUEST: Cleansing the Lake
Target: 퀘스트: 호수 청소하기

Target: 전쟁 전에는 군단병들과 대련하고는 했었지. 연습장에서는 충분히 무시무시하더군. 녀석들이 자네 때문에 뱅코라이에서 문제 일으키지 않았으면 좋겠어.

Target: 그래. 이미 지부에서 보고를 올렸어. 그쪽에서 추가적인 도움이 필요해지면 나에게 자네를 그쪽으로 보내달라고 요청하더군.

Target: 소식 들었어. 모운홀드 사원에서 편지 한묶음을 받았지. 자기네 사건에 연루된 파이터 길드에 항의하는 편지 말이야. 땔감을 보내줘서 고맙더군.

Source: <A well-worn vessel of Alchemy supplies sits in the chest as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"Your dedication to the Alliance does you proud, crafter. By completing this order in a timely fashion you support our troops. Thank you."

Target: 좋아. 이미 스톤폴즈 지부에서 순찰을 늘렸다고 보고했어. 벌레 교단이 발판을 얻게 된다면, 문제거리는 화산 활동만이 아니게 되겠지.
