Source: Lumbermill reports are needed urgently. Post them here as soon as you return.\n\n- General Thoron
Target: Lumbermill reports are needed urgently. Post them here as soon as you return.\n\n- General Thoron

Source: Returning from a lumbermill scouting mission? Post your report here!\n\n- Scribe Fireluin
Target: Returning from a lumbermill scouting mission? Post your report here!\n\n- Scribe Fireluin

Source: Post all lumbermill scouting reports to this board.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin
Target: Post all lumbermill scouting reports to this board.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin

Source: They say Captain Khammo took another ship. You're why moon-sugar is so pricy, yes?
Target: They say Captain Khammo took another ship. You're why moon-sugar is so pricy, yes?

Source: Your husband would want you to have these. You can sell them and start fresh.
Target: 당신 남편이 이 물건들을 가지길 원 했어요. 이걸 팔아 새 시작을 하세요.

Source: <<1>> was the poisoner. She was working for <<2>>.
Target: <<1>>가 범인이더군요. <<2>>을 위해서 일하고 있었죠.

Source: I'm sorry. Your husband is dead. I brought the relics to you, to pay off his debt.
Target: 죄송 해요. 당신의 남편이 죽었습니다. 나는 그의 빚을 탕감하기 위해 유물을 가져 왔습니다.\n

Source: The workers made it to safety.
Target: 직원들은 이제 안전해요.

Source: I wonder what the Dominion thought when they saw you burn their ship.
Target: I wonder what the Dominion thought when they saw you burn their ship.

Source: What about the others?
Target: 다른 사람들은 어떨까요?

Source: The moment the plague disappeared from the Gorge, traders were selling their wares again. Amazing.
Target: The moment the plague disappeared from the Gorge, traders were selling their wares again. Amazing.

Source: I have to admit. I do have some doubts now, but we'll petition the Wilderking for an audience.\n\nWhen he hears of our plight, I know he'll confirm that we can settle here. He'll make sure the wood is protected too.
Target: 그건 인정해야겠지. 지금은 좀 의문이 들지만, 윌더킹님께 알현을 청원해볼 생각이야.\n\n그분께서 우리의 곤경을 들으시면 우리가 여기 정착할 수 있다고 확인해 주시겠지. 숲도 확실하게 지켜주실 거고.

Source: That is a first then. Usually when she stumbles home after a few nights out there is a trail of destruction that follows.\n\nTake some gold for your trouble. And dump her out, walker, the little troublemaker doesn't deserve your pity.
Target: That is a first then. Usually when she stumbles home after a few nights out there is a trail of destruction that follows.\n\nTake some gold for your trouble. And dump her out, walker, the little troublemaker doesn't deserve your pity.

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: We have no purpose, so we will return to our vigil. Our directives render us dormant until circumstances again warrant action.\n\nI have no sentiment, but I do have memories, and I will remember you and what you have done here to protect the Valenwood.
Target: 목적이 없으니 다시 감시를 하러 돌아갈 것이다. 명령에 따라 우리는 또다시 잘못된 상황이 발생할 때까지 휴면 상태에 들어가게 된다.\n\n나에겐 감정이 없지만, 기억은 가지고 있지. 당신이 발렌우드를 보호하기 위해 여기서 어떤 행동을 했는지를 기억할 것이다.

Source: I'd like to think so, but it feels like this city is determined to destroy any kindness that lurks within its walls.\n\nHere's your payment. You could have saved those people some pain if you had been faster, but you helped them nonetheless.
Target: I'd like to think so, but it feels like this city is determined to destroy any kindness that lurks within its walls.\n\nHere's your payment. You could have saved those people some pain if you had been faster, but you helped them nonetheless.

Source: You fought bravely.
Target: 넌 용감하게 싸웠어.

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: Richard Dusant is dead, but his spirit thought you might be able to use this.
Target: Richard Dusant is dead, but his spirit thought you might be able to use this.

Source: Here's the Cartulary. What will you do now?
Target: 여기 the Cartulary가 있습니다. 지금 무엇을 할 것인가?\n

Source: Very well, I'll help you.
Target: 좋습니다. 당신을 도와드리죠.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 뭘해야하지?

Source: Very well, I'll help you.
Target: 좋습니다. 당신을 도와드리죠.

Source: Here. Take them.
Target: 여기. 가져가시오.

Source: Are you all right?
Target: 괜찮아요?

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: Well look at that. No wonder I misplaced these. That last batch I made must have been particularly potent.\n\nI'm sorry, stranger, but I won't be able to make enough for you to see the sand-whales. Take this instead, with my thanks.
Target: Well look at that. No wonder I misplaced these. That last batch I made must have been particularly potent.\n\nI'm sorry, stranger, but I won't be able to make enough for you to see the sand-whales. Take this instead, with my thanks.

Source: Thank you. What can I do to help?
Target: 고마워. 뭘 도와줄까?

Source: The serpent ate the goat.
Target: The serpent ate the goat.

Source: <<1>> is dead.
Target: <<1>>은 죽었어.

Source: What's next?
Target: 계획이 뭐야?

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 무엇을 할거지?

Source: The tree-minder said you'll make a fine healer.
Target: The tree-minder said you'll make a fine healer.

Source: Yes, yes, give Tender Claw here. Stupid little thief! Always striking off on his own when we're supposed to work together.\n\nThis one supposes she should give you a reward. No matter. She will find a way to get it back from you later, yes?
Target: Yes, yes, give Tender Claw here. Stupid little thief! Always striking off on his own when we're supposed to work together.\n\nThis one supposes she should give you a reward. No matter. She will find a way to get it back from you later, yes?

Source: I'll drop this stone in the deepest lake or river I can find. Put it where it won't hurt anyone else.\n\nBut here, take this, please. You went out of your way to inform me of my beloved's fate. The Moons thank you, walker, and so do I.
Target: I'll drop this stone in the deepest lake or river I can find. Put it where it won't hurt anyone else.\n\nBut here, take this, please. You went out of your way to inform me of my beloved's fate. The Moons thank you, walker, and so do I.

Source: <A parcel awaits you as reward for your battle prowess.>
Target: <당신의 전투 능력에 대한 포상으로 꾸러미가 놓여있습니다.>

Source: Thank you. At least now, travelers won't be fooled into thinking they can trust these ruffians.\n\nAfter we get healed up, we'll make another push to drive the bandits from this region altogether.
Target: Thank you. At least now, travelers won't be fooled into thinking they can trust these ruffians.\n\nAfter we get healed up, we'll make another push to drive the bandits from this region altogether.

Source: The councilors support the resistance.
Target: 의원들은 저항을 지지하고 있어.

Source: I don't know. I just heard you needed help.
Target: 나는 모른다. 방금 도움이 필요하다고 들었을  뿐이야.

Source: I'm here to help. I know how to defeat Faolchu.
Target: 도움을 드리기 위해 왔습니다. 팔츄를 물리칠 방법을 알아냈어요.

Source: I've secured the Hall. I'm afraid the axe Wuuthrad is missing.
Target: I've secured the Hall. I'm afraid the axe Wuuthrad is missing.

Source: I'd like to think so, but it feels like Senchal is determined to destroy any kindness that lurks within its walls.\n\nPlease accept this payment, and some additional gold for your efficiency. Perhaps we can work together again in the future.
Target: I'd like to think so, but it feels like Senchal is determined to destroy any kindness that lurks within its walls.\n\nPlease accept this payment, and some additional gold for your efficiency. Perhaps we can work together again in the future.

Source: That's Falls' all right. She loved this ring. I'll make sure her family gets it when we're back home in Murkmire.\n\nAnyway, thank you. Why don't you take this. For your efforts. I just wish it could be more.
Target: That's Falls' all right. She loved this ring. I'll make sure her family gets it when we're back home in Murkmire.\n\nAnyway, thank you. Why don't you take this. For your efforts. I just wish it could be more.

Source: Excellent! You are now a Student of the Mages Guild! Every book you find will now earn you reputation in the guild.\n\nI suggest you begin by talking to Valaste, our Mistress of Incunabula. She often has tasks for new recruits. Good luck!
Target: Excellent! You are now a Student of the Mages Guild! Every book you find will now earn you reputation in the guild.\n\nI suggest you begin by talking to Valaste, our Mistress of Incunabula. She often has tasks for new recruits. Good luck!

Source: I may not seem appreciative, but really, this would have been very difficult without your help.\n\nAzei can pack up our camp now and we'll .… Hmm. Did you hear something? Sounds like the wind's picking up a bit ….
Target: I may not seem appreciative, but really, this would have been very difficult without your help.\n\nAzei can pack up our camp now and we'll .… Hmm. Did you hear something? Sounds like the wind's picking up a bit ….

Source: Little Leaf sent you? Then I assume all is well with my dearest companion?\n\nSince you did as my Little Leaf asked, I can only hope you shall grant me the same courtesy.
Target: Little Leaf sent you? Then I assume all is well with my dearest companion?\n\nSince you did as my Little Leaf asked, I can only hope you shall grant me the same courtesy.

Source: Go, quickly.
Target: Go, quickly.

Source: Cassi sent you? Well, why didn't you say so? I'm so lucky that the regent looks out for me!\n\nAll right. We've got a lot of work to do. Have you ever tried to change an Iron Orc's mind? Oh, this is going to be so much fun!
Target: Cassi sent you? Well, why didn't you say so? I'm so lucky that the regent looks out for me!\n\nAll right. We've got a lot of work to do. Have you ever tried to change an Iron Orc's mind? Oh, this is going to be so much fun!

Source: This is a magnificent blade! I can feel its energy. It calls to me, just as the Warrior once did.\n\nIt feels right. As though I was meant to have it. Well then, in friendship, I hope you will accept my old blade. Something to remember me by.
Target: This is a magnificent blade! I can feel its energy. It calls to me, just as the Warrior once did.\n\nIt feels right. As though I was meant to have it. Well then, in friendship, I hope you will accept my old blade. Something to remember me by.

Source: Yes, I have it here.
Target: Yes, I have it here.

Source: <The latch opens a door in the menhir, revealing a vault. Inside the vault, you find an ancient Nedic coffer. It appears to be unaffected by age and cool to the touch. This must be your reward for completing the Gray Passage in the allotted time.>
Target: <The latch opens a door in the menhir, revealing a vault. Inside the vault, you find an ancient Nedic coffer. It appears to be unaffected by age and cool to the touch. This must be your reward for completing the Gray Passage in the allotted time.>

Source: What does it mean?
Target: What does it mean?

Source: Good! As you can see, I have <<1>>. With my help, he might even become a good swindler someday.\n\nAnything would be better than staying in that camp. It's difficult to be the daughter of a man known as "the Ungodly."
Target: Good! As you can see, I have <<1>>. With my help, he might even become a good swindler someday.\n\nAnything would be better than staying in that camp. It's difficult to be the daughter of a man known as "the Ungodly."

Source: I'm not surprised that you didn't find anything. It takes keen eyes and an educated mind to fully identify significant artifacts.\n\nI may just abandon this site and go deeper in the desert anyway. I heard there were burial sites ….
Target: I'm not surprised that you didn't find anything. It takes keen eyes and an educated mind to fully identify significant artifacts.\n\nI may just abandon this site and go deeper in the desert anyway. I heard there were burial sites ….

Source: You're the one who warned the Pact about Sinmur's ghost.
Target: You're the one who warned the Pact about Sinmur's ghost.

Source: This was written by Ibrula! We've been looking for her for weeks. Is she okay?\n\nOh my … this is awful. What did she find in that house? I will inform Hara. She will be interested to know about this.
Target: This was written by Ibrula! We've been looking for her for weeks. Is she okay?\n\nOh my … this is awful. What did she find in that house? I will inform Hara. She will be interested to know about this.

Source: <A representative of the Dragonstar Caravan Company left this pack of rewards and a note of thanks.> \n\n"Never believe an Argonian when he says something is delicious. Seriously. Thanks for something I bet I can eat."
Target: <A representative of the Dragonstar Caravan Company left this pack of rewards and a note of thanks.> \n\n\\"Never believe an Argonian when he says something is delicious. Seriously. Thanks for something I bet I can eat.\"\""

Source: <Within the crate your reward awaits.>
Target: <상자 안에서 당신의 보상이 기다리고 있습니다.>

Source: <The refugee organization has managed to gather a pack of rewards for your donation. There is also a note of thanks included.> \n\n"Across the Dominion, so many people go hungry. With your contract fulfilled, you're making a real difference."
Target: <The refugee organization has managed to gather a pack of rewards for your donation. There is also a note of thanks included.> \n\n\\"Across the Dominion
column4: so many people go hungry. With your contract fulfilled

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 뭘 할 거지?

Source: Good. I'll get these back to their owners and let them know the tribe in Atanaz Ruins won't cause them any more trouble.\n\nIf they do? I'll send you to cause trouble right back.
Target: 좋아. 이것들을 원래 주인에게 돌려주고 아타나즈 유적의 부족이 더는 문제를 일으키지 않을 거라고 알려줘야겠어.\n\n또 문제를 일으키면? 널 보내서 문제를 바로잡아야지.

Source: What's happened here?
Target: 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는 거죠?

Source: I don't know. Killing some coward assassins doesn't sound impressive to me. I suppose you killed a lot of them.\n\nFine. Your key and your cut. Tomorrow we'll find an enemy brave enough to face you head on.
Target: I don't know. Killing some coward assassins doesn't sound impressive to me. I suppose you killed a lot of them.\n\nFine. Your key and your cut. Tomorrow we'll find an enemy brave enough to face you head on.

Source: That's good. Don't know what's inside and I don't really care. All I know is that the client is willing to pay.\n\nHere, you earned it.
Target: 잘 했어. 안에 뭐가 들었는지는 모르겠고 신경도 안 쓰지만 말이야. 내가 아는 거라곤 고객이 흔쾌히 돈을 줄 거라는 것이지.\n\n자, 여기 네 몫이야.

Source: <A note and a vessel have been placed here as payment by the Consortium.> \n\n"From your alchemy table to the farthest reaches of Tamriel, the river of commerce rushes on!"
Target: <A note and a vessel have been placed here as payment by the Consortium.> \n\n\\"From your alchemy table to the farthest reaches of Tamriel
column4: the river of commerce rushes on!\"\""

Source: Hmph, did they call it the Cradle of Shadows because it was full of suckling babes? Ridding the world of spider-worshipers is always worth something.\n\nKey. Cut. And shake off those webs before you find a bed.
Target: Hmph, did they call it the Cradle of Shadows because it was full of suckling babes? Ridding the world of spider-worshipers is always worth something.\n\nKey. Cut. And shake off those webs before you find a bed.

Source: I've replaced the orders of the Seventh Legion soldiers in Old Tower with falsified documents, which will send the troops back to their homeland instead of on a mission to loot Volenfell.
Target: 볼렌펠을 수색하라는 올드 타워의 7군단 명령서를 고향으로 돌려보낼 명령서로 바꿔치기 했습니다.

Source: I've killed him, Hoknir.
Target: 그놈을 죽였어요, 호크니어.

Source: Hah! Spit in Mephala's face and crushed her greatest minion like a bug! I could kiss you if you weren't covered in Daedra spittle.\n\nMaybe I'll make it up to you tomorrow. Until then, settle for your key and cut.
Target: Hah! Spit in Mephala's face and crushed her greatest minion like a bug! I could kiss you if you weren't covered in Daedra spittle.\n\nMaybe I'll make it up to you tomorrow. Until then, settle for your key and cut.

Source: <Alliance quartermasters have left a vessel of Alchemy supplies and a note of thanks.>\n\n"Not every hero wins glory on the battlefield. Champions are born at the alchemist's table, too. Thank you for your service."
Target: <Alliance quartermasters have left a vessel of Alchemy supplies and a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Not every hero wins glory on the battlefield. Champions are born at the alchemist's table
column4: too. Thank you for your service.\"\""

Source: Glad you both made it.
Target: 둘 다 무사해서 다행입니다.

Source: The Red Rook enforcers shouldn't bother those people anymore.
Target: Red Rook 집행자들은 더 이상 사람들을 괴롭힐 수 없을 거야.

Source: Did you hear what happened in Aldcroft? They killed the Duke.
Target: Did you hear what happened in Aldcroft? They killed the Duke.

Source: Then that's all I need for my report. My superiors won't be happy, but I'm sure they'll get used to the idea eventually.\n\nThank you for seeing the truth of the matter. I hope to have those wretched wooden barricades down within the month.
Target: 그럼 보고서에 필요한 것들은 전부 알았군요. 상관들이 좋아하진 않겠지만, 결국에는 이 의견에도 동의할 겁니다.\n\n문제의 진실을 알려줘서 감사합니다. 저 형편없는 나무 방벽이 한 달 안에 철거된다면 좋겠군요.

Source: Throne Keeper Farvad says you are Tu'whacca's champion. I hope it is true.
Target: Throne Keeper Farvad says you are Tu'whacca's champion. I hope it is true.

Source: See that Titus makes it to Belkarth. The Star-Gazers will give him refuge. I feel he may still have a part to play in our struggle.\n\nContinue to work with Hara of the Star-Gazers. I will reach out to you again when it is safe to do so.
Target: See that Titus makes it to Belkarth. The Star-Gazers will give him refuge. I feel he may still have a part to play in our struggle.\n\nContinue to work with Hara of the Star-Gazers. I will reach out to you again when it is safe to do so.

Source: I heard the Vereansu attacked Muth Gnaar because the monks were using some sort of Daedric artifact.
Target: I heard the Vereansu attacked Muth Gnaar because the monks were using some sort of Daedric artifact.

Source: A Worm Cult cell in the town of Riften was terrorizing the citizens. I destroyed its apparent leader, but another cultist escaped with one of the shards of Wuuthrad.
Target: A Worm Cult cell in the town of Riften was terrorizing the citizens. I destroyed its apparent leader, but another cultist escaped with one of the shards of Wuuthrad.

Source: Fed them to … but why would …. Those scaleless savages! I swear on the Hist, we'll sun ourselves with vengeance before we depart!\n\nThank you for trying to save them. And for bringing us their badges. Their families will appreciate the gesture.
Target: Fed them to … but why would …. Those scaleless savages! I swear on the Hist, we'll sun ourselves with vengeance before we depart!\n\nThank you for trying to save them. And for bringing us their badges. Their families will appreciate the gesture.

Source: Those witches helped at the Mill? That really surprises me.
Target: 저 마녀들이 제분소에서 도움이 됐었나요? 정말 놀랍네요.

Source: Let Sir Lanis know I'll send anyone else I find to join him.
Target: Let Sir Lanis know I'll send anyone else I find to join him.

Source: And you look perfectly healthy. How … irksome. I suppose my wayward acolytes weren't as powerful as I thought. I'll need to be more diligent in my training of their replacements.\n\nStill, my lord Satakal thanks you. May his coils guide your steps.
Target: And you look perfectly healthy. How … irksome. I suppose my wayward acolytes weren't as powerful as I thought. I'll need to be more diligent in my training of their replacements.\n\nStill, my lord Satakal thanks you. May his coils guide your steps.

Source: I heard that Duke Sebastien was ill, but Gloria Fausta cured him. Royalty have all the luck!
Target: I heard that Duke Sebastien was ill, but Gloria Fausta cured him. Royalty have all the luck!

Source: The little goat honors the stones with Agganor's blood! I will see the Scaled Court destroyed as well, this Lashburr swears.\n\nLittle goat, it has my thanks. Steel for its enemies, blood for its tribe.
Target: The little goat honors the stones with Agganor's blood! I will see the Scaled Court destroyed as well, this Lashburr swears.\n\nLittle goat, it has my thanks. Steel for its enemies, blood for its tribe.

Source: Istraga is dead. Here is its scale.
Target: 이스트라가는 죽었소. 여기 그 비늘이 있소.

Source: Good. We'll make a proper hunter out of you yet. Here's a little something for fetching those bones for me. Maybe buy yourself a satchel so you don't get Dragon guts seeping into your bedroll.
Target: Good. We'll make a proper hunter out of you yet. Here's a little something for fetching those bones for me. Maybe buy yourself a satchel so you don't get Dragon guts seeping into your bedroll.

Source: QUEST: Waste of the Wood
Target: 퀘스트:  나무 낭비

Source: I know. His fate is in the Three's hands now, but he certainly has a fighting chance—thanks to you.\n\nHere, take this. There's no way I can truly repay you for what you've done for the Serk, but it's a start.
Target: 알고 있어요. 그의 운명은 지금 삼신의 손에 달렸지만, 분명히 싸울 수 있는 기회를 가지게 됬죠. 정말 고마워요.\n\n여기, 이걸 받으세요. 당신이 서크를 위해 한 일에 대해 제가 진정으로 보답할 수는 없지만, 이것은 시작이에요.

Source: That's what I'm thinking as well. But maybe your efforts were enough to put an end to all that.\n\nFor now, at least, the Serk is safe. Take this as a thank you for helping us.
Target: 제 생각도 그래요. 하지만 당신 덕분에 전부 막을 수 있을지도 모르죠.\n\n적어도 현재 서크는 안전해졌어요. 도와주신 답례예요.

Source: I've been watching the townsfolk who received the curative and came to the same conclusion. But I'll be able to tell for sure after I analyze the elixir.\n\nTake this. It isn't much, but I'm sure you didn't have too much trouble in there.
Target: 나도 치료제를 받은 마을 사람들을 지켜보고 똑같은 결론을 내렸었어. 하지만 이 엘릭서를 분석해보면 확실히 알 수 있겠지.\n\n이걸 받아. 많지는 않지만, 그 안에서 크게 고생하진 않았을테니까.

Source: Exarch Arnoth? I've heard his name whispered in fear, even among the Scaled Court. If you killed him, you've dealt a far greater blow to the Serpent's cult than you can imagine. \n\nPerhaps now we'll be able to learn more about the nirncrux element.
Target: Exarch Arnoth? I've heard his name whispered in fear, even among the Scaled Court. If you killed him, you've dealt a far greater blow to the Serpent's cult than you can imagine. \n\nPerhaps now we'll be able to learn more about the nirncrux element.

Source: Thank you for helping me in this matter.\n\nNow, I need to make sure these spawning pools can't be used again. And I should collect a few of the mantikora remains. I need to study them so I can continue to oppose the Serpent's horrid plans.
Target: Thank you for helping me in this matter.\n\nNow, I need to make sure these spawning pools can't be used again. And I should collect a few of the mantikora remains. I need to study them so I can continue to oppose the Serpent's horrid plans.

Source: Go find Sir Lanis. He's not far.
Target: Go find Sir Lanis. He's not far.

Source: Right. Of course. \n\nCassi asked me to bring some of the altered nirncrux to her. So she can study it. I'll stay here and collect what I need. But thanks. I couldn't have completed my mission without you!
Target: Right. Of course. \n\nCassi asked me to bring some of the altered nirncrux to her. So she can study it. I'll stay here and collect what I need. But thanks. I couldn't have completed my mission without you!

Source: I learned more about the history of Bloodtoil Valley. It is possible the Spinner can take that knowledge and use it to stop the violence elsewhere in Malabal-Tor.
Target: 피땀 계곡의 역사에 대해 더 많은 것을 알아냈다. 방적공이 이 지식을 받아들여서 말라발 토르 곳곳의 분쟁을 멈추는데 사용할 수도 있을 것이다.

Source: Arkay bless you, for the living will rest easier now that Virmaril is gone. But I sense … something.\n\nI will remain here. Where necromancy is concerned, who can say what is possible? If Virmaril rises again, someone will need to take action.
Target: Arkay bless you, for the living will rest easier now that Virmaril is gone. But I sense … something.\n\nI will remain here. Where necromancy is concerned, who can say what is possible? If Virmaril rises again, someone will need to take action.

Source: Of course! And I will do what I can to dissuade others from entering this portion of the city again.\n\nPerhaps some day we can seal the ruins completely, as the Yokudans tried to do. For now, be content that the wards have bought us time.
Target: Of course! And I will do what I can to dissuade others from entering this portion of the city again.\n\nPerhaps some day we can seal the ruins completely, as the Yokudans tried to do. For now, be content that the wards have bought us time.

Source: And so we did. Cassipia and Little Leaf's deaths were regrettable, but they were a necessary evil in our efforts to save Craglorn.\n\nYou have provided another great service to the Guardian Celestials. For that, you have my gratitude.
Target: And so we did. Cassipia and Little Leaf's deaths were regrettable, but they were a necessary evil in our efforts to save Craglorn.\n\nYou have provided another great service to the Guardian Celestials. For that, you have my gratitude.

Source: Then we must do everything in our power to stop the attack. \n\nThanks to your efforts, my friend, we now know where the cult plans to strike next. Here, take this treasure from the sanctum's stores. You certainly earned it.
Target: Then we must do everything in our power to stop the attack. \n\nThanks to your efforts, my friend, we now know where the cult plans to strike next. Here, take this treasure from the sanctum's stores. You certainly earned it.

Source: A vampire? Working with the coven? That would explain the strange bloodfiends in the Ratway. We'll worry about that later. Right now, we have to get to Eastmarch and find that witch.\n\nOh, before we leave, take this. You earned it.
Target: 뱀파이어라고? 마녀회와 같이 일하는건가? 그렇다면 곰쥐통로에서 볼 수 있었던 이상한 흡혈귀들이 설명이 되는군. 일단 그건 나중에 생각하자. 지금 당장은 우리는 이스트마치로 가서 마녀들을 찾아야만 해.\n\n오, 우리가 떠나기 전에, 이걸 받아. 너는 받을 자격이 있어.

Source: That's true. And we stopped that storm. My investigations have led to even darker corners, but progress has been made.\n\nHere. Consider this a stipend from Ravenwatch. For your valuable assistance, of course. Now, let's get out of here.
Target: That's true. And we stopped that storm. My investigations have led to even darker corners, but progress has been made.\n\nHere. Consider this a stipend from Ravenwatch. For your valuable assistance, of course. Now, let's get out of here.

Source: You'd be willing to make peace with your enemies in the future?
Target: You'd be willing to make peace with your enemies in the future?

Source: Your children will honor our agreement, correct?
Target: 당신 아이들이 우리 합의를 존중할 거라고 생각해도 되겠지?

Source: Oh! I know you! Ingride Vanne told me to give you her regards!
Target: 아! 당신이군! Ingride Vanne이 당신에게 안부를 전해달라고 내게 말했지.

Source: Excellent. The missions most important to the Covenant are posted on the mission boards. Find one that appeals to you and do it. A Scouting mission would be a good place to start.\n\nWelcome to the war!
Target: Excellent. The missions most important to the Covenant are posted on the mission boards. Find one that appeals to you and do it. A Scouting mission would be a good place to start.\n\nWelcome to the war!

Source: You're welcome. What will you do now?
Target: 천만에. 이제 어쩔 셈이지?

Source: Is there anything else I need to know?
Target: Is there anything else I need to know?

Source: Was that good?
Target: 제대로 된건가?

Source: I have a delivery for you.
Target: 당신에게 건네줄 물건이 있습니다.

Source: Do you need anything?
Target: 뭐가 필요하신가요?

Source: Hail, Geirmund's Guardian!
Target: Hail, Geirmund's Guardian!

Source: Is there anything else I need to know?
Target: 제가 더 알아야 하는 것이 있습니까?

Source: I've done all that you've asked.
Target: 부탁했던 일을 다 끝냈습니다.

Source: I have a delivery for you.
Target: I have a delivery for you.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 당신은 어떡할 거죠?

Source: Do you need anything?
Target: Do you need anything?

Source: Yes. I see you and the others made it out all right as well.
Target: 그래요. 당신과 다른 사람들도 잘 빠져 나왔군요.

Source: My brother worked the shipyards at Tava's Blessing. Thanks to you, he can soon return.
Target: 동생은 타바의 축복에 있는 조선소에서 일했어요. 고마워요. 그는 곧 돌아올 수 있을 거예요.

Source: I hope you never doubted our success, my friend. Between your skills and my formidable magical prowess, there was no way we could fail.\n\nIt appears we aren't as finished as I had hoped, however. Cadwell claims we have more to do to save Nirn.
Target: I hope you never doubted our success, my friend. Between your skills and my formidable magical prowess, there was no way we could fail.\n\nIt appears we aren't as finished as I had hoped, however. Cadwell claims we have more to do to save Nirn.

Source: Was there ever any doubt? Between your skills and my formidable magical prowess, the destruction of the Shackle was a foregone conclusion.\n\nWe aren't finished yet, however. Cadwell claims that we have more to do if we are to truly save Nirn.
Target: 의심의 여지가 있었나? 자네의 기술과 내 가공할 마법적 기량이 힘을 모았으니, 걸쇠의 파괴는 뻔한 결과였다네.\n\n하지만 아직 끝난 것은 아니지. 캐드웰은 진정으로 넌을 구하려면 우리가 더 많은 일을 해야 한다고 주장했다네.

Source: What we saw … could it be the future of the Dominion?
Target: 우리가 본 것은... 자치령의 미래일 수도 있을까요?

Source: Of course! We accomplished exactly what we set out to do. Thanks to your help and my considerable magical power, the Great Shackle is no more!\n\nWe can't return home just yet, however. Cadwell claims that Molag Bal has one more arrow in his quiver.
Target: Of course! We accomplished exactly what we set out to do. Thanks to your help and my considerable magical power, the Great Shackle is no more!\n\nWe can't return home just yet, however. Cadwell claims that Molag Bal has one more arrow in his quiver.

Source: Bright Moons, Khali.
Target: 빛나는 달들이시여, 칼리.

Source: Yes, my friend. With your help and thanks to my considerable power, we destroyed the Great Shackle!\n\nBut we can't celebrate just yet. Cadwell claims that Molag Bal has one more trick up his sleeve that we still have to deal with.
Target: Yes, my friend. With your help and thanks to my considerable power, we destroyed the Great Shackle!\n\nBut we can't celebrate just yet. Cadwell claims that Molag Bal has one more trick up his sleeve that we still have to deal with.

Source: I think you can make it home safely from here.
Target: 내생각엔 넌 집으로 안전하게 갈 수 있을 거야.

Source: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.
Target: 서쪽에 안전한 피난처가 있어. 공허한 도시라고 하지.

Source: What's my reward?
Target: 보상은 무엇이지?

Source: Here's the part where you reward me.
Target: Here's the part where you reward me.

Source: Here we go.
Target: 자 가자구.

Source: Er… sure.
Target: 어... 그래.

Source: Yes, in a crocodile's stomach.
Target: Yes, in a crocodile's stomach.

Source: How's that freedom working out for you?
Target: 그 자유가 당신을 위해 일하는게 어때?\n

Source: You should leave before she changes her mind.
Target: You should leave before she changes her mind.

Source: It's not really my business.
Target: It's not really my business.

Source: I think you're safe now.
Target: 내생각엔 넌 이제 안전한것 같아.

Source: You did us all a favor by saving Wayrest, but what were you doing down in those sewers?
Target: You did us all a favor by saving Wayrest, but what were you doing down in those sewers?

Source: You're welcome.
Target: 천만에요.

Source: Then we are once again in your debt, champion.\n\nHere. Take this. As a token of our deep appreciation. Now Northpoint can rest easy. At least as far as this threat is concerned.
Target: Then we are once again in your debt, champion.\n\nHere. Take this. As a token of our deep appreciation. Now Northpoint can rest easy. At least as far as this threat is concerned.

Source: Much needs to be done for the Pact to control Cyrodiil. I send the most urgent tasks to be posted on the mission boards for all to see. Scouting missions are best to start with.\n\nWelcome to the war.
Target: Much needs to be done for the Pact to control Cyrodiil. I send the most urgent tasks to be posted on the mission boards for all to see. Scouting missions are best to start with.\n\nWelcome to the war.

Source: Of course. I would be happy to accept the offering. \n\nStrange as it may sound for someone to make an offering to a Daedric Prince, there are actually many who do so, hoping for Azura's blessing. I believe she obliges them when she can.
Target: Of course. I would be happy to accept the offering. \n\nStrange as it may sound for someone to make an offering to a Daedric Prince, there are actually many who do so, hoping for Azura's blessing. I believe she obliges them when she can.

Source: Damn. Another one. We can't afford to keep losing soldiers like this!
Target: Damn. Another one. We can't afford to keep losing soldiers like this!

Source: I put an end to the troubles in <<1>> and <<Ac:2>>.
Target: <<1>>과 <<2>>의 문제들을 처리했죠.

Source: I rescued your assistants.
Target: 조수들을 구출했어요.

Source: You should go.
Target: You should go.

Source: You won't catch me visiting Lower Yorgrim. There are too many giants in that place.
Target: You won't catch me visiting Lower Yorgrim. There are too many giants in that place.

Source: Gore and Glory! It's about damn time. Let me see ….\n\nOh. It says we're to stay here until further notice. That pretty much stinks like three-day old troll dung. Thanks for the message though. Yeah.
Target: Gore and Glory! It's about damn time. Let me see ….\n\nOh. It says we're to stay here until further notice. That pretty much stinks like three-day old troll dung. Thanks for the message though. Yeah.

Source: It will go on, as it always has. Except now we can say without hesitation that we follow the just path, no matter the hardships.\n\nThe old masters would have been proud.
Target: It will go on, as it always has. Except now we can say without hesitation that we follow the just path, no matter the hardships.\n\nThe old masters would have been proud.

Source: It will go on, as it always has. Let it not be said that we shirk our responsibility when need arises.\n\nI will make Master Fa … that is, the former masters, proud.
Target: It will go on, as it always has. Let it not be said that we shirk our responsibility when need arises.\n\nI will make Master Fa … that is, the former masters, proud.

Source: Really? Was it half as boring as it sounds? Can't be more boring than going through these manifests you brought. What if they put me to sleep and Vaermina comes for me? Nah, nah, that's crazy ….\n\nUh, here's your gold. I'm gonna go switch to coffee.
Target: Really? Was it half as boring as it sounds? Can't be more boring than going through these manifests you brought. What if they put me to sleep and Vaermina comes for me? Nah, nah, that's crazy ….\n\nUh, here's your gold. I'm gonna go switch to coffee.

Source: I thinned them out. Here's <<Az:1>> you wanted.
Target: 쫓아내 버렸죠. 당신이 찾던 <<1>>는 여기 있어요.

Source: Good. May Namiira drag them to the darkness where they belong.\n\nTake this as payment, walker. Just know that more Dragons will come. Return tomorrow, yes? Tomorrow's Dragons will die as surely as today's.
Target: Good. May Namiira drag them to the darkness where they belong.\n\nTake this as payment, walker. Just know that more Dragons will come. Return tomorrow, yes? Tomorrow's Dragons will die as surely as today's.

Source: Excellent! Perhaps I'll purchase a few of those candles for my cottage. My wife insists it's haunted. Honestly, I'm just too cheap to replace the creaky floorboards. Guybert is nothing if not frugal!\n\nIn any event, take this with my compliments!
Target: Excellent! Perhaps I'll purchase a few of those candles for my cottage. My wife insists it's haunted. Honestly, I'm just too cheap to replace the creaky floorboards. Guybert is nothing if not frugal!\n\nIn any event, take this with my compliments!

Source: Hah!
Target: 하!

Source: The pirate leader is dead.
Target: 해적 지도자는 죽었습니다.

Source: Good. May Namiira drag them to the darkness where they belong.\n\nTake this as payment, walker. Just know that more Dragons will come. Return tomorrow, yes? Tomorrow's Dragons will die as surely as today's.
Target: Good. May Namiira drag them to the darkness where they belong.\n\nTake this as payment, walker. Just know that more Dragons will come. Return tomorrow, yes? Tomorrow's Dragons will die as surely as today's.

Source: I said, I didn't kill Remelie.
Target: 레멜리에를 죽이지 않았다니까요.

Source: I didn't do this to take command. You know your business here—you're in charge.
Target: I didn't do this to take command. You know your business here—you're in charge.

Source: You're the hero of Ash Mountain, the slayer of Balreth!
Target: 당신은 발레스를 꺾은 애쉬 마운틴의 영웅입니다!

Source: I'm glad you survived the Tower of Lies.
Target: 당신이 거짓의 탑에서 살아남아 기쁘군요.

Source: I did give you the samples.
Target: I did give you the samples.

Source: The wilderness is just too dangerous for us. I'm never leaving town again!
Target: The wilderness is just too dangerous for us. I'm never leaving town again!

Source: Your have her samples.
Target: Your have her samples.

Source: That's refreshing. Most days, it's just Rana and me against the world. \n\nWe have some work to do.
Target: That's refreshing. Most days, it's just Rana and me against the world. \n\nWe have some work to do.

Source: We'll mop up the remaining Daedra and start rebuilding the outpost. Thanks to you, we won't have to fight a war on two fronts.
Target: 저희는 남은 데이드라를 소탕하고 전초 기지를 복구하겠습니다. 당신 덕분에 양쪽에서 전쟁을 치를 걱정은 없겠군요.

Source: At least you know who was stealing your goods.
Target: At least you know who was stealing your goods.

Source: That's refreshing. Most days, it's just Rana and me against the world. \n\nWe have some work to do.
Target: That's refreshing. Most days, it's just Rana and me against the world. \n\nWe have some work to do.

Source: When Tharn returns, we will combine our resources. We will find a path to these Halls of Torment soon enough.
Target: 탄이 돌아오면 우리의 힘을 합쳐 봐야지. 고문의 회랑으로 가는 길은 금방 찾을걸세.

Source: I still have the letter.
Target: I still have the letter.

Source: Perhaps if my brother is still alive. I just hope it's not too late.
Target: 아마도 내 동생이 아직 살아 있다면. 너무 늦지 않기를 바랍니다.\n

Source: Excellent! Always a welcome change of pace when success is measured in flowers planted rather than skulls cloven, yes? I digress.\n\nHere is your reward, my friend. Spend it in good health!
Target: Excellent! Always a welcome change of pace when success is measured in flowers planted rather than skulls cloven, yes? I digress.\n\nHere is your reward, my friend. Spend it in good health!

Source: You have his samples.
Target: You have his samples.

Source: I looked through them.
Target: I looked through them.

Source: Well, I won't bother you for the details. The less I know the better. I have enough trouble sleeping at night, what with my wife's snoring.\n\nTake this with my compliments. With any luck, my client will develop a skooma treatment soon.
Target: Well, I won't bother you for the details. The less I know the better. I have enough trouble sleeping at night, what with my wife's snoring.\n\nTake this with my compliments. With any luck, my client will develop a skooma treatment soon.

Source: The boss is dead.
Target: 보스는 죽었다.

Source: Remelie is dead.
Target: 레멜리에는 죽었습니다.

Source: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.
Target: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.

Source: Ah, yes. I can smell them from here. Gracious, that smell. Haven't confronted an aroma like that since my days in the dung-business. What? There's a lot of gold to be made in dung! A story for another time, I suppose.\n\nHere's your fee. Farewell!
Target: Ah, yes. I can smell them from here. Gracious, that smell. Haven't confronted an aroma like that since my days in the dung-business. What? There's a lot of gold to be made in dung! A story for another time, I suppose.\n\nHere's your fee. Farewell!

Source: I've killed Remelie.
Target: 레멜리에를 죽였다.

Source: Give me the prize.
Target: 나에게 보상을 줘.

Source: I charged the amulet, but it didn't protect me from the lightning.
Target: 아뮬렛을 충전했지만, 그건 절 번개에서 보호해 주지 않았어요.

Source: I do.
Target: 가지고 왔습니다.

Source: The Mages Guild is recruiting to fill roles on their fancy new island refuge. Eyevea, I think? Impressive.
Target: The Mages Guild is recruiting to fill roles on their fancy new island refuge. Eyevea, I think? Impressive.

Source: Cloggg is dead; justice is done.
Target: 클로그는 죽었고 정의가 실현되었다.

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"I appreciate your quick and discreet delivery. Master Rolis need not know of this, of course. He isn't quite as open-minded as the rest of us. Enjoy your reward!" —Faustina Curio
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n\\"I appreciate your quick and discreet delivery. Master Rolis need not know of this
column4: of course. He isn't quite as open-minded as the rest of us. Enjoy your reward!\"\" —Faustina Curio"

Source: Thank you.
Target: 고마워.

Source: Your crew is all accounted for, then?
Target: 그럼. 네 선원들은 다 승선한거야?

Source: She hoped they would spare Bergama.
Target: 그녀는 메마른 손이 벌가마를 내버려두기를 바랐습니다.

Source: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.
Target: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.

Source: I understand.
Target: I understand.

Source: <<1>> lost most of his kwama in a mine collapse. He asked me to help round up the survivors and convince them to return home.
Target: <<1>>는 그의 광산이 붕괴되면서 대부분의 크와마를 잃었다. 그는 주변을 살펴본 후 살아남은 크와마들을 수습한뒤 집으로 돌아오는걸 설득해달라며 내게 부탁했다.

Source: <<1>> agreed to collect wamasu lightning for you.
Target: <<1>>는 당신을 위해 와마수 번개를 수집하겠다고 하였습니다.

Source: I killed him.
Target: 그를 죽였다.

Source: I have slain the Twilight Boss!
Target: 나는 황혼 보스를 죽였다!\n

Source: We've done all we can here, but it's clear that Naemon still seeks to harm Valenwood, so our work is not finished.\n\nI suggest we spread out and search for signs of darkness. When Auri-El wills it, I am certain the Green will bring us together again.
Target: 여기서 할 수 있는 일은 다 했지만, 네이몬이 지금도 발렌우드를 해치려 한다는 사실은 명백하니, 우리 일은 아직 끝난 것이 아니오.\n\n따로 떨어져서 어둠의 흔적을 찾아보는 것이 좋겠소. 아우리엘께서 원하실 때, 분명 녹색이 우리를 다시 만나게 해 줄 것이오.

Source: We've done all we can here, but it's clear that Naemon still seeks to harm Valenwood, so our work is not finished.\n\nI suggest we spread out and search for signs of darkness. When Auri-El wills it, I am certain the Green will bring us together again.
Target: 여기서 할 수 있는 일은 다 했지만, 네이몬이 지금도 발렌우드를 해치려 한다는 사실은 명백하니, 우리 일은 아직 끝난 것이 아니오.\n\n따로 떨어져서 어둠의 흔적을 찾아보는 것이 좋겠소. 아우리엘께서 원하실 때, 분명 녹색이 우리를 다시 만나게 해 줄 것이오.

Source: This one knows, Hallowed. The priestess is already here. Preparations have begun. Your path to the Two Moons Dance begins here, and now.
Target: 이 카짓은 압니다, 성자님. 여사제가 이미 와 있습니다. 준비는 이미 시작됐어요. 두 달의 춤의 길은 여기에서 시작입니다.

Source: Thank you for bringing me this message, albeit the scholar's apprentice was lost to me in the fighting. Regrettably, I fear that young Shiri was most likely … slain.\n\nOf course, until you arrived, I believed we would soon share her fate.
Target: Thank you for bringing me this message, albeit the scholar's apprentice was lost to me in the fighting. Regrettably, I fear that young Shiri was most likely … slain.\n\nOf course, until you arrived, I believed we would soon share her fate.

Source: I gave you the samples.
Target: I gave you the samples.

Source: For Melril!
Target: Melril을 위하여!

Source: I found the lost treasure. It was a vault full of ancient tomes and scrolls.
Target: 잃어버린 보물을 찾았습니다. 그곳은 고대 서적과 두루말이로 가득 찬 금고였습니다.

Source: I did as you asked.
Target: I did as you asked.

Source: Reporting in, captain.
Target: 보고합니다, 함장님.\n

Source: I was able to determine that Khartag Point continues to be a key location in the regions illegal slave trade.
Target: 나는 카르타그 포인트가 불법 노예 매매의 중심지로 계속 기능하고 있음을 알 수있었어.

Source: You're right. The Maulborn are experimenting on the afflicted.
Target: 맞습니다. 마울본은 환자들에게 실험을 하고 있습니다.

Source: Yes. Here are the Graveborn hearts.
Target: 여기 무덤에서 일어난 자들의 심장입니다.

Source: Another one, eh? Well, you're not the first and won't be the last.\n\nLet me be the first to welcome you to Vulkhel Guard!
Target: Another one, eh? Well, you're not the first and won't be the last.\n\nLet me be the first to welcome you to Vulkhel Guard!

Source: I want you to … to have this. A gift from my people to the hero of Nirn. To honor you … and those who fell beside me in this great battle. Thank … thank you.\n\nMay the … spirits … guide me on my … way ….
Target: 네가 이것... 이것을 받아줬으면 한다. 우리 민족이 넌의 영웅에게 주는 선물이다. 너와... 이 거대한 전투에서 내 곁에 쓰러진 이들을 기리는 것이다. 고맙... 고맙다.\n\n영혼들께서... 나의... 길을... 이끌어 주시길....

Source: I should have expected such initiative from the queen's chosen. Tracking down Vicereeve Pelidil will take time. That is my responsibility as the Staff of Magnus disappeared on my watch.\n\nI will keep the queen apprised of our actions.
Target: I should have expected such initiative from the queen's chosen. Tracking down Vicereeve Pelidil will take time. That is my responsibility as the Staff of Magnus disappeared on my watch.\n\nI will keep the queen apprised of our actions.

Source: Glad you fared better than that scholar. And you have the notes. I'll let the friends know. Plus give them an earful about taking armed folk on their little field trips next time.\n\nThanks. Here's something for the effort.
Target: Glad you fared better than that scholar. And you have the notes. I'll let the friends know. Plus give them an earful about taking armed folk on their little field trips next time.\n\nThanks. Here's something for the effort.

Source: I hear someone helped the Wyrd Sisters save the Wyrd Tree.
Target: 누군가 위어드 자매들이 위어드 나무를 구하는걸 도왔다고 들었어요.

Source: Narsis sent me to provide assistance.
Target: 나르시스는 도움을주기 위해 나를 보냈습니다.

Source: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n"Thank you for your timely delivery. You saved me some embarrassment already. Please keep my arrangement with Alyxe from reaching Master Rolis's ears. We need not scandalize him." —Faustina Curio
Target: <A scrap of paper is pinned to the crate.>\n\n\\"Thank you for your timely delivery. You saved me some embarrassment already. Please keep my arrangement with Alyxe from reaching Master Rolis's ears. We need not scandalize him.\"\" —Faustina Curio"

Source: You've done us all a great favor. That blasted guardian has plagued unwary travelers for a while now. Not sure why it's still so protective of that place.\n\nThanks … and here's your reward!
Target: You've done us all a great favor. That blasted guardian has plagued unwary travelers for a while now. Not sure why it's still so protective of that place.\n\nThanks … and here's your reward!

Source: Yes, free to leave this place.
Target: 그렇습니다. 자유롭게 이곳을 떠나도 좋습니다.

Source: Phew. Guess the Dark Elves did bury them with it. You just been lugging it around like that? You're as bad as Za'ji.\n\nI won't dock you anything for leaving it to me to clean up, just this once. Here's your pay.
Target: Phew. Guess the Dark Elves did bury them with it. You just been lugging it around like that? You're as bad as Za'ji.\n\nI won't dock you anything for leaving it to me to clean up, just this once. Here's your pay.

Source: The staff is gone. Vicereeve Pelidil stole it.
Target: 지팡이가 사라졌습니다. 대리행정관 펠리딜이 훔쳐갔습니다.

Source: Firsthold...so much death. I hear the place still smells of fire and death.
Target: 퍼스트홀드... 정말 많이 죽었죠. 거기에서 아직도 화염과 죽음의 냄새가 난다고 들었어요.

Source: Now we're talking. I mean, it's an expression. I'm not just narrating what's hap—forget it. If we're lucky, these papers will tell us what the New Moons are planning.\n\nI'm giving you this gold for a job well done. Dammit.
Target: Now we're talking. I mean, it's an expression. I'm not just narrating what's hap—forget it. If we're lucky, these papers will tell us what the New Moons are planning.\n\nI'm giving you this gold for a job well done. Dammit.

Source: I've come to report that the Obsidian Gorge is safe once more.
Target: 저는 흑요석 협곡이 안전하다는걸 다시 한번 보고 하기 위해 왔습니다.

Source: What did you do to Selene?
Target: What did you do to Selene?

Source: How do I set you free?
Target: 어떻게 풀어드려야 하죠?

Source: When Drillk died, so did the source of the Knahaten Flu. You protected us all.
Target: When Drillk died, so did the source of the Knahaten Flu. You protected us all.

Source: I'm glad you stayed to close it.
Target: 당신이 포탈을 닫아서 기쁘군요.

Source: Give me the prize.
Target: 보상을 줘

Source: Haha, I laugh at your misfortune.
Target: 하하, 나는 너의 불행을 비웃는다.\n

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있었다니 기쁘네요.

Source: I also killed <<1>>.
Target: 그리고 내가 <<1>>을(를) 죽였지.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 뭘해야하지?

Source: <<1>> fled. She was working for <<2>>.
Target: <<1>>는 도망쳤어요. <<2>>를 위해서 일하고 있더군요.

Source: Remelie is dead.
Target: 레멜리에는 죽었습니다.

Source: Yes, <<1>> is dead.
Target: 네. <<1>>은 죽었어요.

Source: Something about Her Majesty's speech, eh? That's what I'd guess. I'll make sure it gets into the right hands. \n\nThe Watch thanks you for your service.
Target: Something about Her Majesty's speech, eh? That's what I'd guess. I'll make sure it gets into the right hands. \n\nThe Watch thanks you for your service.

Source: How will you respond to the Sea Sload threat?
Target: How will you respond to the Sea Sload threat?

Source: That's the same conclusion I reached, but at least the Serk is safe. For now.\n\nHere. Take this. For helping me find my brother and expose the true nature of the Maulborn.
Target: 제가 도달한 결론과 똑같네요, 하지만 적어도 서크는 안전할거에요. 지금은 말이죠.\n\n여기. 이걸 받으세요. 제 오빠를 찾고 마울본의 본성을 들어내도록 도와주셨죠.

Source: I think so. Thanks to you. I need to find Lady Laurent and make sure she's all right. She can get so flustered without me. \n\nI'll lead Fatahala to the Hollow City. Those dueling lessons were certainly worth the gold!
Target: 그럴 것 같소. 당신 덕분이지. 레이디 로런트를 찾아서 그분이 괜찮으신지 확인해 봐야겠소. 내가 없으면 꽤 허둥지둥하셔서 말이오.\n\n난 파타할라를 따라 공허한 도시로 갈 것이오. 그 결투 교습이 확실히 골드 값을 하는군!

Source: Excellent! Just place them, you know … over there. I'll make sure my client comes to collect them directly. Can't have things like this lying about. Not that they're … you're feeling all right, yes? Never mind.\n\nHere's your payment, as promised!
Target: Excellent! Just place them, you know … over there. I'll make sure my client comes to collect them directly. Can't have things like this lying about. Not that they're … you're feeling all right, yes? Never mind.\n\nHere's your payment, as promised!

Source: You saved Glenumbra? Really? I guess I'm impressed.
Target: 글렌움브라를 구한거야? 정말? 나는 감동했다.

Source: Haha! Earned our pay with this one! Would you look at that? Even got pictures. The old beard is gonna love it.\n\nGo on and take your pay. I need to show Sai all the important work I—we—been doing.
Target: Haha! Earned our pay with this one! Would you look at that? Even got pictures. The old beard is gonna love it.\n\nGo on and take your pay. I need to show Sai all the important work I—we—been doing.

Source: <A representative of the Dragonstar Caravan Company left this pack of rewards and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The local fauna leave something to be desired when it comes to flavor, consistency, appearance, and lack of poison. This will help."
Target: <A representative of the Dragonstar Caravan Company left this pack of rewards and a note of thanks.> \n\n\\"The local fauna leave something to be desired when it comes to flavor
column4: consistency
column6: and lack of poison. This will help.\"\""

Source: <The Mages Guild has set aside a reward pack and a note of thanks.> \n\n"Thank the Eight! Do you know what I had to eat for supper last night? You don't want to know."
Target: <The Mages Guild has set aside a reward pack and a note of thanks.> \n\n\\"Thank the Eight! Do you know what I had to eat for supper last night? You don't want to know.\"\""

Source: <The consortium has left a pack and a note of thanks as a reward.> \n\n"Common dishes in the lands of Queen Ayrenn are novel cuisine on distant shores. Well done!"
Target: <The consortium has left a pack and a note of thanks as a reward.> \n\n\\"Common dishes in the lands of Queen Ayrenn are novel cuisine on distant shores. Well done!\"\""

Source: <The refugee organization has managed to gather a pack of rewards for your donation. There is also a note of thanks included.> \n\n"Fighting on the edge of the March was brutal this week. Your goods will give hope where only there was despair."
Target: <The refugee organization has managed to gather a pack of rewards for your donation. There is also a note of thanks included.> \n\n\\"Fighting on the edge of the March was brutal this week. Your goods will give hope where only there was despair.\"\""

Source: <The Fighters Guild has set aside a pack of supplies and a letter of thanks.> \n\n"Nothing like a hot meal and tasty drink to remind you of home, and a future free from these bastards."
Target: <The Fighters Guild has set aside a pack of supplies and a letter of thanks.> \n\n\\"Nothing like a hot meal and tasty drink to remind you of home
column4: and a future free from these bastards.\"\""

Source: <Officers of the Aldmeri Dominion have set aside a pack of goods as thanks for your contribution.> \n\n"Sevenfold blessings upon you! Last week we ran out of rations and resorted to raiding the clothier's stores for leather. This should taste better!"
Target: <Officers of the Aldmeri Dominion have set aside a pack of goods as thanks for your contribution.> \n\n\\"Sevenfold blessings upon you! Last week we ran out of rations and resorted to raiding the clothier's stores for leather. This should taste better!\"\""

Source: <The Mages Guild has set aside a reward pack and a note of thanks. The note bears numerous strange sigils, and a crude drawing of a woman with a staff beating up a scamp.>
Target: <The Mages Guild has set aside a reward pack and a note of thanks. The note bears numerous strange sigils, and a crude drawing of a woman with a staff beating up a scamp.>

Source: Now that Fildgor is gone, perhaps the Stormfist clan will accept with the one true king.
Target: Now that Fildgor is gone, perhaps the Stormfist clan will accept with the one true king.

Source: Azura gave me a Duskstone with which I can enter the dream.
Target: 아주라께서 제게 꿈 속으로 들어갈 수 있는 황혼의 돌을 주셨습니다.

Source: I hope you can rest easy now.
Target: 이제 편히 쉬시길 바랍니다.

Source: Those mines needed to be closed. I'm glad you convinced Kasal to finally do so.
Target: 그 광산들은 폐쇄 될 필요가있었습니다. 마침내 Kasal를 설득했기 때문에 기쁩니다.\n

Source: Shor's bones! It's good to see another competent fighter.\n\nGeneral Serien has dug into Fort Virak like a tick on a dog, and we're having a cursed hard time digging him out.
Target: Shor's bones! It's good to see another competent fighter.\n\nGeneral Serien has dug into Fort Virak like a tick on a dog, and we're having a cursed hard time digging him out.

Source: Shagora doesn't remember her friend Seqbar, but she's very fond of you.
Target: Shagora doesn't remember her friend Seqbar, but she's very fond of you.

Source: What? Have I been a fool? I questioned my faith for the flimsiest of reasons and caused others to question theirs. I have much to do to correct my failure.\n\nI wish I knew why Rhavil Urano's doubting words were so compelling.
Target: 뭐? 내가 바보였나? 나는 가장 가벼운 이유로 나의 믿음을 의심했고 다른 사람들이 그들의 믿음을 의심하게 만들었군요. 나는 실패를 고치기 위해 할 일이 많습니다.\n\nRhavil Urano의 의심스러운 말들이 왜 그렇게 매력적이었는지 알았어야 했습니다.

Source: Can I have my cake now?
Target: 이제 케이크를 받아도 될까요?

Source: I destroyed at least three of the abyssal geysers.
Target: I destroyed at least three of the abyssal geysers.

Source: The Fighters Guild was cruel to cast out Sees-All-Colors. She was brave to do as she did.
Target: 파이터스 길드 Sees-All-Colors)를 쫒아내는데 잔인하게 행동하였습니다. 그녀는 그녀가 한 것처럼 용감했습니다.\n

Source: The ruins by the river? The General had them sealed off and commanded that the place was off limits. Huh. Curiouser and curiouser.
Target: 강 근처 유적 이야기를 말하는 거죠? 장군은 그 장소를 봉인하고 명령을 내려 출입을 제한 했죠. 흥미가 동하는군요.

Source: This … this is very nearly everything! I can't believe it. My employer might even be lenient!\n\nYou've saved me. You didn't have to help, but you did. Thank you.
Target: 이건 ... 거의 다 찾아오신거나 마찬가지입니다!정말 믿을수 없군요.제 고용주는 어쩌면 관대하게 대할지도 모릅니다!\n\n당신이 저를 구했습니다.당신은 도와줄 이유가 없었지만 절 도와주셨습니다.정말 감사합니다.

Source: You've been beneath the Grimwatch. You've seen the Khajiiti ruins. Fascinating!
Target: You've been beneath the Grimwatch. You've seen the Khajiiti ruins. Fascinating!

Source: Right! Things like that, they're exactly why we keep to ourselves in the Elven lands—that and the bad food.\n\nAnyway, you're all right. Tell that fancy Othral we'll fight. Come back and drink with us again sometime.
Target: Right! Things like that, they're exactly why we keep to ourselves in the Elven lands—that and the bad food.\n\nAnyway, you're all right. Tell that fancy Othral we'll fight. Come back and drink with us again sometime.

Source: I'll make sure the families of the fallen get these. It should give them some closure at least.
Target: 나는 타락한 사람들의 가족들이 이것을 얻을 수 있도록 할 것입니다. 적어도 그들에게 어떤 종결을 주어야합니다.\n

Source: Yes. As Ysgramor said, their masters reside in Coldharbour. We have no choice but to invade.\n \nI must return to Mournhould, my friend. I hope to see you there.
Target: Yes. As Ysgramor said, their masters reside in Coldharbour. We have no choice but to invade.\n \nI must return to Mournhould, my friend. I hope to see you there.

Source: He didn't know why? If he was willing to attack and kill us without even questioning his orders, he's better off dead.\n\nWell done. Thank you, outsider.
Target: 이유를 몰랐다구요? 그가 심지어 명령에 아무 의문도 없이 우리를 공격하고 죽이려했다면, 죽은게 잘됬네요.\n\n 잘 했어요. 외부인 감사합니다.

Source: So he's under the impression he's been rescued? We'll have to correct that.\n\nI appreciate your help. Though when we're done with him, I doubt Omalor will be very happy.
Target: 그래서 그는 저 아래에서 구조됬다는 사실에 감명받았다는건가요?우리가 그걸 바로 잡아주도록 하죠.\n\n도와 주셔서 감사합니다.그렇지만 우리가 그를 만났을때에도 오말러가 아주 행복해할지 확신하진 못하겠네요.

Source: Excellent! You've cleared the pass for us. I'm moving our troops forward now.
Target: 훌륭하군! 너는 우리를 위해 통로를 청소해주었군. 이제 군대를 전진시켜야겠어.\n

Source: Narsis is safe, at least for now. We'll get these people to the healers. You should get some rest. I fear things are about to get more complicated.\n\nThe Maulborn are more dangerous than we thought. I'm sure your help will be needed again.
Target: 나르시스는 안전합니다, 지금은 말이죠.저희들은 사람들을 치료사에게 데려갈겁니다.당신도 조금은 휴식을 취하셔야 하구요.상황이 좀 더 복잡해질까봐 우려되네요.\n\n마울본은 우리가 생각한 것보다 더 위험한것 같습니다. 당신의 도움이 다시 필요할 것이라고 확신합니다.

Source: And not a moment too soon. \n\nWe can't wait for more reinforcements. We must strike back against these bastards before we lose our chance.
Target: 아슬아슬하게 도착했군.\n\n더 이상 증원군을 기다릴 순 없네. 기회를 잃기 전에 이 놈들을 공격해야 해.

Source: I'm glad you've come. Help is vital at this time of crisis.
Target: 네가 와서 다행이야. 이 위기 상황에서 너의도움이 매우 중요해.\n

Source: You saved King Emeric, didn't you? I can't wait to tell my friend we met.
Target: You saved King Emeric, didn't you? I can't wait to tell my friend we met.

Source: <The consortium has left a pack and a note of thanks as a reward.> \n\n"Our Dominion arm thanks you for broadening our palates and our profit."
Target: <The consortium has left a pack and a note of thanks as a reward.> \n\n\\"Our Dominion arm thanks you for broadening our palates and our profit.\"\""

Source: <The Fighters Guild has set aside a pack of supplies and a letter of thanks.> \n\n"Today many a Daedra's belly will go empty because a Fighter's belly was full. Keep up the good work."
Target: <The Fighters Guild has set aside a pack of supplies and a letter of thanks.> \n\n\\"Today many a Daedra's belly will go empty because a Fighter's belly was full. Keep up the good work.\"\""

Source: Well, if it isn't the new King of the Grotto! You ask me, those beasts got what was coming to them.
Target: Well, if it isn't the new King of the Grotto! You ask me, those beasts got what was coming to them.

Source: <Officers of the Aldmeri Dominion have set aside a pack of goods as thanks for your contribution.> \n\n"An army lives and dies on its stomach, so they say. The Golden Eagle's army will be well-fed today."
Target: <Officers of the Aldmeri Dominion have set aside a pack of goods as thanks for your contribution.> \n\n\\"An army lives and dies on its stomach
column4: so they say. The Golden Eagle's army will be well-fed today.\"\""

Source: <A representative of the Dragonstar Caravan Company left this pack of rewards and a note of thanks.> \n\n"There's nothing like good food to make the long desert nights bearable. Thank you."
Target: <A representative of the Dragonstar Caravan Company left this pack of rewards and a note of thanks.> \n\n\\"There's nothing like good food to make the long desert nights bearable. Thank you.\"\""

Source: <The Mages Guild has set aside a reward pack and a note of thanks.> \n\n"Our thanks can never measure up to what you've provided us. Thank you, sincerely."
Target: <The Mages Guild has set aside a reward pack and a note of thanks.> \n\n\\"Our thanks can never measure up to what you've provided us. Thank you
column4: sincerely.\"\""

Source: <The refugee organization has managed to gather a pack of rewards for your donation. There is also a note of thanks included.>\n\n"Across the Dominion, so many people are in need of basic sustenance. Your donation will help fill many a needy stomach."
Target: <The refugee organization has managed to gather a pack of rewards for your donation. There is also a note of thanks included.>\n\n\\"Across the Dominion
column4: so many people are in need of basic sustenance. Your donation will help fill many a needy stomach.\"\""

Source: I understand we've you to thank for uncovering the spy in Woodhearth.
Target: I understand we've you to thank for uncovering the spy in Woodhearth.

Source: Now that the giant threat is over, I'm going to start trading in Lower Yorgrim again.
Target: Now that the giant threat is over, I'm going to start trading in Lower Yorgrim again.

Source: I can take on contracts to assist the Divine Prosecution.
Target: I can take on contracts to assist the Divine Prosecution.

Source: The Maormer are fled or dead, thanks to your efforts. <<1>> is safe, and voluntarily a part of the Aldmeri Dominion.\n\nSo, if you must know? <<2>> keeps an eye on promising people.
Target: 마오머들은 도망가거나 죽었어. 네 노력 덕분에 말이야. <<1>>는 안전해졌고, 자발적으로 알드메리 자치령의 일원이 되었지.\n\n그래, 꼭 알아야겠어? <<2>>는 전도유망한 사람들을 계속 지켜보거든.

Source: What happens to the Oracle now?
Target: 이제 예언자는 어떻게 되는건가요?

Source: No. I will stay aboard the Prowler. I miss her greatly when we are apart, so I will celebrate our victory here on deck with my crew … and several bottles of Moon-Sugar Double Rum.\n\nYou go on. Savor this victory. You certainly earned it.
Target: 아니, 난 부랑자호에 계속 있을 거야. 떨어져 있는 동안 이 배가 정말로 그리웠거든. 그러니 우리 선원들이랑 여기서 축하연을 벌일 거야... 달설탕을 두 배로 넣은 럼주 몇 병과 함께 말이지.\n\n당신은 해안가로 가 봐. 이 승리를 즐겨야지. 그럴 자격이 있으니까.

Source: You recovered all three of the Ansei Wards. This is a cause for joyful celebration!
Target: 당신께서 세 개의 안세이 워드들을 모두 회수하셨습니다. 그래서 기쁜 마음으로 축하하는 것이죠!

Source: It is. And your arrival is not unexpected.
Target: 그래. 그리고 당신의 도착은 예견되었었습니다.\n

Source: Absolutely! You've brought the best news I've heard in several weeks. Enjoy your trophy.
Target: 당연하지! 지난 몇 주 동안 들었던 소식 중에 최고의 소식을 가져왔으니까. 전리품을 즐기라고.

Source: Then we cannot allow these people to remain. The last thing the Dominion needs is rebellious elements near its capital city.\n\nI don't enjoy making this decision, but thank you for helping me see its necessity.
Target: 그렇다면 이 사람들을 남겨둘 순 없습니다. 수도 근처에 반역적인 부류가 있다는 것은 자치령이 용납할 수 없어요.\n\n이런 결정을 내리는게 즐겁진 않지만, 그래도 필요성을 알 수 있도록 도와줘서 고맙습니다.

Source: What is it?
Target: 그게 뭔데?

Source: This one thinks that Sees-All-Colors got what was coming to her. Traitorous Argonian scum.
Target: This one thinks that Sees-All-Colors got what was coming to her. Traitorous Argonian scum.

그가 용병들과의 마찰로 인해 마을을 떠나야 한다고 했어.
