Target: 그리고 내 보상은?

Source: Yes, and you did it well! Few make it past the Trial of the Mind, let alone all three trials. They're necessary to prepare one's body and spirit for what comes next.
Target: 그래, 너는 훌륭히 시련을 완수해냈군! 세 개의 시련은 커녕, 마음의 시련을 통과하는 사람은 거의 없지. 그들은 자신의 몸과 영혼에 닥쳐 올 일에 대해 준비되어야만 한다.

Source: You unlocked a secret from our past, one so well-hidden we didn't see it ourselves. We'll retain this memory until it is lost once more. Then, in a time of great need, the Hist will reveal your deeds to our descendants.
Target: 너는 우리 과거로부터온 비밀을 알아냈다. 너무 잘 숨겨져 있어 우리들이 차마 보지 못했던 과거말이야. 우리가 이 기억들을 다시 잃기 전까진 간직할것이다. 큰 위기가 닥쳤을때, 히스트는 우리의 자손들에게 너의 행적을 보여줄것이다.

Source: Shor's Bones! I'm glad to hear that. On both counts! I wasn't looking forward to going up there. The mountain has a terrible reputation. I'll take the shard back to Riften and keep it safe until you need it.
Target: Shor's Bones이군! 정말 기뻐. 두 번 모두! 나는 거기로 올라갈 것을 고대하지 못했다. 그 산은 끔찍한 평판을 얻었어. 나는 Riften에게 조각을 가져다가 필요할 때까지 안전하게 지킬거야.\n

Source: Maybe I will … but don't be too insistent about that.\n\nKeep your curiosity to yourself. Better to stay silent and be thought a fool than to speak carelessly and have your throat cut.
Target: 그럴지도 모르지... 그래도 너무 고집부리진 말라고.\n\n호기심은 잘 챙겨 둬. 조용히 있으면서 바보 취급 받는 편이 부주의하게 말했다가 목이 달아나는 것보다는 더 나은 법이니까.

Source: He can stay there a while longer. That would make it easier for you to work on my side, wouldn't it?\n\nAnd after you help me rid my town of this Khajiiti upstart, we'll both have what we want.
Target: He can stay there a while longer. That would make it easier for you to work on my side, wouldn't it?\n\nAnd after you help me rid my town of this Khajiiti upstart, we'll both have what we want.

Source: Just you? I hope you're tougher than you look. Sorry. I don't mean to sound ungrateful, but we're in trouble out here.
Target: 너 뿐이야? 네가 보기보다 더 강했으면 좋겠군. 미안해. 기분나쁜 말을 하려던건 아니지만 우린 문제가 생겼거든.\n

Source: My job. We were sent here to escort the Green Lady, but the town's defenses will need a bit of work first.\n\nI'm sure our paths will cross again someday.
Target: 제 일을 해야죠. 원래는 녹색 여군주를 호위하려고 온 거지만, 우선 마을 방어선을 좀 손볼 필요가 있겠어요.\n\n분명 우린 언젠가 다시 만나게 될 거에요.

Source: And my reward?
Target: 그리고 내 보상은?

Source: I … what was I saying? \n\nDid Scout Mamyne send you? I was glad she got away. The others … they're all gone.
Target: 어... 제가 뭐라고 했었나요?\n\n당신은 Mamyne 정찰병이 보냈나요? 그녀가 도망칠수 있어서 기뻣어요.다른 사람들은...다들 죽었어요.

Source: I have never been so grateful for it to be business as usual. Travelers will come again. We will flourish.\n\nWherever you go, you may meet one of our kind. And we will know your name as a friend, a friend of the Baandari.
Target: 사업이 평소처럼 움직인다는 것에 이렇게 감사해본 적이 없었다네. 여행자들도 다시 방문하겠지. 우리는 번영할 게야.\n\n자네가 어딜 가든 우리쪽 사람들을 만나게 될 걸세. 우리는 자네의 이름을 친구로서 알게 될 것이야. 반다리의 친구 말일세.

Source: And my reward?
Target: And my reward?

Source: I couldn't wait for them. Ran ahead, too far ahead. Impatience. My curse! The captain … if she's alive ….\n\n<<1>>'s in charge. She's got to … to save Velyn Harbor now.
Target: 내가 기다리질 못했소. 너무 앞으로 달려나가 버렸지. 내 조급함에 저주 있으라! 대장님이... 아직 살아 있다면...\n\n이제 <<1>>이 책임자요. 리나리에가... 벨린항을 구해야 하오.

Source: The ones in Colovia wait for a reply from the Gold Coast mercenaries. When they do not get one, they will send another courier, forewarned of treachery.\n\nLet us make sure none are left to answer the next message, shall we?
Target: 콜로비아에 있는 자들이 골드 코스트 용병들의 답신을 기다리고 있거든. 답신이 오지 않으면 그쪽에서 다른 배달부를 보낼 걸세. 배신을 경고하는 거지.\n\n바로 그 다음 편지에 아무도 답변하지 못하게 해야 한다네, 알겠는가?

Source: You are a true gambler to risk your life in such a fashion. It is my pleasure to award you with these lovely items. Please accept these as a small token of my respect for you.
Target: You are a true gambler to risk your life in such a fashion. It is my pleasure to award you with these lovely items. Please accept these as a small token of my respect for you.

Source: <<1>> claimed he saw House Dres poison our Hist Tree. Then he gave a bottle to this tree-licking waste of flesh.\n\nI smell worm scat. Someone has been playing us for fools, and I no longer believe it's House Dres.
Target: <<1>>은 Dres가문이 우리의 히스트 나무에 독을 풀었다고 주장했습니다. 그 다음에는 이 나무를 핱는 머저리에게 병을 주었군요.\n\n나는 벌레똥의 냄새를 맡습니다. 누군가가 우리를 바보처럼 속이고, 제가 더이상 Dres가문을 믿지 못하게 만들었군요.

Source: Well done. While you were out saving people, I've been working on a way to stop this thing. And I think I'm onto something.
Target: 잘 했어. 네가 사람들을 구하는 동안, 난 이 일을 멈출 방법을 찾고 있었지. 그리고 무언가를 찾는 데 성공한 것 같아.

Source: Two of the Telvanni are grateful to you. I'll spread word of your deeds to the others.\n\nShould you have need of us again, just ask. Until then, may Vivec guide your path.
Target: 두 명의 텔바니가 당신께 감사를 표합니다. 당신의 행동을 다른 이들에게도 알려야 하겠습니다.\n\n우리를 다시 필요로 하는 때가 오면, 돌아와 도움을 요청하십시오. 비벡께서 당신을 인도하길.

Source: <The Consortium set aside a case of Woodworker supplies as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"We'll never be able to look at a shield again without comparing it to your fine and detailed work."
Target: <단체에서 쪽지와 함께 목공 보급품 상자를 보상으로 지급했습니다.>\n\n\\"어디서든 방패를 보면 언제나 당신이 만든 훌륭하고 섬세한 방패가 생각날 겁니다.\"\""

Source: Impressive. These are all fit for display—once I scrub the dirt off. Filthy cultists don't know culture when they see it.\n\nHere, you earned this.
Target: 인상적인데. 전부 장식대에 딱 맞잖아. 먼지를 씻어 내야겠지만. 더러운 광신도놈들은 문화라는 것을 보고도 모르는구만.\n\n여기, 대가를 받으라고.

Source: <The organization gathered enough supplies to offer you a case as a reward. They also included a note of thanks.>\n\n"The war has displaced so many refugees. Thanks to crafters such as yourself, at least some of them can defend themselves tonight."
Target: <The organization gathered enough supplies to offer you a case as a reward. They also included a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"The war has displaced so many refugees. Thanks to crafters such as yourself
column4: at least some of them can defend themselves tonight.\"\""

Source: <The military provided a case of supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"Your work in support of the war effort does you proud. One of our healers thinks that your intricate carvings provide a better focus for her magicka. Thank you!"
Target: <The military provided a case of supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Your work in support of the war effort does you proud. One of our healers thinks that your intricate carvings provide a better focus for her magicka. Thank you!\"\""

Source: Good—the Red Rooks are ticks. I go out of my way to squash them. Or have someone else squash them.\n\nI'll get these heirlooms back where they belong. Here, you earned it.
Target: 좋아. 붉은 떼까마귀 놈들은 귀찮은 녀석들이지. 직접 놈들을 박살내러 가야겠어. 아니면 다른 사람을 시켜 박살내야겠군.\n\n이 가보들은 원래 주인들에게 돌려주도록 하지. 자, 보상을 받으라고.

Source: <A battered case of woodworking supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"We hope your ability to keep quiet about our partnership matches or exceeds the level of your craftsmanship. Or else."
Target: <A battered case of woodworking supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n\\"We hope your ability to keep quiet about our partnership matches or exceeds the level of your craftsmanship. Or else.\"\""

Source: <The Guild provided a case of woodworking supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n"The Daedra really don't like the staves you've been providing us with, but we certainly do! Thanks!"
Target: <The Guild provided a case of woodworking supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"The Daedra really don't like the staves you've been providing us with
column4: but we certainly do! Thanks!\"\""

Source: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a case of Woodworking supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"We deal with a lot of crafters, so take this for what it's worth. Your shields are among the best we've received. Thanks."
Target: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a case of Woodworking supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"We deal with a lot of crafters
column4: so take this for what it's worth. Your shields are among the best we've received. Thanks.\"\""

Source: <A decrepit case of woodworking supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n"Daedra aren't fond of giving up their spoils. So we convinced them, with the help of one of your last shipments. It worked out in our favor!"
Target: <A decrepit case of woodworking supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n\\"Daedra aren't fond of giving up their spoils. So we convinced them
column4: with the help of one of your last shipments. It worked out in our favor!\"\""

Source: <A Woodworker's Case from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n"The new arrivals were quite happy with the shields you provided. We look forward to working with you again."
Target: <A Woodworker's Case from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n\\"The new arrivals were quite happy with the shields you provided. We look forward to working with you again.\"\""

Source: <A case bearing the tag "Crossroads Profiteers" waits inside the box, a note attached to one side.>\n\n"Usually, the staves we gather from the battlefields are cracked and broken, so receiving your goods is a welcome change."
Target: <A case bearing the tag \\"Crossroads Profiteers\"\" waits inside the box
column4: a note attached to one side.>\n\n\"\"Usually
column5: the staves we gather from the battlefields are cracked and broken
column6: so receiving your goods is a welcome change.\"\""

Source: <The Consortium set aside a case of Woodworker supplies as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n "Good work, master woodworker! Your skill with a chisel and saw does you proud. We look forward to dealing with you again."
Target: <The Consortium set aside a case of Woodworker supplies as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n \\"Good work
column4: master woodworker! Your skill with a chisel and saw does you proud. We look forward to dealing with you again.\"\""

Source: I've decided to accept your offer.
Target: I've decided to accept your offer.

Source: Are you ready for me to set out?
Target: Are you ready for me to set out?

Source: There's no way Hircine will free you both?
Target: 허씬이 두 명 다 풀어줄 방법은 없을까?

Source: And as for my reward?
Target: 내 보상은?

Source: And as for my reward?
Target: 내 보상은?

Source: Count Hosni. We haven't met, but from what I hear, you could use someone like me at your side.
Target: 호스니 백작님. 우린 만난 적이 없지만, 당신이 나와 같은 사람을 기용한다고 들었습니다.

Source: And as for my reward?
Target: 내 보상은?

Source: QUEST: Plantation Hostages
Target: 퀘스트: 농장 인질들

Source: I want nothing that belonged to that dirty cat-man Ra-shadda. \n\nHe brought that monster here. He must know a way to send it back.
Target: I want nothing that belonged to that dirty cat-man Ra-shadda. \n\nHe brought that monster here. He must know a way to send it back.

Source: With the Elder Scroll of Ghartok back in our hands, we are one step closer to victory. Your part in its recovery will not be forgotten.
Target: With the Elder Scroll of Ghartok back in our hands, we are one step closer to victory. Your part in its recovery will not be forgotten.

Source: King Emeric? That—that is bad. We just received word that the king has fallen ill.\n\nIt cannot be a coincidence. Vaermina is raising the stakes. She makes a final bid for power by assaulting our king.
Target: 에머릭 왕을요? 그건 좋지 않은 일이군요. 방금 왕이 병에 걸렸다는 전갈을 받았습니다.\n\n 우연이 아니군요. 베르미나가 대범해지고 있어요. 그녀는 우리 왕을 공격해서 힘을 얻으려고 마지막으로 시도할 겁니다.

Source: We were careless, allowing the enemy to steal the Elder Scroll of Chim. Now that it has been recaptured, our conquest of Cyrodiil must continue!
Target: We were careless, allowing the enemy to steal the Elder Scroll of Chim. Now that it has been recaptured, our conquest of Cyrodiil must continue!

Source: He's planning to use it to release Sadal, the second Brother of Strife. \n\nWe've got to stop him. All of Stonefalls will suffer if Tanval exploits the Tormented Spire.
Target: 그는 두 번째 투쟁의 형제인 사달을 해방시키기 위해 그것을 사용할 계획을 가지고 있을 겁니다.\n\n우리는 그를 막아야 합니다. 탄발이 고통의 첨탑에서 일을 벌이면 스톤폴스의 모든 것이 고통받게 될 것입니다.

Source: Hah, don't we all?\n\nI wish you luck, stranger, but you probably won't find much here. Grandmaster Omin has been transformed from a bloodthirsty nix hound into a simpering guar. Maybe one of the guardsmen here can tell you more. I want no part of it.
Target: Hah, don't we all?\n\nI wish you luck, stranger, but you probably won't find much here. Grandmaster Omin has been transformed from a bloodthirsty nix hound into a simpering guar. Maybe one of the guardsmen here can tell you more. I want no part of it.

Source: <The Guild provided a case of woodworking supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n"Fun bit of lore for you: most Daedra have pointy teeth. The bow is a great way to ensure you never smell a scamp's breath."
Target: <The Guild provided a case of woodworking supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Fun bit of lore for you: most Daedra have pointy teeth. The bow is a great way to ensure you never smell a scamp's breath.\"\""

Source: Yes, they are all safe.
Target: 그래, 그들은 모두 무사해.

Source: I'll never regain my eyesight, but I'll live. Porath will see me back to Shor's Stone. Come see me, if you ever return.
Target: I'll never regain my eyesight, but I'll live. Porath will see me back to Shor's Stone. Come see me, if you ever return.

Source: <The military provided a case of Woodworking supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n "Your ability to supply what we need when we need it is much appreciated. We look forward to working with you again."
Target: <The military provided a case of Woodworking supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n \\"Your ability to supply what we need when we need it is much appreciated. We look forward to working with you again.\"\""

Source: What happens now? I utter a prayer to Sithis and send this traitor down dead-man's river. If I had the time, I'd do something really spectacular, but I can hear the spiders closing in. A bolt in the head will have to do.\n\nAgain, you have my thanks.
Target: What happens now? I utter a prayer to Sithis and send this traitor down dead-man's river. If I had the time, I'd do something really spectacular, but I can hear the spiders closing in. A bolt in the head will have to do.\n\nAgain, you have my thanks.

Source: I have it all.
Target: I have it all.

Source: That Covenant general is a monster. Thank you, soldier. We'll ensure the dead rest peacefully.
Target: 그 동맹 장군은 괴물이다. 고맙군, 병사. 우리는 죽은 자들을 평화롭게 쉬도록 해 줄 것이다.

Source: <The organization gathered enough supplies to offer you a Woodworker's Case as a reward. They also included a note of thanks.>\n\n"You have our thanks, crafter. These bows guarantee that we'll be able to keep the least among us safe."
Target: <The organization gathered enough supplies to offer you a Woodworker's Case as a reward. They also included a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"You have our thanks
column4: crafter. These bows guarantee that we'll be able to keep the least among us safe.\"\""

Source: <A battered case of woodworking supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"The other day I heard someone refer to our activities as illegal. I prefer to think of us as entrepreneurs. Still, let's keep this transaction to ourselves."
Target: <A battered case of woodworking supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n\\"The other day I heard someone refer to our activities as illegal. I prefer to think of us as entrepreneurs. Still
column4: let's keep this transaction to ourselves.\"\""

Source: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a case of Woodworking supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"Don't let this go to your head, but that was some damn fine work you provided. Take this with our thanks."
Target: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a case of Woodworking supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Don't let this go to your head
column4: but that was some damn fine work you provided. Take this with our thanks.\"\""

Source: <A decrepit case of woodworking supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n"Your wonderful work has made our job in Coldharbour easier than we imagined. Accept these supplies we commandeered as compensation for your efforts."
Target: <A decrepit case of woodworking supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n\\"Your wonderful work has made our job in Coldharbour easier than we imagined. Accept these supplies we commandeered as compensation for your efforts.\"\""

Source: <A case bearing the tag "Crossroads Profiteers" waits inside the box, a note attached to one side.>\n\n"You have a flair for woodworking, and we appreciate your craftsmanship. Take this with our thanks."
Target: <A case bearing the tag \\"Crossroads Profiteers\"\" waits inside the box
column4: a note attached to one side.>\n\n\"\"You have a flair for woodworking
column5: and we appreciate your craftsmanship. Take this with our thanks.\"\""

Source: <A Woodworker's Case from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n"Who knew the difference a quality shield could make in the Craglorn wilderness? The survivors send their thanks."
Target: <A Woodworker's Case from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n\\"Who knew the difference a quality shield could make in the Craglorn wilderness? The survivors send their thanks.\"\""

Source: Did you hear that a bunch of scholars and treasure-hunters were trapped in the Library of Dusk?
Target: Did you hear that a bunch of scholars and treasure-hunters were trapped in the Library of Dusk?

Source: Having him alive might have been useful, but having him dead is just as good.\n\nThe ritual items in the shack on the docks and his belongings might tell us something more.
Target: Having him alive might have been useful, but having him dead is just as good.\n\nThe ritual items in the shack on the docks and his belongings might tell us something more.

Source: This victory will propel the Pact to ever-greater heights. Soon all of Cyrodiil will lie beneath our feet!
Target: This victory will propel the Pact to ever-greater heights. Soon all of Cyrodiil will lie beneath our feet!

Source: There's a necromancer here, but I can't find him. He must be in the catacombs beneath the shrine. That's the only place that makes sense.
Target: 그곳엔 강령술사가 있지만, 어디 있는지는 모르겠네. 그는 성지 아래의 묘실에 있는게 틀립없어. 거기밖에 숨을 곳이 없으니.

Source: Your part in this great deed has been noted. The Pact's ascendancy is assured if our warriors face all challenges this boldly.
Target: Your part in this great deed has been noted. The Pact's ascendancy is assured if our warriors face all challenges this boldly.

Source: Now our foes fear the Pact army! Capturing the Elder Scroll of Altadoon serves notice that any task is within our power.
Target: Now our foes fear the Pact army! Capturing the Elder Scroll of Altadoon serves notice that any task is within our power.

Source: QUEST: Divide and Conquer
Target: 퀘스트: 분열과 정복

Source: We cannot rest upon this victory, however. Much more must be done if we are to conquer Cyrodiil.
Target: We cannot rest upon this victory, however. Much more must be done if we are to conquer Cyrodiil.

Source: Then by all means, let me have it.\n\nExcellent! The fort is back under our control, thanks to you. You've made quite a name for yourself amongst our soldiers, friend. Lieutenant Koruni, in particular, seems suitably impressed with your efforts.
Target: 그렇다면 전해줘.\n\n다행이야! 당신 덕분에 요새를 다시 되찾았어. 우리 병사들 사이에서 유명해 지고 있어. 특히 코루니 부대장은 당신의 일에 감탄하고 있는 것 같아.

Source: They're missing! We found <<1>>. We were escorting him home when we were ambushed.\n\nThe Goblins must have taken them both!
Target: They're missing! We found <<1>>. We were escorting him home when we were ambushed.\n\nThe Goblins must have taken them both!

Source: Shor's bones, traveler! Without your help, we'd be attending my son's funeral instead of celebrating a victory over the Goblins.
Target: Shor's bones, traveler! Without your help, we'd be attending my son's funeral instead of celebrating a victory over the Goblins.

Source: Recording your deeds here will be my first act as Sage of Fallowstone Hall. The Companions will recover from this setback. Vigrod and I will make sure of it.
Target: 여기에 당신의 행적을 기록하는 것이 황갈색비석 회관의 현자로서의 나의 첫번째 활동이 될 것입니다. 컴패니언은이 좌절로부터 회복 될 거에요.비그로드와 내가 반드시 그렇게 할 거에요.

Source: Did your eyes start bleeding recently? You didn't cough up any beetles, did you? Good, good … sounds like you avoided the curse.\n\nProbably.
Target: 최근에 눈에서 피가 나오진 않았겠지? 딱정벌레를 토해내지도 않았고? 좋아, 좋아... 네가 저주를 피한 모양이야.\n\n아마도.

Source: You're just in time. Our people are being slaughtered. General Balreth needs to prepare at the altar. We've got some dirty business ahead.\n\nIt's time to teach these savages what it means to cross the Chimer.
Target: You're just in time. Our people are being slaughtered. General Balreth needs to prepare at the altar. We've got some dirty business ahead.\n\nIt's time to teach these savages what it means to cross the Chimer.

Source: We still have plenty of work to do. Without reinforcements, these troops won't last long. And I'm sure Serien won't give up without a fight.\n\nThe real battle has just begun.
Target: We still have plenty of work to do. Without reinforcements, these troops won't last long. And I'm sure Serien won't give up without a fight.\n\nThe real battle has just begun.

Source: I never had a chance. They drugged us. Then the Hagraven came. Its breath on my face! It sucked out my eyes. I'll never see again.
Target: I never had a chance. They drugged us. Then the Hagraven came. Its breath on my face! It sucked out my eyes. I'll never see again.

Source: I heard that someone entered the Black Forge and shut it down. That should slow down the Dark Lord's plans!
Target: I heard that someone entered the Black Forge and shut it down. That should slow down the Dark Lord's plans!

Source: The Othrys use these animals to haul carts of sulfur to market, but they don't care about them like I do.\n\nWhether or not you care about the guar, you've helped them … and me. I think I owe you this.
Target: 오스리스 가족은 이 동물들을 유황이 실린 수레를 시장까지 운반하는 데 사용하지만, 그들은 저만큼 그들에게 신경쓰지 않습니다. \n\n당신이 구아들을 걱정했든 그렇지 않았든 간에, 당신은 그들과... 저를 도와주었습니다. 이 일에 대해 당신에게 빚을 졌군요.

Source: I'll keep it safe until you need it. You have my word as Thane of Fullhelm.\n\nIf not for you, we'd all be dead. It's a debt I can't repay, but you can start by keeping Bonebane. Use it like my grandfather did. Make these Worm Cult bastards bleed.
Target: I'll keep it safe until you need it. You have my word as Thane of Fullhelm.\n\nIf not for you, we'd all be dead. It's a debt I can't repay, but you can start by keeping Bonebane. Use it like my grandfather did. Make these Worm Cult bastards bleed.

Source: Right. He's mine to deal with, and I will. As for you, you saved my hall. I owe you.\n\nI want you to keep Bonebane, use it as I did. My adventuring days are over. As for this cursed shard, Hallfrida will keep it safe until you need it again.
Target: Right. He's mine to deal with, and I will. As for you, you saved my hall. I owe you.\n\nI want you to keep Bonebane, use it as I did. My adventuring days are over. As for this cursed shard, Hallfrida will keep it safe until you need it again.

Source: Did … did you notice that? Just now, as you handed me the silk. The sun shone through the clouds. Thank you. And look at Enthis over there. May he suffocate beneath a pile of mammoth dung.
Target: 아... 알아준 거야? 너가 비단을 줬을 때 구름 사이로 햇빛이 비쳤어. 고마워. 저기 엔티스를 봐봐. 저놈은 매머드 똥에 깔려 질식사해버렸으면 좋겠어.

Source: You … you're a hero to honest businessmen everywhere. I'll teach my children songs about you! Look at Turil glowering. I hope he gets a disease and drowns in his own fluids.
Target: 너는... 정직한 기업가의 영웅이야. 언젠가 아이들에게 너에 관한 노래를 가르쳐 주마! 튜릴의 화난 얼굴을 봐. 제 병에 걸려 나온 체액에 빠져 죽어버렸으면 좋겠군.

Source: <The Consortium set aside a case of Woodworker supplies as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"Such exquisite craftsmanship! Your woodwork is all the rage in our most-distant markets!"
Target: <The Consortium set aside a case of Woodworker supplies as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Such exquisite craftsmanship! Your woodwork is all the rage in our most-distant markets!\"\""

Source: So the <<z:1>> are in place? One of my clan mothers gets a cut for every one we use, so she'll be happy to hear it.\n\nAnd the locals around Shael Ruins, I suppose.
Target: 그래 <<z:1>>을 놓아두고 왔나? 우리가 사용한 것들은 전부 우리 부족 어머니들 중에 한 분께서 마련하신 것들이거든. 이 소식을 들으시면 기뻐하시겠어.\n\n쉘 유적 주변의 현지인들도 그럴 것 같고.

Source: <The Guild provided a case of woodworking supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n"Not many people realize that the Fighters Guild includes battle mages, and they appreciate the cut of your staves."
Target: <The Guild provided a case of woodworking supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Not many people realize that the Fighters Guild includes battle mages
column4: and they appreciate the cut of your staves.\"\""

Source: Praise the Eight! And praise be to you for your bravery at Torinaan.
Target: Praise the Eight! And praise be to you for your bravery at Torinaan.

Source: <The military provided a case of Woodworking supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"Our mages have grown very fond of the staves you provide. Keep up the good work!"
Target: <The military provided a case of Woodworking supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Our mages have grown very fond of the staves you provide. Keep up the good work!\"\""

Source: <The organization gathered enough supplies to offer you a Woodworker's Case as a reward. They also included a note of thanks.>\n\n"You'd be surprised how many Mages wind up displaced. Thanks for giving them the means to defend themselves."
Target: <The organization gathered enough supplies to offer you a Woodworker's Case as a reward. They also included a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"You'd be surprised how many Mages wind up displaced. Thanks for giving them the means to defend themselves.\"\""

Source: Good. The local bumpkins can return to calling it "Grandmother's Respite," or whatever fool name they used to give it.\n\nUntil the <<mz:1>> fail. And when they do, I'll have more work for you.
Target: Good. The local bumpkins can return to calling it "Grandmother's Respite," or whatever fool name they used to give it.\n\nUntil the <<mz:1>> fail. And when they do, I'll have more work for you.

Source: <A battered case of woodworking supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"We're so glad you accepted our contract. We get upset when people refuse our offers. Smart move."
Target: <A battered case of woodworking supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n\\"We're so glad you accepted our contract. We get upset when people refuse our offers. Smart move.\"\""

Target: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a case of supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Damn adventurers used to hire for all their protection needs. Now they want to do it themselves! At least we still get a cut from the supplies.\"\""

Source: Well, isn't that an impressive bag full of junk. It's amazing what people are willing to pay for trash these days.\n\nBut those Dark Elf siblings pay well. Here's your share.
Target: 음. 그 쓰레기로 가득한 가방이 인상적이진 않은데. 요즘엔 이런 쓰레기를 돈 주고 사려는 사람이 있다니 놀랍다니까.\n\n하지만 그 다크 엘프 남매는 값을 잘 쳐줬지. 여기 네 몫이야.

Source: <A decrepit case of woodworking supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n"Who said nothing good ever came from Coldharbour? Use these supplies as you see fit."
Target: <A decrepit case of woodworking supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n\\"Who said nothing good ever came from Coldharbour? Use these supplies as you see fit.\"\""

Source: <A Woodworker's Case from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n"Even the Star-Gazers are impressed by your craftsmanship, and those uppity scholars are rarely impressed by anything. Good job!"

Target: <A case bearing the tag \\"Crossroads Profiteers\"\" waits inside the box
column4: a note attached to one side.>\n\n\"\"Veteran explorers demand quality as well as quantity. You have surpassed our expectations on both counts.\"\""

Source: You saved the Queen! Stars keep you safe, traveler.
Target: You saved the Queen! Stars keep you safe, traveler.

Source: The traitor is dead, but that brings me no joy. I can only hope that Silent Mire will be left in peace once more.\n\nI'll return the branch to Leel-Vata. Take this, friend. It's not much, but it's what we can spare.
Target: 반역자는 죽었지만, 그렇다고 제게 기쁨을 가져다주진 않는군요. 침묵의 습지가 다시 한 번 평화롭게 지내기를.\n\nLeel-Vata에게 히스트의 나뭇가지를 반환할 겁니다. 이걸 가져가 주시길, 친구여. 많지는 않지만, 우리가 당신에게 보답할 방법인것 같습니다.

Source: Indeed. This is a great step toward Dominion control of Cyrodiil. But we must not get overconfident. There is much still to be done!
Target: Indeed. This is a great step toward Dominion control of Cyrodiil. But we must not get overconfident. There is much still to be done!

Source: I know. But still, it's so terrible. Whatever the source of this curse, you must find a way to end it.\n\nI will take Nahlia back to the main camp. Thank you for helping us.
Target: I know. But still, it's so terrible. Whatever the source of this curse, you must find a way to end it.\n\nI will take Nahlia back to the main camp. Thank you for helping us.

Source: As well they should. The glory of this deed lightens our hearts and strikes fear into our foes!
Target: As well they should. The glory of this deed lightens our hearts and strikes fear into our foes!

Source: This victory will be remembered as long as the Dominion stands. The wails of our enemies are music to my ears!
Target: This victory will be remembered as long as the Dominion stands. The wails of our enemies are music to my ears!

Source: <A coffer labeled "Crossroads Profiteers" waits inside the box, a note attached to one side.>\n\n"Veteran explorers deserve the very best, and your exquisite crafting matches their dedication and level of skill."
Target: <A coffer labeled \\"Crossroads Profiteers\"\" waits inside the box

Source: I suspect it will be a long time before the people of Elinhir trust mages again—and with good reason. The city is in ruins and it's our fault.\n\nI'll seal off the mage towers and help rebuild the city. If they'll let me, that is.
Target: I suspect it will be a long time before the people of Elinhir trust mages again—and with good reason. The city is in ruins and it's our fault.\n\nI'll seal off the mage towers and help rebuild the city. If they'll let me, that is.

Source: We are now one step closer to victory. Your part in its recovery will not be forgotten.
Target: We are now one step closer to victory. Your part in its recovery will not be forgotten.

Source: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a coffer of Enchantment supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"Sometimes it's hard to keep motivated, you know? When you folks fulfill these contracts I like to spark the glyphs together."

Source: With this Elder Scroll's power at our disposal and heroes like you on our side, we cannot fail.
Target: With this Elder Scroll's power at our disposal and heroes like you on our side, we cannot fail.

Source: <A cast-off coffer of supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n"Coldharbour is a strange place. Did you know banekin sometimes swallow runestones? Gross."
Target: <A cast-off coffer of supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n\\"Coldharbour is a strange place. Did you know banekin sometimes swallow runestones? Gross.\"\""

Source: I hope not, but we can never be too cautious. \n\nIn the meantime, I will take samples of the staff to the Mages Guild for study.
Target: I hope not, but we can never be too cautious. \n\nIn the meantime, I will take samples of the staff to the Mages Guild for study.

Source: Auri-El smiles upon our cause. And upon the brave warriors who foiled the schemes of our enemies.
Target: Auri-El smiles upon our cause. And upon the brave warriors who foiled the schemes of our enemies.

Source: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"We appreciate good work, tight lips, and prompt payment. Hope you feel the same way."
Target: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n\\"We appreciate good work

column5: and prompt payment. Hope you feel the same way.\"\""

Target: 퀘스트: 죽은자들을 치우기

Target: <The Consortium set aside a coffer of Enchantment goods as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"We're proud to represent your wares in foreign markets

Source: The Dwemer knew things you cannot even dream.\n\nHere is your reward: the Celestials are bound to this realm by their Apex stones. These stones were constructed using knowledge stolen from the Dwemer. To defeat the Celestials, you must find the stones.
Target: The Dwemer knew things you cannot even dream.\n\nHere is your reward: the Celestials are bound to this realm by their Apex stones. These stones were constructed using knowledge stolen from the Dwemer. To defeat the Celestials, you must find the stones.

Source: <The Guild has provided a coffer of Enchantment supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n"When the Daedra see us coming, we usually get crushed. Your little vials make the aftermath a little more bearable."

Source: I find this offering to be acceptable. Inside the gem, you can see the celestial bodies in their courses.\n\nThe text says the constellations are gods. They can be brought to earth using stones carved from Aetherium. Make of that what you will.

column4: 전쟁은 계속되고 있지만 오늘날 여러분의 노력으로 인해 조금 더 수월해졌습니다. 수고하셨습니다.\"\"\n"

Source: A death, and an unrequited love. Sentimental, and unimportant. \n\nBut you have fulfilled your part of the bargain, so here is mine: there is a man who can help you defeat the Anka-Ra. His name is Titus Valerius, but he is not of this time.

Source: <A coffer from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits at the bottom of the chest. A note's attached.>\n\n"Last week one of the enchantments obtained through a contract saved the life of a stupid, wet-behind-the-ears newcomer. Thanks."

Target: 들어보게. 내가 멍청하게 굴었던 건 알아. 하지만 고맙네. 우리가 그 아트로나크들을 소환했을 때, 그들이 크래글론에 등을 돌릴 거라고는 상상도 못했어.\n\n만약 내가 그 은혜에 보답할 수 있다면 알려주게.

Source: A friend said the kwama at Deepcrag Den got all riled up and attacked the miners.
