Source: It is an honor to lead this army. No challenge is too great for our warriors. I foresee the day when the Covenant banner flies over all of Cyrodiil!
Target: It is an honor to lead this army. No challenge is too great for our warriors. I foresee the day when the Covenant banner flies over all of Cyrodiil!

Source: That's good news. I've also had a slight change of plans.
Target: 좋은 소식이네요.저도 약간 계획을 변경하기로 했습니다.

Source: Nothing less is expected of our warriors. While gaining another Elder Scroll is a great victory, we must not relax. Press forward and continue to attack!
Target: Nothing less is expected of our warriors. While gaining another Elder Scroll is a great victory, we must not relax. Press forward and continue to attack!

Source: I can't believe she was so selfish and thoughtless. Maybe I'll send her to my mother's netch farm in Stonefalls. She'll hate that even more than Deepcrag.
Target: I can't believe she was so selfish and thoughtless. Maybe I'll send her to my mother's netch farm in Stonefalls. She'll hate that even more than Deepcrag.

Source: Yes, but our joy should be tempered by the thought of all that remains to be done. I count you among the Covenant heroes who will lead us to ever greater victories!
Target: Yes, but our joy should be tempered by the thought of all that remains to be done. I count you among the Covenant heroes who will lead us to ever greater victories!

Source: That's good news.\n\nI also heard from my associate, Naryu Virian. We may have finally gotten a few breaks in this sordid situation.
Target: 좋은 소식이네요.\n\n동료인 나류 비리안의 소식도 들었습니다. 우리는이 더러운 상황 속에서 마침내 약간의 휴식을 취할 수 있습니다.

Source: You came this far, did you not? Drink from the cauldron. Feel the witchmother's brew course through you!\n\nDo not delay, reaper. The harvest lasts only so long.
Target: 여기까지 오지 않았더냐? 가마솥에 든 것을 마셔라. 마녀어미의 혼합물이 네 몸에 흐르는 것을 느껴 보는 게다!\n\n지체하지 말거라, 수확자여. 수확은 오래 지속되지 않으니.

Source: I claim no credit for this great victory. All praise is due to the brave Covenant warriors who accomplished this deed.\n\nWith heroes like these in our armies, the other alliances will crumble before us!
Target: I claim no credit for this great victory. All praise is due to the brave Covenant warriors who accomplished this deed.\n\nWith heroes like these in our armies, the other alliances will crumble before us!

Source: <Alliance representatives have left a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The future of our alliance is carved from the runes of our enchanters. Many thanks."
Target: <Alliance representatives have left a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The future of our alliance is carved from the runes of our enchanters. Many thanks."

Source: <The consortium has supplied a coffer of rewards for your efforts, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n"The finest wares bring the best profit. Thank you for your excellent work."
Target: <The consortium has supplied a coffer of rewards for your efforts, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n"The finest wares bring the best profit. Thank you for your excellent work."

Source: The battle against the Scaled Court will continue, but this was the one place in Craglorn the Serpent could be contained. You accomplished wonders today.\n\nTuruk wanted me to give this to you. Don't worry—it's not diseased. I think.
Target: The battle against the Scaled Court will continue, but this was the one place in Craglorn the Serpent could be contained. You accomplished wonders today.\n\nTuruk wanted me to give this to you. Don't worry—it's not diseased. I think.

Source: What? Madras is going to get those people killed. They're farmers and peasants, not soldiers!\n\nI can't let them do this.
Target: 뭐라고요? 마드라스는 그 사람들 전부를 죽이고 말 것입니다.그들은 농부이지 병사가 아니에요!\n\n전 이걸 두고만 볼순 없어요.

Source: They'd better be. The scroll's return has greatly improved morale around here. Now we can turn our minds and swords to other matters!
Target: They'd better be. The scroll's return has greatly improved morale around here. Now we can turn our minds and swords to other matters!

Source: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"Your time is our coin, and we just love our coin. Keep up the good work, friend."
Target: <A battered coffer of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"Your time is our coin, and we just love our coin. Keep up the good work, friend."

Source: Well. I suppose we could wait for reinforcements. Mordra and Kailstig are out there. Somewhere. Or we could call the Fighter's Guild.\n\nThis is embarassing.
Target: Well. I suppose we could wait for reinforcements. Mordra and Kailstig are out there. Somewhere. Or we could call the Fighter's Guild.\n\nThis is embarassing.

Source: <The Fighters Guild has set aside a coffer and a note of thanks as a reward.> \n\n"The value of your work is measured in slain Daedra. Many thanks."
Target: <The Fighters Guild has set aside a coffer and a note of thanks as a reward.> \n\n"The value of your work is measured in slain Daedra. Many thanks."

Source: You are five-clawed, my friend. Milksop no longer, though it will not stop this one from naming you "Milksop."\n\nIt seems none among the captured live. A shame, but Turuk will think of them when he sheathes his sword with the belly of a beast.
Target: You are five-clawed, my friend. Milksop no longer, though it will not stop this one from naming you "Milksop."\n\nIt seems none among the captured live. A shame, but Turuk will think of them when he sheathes his sword with the belly of a beast.

Source: <A coffer of rewards has been set aside by the Mages Guild, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n"The enemy will not be defeated by brute force, but by wit and craft. Thank you for your work."
Target: <A coffer of rewards has been set aside by the Mages Guild, as well as a note of thanks.> \n\n\\"The enemy will not be defeated by brute force
column4: but by wit and craft. Thank you for your work.\"\""

Source: <The refugee organization has scrounged a coffer of rewards and left a note of thanks.> \n\n"Know that you have given more than material goods. You have given hope. Please accept our gratitude, what little it's worth."
Target: <The refugee organization has scrounged a coffer of rewards and left a note of thanks.> \n\n"Know that you have given more than material goods. You have given hope. Please accept our gratitude, what little it's worth."

Source: <The Dragonstar Trading Company has collected a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n"The stars themselves will not be able to stand against your workmanship. Thank you!"
Target: <The Dragonstar Trading Company has collected a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.> \n\n\\"The stars themselves will not be able to stand against your workmanship. Thank you!\"\""

Source: I don't know. I only know what the reports tell me.\n\nGiron probably took Ralden somewhere secluded, far from prying eyes.
Target: 그건 나도 모르네. 나는 보고 받는 부분만 알고 있네.\n\n아마도 기론은 랄든을 감시를 피할수 있는 외딴 곳으로 데려 갔겠지.

Source: Your choice satisfies me. Raston will serve the Ghost Snake well.\n\nYou have my thanks for your sage counsel.
Target: 너의 선택이 나를 만족시키는군. 라스턴은 유령 뱀을 섬길것이다.\n\n너의 현명한 조언에 내 감사를 드리지.

Source: Steal them.\n\nThe House Hlaalu armory has everything we need to launch a full assault. If you really want to help, that's what we need.
Target: 그들을 훔치십시오.\n\n할루 가문 병기고에는 총 공격을 시작하는 데 필요한 모든 것이 있습니다. 당신이 우릴 정말로 돕고 싶다면 그게 우리가 필요로하는 것입니다.

Source: <The Belkarth Quartermaster has set aside a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.>\n\n"You can rest assured your contribution will be put to good use. Accept my thanks!"
Target: <The Belkarth Quartermaster has set aside a rewards coffer and a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"You can rest assured your contribution will be put to good use. Accept my thanks!\"\""

Source: When you're ready to attack, just say the word.
Target: 준비가 되면 말씀해 주십시오.

Source: <A coffer labeled "Crossroads Profiteers" waits inside the box, a note attached to one side.> \n\n"As long as the war in Craglorn rages, your contributions are urgently needed … by our coin purses! Thanks!"
Target: <A coffer labeled \\"Crossroads Profiteers\"\" waits inside the box
column4: a note attached to one side.> \n\n\"\"As long as the war in Craglorn rages
column5: your contributions are urgently needed … by our coin purses! Thanks!\"\""

Source: And you didn't burn a part of yourself off in the process. I'd call that a success.\n\nWell done!
Target: 그리고 그 과정에서 몸을 태워먹지도 않았군. 난 그걸 성공이라고 부르지.\n\n잘 했어!

Source: Indeed. The ladies here sure kicked up a bit of a fuss. But we can put that behind us and I can make some gold. And the Mabrigash, too, of course.\n\nI'll make sure to mind my manners going forward. Wouldn't do to upset the Farseer again.
Target: 과연. 이곳의 여성들에게 약간의 소란을 피웠었지. 하지만 우리는 그것을 뒤로하고 나는 약간의 돈을 만들어낼 수 있지. 물론 마브리가쉬도 말이지. \n\n나는 앞으로 매너에 신경 쓸것이다. 예언자를 다시는 화내게 만들지 않을 것이다.

Source: Gather allies before you leave the city. You'll need loyal friends to face the armies of the Warrior, the Mage, and the Serpent.\n\nReturn to me each time you learn something new. I will use what you learn to devise a plan to defeat the Celestials.
Target: 도시를 떠나기전에 동료를 모으세요. 전사자리, 마법사자리 그리고 뱀자리의 군대와 맞설 수 있는 충직한 친구들이 필요할 겁니다.\n\n새로운 것을 알아낼 때마다 돌아와 주세요. 당신이 알아낸 것들로 천인들을 무찌를 계획을 세울 수 있을 겁니다.

Source: Restored the Apex Stone? Incredible! Then my predictions were more accurate than I expected and you've done more than I could have asked. \n\nI'll keep the amulet safe here among the Star-Gazers for now. There may be more we can learn from it.
Target: 향점석을 복원했다고요? 믿을 수 없군요! 그렇다면 제 예측은 생각한 것 보다 더 정확했었군요.  그리고 당신은 제가 부탁한 일 이상을 해주셨습니다!\n\n일단 부적은 별 응시자들이 안전하게 지키겠습니다. 그것으로부터 배울 수 있는 것이 더 있을 겁니다.

Source: Then perhaps you understand how delicious revenge can be. Every insult and every slight must be returned in kind.\n\nYou honor us, friend. Take this and kill any who may wrong you!
Target: 그렇다면 너는 달콤한 복수가 어떤지 이해할 수 있겠군. 모든 모욕은 같은 방법으로 돌려주어야 하지.\n\n너는 우리를 명예롭게 만들어줬군, 친구. 이걸 가지고 너에게 잘못하는 사람들은 누구라도 죽이길!

Source: I will continue my quest to find relics for my master and acquire the knowledge to defeat the Celestials.\n\nYou might do the same. If you find curious relics from Craglorn's lost history, bring them here and Hermaeus Mora will reward you.
Target: I will continue my quest to find relics for my master and acquire the knowledge to defeat the Celestials.\n\nYou might do the same. If you find curious relics from Craglorn's lost history, bring them here and Hermaeus Mora will reward you.

Source: There is still the matter of the Hist. The elders may be able to put it to sleep, but that mud is too deep for me.\n\nThe important thing is that our rampage was a success, right? Na-Kesh is dealt with and my egg-kin are free. Well done, friend.
Target: There is still the matter of the Hist. The elders may be able to put it to sleep, but that mud is too deep for me.\n\nThe important thing is that our rampage was a success, right? Na-Kesh is dealt with and my egg-kin are free. Well done, friend.

Source: See that Titus makes it to Belkarth. The Star-Gazers will give him refuge. I feel he may still have a part to play in our struggle.\n\nContinue to work with Hara of the Star-Gazers. I will reach out to you again when it is safe to do so.
Target: See that Titus makes it to Belkarth. The Star-Gazers will give him refuge. I feel he may still have a part to play in our struggle.\n\nContinue to work with Hara of the Star-Gazers. I will reach out to you again when it is safe to do so.

Source: At last. Although it does not end the suffering of my fellow Sword-Disciples, at least the Serpent's foul poison will spread no more.\n\nFor my part, I will wait here until it is safe to enter, bury the dead, and see if I can carry on their legacy.
Target: At last. Although it does not end the suffering of my fellow Sword-Disciples, at least the Serpent's foul poison will spread no more.\n\nFor my part, I will wait here until it is safe to enter, bury the dead, and see if I can carry on their legacy.

Source: The Reachmen are off-guard. Something's gone wrong with their plans, it seems.
Target: 리치맨은 무방비 상태입니다. 그들의 계획에 뭔가 문제가 생긴 것 같아요.\n

Source: What mad sorcery. Better that she's gone and the water cleansed.\n\nThank you for this. Maybe this will give us a chance to do proper research and find out what really happened to this city.
Target: What mad sorcery. Better that she's gone and the water cleansed.\n\nThank you for this. Maybe this will give us a chance to do proper research and find out what really happened to this city.

Source: They say the queen herself killed Duke Renchant. Good for her!
Target: 그들은 여왕 자신이 렌찬트 공작을 죽였다고 말합니다. 잘 됐네요!\n

Source: Now that the Elder Scroll of Ni-Mohk is safely back in its temple, we can move forward with our conquest of Cyrodiil!
Target: Now that the Elder Scroll of Ni-Mohk is safely back in its temple, we can move forward with our conquest of Cyrodiil!

Source: The temple appears as a nest disturbed. The Dark Elves swarm around it, seeming to busy themselves but accomplishing nothing.
Target: The temple appears as a nest disturbed. The Dark Elves swarm around it, seeming to busy themselves but accomplishing nothing.

Source: I closed the Daedric portals.
Target: 데이드릭 포탈을 닫았다.

Source: I've returned from my vision of the past. I saw firsthand the desperation that pushed the Chimer into creating the Brothers of Strife.
Target: I've returned from my vision of the past. I saw firsthand the desperation that pushed the Chimer into creating the Brothers of Strife.

Source: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.
Target: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.

Source: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.
Target: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.

Source: Is it true the Impervious Vault was robbed? I did not deem that possible!
Target: 불가침의 금고가 침입당했다는 것이 사실인가? 그게 가능할 거라고는 생각도 못했는데!

Source: The Covenant is occupying volcanic sulfur pools outside Omaynia. I rescued the various members of the Othrys family.
Target: The Covenant is occupying volcanic sulfur pools outside Omaynia. I rescued the various members of the Othrys family.

Source: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.
Target: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.

Source: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.
Target: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.

Source: My message?
Target: 제 소식이요?

Source: The Dark Elves' Saint Veloth, his spirit apparently lingers at his shrine. I find that rather disturbing.
Target: The Dark Elves' Saint Veloth, his spirit apparently lingers at his shrine. I find that rather disturbing.

Source: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.
Target: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.

Source: S'rendarr's salty tears, yes! This sanctuary is safe again. Someone will still need to strong-arm these smugglers into shoving off, but Moonlit Cove will survive.\n\nTake this as Shazar's show of support! May Jone and Jode shower you with succor.
Target: S'rendarr's salty tears, yes! This sanctuary is safe again. Someone will still need to strong-arm these smugglers into shoving off, but Moonlit Cove will survive.\n\nTake this as Shazar's show of support! May Jone and Jode shower you with succor.

Source: I came to speak with you about High Kinlady Estre and the Veiled Heritance.
Target: 저는 고위 혈족부인 에스트리와 베일의 계승단에 대해 나눌 말이 있어 온겁니다.

Source: The Battlereeve said you're looking into a Veiled Heritance connection here?
Target: 전투행정관이 그러는데 여기서 베일의 계승단의 연결고리를 찾고 있다면서요?

Source: I found this near the ruins in Mist Morrow Vale.
Target: I found this near the ruins in Mist Morrow Vale.

Source: You have saved many lives by ending Vox's threat. What you did was good and right.
Target: 복스의 공포에 종지부를 찍고, 많은 생명을 구해냈어요. 당신이 해 준 일은 좋은 일이고 옳은 일이었습니다.

Source: Ulov is dead.
Target: Ulov는 죽었다.

Source: I was told to report to you.
Target: I was told to report to you.

Source: Is there nothing else to learn?
Target: Is there nothing else to learn?

Source: That's a shield? Hmm, hand it over. Hey, this didn't hold up so bad. Yeah, there's Akaviri engravings on it. Bet it'll clean up real good.\n\nHere's your gold. I'll yell when I got more work for you.
Target: That's a shield? Hmm, hand it over. Hey, this didn't hold up so bad. Yeah, there's Akaviri engravings on it. Bet it'll clean up real good.\n\nHere's your gold. I'll yell when I got more work for you.

Source: I saw him return to life but couldn't stop it. What now?
Target: 그가 되살아나는 걸 봤지만 멈추지 못했습니다. 지금은 어떻죠?\n

Source: Bebbia looks forward to it. Rest assured, her gratitude knows no bounds. And the Khajiiti people, as well. Every tapestry fragment you find restores a little more of our history.\n\nThank you so much, my friend.
Target: Bebbia looks forward to it. Rest assured, her gratitude knows no bounds. And the Khajiiti people, as well. Every tapestry fragment you find restores a little more of our history.\n\nThank you so much, my friend.

Source: To be the last Kothringi...such a lonely thing. You must visit Drillk, now and again.
Target: To be the last Kothringi...such a lonely thing. You must visit Drillk, now and again.

Source: Everything got hazy. And then I saw a mammoth … being chased by a cat.
Target: 모든 것이 흐릿 해져가는군. 그리고 나는 맘모스를 보았는데.... 고양이에게 쫓기고 있었네.\n

Source: I'm sorry, but I didn't learn the performance.
Target: 미안하지만 뭘해야하는지 배우지 못했어.

Source: I'm here to help. The Companions sent me.
Target: 도우러 왔네. the Companions이 날 보냈어.

Source: Sheogorath put me through another trial. But I have the third book.
Target: 쉐오고라스가 내게 새로운 시련을 주었죠. 하지만 세번째 책을 찾아왔어요.

Source: I arrived at Fullhelm Fort to find it facing imminent attack by the undead. Worse, the Thane's granddaughter suspects that their Housecarl is himself a necromancer.
Target: I arrived at Fullhelm Fort to find it facing imminent attack by the undead. Worse, the Thane's granddaughter suspects that their Housecarl is himself a necromancer.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군.

Source: The Fang <<1>> took strongly affected him. He survived … but barely.
Target: The Fang <<1>> took strongly affected him. He survived … but barely.

Source: I heard you helped the soldiers camped at the Redoubt. Thank you for that.
Target: I heard you helped the soldiers camped at the Redoubt. Thank you for that.

Source: Old Hjurring's been spreading tales of how you defeated Malana. Very impressive!
Target: Old Hjurring's been spreading tales of how you defeated Malana. Very impressive!

Source: Excellent. I'll meet with him and his crew to discuss the particulars.\n\nFor aiding me in the establishment of our new Dragonguard, accept this reward. Oh, and talk to Nahfahlaar when you have a moment. He requested your help with a small matter.
Target: Excellent. I'll meet with him and his crew to discuss the particulars.\n\nFor aiding me in the establishment of our new Dragonguard, accept this reward. Oh, and talk to Nahfahlaar when you have a moment. He requested your help with a small matter.

Source: Returning Scouts: Post your reports on this board and take your reward.
Target: Returning Scouts: Post your reports on this board and take your reward.

Source: If you are returning from a scouting mission, post your report and accept your reward, with the Dominion's gratitude.\n\n- Gen. Thoron
Target: 정찰 임무를 마치고 돌아오면, 보고서를 게시 한 후 자치령의 감사와 보상을 수령하십시오.\n\n-젠, 쏘론

Source: Same as always, I guess. Keep wandering. Keep working. Sword arm's healing up. I wager there's plenty of gold around here for a thick-headed Orc.\n\nPleasure working with you, pal. Let's do this again some time. Just without the kidnapping bit. Ha!
Target: Same as always, I guess. Keep wandering. Keep working. Sword arm's healing up. I wager there's plenty of gold around here for a thick-headed Orc.\n\nPleasure working with you, pal. Let's do this again some time. Just without the kidnapping bit. Ha!

Source: <<1>>'s soul has been sealed within Treehenge, joined with the other matrons.
Target: <<1>>의 영혼이 트리헨지에 봉인되었고, 다른 귀부인들과 합류했다.

Source: I found his body and this necklace.
Target: 그의 시체에서 이 목걸이를 찾았다.

Source: Your long debate has been decided.
Target: 그 오랜 논쟁이 종결되었네요.

Source: Your long debate has been decided.
Target: 그 오랜 논쟁이 종결되었네요.

Source: I will.
Target: 그럴게요.

Source: I did what I could.
Target: 할 수 있었던 일을 한 겁니다.

Source: The Seneschal said I should speak with you … Your Grace.
Target: 집사가 당신과 이야기 해도 된다고 하였습니다 … 전하.

Source: Glad to hear Camlorn is safe again. I imagine that it will take years to rebuild it, however.
Target: 캠론이 다시 안전하다니 기뻐. 하지만 캠론을 다시 재건하려면 몇 년이 걸리겠지.

Source: I gave Marq his brew and he left the Goblin camp.
Target: 나는 마르크에게 양조주를 줬고 그는 고블린 캠프를 떠났어.

Source: <<1>> fears for the survival of the Hist Tree the Argonians transplated from Black Marsh to Ebonheart. He thinks the Dunmer of House Dres poisoned it, so he wants to fertilize it to encourage its growth.
Target: <<1>> fears for the survival of the Hist Tree the Argonians transplated from Black Marsh to Ebonheart. He thinks the Dunmer of House Dres poisoned it, so he wants to fertilize it to encourage its growth.

Source: I have the shards.
Target: 난 이 조각을 가지고 있네.

Source: I found the five shards.
Target: 조각 다섯 개를 찾았습니다.

Source: Yes, here they are.
Target: 그래, 여기 그것들이 있어.

Source: Uh, yes. Here are the crystals. I guess.
Target: 어,, 그래, 여기 크리스탈이 있을거야 내 생각엔.

Source: The Seneschal said I should speak with you … Your Grace.
Target: 집사가 당신과 이야기 해도 된다고 하였습니다 … 전하.

Source: I should really get some sleep, but with all that's happened I don't know how I could manage it. Secrets from my mother's past, a father I never knew …. It's a lot to take in.\n\nIn any event, thank you so much for all your efforts. Eight bless you.
Target: I should really get some sleep, but with all that's happened I don't know how I could manage it. Secrets from my mother's past, a father I never knew …. It's a lot to take in.\n\nIn any event, thank you so much for all your efforts. Eight bless you.

Source: Sir Hughes was once a good man, but killing Duchess Lakana could not be forgiven.
Target: Sir Hughes was once a good man, but killing Duchess Lakana could not be forgiven.

Source: The cultists imbue the Reachmen with dark powers. Stral is at the ruin.
Target: 추종자들이 리치맨들을 어둠의 힘으로 채웠습니다. 스트랄은 유적에 있습니다.

Source: You really gave those graverobbers what for! I bet they'll tell stories about you for a long time—the few that survived, I mean.\n\nHere's your key. Well done.
Target: 너 정말 뭐 때문에 도굴꾼들에게 준거야! 나는 그들이 오랫동안 너에대해 얘기할거라 장담해. 내말은, 살아남았던 몇 안되는 사람들말야.\n\n여기 네 열쇠. 잘했어.

Source: The Covenant has landed in force, that's what's the word. The leadership of our forces, and theirs, have gone mad. The Dark Elves love these land coral growths, I know, but … what are we doing here?
Target: The Covenant has landed in force, that's what's the word. The leadership of our forces, and theirs, have gone mad. The Dark Elves love these land coral growths, I know, but … what are we doing here?

Source: Ah, excellent! Welcome to Ash Mountain! Mind the lava, now. Hah!
Target: Ah, excellent! Welcome to Ash Mountain! Mind the lava, now. Hah!

Source: These don't look like my shoes. Mine had tassles here and a tear there. And more buckles. My shoes definitely have more buckles.\n\nBut thank you for finding my wife's mace. I wish I could have been there with you when you took down that Hagraven.
Target: These don't look like my shoes. Mine had tassles here and a tear there. And more buckles. My shoes definitely have more buckles.\n\nBut thank you for finding my wife's mace. I wish I could have been there with you when you took down that Hagraven.

Source: So you did! And just look at them. Majestic, eh? These would look splendid on my shelf next to all those other books I never bothered to read. Alas, they're not mine to keep. I will deliver them to my client straight away.\n\nAnd now, your reward!
Target: So you did! And just look at them. Majestic, eh? These would look splendid on my shelf next to all those other books I never bothered to read. Alas, they're not mine to keep. I will deliver them to my client straight away.\n\nAnd now, your reward!

Source: Thank you for this. That's it, then. Stonefalls holds nothing for me now. I'll set out for Deshaan presently. Perhaps I'll see you down the road.
Target: 고마워... 이제 됐어. 스톤폴즈는 이제 아무런 의미도 없어. 이제 데샨으로 떠나야지. 언젠가 길에서 또 만날 수도 있을 거야.

Source: Truer words were never spoken.
Target: 입 밖으로 꺼낸 적은 없지만 그건 사실이다.

Source: A smart woman. Seems I'll never be free of my debt to her. Hah!
Target: A smart woman. Seems I'll never be free of my debt to her. Hah!

Source: I found these books around the island.
Target: 섬 주변에서 이 책들을 찾았다.

Source: Just good to see you all awake.
Target: 당신들 모두가 깨어나 있는걸 보니 좋군.

Source: Your family is safe, Gjakil.
Target: 갸킬, 당신 가족은 안전해요.

Source: I found this runestone in the Goblin camp, in the hand of a dead Nord.
Target: 고블린 캠프의 죽은 Nord의 손에서 이 룬스톤을 찾았다.

Source: What will happen to the refugees now?
Target: 피난민들에게 무슨 일들이 일어날거지?

Source: My friend Mordroc told me you saved him from being a monkey. Crazy talk!
Target: My friend Mordroc told me you saved him from being a monkey. Crazy talk!

Source: I'm just glad I was able to get some of your people out.
Target: 네 사람들 중 일부를 데려 올 수있어서 기쁘다.\n

Source: A wise choice, walker! Very wise indeed. Please, speak to any of my friends here. They will get you started on the path to coin and adventure!\n\nAh, Tsaraba almost forgot! Take this small retainer. To whet the appetite, yes? Ha! Farewell!
Target: A wise choice, walker! Very wise indeed. Please, speak to any of my friends here. They will get you started on the path to coin and adventure!\n\nAh, Tsaraba almost forgot! Take this small retainer. To whet the appetite, yes? Ha! Farewell!

Source: Well done. Although, come to think of it, I can't stand rice either. It feels like little maggots in my mouth. Maybe it's just the cook we have.\n\nAppreciate your help. Here's a little something for the effort.
Target: Well done. Although, come to think of it, I can't stand rice either. It feels like little maggots in my mouth. Maybe it's just the cook we have.\n\nAppreciate your help. Here's a little something for the effort.

Source: Those crafty bastards. Use the beastmen's own bugs to drive them out of the caves. Then the beasties raise havoc with the civilians. Crafted milk-drinking sots, they are.\n\nGood work. I'll be sure the General sees this.
Target: Those crafty bastards. Use the beastmen's own bugs to drive them out of the caves. Then the beasties raise havoc with the civilians. Crafted milk-drinking sots, they are.\n\nGood work. I'll be sure the General sees this.

Source: Huh. Springmint smells nice. Might want some for myself. Bet it soothes aches, and I've got plenty of those.\n\nAnyway, you helped our forces by gathering this stuff for the healers, so thanks. Here's your reward.
Target: Huh. Springmint smells nice. Might want some for myself. Bet it soothes aches, and I've got plenty of those.\n\nAnyway, you helped our forces by gathering this stuff for the healers, so thanks. Here's your reward.

Source: Yes! Thank you, traveler. This means I'll get to keep my head. \n\nI think I've regained strength enough to make it back to Kragenmoor. I'll spare you the wrath of my captain and report the news myself. Three keep you!
Target: Yes! Thank you, traveler. This means I'll get to keep my head. \n\nI think I've regained strength enough to make it back to Kragenmoor. I'll spare you the wrath of my captain and report the news myself. Three keep you!

Source: I worked the Crosswych mines a while back. Glad to know the town is safe again.
Target: 난 얼마 전에 Crosswych 광산에서 일했었지. 마을이 다시 안전해져서 기뻐.

Source: The what with the … wards? All right, whatever you say traveler. I'll pass your word to one of our scouts. They'll find Walks-in-Ash and make sure she gets the message. Thanks for your service.
Target: The what with the … wards? All right, whatever you say traveler. I'll pass your word to one of our scouts. They'll find Walks-in-Ash and make sure she gets the message. Thanks for your service.

Source: Just in time. One of the mages came by to check on this. Claims this dust can reveal the past through visions if you drink it in a potion. I think the mage has already had too much to drink.\n\nThanks. Here's your reward.
Target: Just in time. One of the mages came by to check on this. Claims this dust can reveal the past through visions if you drink it in a potion. I think the mage has already had too much to drink.\n\nThanks. Here's your reward.

Source: By the hoary hosts of Auri-el, thank you. If I'd arrived in Kragenmoor empty-handed, I don't think it would have gone well for me.\n\nGo with the thanks of this humble trader, and his masters in the Darkvale Trading Coster.
Target:
아우리엘의 이름으로, 감사를 표한다. 내가 빈손으로 크라겐무어에 도착했다면, 그 일은 내게 잘 풀리지 않았을 거야. 

이 겸손한 상인과, 어둠계곡 무역 행상인의 상관들의 답례를 받게.

Source: I found Fullhelm Fort besieged by undead raised by the traitorious <<1>>. While I helped the garrison weather a final assault, Thorulf fled the scene. Fortunately, I was able to save the Thane from his manipulations.
Target: I found Fullhelm Fort besieged by undead raised by the traitorious <<1>>. While I helped the garrison weather a final assault, Thorulf fled the scene. Fortunately, I was able to save the Thane from his manipulations.

Source: All those prisoners in White Rose, driven mad. Sometimes you have to weigh the odds.
Target: 백장미 교도소에 있는 죄수들은 전부 미쳤다. 때로는 승산을 따져봐야 한다.

Source: A herd of guar stampeded during the Covenant attack on the sulfur pools. They were scattered throughout the area. I claimed them and sent them back home.
Target: 동맹이 유황 못을 습격하면서 구아의 무리가 공격당했다. 그들은 전 지역에 걸쳐 흩어져 있었다. 그들을 진정시키고 집으로 돌려 보내는데 성공했다.

Source: I found <<1>>. They've taken her eyes, but at least she's still alive.
Target: 나는 << 1 >>을 발견했다. 그들은 그녀의 눈을 가져갔지만, 적어도 그녀는 아직 살아 있습니다.\n

Source: I made an offering at the <<1>>
Target: I made an offering at the <<1>>

Source: I found Fullhelm Fort besieged by undead raised by the traitorious <<1>>. While I helped the garrison weather a final assault, Thorulf manipulated <<2>> into suicide. I Thorulf did not live long; I took a shard of Wuuthrad from his corpse.
Target: I found Fullhelm Fort besieged by undead raised by the traitorious <<1>>. While I helped the garrison weather a final assault, Thorulf manipulated <<2>> into suicide. I Thorulf did not live long; I took a shard of Wuuthrad from his corpse.

Source: I told him I could handle this, but Taarengrav is overrun with cultists. Perhaps with your help, we might have a chance to turn the tide.
Target: I told him I could handle this, but Taarengrav is overrun with cultists. Perhaps with your help, we might have a chance to turn the tide.

Source: Zhasim and Winks are going to become the traders they always knew they could be. I'm going to ask my uncle to let Maezi and me open a trade route between Orsinium and Senchal! If Maezi is willing, of course.\n\nHere, friend. For all your help. Thanks!
Target: Zhasim and Winks are going to become the traders they always knew they could be. I'm going to ask my uncle to let Maezi and me open a trade route between Orsinium and Senchal! If Maezi is willing, of course.\n\nHere, friend. For all your help. Thanks!

Source: Ah. Good. Then at least Holgunn knows there's a problem here. I will return and give him a full report as soon as I can.\n\nIn the meantime, if you're willing to help us against the Worm Cult here, talk to Netapatuu.
Target: Ah. Good. Then at least Holgunn knows there's a problem here. I will return and give him a full report as soon as I can.\n\nIn the meantime, if you're willing to help us against the Worm Cult here, talk to Netapatuu.

Source: Then welcome to the battle, friend!\n\nWe must strike back against these bastards now, before we lose our chance.
Target: Then welcome to the battle, friend!\n\nWe must strike back against these bastards now, before we lose our chance.

Source: Magistrix Vox did something terrible to the people of Selfora. Why is the Tribunal silent in the face of such atrocities?
Target: Magistrix Vox did something terrible to the people of Selfora. Why is the Tribunal silent in the face of such atrocities?

Source: How could you let those Imperial prisoners loose in Shadowfen? I bet they're up to no good.
Target: How could you let those Imperial prisoners loose in Shadowfen? I bet they're up to no good.

Source: Yes, I have them right here.
Target: 응 여기있어.

Source: Those witches didn't know what hit them. Taking out a whole coven and their allies is no mean feat. Here is your reward.
Target: 마녀들은 어떤것이 그들을 때린건지 몰라. 마녀회와 그들의 동맹국들을 통째로 끌어내린것은 상당한 공적이야. 여기 너의 보상이야.

Source: If the full might of the Icereach Coven wasn't enough to stop you then I'm not sure what will! Here's your key. You earned it.
Target: 아이스리치 마녀회의 진정한 힘이 그때 너를 멈추는데 충분하지 않았다면 나는 무슨일이 벌어질지 확신할수없어! 여기 너의 키야. 너는 받을자격이 돼.

Source: Well, I'm going to make my way back to Windhelm. If these hags and their sisters on the mainland really intend to make a play for Skyrim, the Skald-King needs to know.\n\nAs for you? I'd say get in out of the cold. And take this. You earned it.
Target: 글쎄, 나는 윈드헬름(Windhelm)으로 돌아갈거야. 만약 본토에 있는 노파와 그들의 자매들이 정말로 스카이림을 얻을려고 한다면, 스칼드 왕은 알아야 할 필요가 있어.\n\n너는? 내 생각에는 추위를피해 들어가야될것 같아. 그리고 이거 받아. 너는 받을 자격이 있어.

Source: Slaying witches like that is tough under the best circumstances. But when they're at their peak? I'd say it was impossible if you weren't standing here as living proof.\n\nWell done! Here's your key.
Target: 마녀들을 숙청하는것은 최고의 상황속에서도 힘든일이야. 그러나 그들이 전성기에 이르렀을 때? 살아돌아온 널 보니 그게 가능은 한거구나 라고 생각해. \n\n잘했어! 여기 너의 열쇠야.

Source: Well, I'm glad I'm no graverobber! To slay a whole mess of necromancers and their monsters while their leader's dander is up? Whoa. That takes real courage.\n\nHere's your key. You earned it!
Target: 글쎄, 나는 내가 도굴꾼이 아니라서 다행이야! 놈들의 수장이 열받아서 날뛰는 동안 네크로멘서와 그 괴물 얼간이들을 도륙하기 위해서인가? 와우. 그건 정말 용기가 필요해.\n\n여기 너의 열쇠야. 너의 노력으로 얻은 거야!

Source: A whole horde of graverobbers slain, and a bone monster banished? I'd say that more than earns you a key. Well done.
Target: 도굴꾼 전체 무리가 살해당했고 뼈다귀들이 추방당했다고? 나는 너가 열쇠를 얻은것보다 잘했다고 생각해. 잘했어.

Source: You are right, of course. Even at my best, I could not hope to match a foe like that. Let alone the creature he summoned or the patron who sent him here—whoever that is.\n\nThe Pyre Watch will always be in your debt, wayfarer. Tu'whacca bless you.
Target: 물론, 너의 말이 맞아. 아무리 열심히해도, 나는 저런 괴물같은 적과 맞설 수 있을것 같지가 않았어. 그가 소환한 괴물이나 그를 여기에 보낸 후원자는 말할것도 없어. 그게 누구든지 말이야.\n\nPyre Watch는 항상 신세를 질것이야. 여행자여 투와카의 축복이 있기를.

Source: Is there anything more I can do?
Target: 더 할 수 있는 일이 있나요?

Source: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.
Target: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.

Source: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.
Target: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.

Source: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.
Target: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.

Source: Safely returned to its home in Apocrypha. I would not risk you against its secrets.\n\nBut I will not leave you empty-handed.
Target: 안전하게 아포크리파의 집으로 돌아갔다. 그 비밀로 널 위험에 빠뜨리진 않을 것이야.\n\n하지만 널 빈손으로 떠나보내지도 않을 것이다.

Source: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.
Target: 시간을 투자할 가치가 있는 사람은 없어. 그리고 난 이제 어떻게든 이 3명을 채찍질해서 경비대로 만들어 놓을 거야.\n\n내가 신병들을 데리고 들어가면 장군의 코가 납작해지겠군. 물론, 난 장군에게 도움을 받았다고 말할 거야. 장군이 내게 이 임무를 다시 맡겼으면 싶진 않거든.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 할 건가요?

Source: QUEST: Thieving from Thieves
Target: 임무: 도둑들에게서 도둑질하기

Source: A battle won, but the war rages on. We must reach the Lightless Remnant and destroy it. But Montclair will grow more desperate the closer we get to that cursed relic.\n\nAre you ready, my friend? Once more into the breach?
Target: A battle won, but the war rages on. We must reach the Lightless Remnant and destroy it. But Montclair will grow more desperate the closer we get to that cursed relic.\n\nAre you ready, my friend? Once more into the breach?

Source: You've done my people a great service, friend. You may stay and learn the stories of these people with me, if you desire.
Target: 내 민족을 위해 커다란 공헌을 해 주셨소, 친구여. 원하신다면 여기 머물면서 이 사람들의 이야기를 들어도 좋소.

Source: I found this on a body.
Target: 이걸 시체에서 찾았는데요.

Source: QUEST: Aldcroft Manor
Target: 임무: 알드크로프트저택

Source: He's a tough one. And if he survives, maybe he'll stop griping about his postings.\n\nWe'll mop up the remaining Daedra and start rebuilding the outpost. Thanks to you, we won't have to fight a war on two fronts.
Target: 굳센 사람이로군요. 만약 그가 살아남는다면, 앞으로는 자기 신세 불평을 그만둘지도 모르겠습니다.\n\n저희는 남은 데이드라를 소탕하고 전초 기지를 복구하겠습니다. 당신 덕분에 양쪽에서 전쟁을 치를 걱정은 없겠군요.

Source: I've just come from Arenthia. The city is free, but the Mane ….
Target: 아렌시아에서 오는 길이에요. 도시는 해방됐지만, 메인이...

Source: Can you get a warning to Firsthold in time?
Target: 퍼스트홀드에 제 시간에 도착할 수 있을까요?

Source: I came to warn you of a Daedric attack, but it looks like I'm too late.
Target: 데이드라의 공격을 경고해주러 왔는데, 너무 늦은 것 같군요.

Source: I'll side with Angof the Undying.
Target: 죽지않는 앵고프와 함께 하겠어.

Source: You did? Excellent! I don't know what you said to him but I don't care. It's my duty to get new recruits and you helped me fulfill it. Thank you.\n\nI'll have the deputy release him and we'll get him whipped into shape in no time.
Target: You did? Excellent! I don't know what you said to him but I don't care. It's my duty to get new recruits and you helped me fulfill it. Thank you.\n\nI'll have the deputy release him and we'll get him whipped into shape in no time.

Source: You did? Excellent! I don't know what you said to him but I don't care. It's my duty to get new recruits and you helped me fulfill it. Thank you.\n\nI'll have the deputy release him and we'll get him whipped into shape in no time.
Target: You did? Excellent! I don't know what you said to him but I don't care. It's my duty to get new recruits and you helped me fulfill it. Thank you.\n\nI'll have the deputy release him and we'll get him whipped into shape in no time.

Source: QUEST: In Pursuit of Gargast
Target: 임무: 가르가스트를 쫓아서

Source: QUEST: A Crossroad
Target: 임무: 교차로

Source: You did? Well, I'll be an Argonian's aunt! I really didn't think you could pull that off.\n\nYou missed your calling, my friend. You should have been a recruiter. You can't seem to fail.
Target: 설득했다고? 음, 그럼 난 아고니안의 숙모가 되겠군! 네가 해낼 거라고 생각하지 못했거든.\n\n넌 길을 잘못 든 거야, 친구. 네가 모병관이 됐어야 해. 넌 실패할 것 같지 않거든.

Source: QUEST: A Crossroad
Target: 임무: 교차로

Source: You did? Excellent! I don't know what you said to him but I don't care. It's my duty to get new recruits and you helped me fulfill it. Thank you.\n\nI'll have the deputy release him and we'll get him whipped into shape in no time.
Target: 그래? 멋진 걸! 네가 마틴에게 뭐라고 말했는지 모르겠지만 상관 없어. 신병을 모집하는 건 내 의무였는데 네가 그걸 도와줬네. 고마워.\n\n보좌관에게 마틴을 풀어주라고 할게. 그리고 우린 마틴을 곧바로 채찍질해 사람으로 만들어 놓을 거야.

Source: <<1>> sent me to tell you that Munya is dead.
Target: <<1>> sent me to tell you that Munya is dead.

Source: You did? Excellent! I don't know what you said to him but I don't care. It's my duty to get new recruits and you helped me fulfill it. Thank you.\n\nI'll have the deputy release him and we'll get him whipped into shape in no time.
Target: You did? Excellent! I don't know what you said to him but I don't care. It's my duty to get new recruits and you helped me fulfill it. Thank you.\n\nI'll have the deputy release him and we'll get him whipped into shape in no time.

Source: Eneriell asked me to tell you she's on her way.
Target: 에네리엘이 여기로 오고 있다고 전해달라고 하더군요.

Source: Thank you for standing beside the Queen at Tanzelwil, traveler. Stars watch over you.
Target: Thank you for standing beside the Queen at Tanzelwil, traveler. Stars watch over you.

Source: Here's the skooma.
Target: 여기 스쿠마야.

Source: I hear the Duke's gone. Good riddance! I never did trust him.
Target: 듀크가 없어 졌다고 들었어. 좋은 속임수야! 나는 그를 신뢰하지 않았다.\n

Source: What happens now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 되는거죠?

Source: Blood is thicker than water. The queen's soft-hearted where her family's concerned, even when it's the Duke.
Target: Blood is thicker than water. The queen's soft-hearted where her family's concerned, even when it's the Duke.

Source: <<1>>? Long has it been since he crawled from the pool.\n\nSithis looks upon us with a hungry eye, but we yet draw breath. The time for stillness has not come.
Target: <<1>>? Long has it been since he crawled from the pool.\n\nSithis looks upon us with a hungry eye, but we yet draw breath. The time for stillness has not come.

Source: I came to warn him that the dead have risen at Tu'whacca's Throne.
Target: I came to warn him that the dead have risen at Tu'whacca's Throne.

Source: Thank you. I suppose it will do little to console young Rubyn, but at least we can give Lady Mondorie a proper funeral.\n\nI got my job back. The mayor's even increased my wages. You have my gratitude. By Mauloch, you have the whole town's gratitude.
Target: 고마워. 이게 어린 루빈을 조금은 위로해 줄 것 같아. 하지만 최소한 우린 레이디 몬도리를 위해 적절한 장례식을 치러줄 순 있겠지.\n\n난 내 일을 다시 되찾았어. 촌장은 심지어 내 봉급도 올려 줬지. 고마워. 말락에 의해, 마을 전체가 네게 고마워 할 거야.

Source: Your father's dead, and the Daedra Lord's banished. It was a sordid task, but it had to be done.
Target: 너의 아버지의 죽음과 데이드라 로드의 사라짐. 이것은 야비한 일이었지만 꼭 해야하는 일이었어.

Source: I see your father found you.
Target: 네 아버지를 찾길 바래.

Source: Your father's in the tower with the Daedra Lord. It's a long story.
Target: 너희 아버지는 데이드라 로드와 함께 탑에 있어. 얘기를 하자면 길어.

Source: Fa'ren-dar says I'm ready to start taking jobs. I should consult the tip board to see what's available.
Target: 파'렌-다르는 내가 일을 할 준비가 되었다고 말했다. 할 수 있는 것을 알아 보려면 정보 게시판을 봐야 한다.

Source: I'll side with Thallik of the Wormcult.
Target: 벌레 교단의 탈릭과 함께 하겠어.

Source: I'll side with Kinlady Estre.
Target: 혈족부인 에스트리와 함께 하겠어.

Source: He would not violate his oath.
Target: 에루노어는 맹세를 저버리지 않을 거에요.

Source: Here is the note, your debt is no longer due.
Target: Here is the note, your debt is no longer due.

Source: <<1>> had a crisis of faith. It appeared as though the Tribunal gods were ignoring the tribulations of Ebonheart. Messengers representing each of the Tribunal's leaders told me to assure him the Three were watching and had faith in him.
Target: <<1>>의 믿음에 위기가 왔다. 트라이뷰널 신들이 에본하트의 고난을 무시하는 것처럼 보였다. 각 트라이뷰널 신들의 전령들은 나에게 삼신이 그를 지켜보고 있고 그를 믿고 있다고 전하라고 했다.

Source: Thanks to you. The touch of a Daedric prince is enough to muddy any water. I look forward to working with Master Pircalmo. We could really use someone of his expertise. May the Green guide your steps.
Target: 감사드려요. 데이드릭 대공의 손길은 어떤 물이라도 진흙탕으로 만들 수 있죠. 빨리 퍼칼모 선생과 함께 일하고 싶어요. 그런 전문 기술이 정말 필요하니까요. 녹색께서 당신의 발걸음을 인도하시길.

Source: I can't believe I'll never see Nedras again … but he was so kind to me.\n\nAnd you! Thank you for telling me about my brother, and bringing me his gift. I'll never forget you.
Target: I can't believe I'll never see Nedras again … but he was so kind to me.\n\nAnd you! Thank you for telling me about my brother, and bringing me his gift. I'll never forget you.

Source: You found it! How wonderful! Oh, I missed my lute, F'lah, so much! Oh, thank you!\n\nI feel so happy. I think I want to play a song now. Oh, F'lah, let's make some beautiful music together!
Target: 찾으셨군요! 정말 멋져요! 아, 내 류트, 플라가 정말 그리웠답니다! 감사해요!\n\n정말 행복하네요. 지금 노래를 부르고 싶어요. 아, 플라. 함께 아름다운 음악을 만들어 보자꾸나!

Source: Pomp and circumstance are a necessary component of every ceremony. The masses demand it!\n\nBesides, I want to honor the Dragonguard's accomplishments, yours included. Take this reward and smile, five-claw. We are about to begin!
Target: Pomp and circumstance are a necessary component of every ceremony. The masses demand it!\n\nBesides, I want to honor the Dragonguard's accomplishments, yours included. Take this reward and smile, five-claw. We are about to begin!

Source: Wherever Sormund takes us, yes? After years of waking to the same nightmare, Daini could do with a surprise or two.\n\nSpeaking of nightmares, thank you for ridding Daini of hers. Knowing that Turo lies dead … it lightens the soul. Farewell, walker.
Target: Wherever Sormund takes us, yes? After years of waking to the same nightmare, Daini could do with a surprise or two.\n\nSpeaking of nightmares, thank you for ridding Daini of hers. Knowing that Turo lies dead … it lightens the soul. Farewell, walker.

Source: I'm sorry, Elanwe.
Target: 유감입니다, 엘란웨씨.

Source: What now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 되는거죠?

Source: By my honor, that's good to hear. With Ra'khajin slain and the mask in our possession, we're much closer to victory. And it's all because of your efforts.\n\nHere, take this. Another interesting item I found in the sanctum's vaults.
Target: By my honor, that's good to hear. With Ra'khajin slain and the mask in our possession, we're much closer to victory. And it's all because of your efforts.\n\nHere, take this. Another interesting item I found in the sanctum's vaults.

Source: Yes. I was never here.
Target: 네. 전 여기 없었던 겁니다.

Source: The Lieutenant is dead. He died protecting Velyn Harbor and its militia.
Target: 부관은 죽었다. 벨린항과 민병대를 지키다가 죽은 것이다.

Source: Only to say that, without you, none of this would have been possible. My father, my mother, <<1>>, maybe even Federic … we would all be dead, right now.\n\nIf you ever have need of a home … please. You will be welcome here.
Target: Only to say that, without you, none of this would have been possible. My father, my mother, <<1>>, maybe even Federic … we would all be dead, right now.\n\nIf you ever have need of a home … please. You will be welcome here.

Source: Only to say that, without you, none of this would have been possible. My father, my mother, <<1>>, maybe even Federic … we would all be dead, right now.\n\nIf you ever have need of a home … please. You will be welcome here.
Target: Only to say that, without you, none of this would have been possible. My father, my mother, <<1>>, maybe even Federic … we would all be dead, right now.\n\nIf you ever have need of a home … please. You will be welcome here.

Source: Of course. The Prowler's been sitting at dock too long. She's ready to pounce on that bastard Pelidil as soon as we catch him.\n\nAnd catch him soon we will—you have the captain's word on it!
Target: 당연하지. 부랑자호는 부두에 너무 오래 앉아 있었어. 내 배는 우리가 놈을 따라잡자 마자 그 개같은 펠리딜을 덮칠 준비가 되었다고.\n\n그리고 우린 곧 놈을 잡을 거야. 선장의 말을 믿어도 좋아!

Source: I've arrived at Fort Vivak.
Target: I've arrived at Fort Vivak.

Source: What about the Welkynars?
Target: What about the Welkynars?

Source: What about the Welkynars?
Target: What about the Welkynars?

Source: What about the Welkynars?
Target: What about the Welkynars?

Source: That's more like it. Has to be far more interesting than interpreting fifty-six poses of katana kata. Next time bring a katana. Least then I can try them out.\n\nHere's your pay.
Target: That's more like it. Has to be far more interesting than interpreting fifty-six poses of katana kata. Next time bring a katana. Least then I can try them out.\n\nHere's your pay.

Source: Wonder of wonders! Her ring shows you speak the truth. And these are the stolen gems? They will prove her innocence!\n\nI can bury my wife with honor beside our family! This is more than I ever hoped! Thank you. Thank you so much!
Target: 정말 놀랍군요! 그녀의 반지가 당신이 진실을 말했음을 증명하네요. 그리고 이것들이 도둑맞은 보석입니까? 이것으로 그녀의 결백을 증명할  수 있어요!\n\n저는 우리 가족 옆에 명예롭게 아내를 묻을 수 있게 됐습니다! 제가 바라던 것 이상이에요! 고맙습니다. 정말 고맙습니다!

Source: Here's the treasure chest.
Target: Here's the treasure chest.

Source: Not yet. We defeated Laatvulon, but I sense another power lurking in Elsweyr. Something dark that threatens to disrupt my father's order. When the time comes for you to face it, I shall aid you. I give you my word.\n\nAnd keep the mask. It suits you.
Target: Not yet. We defeated Laatvulon, but I sense another power lurking in Elsweyr. Something dark that threatens to disrupt my father's order. When the time comes for you to face it, I shall aid you. I give you my word.\n\nAnd keep the mask. It suits you.

Source: I have the chain from Z'Maja's amulet.
Target: I have the chain from Z'Maja's amulet.

Source: I have Z'Maja's amulet, though it's severely damaged.
Target: I have Z'Maja's amulet, though it's severely damaged.

Source: There's a safe haven to the west. The Hollow City.
Target: 서쪽에 안전한 장소가 있어. 공허한 도시라고 불리는 곳이지.

Source: I have a delivery for you.
Target: I have a delivery for you.

Source: I have Z'Maja's amulet, though it's severely damaged.
Target: I have Z'Maja's amulet, though it's severely damaged.

Source: I helped <<1>> decide the fate of the Argonian tribe. I should speak with her.
Target: <<1>>이 아르고니안 부족의 운명을 결정하는 것을 도왔다. 그녀와 대화해야 한다.

Source: <<1>> died of poison.
Target: <<1>> died of poison.

Source: Enter Castle Vault
Target: Enter Castle Vault

Source: You don't have to give me a present.
Target: 너는 나에게 선물을 줄 필요가 없다.\n

Source: Only to say that, without you, none of this would have been possible. My father, my mother, <<1>>, maybe even Federic … we would all be dead, right now.\n\nIf you ever have need of a home … please. You will be welcome here.
Target: Only to say that, without you, none of this would have been possible. My father, my mother, <<1>>, maybe even Federic … we would all be dead, right now.\n\nIf you ever have need of a home … please. You will be welcome here.

Source: Yes. What's next?
Target: Yes. What's next?

Source: I'll lead any villagers that wish to join me to the Hollow City. A few may decide to remain here, where it's familiar, but that's up to them.\n\nI don't know if I'll ever forgive my father. He can remain here and help anyone who wanders in.
Target: 저와 같이 공허한 도시에 가겠다는 사람들을 데려갈게요. 몇명은 친숙한 이곳에 남겠다고 할 지도 모르지만, 그건 본인들 선택이죠.\n\n제가 아버지를 용서할 수 있을지 모르겠어요. 여기에 남으셔서 헤매는 사람을 도울 수도 있겠죠.

Source: How did she take the news?
Target: How did she take the news?

Source: Only to say that, without you, none of this would have been possible. My father, my mother, <<1>>, maybe even Federic … we would all be dead, right now.\n\nIf you ever have need of a home … please. You will be welcome here.
Target: Only to say that, without you, none of this would have been possible. My father, my mother, <<1>>, maybe even Federic … we would all be dead, right now.\n\nIf you ever have need of a home … please. You will be welcome here.

Source: Is there anything I can do to help?
Target: 제가 도울 수 있는 일이 있을까요?

Source: Aren't you the Champion of Windhelm? The one that stopped Fildgor Orcthane?
Target: Aren't you the Champion of Windhelm? The one that stopped Fildgor Orcthane?

Source: Feyne will be happier in Narsis.
Target: Feyne는 나르시스에서 더 행복해 할 것입니다.

Source: Here's what I was able to find.
Target: 이것이 내가 찾을 수 있는 것이었어.

Source: So the Chasm is clear?
Target: 그래서 균열은 안전한겁니까?

Source: End
Target: End

Source: The Covenant landed west of Ebonheart. The Nord sawyers outside town refused to join the general defense until I proved the rest of the Pact can drink and brawl as well as any Nord.
Target: The Covenant landed west of Ebonheart. The Nord sawyers outside town refused to join the general defense until I proved the rest of the Pact can drink and brawl as well as any Nord.

Source: Your students passed their tests.
Target: 너의 제자들은 그들의 시험을 통과했다.

Source: You are strong to do this Bakkhara.
Target: You are strong to do this Bakkhara.

Source: Then we need to stop her.
Target: Then we need to stop her.

Source: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.
Target: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.

Source: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.
Target: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.

Source: We will go to the Hollow City. Some of the villagers may decide to stay here, where it's familiar, but that will be their choice.  \n\nI grieve for the lost, but it's not in a Nord's nature to just give up. Thank you for helping us.
Target: 저희는 공허한 도시로 갈 거에요. 마을 사람들 몇명은 친숙한 여기에 남을지도 모르지만, 그건 본인들 선택이죠.\n\n상실감 때문에 슬프지만, 그냥 포기하는 건 노드의 본성이 아니죠. 저희를 도와줘서 고마워요.

Source: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.
Target: None that are worth our time, and I'll have my hands full whipping these three into shape anyhow.\n\nThe general's jaw's going to hit the dirt when I march them in. I'll tell him I had help, of course. I don't want him assigning me this duty again.

Source: Restored the Apex Stone? Incredible! Then my predictions were more accurate than I expected and you've done more than I could have asked. \n\nI'll keep the amulet safe here among the Star-Gazers for now. There may be more we can learn from it.
Target: Restored the Apex Stone? Incredible! Then my predictions were more accurate than I expected and you've done more than I could have asked. \n\nI'll keep the amulet safe here among the Star-Gazers for now. There may be more we can learn from it.

Source: That's good to hear. What's next?
Target: That's good to hear. What's next?

Source: So I need to place more Psijic Seals to discover the remaining fragments?
Target: So I need to place more Psijic Seals to discover the remaining fragments?

Source: <The military provided a crate of Blacksmith supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"Your work to support the war effort does you proud. And we imagine that more than one soldier enjoys both the style and effectiveness of your designs."
Target: <The military provided a crate of Blacksmith supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Your work to support the war effort does you proud. And we imagine that more than one soldier enjoys both the style and effectiveness of your designs.\"\""

Source: <The Consortium set aside a crate of Blacksmith supplies as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"Good work, friend smith! Your skill at working metal does you proud. We look forward to dealing with you again."
Target: <The Consortium set aside a crate of Blacksmith supplies as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Good work

Source: <A battered crate of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"You were never here. We were never here. Let's never mention this again. Thanks."
Target: <A battered crate of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n\\"You were never here. We were never here. Let's never mention this again. Thanks.\"\""

column4: we can give them a proper one!\"\""

Source: <A cast-off crate of supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n"Found these in the ruins of a Daedric camp. Your efforts keep us focused on this little corner of Oblivion."
Target: <A cast-off crate of supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the lid.>\n\n\\"Found these in the ruins of a Daedric camp. Your efforts keep us focused on this little corner of Oblivion.\"\""

Target: <The organization gathered enough supplies to offer you a crate as a reward. They also included a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"You have our thanks

Source: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a crate of Blacksmith supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"Damned adventurers would be better off hiring us than doing it all themselves! They have a fighting chance thanks to your efforts."
Target: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a crate of Blacksmith supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Damned adventurers would be better off hiring us than doing it all themselves! They have a fighting chance thanks to your efforts.\"\""

Source: Khanni thanks you for saving her soul from that prison. No treasure can repay you for my freedom.
Target: 칸니는 그녀의 영혼을 감옥에서 꺼내주셔서 감사드려요. 어떤 보물로도 제 자유에 대한 보답을 못 해드릴 거에요.

Source: Death was a just punishment for my crimes. The <<1>> released my spirit when that barrier fell.\n\nThe Worm Cult failed to summon Mauloch, thanks to you. And now, I am free. Safe journeys, my friend!
Target: 죽음은 내가 저지른 죄에 대한 처벌일 뿐이었어요. 장벽이 깨졌을 때 <<1>>이 내 영혼을 내보냈고요.\n\n당신 덕분에 벌레 교단이 말락을 소환해내지 못했잖아요. 그리고 이제 난 자유에요. 안전한 여행 되시길, 친구!

Source: And I spoke to Prince Irnskar. He agrees that he might have been a little arrogant. Especially when I told him what you discovered.\n\nMaybe now we can all get back to the business at hand instead of just throwing insults at each other.
Target: 이른스카 왕자와 이야기했다. 조금 건방진 편이었는지도 모른다고 인정했다. 특히 네가 한 일에 대해 얘기할 때에.\n\n이것으로 모든 사람들은 서로를 비난하는 대신 다시 해야할 일로 돌아갈 것이다.

Source: So what happens now?
Target: So what happens now?

Source: I completed the Snow Bear Plunge.
Target: 설원 곰 다이빙을 완수했습니다.

Source: <A crate from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n"Thanks for keeping the new arrivals stocked. Good luck to you."
Target: <A crate from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n\\"Thanks for keeping the new arrivals stocked. Good luck to you.\"\""

Source: I will enter the city and find a safe place to store the Egg. Then I will enjoy the celebration.\n\nThe Nords know how to keep the cold at bay. It's my favorite thing about them.
Target: 도시에 들어가서 알들을 보관하기 안전한 장소를 찾을 거예요. 그리고나서 축하행사를 즐겨야죠. \n\n이 Nord들은 추위를 막는 방법을 잘 알고 있어요. 그게 내가 Nord들의 가장좋아하는 부분이죠.

Source: <The military provided a crate of Blacksmith supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"You demonstrate honor and display a powerful sense of duty by completing this order in a timely fashion to support our troops. Thanks."
Target: <The military provided a crate of Blacksmith supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"You demonstrate honor and display a powerful sense of duty by completing this order in a timely fashion to support our troops. Thanks.\"\""

Source: So what happens now?

Source: I heard of your victory over the Reachmage - well done.  I could use your help.\n\nKing Fahara'jad, ruler of the Nine Crowns, sent me to find Lord Ranser's murderer.  Relations between Shornhelm and Northmoor hang on the expedience of my investigation
Target: 그대가 리치마법사를 이겼다는 소식을 들었네. 잘했군. 조금 더 도와줄 수 있겠지.\n\n아홉 왕관의 지배자 파하라자드 왕께서 내게 랜서경을 살해한 범인을 잡으라 명하셨네. 숀헬름과 노스무어의 관계가 내 수사 결과에 달려 있지.

Source: Well, if there's one thing I know, it's that you, my friend, have done your duty here, and then some. You covered the behinds of all the cowards who abandoned the place.\n\nThe Covenant needs more people like you. I mean that.
Target: Well, if there's one thing I know, it's that you, my friend, have done your duty here, and then some. You covered the behinds of all the cowards who abandoned the place.\n\nThe Covenant needs more people like you. I mean that.

Target: 알리키어 사막에서 유물을 찾았습니다.

Source: That's the deed all right. I didn't think I liked you when I met you, but you've grown on me.\n\nNow to deal with the hole the kwama dug. There's some kind of Dwemer ruin down there. This whole affair might turn out better than I thought it would.
Target: 틀림없이 그 증서가 맞아. 처음 만났을 때는 마음에 들지 않았지만, 점점 더 좋아지는데.\n\n이제 크와마가 파낸 구멍을 처리해야겠어. 저 아래에 어떤 드웨머 유적이 있거든. 이 모든 일들이 내 생각보다 더 좋게 흘러갈지도 모르겠는걸.

Source: I won't forget what you did for me. Even a loyal servant can withstand the charms of a beautiful, winged Daedra for only so long, you know.\n\nI saw a city from the top of the tower. I'll head there and try to find my dear Lady Laurent.
Target: 당신이 해 준 일을 잊지 않겠소. 아무리 충직한 하인이라도 아름답고 날개달린 데이드라의 매력에 계속 버텨낼 수는 없으니까 말이오.\n\n탑 꼭대기에서 도시를 봤지. 거기 가서 우리 친애하는 레이디 로런트를 찾아봐야겠소.

Source: What? Those incompetents let trolls take the mine? That's terrible! I'm ruined! I'll have to hire sellswords to clear the mine and … bah! Thank you for telling me, I suppose. Here's something for your trouble. Now, if you'll excuse me ….
Target: 뭐라고요? 그 무능한 놈들이 트롤을 그냥 들여보냈단 말인가요? 이런 끔찍한 일이! 완전 망했잖아! 광산을 정리할 용병을 고용하고... 아오! 소식 전해줘서 고맙다고 해야겠군요. 여기 수고해준 보답이에요. 자, 이만 실례하죠...

Source: I found the relic in Deshaan.
Target: 데샨에서 유물을 찾았습니다.

Source: I grew up with Sir Hughes. Thank you for sparing his life.
Target: I grew up with Sir Hughes. Thank you for sparing his life.

Source: I'm a skeleton of me word, so here, take this. \n\nNow be off with ya. I got some vengeance to bestow on them what busted me up.
Target: 나는 한 말은 지키는 해골이니까. 자, 받으라고.\n\n이제 가 보라고. 나를 박살낸 것들에게 헌정할 복수가 있으니까.

Source: Nonsense. You worry too much, my friend. This is going to be the best Corn-loon-licker ever!\n\nNow please take this. It's a gift for all your hard work. Rigurt insists!
Target: Nonsense. You worry too much, my friend. This is going to be the best Corn-loon-licker ever!\n\nNow please take this. It's a gift for all your hard work. Rigurt insists!

Source: After that story, I think I might be the one who needs a drink! Well, thanks for the information. I'll make sure to look into these accusations as soon as I can.\n\nBut you're not going to give up on this, are you?
Target: After that story, I think I might be the one who needs a drink! Well, thanks for the information. I'll make sure to look into these accusations as soon as I can.\n\nBut you're not going to give up on this, are you?

Source: I found the relic in Glenumbra.
Target: 글렌움브라에서 유물을 찾았습니다.

Source: You stood against the darkness at Moonmont. The Dro-m'Athra. Moons be praised!
Target: 당신은 달언덕에서 어둠에 대항했습니다. 드로 마스라 말이에요. 달들이여 축복받으시기를!

Source: I am prepared to lose my memories, but I don't want to lose the lessons I've learned. \n\nYou helped me understand the difference between a foe and a friend. I'm determined not to forget that, nor to forget you.
Target: 기억을 잃을 각오는 돼 있지만, 내가 배운 교훈을 잃고 싶지는 않아.\n\n넌 날 도와서 적과 친구의 차이가 뭔지 알게 해 줬어. 난 그걸 잊지 않기로 결심했어. 너도 잊지 않을거야.

Source: Excellent. My latest orders are posted to the mission boards by Generals Thoron and Atahba. Look at the notices, find a mission that fits your abilities, and do it. I suggest you start with a Scouting mission.\n\nWelcome to the war!

Source: I found the relic in Greenshade.
Target: 그린셰이드에서 유물을 찾았습니다.

Source: Indeed. We have fought alongside many of the same soldiers and word travels quickly when it involves heroics such as those attributed to you.\n\nI have anticipated the chance to meet you in person, and I am pleased the opportunity has finally arrived.
Target: 물론이지. 우리는 같은 병사들과 함께 많은 싸움을 거쳐왔고, 그 싸움에 자네같은 영웅들이 참여하면 소문이 빠르게 퍼진다네.\n\n자네를 직접 만날 기회가 있기를 바라왔었지. 그 기회가 드디어 오게 되서 기쁘다네.

Source: Stand back then, mate, while I put on the crown. \n\nIf I turn on you, strike me down. Do it quick-like, there's a good chum.
Target: Stand back then, mate, while I put on the crown. \n\nIf I turn on you, strike me down. Do it quick-like, there's a good chum.

Source: Damn and blast. Destroy the thing and be done with it, then.
Target: 이런 빌어먹을. 정 그렇다면 그걸 부수고 끝내자고.

Source: <Finish the job.>
Target: <Finish the job.>

Source: This one's beloved <<1>> dropped it while we ran from the Dremora. Ahirunz never thought he would see it again. It must be a sign! Ernabi doesn't want this one to give up.\n\nThank you. Thank you for giving Ahirunz the strength to go on living.
Target: 이 카짓이 사랑하던 <<1>>은(는) 드레모라에게 도망치는 도중 이것을 떨어뜨렸습니다. 아히런즈는 이걸 다시 볼 수 있을거라 생각하지 못했습니다. 이건 신호입니다! 엘나비는 카짓이 포기하길 원치 않는겁니다.\n\n감사합니다. 아히런즈에게 살아갈 힘을 주셔서 감사합니다.

Source: As the bones foretold! I knew someone would come to help us. The boar's tusk lies beneath the fox's leg. That means death, from one who walks far.\n\nNo matter where you wander, you'll find friends in Shor's Stone, for so long as we live.
Target: As the bones foretold! I knew someone would come to help us. The boar's tusk lies beneath the fox's leg. That means death, from one who walks far.\n\nNo matter where you wander, you'll find friends in Shor's Stone, for so long as we live.

Source: You did? I knew it! That's wonderful! I can't thank you enough.\n\nNow I won't wind up like the rest of these poor wretches. I have my soul back and I'm getting out of here!
Target: 정말요? 역시나! 훌륭하군요! 감사를 이루 표현할 수 없어요.\n\n이제 그 불쌍한 녀석들처럼 되지 않겠네요. 내 영혼을 되찾았으니 여기서 나갈 거에요!

Source: Gather allies before you leave the city. You'll need loyal friends to face the armies of the Warrior, the Mage, and the Serpent.\n\nReturn to me each time you learn something new. I will use what you learn to devise a plan to defeat the Celestials.
Target: 도시를 떠나기전에 동료를 모으세요. 전사자리, 마법사자리 그리고 뱀자리의 군대와 맞설 수 있는 충직한 친구들이 필요할 겁니다.\n\n새로운 것을 알아낼 때마다 돌아와 주세요. 당신이 알아낸 것들로 천인들을 무찌를 계획을 세울 수 있을 겁니다.

Source: I found the relic in Malabal Tor.

Target: 리븐스파이어에서 유물을 찾았습니다.

Source: Oron seems to know more than he is telling.\n\nI returned to Camlorn and spoke with Oron.  He seems to know more than he is revealing.  He fears "what we are going to uncover by finding the murderer will endanger us all."
Target: Oron seems to know more than he is telling.\n\nI returned to Camlorn and spoke with Oron.  He seems to know more than he is revealing.  He fears "what we are going to uncover by finding the murderer will endanger us all."

Source: Excellent! My friend, you are an asset and blessing on the Pact. I sense the hand of the Three here.
Target: 좋아! 친구, 넌 협약의 자산이자 축복이야. 여기서 삼신의 손길을 느끼는군.

Source: Yes! In the here and now, the guardians must have been disrupted or destroyed.\n\nSo it's simple! Fix the guardians and they'll draw Balreth's power back into them. Then you can bind or kill Balreth.
Target: 그래! 지금은, 수호자들이 붕괴되거나 파괴되었을거야.\n\n일이 간단해 졌군! 수호자들을 고치면 그들이 발레스의 힘을 다시 빨아들일거야. 그럼 발레스를 봉인하거나 죽일 수 있게 되겠지.

Source: Oron suspects there are agents of the Shrouded Throne in Crosswych.  I must work with Warden Godwin to find them.
Target: 오론(Oron)은 크로스위치에 가려진 왕좌(Shrouded Throne)의 요원들이 있다고 의심한다. 나는 그 요원들을 찾기 위해 워든 고드윈(Warden Godwin)과 협력해야해.

Source: King Vincintian informed me that the Shrouded Throne must not break through the defenses at Eagles Watch.  I have travelled here to help in its defense.
Target: Vincintian왕은 슈뢰드 쓰론(Shrouded Throne)이 독수리 감시탑(Eagles Watch)의 방어선을 돌파해서는 안된다고 하였고, 나는 그 방어를 돕기 위해 여기까지 왔다.

Source: You stood in the ruins of Ezduiin. The halls of the Ancients.
Target: You stood in the ruins of Ezduiin. The halls of the Ancients.

Source: <Read Notice.>
Target: <Read Notice.>

Source: Lady Laurent passed through here -- I think she may have finally fired that insufferable Stibbons.
Target: Lady Laurent passed through here -- I think she may have finally fired that insufferable Stibbons.

Source: <Claim Bounty.>
Target: <Claim Bounty.>

Target: 스톤폴즈에서 유물을 찾았습니다.

Target: <Read Notice>

Target: <Read Notice.>

Target: 스톰헤븐에서 유물을 찾았습니다.

Target: 그럼, 어떻게 되는 것입니까?

Target: <Read Notice.>

Source: I found the relic in Shadowfen.
Target: 섀도우펜에서 유물을 찾았습니다.

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in Glenumbra.
Target: 글렌움브라에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: Nede blood! I should have seen this! The Chimer thought they were gods. Backed into a corner, they turned to dark rituals.\n\nThis was dangerous magic. I must contemplate this. Still, I am quite grateful that you did not fail.
Target: Nede blood! I should have seen this! The Chimer thought they were gods. Backed into a corner, they turned to dark rituals.\n\nThis was dangerous magic. I must contemplate this. Still, I am quite grateful that you did not fail.

Source: I'm glad my trust was well placed. To lose the Hist branch, that would have been too much tragedy for me.\n\nSeeks-the-Night has caused me more than enough pain. How could he betray us to the pirate slavers? Is his heart really so full of hate?
Target: 제 신뢰가 보답 받다니 너무 기쁘군요. 히스트의 나뭇가지를 잃어버리는 것은 저에게 있어 큰 비극이었죠.\n\n시커즈-더-나이트는 내게 충분히 고통을 주었습니다. 어떻게 그가 우리를 배반할 수 있죠? 그의 마음은 정말 증오로만 가득 차 있는걸까요?

Source: That's thanks to you. As I said, I honor my debts, but until we drive the Covenant from Stonefalls, this is all I can offer.\n\nNow, I must speak with Dedras. He smells like he dishonored himself.
Target: 당신 덕분입니다. 방금 말했듯이, 저는 답례를 하고 싶습니다. 하지만 동맹을 스톤폴스에서 물리칠 때 까지, 이것이 제가 드릴 수 있는 전부입니다.\n\n이제 데드라스와 얘기해봐야겠습니다. 그는 스스로를 망신시킨 것 같더군요.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <Read Notice>

Source: <Claim Bounty.>
Target: <Claim Bounty.>

Source: I found the relic in the Rift.
Target: 리프트에서 유물을 찾았습니다.

Source: Then we are allies. For now.\n\nI must go to my father. I don't care how we do it, but his life must be saved. My father can't die. Fildgor will not win this war! Not this way! I forbid it!
Target: Then we are allies. For now.\n\nI must go to my father. I don't care how we do it, but his life must be saved. My father can't die. Fildgor will not win this war! Not this way! I forbid it!

Source: <Claim Bounty.>
Target: <Claim Bounty.>

Source: I can't! I'll search Stonefalls until I find him.\n\nEven in death, I won't give up my love for him.
Target: I can't! I'll search Stonefalls until I find him.\n\nEven in death, I won't give up my love for him.

Source: <Read Notice>
Target: <Read Notice>

Source: I'm here to collect.
Target: 보수를 받으러 왔어.

Source: Lady Laurent sends her regards -- she still has that insufferable Stibbons with her.
Target: Lady Laurent sends her regards -- she still has that insufferable Stibbons with her.

Source: Bless Azura!\n\nThank you. I'll run to him at once.
Target: 아주라의 축복이 있기를!\n\n감사합니다. 당장 그에게 가야겠어요.

Source: It's hard to believe that someone I don't even know would go so far out of their way to help us.\n\nThere's hope now, at least. Thank you.
Target: 내가 알지도 못하는 사람이 우리를 돕기 위해 그 모든 수고로움을 감수할 거라는 것은 믿기 어렵군.\n\n 이제 적어도 희망은 있지. 당신 덕분에. 정말 고맙군.

Source: I'll spend the rest of my life atoning for my crimes. Starting with telling my traveling companions the truth about my past. If I'm shunned for my actions, so be it.\n\nThank you for giving me a chance to start over.
Target: 남은 인생동안 내 죄를 속죄하며 보내야겠죠. 같이 여행하던 동료들에게 제 진짜 과거를 말하는 것부터 시작할 거에요. 배척받는다 해도 상관없어요.\n\n다시 시작할 수 있는 기회를 주셔서 고마워요.

Source: The Countess' advisor will not allow me to enter the manor and speak with her.  I will have to convince Chamberlain Gargast of the urgency of this matter.
Target: 백작부인의 고문은 날 저택으로 들이지 않았고 부인과 이야기 할 수도 없었다.  시종 가르가스트에게 이 사건이 얼마나 급박한지 납득시켜야 한다.

Source: Then we are avenged. Our father is still dead, but at least the ones responsible for his death paid a price. \n\nWhy don't I feel any better?
Target: 그렇다면 복수를 한 것 입니다. 우리의 아버지는 여전히 죽어있지만, 적어도 그의 죽음에 책임이 있는 자들은 값을 치렀습니다.\n\n왜 기분이 나아지지 않는거죠?

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Target: 다섯-발톱 간계의 시험을 완수했습니다.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: How are you going to make sure Stromgruf doesn't run off at the next sign of trouble?
Target: How are you going to make sure Stromgruf doesn't run off at the next sign of trouble?

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Here it is. Don't say I didn't warn you.
Target: 자. 경고하지 않았다고는 말하지 않도록.

Target: <Read Notice.>

Source: I hear that troublemaker Captain Rama wound up dead. What a shame, eh? Ha ha!
Target: I hear that troublemaker Captain Rama wound up dead. What a shame, eh? Ha ha!

Source: <Read Notice.>
Target: <Read Notice.>

Source: So, you caught that captain who set the Goblins on Cumberland's Watch. Nice work.
Target: So, you caught that captain who set the Goblins on Cumberland's Watch. Nice work.

Source: No! I can't believe that. I won't.\n\nWhy? My Eanen wouldn't, no!
Target: 아뇨! 믿을 수 없어요. 안 믿을거에요.\n\n왜? 나의 이넌이 그럴리가 없어요, 안돼!

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: The greatest mage of my era, and you wake me for something they could have read in a book?\n\nIt's pathetic, but clearly, I must aid my people again. No deathworms for you just yet.
Target: 난 나의 시대의 가장 위대한 마법사인데, 책을 읽으면 알 수 있는 것을 묻기 위해 나를 깨운 건가?\n\n한심하기는, 그러나 명백하게 나는 내 백성을 다시 한번 도와야하지. 네놈에게 죽음의 벌레를 선사하는 건 그 다음이다.

Source: Because of you, I've finally joined my sisters. I feel like we're old friends already.\n\nPerhaps the four of us can heal the spriggans and drive the Worm Cult away for good. It'd be like being the Green Lady once again!
Target: 당신 덕분에 드디어 내 자매들과 함께할 수 있었어. 벌써 오래된 친구들처럼 느껴지는군.\n\n우리 넷이라면 스프리건들을 치유하고 벌레 교단을 영원히 몰아낼 수 있을 거야. 다시 한번 녹색 여군주가 되는 것 같은데!

Source: Did he mention the finder's fee he receives for sending you into the swamp? Of course not.\n\nSince he didn't, I'll provide you with his fee directly. Hand it to him the next time you see him, or use it for a pair of watertight boots.
Target: Did he mention the finder's fee he receives for sending you into the swamp? Of course not.\n\nSince he didn't, I'll provide you with his fee directly. Hand it to him the next time you see him, or use it for a pair of watertight boots.

Source: I don't care if the Eight themselves sent you. If you're here to help, you have my thanks.
Target: I don't care if the Eight themselves sent you. If you're here to help, you have my thanks.

Source: Good luck in your travels, Tirwin.
Target: 티르윈, 당신의 여행에 행운이 있길 바랍니다.

Source:
Thank you. I'll make sure that gets to him too.

Don't know if you're a friend of the family or what, but we appreciate you going to so much trouble. Take this for your efforts.

I'll let you know when I've tracked down Scout Fontbonne.
Target:
감사합니다. 반드시 그에게 전하도록 하죠.

당신이 그의 가족과 친구인지는 모르겠지만, 이렇게까지 수고를 해주셔서 감사합니다. 보상으로 이걸 가져 가십시오.

정찰병 Fontbonne을 찾아내면 당신에게 알려드리겠습니다.

Source: I completed the Lava Foot Stomp.
Target: 용암 발구르기를 완수했습니다.

Source: These don't look like my pants, but thank you for finding the axe.\n\nI wish I could find that witch and teach her not to tangle with <<1>>!
Target: 이 건 제 바지처럼 보이진 않지만 도끼를 찾아주셔서 감사합니다.\n\n그 마녀를 찾으면 그녀에게 << 1 >>과 얽히게하지 말라고 가르쳐줬으면합니다!

Source: <A battered crate of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"We appreciate fine workmanship. We also appreciate those who can keep their mouths shut. Remember that."
Target: <A battered crate of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n\\"We appreciate fine workmanship. We also appreciate those who can keep their mouths shut. Remember that.\"\""

Source: Jes was grateful to have his missing weapons back, and my efforts have made the roads to and from Camlorn safer. He said the Red Rook bandits were led by a lunatic who is not to be trusted.
Target: Jes는 자신의 무기를 되찾아주고 Camlorn까지 가는 길을 더욱 안전하게 만들어준 나의 노력들에 감사해했다. 그는 한 미치광이에 의해 Red Rook 도적들이 인솔되었다고 말했다.

Source: <The Guild provided a crate of Smithing supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n"Who knew you could fight Daedra while wielding practical yet stylish arms and armor? We appreciate your efforts!"
Target: <The Guild provided a crate of Smithing supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"Who knew you could fight Daedra while wielding practical yet stylish arms and armor? We appreciate your efforts!\"\""

Source: So now what?
Target: 이제 어떻게 합니까?

Source: <A crate labeled "Crossroads Profiteers" waits inside the box, a note attached to one side.>\n\n"Veteran explorers deserve the very best, and your exquisite crafting matches their dedication and level of skill."
Target: <A crate labeled \\"Crossroads Profiteers\"\" waits inside the box
column4: a note attached to one side.>\n\n\"\"Veteran explorers deserve the very best
column5: and your exquisite crafting matches their dedication and level of skill.\"\""

Source: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a crate of Blacksmith supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"No one pays for quality and experience anymore. Place is going to the damn Orcs! Accept these supplies in lieu of other compensation."
Target: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a crate of Blacksmith supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"No one pays for quality and experience anymore. Place is going to the damn Orcs! Accept these supplies in lieu of other compensation.\"\""

Source: <A crate from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n"It was gratifying to hear that one of your helmets saved an explorer from an Iron Orc's warhammer. Thanks!
Target: <A crate from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n\\"It was gratifying to hear that one of your helmets saved an explorer from an Iron Orc's warhammer. Thanks!"

Source: Thank you.
Target: 고마워요.

Target: <Read Notice.>

Target: QUEST: TM01_OUTOFDATE
