Target: This one was impressed by your fights at Thizzrini!

Source: I completed the Lava Foot Stomp.
Target: 용암 발구르기를 완수했습니다.

Source: <Read Notice.>
Target: <Read Notice.>

Source: I took part in the Mud Ball Merriment.
Target: 유쾌한 진흙 공 축제에 참가하고 왔죠.

Source: <Read Notice.>
Target: <Read Notice.>

Source: What's this? Notes? A journal? Attacked? Slow down.\n\nHmmm. I've never heard of Vox. And the thought of someone smuggling Llodos plague into Narsis frightens me greatly. But where are the missing people?
Target: 이게 뭔가? 메모? 일기? 공격을 당했다고? 오, 진정하게.\n\n 흠. 복스란 자는 들어본 적이 없어. 그리고 누군가 로도스 전염병을 나르시스로 몰래 들여왔다니 정말 무섭군. 그건 그렇고, 대체 행방불명된 사람들은 어디에 있는 거지?

Source: Unusual, but not unworkable.\n\nShandi will make this less edible and more readable. Thank you for your gift!
Target: 특이하긴 하지만, 못 써먹지는 않겠네요.\n\n샨디가 이걸 덜 먹음직스럽고 더 잘 읽을 수 있게 만들어야겠어요. 선물을 전해 줘서 고마워요!

Source: <Read Notice.>
Target: <Read Notice.>

Source: Yes. Savarak won't trouble the people of Vos any longer.
Target: 그래. 사바락이 보스 사람들을 괴롭히는 일은 더이상 없어.

Source: <Read Notice.>
Target: <Read Notice.>

Source: I should have been told what I was helping you to do.
Target: 뭘 도와주고 있는지는 알려줘야 했어.

Source: I'd slit his throat right now if I could, but there's no time … not with the dead on our doorstep.\n\nDeal with the dead. Stop the attack. After that, we'll expose Thorulf for what he is!
Target: I'd slit his throat right now if I could, but there's no time … not with the dead on our doorstep.\n\nDeal with the dead. Stop the attack. After that, we'll expose Thorulf for what he is!

Source: I completed the Signal Fire Sprint.
Target: 봉화 달리기를 완수했습니다.

Source: I lost a lot of money betting against you in that Crucible fight. You're a lucky one.
Target: I lost a lot of money betting against you in that Crucible fight. You're a lucky one.

Source: I completed the Castle Charm Challenge.
Target: 성채 매력 뽐내기를 완수했습니다.

Source: Folks are saying that Count Ravenwatch discovered an Ayleid manuscript in the Lorkrata ruins. Good thing you were there to help him!
Target: 사람들은 레이븐와치 백작이 로크라타 폐허에서 에일리드 필사본을 발견했다고 말했어요. 당신이 거기서 그를 도와줘서 다행이에요!

Source: Shor's stones, you did it! \n\nThese troops heard the horn blow and came running from Narsis. With Gruznak gone, we can sweep up the rest of these Orcs in no time. You've got a heavy hand, friend. I like that.
Target: 쇼어의 돌이여, 당신이 해냈어!\n\n이 군대는 뿔을 부르는 소릴 듣고 나르시스에서 달려 왔습니다. Gruznak이 죽은 지금, 우리는 나머지 오크들을 순식간에 쓸어 버릴 수 있습니다. 당신 손재주가 좋군요. 정말 좋아요.

Source: I'm going to have to get the mine back open, of course. \n\nKwama are very good diggers, you know, particularly the workers.
Target: 당연히 광산을 다시 열어야겠지요.\n\n크와마는 매우 훌륭한 광부로서, 잘 아시겠지만 특히 일꾼으로 적합하죠.

Source: You...you were the one that drove the darkness from Akkhuz-ri! Moons be praised!
Target: You...you were the one that drove the darkness from Akkhuz-ri! Moons be praised!

Source: Good. These Orcs will be sorry they took me captive.\n\nWe Nords appreciate a nice, warm fire.
Target: 좋아. 이 오크들은 절 포로로 잡아 둔 걸 후회할 것입니다.\n\n우리 노드에게 따뜻한 불을 주셔서 감사합니다.

Source: Yes, yes. I'm thankful for these wounds, in fact. They woke me up. A thane must be ever vigilant.\n\nThe Worms will find no shelter in the shadows of Nimalten.
Target: 그래, 그렇지. 이 상처들에 대해 감사하고 있어. 그들은 나를 일깨워줬지. 종사는 항상 경계해야 한다는 걸.\n\n니말텐의 그림자에서 벌레 교단 놈들이 설 자리는 없을 것이야.

Source: You did it? Excellent. That will put the fear of the Ebonheart Pact into them.
Target: You did it? Excellent. That will put the fear of the Ebonheart Pact into them.

Source: Yes, my friend. We have. Families across the Pact-lands will rest easier tonight thanks to you.
Target: 네, 친구. 우리가 바꿨어요. 조약의 영토 전역의 가족들이 오늘 밤은 안심하고 쉴 수 있어요. 감사합니다.

Source: And you turned the tide and cut off the head of the worm! Without Thallik Wormfather, the cult will be severely weakened.\n\nThanks to you, I now see victory on the horizon.
Target: 전세를 뒤집고 벌레의 수장을 처치했지! 벌레아비 탈릭이 없으면 교단은 급격하게 약화될 거야.\n\n자네에게 고맙네. 이제야 지평선 넘어 승리가 다가오는게 보이는군.

Source: Hardly a scratch! I still don't have any idea what to make of this ore, but the residual dust could be useful. \n\nI'll go up to the mine and talk to Jomund. I need more samples. This dust may be valuable, even if I don't fully understand it yet.
Target: Hardly a scratch! I still don't have any idea what to make of this ore, but the residual dust could be useful. \n\nI'll go up to the mine and talk to Jomund. I need more samples. This dust may be valuable, even if I don't fully understand it yet.

Source: King Fahara'jad, ruler of the Nine Crowns, sent Oron to defuse a potential war between Shornhelm and Northmoor.
Target: 아홉 왕관의 지배자 파하라'자드 왕이  오론을 보내  숀헬름과 노스무어 사이를 진정시켜 전쟁을 막았다.

Source: With this, the rotmeth will turn out great! A pity to lose all that ice, but to be honest … the atronach always gives me the chills. Just standing there. Watching.\n\nWe'll make do with the cave. What was good for our parents is good for us, eh?
Target: 이게 있으면 롯메스가 훌륭하게 완성될 거야! 저 얼음 녀석을 잃은건 안됐지만, 솔직히 말해서... 그 아트로나크는 항상 날 오싹하게 했다고. 그냥 가만히 서서 쳐다보곤 했거든.\n\n동굴만 가지고 때워야지 뭐. 우리 부모님이 잘 쓰셨으면 우리도 잘 쓸 수 있지 않겠어?

Source: I completed the War Orphan's Sojourn.
Target: 전쟁 고아 순례를 완수했습니다.

Source: QUEST: Lost and Found
Target: 퀘스트: 분실물 취급소

Source: QUEST: A Royal Summons
Target: 퀘스트: 왕실의 부름

Source: I broke the spell the Supernal Dreamers had placed on Ingride Vanne.
Target: 나는 숭고한 몽상가들이 인그라이드 베인에 걸었던 마법을 깨뜨렸다.\n

Source: Bakkhara spoke of your selflessness in Elden Hollow. If only we could all be so brave.
Target: Bakkhara spoke of your selflessness in Elden Hollow. If only we could all be so brave.

Source: Maybe. What is the lesson?
Target: 그럴지도 모르지. 얻은 교훈은 무엇이지?

Source: Please, enjoy the hospitality of Silvenar for as long as you like … though I am certain your tale will draw you away from us soon.\n\nMay your story be neverending, and always of interest.
Target: 부디 원하는 만큼 머물면서 실베나의 환대를 즐겨 주시게... 물론 그대의 이야기가 곧 그대를 우리에게서 끌어내겠지만 말일세.\n\n그대의 이야기가 절대 끝나지 않기를, 그리고 언제나 흥미진진하기를.

Source: I think we'll be fine. Maybe we'll be a little more diligent about guard duty. We don't want to get caught unawares again! \n\nThanks for all your help.
Target: I think we'll be fine. Maybe we'll be a little more diligent about guard duty. We don't want to get caught unawares again! \n\nThanks for all your help.

Source: I returned the tabards to Sir Graham. Now bandits will no longer besmirch the good name of the Knights of the Flame.
Target: 나는 타바드를 그레이엄 경에게 돌려주었다. 이제 산적들은 더 이상 화염의 기사들의 이름을 더럽히지 않을 것이다.\n

Source: A soul has been sent to the Void. Pity that you weren't able to complete both of my challenges, but there's no sense dwelling on your failures.\n\nHere's your reward. Return tomorrow. There is always work to be done.
Target: 영혼이 공허로 보내졌군. 시험을 모두 완수하지 못한 건 유감이지만, 네 실패를 오래 담아 둘 필요는 없다.\n\n여기 보수다. 내일도 오도록. 처리해야 할 일은 항상 있으니.

Source: I completed the War Orphan's Sojourn. I did all I could to help the children.
Target: 전쟁 고아 순례를 완수했습니다. 아이들을 돕기 위해 할 수 있는 모든 것을 했죠.

Source: Are you both all right?
Target: 너희 둘 다 괜찮은가?

Source: Hmm. You return head bowed? Do not be troubled by your failure to complete my challenges. You killed the target. That is enough for the Night Mother, and enough for me.\n\nPerhaps tomorrow you can finally impress me.
Target: 흠. 고개를 떨군채 돌아온건가? 내 시험을 완수하지 못했다고 기죽을 필요는 없네. 목표는 죽었어. 그것 만으로도 나이트 마더께서도 충분히 만족하시고, 나도 만족한다네.\n\n내일이라면 날 만족시킬지도 모르네.

Source: I collected the offerings.
Target: 물건을 모아왔어요.

Source: Expertly done. I sense that some of your Brothers and Sisters gaze upon you with jealous eyes. This is good. Perhaps that will motivate them to excel.\n\nTake this with the Night Mother's blessing. Return tomorrow. There is always work to be done.
Target: 전문가답게 해결했군. 형제 자매들 중 몇 명이 질투하는게 느껴질 정도야. 아주 좋아. 아마 그들이 더 발전할 계기를 마련해 줄 일이 될 거야.\n\n나이트 마더의 축복과 함께 이 포상을 받아라. 내일도 오도록. 처리해야 할 일은 항상 있으니.

Source: I assisted the Fish Boon Feast.
Target: 생선의 은혜 축제를 도와주고 왔죠.

Source: I took part in the Stonetooth Bash.
Target: 돌이빨 축제에 참여하고 왔죠.

Source: You hear what the cultists were doing at Eagle's Brook? Nasty business.
Target: 이글스 브룩에서 광신도들이 무슨 짓을 하는지 들었습니까? 끔찍한 짓을 벌이고 있어요.

Source: Did you hear? Some Red Rook scum had a change of heart and actually helped the Lion Guard at Eagle's Brook? Ridiculous!
Target: 들었어요? 붉은 떼까마귀단 쓰레기 중 일부는 마음이 바뀌었고 실제로 이글스 브룩의 사자 근위대를 도왔다는 것을? 웃기는 일이죠!

Source: QUEST: Crypt Cleansing
Target: 퀘스트: 묘지 지하실 정화

Source: QUEST: Vestrial's Research Book
Target: 퀘스트: Vestrial의 연구 일지

Source: What's the next step?
Target: 다음 단계는?

Source: Everyone is safe now.
Target: 모두가 안전하다.

Source: Every tale has an end. Every end allows a beginning to set hold. It is a balance, tenuous though it seems to be.\n\nZ'en's presence fades from this world as Mauloch grows stronger. Perhaps these journals will give comfort to those who fear the end.
Target: 모든 이야기에는 끝이 있소. 모두 새로운 시작이 존재하도록 해 주지. 겉보기에는 보잘것없어도, 그것이 균형이라오.\n\n이 세상에서 젠'의 존재는 말락이 점차 강해지면서 옅어지고 말았소. 어쩌면 이 일지들이 그 끝을 두려워하는 이들에게 위안을 줄지도 모르겠구려.

Source: Ah, my true king. I knew he had not forgotten us. \n\nI am certain there are many ways you can help. You should speak to Duke Renchant if you haven't already … oh, and Queen Arzhela's handmaiden. She's very sharp.
Target: Ah, my true king. I knew he had not forgotten us. \n\nI am certain there are many ways you can help. You should speak to Duke Renchant if you haven't already … oh, and Queen Arzhela's handmaiden. She's very sharp.

Source: Help my family any way you can.\n\nThey'll need it without me around.
Target: 가능한 어떻게든 내 가족을 도와주게나.\n\n내가 없으면 도움이 필요할거야.

Source: QUEST: Choice Quest
Target: 퀘스트: 선택

Source: QUEST: The Largest Threats
Target: 퀘스트: 가장 큰 위협들

Source: QUEST: In Crucial Need
Target: 퀘스트: 중대한 필요에 의해\n

Source: QUEST: Missing Soldiers
Target: 퀘스트: 사라진 병사들\n

Source: It's a good thing you were here, or I imagine they would have summoned many more. \n\nI'm going to take these relics back to Pariah Abbey. I can escort Tabakah back too.
Target: 당신이 여기 있어서 다행이에요. 아니면 그들이 더 많은 데이드라를 소환했을 거라고 상상했을 거예요.\n\n이 유물들을 다시 파리아 수도원으로 가지고 갈 겁니다. 타바카도 데려갈 거구요.

Source: QUEST: Choice Quest
Target: 퀘스트: 선택

Source: A shard of Wuuthrad. Here? You must be joking. Though, from the look on your face, I see you're not. \n\nThe Worm Cult is a danger to us all. We'll double patrols with the five men we have. In the meantime, thank you for running them out of town.
Target: A shard of Wuuthrad. Here? You must be joking. Though, from the look on your face, I see you're not. \n\nThe Worm Cult is a danger to us all. We'll double patrols with the five men we have. In the meantime, thank you for running them out of town.

Source: Drunk? No! Just checking the jagga. For bruising, you know? Rotmeth's the real prize, though. Thank you for finding it! I'll have some of the workers bring it home.\n\nI thank you. My ancestors thank you. We all thank you! Here's to your success!
Target: 취했냐고? 아니! 그냥 자가를 확인하던 중인데. 상했을지도 모르잖소? 그래도 진짜 물건은 롯메스지. 찾아줘서 고맙소! 일꾼 몇 명을 시켜서 집에 가져가야겠구만.\n\n감사드리오. 우리 조상님들도 고마워하실 거요. 우리 모두 감사드리오! 당신의 성공에 건배!

Source: QUEST: Merchant Matters
Target: 퀘스트: 상인의 문제

Source: This one heard you captured the High Elf ambassador for her crimes in Elden Root. Well done, walker.
Target: This one heard you captured the High Elf ambassador for her crimes in Elden Root. Well done, walker.

Source: There's the one that stopped the attempt on the King's life.
Target: 왕의 목숨을 노린 시도를 저지한 자가 있대요.

Source: QUEST: Merchant Matters
Target: 퀘스트: 상인의 문제

Source: Good. I lit up a few of the rowboats myself.\n\nA job well-done, but don't let it go to your head. It'll take the Maormer a while to recover, but they will. We must be vigilant.
Target: Good. I lit up a few of the rowboats myself.\n\nA job well-done, but don't let it go to your head. It'll take the Maormer a while to recover, but they will. We must be vigilant.

Source: You were trapped by the spell book.
Target: 주문서에 갇혀 버렸군요.\n

Source: With this group? Without a doubt! We'll make our way overland to Vulkwasten.\n\nWe'd have been lost without you, and the Maormer would know our secrets. This rescue brings great honor to your name, my friend. May Auri-El guide you.
Target: 이 애들이랑? 당연하지! 우린 걸어서 벌크와스텐으로 갈 걸세.\n\n자네가 없었다면 우린 죽었을 것이고, 마오머는 우리의 비밀을 알아버렸겠지. 이번 구출은 자네 이름에 커다란 영광을 가져올 걸세, 친구. 아우리엘께서 자네를 이끄시기를.

Source: Good work! With that manifest, the Maormer could've intercepted our supply ships, and taken arms intended for Dominion forces.\n\nThey'll regret this assault. We don't take such affronts lightly.
Target: 잘 하셨소! 그 목록이 넘어갔다면 마오머놈들이 우리 보급선을 가로챘을 거요. 자치령 병력에 공급할 무기들도 빼앗기고 말았겠지.\n\n놈들은 이번 공격을 후회하게 될 것이오. 우린 이런 모욕을 가볍게 여기지 않으니까.

Source: Thank Stendarr you happened by! With the denizens of death suppressed by your heroic efforts, it should now be within the capacity of my divine gifts to banish the works of the unholy and ….\n\nSorry. Anyway, after prayers I'll go clean up.
Target: 자네를 보내준 기적에 대해 스텐다르에게 감사하네! 자네의 영웅적인 노력 덕분에 언데드들이 격퇴되었어, 이제 내 신성한 힘을 이용하여 불경스러운 것들을 추방 할 수가 있을 것이고 또...\n\n말이 길어 미안하군. 어찌됬건, 기도 드린 후에 난 정리하러 가지.

Source: The Daedra never seem to stay down for long, but a reminder that we can hurt them is worth something.\n\nTake your key and your cut. By tomorrow they may be back to get hurt again!
Target: The Daedra never seem to stay down for long, but a reminder that we can hurt them is worth something.\n\nTake your key and your cut. By tomorrow they may be back to get hurt again!

Source: Ha! My fine f'lah! Well done. I'll see your name is not forgotten.\n\nAhknara, however, will be forgotten. The Dunmer reshape history to serve their needs. I'll remove any mention of her actions here, and I'll purge all records of that vile assassin.
Target: 하! 내 좋은 친구여! 잘 했어. 나는 네 이름이 길이 남는 걸 보게 되겠군.\n\n그러나, 아크나라의 이름은 잊혀지겠지. 던머는 자신의 필요에 따라 역사를 재구성하기도 해. 나는 이곳에서 그녀에 행적에 관한 어떤 언급이라도 지워버릴 것이고, 그 비열한 암살자 놈들에 대한 기록도 모조리 없애 버릴 거야.

Source: Ah. Very good then. For all of us. Azaro will send word to Zazabukhi to let her know all is well. \n\nNot just yet though. This one wants a few more minutes to enjoy this rock, and besides, he likes making Zazabukhi wait. Heh.
Target: Ah. Very good then. For all of us. Azaro will send word to Zazabukhi to let her know all is well. \n\nNot just yet though. This one wants a few more minutes to enjoy this rock, and besides, he likes making Zazabukhi wait. Heh.

Source: <The Consortium set aside a satchel of Clothier supplies as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n "Good work, master clothier! Your skill with a needle and thread does you proud. We look forward to dealing with you again."
Target: <The Consortium set aside a satchel of Clothier supplies as a reward, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n \\"Good work
column4: master clothier! Your skill with a needle and thread does you proud. We look forward to dealing with you again.\"\""

Source: Sacrificing our own people! This monstrosity must stop!\n\nThe commanders at Davon's Watch must see this immediately. And … and I must tell them about Giron.
Target: 우리편을 희생시키다니! 이런 끔찍한 짓은 당장 중단되어야 해!\n\n다본의 감시대의 지도자들은 이 일을 당장 알아야 해. 그리고... 난 기론이 한 짓에 대해 말해야 겠지.

Source: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a satchel of Clothier supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n"What provides better protection than a Dragonstar Trading Company guard? Nothing! But your light armor comes damn close!"
Target: <The Dragonstar Trading Company provided a satchel of Clothier supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"What provides better protection than a Dragonstar Trading Company guard? Nothing! But your light armor comes damn close!\"\""

Source: <The military provided a satchel of Clothier supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n "We once again stand in awe of your intricate designs and attention to detail. You have our admiration and our thanks."
Target: <The military provided a satchel of Clothier supplies as payment, along with a note of thanks.>\n\n \\"We once again stand in awe of your intricate designs and attention to detail. You have our admiration and our thanks.\"\""

Source: I will make this gift, this sacrifice. Trees, plants—one day it will all bloom again. Blood is water, water is life.\n\nMay the Hist embrace you.
Target: 나는 제물이 되어, 희생을 할 것이다. 나무들, 식물들—언젠가는 다시금 피어날테지. 피는 물이고, 물은 생명이다.\n\n히스트가 널 포용하길.

Source: I am free of Molag Bal's curse and will pass on to whatever fate awaits me. \n\nDark Anchors may yet fall, but Stormhaven will remain a blind spot for the Father of Vampires—at least for a while longer.
Target: 난 이제 몰라그 발의 저주에서 벗어났고, 이제 자유가 기다리고 있어.\n\n어둠의 닻이 떨어질 수도 있겠지만, 그래도 한 동안은 스톰헤이븐은 뱀파이어의 아버지의 시선으로부터 자유로울 거야.

Source: QUEST: Treasure Beyond Wonder
Target: 질문:경이로움을 넘어선 보물

Source: <A satchel bearing the tag "Crossroads Profiteers" waits inside the box, a note attached to one side.>\n\n"You have a flair for needlework, and we appreciate your craftsmanship. Take this with our thanks."
Target: <A satchel bearing the tag \\"Crossroads Profiteers\"\" waits inside the box
column4: a note attached to one side.>\n\n\"\"You have a flair for needlework
column5: and we appreciate your craftsmanship. Take this with our thanks.\"\""

Source: Yes, well. Ahem. I thank you for all you've done here today, traveler. My daughter is safe and I must … reluctantly … admit that the Argonian may have played a part.\n\nMay Lord, Mother, and Wizard all guard you on your journey.
Target: 그래, 음. 크흠. 오늘 이 곳에서 해준 일들에 대해 감사드리지, 여행자. 내 딸은 무사하고 나는 ... 마지못해 ... 아르고니안이 한 몫을 했을지도 모른다에 동의해야겠군.\n\n오 신이시여, 어머니, 그리고 마법사 모두가 네 여정을 지켜주길.

Source: My brother's spell bound them to guard Davon's Watch.\n\nIt wasn't supposed to be like this. It wasn't supposed to be like torture.
Target: 내 동생의 마법이 죽은 자들이 다본의 감시대를 지키도록 묶어놨어.\n\n이럴 의도는 아니었어. 그들의 영혼을 고문하는 짓 같은 걸 하려는게 아니었다고.

Source: Whoever these Supernal Dreamers are, they are cunning and clearly willing to go to great lengths to achieve their goals.\n\nI'm happy to be alive, and I'm also glad to know you stopped them cold.
Target: Whoever these Supernal Dreamers are, they are cunning and clearly willing to go to great lengths to achieve their goals.\n\nI'm happy to be alive, and I'm also glad to know you stopped them cold.

Source: <A satchel from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n"Craglorn can be a lonely place, especially for the newest arrivals. Thanks for brightening their day with such stylish accouterments."
Target: <A satchel from the Belkarth Quartermaster awaits within, stocked with supplies. A note is attached.>\n\n\\"Craglorn can be a lonely place
column4: especially for the newest arrivals. Thanks for brightening their day with such stylish accouterments.\"\""

Source: Their leaders have moved beyond. May they find peace.\n\nFor now, the rest remain like moths. They're no threat to the living, but they'll soon follow.
Target: 그들의 지도자는 저편으로 넘어갔어. 그들이 평화를 찾기를.\n\n현재로썬, 나머지 유령들은 나방처럼 남아있어. 그들은 산 자에게는 위협이 되지 않겠지만, 곧 따라올거야.

Source: <The organization gathered enough supplies to offer you a satchel as a reward. They've also included a note of thanks.>\n\n"You have our thanks, crafter. This clothing guarantees that the least among us receive a few basic necessities."
Target: <The organization gathered enough supplies to offer you a satchel as a reward. They've also included a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"You have our thanks
column4: crafter. This clothing guarantees that the least among us receive a few basic necessities.\"\""

Source: And I'm glad he did. Balreth, it seems, does not want to go quietly back into his cage.
Target: 그가 해내서 다행이야. 벨레스가 조용히 자기 우리 안으로 돌아가고 싶어 하지 않은 것처럼 보이거든.

Source: <A beat-up satchel of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n"It may look like this stuff fell off the back of a trader's cart, but that's probably because it did. But you lived up to your end of the bargain, so here you go."
Target: <A beat-up satchel of supplies awaits you, a scrap of paper tacked to its side.>\n\n\\"It may look like this stuff fell off the back of a trader's cart
column4: but that's probably because it did. But you lived up to your end of the bargain

Source: The damn skeevers tricked us, though. This was only a feint.
Target: 그 망할 스키버놈들이 우릴 속였어. 이건 속임수야.

Source: <The Guild provided a satchel of tailoring supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n"We had more than a few Daedra ask where we got our clothing—before we killed them! Thanks."
Target: <The Guild provided a satchel of tailoring supplies as a reward, as well as a note of thanks.>\n\n\\"We had more than a few Daedra ask where we got our clothing—before we killed them! Thanks.\"\""

Source: Our victory is complete. Even now, the Covenant retreats. You gave me enough time to summon <<1>>.\n\nAs grandmaster of House Indoril, I honor you.
Target: 우리의 승리로 끝났다. 지금 이 순간에도, 동맹은 후퇴하고 있지. 너는 내게 <<1>>를 소환할 충분한 시간을 벌어다줬어.\n\n인두릴 가문의 기사단장으로서, 널 존경하마.

Source: <A decrepit satchel of supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the flap.>\n\n"The Daedra we acquired this from have no further need for it. We're sure it will be better off in your hands."
Target: <A decrepit satchel of supplies sits inside the box, a note attached to the flap.>\n\n\\"The Daedra we acquired this from have no further need for it. We're sure it will be better off in your hands.\"\""

Source: The savior of Skywatch! The Heritance training camp crushed!
Target: The savior of Skywatch! The Heritance training camp crushed!

Source: QUEST: Exposing the Baron
Target: 퀘스트: 남작을 폭로하기

Source: Welcome back to Aldcroft, my friend.
Target: 알드크로프트에 돌아온 것을 환영하오, 내 친구여.

Source: Vincintian sent you to me? Well. I suppose we must all make due with what we have.
Target: Vincintian이 나한테 보냈다고? 음. 나는 우리 모두가 무엇을 가지고 있는지도 함께  감안해야만한다고 생각하는데.

Source: I am pleased to see you alive and well, your travels have been quite dangerous as I have heard.\n\nOur mystery will soon conclude, yet I fear what we are going to uncover by finding the murderer will endanger us all...
Target: 건강히 살아있어서 기쁩니다.  당신의 여행은 그동안 꽤나 위험했다고 들어왔습니다.\n\n우리의 비밀은 곧 결말 짓겠지만, 그 살인마가 우리를 위험에 빠트리겠다고 한 협박을 발견한 후로부터는 우리가 무엇을 폭로할 것인지 아직 무섭습니다.

Source: QUEST: Exposing the Baron
Target: 퀘스트: 남작을 폭로하기

Source: QUEST: Blackmoore's End
Target: 퀘스트: 블랙무어의 끝

Source: Let me see what you found.\n\nCovenant mercenaries? You've done well to bring this to me, traveler. I'll make sure this news reaches Mournhold.
Target: 당신이 찾은걸 한번 보도록 하죠.\n\n코버넌트 용병? 이걸 제게 가져다 준 건 잘한 일입니다, 여행자. 저는 이 소식을 모운홀드에 전달할 것입니다.

Source: My brethren are safe, and the Ashlands bubble with hope. I pass now down the river, to swim in the currents of Aetherius. Go well in your own passage, traveler.
Target: 내 형제들은 안전하고, 재의 땅은 희망으로 가득찼군요. 저는 이제 에테리우스의 흐름으로 떠날게요. 잘 있으세요, 여행자님.

Source: No! Dumac take those fetchers. Hjolm, my best officer, is dead. And these plans say Ahknara is here.\n\nOf all the … we're not prepared for Ahknara. Not even slightly, traveler. Let's talk.
Target:
안돼! 두만이 놈들을 데려가기를. 내 최고의 장교 흐요움이 죽었다. 그리고 이 계획들은 아크나라가 여기 있다고 말하는군. 

무엇보다... 우리는 아크나라에 전혀 준비되어 있지 않다. 아주 조금조차도. 

여행자, 얘기를 좀 해봐야겠어.

Source: Then Ebonheart is saved! We are once again in your debt. Maybe we'll make you the new Thane of Whiterun. After all, they'll take anyone!\n\nI'll keep the Heart safe. This Brother of Strife must remain bound.
Target: 그럼 에본하트가 구원 받았군! 다시 한번 자네에게 빚을 졌네. 어쩌면 자네를 화이트런의 새 수호기사로 삼을 수도 있겠어. 결국, 그들이 아무나 앉히겠지만!\n\n 나는 심장을 안전하게 지킬 것이네. 이 투쟁의 형제는 속박되어 있어야 해.

Source: Vivec's children can rest now. I feel it in my bones. You are kind to perform this service for the heroes of the past.\n\nVivec! We thank them for our freedom today. No foe can stand against the Three!
Target: 이제 비벡의 아이들이 쉴 수 있겠군요. 난 그것을 뼛속 깊이 느낄 수 있습니다. 당신은 친절하게도 과거의 영웅들을 위해 이런 봉사를 해 줬어요.\n\n비벡이시여! 오늘 우리가 자유를 누릴 수 있게 해 준 그들에게 감사합니다. 어떤 적도 삼신에게 대항할 수 없습니다!

Source: King Fahara'jad sent me. We need the aid of the Ash'abah.
Target: 파하라자드 왕이 나를 보냈네. 우리는 아샤바의 도움이 필요해.

Source: What happened to General Godrun?
Target: 고드런 장군에게 무슨 일이 있었던 거죠?

Source: Hmm. You return head bowed? Do not be troubled by your failure to complete my challenges. You killed the target. That is enough for the Night Mother, and enough for me.\n\nPerhaps tomorrow you can show me your true quality.
Target: 흠. 고개를 떨군채 돌아온건가? 내 시험을 완수하지 못했다고 기죽을 필요는 없네. 목표는 죽었어. 그것 만으로도 나이트 마더께서도 충분히 만족하시고, 나도 만족한다네.\n\n내일 자네의 진짜 솜씨를 보여줄지도 모르잖나.

Source: Expertly done. I sense that some of our Brothers and Sisters gaze upon you with jealous eyes. This is good. Perhaps that will motivate them to excel.\n\nTake this with the Night Mother's blessing. Return tomorrow. There is always work to be done.
Target: 전문가답게 해결했군. 우리 형제 자매들 중 몇 명이 질투하는게 느껴질 정도야. 아주 좋아. 아마 그들이 더 발전할 계기를 마련해 줄 일이 될 거야.\n\n나이트 마더의 축복과 함께 이 포상을 받아라. 내일도 오도록. 처리해야 할 일은 항상 있으니.

Source: A soul has been sent to the Void. Pity that you weren't able to complete both of my challenges, but there's no sense dwelling on your failures.\n\nHere's your reward. Return tomorrow. There is always work to be done.
Target: 영혼이 공허로 보내졌군. 시험을 모두 완수하지 못한 건 유감이지만, 네 실패를 오래 담아 둘 필요는 없다.\n\n여기 보수다. 내일도 오도록. 처리해야 할 일은 항상 있으니.

Source: Yes. All 124 of them.
Target: 그래. 그것들 124개 모두.

Source: You would like to speak to Countess Virolynn?  Should I allow any vagrant to bother the Countess?\n\nCome back tomorrow.
Target: 비롤린 백작부인과 이야기 하고 싶다고요?  내가 부랑자들을 들여보내 백작부인을 귀찮게 해야 합니까?\n\n내일 다시 오시오.

Source: No need to worry. I collapsed the tunnel they were coming through.
Target: 걱정할 필요 없어. 내가 지나온 터널을 무너뜨렸거든.

Source: Even the greatest empire is a desolate domain without the ones you love.  \n\nI never learned that lesson in life, but I hope you have. May the Eight be with you, young traveler.
Target: Even the greatest empire is a desolate domain without the ones you love.  \n\nI never learned that lesson in life, but I hope you have. May the Eight be with you, young traveler.

Source: That was one of my ancestors. He refuses to recognize the threat facing us today.\n\nIt's time to turn the tables on the Covenant. For that, you must buy me some time.
Target: 그것은 나의 조상들 중 하나야. 그는 오늘날 우리가 직면하고 있는 위협을 인정하지 않으려해.\n\n이제 상황을 역전시킬 때야. 그러기 위해서, 네가 시간을 좀 벌어 줘야 해.

Source: Probably doesn't look like much to you, but this helm and armor withstood the blows of the Orc warlord Nahkdul, a Nord killer at Farrun. This axe lopped off that monster's misshappen head!\n\nI'll drink to those days. And more of them to come!
Target: Probably doesn't look like much to you, but this helm and armor withstood the blows of the Orc warlord Nahkdul, a Nord killer at Farrun. This axe lopped off that monster's misshappen head!\n\nI'll drink to those days. And more of them to come!

Source: Shiri is the sister of Uwafa and Alasan.
Target: Shiri는 Uwafa and Alasan의 자매이다.

Source: I knew it wasn't my imagination! She must need something to cling to.\n\nI'm here, my lady. I will protect you.
Target: 내 상상이 아니었을 줄 알았어요! 붙잡고 계실 것이 필요하셨던 거군요.\n\n전 여기 있어요, 여군주님. 제가 지켜드리겠습니다.

Source: The celebrations last several days. You should stay and listen to us! We don't all know the same songs yet, but our performance will never be forgotten.\n\nSee you there!
Target: 축하 행사는 며칠동안 계속될 거에요. 머물면서 우리 공연을 들어보세요! 아직은 우리가 같은 노래를 모르지만, 우리 공연은 절대로 잊혀지지 않을 거에요.\n\n도시에서 만나요!

Source: Certainly. You've accomplished wonders today, Undaunted. Forcing the closure of an Oblivion Gate is a feat out of myth.
Target: Certainly. You've accomplished wonders today, Undaunted. Forcing the closure of an Oblivion Gate is a feat out of myth.

Source: A soul has been sent to the Void. Pity that you weren't able to complete both of my challenges, but there's no sense dwelling on your failures.\n\nHere's your reward. Return tomorrow. There is always work to be done.
Target: 영혼이 공허로 보내졌군. 시험을 모두 완수하지 못한 건 유감이지만, 네 실패를 오래 담아 둘 필요는 없다.\n\n여기 보수다. 내일도 오도록. 처리해야 할 일은 항상 있으니.

Source: Hmm. You return head bowed? Do not be troubled by your failure to complete my challenges. You killed the target. That is enough for the Night Mother, and enough for me.\n\nPerhaps tomorrow you can finally impress me.
Target: 흠. 고개를 떨군채 돌아온건가? 내 시험을 완수하지 못했다고 기죽을 필요는 없네. 목표는 죽었어. 그것 만으로도 나이트 마더께서도 충분히 만족하시고, 나도 만족한다네.\n\n내일이리면 날 만족시킬지도 모르네.

Source: Yes, you did all right. Closed the portal, which was no simple task, and bulled your way through everything they threw at you. Quite Undaunted, if you ask me.
Target: Yes, you did all right. Closed the portal, which was no simple task, and bulled your way through everything they threw at you. Quite Undaunted, if you ask me.

Source: Expertly done. I sense that some of our Brothers and Sisters gaze upon you with jealous eyes. This is good. Perhaps that will motivate them to excel.\n\nTake this with the Night Mother's blessing. Return tomorrow. There is always work to be done.
Target: 전문가답게 해결했군. 우리 형제 자매들 중 몇 명이 질투하는게 느껴질 정도야. 아주 좋아. 아마 그들이 더 발전할 계기를 마련해 줄 일이 될 거야.\n\n나이트 마더의 축복과 함께 이 포상을 받아라. 내일도 오도록. 처리해야 할 일은 항상 있으니.

Source: You and Tanval kept that monster Sadal at bay. Thank you!
Target: You and Tanval kept that monster Sadal at bay. Thank you!

Source: You burned the Warden's Tome and made a prisoner of him. Can't think of a more fitting end for that scum. Well done!\n\nTake your prize! We'll see if you can outdo this feat tomorrow.
Target: 너는 워든의 책을 태웠고 그를 포로로 만들었어. 그 쓰레기한테 이보다 더 어울리는 최후가 떠오르지 않는다니까. 아주 잘 했어!\n\n네 보상을 가져가! 네가 내일 이 위업을 뛰어넘을 수 있을지 두고 보자고.

Source: You've retrieved the crates, I trust? The Red Rook bandits are not to be trifled with - and their leader is a lunatic. \n\nI'm glad to see you returned safely, with my merchandise. You've saved many travelers, my friend.
Target: 상자를 되찾아왔군, I trust? 붉은 떼까마귀 도적들은 결코 하찮은 녀석들이 아니며 그들의 우두머리는 미치광이지.\n\n내 물건을 무사히 가지고 돌아와서 기뻐. 넌 많은 여행자들을 구했어, 친구.

Source: There is no greater shame than being an Ash'abah...and you joined willingly? So sad.
Target: There is no greater shame than being an Ash'abah...and you joined willingly? So sad.

Source: I know people despise the Ash'abah, but I appreciate the sacrifice you make, the sacrifice Sameer made.
Target: 전 사람들이 Ash'abah를 경멸하는 것을 알지만, 전 Sameer가 했던, 당신이 한 희생에 감사하게 생각합니다.

Source: Of course! And because of your actions here, they will never find the magic weapon Chancellor Tharn wants. \n\nThat's good news for the Covenant—and possibly for all of Tamriel. Why, we're heroes! Heh heh.
Target: 물론이지! 자네가 해 준 일 덕택에 그놈들은 Tharn 집정관이 원하는 마법 무기를 절대 찾지 못할 거요.\n\n코버넌트에게는 좋은 소식이지. 물론 탐리엘 전체에도 이득일거고. 우린 영웅이라고! 헤헤.

Source: No. With my shackles destroyed and the cult's ritual disrupted, I am free. \n\nThey wished to enslave me, to use me to strengthen the giant Sinmur. I will aid you in your quest against the foul Worms.
Target: 그렇지 않소. 족쇄가 파괴되고 교단의 의식이 붕괴되면서 나는 자유가 되었소.\n\n그들은 거인 신무르를 강화시키기 위해 나를 노예화하기를 원했소. 그릇된 벌레 교단에 대한 당신의 임무에서 당신을 도울 것이오.

Source: Meet <<1>> back at the palace.
Target: Meet <<1>> back at the palace.

Source: I've succesfully helped gather guar for <<1>>.
Target: I've succesfully helped gather guar for <<1>>.

Source: Talk to <<1>>
Target: <<1>>와(과) 대화하기

Source: Your son sent me here to cast your spell. He should be here shortly.
Target: 당신의 주문을 시전키 위해 당신 아들이 나를 여기로 보냈습니다. 그는 곧 여기로 올 겁니다.

Source: The spider did most of the work.
Target: 거미가 대부분의 일을 했습니다.

Source: That doesn't make it right. Return the items, or I'll make sure the guards hear of this.
Target: 그러면 안돼요. 물건을 돌려주거나 경비병에게 이 사실을 알릴거에요.

Source: Yes, that's the truth.
Target: Yes, that's the truth.

Source: All the creatures you spoke of are dead.
Target: 니가 말한 모든 생물체는 죽었어.

Source: How do I set you free?
Target: 어떻게 풀어드려야 하죠?

Source: I have it.
Target: 난 그것을 가지고 있다.

Source: talk to the guy
Target: 남자에게 말걸기

Source: I found out that hostile Kagesh Ashlanders led by <<1>> were besieging <<2>>. The Kagesh wise woman, <<3>>, wants to work with the House Dunmer to stop him. She believes the current peace is better than another cycle of religious bloodshed.
Target: I found out that hostile Kagesh Ashlanders led by <<1>> were besieging <<2>>. The Kagesh wise woman, <<3>>, wants to work with the House Dunmer to stop him. She believes the current peace is better than another cycle of religious bloodshed.

Source: The duchess is dead? Hughes killed her? For Mara's sake, I didn't think he was that crazy!\n\nI guess that explains why his orders were so confusing. Good thing we didn't march on the Redguards at Alcaire Castle!
Target: The duchess is dead? Hughes killed her? For Mara's sake, I didn't think he was that crazy!\n\nI guess that explains why his orders were so confusing. Good thing we didn't march on the Redguards at Alcaire Castle!

Source: I rescued the villagers and destroyed the Bloodthorn boats.
Target: 마을 주민들을 구출하고 핏빛가시단의 배를 파괴했습니다.

Source: I found a bag with your name on it.
Target: 당신 이름이 써진 가방을 찾았아요.

Source: I have saved the townspeople of Silsailen.
Target: 나는 Silsailen의 마을 사람들을 구했다.\n

Source: Tamien and I stopped the necromantic ritual and rescued his father, but the Bloodthorns escaped.
Target: 타미엔과 나는 네크로맨서 의식을 멈추고 그의 아버지를 구출했지만 핏빛가시단은 도망쳤어요.

Source: I have herbs from <<1>>.
Target: <<1>>가 보낸 약초를 가져왔어요.

Source: Yes, we found this tome and crystal in Mzeneldt.
Target: 네, 저희는 므제넬트에서 이 책과 수정을 발견하였습니다.

Source: A friend of yours, <<1>>, asked me to bring you some fish.
Target: 당신 친구 <<1>>가 생선을 좀 가져다달라고 부탁하더군요.

Source: How do I set you free?
Target: 어떻게 풀어드려야 하죠?

Source: I can feel the serenity flowing into my spirit already. By destroying their spirits with my blade, you have fulfilled my vow and released me from this plane. Thank you.\n\nI'll return you to the surface now. Go with honor … and my gratitude.
Target: I can feel the serenity flowing into my spirit already. By destroying their spirits with my blade, you have fulfilled my vow and released me from this plane. Thank you.\n\nI'll return you to the surface now. Go with honor … and my gratitude.

Source: Tamien Sellan told me to bring the villagers here to hide.
Target: 타미엔 셀란은 마을 사람들을 숨기려고 이곳에 왔습니다.

Source: What about the rest of the Maormer?
Target: 나머지 마오머들은 어떻게 하죠?

Source: <<1>>? Was he mad? He was supposed to protect her! How will I explain this to Lakana's father? To her sister?\n\nLakana would never hurt anyone. She was innocent … my beloved wife.
Target: <<1>>? Was he mad? He was supposed to protect her! How will I explain this to Lakana's father? To her sister?\n\nLakana would never hurt anyone. She was innocent … my beloved wife.

Source: I was able to get the wine from Hectur.
Target: 헥터에게서 와인을 얻을 수 있었어.

Source: I have recovered all of the relics.
Target: 모든 유물을 되찾았습니다.

Source: I left Hald behind.
Target: 할드를 남겨두고 왔죠.

Source: I left Hilka behind.
Target: 힐카를 남겨두고 왔죠.

Source: I'm … sorry to hear that. \n\nYou did what had to be done, and I suppose her reaction merely proves her guilt.
Target: I'm … sorry to hear that. \n\nYou did what had to be done, and I suppose her reaction merely proves her guilt.

Source: What? The Knights of the Flame are sworn to protect me. Why would one try to take my life?\n\nI know Dame Falhut spoke out against my marriage to the duke. I can't imagine how that could motivate her to murder.
Target: What? The Knights of the Flame are sworn to protect me. Why would one try to take my life?\n\nI know Dame Falhut spoke out against my marriage to the duke. I can't imagine how that could motivate her to murder.

Source: A giant spider construct and this Dwarven relic.
Target: 거대한 거미 구조물과 드워븐 유물이 있었습니다.

Source: It's hard to look around here and feel safe, but I do, especially since you're here.\n\nWhen we rebuild the farm, I think I'll build a statue in your honor, and put it right over there.
Target: 망가진 이 주변을 보면 이곳이 안전하다고 느끼기는 힘들겠지만, 당신이 여기 있기 때문에 이곳이 안전하게 느껴져요. \n\n우리가 농장을 재건하면, 당신을 기리기 위해 당신의 동상을 세울 거에요. 바로 저기에 말이죠.

Source: I've saved Argonian slaves from the soul crystals and cleared the slaver's camp.
Target: I've saved Argonian slaves from the soul crystals and cleared the slaver's camp.

Source: I have ventured into Arx Corinium and saved the enslaved nature spirits there.
Target: Arx Corinium에 도전을해서 노예가 된 영혼들을 구했습니다.\n

Target: The Talking quest

Source: I'll never forget what you've done for us.\n\nI hope someday my little Lucas grows up to be like you.
Target: 당신이 우리를 위해 해 준 일을 결코 잊지 않을 거예요.\n\n언젠가 나의 어린 루카스가 당신처럼 자랐으면 좋겠군요.

Source: Then my initiation is complete?
Target: Then my initiation is complete?

Source:
Not as glad as I am. Believe me.

It seems I'll need to take over security here in the village, and with those slavers out there, I need to get busy.

First though, I'm going to see if someone around here can give me a massage.
Target:
Not as glad as I am. Believe me.

It seems I'll need to take over security here in the village, and with those slavers out there, I need to get busy.

First though, I'm going to see if someone around here can give me a massage.

Source: There is nothing more to do. I can feel my unrest easing. My ties to this plane loosen... Aetherius pulls me. Farewell.
Target: There is nothing more to do. I can feel my unrest easing. My ties to this plane loosen... Aetherius pulls me. Farewell.

Source: Tanval wished you to follow him as interim leader of our forces in Stonefalls.
Target: 탄발은 그의 후임으로 당신을 스톤폴스에서의 우리 군대의 임시 지도자로 삼고 싶어했소.

Source: I feared as much. We have to proceed carefully now. \n\nWe don't want to alert the duchess or King Fahara'jad to the fact that we know about the secret communications.
Target: I feared as much. We have to proceed carefully now. \n\nWe don't want to alert the duchess or King Fahara'jad to the fact that we know about the secret communications.

Source: Then my initiation is complete?
Target: Then my initiation is complete?

Source: Brielus, <<1>> is carrying your child. Congratulations.
Target: 브리엘루스, <<1>>가 당신 아이를 가졌다더군요. 축하드려요.

Source: Thank you. Thank you so much. I promise you, whatever efforts I made to redeem myself before, they will be doubled.\n\nEvery hour, for the rest of my life, I will try to earn the reprieve you've given me.
Target: Thank you. Thank you so much. I promise you, whatever efforts I made to redeem myself before, they will be doubled.\n\nEvery hour, for the rest of my life, I will try to earn the reprieve you've given me.

Target: 그 보물, 저주받은 겁니다. 무슨 일이 있었던 거죠?

Target: <Claim bounty.>

Source: What now, Guildmaster?
Target: 이제 뭘 하면 될까요, 길드마스터?

Source: You've earned my esteem, my friend, and that's no small thing. You're a friend to the Ring of Daggers now.\n\nI have a feeling we'll cross paths again someday. May the gods watch over you until then.
Target: 널 존경해, 친구. 이건 작은 일이 아니야. 넌 이제 대거단의 친구야.\n\n우리가 언젠가 다시 만날 거란 느낌이 들어. 그 때까지 신이 너를 굽어 살펴 주시길.

Source: Dominion correspondence? Let me see ….\n\nHa! The guard's failure to protect our citizens is already the gossip of Stormhold. Why not Elven spies? Dark times, no doubt about it.
Target: Dominion correspondence? Let me see ….\n\nHa! The guard's failure to protect our citizens is already the gossip of Stormhold. Why not Elven spies? Dark times, no doubt about it.

Target: 복스를 떠받드는 자들은 더 적어졌다.

Target: 저는 망령의 동굴에서 꽤 많은 수의 복스의 추종자들을 죽였습니다.

Target: 우리는 메네비아를 구했다. 하지만 듀락은 스톰헤이븐의 다른 지역은 여전히 베르미나의 영향력 하에서 고통 받고 있다고 말했다. 베르미나를 처리할 대까지 그녀의 오멘들은 스톰헤이븐을 괴롭힐 것이다.\n

Source: How am I going to save your students?
Target: 당신의 제자를 구하려면 어떻게 해야하죠?

Target: 복스가 당신을 살해한건가요?

Target: 이젠 뭘 할까요?

Target: 어떻게 그렇게 빨리 퍼질수 있는걸까요?

Target: 내가 부하들을 데리고 가서 놈을 체포하겠어. 우리가 그런 빌어먹을 죽음몰이꾼과 계약을 했다니 믿기지가 않는군.\n\n고마워, 여행자. 별들께서 네 발걸음을 인도하시길.

Source: No nightmares, but I heard Godrun's been acting strange.
Target: 악몽에 대한 것은 없습니다. 하지만 고드런이 이상한 행동을 한다는 걸 들었어요.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: We'll toast your name tonight, my new champion. I hope you'll stay and enjoy the mead. And the feasting. And the dancing!\n\nOh, oh, oh! And don't forget—the singing!
Target: 우리는 오늘 밤 자네의 이름을 축복 할 것이야, 나의 새로운 챔피언. 자네가 머물면서 벌꿀주를 즐기기 바라네. 그리고 잔치도. 또 춤도!\n\n 오, 오, 오! 노래하는 것도 잊어서는 안돼지!

Source: Oh, aye. You did great. Just great! \n\nI'll let Vofknir know about your luminous inner spirit. Good luck in the rest of your journey!
Target: Oh, aye. You did great. Just great! \n\nI'll let Vofknir know about your luminous inner spirit. Good luck in the rest of your journey!

Source: Yes, that's it! Well done indeed. I'll pass the word to Vofknir at once.\n\nNow, if you'll excuse me.
Target: Yes, that's it! Well done indeed. I'll pass the word to Vofknir at once.\n\nNow, if you'll excuse me.

Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: Yup. I'll let Vofknir know.\n\nGood work.
Target: Yup. I'll let Vofknir know.\n\nGood work.

Source: You don't wish to become captain of the royal army? We apologize, but the only other position is royal consort. Though we seek to cause no offense, you simply don't intrigue us in that fashion.
Target: 너는 왕실군의 대위가 되고 싶은것이 아니었나?? 사과드리지, 이제 남은건 왕실군의 영사뿐이다. 우리에게 악의는 없지만, 너는 그런 식으로 우리를 음해하려 들면 안된다.

Source: <<1>>'s a monster. Over the years the coin, the skooma, they've made him cruel. Cross him and usually you end up buried in a hole out in the wastes. Kill him, and no one will mourn him.
Target: <<1>>은 괴물이에요. 지난 수년 간 금화랑 스쿠마가 그놈을 잔인하게 변화시켰죠. 놈한테 거스르면 보통은 황무지에 있는 구멍 속에 파묻히게 된다고요. 놈을 죽여도 슬퍼할 사람은 아무도 없을 거에요.

Source: I've defeated the Blackrose Prison Gauntlet. I should speak to Erilthel and accept my reward.
Target: I've defeated the Blackrose Prison Gauntlet. I should speak to Erilthel and accept my reward.

Target: It must have been hard for King Jorunn to kill his own brother.

Source: We're ready to confront Angof and destroy him. Thanks to you, he won't be able to hide from us now.\n\nI told Sir Lanis what happened out there. You should introduce yourself when you get a chance.
Target: We're ready to confront Angof and destroy him. Thanks to you, he won't be able to hide from us now.\n\nI told Sir Lanis what happened out there. You should introduce yourself when you get a chance.

Source: You really are an old softy. Well, I've got him. I think.\n\nNormally, I'd never keep a werewolf as a pet. But in this case, perhaps you're right. If we can cure the Duke, that would certainly be better than killing him.
Target: 넌 정말 오래된 유약함을 가지고 있군. 글쎄, 내가 잡았어, 내 생각에는.\n\n보통은 늑대인간을 애완동물로 키우지 않을 거야. 하지만 이 경우엔 아마 네 말이 맞겠지. 우리가 공작을 치료할 수 있다면, 당연히 공작을 죽이는 것보다 나아.

Source: The real pity is I can't make more doses until we're out of here.\n\nStill, you were able to rescue a few of our citizens. Thanks.

Source: Another soul delivered to Sithis. It's unfortunate that things did not go wholly as planned, but the end result is the same.\n\nReflect on all that occurred. Then return tomorrow to use what you have learned.
Target: 또 하나의 영혼이 시디스께 보내졌군. 계획대로 진행되지 않은게 실망이지만, 결과는 같네.\n\n오늘의 모든 일을 반성하게. 오늘의 교훈을 내일 다시 와서 확인하게.

Source: Sithis welcomes all souls to the Void, no matter how they might arrive. You executed your duty, but I expect more of you.\n\nReturn tomorrow. I'll offer you a chance to prove you can excel as well as kill.
Target: 시디스께서는 모든 영혼을 환영하신다. 어떻게 그에게 왔는지는 상관하지 않으시지. 네 임무를 성공했으나, 난 네게 그 이상을 바랬다.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 네가 죽이는 것 그 이상을 할 수 있도록 기회를 주겠다.

Source: Performed with all the care befitting the Night Mother's sacred work. Your devotion to this task has not been overlooked.\n\nReturn again tomorrow and I'll offer you another opportunity to demonstrate your skill.
Target: 나이트 마더의 성스러운 일에 걸맞게 정성을 다해 수행했다. 이 일에 대한 네 헌신은 간과되지 않았네.\n\n 내일 다시 오면 네 기술을 증명할 또 다른 기회를 주겠다.

Source: What will you do?
Target: 어떻게 하실 건가요?

Source: You're the darling who saved Rozenn Vanne, aren't you? Quite the hero!
Target: 당신이 Rozenn Vanne을 구한 사람이군, 그렇지? 대단한 영웅이 아닐 수 없군!

Source: Are you coming ashore?
Target: 당신도 해안가로 갈 건가요?

Source: So, I can have the axe?
Target: 그럼, 도끼는 가져가도 되겠죠?

Source: How did you find me?
Target: 어떻게 날 찾았어요?

Source: Yes, invoke the Blood Price.
Target: Yes, invoke the Blood Price.

Source: I posted the handbills. You should expect a crowd.
Target: I posted the handbills. You should expect a crowd.

Source: What? No. I simply thought you'd like to know what Tu'whacca thought of you. He is an excellent judge of character. No, the real lesson of these heroes is that legend always carries a price. You must be prepared to pay that toll when it comes.
Target: 네? 아뇨. 전 그저 투'와카께서 당신에 대해 생각하는 것을 당신이 알고싶어할 거라고 생각했습니다. 그분께서는 사람의 특성에 대해서는 아주 뛰어난 판사이시죠. 이 영웅들의 진짜 교훈 전설은 언제나 그에 상응하는 대가를 가지고 있다는 겁니다. 당신은 때가 되면 반드시 그 대가를 지불할 준비가 되어있어야 해요.

Source: The quest is now complete. You should still be on this layer until leaving the subzone.
Target: The quest is now complete. You should still be on this layer until leaving the subzone.

Source: Sithis welcomes all souls to the Void, no matter how they arrive. You have executed your duty, but I expect more of you.\n\nReturn tomorrow. I'll provide a chance to prove you can excel as well as kill.
Target: 시디스께서는 모든 영혼을 환영하신다. 어떻게 그에게 왔는지는 상관하지 않으시지. 네 임무를 성공했으나, 난 네게 그 이상을 바랬다.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 네가 죽이는 것 그 이상을 할 수 있도록 기회를 주겠다.

Source: Performed with all the care befitting the Night Mother's sacred work. Your devotion to this task has not been overlooked.\n\nReturn again tomorrow and I'll provide another opportunity to prove your prowess.
Target: 나이트 마더의 성스러운 일에 걸맞게 정성을 다해 수행했다. 이 일에 대한 네 헌신은 간과되지 않았네.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 네 용감함을 증명할 또 다른 기회를 주겠어.

Source: Another soul delivered to Sithis. It's unfortunate that things did not go wholly as planned, but the end result is the same.\n\nReflect on what occurred. Return tomorrow to use what you have learned.

Source: Yes. And with that beast Rakkhat killed, it will stay that way. Well, Adara'hai can hope, yes?\n\nThank you, friend. Take this and my blessing. When Jone and Jode cry out for a hero's song, this one will sing your name.

Source: Emile is free to leave our island. Permanently. The Sapiarchs and the Mages Guild clearly have a long way to go before we can rely upon each other.\n\nAs for you—I must confess, I find your diligence … commendable. Take this, and my apologies.
Target: Emile is free to leave our island. Permanently. The Sapiarchs and the Mages Guild clearly have a long way to go before we can rely upon each other.\n\nAs for you—I must confess, I find your diligence … commendable. Take this, and my apologies.

Source: The beasts at the shrines were deliberately drawn by piles of offal.
Target: 성소의 짐승들은 고의적으로 내장더미가 되었습니다.

Source: Damn it all! Thoda said Suturah's sons were dangerous. That's certainly true now. With the Ansei Wards, they can raise an army faster than I can!\n\nWe have to stop them. We have to send Uwafa and Alasan to join their father in Oblivion!
Target: 젠장! Thoda 장군은 Suturah의 아들들이 위험한 놈들이라고 했네. 지금은 그 말이 확실히 맞는 것 같군. Ansei 와드가 있다면, 그들은 나의 군대보다 빠르게 그들의 언데드 군대를 일으킬 수 있네!\n\n그들을 막아야 하네. Uwafa와 Alasan을 오블리비언에 있는 그놈들 아비 곁으로 보내버려야 해!

Source: I purchased a strange statue from an Ashlander merchant in the wilderness. It might be a religious fetish. Later, I met a Dark Elf named <<1>> who wanted to purchase it from me. When he used it, the <<2>> appeared. It killed him him where he stood.
Target: I purchased a strange statue from an Ashlander merchant in the wilderness. It might be a religious fetish. Later, I met a Dark Elf named <<1>> who wanted to purchase it from me. When he used it, the <<2>> appeared. It killed him him where he stood.

Source: Mercifully, yes. The Mages Guild promised to imprison Emile for the rest of his brief Breton life. I have no reason to doubt their sincerity given your honesty today.\n\nLet us put this matter behind us. The Guild and the Sapiarchs must move forward.
Target: Mercifully, yes. The Mages Guild promised to imprison Emile for the rest of his brief Breton life. I have no reason to doubt their sincerity given your honesty today.\n\nLet us put this matter behind us. The Guild and the Sapiarchs must move forward.

Source: I found this note. I think there's something suspicious about the General's new retainer.
Target: 노트를 하나 발견 했습니다. 제 생각에는 장군의 새 보금자리가 뭔가 의심스럽습니다.

Source: Here are the ingredients we gathered from the cave.
Target: Here are the ingredients we gathered from the cave.

Source: I recovered your cargo and manifest from the raiders.
Target: 레이더들로 부터 짐과 적하목록을 되찾아왔습니다.

Source: I'm here to help.
Target: 도움을 드리러 왔습니다.

Source: Is there anything else you need me to do?
Target: Is there anything else you need me to do?

Source: The spirit <<1>> sent me to you.
Target: 영혼 << 1 >>이 나를 당신에게 보냈습니다.\n

Source: Sithis welcomes all souls to the Void, no matter how they arrive. You have executed your duty, but I expect more from you.\n\nReturn tomorrow. I'll offer you a chance to prove that you can excel, not just kill.
Target: 시디스께서는 모든 영혼을 환영하신다. 어떻게 그에게 왔는지는 상관하지 않으시지. 네 임무를 성공했으나, 난 네게 그 이상을 바랬다.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 단순히 죽이는 것 이상으로 네가 더 발전할 기회를 주마.

Source: I've collected amulets from the bodies of fallen Pact soldiers.
Target: 나는 낙오 한 협동 병사들의 시체에서 부적을 수집했습니다.\n

Source: Rhavil's behavior does sound suspicious.
Target: Rhavil's behavior does sound suspicious.

Source: You believe the Worms were pawns?
Target: the Worm들이 심복이라고 생각하세요?\n

Source: Performed with all the care befitting the Night Mother's sacred work. Your devotion to this task has not been overlooked.\n\nReturn again tomorrow and I will offer you another opportunity to demonstrate your skill.
Target: 나이트 마더의 성스러운 일에 걸맞게 정성을 다해 수행했다. 이 일에 대한 네 헌신은 간과되지 않았네.\n\n 내일 다시 오면 네 기술을 증명할 또 다른 기회를 주겠다.

Source: Ithis feared for his life. He agreed to surrender if I led him out of the ruins.
Target: 이티스는 자신의 목숨에 대해 걱정했습니다.제가 폐허에서 꺼내주는것으로 항복하겠다고 약속했습니다.

Source: Another soul delivered to Sithis. It's unfortunate that things did not go wholly as planned, but the end result is the same.\n\nReflect on what occurred. Return tomorrow and use what you have learned.
Target: 또 하나의 영혼이 시디스께 보내졌군. 계획대로 진행되지 않은게 실망이지만, 결과는 같네.\n\n오늘 일을 반성하게. 오늘의 교훈을 내일 다시 와서 확인하게.

Source: Ithis Omalor is dead. He was sent to attack you by Magistrix Vox, but didn't know why.
Target: 이티스 오말러는 죽었습니다. 그는 여마법사 복스에 의해 당신을 공격하라고 보내졌지만 그 이유는 알지 못했습니다.

Source: Ah, so you do know who I am then? Did my father put you up to this? Is he keeping tabs on me?\n\nWell … I shouldn't be so accusatory. If he was tracking me, then I guess that turned out to be extremely fortunate.

Target: What's going on outside? Is Kyne's Aegis secured?

Source: I've decided to accept your offer.
Target: 당신의 제안을 받아들이죠.

Source: I've decided to accept your offer.
Target: I've decided to accept your offer.

Source: I found this on Falgravn's corpse. A Bloodstone Chalice.
Target: I found this on Falgravn's corpse. A Bloodstone Chalice.

Source: I've decided to accept your offer.
Target: 당신의 제안을 받아들이죠.

Source: I found this on Lord Falgravn's corpse. An Amulet of Bats.
Target: I found this on Lord Falgravn's corpse. An Amulet of Bats.

Source: I've decided to accept your offer.
Target: I've decided to accept your offer.

Source: Well, good for you. But don't get too full of your accomplishments just yet. That was a fairly easy contract I started you with.\n\nCome back when you're ready for more. If the Speaker or the Matron give an order, though, that takes priority.
Target: 뭐, 네게는 좋은 일이겠군. 그러나 아직 네가 이룬 것에 배불러 하진 말라고. 그건 네가 시작하기 좋은 쉬운 작업이었을 뿐이니까.\n\n더 작업을 수행하고 싶다면 돌아오도록. 그래도, 스피커와 여주인 아스타라의 명령이 더 우선이라는 것은 알아둬라.

Source: <The client provided a crate of Alchemy supplies as payment, along with a note.>\n\n"The Orsinium Civic Renewal and Vengeance Committee appreciates your work. These supplies now go toward renewing the city of Orsinium. Malacath curse your enemies!"
Target: <고객이 쪽지와 함께 연금술 보급품 상자를 보상으로 지급했습니다.>\n\n\\"오시니움 도시 재건과 복수 위원회는 당신의 작업에 감사드립니다. 이 물자들은 이제 오시니움의 도시를 재건하는 데 도움이 될 것입니다. 말라카스께서 당신의 적들을 저주하시길!\"\""

Source: <The client provided a crate of Alchemy supplies as payment, along with a note.>\n\n"The Orsinium Civic Renewal and Vengeance Committee appreciates your work. These supplies now go toward renewing the city of Orsinium. Malacath curse your enemies!"
Target: <고객이 쪽지와 함께 연금술 보급품 상자를 보상으로 지급했습니다.>\n\n\\"오시니움 도시 재건과 복수 위원회는 당신의 작업에 감사드립니다. 이 물자들은 이제 오시니움의 도시를 재건하는 데 도움이 될 것입니다. 말라카스께서 당신의 적들을 저주하시길!\"\""

Source: <The client provided a crate of Alchemy supplies as payment, along with a note.>\n\n"The Orsinium Civic Renewal and Vengeance Committee appreciates your work. These supplies now go toward renewing the city of Orsinium. Malacath curse your enemies!"
Target: <고객이 쪽지와 함께 연금술 보급품 상자를 보상으로 지급했습니다.>\n\n\\"오시니움 도시 재건과 복수 위원회는 당신의 작업에 감사드립니다. 이 물자들은 이제 오시니움의 도시를 재건하는 데 도움이 될 것입니다. 말라카스께서 당신의 적들을 저주하시길!\"\""

Source: It's as I feared. The Shadow breached the Cogitum Centralis—Lord Seht's seat of power. If it reaches the core … if it removes Lord Seht from the Throne-Aligned …. We can't let that happen.\n\nYou should steel yourself for the battles ahead.
Target: 내 염려 대로야. 그 그림자가 Cogitum 의 중심—셋 경의 권좌를 침범했어. 만약 그게 코어를 손에 넣는다면 … 만약 셋 경을 왕좌에서 끌어내리는 데 성공한다면 … 우린 그런 일이 일어나게 해선 안돼.\n\n너는 다음에 있을 전투에 대비해서 준비해야만 해.

Source: I have a dispatch here from Captain Ronag.
Target: I have a dispatch here from Captain Ronag.

Source: Ever dream of the most perfect kill? Sometimes it keeps me up at night, imagining the best way to send a soul to Sithis. I thought I figured it out once. It came to me in a dream. But a dead chicken and a soup spoon make for terrible weapons.
Target: Ever dream of the most perfect kill? Sometimes it keeps me up at night, imagining the best way to send a soul to Sithis. I thought I figured it out once. It came to me in a dream. But a dead chicken and a soup spoon make for terrible weapons.

Source: Oh yes, these will do nicely! The Court preens in elegance and splendor as the featherless curs languish in muck and mire.\n\nTake these coins for your efforts, crow-friend. And may your feathers always stay groomed!
Target: Oh yes, these will do nicely! The Court preens in elegance and splendor as the featherless curs languish in muck and mire.\n\nTake these coins for your efforts, crow-friend. And may your feathers always stay groomed!

Source: What do you need me to do?
Target: What do you need me to do?

Source: What will happen to Leki's Blade?
Target: What will happen to Leki's Blade?

Source: What will happen to Leki's Blade?
Target: What will happen to Leki's Blade?

Source: I spent a lovely evening listening to a Sermonizer in Kvatch. He went on and on about how terrible the Dark Brotherhood is. I found it quite amusing. And so did he when I stuck an ice pick in his ear.\n\nSpeaking of perfect kills, here's your payment.
Target: I spent a lovely evening listening to a Sermonizer in Kvatch. He went on and on about how terrible the Dark Brotherhood is. I found it quite amusing. And so did he when I stuck an ice pick in his ear.\n\nSpeaking of perfect kills, here's your payment.

Source: Such foolish trinkets. I love them! The Court will have such fun. Our play, it will be epic!\n\nYou have once again demonstrated your respect and loyalty, crow-friend. Take these with our gratitude.
Target: Such foolish trinkets. I love them! The Court will have such fun. Our play, it will be epic!\n\nYou have once again demonstrated your respect and loyalty, crow-friend. Take these with our gratitude.

Source: Everyone celebrates New Life? So is there more than one way to enjoy the festival?
Target: Everyone celebrates New Life? So is there more than one way to enjoy the festival?

Source: I'm sorry. We couldn't save Celan, but we brought his killer, the Ghost of the Green, to justice.
Target: 죄송해요. 켈란을 구할수없었어요, 하지만 우린 그를 죽인 살인자, 녹색의 유령에게, 심판을 내려줬어요.

Source: I've decided to accept your offer.
Target: I've decided to accept your offer.

Source: I'm sorry Pandermalion didn't make it, but his actions saved the day.
Target: I'm sorry Pandermalion didn't make it, but his actions saved the day.

Source: The Maormer may have gotten the best of him, but it was Pandermalion's plan that saved the day.
Target: The Maormer may have gotten the best of him, but it was Pandermalion's plan that saved the day.

Source: They exploited a secret entrance only he could open. He was using it to carry on an illicit affair.
Target: They exploited a secret entrance only he could open. He was using it to carry on an illicit affair.

Source: Is there anything I can do to help restore your missing memories?
Target: 당신의 사라진 기억을 회복하는 데 제가 도와드릴 일이 있을까요?

Source: The designs of Lord Seht never cease to amaze. Even so broken, you can feel how they resonate with the world around. I don't know that I can mend these things, but I will explore their therapeutic benefits on my wards.\n\nMay this benefit you in turn.
Target: The designs of Lord Seht never cease to amaze. Even so broken, you can feel how they resonate with the world around. I don't know that I can mend these things, but I will explore their therapeutic benefits on my wards.\n\nMay this benefit you in turn.

Source: They may not have possessed a divine spark, but you must have felt the power of the Saints' souls. It must have been the will of the Three to see their beloved cohort finally granted rest.\n\nHere, an offering for one who walks the path of Sainthood.
Target: They may not have possessed a divine spark, but you must have felt the power of the Saints' souls. It must have been the will of the Three to see their beloved cohort finally granted rest.\n\nHere, an offering for one who walks the path of Sainthood.

Source: Thank you for delivering the Three's mercy to those wayward souls.They've endured much in their lifetimes, they deserve to have some rest.\n\nYou are always welcome here, should you wish to pay your respects.
Target: Thank you for delivering the Three's mercy to those wayward souls.They've endured much in their lifetimes, they deserve to have some rest.\n\nYou are always welcome here, should you wish to pay your respects.

Source: You have done a great service today. For me, for the Saints, for the Three. This place can become a place of healing once again.\n\nThere is a long road ahead, but take this with my gratitude.
Target: You have done a great service today. For me, for the Saints, for the Three. This place can become a place of healing once again.\n\nThere is a long road ahead, but take this with my gratitude.

Source: Anyone who has House Dres's respect has mine.
Target: Anyone who has House Dres's respect has mine.

Source: I've given <<1>> the note and forgiven his debt.
Target: I've given <<1>> the note and forgiven his debt.

Source: I'm ready for duty. I don't need training.
Target: I'm ready for duty. I don't need training.

Source: Here are the tokens.
Target: Here are the tokens.

Source: So when I find a relic, I should put it back in its display case?
Target: 그러니까 제가 유물을 발견해 가져와서, 이곳에 있는 진열장에 넣기만 하면 된다는거죠?

Source: The taste is unforgettable.
Target: 그 맛은 잊을 수가 없다.

Source: We all saw the same thing. Could the legends be false?
Target: 우리 모두 똑같은 것을 보았습니다. 전설이 거짓일 수도 있을까요?

Source: You don't seem overly concerned about Chief Bazrag.
Target: 당신은 바즈라그 족장에 대해 지나치게 염려하지 않는 것 같습니다.\n

Source: This means more than you know. The gro-Morkul clan had all but given up finding this sword again. Now we can finally return to Orsinium with our heads high. \n\nThank you. Your actions deserve a greater reward than this, but it's been a slow year.
Target: This means more than you know. The gro-Morkul clan had all but given up finding this sword again. Now we can finally return to Orsinium with our heads high. \n\nThank you. Your actions deserve a greater reward than this, but it's been a slow year.

Source: The Great Shackle is destroyed?
Target: The Great Shackle is destroyed?

Source: I suppose I have to. I'll admit, the mutt's more useful than most. She at least keeps the rats at bay. Besides, I don't think anyone else would.\n\nThank you for letting me know. Here's something for your troubles.
Target: 그래야 할 거 같아. 솔직히 인정하자면, 그 개가 대부분의 다른 개들보다 더 쓸모 있거든. 적어도 쥐가 근처로 접근하지 못하게 해주잖아. 게다가, 다른 누가 얠 돌봐줄 거라고 생각하지도 않고. \n\n알려줘서 고마워. 여기 네 노고에 대한 보상이야.

Source: I rescued everyone I could.
Target: I rescued everyone I could.

Source: Is the Great Shackle destroyed?
Target: 거대한 걸쇠는 파괴된건가요?

Source: I found Lauriel's ghost wandering the catacombs. I rebound her to her tomb.
Target: I found Lauriel's ghost wandering the catacombs. I rebound her to her tomb.

Source: Nasty business in Stormhold. You must enjoy having the ear of the vicecanons.
Target: Nasty business in Stormhold. You must enjoy having the ear of the vicecanons.

Source: I have saved Bakkhara from the Daedric Realm but unfortunately, Kargand was beyond redemption.
Target: I have saved Bakkhara from the Daedric Realm but unfortunately, Kargand was beyond redemption.

Source: The Great Shackle is destroyed?
Target: The Great Shackle is destroyed?

Source: Indeed, but not until we finish studying the pearl Valsirenn brought us. There are mysteries to unravel and Val believes you will be instrumental to our success.\n\nWe can get started immediately, unless you want to explore our island first.
Target: 있다네. 하지만 발시렌에 우리에게 가져 온 진주에 대한 연구를 먼저 마쳐야 할 걸세. 아직 풀리지 않은 수수께끼가 있어. 그리고 발시렌은 우리가 성공하려면 네 도움이 필요할 거라고 생각한다네.\n\n자네가 먼저 우리 섬을 살펴 보고 싶지 않다면, 즉시 시작할 수 있을 걸세.

Source: Seht bless you! I can't wait to delve into all this collected data. Please, take this for your trouble. Knowledge may go beyond value, but I hope this shows my gratitude.\n\nCome on Brassie, let's get you set up for analysis!
Target: 셋의 축복이 있기를! 이 녀석이 수집한 데이터를 빨리 살펴보고 싶어. 제발, 네 수고에 보답하고 싶으니, 이걸 받아줘. 어쩌면 지식이 이것보다 더 가치 있을 수도 있겠지만, 감사하다는 마음을 보여주고 싶어. \n\n이리 와 브레시, 널 분석할 준비를 해야겠어!

Source: The Great Shackle is destroyedt?
Target: The Great Shackle is destroyedt?

Source: The Brass Fortress thanks you for your cooperation in this matter. All citizens are entitled to a reward for this service.\n\nGo forth and create, citizen.
Target: 황동 요새는 이 문제에 협조 해 주셔서 감사합니다. 모든 시민들은 봉사에 대한 보상을 받을 권리가 있습니다.\n\n나아가시고 창조하십시오, 시민.

Source: Trust in what Tableau says. If she wants to be your friend, you should accept that.
Target: Trust in what Tableau says. If she wants to be your friend, you should accept that.

Source: It worked. Courtier Vindilween has agreed to grant you an immediate audience with the Proxy Queen.
Target: It worked. Courtier Vindilween has agreed to grant you an immediate audience with the Proxy Queen.

Source: I know you'll do the right thing.
Target: 네가 옳은 일을 할 거란 걸 알아.

Source: Manacar sent me to deliver this heart to you.
Target: Manacar sent me to deliver this heart to you.

Source: How can you complain that he's not respecting your wishes, when you refuse to respect his?
Target: How can you complain that he's not respecting your wishes, when you refuse to respect his?

Source: You have done well. The people of Cyrodiil will sleep better tonight for your efforts. And the guild is not ungrateful ….
Target: You have done well. The people of Cyrodiil will sleep better tonight for your efforts. And the guild is not ungrateful ….

Source: I've found my way into the mine. One step closer to uncovering the Reachmen's plan.
Target: 광산으로 들어갔다. Reachmen의 계획을 밝히기위한 한 걸음 더 가까이 갔다.\n

Source: That's the first good news I've heard in a long time. The Dremora and those cursed cultists will have to find another way in now.\n\nI'll trade you a reward for my crystal.
Target: 오랫동안 듣지 못했던 좋은 소식이네. 드레모라와 놈들의 빌어먹을 광신도들은 이제 다른 길을 찾아야 하겠지.\n\n내 수정을 돌려주면 보상을 줄게.

Source: Then I trust he will stay that way or you will answer to me.\n\nTake this as a token of thanks for assisting the chief and for your willingness to find the truth of the dark matters that plague Wrothgar. I'll contact you in Orsinium when I have news.
Target: Then I trust he will stay that way or you will answer to me.\n\nTake this as a token of thanks for assisting the chief and for your willingness to find the truth of the dark matters that plague Wrothgar. I'll contact you in Orsinium when I have news.

Source: You summoned me for a specific reason, Ritemaster?
Target: 절 특별한 이유로 부르지 않으셨나요, 라이트마스터?

Source: You've done more for me and my people than I could have ever expected. I appreciate that. It shows you have honor.\n\nNow get to the temple and make sure the high priestess is all right. We need her alive!
Target: You've done more for me and my people than I could have ever expected. I appreciate that. It shows you have honor.\n\nNow get to the temple and make sure the high priestess is all right. We need her alive!

Source: Thanks for helping me. If there's a way I can repay you, let me know.
Target: Thanks for helping me. If there's a way I can repay you, let me know.

Source: What do I need to do then?
Target: What do I need to do then?

Source: There's no time to wait for the queen. We must act now.
Target: There's no time to wait for the queen. We must act now.

Source: Best of luck.
Target: Best of luck.

Source: I'm told the Queen is in town. A member of her retinue recommended I visit the city.
Target: I'm told the Queen is in town. A member of her retinue recommended I visit the city.

Source: Good, though some ears would have been nice. Anyway, the guild appreciates your efforts. Keep up the good work, comrade!
Target: Good, though some ears would have been nice. Anyway, the guild appreciates your efforts. Keep up the good work, comrade!

Source: I am glad to hear it. The guild's reputation rests in the hands of its members; you have represented us well this day.
Target: I am glad to hear it. The guild's reputation rests in the hands of its members; you have represented us well this day.

Source: That's a small blessing. If I had known what Skorvild was doing, maybe I could have talked to him and stopped this.\n\nAnyway, thanks for your help. You kept a bad situation from turning even worse.
Target: That's a small blessing. If I had known what Skorvild was doing, maybe I could have talked to him and stopped this.\n\nAnyway, thanks for your help. You kept a bad situation from turning even worse.

Source: Modesty befits a hero. You do honor to the guild, comrade. I look forward to working with you again.
Target: Modesty befits a hero. You do honor to the guild, comrade. I look forward to working with you again.

Source: They'll find one, I have no doubt. But it's good to strike back at them as hard as we can. Thank you!
Target: 놈들은 새 지도자를 찾아낼 거야. 의심의 여지가 없지. 하지만 가능한 열심히 놈들을 몰아내는게 좋아. 고마워!

Source: I deem your contract fulfilled. Accept this reward from a grateful guild.
Target: I deem your contract fulfilled. Accept this reward from a grateful guild.

Source: Damn. Honestly, I rather hoped he misheard. I suppose that's rarely the case.\n\nVery well, then. I will muster the city's defenses, but there is only so much we can do. I'm certainly glad you're here. You and Razum-dar may be our best hope.
Target: 젠장. 솔직히 잘못 들은 내용이길 바랐는데. 그런 경우는 드물겠지.\n\n아무튼 좋아. 도시를 방어할 인원을 모아 보겠지만, 우리가 할 수 있는 일이 많지가 않아. 당신이 여기 있어서 정말 다행이지. 당신이랑 라줌-다르가 우리 최고의 희망일지도 몰라.

Source: Province General Auctor will be pleased. Sebazi is pleased as well. Your have earned your pay.
Target: Province General Auctor will be pleased. Sebazi is pleased as well. Your have earned your pay.

Source: Should we go after your brother and the construct?
Target: Should we go after your brother and the construct?

Source: The guild thanks you, comrade. Here is the reward for your efforts.
Target: The guild thanks you, comrade. Here is the reward for your efforts.

Source: Knight Darien needs to recover his strength first and restore the Dawnbreaker. Then we can attempt to unblock the path and see where I took the Heart of Transparent Law.\n\nFor now, take this with my thanks.
Target: 기사 다리엔이 먼저 힘을 회복하고 던브레이커를 복구해야겠지. 그런 다음 우린 길을 뚫고 내가 투명한 법의 심장을 어디로 가져갔는지 확인할 수 있을 게야.\n\n지금으로선, 내 감사의 표시로 이걸 받아 주게.

Source: You have turned back a little of Cyrodiil's darkness, comrade. Sebazi honors you!
Target: You have turned back a little of Cyrodiil's darkness, comrade. Sebazi honors you!

Source: That is indeed good news. Thank you for your efforts.
Target: That is indeed good news. Thank you for your efforts.

Source: Well, that's something at least. I like hearing about piles of corpses, but you earned your reward.
Target: Well, that's something at least. I like hearing about piles of corpses, but you earned your reward.

Source: I remember now. Good. That'll keep Province General Auctor happy for a while. Maybe I'll go bash in a few heads myself. We'll see.
Target: I remember now. Good. That'll keep Province General Auctor happy for a while. Maybe I'll go bash in a few heads myself. We'll see.

Source: Excellent! Best news I've heard all day. You're a credit to the guild, comrade.
Target: Excellent! Best news I've heard all day. You're a credit to the guild, comrade.

Source: Sparkle and shine! These will do nicely. Even the Duke of Crows should be impressed, and he's a hard one to please.\n\nI have something for you in return. A prize for the Blackfeather Court's favorite crow-friend.
Target: Sparkle and shine! These will do nicely. Even the Duke of Crows should be impressed, and he's a hard one to please.\n\nI have something for you in return. A prize for the Blackfeather Court's favorite crow-friend.

Source: Is that the end of the runaway Dwarven sphere?
Target: Is that the end of the runaway Dwarven sphere?

Source: Will you be all right now?
Target: 이제 괜찮으시겠어요?

Source: Yes. And with that beast Rakkhat killed, it will stay that way. Well, Adara'hai can hope, yes?\n\nThank you, friend. Take this and my blessing. When Jone and Jode cry out for a hero's song, this one will sing your name.
Target: Yes. And with that beast Rakkhat killed, it will stay that way. Well, Adara'hai can hope, yes?\n\nThank you, friend. Take this and my blessing. When Jone and Jode cry out for a hero's song, this one will sing your name.

Source: Yes. And with that beast Rakkhat killed, it will stay that way. Well, Adara'hai can hope, yes?\n\nThank you, friend. When Jone and Jode cry out for a hero's song, this one will sing your name.
Target: Yes. And with that beast Rakkhat killed, it will stay that way. Well, Adara'hai can hope, yes?\n\nThank you, friend. When Jone and Jode cry out for a hero's song, this one will sing your name.

Source: They're going to take Bazrag at the inn and claim that Solgra leads the Voah Rakh.
Target: They're going to take Bazrag at the inn and claim that Solgra leads the Voah Rakh.

Source: I dealt with the Maulborn, but I think their plans go way beyond the Serk.
Target: 내가 마울본을 처리했지만, 그들의 계획이 서크에서 끝날 것 같진 않을것 같지 않다고 생각해.

Source: You're the one who saved For Zeren. Terrible what happened at Foyen Docks, though.
Target: 당신은 제렌을 구원했습니다. 하지만 포엔 부두에서 일어난 일은 참혹했어요.

Source: Actually, I'm here with a message from Skywatch.
Target: Actually, I'm here with a message from Skywatch.

Source: She will pay you the gold herself.
Target: 그녀가 돈을 낼거야.

Source: She did pay the blood price.
Target: 그녀는 피로 값을 치뤘군.

Source: You should mourn with her.
Target: 너는 그녀와 애도해야한다.

Source: Think I don't remember, you daft little sprig? Call me a debt-hedger, will you? A deal-fondler?\n\nAh, but you're forgiven. I've always said grudges are like a good cheese. Hold them inside for too long, and you're the one to suffer.
Target: 내가 기억 못할 거라고 생각했느냐, 어리석은 작은 나뭇가지야? 날 부채 상환 전문가라고 불러 주겠니? 아니면 거래 애호가?\n\n아, 하지만 널 용서해 주지. 난 항상 원한은 좋은 치즈 같다고 말했으니까. 안에 너무 오래 묵혀 두면, 고생하게 될 거야.

Source: I hope you and Rigvar have learned a lesson here.
Target: 너와 Rigvar 이 여기서 교훈을 얻었 으면한다.\n

Source: We did, did we?\n\nWell, I suppose you're right. Aulie and I could always visit. Perhaps during hurricane season! That would be delightful.
Target: 그랬어, 그랬지?\n\n뭐, 네 말이 맞겠지. 아울리랑 나는 언제든지 방문할 수 있으니까. 태풍철동안 오게 될 지도! 정말 재밌을 거야.

Source: It really sticks to the ribs.
Target: It really sticks to the ribs.

Source: Can I help?
Target: 도와줄까?

Source: It seems your work was far from perfect, but a life is a life.\n\nReturn tomorrow. The truest path to improvement is practice, and the Night Mother provides ample opportunity for that.
Target: 너의 일은 완벽하지 못했지만, 인생은 인생이야.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 개선의 가장 진실한 길은 실천이며, 나이트 마더께선 충분한 기회를 줄 것이야.

Source: My tongue has never experienced that sensation.
Target: My tongue has never experienced that sensation.

Source: Can I help?
Target: 도와줄까?

Source: This dish is a rare vision.
Target: This dish is a rare vision.

Source: Can I help?
Target: 도와드릴까요?

Source: Exemplary work. You truly possess the gift of death.\n\nReturn tomorrow. I'm certain we can find more ways to put your skills to the test.
Target: 훌륭한 솜씨로군. 너에겐 죽음을 가져오는 재능이 있는게 틀림없어.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 그 능력을 확인하기 위해, 새로운 시련을 준비해두지.

Source: Excellent. The Night Mother will be pleased.\n\nReturn tomorrow. I am eager to see you reach your full potential.
Target: 훌륭하군. 나이트 마더께서 기뻐하시겠어.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 자네의 잠재력을 최대한 발휘한 모습을 보고 싶으니.

Source: Are you sure you can find the way?
Target: Are you sure you can find the way?

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 할 건가요?

Source: I don't care if they're under control. I'm not going to Lower Yorgrim until the giants go away.
Target: I don't care if they're under control. I'm not going to Lower Yorgrim until the giants go away.

Source: No thanks.
Target: 아니, 괜찮아.

Source: I returned the mug. You should free <<1>>.
Target: 제가 머그잔을 돌려 드렸으니. << 1 >>를 풀어주셨으면 합니다.

Source: Yes, it's done.
Target: 그래. 이제 됐어.

Source: I have not forgotten, Vestige. It is another piece of the puzzle and we shall address it in due time. \n\nBut for now, let us rest and recover. As always, I will contact you soon. Walk in the light, Vestige.
Target: 그것도 잊지 않았네, 잔존자여. 그것은 수수께끼의 또다른 조각이고 적당한 때가 되면 찾아낼 것이야.\n\n하지만 지금은 쉬면서 회복해야 하네. 항상 그렇듯이, 곧 자네에게 연락함세. 빛 속을 걷게, 잔존자여.

Source: Yes, I heard about the trouble at Fharun Stronghold. Thank Malacath that you were able to secure the holy text.\n\nThe Agra Crun will make sure it remains safe. The Vosh Rakh lost today's battle, thanks to you.
Target: 그래, 파룬 요새에서 일어난 사고에 대해선 들었었다. 네가 신성한 글을 확보 했으니 말라카스께 감사를 드려야겠어.\n\n아그라 크런이 안전하게 보관하도록 하겠다. 보쉬 라크는 오늘 전투에서 졌다, 네 덕분이지.

Source: The battle against the Scaled Court will continue, but this was the one place in Craglorn the Serpent could be contained. You accomplished wonders today.\n\nTuruk wanted me to give this to you. Don't worry—it's not diseased. I think.
Target: The battle against the Scaled Court will continue, but this was the one place in Craglorn the Serpent could be contained. You accomplished wonders today.\n\nTuruk wanted me to give this to you. Don't worry—it's not diseased. I think.

Source: Do you have my cut?
Target: Do you have my cut?

Source: Excellent. The Night Mother will be pleased.\n\nReturn tomorrow. I am eager to see you reach your full potential.
Target: 훌륭하군. 나이트 마더께서 기뻐하시겠어.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 자네의 잠재력을 최대한 발휘한 모습을 보고 싶으니.

Source: It seems your work was far from perfect, but a life is a life.\n\nReturn tomorrow. The truest path to improvement is practice, and the Night Mother provides ample opportunity for that.
Target: 너의 일은 완벽하지 못했지만, 인생은 인생이야.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 개선의 가장 진실한 길은 실천이며, 나이트 마더께선 충분한 기회를 줄 것이야.

Source: Tomorrow is the first time in many years that I won't have anything to do. No tasks, no duties. Nothing prophesied, anyway.\n\nHave you ever had rotmeth? I've always wanted to try rotmeth. Maybe a trip to Valenwood is in order.
Target: Tomorrow is the first time in many years that I won't have anything to do. No tasks, no duties. Nothing prophesied, anyway.\n\nHave you ever had rotmeth? I've always wanted to try rotmeth. Maybe a trip to Valenwood is in order.

Source: Exemplary work. You truly have a gift for death.\n\nReturn tomorrow. I'm certain we can find more ways to put your skills to the test.
Target: 훌륭한 솜씨로군. 너에겐 죽음을 가져오는 재능이 있는게 틀림없어.\n\n내일 다시 오거라. 그 능력을 확인하기 위해, 새로운 시련을 준비해두지.

Source: Scholar Zhoreh wants you to send Shiri back to Bergama
Target: Scholar Zhoreh wants you to send Shiri back to Bergama

Source: I've just come from speaking to priestess Kauzanabi-jo.
Target: 여사제 카우자나비-조의 이야기를 듣고 왔습니다.

Source: What should we do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 해야 하죠?

Source: What should we do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 해야 하죠?

Source: I'd like a reward.
Target: 나는 보상을 원해.\n

Source: No thanks.
Target: 아니, 괜찮아.

Source: No thanks.
Target: 아니, 괜찮아.

Source: A friend sailed on the Prowler when you defeated Vicereeve Pelidil. The stories he tells!
Target: A friend sailed on the Prowler when you defeated Vicereeve Pelidil. The stories he tells!

Source: No thanks.
Target: 아니, 괜찮아.

Source: Argonians, exiled from the Gray Mire. Will the Dominion do so to Khajiit, one day?
Target: 아르고니안들. 회색 진창에서 추방됐지. 언젠가 자치령이 카짓에게도 그렇게 할까?

Source: Before we go, take this. Verandis gave it to me, but I can't keep it. You helped him so much. You should have it.\n\nYou helped the man I cared about … the man I loved. And you were with him to the end. This belongs to you.
Target: Before we go, take this. Verandis gave it to me, but I can't keep it. You helped him so much. You should have it.\n\nYou helped the man I cared about … the man I loved. And you were with him to the end. This belongs to you.

Source: A Dominion general, perhaps? Whoever he is, we'll stop his march through Shadowfen.\n\nI'll appoint <<1>> to lead the scouts in our search for <<2>>. I swear to you, he'll account for the Dominion's terror.
Target: A Dominion general, perhaps? Whoever he is, we'll stop his march through Shadowfen.\n\nI'll appoint <<1>> to lead the scouts in our search for <<2>>. I swear to you, he'll account for the Dominion's terror.

Source: Return to Orsinium and warn Chief Bazrag. I'll meet you there shortly.
Target: 오르시 늄으로 돌아가서 Bazrag 장에게 경고하십시오. 나는 곧 거기에서 너를 만날 것이다.

Source: I knew it. They're both too stubborn and proud to take orders from anyone. Well, at least they're alive, for now.\n\nThank you for letting me know.
Target: 그럴 줄 알았지. 둘 다 다른 사람한테서 지시받기엔 너무 고집 세고 자부심 강한 녀석들이니까. 뭐, 적어도 지금은 살아 있으니까.\n\n알려줘서 고마워.

Source: Don't forget my payment.
Target: 내 지불을 잊지 마라.

Source: Is there anything else I can do to help?
Target: 내가 도울 것이 있을까?

Source: I went to Watcher's Hold. The <<z:1>> is dead.
Target: 저는 감시자의 요새에 갔었습니다. <<z:1>> 는 죽었습니다.

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: <Post Report>
Target: <보고서를 게시한다>

Source: I rescued everyone I could.
Target: 내가 구할 수 있는 사람은 모두 구했어.

Source: Any idea what we should do next?
Target: 다음에 뭘 해야할까?

Source: You're right. They'll know what to do. They have to.\n\nDespite his rough manner, <<1>> was a hero to many in Stormhold. When this is all over, he'll have a fitting burial.
Target: You're right. They'll know what to do. They have to.\n\nDespite his rough manner, <<1>> was a hero to many in Stormhold. When this is all over, he'll have a fitting burial.

Source: You bear the Brimstone Crown! So the Lava Queen's reign ends at last.
Target: You bear the Brimstone Crown! So the Lava Queen's reign ends at last.

Source: Really? That's outrageous. But that does explain what that old Nord I bought the place from was trying to tell me.\n\nAnyway, we'll leave the camp vacant for now. Eventually the trolls will leave. Take this for helping us. And thank you.
Target: Really? That's outrageous. But that does explain what that old Nord I bought the place from was trying to tell me.\n\nAnyway, we'll leave the camp vacant for now. Eventually the trolls will leave. Take this for helping us. And thank you.

Source: Thank you. I will destroy the skull and rid the world of Blackheart's menace once and for all. \n\nMay fortune find you wherever you go, my friend.
Target: Thank you. I will destroy the skull and rid the world of Blackheart's menace once and for all. \n\nMay fortune find you wherever you go, my friend.

Source: <<1>> chose exile, but she didn't confess to killing <<2>>.
Target: <<1>> chose exile, but she didn't confess to killing <<2>>.

Source: It seems some treasure hunter looted the Old Badwater Mine. Good for them.
Target: It seems some treasure hunter looted the Old Badwater Mine. Good for them.

Source: The Daedra opened a portal at Moonhenge, and some hero collapsed it single-handedly.
Target: The Daedra opened a portal at Moonhenge, and some hero collapsed it single-handedly.

Source: Heard they found some dead treasure hunter out by Badwater Mine. Cursed gemstones.
Target: Heard they found some dead treasure hunter out by Badwater Mine. Cursed gemstones.

Source: Angof's gone, but I wonder how long his creepy vines are going to stick around.
