Target: Angof's gone, but I wonder how long his creepy vines are going to stick around.

Source: I found <<Cz:1>>. Here you are.
Target: <<Cz:1>>를 찾았어. 여기.

Source: These … these are my mother's remains. I thought this urn had been lost forever!\n\nI carved the designs onto the urn myself, pictures of things my mother loved. I can't believe thieves would steal it. Thank you for returning it to me.
Target: These … these are my mother's remains. I thought this urn had been lost forever!\n\nI carved the designs onto the urn myself, pictures of things my mother loved. I can't believe thieves would steal it. Thank you for returning it to me.

Source: I did, thanks to you. Not only did I make it in time to see my sister get married, but I also decided to follow her example and become a soldier for the Skald-King.\n\nWe're going to drive the traitorous Stormfist out of our land!
Target: I did, thanks to you. Not only did I make it in time to see my sister get married, but I also decided to follow her example and become a soldier for the Skald-King.\n\nWe're going to drive the traitorous Stormfist out of our land!

Source: As one story ends, another reaches its climax. Our little bit of mischief was a success: because of you, Aranias may very well betray her masters to defend the Wilderking.
Target: 한 이야기가 끝났고, 또 다른 이야기는 절정에 이르렀지. 우리의 작은 장난은 성공적이었다네. 자네 덕분에 아라나이아스는 윌더킹님을 보호하기 위해 자신의 주인을 아주 잘 배신할 걸세.

Source: Egnatius is safe. He said that Molag Bal is looking for information on a scroll he found.
Target: Egnatius is safe. He said that Molag Bal is looking for information on a scroll he found.

Source: I'm ready. What do you want me to do next?
Target: 준비됐네. 뭘 해야하지?

Source: Fildgor's dead? As it should be. I mourn with my father, though. \n\nYou've been by his side and have persevered when others would have faltered. From now on, you shall be known as the High King's Arrow, for you lead the way and always strike true.
Target: Fildgor's dead? As it should be. I mourn with my father, though. \n\nYou've been by his side and have persevered when others would have faltered. From now on, you shall be known as the High King's Arrow, for you lead the way and always strike true.

Source: More than that! The rocks themselves give me strength! I feel immortal!\n\nAh, apologies my friend. This power, it's heady. Like a deep, cold pool. Refreshing, but so easy to fall into! I have much to learn, it seems!
Target: 그 이상이에요! 바위들이 스스로 저에게 힘을 주고 있어요! 불멸자가 된 느낌이네요!\n\n아, 미안해요 친구. 이 힘은 자극적이네요. 깊고 차가운  연못같아요. 신선하지만 빠져들기 쉽네요! 배워야 할 것이 많은것 같아요!

Source: We know as much as any creature of the forest does. We know because we trust the wild to be as it should, and to honor the rite of predator and prey.\n\nThat is all the Wyrd wish of any creature, man or beast. And now, we have it.
Target: We know as much as any creature of the forest does. We know because we trust the wild to be as it should, and to honor the rite of predator and prey.\n\nThat is all the Wyrd wish of any creature, man or beast. And now, we have it.

Source: What do you need me to do?
Target: 제가 뭘 하면 될까요?

Source: Scouts: Turn in your report and collect your reward.\n\n- General Dar-Liurz
Target: 정찰병에게 공지함: 보고서를 제출하고 보상을 받아가게.\n\n-  다-리우르즈 장군

Source: Here's Khoruzoth's amulet. You should have it to remember him by.
Target: 여기 코루자스의 목걸이 입니다. 그를 기억하려면 그것을 가지고 있어야 할겁니다.

Source: It was inevitable. The only person he really loved was himself. It was only a matter of time before one of his "true loves" objected.\n\nI will miss him dearly, I did love him in spite of everything … but I could not change him. Thank you.
Target: It was inevitable. The only person he really loved was himself. It was only a matter of time before one of his "true loves" objected.\n\nI will miss him dearly, I did love him in spite of everything … but I could not change him. Thank you.

Source: Here's the amulet. Where's my gold?
Target: 여기 목걸이 입니다. 제 돈은 어디에 있는건가요?

Source: He had so much to give the world—he gave joy to so many. He had many flaws, I'm no fool, but it is truly a waste.\n\nI must return to <<1>> to plan his funeral. Minstrels from across Tamriel are sure to attend. Thank you.
Target: 그이는 세상에 줄 것을 너무나 많이 갖고 있었어요. 그렇게 많은 사람들한테 즐거움을 줬는데. 결점도 많은 사람이었지만, 정말 헛된 죽음이에요.\n\n전 <<1>>으로 돌아가서 장례식 계획을 세워야겠네요. 분명 전 탐리엘의 음유 시인들이 참석할 거에요. 고마워요.

Source: Yes. This does look like Uggissar's writing. I had hoped that his wife would convince him to give up treasure hunting, but it appears that the opposite is true.\n\nThank you for bringing this to me.
Target: Yes. This does look like Uggissar's writing. I had hoped that his wife would convince him to give up treasure hunting, but it appears that the opposite is true.\n\nThank you for bringing this to me.

Source: So, the Brazier is safe.
Target: 그래서 화로는 안전합니다.

Source: You have not yet earned that knowledge, which Naemon and Pelidil took by force.\n\nThey went to Hectahame. Where you go is your choice, but I will be watching.
Target: 넌 아직 그 지식을 얻지 못한다. 네이몬과 펠리딜이 강제로 가져갔으니 말이다.\n\n놈들은 헥타헤임으로 향했다. 네가 가는 곳은 너의 선택이지만, 나는 지켜보고 있을 것이다.

Source: It's magic. It made a garrison of Imperial soldiers immortal.
Target: 그것은 마술입니다. 그것은 제국 군인의 수비대를 불멸의 존재로 만들었습니다.\n

Source: Thanks. We'll see how long she stays down this time. She never seems to stay dead for very long.\n\nI appreciate the effort though!
Target: 고마워. 이번엔 얼마나 오래 죽어 있을지 봐야겠어. 오랫동안 죽어 있었던 적이 한 번도 없었던 것 같거든.\n\n그래도 애써줘서 정말 고마워!

Source: Our investigation is just beginning. I hope the elder Pellingare isn't implicated, as well.\n\nToday is a dark one for our city. But it would've been worse if you hadn't gotten involved.
Target: 우리는 수사를 막 시작했습니다. 펠링게어 장로님이 연루되지 않았으면 좋겠습니다만.\n\n오늘날 우리 도시는 암울합니다. 하지만 당신이 개입하지 않았다면 그것은 더 나빠졌겠죠.

Source: Well done! I hope that gives us a respite from their attacks, for a while at least.\n\nYour efforts on our behalf are greatly appreciated.
Target: 잘 했네! 놈들의 공격에서 한숨 돌릴 틈이 생겼으면 좋겠군. 잠시뿐일 지라도 말일세.\n\n우리 대신에 애써줘서 정말로 고맙네.

Source: Holgunn was worried when you didn't report back in.
Target: Holgunn was worried when you didn't report back in.

Source: Holgunn One-Eye sent me to check on you.
Target: Holgunn One-Eye sent me to check on you.

Source: Have you heard? A High Elven woman named Valaste returned Eyevea to the Summerset Isles!
Target: Have you heard? A High Elven woman named Valaste returned Eyevea to the Summerset Isles!

Source: I'm here to help.
Target: I'm here to help.

Source: We'll keep the Fangs safe, as well as your friend here. He will be honored by the Shadowscales for what he did.\n\nFor you, I have a gift. This is one of the weapons I spoke of, made in the Fangs' image. Wield it well.
Target: We'll keep the Fangs safe, as well as your friend here. He will be honored by the Shadowscales for what he did.\n\nFor you, I have a gift. This is one of the weapons I spoke of, made in the Fangs' image. Wield it well.

Source: That's good to hear. Not many know how the galvanic engine's process works, so this task may be a bit tricky to boast about. You can always brag to me though. I'd be happy to give you my continued admiration.\n\nAnd a reward is needed, of course.
Target: That's good to hear. Not many know how the galvanic engine's process works, so this task may be a bit tricky to boast about. You can always brag to me though. I'd be happy to give you my continued admiration.\n\nAnd a reward is needed, of course.

Source: I heard you uncovered a lost shrine in Fungal Grotto. How eerie.
Target: I heard you uncovered a lost shrine in Fungal Grotto. How eerie.

Source: Most excellent. Water cycle regulation isn't possible without properly maintained filters. You're the reason why we won't have to drink oily water tonight!\n\nHere's your well-earned reward.
Target: 아주 훌륭해. 필터를 적절하게 유지하지 않으면 물 조절이 불가능하지. 오늘 밤에는 자네 덕분에 기름기가 많은 물을 마시지 않겠군!\n\n 여기에 자네의 괜찮은 보상이 있다네.

Source: Heart. That's not something you hear a lot about in a place that runs on gears and cogs. Here, this is your share of the treasure. You earned it.\n\nOh, and Palbatan wants you to meet him in the Outlaws Refuge afterward. He has something for you, too.
Target: Heart. That's not something you hear a lot about in a place that runs on gears and cogs. Here, this is your share of the treasure. You earned it.\n\nOh, and Palbatan wants you to meet him in the Outlaws Refuge afterward. He has something for you, too.

Source: A grim reminder of how far these great Dunmer have fallen, but perhaps Sotha Sil can mend them as he will surely mend their souls.\n\nThank you for this kind gesture.
Target: A grim reminder of how far these great Dunmer have fallen, but perhaps Sotha Sil can mend them as he will surely mend their souls.\n\nThank you for this kind gesture.

Source: There is a glimmer in these fragments. Do they resonate with the beneficence of the Three, I wonder? I will keep them with the soul gems in the hope they offer some soothing presence to the Saints.\n\nPlease accept this as thanks.
Target: There is a glimmer in these fragments. Do they resonate with the beneficence of the Three, I wonder? I will keep them with the soul gems in the hope they offer some soothing presence to the Saints.\n\nPlease accept this as thanks.

Source: Good riddance to cowards. Captain Cularalda has no place in the Dominion!
Target: Good riddance to cowards. Captain Cularalda has no place in the Dominion!

Source: This day will go down in our clan's history, and you helped make it happen! \n\nUnfortunately, I haven't figured out how to keep the guardians under control for very long, but I'm working on it!
Target: This day will go down in our clan's history, and you helped make it happen! \n\nUnfortunately, I haven't figured out how to keep the guardians under control for very long, but I'm working on it!

Source: <Cirion's body is unnaturally cold. It appears his gamble was successful. High Kinlord Rilis is defeated at last, leaving both dead.>
Target: <시리온의 몸이 부자연스럽게 차갑습니다. 그의 도박은 성공한 것 같습니다. 고위 혈족군주 릴리스는 마침내 패배하였고, 그 둘 모두 사망했습니다.>

Source: So she believes, but there may be a greater truth to her purpose here. \n\nYou may not like this, but I sense the same is true of you.
Target: 본인은 그렇게 생각하겠지만, 그녀가 여기 온 목적에는 더 큰 진실이 있을 것이다.\n\n그대 마음에 들지 않을지 모르겠다만, 그대도 똑같이 생각하는 것이 느껴지는군.

Source: Thank Akatosh! With a lich to lead them, the Shadowed Path evil could spread unchecked. We will keep an eye on those ruins henceforth.
Target: 아카토쉬여 감사합니다! 그 리치가 그림자의 길을 이끌었다면, 억제되지 않은 악이 사방에 퍼졌을 걸세. 앞으로 그 유적을 잘 감시해야겠군.

Source: A strong Argonian woman become leader of the Fighters Guild...and she's slain! Typical.
Target: A strong Argonian woman become leader of the Fighters Guild...and she's slain! Typical.

Source: I have your mace. And your shoes.
Target: I have your mace. And your shoes.

Source: I'm sorry. I found this dagger on his body. I thought you might want it.
Target: 미안. 그의 시체에서 이 단검을 찾아 냈어. 그는 네가 이걸 가졌으면 했을 거야.

Source: What's the word, soldier?
Target: What's the word, soldier?

Source: I've come from Vivec's Antlers.
Target: I've come from Vivec's Antlers.

Source: Much, when it is time. You have taught humility to a Daedric Prince, mortal. Tread carefully, for he will attempt to exact his revenge.\n\nNow go, with my blessing. When I have need of you, you will know.
Target: Much, when it is time. You have taught humility to a Daedric Prince, mortal. Tread carefully, for he will attempt to exact his revenge.\n\nNow go, with my blessing. When I have need of you, you will know.

Source: Yes, this is the right book. Just saw the witches using it a few minutes ago. I don't understand how this happened, but I sure do appreciate it.\n\nIf I get this book back to the Guildhall fast, they might not even notice it was gone!
Target: 맞아요. 바로 이 책이에요. 바로 몇 분 전에 마녀들이 이 책을 사용하는 걸 봤었는데. 어떻게 된 일인지는 이해가 안가지만, 감사해야겠군요.\n\n빨리 이 책을 길드홀로 가져간다면, 길드에서 이 책이 없어진 것도 모를 거에요!

Source: Amazing to stand at the heart of Tanzelwil, isn't it. You can hear the Ancestors whisper.
Target: Amazing to stand at the heart of Tanzelwil, isn't it. You can hear the Ancestors whisper.

Source: If the Duke were an Orc, he'd have killed himself by now. He brings shame to Evermore.
Target: If the Duke were an Orc, he'd have killed himself by now. He brings shame to Evermore.

Source: Glad to see the queen finally show her backbone. The duke deserved death for what he did.
Target: Glad to see the queen finally show her backbone. The duke deserved death for what he did.

Source: Lucius was a good friend, the bravest among us. Akatosh grant his soul peace.\n\nHe would be glad to know you completed the delivery. Here, take the payment he would have received for the supplies.
Target: 루시우스는 좋은 친구였다네. 우리 중에서 가장 용감했지. 아카토쉬께서 그의 영혼에 평화를 내려주시길.\n\n자네가 배달을 끝마쳤다는걸 알면 루시우스도 기뻐할 걸세. 여기, 루시우스가 받았을 보수금을 받아 주게나.

Source: You the one killed Captain Rama? He was my cousin. Never liked him, though.
Target: You the one killed Captain Rama? He was my cousin. Never liked him, though.

Source: I can finally go home. I'm going to crawl into my hut and sleep until the start of the next age. \n\nI'll never forget what you did for me, provided I remember any of this when I wake up.
Target: 드디어 집에 갈 수 있겠소. 내 오두막에 기어들어가서 다음 시대가 시작될 때까지 잠들어 있어야겠군.\n\n날 위해 해 준 일을 절대 잊지 않겠소. 내가 깨어났을 때 이 일을 기억한다면 말이오.

Source: You caught Captain Rama, didn't you? None too soon, if you ask me.
Target: You caught Captain Rama, didn't you? None too soon, if you ask me.

Source: Onuja sent me. He said you could use some help.
Target: 오누자가 나를 보냈다. 네게 도움이 좀 필요하다고 말했어.

Source: Virmar sent me. She said you can use some help.
Target: Virmar sent me. She said you can use some help.

Source: I'm trying to get a message to Walks-in-Ash. The wards at Tormented Spire are unstable.
Target: I'm trying to get a message to Walks-in-Ash. The wards at Tormented Spire are unstable.

Source: I've got your goods. Here you go.
Target: 당신의 물건을 찾아왔습니다. 여기 있어요.

Source: I found this journal. There was a Covenant mage controlling the spiders.
Target: I found this journal. There was a Covenant mage controlling the spiders.

Source: The portal is closed, and the Covenant plan stopped.
Target: The portal is closed, and the Covenant plan stopped.

Source: You're the favored one, the one Ysgramor appeared to.
Target: You're the favored one, the one Ysgramor appeared to.

Source: Plague in Narsis? Hah! Those Dark Elves wouldn't know a real plague if it crawled out and bit them.
Target: Plague in Narsis? Hah! Those Dark Elves wouldn't know a real plague if it crawled out and bit them.

Source: I am too. It has been many years since the plague of necromancy visited our shores.\n\nThough I am relieved the docks are clear, the events of this day are extremely disturbing.
Target: I am too. It has been many years since the plague of necromancy visited our shores.\n\nThough I am relieved the docks are clear, the events of this day are extremely disturbing.

Source: Amazing to think you've been in the field with Telenger himself. Simply amazing.
Target: Amazing to think you've been in the field with Telenger himself. Simply amazing.

Source: Excellent. I can't bear to think of the outcome had you not been here.\n\nBut no matter. Lady <<1>> and I will return to <<2>> as soon as it's safe.
Target: 훌륭해요. 당신이 없었다면 어떤 결과가 생겼을지 생각하기도 싫네요.\n\n하지만 이젠 상관없죠. <<1>> 부인과 저는 망토가 안전해지면 곧장 <<2>>로 돌아갈게요.

Source: My hatchling lives because of you. I tell all I see, so your legend will grow in the Hist.
Target: My hatchling lives because of you. I tell all I see, so your legend will grow in the Hist.

Source: Dathieu? The son of King Ranser's traitor general? Do we really want another Dathieu serving in the army?
Target: 다티유? 랜서 왕을 배반한 장군의 아들 말이야? 정말로 다른 다티유가 군대에서 복무하길 바라는 거야?

Source: I'm glad they made it.
Target: 무사히 돌아오다니 다행이군요.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: He escaped. I let him go to save you.
Target: He escaped. I let him go to save you.

Source: So the fort is ours?
Target: 이제 요새는 우리 차지입니까?

Source: I was relieved to hear that Voljar's Meadery has reopened. Good mead warms the soul!
Target: I was relieved to hear that Voljar's Meadery has reopened. Good mead warms the soul!

Source: The, er, general sent me to report to you. What do you need?
Target: The, er, general sent me to report to you. What do you need?

Source: I'll avenge you!
Target: I'll avenge you!

Source: I was proud to do my part.
Target: 내 역할을 자랑스럽게 생각합니다.

Source: Have you heard of that Sees-All-Colors? Cannot believe the Fighters Guild let her live.
Target: Have you heard of that Sees-All-Colors? Cannot believe the Fighters Guild let her live.

Source: <<1>> and I defeated the Goblin Warlord and the spider queen.
Target: <<1>> and I defeated the Goblin Warlord and the spider queen.

Source: What happened? Where are Gar and Bjorick?
Target: 무슨일이 있던거죠?  Gar 과 Bjorick는 어디에 있어요?

Source: Weren't you at Foyen docks? I hear they never would have held without you.
Target: Weren't you at Foyen docks? I hear they never would have held without you.

Source: Dathieu? The son of King Ranser's traitor general? Do we really want another Dathieu serving in the army?
Target: 다티유? 랜서 왕을 배반한 장군의 아들 말이야? 정말로 다른 다티유가 군대에서 복무하길 바라는 거야?

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Faregyl Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Faregyl Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Drakelowe Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Drakelowe Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: The Pact now controls Alessia Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: The Pact now controls Alessia Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: The Pact now controls Farragut Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: The Pact now controls Farragut Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Blue Road Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Blue Road Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Arrius Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Arrius Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Kingscrest Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Kingscrest Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: Dragonclaw Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Dragonclaw Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: The Pact now controls Chalman Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: The Pact now controls Chalman Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Aleswell Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Aleswell Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Have you heard that King Lalorian has returned? He's going to lead the Fighters Guild now.
Target: Have you heard that King Lalorian has returned? He's going to lead the Fighters Guild now.

Source: It's done. Seeks-the-Night is dead.
Target: 끝났다. 시커즈-더-나이트는 죽었다.

Source: Here is your silk.
Target: 여기 비단입니다.

Source: Here is your silk.
Target: 여기 비단입니다.

Source: Dathieu? The son of King Ranser's traitor general? Do we really want another Dathieu serving in the army?
Target: 다티유? 랜서 왕을 배반한 장군의 아들 말이야? 정말로 다른 다티유가 군대에서 복무하길 바라는 거야?

Source: Dathieu? The son of King Ranser's traitor general? Do we really want another Dathieu serving in the army?
Target: 다티유? 랜서 왕을 배반한 장군의 아들 말이야? 정말로 다른 다티유가 군대에서 복무하길 바라는 거야?

Source: I truly cannot thank you enough. This one wishes she could stay and chat, but she must deliver the coffer as soon as possible. Safe travels!
Target: 정말 감사를 말로 다할 수가 없네요. 이 몸도 여기서 서로 얘기를 좀 나눠보고 싶지만, 최대한 빨리 상자를 전해줘야 해서요. 안전한 여행 되세요!

Source: Moons be damned, I will get my sister back. I don't care what that moldering old ghost says. I'll walk the Path with you, cut Tharn's throat, and come back with an army of mages to free Shazah from this torment.
Target: 이런 빌어먹을. 언니를 되찾을 거에요. 그 썩어가는 늙은이 유령이 하는 말은 신경 안 써요. 전 당신과 함께 길을 걷고, 탄 놈의 목을 베고, 마법사 군대를 데려와서 샤자를 이 고문에서 풀어줄 거에요.

Source: You're the one who helped that Dunmer vampire hunter drive the vampires out of Long Haven.
Target: You're the one who helped that Dunmer vampire hunter drive the vampires out of Long Haven.

Source: We do not mince words here. You are the chief of Shatul.\n\nGo, receive your clan.
Target: We do not mince words here. You are the chief of Shatul.\n\nGo, receive your clan.

Source: Do you want this idol?
Target: Do you want this idol?

Source: I see. Our clan will believe Malacath favors the loyalty <<1>> showed my son. They'll accept his victory … for now.\n\nI shall advise him, if he allows it. And I will watch for weakness in his heart. Shatul must survive.
Target: 그래. 우리 부족은  <<1>>가 나의 아들에게 보여준 충성심덕에 말라카스가 호의를 배푼다 믿을테지. 이들은 그의 승리를 받아들이것이다 ... 지금 당장은.\n\n그가 허락한다면, 그에게 조언을 해줘야겠지. 그리고 나는 그의 심장이 약해지는걸 지켜볼것이다. 샤툴은 반드시 살아남야하니.

Source: Indeed! Well, perhaps my time is not yet at an end here. I cannot leave such a phenomenon undocumented.\n\nThank you for your aid in uncovering these creatures. Their suffering is regrettable, but I will see to it that it is not forgotten.
Target: Indeed! Well, perhaps my time is not yet at an end here. I cannot leave such a phenomenon undocumented.\n\nThank you for your aid in uncovering these creatures. Their suffering is regrettable, but I will see to it that it is not forgotten.

Source: You've lightened my heart, friend. Akatosh's blessings upon you!
Target: 내 마음의 짐을 덜어 주었군, 친구. 자네에게 아카토쉬님의 축복이 내릴 걸세!

Source: You recognize the name?
Target: 그 이름을 아시나요?

Source: The moons praise you for what you did at Moonmont, Hallowed.
Target: 달들이 당신이 달언덕에서 한 일을 칭찬하십니다, 성자님.

Source: Yes. The spellplague curse is broken.
Target: 예. 그 역병 저주는 파괴되었습니다.

Source: She said she'd stay out of trouble. And with the totem I got all of the residents out.
Target: 그녀는 이 상황에서 벗어날 것이라 했습니다. 그리고 토템을 이용해 모든 주민들을 데려왔습니다.

Source: So now you know. Our foes are deadly and numerous. It is wisdom, not cowardice, that keeps us inside the shelters left to us.
Target: 그럼 이제 알겠지. 우리의 적들은 지독하고 머릿수도 많아. 우리를 피난처 안에 머물게 하는 것은 비겁함이 아니라 지혜라고.

Source: By the Green, well done. I was beginning to wonder if anyone was going to show up. Claim these pretty little coins … ah, and these will do fine. I get a pretty necklace and there are fewer dangerous beasts wandering the wilds. Here you go!
Target: 녹색께 맹세코 잘 하셨네요. 아무도 안 오는건 아닌가 궁금해지던 참이었는데. 이 귀여운 금화를 받아가세요... 아, 일이 정말 잘 풀렸네요. 난 예쁜 목걸이를 만들 수 있고, 야생을 돌아다니는 위험한 짐승들은 더 줄어들었잖아요. 여기 있어요!

Source: Ha! And you're worried I won't hold up my end of the bargain? \n\nNo no. I keep my promises. You got rid of those parasitic Orcs—you've earned the right to petition the Wilderking for an audience.
Target: 하! 내가 약속을 지키지 않을까봐 걱정하는 것이더냐?\n\n아니지, 아니야. 난 약속을 지킨다. 네가 그 기생충같은 오크놈들을 없애 주었으니, 윌더킹님께 알현을 청원할 자격을 내려 주마.

Source: Damn. This proves that Pelidil is planning something here, something even bigger than killing the queen.\n\nI'm glad you brought it to light. I just hope it's not too late for us to do something about it.
Target: 젠장. 펠리딜이 여기서 뭔가를 꾸미고 있군. 여왕님을 죽이는 것보다 더 큰 일을 꾸미고 있어.\n\n당신이 이걸 밝혀내줘서 다행이야. 너무 늦지 않은 거라면 좋을 텐데 말이지.

Source: You have not yet earned that knowledge, which Naemon and Pelidil took by force.\n\nThey went to Hectahame. Where you go is your choice, but I will be watching.
Target: 넌 아직 그 지식을 얻지 못한다. 네이몬과 펠리딜이 강제로 가져갔으니 말이다.\n\n놈들은 헥타헤임으로 향했다. 네가 가는 곳은 너의 선택이지만, 나는 지켜보고 있을 것이다.

Source: I heard the battle in the Fevered Mews was touch and go. Glad you won the day.
Target: 열병 거리에서의 전투가 아슬아슬했다고 들었네. 자네가 이겨서 기쁘군.

Source: I'll let them know. We must get help, so we can only send out the runners and hope some survive.\n\nThe way our luck is going, the Dremora will get them all before they leave town.
Target: 내가 알리지. 우리는 도움이 반드시 필요해. 그러니 전령들을 바깥에 보내서 살아남아주길 바랄 수밖에.\n\n행운이 우릴 떠난다면, 전령이 마을을 떠나기도 전에 드레모라한테 붙잡히는 거고.

Source: As you say, Grand Warlord.
Target: As you say, Grand Warlord.

Source: Just tell me what's going on.
Target: 그냥 무슨 일인지 이야기해 줘.

Source: All hail the Pact!
Target: All hail the Pact!

Source: Rhavil attacked me. I had to kill him.
Target: Rhavil attacked me. I had to kill him.

Source: Well, that's a start. Maybe my friends will rest more peacefully now. I like the way you work!
Target: 음, 좋은 출발이네. 내 친구들이 이제 더 평화롭게 안식을 취할지도 모르겠어. 네 일하는 방식이 맘에 드는데!

Source: Yes, Grand Warlord.
Target: 네, 위대한 군주이시여.

Source: Indeed, Grand Warlord.
Target: Indeed, Grand Warlord.

Source: I have a dispatch from Fort Morvunskar.
Target: 모분스카 요새에서 보고서를 가지고 왔다.

Source: Their souls are with Akatosh now and at peace. I wish we could have given them a proper burial, but this will have to do.\n\nBless you, friend, for saving them from a fate I would not wish on anyone.
Target: 그들의 영혼은 이제 아카토쉬님과 함께 영면에 들 걸세. 우리가 더 제대로 된 장례식을 치러 줬으면 좋았겠지만, 이렇게라도 해야겠지.\n\n자네에게 축복이 있길 빌겠네, 친구. 누구도 바라지 않는 운명에서 그들을 구해 줬으니까.

Source: Urgent news, eh? Perhaps it'll take her mind off the troubles. Been enough of that lately!
Target: 급한 소식이라구요, 예? 아마 그것은 그녀가 골치아픈일들을 잠시 잊어버리게 할겁니다. 이쯤이면 충분해!

Source: <<1>> is in the keep. He's turning soldiers into zombies.
Target: <<1>>은 요새 안에 있습니다. 그는 병사들을 좀비로 만들고 있습니다.

Source: Are you going to be all right?
Target: 괜찮을거야?

Source: A great day for the Pact.
Target: 조약에 대한 최후의 심판날이야.

Source: That's good, but Vaermina is after the king.
Target: 다행이군요. 하지만 베르미나는 왕을 노리고 있습니다.

Source: For the Pact!
Target: 조약을 위하여!

Source: I need to speak with your grandmaster.
Target: I need to speak with your grandmaster.

Source: Why would Tanval steal the Coral Heart?
Target: 왜 탄발이 산호 심장을 훔쳐간 겁니까?

Source: A sorry tale. The lying bard got many of my friends killed.\n\nI'll tell the others what happened. A rough end, but fitting for one such as him.
Target: A sorry tale. The lying bard got many of my friends killed.\n\nI'll tell the others what happened. A rough end, but fitting for one such as him.

Source: I've heard of cold feet, but why would anyone open an Oblivion portal just to stop a wedding?
Target: 나는 차가운 발자국 소리를 들었다. 그러나 누가 왜 결혼식을 중단하기 위해 오블리비언 포털을 열었을 까?\n

Source: Where are they?
Target: 그들은 어디에 있나요?

Source: Congratulations, Grand Warlord.
Target: Congratulations, Grand Warlord.

Source: I met someone who knows where they are.
Target: 그들이 어딨는지 안다는 사람과 만났습니다.

Source: He plans on arming his group and launching an attack on the Maulborn.
Target: He plans on arming his group and launching an attack on the Maulborn.

Source: I've heard of cold feet, but why would anyone open an Oblivion portal just to stop a wedding?
Target: 나는 차가운 발자국 소리를 들었다. 그러나 누가 왜 결혼식을 중단하기 위해 오블리비언 포털을 열었을 까?\n

Source: I'm sure they'll be vigilant.
Target: 나는 그들이 경계할 거라고 확신합니다.

Source: I'm glad to hear it, Grand Warlord.
Target: I'm glad to hear it, Grand Warlord.

Source: I met someone who knows where they are.
Target: 그들이 어딨는지 안다는 사람과 만났습니다.

Source: Here's the cuttle.
Target: 여기 껍질이요.

Source: A great deed.
Target: A great deed.

Source: I'm sorry to give you bad news.
Target: I'm sorry to give you bad news.

Source: All the Covenant rejoices, Grand Warlord.
Target: All the Covenant rejoices, Grand Warlord.

Source: Oh goodness! Hag's Breath! What a … special gift. Thank you. Thank you both.\n\nPlease, you must stay for the ceremony. It would mean so much to Casnar, and to me. This marriage would not have been possible without you.
Target: 오 이런! 마녀의 숨결이라니! 정말... 특별한 선물이군요. 감사해요. 두분 모두에게요.\n\n부탁드려요. 이곳에 남아서 식을 지켜봐 주세요. 그래주신다면 카스나르와 저 모두에게 정말 큰 의미가 있는 일이 될 거에요. 당신이 아니었더라면 이 결혼은 이루어지지 못했을 거에요.

Source: A great day, Grand Warlord.
Target: A great day, Grand Warlord.

Source: The pirate captain is dead.
Target: 해적들의 선장은 죽었습니다.

Source: Where will I get so many weapons?
Target: Where will I get so many weapons?

Source: I'm not sure you'll always be able to remain isolated.
Target: 저는 당신들이 계속 고립을 선택 할수 있을지 확신을 못하겠습니다.

Source: I hope you both prosper under this arrangement.
Target: 나는 이 합의 아래 너희 둘 모두가 번영하기를 희망한다.

Source: Just, just stop talking. I can't bear the sound of your voice. It's time I put aside this feud with Enthis. It's clear we have much in common, such as hiring assassins to stab silk-rippers to death!
Target: Just, just stop talking. I can't bear the sound of your voice. It's time I put aside this feud with Enthis. It's clear we have much in common, such as hiring assassins to stab silk-rippers to death!

Source: Oh, you're a priest now? Morally superior? To Oblivion with you! You know, I may just buy Turil a drink. Yes. Have a little chat about who's going to stab you to death!
Target: 오, 성직자 나셨군? 도덕적 우월감인가? 오블리비언에나 떨어져 버려라! 이봐, 난 그냥 튜릴에게 한잔 사려고 하네. 그래. 너를 찔러 죽여줄 사람에 대해 이야기하면서 말이야!

Source: Word has spread throughout the army.
Target: Word has spread throughout the army.

Source: I know. Ever since that bandit raid that separated us, I knew.\n\nBut I must thank you, sera. You helped me persue my foolish hope, even at your own risk. You let me forget what I already knew. I had seen my Garil for the last time.
Target: 저도 알아요. 우리를 떼어 놓았던 도적의 습격 이후에도 알고 있었죠.\n\n하지만 반드시 감사를 표해야겠네요. 위험을 무릎쓰면서까지 제 어리석은 희망을 도와주셨으니까요. 제가 이미 알던 것을 잊게 해 주셨어요. 우리 가릴을 마지막으로 봤으면 좋으련만.

Source: You there! I saw you fighting at the Shrouded Pass. You were remarkable, if you don't mind me saying.
Target: 잠깐만! 당신이 숨겨진 고개에서 싸우는 것을 봤습니다. 놀랍더군요. 내가 말하는게 거슬리지 않는다면..

Source: Our warriors swept the field.
Target: Our warriors swept the field.

Source: Isn't it obvious? You left your friend here in the camp, unguarded, and now she's nowhere to be found. \n\nShe was obviously a woman of good taste. Cinnamon, to be specific. And my people were so very hungry.
Target: 당연하지 않나? 넌 네 친구를 야영지에 홀로 뒀다. 보호받는 상태도 아니었고, 지금은 어디서도 찾을 수가 없지.\n\n확실히 맛있는 여자였다. 정확히는 계피향이 났었지. 내 사람들은 아주아주 배가 고팠고 말이야.

Source: A great day for the Dominion, Grand Warlord.
Target: A great day for the Dominion, Grand Warlord.

Source: It's true, then. He's gone forever. I didn't want to believe it.\n\nI'd have never known the truth if it weren't for you. Wherever he rests in the world beyond this one, he rests peacefully. Thank you.
Target: 그렇다면 사실이군요. 그이가 영원이 떠났어요. 믿고 싶지 않았는데.\n\n당신이 아니었다면 진실을 절대 알지 못했을 거에요. 이 세상 너머 어디에 있든, 그이는 평화롭게 안식을 취하겠죠. 고마워요.

Source: I'm glad we understand each other, outsider. \n\nIt's a shame we didn't reach this understanding earlier. We might have spared your friend. Can you smell the cinnamon aroma? She was a woman of undeniably good taste.
Target: 서로를 이해해서 기쁘군, 외부인.\n\n우리가 더 일찍 이해하지 못하다니 유감이다. 네 친구를 나눌 수도 있었을 것을. 계피향이 느껴지지 않나? 정말이지 좋은 맛이 나는 여자였는데 말이다.

Source: For the Dominion!
Target: For the Dominion!

Source: You're probably right. This place doesn't feel right. \n\nI'll be outside, waiting for news of my husband. Please, hurry!
Target: 그럴지도 모르겠네요. 여긴 느낌이 좋지 않아요.\n\n전 밖에서 남편의 소식을 기다리고 있을게요. 제발 서둘러주세요!

Source: I'll stay here until you return, but please, hurry!
Target: 돌아오실 때까지 여기서 기다릴게요. 하지만 부디 서둘러주세요!

Source: All of the Dominion rejoices.
Target: 자치령의 모든 사람들이 크게 기뻐합니다.

Source: A great day indeed.
Target: A great day indeed.

Source: You made certain the Khajiit will have a voice in Elden Root. Thank you, walker.
Target: You made certain the Khajiit will have a voice in Elden Root. Thank you, walker.

Source: I defeated the Sea Giant and recovered the scouts' intelligence.
Target: I defeated the Sea Giant and recovered the scouts' intelligence.

Source: <Attached to the bounty board is a message from General Dar-Liurz:>\n\n"Your prowess in hunting the enemy has gained you great renown. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron, I leave this reward for your efforts."
Target: <Attached to the bounty board is a message from General Dar-Liurz:>\n\n"Your prowess in hunting the enemy has gained you great renown. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron, I leave this reward for your efforts."

Source: Speaking of careless and irresponsible Narsis Dren, he turned himself into a bottle.
Target: Speaking of careless and irresponsible Narsis Dren, he turned himself into a bottle.

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Black Boot Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Black Boot Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Bloodmayne Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Bloodmayne Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: Roebeck Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Roebeck Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: You assume correctly. Here's the journal back, as promised.
Target: You assume correctly. Here's the journal back, as promised.

Source: The Pact now controls Brindle Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: The Pact now controls Brindle Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: <The latch opens a door in the menhir, revealing a vault. Inside the vault, you find an ancient Nedic coffer. It appears to be unaffected by age and cool to the touch. This must be your reward for completing the Gray Passage in the allotted time.>
Target: <The latch opens a door in the menhir, revealing a vault. Inside the vault, you find an ancient Nedic coffer. It appears to be unaffected by age and cool to the touch. This must be your reward for completing the Gray Passage in the allotted time.>

Source: So you have. These samples bear a lingering, necromantic taint, but from what will be up to the Sapiarchs to determine.\n\nYour adequacy will be noted in the record. Here is your reward.
Target: 임무를 완수했군. 이 표본들은 잘 지워지지 않는 강령술의 흔적이 남아있지만, 무엇인지는 새피아크들이 판단하겠지.\n\n자네의 훌륭함은 기록에 남기겠네. 보상을 받게.

Source: Good. Let's hope those warding stones hold. I would hate to see a beast like that return.\n\nIn any event, this will bring the people of Russafeld some comfort. You continue to defy expectations, newcomer. Well done.
Target: 잘했어. 그 경계석들이 버텨줬으면 좋겠군. 그런 짐승이 다시 돌아오는 것을 보기는 정말 싫거든.\n\n어쨌거나, 이것은 러사펠드 사람들에게 약간의 위로가 될 거야. 신참 자네는 계속 기대 이상의 것을 보여주는군. 잘했네.

Source: A Nord once told me that Reachmen eat stones. Something about hardening the body. From the ones I know, it must only apply to their heads. Mostly I'm just saying they're thick, but I did shatter a sword against a Reach skull once.\n\nPayment, as usual.
Target: A Nord once told me that Reachmen eat stones. Something about hardening the body. From the ones I know, it must only apply to their heads. Mostly I'm just saying they're thick, but I did shatter a sword against a Reach skull once.\n\nPayment, as usual.

Source: The Summerset Isles. A murder spree there can be beautiful this time of year. I remember one time when Astara and I were sent on competing contracts. This was before she became the Matron. Anyway, she …. Oh no, I probably shouldn't tell this story.
Target: The Summerset Isles. A murder spree there can be beautiful this time of year. I remember one time when Astara and I were sent on competing contracts. This was before she became the Matron. Anyway, she …. Oh no, I probably shouldn't tell this story.

Source: Mara willing, that will calm the blasted things down.\n\nOf course, there's still the matter of who brought the dreugh eggs here in the first place.
Target: 마라의 뜻대로, 그게 저 망할 것들을 진정시킬 거요.\n\n물론, 드레그 알을 이곳에 최초로 가져온 자가 누구인지에 대한 문제가 여전히 남아 있다오.

Source: Ah. I understand, you are far too certain in your grasp of the concept.\n\nWell then, you are now certified to fulfill enchanting writs. Best of luck avoiding mistranslations. The self-immolating glyphs are quite easy to misread.
Target: Ah. I understand, you are far too certain in your grasp of the concept.\n\nWell then, you are now certified to fulfill enchanting writs. Best of luck avoiding mistranslations. The self-immolating glyphs are quite easy to misread.

Source: It's a travesty that these weren't retrieved by one of our own, but I can stomach outsider assistance far better than leaving the fallen to lie without memorial.\n\nTake no offense when I say I hope you won't be called on to perform such duties again.
Target: 우리가 이것들을 직접 회수하지 못했다는 것은 희한한 일이지만, 죽은 사람들을 기리지 않고 거짓말을 하도록 내버려두는 것보다는 외부인의 도움을 받는게 훨씬 더 참을만 해.\n\n내가 자네에게 다시는 그런 임무를 맡기고 싶지 않다고 해도 기분 나쁘게 생각하지 말게.

Source: And you managed to keep all your limbs intact. Commendable. \n\nThe Office of Divine Prosecution thanks you for your labors. Mark me—our navy will return to its former strength soon, and these Sea Elves will pay a heavy price for what they've done.
Target: 사지 멀쩡히 돌아오셨군요. 훌륭해요.\n\n디바인 종사 사무소는 당신의 노고에 감사합니다. 잘 들으세요-우리 해군은 다시 예전의 힘을 되찾고, 바다 엘프 놈들은 이 일의 대가를 비싸게 치를 겁니다.

Source: Very well. You remind me of a former apprentice.\n\nNow that you're certified, you can obtain and fulfill alchemy writs. May your titrations avoid the kind of shortcuts you took today.
Target: Very well. You remind me of a former apprentice.\n\nNow that you're certified, you can obtain and fulfill alchemy writs. May your titrations avoid the kind of shortcuts you took today.

Source: Lesson for today: Never get between a Nord and his mead. Or his rabbit meatballs, for that matter. I've used both to lure the fools to their deaths. But you know what? Give a Nord a mead and a rabbit meatball and he dies happy.\n\nHere's your gold.
Target: Lesson for today: Never get between a Nord and his mead. Or his rabbit meatballs, for that matter. I've used both to lure the fools to their deaths. But you know what? Give a Nord a mead and a rabbit meatball and he dies happy.\n\nHere's your gold.

Source: Every victory against the Abyssal Cabal is a triumph for Summerset. The Divine Prosecution acknowledges the completion of this contract. Here is your reward.\n\nI'll send scouts to the cove to deal with any tainted coral that remains.
Target: 심연의 밀계에 대한 승리는 모두 서머셋의 승리지. 디바인의 종사는 이 계약의 완료를 인정하네. 여기 자네의 보상을 받게나.\n\n남아있는 오염된 산호를 처리하기 위해 해안에 정찰대를 보내겠네.

Source: I spent some time with a woman in Bangkorai once. Those river crustaceans she prepared with pepper spice were magic! Oh, this was after I killed her husband. Turns out, she paid for the contract! It's a small world, I tell you.\n\nHere's your pay.
Target: I spent some time with a woman in Bangkorai once. Those river crustaceans she prepared with pepper spice were magic! Oh, this was after I killed her husband. Turns out, she paid for the contract! It's a small world, I tell you.\n\nHere's your pay.

Source: Excellent. It's somewhat of a shame to kill such powerful beasts, but of course Summerset citizens come first. I'll let my superiors know the area is safe once more.\n\nThough helping the Isle is its own reward, here's a more substantial offering.
Target: 훌륭해. 그런 강력한 짐승들을 죽이는 것은 다소 유감스러운 일이지만, 서머셋 시민들이 먼저지. 그 지역이 안전하다는 것을 윗사람들에게 한 번 더 알려야겠군.\n\n섬을 위해 일하는 것은 그 자체로 보상이지만, 여기 좀 더 실질적인 제물이 있네.

Source: Your potions have a slight fizz to them, but your skill with admixtures is unquestioned … far better than my former apprentice.\n\nYou are now authorized to obtain and fulfill alchemy writs. May your elixirs remain potent and your reagents fresh.
Target: 당신의 물약은 약간이 거품이 일긴 하네요, 하지만 당신의 혼합 기술은 의심의 여지가 없습니다. 제 제자보다 훨씬 낫군요.\n\n당신은 이제 연금술 의뢰를 받고 수행할 자격이 있습니다. 아마도 당신의 영약은 강력하고 약초들은 신선하길.

Source: I'm right here.
Target: 나 여기 있어.

Source: I'm ready for duty. I don't need training.
Target: I'm ready for duty. I don't need training.

Source: So, about that treasure.
Target: 그러면, 보물 말인데요.

Source: I'm glad I was able to help.
Target: 도울 수 있어 기쁘네요.

Source: Actually, I have some bad news. Trolls have taken the mine, and your workers are dead or fled.
Target: 사실, 나쁜 소식을 전해주러 왔어요. 트롤들이 광산을 점거하는 바람에 그쪽 일꾼들이 죽거나 도망쳐 버렸거든요.

Source: Our foes are vanquished from Dragonclaw Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal
Target: Our foes are vanquished from Dragonclaw Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal

Source: Ash Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene
Target: Ash Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene

Source: Do you want me bring these items to the families?
Target: Do you want me bring these items to the families?

Source: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Aleswell Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul
Target: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Aleswell Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul

Source: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Rayles Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul
Target: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Rayles Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul

Source: Our foes are vanquished from Glademist Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal
Target: Our foes are vanquished from Glademist Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal

Source: A power core? For me? For all her rough edges, my sister does have a good heart.\n\nThank you for acquiring this for me. With a little tinkering, I'm sure I can use it to complete one of my many Dwemer-related experiments.
Target: 파워 코어? 날 위해서? 제 여동생은 거친데도 불구하고, 좋은 마음씨를 가지고 있습니다.\n\n절 위해 이걸 얻어와주셔서 고마워요. 약간 손만 본다면, 제 많은 드웨머 관련 실험들 중 하나를 완성하는데 쓰일것이라고 확신합니다.

Source: Someone really had an ax to grind with the Dark Elves. Good thing they didn't know who's on the other side of the contract, am I right? The truth is, we're just as awful to each other, so they shouldn't take it personally. Still, they paid good gold.
Target: 계약을 의뢰한 이는 다크 엘프와의 관계를 끊어버리고 싶어하던것 같더군. 다행인건 그들이 한 계약의 반대 편에 누가 있는지 모른다는거지, 그렇지 않나? 사실은, 우린 서로 아주 싫어하지, 그래서 개인적으로 이 일을 받아들이면 안돼. 그래도, 그들은 돈을 많이 지불한다니까.

Source: I disrupted the harrowstorms, as you asked.
Target: I disrupted the harrowstorms, as you asked.

Source: Warden Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene
Target: Warden Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene

Source: Then the bandits gave their answer. Heartless dogs! They were knights, once.\n\nWhen the Lion Guard marches, they'll receive an honorable death.
Target: 그렇다면 도적들이 그들의 답변을 보여준거군. 심장이 없는 개들 같으니! 그들은 한 때는 기사였어.\n\n라이온 가드가 행진할때면, 그들은 명예로운 죽음을 맞이하게 되겠지.

Source: Indubitably! I watched the roots burn with my own eyes! The siege commander needs to hear about this so he can press the advantage and put an end to the Winterborn threat!\n\nAs for me, I'm going to relax. Somewhere in Orsinium with a very large drink.
Target: 의심할 여지없이! 제 눈으로 뿌리가 불타는걸 봤습니다! 포위 공격을 맡은 지휘관이 이 사실에 대해 듣는다면 윈터본의 위협을 종식 시킬수 있을겁니다!\n\n저라면, 이제 쉬러 갈겁니다. 오시니움에서 만난다면 아주 큰 술을 사드리겠습니다.

Source: I never could understand Nord politics. It seems to involve lots of yelling and copious amounts of mead. Still, if they're willing to pay for our services, who am I to complain?\n\nHere. For you.
Target: I never could understand Nord politics. It seems to involve lots of yelling and copious amounts of mead. Still, if they're willing to pay for our services, who am I to complain?\n\nHere. For you.

Source: You should attach it to an item, so you can see the enchantment's effects.\n\nYou are now certified to fulfill enchanting writs. May you unravel the secrets of Nirn.
Target: 당신은 그걸 아이템에 부여해 봐야 해요. 그래야 마법부여 효과를 볼 수 있습니다.\n\n당신은 이제 마법부여 의뢰를 수행할 수 있는 자격을 인증 받았습니다. 어쩌면 당신이 넌의 비밀을 풀 수 있을지도 모르죠.

Source: Oh, almost certainly. I'm sure that dozens of naked people just fell out of trees somewhere in the wilderness.\n\nThey're probably cold, though. Maybe I should have omitted the potion of feather plucking. Left them with something to keep them warm.
Target: Oh, almost certainly. I'm sure that dozens of naked people just fell out of trees somewhere in the wilderness.\n\nThey're probably cold, though. Maybe I should have omitted the potion of feather plucking. Left them with something to keep them warm.

Source: Glenumbra. If not for all the Bretons, it would be a perfectly quaint little community. Glad to see you were able to reduce their numbers by a few.\n\nOh, and excellent work on that contract, by the way. You really earned this.
Target: Glenumbra. If not for all the Bretons, it would be a perfectly quaint little community. Glad to see you were able to reduce their numbers by a few.\n\nOh, and excellent work on that contract, by the way. You really earned this.

Source: You're joking, right? I spent my last gold piece getting to this Three-forsaken wasteland! Bah! A pox on these Orcs and their stupid beasts!\n\nI suppose you've earned your cut, such as it is. I'll need to find a new opportunity now.
Target: 농담하는거지, 그렇지? 난 이 버림받은 황무지로 오기위해 가지고 있는 돈을 다썼다고! 하! 이 빌어먹을 오크들과 그것들이 키우는 짐승들의 똥같으니!\n\n내 생각엔 자업자득인것 같군. 이제부터 다시 새로운 기회를 찾아봐야겠어.

Source: I returned with flowers, wine, and mudcrab meat for Michel. He was grateful for the food. Now he can give his wife the perfect burial.
Target: I returned with flowers, wine, and mudcrab meat for Michel. He was grateful for the food. Now he can give his wife the perfect burial.

Source: I found this pendant. Is it yours?
Target: 이 펜던트를 발견했는데, 당신 건가요?

Source: It's too dangerous. Who knows what it might do to you?
Target: It's too dangerous. Who knows what it might do to you?

Source: I've killed both the Matron and the Covenant spy.
Target: I've killed both the Matron and the Covenant spy.

Source: I know you. You exposed the mad constable in Koeglin Village. Ruptga guide you!
Target: I know you. You exposed the mad constable in Koeglin Village. Ruptga guide you!

Source: I destroyed the gem.
Target: 보석을 파괴했습니다.

Source: Where should I start?
Target: 어디부터 시작해야 할까요?

Source: I'm glad I inspire such confidence.
Target: 제 존재가 그런 자신감을 주다니 기쁜데요.

Source: Yes, I want to join the Antiquarian Circle.
Target: Yes, I want to join the Antiquarian Circle.

Source: Very well.
Target: Very well.

Source: I wish you luck.
Target: I wish you luck.

Source: I renounce the cult and promise to honor my ancestors. But from a much safer distance. \n\nI'll make my way out of here. Maybe go to Daggerfall or start a new life somewhere else. No more cults for me. Not even benign ones!
Target: 저는 컬트를 포기하고 조상님들을 기릴 것을 맹세해요. 하지만 좀 더 안전한 거리에서요.\n\n전 여기서 나가겠어요. 대거 폴이나 다른 어딘가에서 새로운 삶을 시작할 수도 있고요. 더 이상 컬트에는 관심 없어요! 아무리 좋아 보이더라도요!

Source: You? I'm pretty good with faces, but I don't know yours. You must have just joined then …? \n\nEither way, welcome to the tribe. It's good that you're here.
Target: 당신이? 난 얼굴을 잘 외우지만, 당신의 얼굴은 모르는걸. 그럼 최근에 들어온 건가...?\n\n어찌되었든, Ash'abah에 온 것을 환영하네. 자네가 여기 있어서 기쁘군.

Source: You did well and I'm happy to stand at your side. Now we finally have a chance against Angof and putting an end to his unholy corruption.\n\nThere's one more challenge we have to face, though.
Target: 너무 잘해줬어. 당신과 함께 할 수 있어서 기뻐. 이제 우리는 마침내 앵고프에게 맞서 그의 신성하지 않은 부패를 종식시킬 기회를 갖게 된거야.\n\n하지만 우리가 직면해야 할 과제가 하나 더 있어.

Source: Yes, she taught me how to use the antiquarian's tools.
Target: Yes, she taught me how to use the antiquarian's tools.

Source: I wish you luck.
Target: I wish you luck.

Source: Very good. This one knows you wanted something more … personal, but Ildani cannot oblige. \n\nShe did promise reward though, and like you, walker, Ildani delivers.
Target: Very good. This one knows you wanted something more … personal, but Ildani cannot oblige. \n\nShe did promise reward though, and like you, walker, Ildani delivers.

Source: We'll round them up later. They're locals so we don't want to make too much of a scene.\n\nI can't thank you enough for cooperating with us on this case. It'll be some time before the Baandari try to break back into this market.
Target: We'll round them up later. They're locals so we don't want to make too much of a scene.\n\nI can't thank you enough for cooperating with us on this case. It'll be some time before the Baandari try to break back into this market.

Source: Don't get all sentimental on me, hero. We both have our paths to follow. Damn, that sounded like a Fate-Bearer, didn't it?\n\nLook, let me leave you with a single kiss. One really good kiss. If you ever want another one, come find me in Vvardenfell.
Target: Don't get all sentimental on me, hero. We both have our paths to follow. Damn, that sounded like a Fate-Bearer, didn't it?\n\nLook, let me leave you with a single kiss. One really good kiss. If you ever want another one, come find me in Vvardenfell.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: Watching blood matches! What a waste! Anyone who pays to watch two people bash each other to death is an uneducated barbarian! By the way, I saw how you took down your latest target. I especially appreciated the spray of blood at the end. Well done!
Target: Watching blood matches! What a waste! Anyone who pays to watch two people bash each other to death is an uneducated barbarian! By the way, I saw how you took down your latest target. I especially appreciated the spray of blood at the end. Well done!

Source: Excellent! You are now a Student of the Mages Guild! Every book you find will now earn you reputation in the guild.
Target: 훌륭해! 이걸로 메이지 길드의 일원이 되었어! 책을 찾아서 모아준다면 길드에서 명성을 얻게 될거야.

Source: A little bird spoke to me outside the inn. Said the Reachmen's leader was dead. Never had a bird talk to me before.
Target: 작은 새가 여관 밖에서 나에게 말했다. Reachmen의 지도자는 죽었다고 말했다. 전에 새와 대화 한적 없어요.\n

Source: I returned the shards to Geoffroi and claimed my reward.
Target: 제프로이에게 조각들을 주고 보상을 받았습니다.

Source: Already done. You'll now be able to fulfill clothier crafting writs. And I look forward to seeing more of your work!
Target: 이미 인증됐어요. 이제 당신은 재봉사 제작 의뢰를 받을 수 있어요. 당신의 작품을 더 많이 보게 되기를 바랄게요!

Source: The Precursor mentioned he was made of Clockwork and Dwemer parts. I'd keep an eye out for the former as you travel around Clockwork City, and search Dwemer ruins out in Tamriel for the latter.\n\nAnd of course I have your reward, as promised.
Target: The Precursor mentioned he was made of Clockwork and Dwemer parts. I'd keep an eye out for the former as you travel around Clockwork City, and search Dwemer ruins out in Tamriel for the latter.\n\nAnd of course I have your reward, as promised.

Source: Death by assassin. I suppose there are worse ways to enter the Void. But to pay us to end your life? And I thought I'd seen everything! Don't pass it on, but I'd cut your throat just for the fun of it if you asked nicely.\n\nHere's your gold.
Target: Death by assassin. I suppose there are worse ways to enter the Void. But to pay us to end your life? And I thought I'd seen everything! Don't pass it on, but I'd cut your throat just for the fun of it if you asked nicely.\n\nHere's your gold.

Source: Perfect, perfect! Our hoard grows larger and the featherless curs go hungry, all at the same time! That will teach them to show proper respect to the Blackfeather Court.\n\nTake these coins for your efforts, crow-friend.
Target: Perfect, perfect! Our hoard grows larger and the featherless curs go hungry, all at the same time! That will teach them to show proper respect to the Blackfeather Court.\n\nTake these coins for your efforts, crow-friend.

Source: I convinced the Dark Elves and Argonians to return to the Prince's meeting.
Target: I convinced the Dark Elves and Argonians to return to the Prince's meeting.

Source: Did she now! She must like you. In that case, you're going to need all the help you can get!\n\nTake your key and come back when you're ready to take the pledge. I can't wait to see what you're made of!
Target: 그녀가 방금 그랬다고! 너를 마음에 들어하는 것 같군. 그런 경우에는, 너가 지원받을 수 있는 모든 도움을 받게 될거야.\n\n너의 열쇠를 받고 서약을 진행할 준비가 되면 다시 돌아와. 너가 어떤 일을 하게 될지 정말 기대되는군!

Source: Argonians, right? Green-Venom-Tongue aside, on the whole the lizards make for a strange set of luggage. Even the ones I've murdered were unfathomable. I tried to discuss it with a target once, but he kept talking about mud and bugs. Infuriating!
Target: Argonians, right? Green-Venom-Tongue aside, on the whole the lizards make for a strange set of luggage. Even the ones I've murdered were unfathomable. I tried to discuss it with a target once, but he kept talking about mud and bugs. Infuriating!

Source: Look at that! Actual paper, how quaint. In the meantime, take this for what you did for Novice Oscard and the Clockwork City.\n\nMay your pistons never clog and your gears spin freely, my friend!
Target: Look at that! Actual paper, how quaint. In the meantime, take this for what you did for Novice Oscard and the Clockwork City.\n\nMay your pistons never clog and your gears spin freely, my friend!

Source: I raise the spine of ridiculousness in your general direction. Ha! Those lizards, am I right? After one contract, the client was so pleased that she made me a pair of boots—using the Argonian I just killed at her request!\n\nAh, memories. Your pay.
Target: I raise the spine of ridiculousness in your general direction. Ha! Those lizards, am I right? After one contract, the client was so pleased that she made me a pair of boots—using the Argonian I just killed at her request!\n\nAh, memories. Your pay.

Source: Such crunch! Such chewy bits! The Blackfeather Court will feast tonight! Thank you, crow-friend.\n\nNow, these aren't quite as tasty, but they are what we agreed to. Perhaps you could trade them for something yummy.
Target: Such crunch! Such chewy bits! The Blackfeather Court will feast tonight! Thank you, crow-friend.\n\nNow, these aren't quite as tasty, but they are what we agreed to. Perhaps you could trade them for something yummy.

Source: I visited Stormhold once when it was still in Dark Elf hands. Must make for some awkward town meetings since the Argonians took it back. I imagine the Shadowscales keep quite busy.\n\nYou too, by the look of it. Here's your reward.
Target: I visited Stormhold once when it was still in Dark Elf hands. Must make for some awkward town meetings since the Argonians took it back. I imagine the Shadowscales keep quite busy.\n\nYou too, by the look of it. Here's your reward.

Source: Rare delicacies for this land of brass and silver! These morsels must be placed in the hoard with all due haste … after I take a nibble to ensure their quality.\n\nHere's your reward. Not as tasty, but I suspect it will suffice.
Target: Rare delicacies for this land of brass and silver! These morsels must be placed in the hoard with all due haste … after I take a nibble to ensure their quality.\n\nHere's your reward. Not as tasty, but I suspect it will suffice.

Source: Hmm. I don't think this contract was intended for us. We've got the gold, and you've done the deed, so we'll just call this bit of poaching a happy accident—or the will of Sithis, whichever you prefer.\n\nThere's your due.
Target: Hmm. I don't think this contract was intended for us. We've got the gold, and you've done the deed, so we'll just call this bit of poaching a happy accident—or the will of Sithis, whichever you prefer.\n\nThere's your due.

Source: The queen killed the Duke. Strong, decisive. I like that. And she's a widow. Hm....
Target: 여왕이 듀크를 죽였어. 강력하고 결정적임.. 나는 그런것을 좋아하지. 그리고 여왕은 과부가되었어. 흠 ....\n

Source: Heart. That's not something you hear a lot about in a place that runs on gears and cogs. Here, this is your share of the treasure. You earned it.\n\nThe people of Slag Town have a new future to forge, thanks to you.
Target: Heart. That's not something you hear a lot about in a place that runs on gears and cogs. Here, this is your share of the treasure. You earned it.\n\nThe people of Slag Town have a new future to forge, thanks to you.

Source: You helped the High King select Queen Eselde? What an excellent choice, friend!
Target: You helped the High King select Queen Eselde? What an excellent choice, friend!

Source: I killed the werewolves and rescued the goats.
Target: I killed the werewolves and rescued the goats.

Source: All hail King Alard, ruler of Shornhelm! May his wisdom and courage guide us for years to come!
Target: All hail King Alard, ruler of Shornhelm! May his wisdom and courage guide us for years to come!

Source: That's good. Losing Camlorn was bad enough. \n\nMeanwhile, we've made significant progress here. Our research is finally beginning to yield results.
Target: 잘됐군요. 캠론을 잃은 것 만으로도 충분했어요.\n\n그동안 우리는 여기서 상당한 진전을 이루었어요. 우리의 연구가 마침내 성과를 내기 시작했거든요.

Source: I defeated Skreg and discovered proof of his cheating.
Target: I defeated Skreg and discovered proof of his cheating.

Source: Sorry. Old habit. I was in the guard before joining the Wyrd. \n\nDamned Bloodthorns have taken our Wyrd Tree. I've never seen magic like this. I don't know what you can do, but if Ileana sent you, your help is welcome.
Target: 미안. 오랜 버릇이야. 나는 위어드에 오기 전에 경비대에 있었어.\n\n망할 핏빛가시단이 위어드 나무를 가져갔어! 이런 마법은 본 적이 없어. 네가 뭘 할 수 있는지 모르지만, 일리아나가 너를 보냈다면 네 도움은 환영이야.

Source: Niralin is a werewolf now, and refuses to come back. Here is her signet ring.
Target: 니랄린은 이제 늑대 인간이며 돌아오길 거부했어. 여기 그녀의 인장 반지야.

Source: I got the deed to your mine.
Target: 당신네 광산 소유 증서를 찾았어요.

Source: Oh, what a relief. Not that she would refuse, of course.\n\nNow, for all that you've done, I feel it only proper that you should take ownership of the Precursor. I've learned all I can from it, and I'm sure you'll find it useful for … something.
Target: Oh, what a relief. Not that she would refuse, of course.\n\nNow, for all that you've done, I feel it only proper that you should take ownership of the Precursor. I've learned all I can from it, and I'm sure you'll find it useful for … something.

Source: What they were doing was wrong, however they were trying to justify it.
Target: What they were doing was wrong, however they were trying to justify it.

Source: She's dead. I've brought back her signet ring.
Target: She's dead. I've brought back her signet ring.

Source: I destroyed the pearl, but I was unable to save your squad.
Target: 진주를 파괴했지만 네 분대를 구할 수는 없었어.

Source: Feeling a little flush after all that work—or is that just arterial spray? It's a cutthroat business out there, and the Gold Coast Mercenaries know that all too well.\n\nPayment, as promised.
Target: Feeling a little flush after all that work—or is that just arterial spray? It's a cutthroat business out there, and the Gold Coast Mercenaries know that all too well.\n\nPayment, as promised.

Source: He does, does he? Well, I have a few words for Raynor, as well. We're partners, and partners don't abandon each other when the going gets rough.\n\nAnyway, thanks for making sure he got back here safe and sound. I appreciate it.
Target: 그가 그랬어요? 글쎄요, 나도 레이노어를 위해 몇 마디 할게요. 우리는 파트너이고, 파트너는 현실이 힘들어질 때에도 서로를 포기하지 않아요.\n\n어쨌든, 그가 여기서 무사히 돌아온 걸 확인해 주셔서 고마워요. 감사합니다.

Source: Back from Ebonheart? Did you try the blackened snake hearts? I grew so fond of them while working in the area. Come to think of it, one contract called for the death of the region's best chef.\n\nBlackened snake hearts never tasted the same after that.
Target: 에본 하트에서 돌아온건가? 혹시 검게 그을린 뱀의 심장을 먹어봤나? 그 곳에서 일을 하는동안 그걸 매우 좋아하게 됬었지. 그러고 보니 계약중 하나는 이 지역 최고의 요리사의 죽음을 요구했었다.\n\n이후 검게 그을린 뱀의 심장은 결코 예전 같은 맛이 나지 않더군.

Source: He does, does he? I suppose that's only fair, since I saved a few choice words for him, too. We're partners, and partners don't abandon each other over a minor disagreement!\n\nAnyway, thanks for helping my brother out there. I appreciate it.
Target: 그가 그랬어요? 나도 그를 위해 몇 가지 말을 담아두고 있으니 공평하네요. 우리는 파트너이고 파트너는 사소한 의견차이로 서로를 포기하지 않아요!\n\n어쨌든, 우리 오빠를 도와 주셔서 감사합니다. 감사합니다.

Source: House Dres. Even as a Dark Elf, I never could abide slavery. At least murder is swift and sure. A slave dies slowly, one arduous task at a time. It's enough to make the Night Mother weep!\n\nBut on to more cheerful discourse—here's your gold.
Target: House Dres. Even as a Dark Elf, I never could abide slavery. At least murder is swift and sure. A slave dies slowly, one arduous task at a time. It's enough to make the Night Mother weep!\n\nBut on to more cheerful discourse—here's your gold.

Source: Verified. The Imperfect has been tested and the sequence plaques are in your possession.\n\nThank you for completing this task in a timely manner. The information obtained will be useful to furthering the Imperfect prototype. Here is your reward.
Target: 확인되었습니다.. 임퍼펙트의 전투가 완료되고 시퀀시 플라크를 모아오셨습니다.\n\n작업을 적시에 완료 해주셔서 감사합니다. 이 정보는 다음 임퍼펙트 초기형을 발전시키는데 유용할 것입니다. 여기 보상입니다.

Source: Never fancied military service. I prefer death be delivered in a more intimate fashion. I'm sure the Night Mother feels the same way. You don't see us marching armies out for slaughter, after all.\n\nNeither here, nor there, I suppose. Here, payment.
Target: Never fancied military service. I prefer death be delivered in a more intimate fashion. I'm sure the Night Mother feels the same way. You don't see us marching armies out for slaughter, after all.\n\nNeither here, nor there, I suppose. Here, payment.

Source: Verified. The Daedric incursions have been dealt with.\n\nThank you for completing this task in a timely manner. Clockwork City is now safe because of your actions. Here is your reward.
Target: 확인되었습니다. 데이드라의 침입이 격퇴되었습니다.\n\n작업을 적시에 완료 해주셔서 감사합니다. 클락워크 시티는 당신 덕에 안전합니다. 여기 보상입니다.

Source: I often employ slaughterfish for challenging contracts. I hate not doing the job myself, but you have to admire those teeth that swim. I've seen them reduce a Nord to bones faster than Tanek can throw a knife. Today's lesson: everything is a weapon.
Target: I often employ slaughterfish for challenging contracts. I hate not doing the job myself, but you have to admire those teeth that swim. I've seen them reduce a Nord to bones faster than Tanek can throw a knife. Today's lesson: everything is a weapon.

Source: Nimalten's just one more bump on the road beyond Riften, but there's a good reason to stop there—goat cheese curds dipped in hot oil and honey. The hot oil can also be used to take down a target.\n\nTalk about mixing business with pleasure!
Target: Nimalten's just one more bump on the road beyond Riften, but there's a good reason to stop there—goat cheese curds dipped in hot oil and honey. The hot oil can also be used to take down a target.\n\nTalk about mixing business with pleasure!

Source: Dead? I—I'm sorry to hear that. But at least you were able to complete his analysis of the shadow realm. Perhaps we'll be able to seal the portal now.\n\nTake this. You earned it.
Target: Dead? I—I'm sorry to hear that. But at least you were able to complete his analysis of the shadow realm. Perhaps we'll be able to seal the portal now.\n\nTake this. You earned it.

Source: Even better! With the information recorded in the device, we'll be able to analyze the realm in great detail. Take this for your efforts, with our thanks.\n\nAnd may the Great Gear always spin in your general direction!
Target: Even better! With the information recorded in the device, we'll be able to analyze the realm in great detail. Take this for your efforts, with our thanks.\n\nAnd may the Great Gear always spin in your general direction!

Source: Davon's Watch would have been overrun if you hadn't been there.
Target: 다본의 감시대에 당신이 없었다면 점령당했을 거야.

Source: I've destroyed the Shademother and cleansed her corruption.
Target: I've destroyed the Shademother and cleansed her corruption.

Source: I rescued Niralin from the werewolves. She should be here soon.
Target: 늑대 인간들에게서 니랄린을 구했어. 곧 여기 올 거야.

Source: That might take some time.
Target: That might take some time.

Source: I found Zariya's remains.
Target: I found Zariya's remains.

Source: It is not an honorable death, but these Supernal Dreamers have shown no honor. Perhaps it is fitting one have the meeting with his mistress so many crave.\n\nWhen trapped in nightmare eternal, the cultist may regret their choice.
Target: It is not an honorable death, but these Supernal Dreamers have shown no honor. Perhaps it is fitting one have the meeting with his mistress so many crave.\n\nWhen trapped in nightmare eternal, the cultist may regret their choice.

Source: I'm not so sure.
Target: I'm not so sure.

Source: Fildgor's spies have infiltrated Fort Amol!
Target: 필드고어의 스파이가 아몰 요새에 침투했다!

Source: My faith in you continues. Thank you for your assistance, and I hope you'll work with us again. Besides, these fans won't oil themselves!\n\nYour due reward, as promised.
Target: 당신에 대한 나의 믿음은 계속될 거예요. 도와주셔서 감사합니다. 다음에도 저희와 함께 일해주셨으면 해요. 그러니까, 이 팬들은 자신들 스스로 기름칠되는 게 아니잖아요.\n\n약속한 대로, 당신께 드리는 보상이에요.

Source: The carrion beetles of the Alik'r can strip the flesh from a corpse in a day. Today's lesson: If you come across bleached bones in the desert sun, be wary. The carrion beetles may still be hungry\n\nSo, there's your tip and here's your pay.
Target: 알리키어의 캐리온 딱정벌레는 하루 만에 시체에서 살을 벗겨 낼 수 있지. 오늘의 교훈: 사막의 횡단하다 말끔한 뼈를 본다면, 조심해라. 캐리온 딱정벌레가 배가 고플지도 모르니.\n\n그래, 여기 교훈도 있고 너의 돈도 있지.

Source: While I was fighting my way in, the cultists performed a ritual on Muzgu. He's partially possessed by a Daedric spirit!\n\nHe's stuck in a terrible dilemma. He insists I should return alone to Pariah Abbey, but I can't just leave him!
Target: While I was fighting my way in, the cultists performed a ritual on Muzgu. He's partially possessed by a Daedric spirit!\n\nHe's stuck in a terrible dilemma. He insists I should return alone to Pariah Abbey, but I can't just leave him!

Source: Actually, the Maormer attacked <<1>>. Curtaros and I crippled their ship.
Target: 사실, 마오머가 <<1>>을 공격했어요. 커타로스와 나는 그들의 배를 무력화시켰죠.

Source: I collected the spriggan bark as requested.
Target: I collected the spriggan bark as requested.

Source: The good news is I do indeed have the master key to the city gates. \n\nThe bad news is your thrilling exploits have attracted Faolchu's attention.
Target: 좋은 소식은 내가 정말로 도시의 문을 열 수 있는 마스터 키를 가지고 있다는 거야.\n\n나쁜 소식은 네 짜릿한 위업이 팔츄의 주의를 끌었다는 거지.

Source: You've outdone us, friend. You've explored the Aetherian Archive before the Undaunted.\n\nThis doesn't happen often, but we'd like to give you something special to commemorate your feat!
Target: You've outdone us, friend. You've explored the Aetherian Archive before the Undaunted.\n\nThis doesn't happen often, but we'd like to give you something special to commemorate your feat!

Source: You've outdone us, friend. You've reached the heart of this Citadel before the Undaunted.\n\nThis doesn't happen often, but we'd like to give you something special to commemorate your feat!
Target: You've outdone us, friend. You've reached the heart of this Citadel before the Undaunted.\n\nThis doesn't happen often, but we'd like to give you something special to commemorate your feat!

Source: What will we do about Thorulf?
Target: What will we do about Thorulf?

Source: That irascible cad! I should have known better than to trust a common thief. Double, he says! It seems obvious to me now that he and his Red Rooks have absolutely no intention of dealing in good faith.\n\nIt's time to take a different tack.
Target: That irascible cad! I should have known better than to trust a common thief. Double, he says! It seems obvious to me now that he and his Red Rooks have absolutely no intention of dealing in good faith.\n\nIt's time to take a different tack.

Source: Yes, and I share her concerns about both Camlorn and Aldcroft. We must deal with these werewolves once and for all. \n\nIn fact, I hope to involve you in that.
Target: 그렇소, 그녀와 난 캠론(Camlorn)과 알드크로프트(Aldcroft)에 대한 염려를 하고 있소. 우린 이 늑대인간들을 확실하게 처리해야 하오.\n\n사실, 난 당신도 이 일에 참여하길 바라오.

Source: I uncovered some disturbing information.
Target: 조금 불길한 정보를 발견했습니다.

Source: Yes, it seems they did.
Target: 네, 그런 것 같아요.

Source: I tested this Dissonance Apparatus and retrieved a heartcog.
Target: I tested this Dissonance Apparatus and retrieved a heartcog.

Source: I've decided to accept your offer.
Target: 너의 제안을 받아들이지.

Source: I've dealt with the Maormer, just as you asked.
Target: I've dealt with the Maormer, just as you asked.

Source: It's done. Gruznak is dead.
Target: 끝입니다. 그루즈낙은 죽었습니다.

Source: That went pretty quick.
Target: That went pretty quick.

Source: By the Eight! You have given me a sliver of hope on a very dark day. The Order of the Silver Dawn will rebuild and continue the mission given to us by Adeliza Silver-Axe so many years ago. \n\nThank you for all you have done!
Target: 오 여덞 디바인이시여! 넌 오늘같이 절망적인 날에 내게 작은 희망을 줬어. 실버 던을 재건하고 아주 오래 전 은빛 도끼의 아델리자가 우리에게 준 임무를 계속 할 생각이야.\n\n네가 해준 모든 일들 정말 고마웠어!

Source: One night I met a monkey who claimed to be an Orc! Imagine that!
Target: One night I met a monkey who claimed to be an Orc! Imagine that!

Source: I destroyed the umbric urns. The spirits appeared briefly, then vanished.
Target: I destroyed the umbric urns. The spirits appeared briefly, then vanished.

Source: It's done. The supplies are burning nicely.
Target: 끝냈습니다. 보급품들이 멋지게 타고 있네요.

Source: I did. Are you going to make it?
Target: 끝냈습니다. 더 좋은 게 있었을까요?

Source: I see. I convinced our clan that <<1>>'s victory would test our faith in Malacath's favor. They'll accept her … for now.\n\nIf she allows it, I shall advise her. She'll need all the help she can get.
Target: I see. I convinced our clan that <<1>>'s victory would test our faith in Malacath's favor. They'll accept her … for now.\n\nIf she allows it, I shall advise her. She'll need all the help she can get.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 뭘 할 건가요?

Source: I did away with the vampires and consecrated their victims with the relic of Arkay.
Target: I did away with the vampires and consecrated their victims with the relic of Arkay.

Source: Glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘네요.

Source: I had to kill you to stop the Cult.
Target: 교단을 막으려면 당신을 죽여야만 했어요.

Source: I expected to find misery and death in this place. I didn't find it for myself, but still. It doesn't feel any better.
Target: 나는 이 곳에서 고통과 죽음을 발견하길 원했었어. 여전히, 내가 직접 찾은건 아니지만. 기분이 조금도 나아지지 않은것 같아.

Source: Here's today's lesson: What do the Wood Elves value above all else? Trees! Isn't that a kick in the pants? I once held back a legion of Grahtwood guards by threatening to pull a small tree out of the ground, roots and all.\n\nAt least they pay well.
Target: Here's today's lesson: What do the Wood Elves value above all else? Trees! Isn't that a kick in the pants? I once held back a legion of Grahtwood guards by threatening to pull a small tree out of the ground, roots and all.\n\nAt least they pay well.

Source: Fildgor's agents tried to kill me, too.
Target: Fildgor's agents tried to kill me, too.

Source: His tomb lies to the west.
Target: His tomb lies to the west.

Source: I expected to find misery and death in this place. I didn't find it for myself, but still. It doesn't feel any better.
Target: I expected to find misery and death in this place. I didn't find it for myself, but still. It doesn't feel any better.

Source: I think you're going to be fine.
Target: 괜찮아질 거야.

Source: No. He's not in Othrenis. You must go on with your life.
Target: No. He's not in Othrenis. You must go on with your life.

Source: I witnessed the birth of the Brothers. They used Daedric essence and Nede blood in a ritual.
Target: I witnessed the birth of the Brothers. They used Daedric essence and Nede blood in a ritual.

Source: I knew it! May I?\n\nI took the liberty of hiring this rather intense young lady. She deals in wild animals, you see. Ha! I can't wait to see the look on her face when I lull that beast into submission! Many thanks, friend. Here's your advance.
Target: 역시 그럴 줄 알았어!\n\n난 무례하게도 상당히 거친 이 아가씨를 고용하려고 했었지. 보다시피 그녀는 야생동물을 잘 다루고. 하! 내가 짐승들을 안심시켜 굴복시킬 때 그녀의 표정을 보고 싶어 견딜 수가 없구만! 아주 고맙네, 친구여. 여기 선금일세.

Source: Wood Elves. They're so small, you have to kill at least three of them to get any blood on your blade. From what I can tell, you must have slaughtered an entire village.\n\nKeep up the good work.
Target: Wood Elves. They're so small, you have to kill at least three of them to get any blood on your blade. From what I can tell, you must have slaughtered an entire village.\n\nKeep up the good work.

Source: I see your whole family got here safely.
Target: 온 가족이 안전하게 돌아온 것 같군요.

Source: I recovered the relics.
Target: 유물을 회수 했습니다.

Source: Balreth's power was imbued into a pair of magecrafted guardians.
Target: 발레스의 힘은 마법으로 만들어진 쌍둥이 수호자들에게 흘러 들러갔습니다.

Source: I spoke with a Mage from the past and learned how to bind Balreth.
Target: 옛 마법사와 이야기 하고 발레스를 봉인 하는 법을 배워 왔어.

Source: You mentioned a reward?
Target: 보상을 언급한 거야?

Source: What's my reward for clearing Scalecaller Peak?
Target: 비늘소환자 봉우리를 공략한 보상은 뭐죠?

Source: What's my reward for clearing Scalecaller Peak?
Target: 비늘소환자 봉우리를 공략한 보상은 뭐죠?

Source: What's my reward for clearing Scalecaller Peak?
Target: 비늘소환자 봉우리를 공략한 보상은 뭐죠?

Source: I've recovered articles of faith from pilgrims in King's Haven Pass.
Target: 왕의 안식처 통로에서 순례자들의 신앙의 징표를 되찾아 왔습니다.

Source: He is married and thought little of you.
Target: 그는 결혼했고 당신에게 별로 신경을 쓰지 않았습니다.

Source: Is it better to kill one target with excellence or a multitude with mediocrity? I say, as long as they're all dead, who in Oblivion cares?\n\nHere's your pay.
Target: Is it better to kill one target with excellence or a multitude with mediocrity? I say, as long as they're all dead, who in Oblivion cares?\n\nHere's your pay.

Source: I destroyed the Dwarven colossus and the scrap it was using to enhance itself.
Target: I destroyed the Dwarven colossus and the scrap it was using to enhance itself.

Source: What's my reward for clearing Fang Lair?
Target: 송곳니 둥지를 공략한 보상은 뭐죠?

Source: By Malacath's swollen foot, you're an irritating one! But no, I won't have these metal monsters working alongside faithful Orcs.\n\nTake the constructs to Orsinium if you wish. Just get them out of here. My clan wants nothing more to do with them.
Target: By Malacath's swollen foot, you're an irritating one! But no, I won't have these metal monsters working alongside faithful Orcs.\n\nTake the constructs to Orsinium if you wish. Just get them out of here. My clan wants nothing more to do with them.

Source: What's my reward for clearing Fang Lair?
Target: 송곳니 둥지를 공략한 보상은 뭐죠?

Source: What's my reward for clearing Fang Lair?
Target: 송곳니 둥지를 공략한 보상은 뭐죠?

Source: On the subject of murder, what would you say is the most perfect weapon for the job? Wrong! As long as the target winds up dead, there's no such thing as an imperfect weapon!\n\nStyle, on the other hand, counts for everything. Here's your gold.
Target: On the subject of murder, what would you say is the most perfect weapon for the job? Wrong! As long as the target winds up dead, there's no such thing as an imperfect weapon!\n\nStyle, on the other hand, counts for everything. Here's your gold.

Source: I hear you resolved the standoff at Alcaire Castle. I am glad no blood was shed.
Target: I hear you resolved the standoff at Alcaire Castle. I am glad no blood was shed.

Source: Our foes are vanquished from Kingscrest Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal
Target: Our foes are vanquished from Kingscrest Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal

Source: Finally, an outsider who makes sense.\n\nWe … appreciate the Elf's intentions, but it's not our way. We'll send him away and the quarry will be ours again—just as Malacath intended.
Target: 마지막으로, 우리를 이해하는 외부인이여.\n\n우린 ... 엘프의 의도는 고맙지만, 우리의 방식이 아니다. 그를 돌려보낼 것이고 채석장은 다시 우리의 것이 될 것이다—말라카스께서 의도하신대로 말이지.

Source: There's a note from his father also.
Target: There's a note from his father also.

Source: Farragut Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene
Target: Farragut Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene

Source: Chalman Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene
Target: Chalman Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene

Source: I found your pants, too.
Target: 당신의 바지도 함께 찾았습니다.

Source: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Arrius Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul
Target: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Arrius Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul

Source: You're welcome.
Target: 천만에요.

Source: Balreth, the Brother of Strife, is ravaging Stonefalls.
Target: 투쟁의 형제, 발레스, 그 가 스톤폴즈를 황폐하게 만들고 있어요.

Source: Ganthis sent me to look into the murders.
Target: Ganthis sent me to look into the murders.

Source: The High-King sent me. What can I do?
Target: The High-King sent me. What can I do?

Source: I did what you and your brothers wanted. The Ashlander supplies are burning.
Target: 당신과 당신의 형제들이 원하는것을 행하였습니다. 애쉬랜더의 보급품들은 불타고 있는 중입니다.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 할 건가요?

Source: I've got some Rose-Of-Archon blossoms.
Target: 집정관의 장미꽃 몇 개를 가져왔습니다.

Source: I've recovered the relics from the Sagacians.
Target: 사가시안들로부터 유물을 회수했습니다.

Source: I've destroyed the reef viper nests.
Target: 암초 독사의 둥지를 파괴했습니다.

Source: Yes, I've disposed of Mannimarco's forbidden tomes.
Target: 네, 매니마코의 금지된 마법책을 처분하고 왔습니다.

Source: I disrupted the harrowstorms, as you asked.
Target: I disrupted the harrowstorms, as you asked.

Source: I've completed my assignment.
Target: 임무를 완수했습니다.

Source: Our foes are vanquished from Roebeck Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal
Target: Our foes are vanquished from Roebeck Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal

Source: Brindle Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene
Target: Brindle Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene

Source: Alessia Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene
Target: Alessia Farm belongs to the Covenant! Conquering heroes, collect your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Dortene

Source: A grim tale. Someone attempted to bind Orc souls to Dwarven constructs. Even if possible, the process would destroy body and mind … to say nothing of the soul itself.\n\nIt warrants further study, yes? Yes, good.
