Target: 암울한 이야기지. 누군가 오크의 영혼을 드워븐 건축물에 묶을려는 시도를 했었다. 만약 그게 가능했더라도,  그 과정은 몸과 마음을 부숴버렸겠지 ... 영혼 그 자체는 말할것도 없어.\n\n더 많은 연구가 필요하는데 동의하겠지? 그래, 좋아.

Source: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Faregyl Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul
Target: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Faregyl Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul

Source: For now? No. Go explore Wrothgar and get to know this great city. Enjoy yourself!\n\nWhen you're ready for a new challenge, find me at my private tavern in the city. I'm sure I'll have something that requires your specific skill set by then.
Target: 지금? 아니. 가서 이 위대한 도시 로스가를 탐험 해봐라. 즐거운 시간을 보내도록!\n\n새로운 도전을 할 준비가 되면, 도시에 있는 내 개인 주점에서 나를 찾도록 해라. 분명 네 특별한 기술이 필요한 곳이 있을테니 그때까지 소중히 다뤄라.

Source: What about my share?
Target: What about my share?

Source: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Blue Road Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul
Target: Rewards are offered to all who helped bring Blue Road Farm under Covenant control. Continue to serve the alliance!\n\n- Scribe Grulzul

Source: Our foes are vanquished from Drakelowe Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal
Target: Our foes are vanquished from Drakelowe Farm. Such deeds earn the Covenant's gratitude!\n\n- General Am-Shadal

Source: I value your service and partnership, assistant. Please, take this as a token of my appreciation.\n\nIf I understand the bureaucracy correctly, I may be here in the Brass Fortress for a while. Feel free to seek me out, should you require my aid.
Target: 나는 네 도움과 파트너쉽 그리고 조수로서 소중하게 생각해. 제발, 내 감사의 표시를 가져가.\n\n이 관료주의적인 걸 이해하기 위해서, 잠깐동안 황동 요새에 있을지도 모르니까, 내 도움이 필요하다면, 언제든지 나를 찾아와.

Source: Well. I suppose we could wait for reinforcements. Mordra and Kailstig are out there. Somewhere. Or we could call the Fighter's Guild.\n\nThis is embarassing.
Target: Well. I suppose we could wait for reinforcements. Mordra and Kailstig are out there. Somewhere. Or we could call the Fighter's Guild.\n\nThis is embarassing.

Source: Actually, I convinced Shuga to enlist.
Target: 사실, 슈가가 입대하도록 설득했어요.

Source: Actually, I convinced Martin to enlist.
Target: Actually, I convinced Martin to enlist.

Source: Actually, I convinced Martin to enlist.
Target: Actually, I convinced Martin to enlist.

Source: I have maintained this position for over a millennium. It is my sole purpose, the path given to me by the Divine Metronome. I have no regrets.\n\nI thank you for your efforts. A reward is common for these situations, yes? Here you are.
Target: 나는 천년이 넘는 세월동안 이 일을 하였었네. 내 삶엔 오직 이것뿐이네. 성스로운 매트로눔만이 나에게 주어진 길이니. 나는 이것에 후회 없네.\n\n노력해 주어 고맙네. 이 상황에서 보상을 주는것이 일반적이지, 그렇지 않나? 여기 이걸 가져가게.

Source: Oh! Uh. There's absolutely no need to concern yourself about that, I assure you! All that matters is that the Brass Fortress will have water tonight because of us, am I right?\n\nHere, you've been such a great help. You should be properly rewarded.
Target: 오! 어. 단언컨대! 그것에 대해선 전혀 걱정할 필요 없어요. 중요한 건 오늘 물이 제대로 황동 요새로 되돌아갈 수 있다는 거죠 그렇죠?\n\n여기요, 정말 큰 도움이 됐어요. 당신은 마땅히 보상을 받아야 해요.

Source: Nubani believes you can make it on your own by living honestly. Trust her opinion.
Target: 누바니는 당신이 정직하게 살 수 있다고 믿고 있습니다. 그녀의 확신을 믿으세요.

Source: Madja is dead and Nubani is fine, but your items were lost to the sea.
Target: 마드자는 죽었고 누바니는 무사하지만,  당신의 뱃짐들은 바다로 사라졌습니다.

Source: Here, I'll leave it with you.
Target: 여기. 난 너와 함께 떠날거야.

Source: I think the pendant belongs to you.
Target: 펜던트는 이제 니거야.

Source: Actually, I convinced Martin to enlist.
Target: 사실, 마틴이 입대하도록 설득했어요.

Source: Actually, I convinced Martin to enlist.
Target: Actually, I convinced Martin to enlist.

Source: Bet the Lion Guard could use another strong Orc. Maybe I'll head to the Redoubt and offer my services.
Target: Bet the Lion Guard could use another strong Orc. Maybe I'll head to the Redoubt and offer my services.

Source: I think the pendant belongs to you.
Target: 펜던트는 이제 네거야.

Source: I killed Gavendien and brought the stolen jewels back.
Target: 가벤디엔을 죽이고 도둑 맞은 보석들을 다시 가져 왔어요.

Source: <<1>> sent me to help you.
Target: <<1>>이(가) 당신을 도우라 하더군.

Source: That's great! Let's have a look, eh? Why that slimy son-of-a-scrib—he's been lying through his teeth! I could have been growing these mushrooms the whole time. Still, his pickling recipe is just what I needed to make use of 'em. \n\nGreat work!
Target: That's great! Let's have a look, eh? Why that slimy son-of-a-scrib—he's been lying through his teeth! I could have been growing these mushrooms the whole time. Still, his pickling recipe is just what I needed to make use of 'em. \n\nGreat work!

Source: Argonians in Silent Mire had a bit of pirate trouble recently, but I heard some stranger saved them.
Target: Argonians in Silent Mire had a bit of pirate trouble recently, but I heard some stranger saved them.

Source: I can't think of anyone better.
Target: I can't think of anyone better.

Source: All right, I'll help you.
Target: 좋아. 널 도와주지.

Source: So what's the plan?
Target: 그래서 계획이 뭔데?

Source: <Give her the items.>
Target: <물건을 넘겨준다.>

Source: I think everyone is here. The pass is ours.
Target: I think everyone is here. The pass is ours.

Source: So …?
I helped track down the source of the poison afflicting the Wood Orcs of <<1>>.
Target: <<1>>의 우드 오크들을 괴롭히던 독의 원인을 추적하는 것을 도왔다.

Source: I killed Remelie Frinck, but lied to Lord Geoffroi about her death.
Target: 레멜리에 프링크를 죽였지만 제프로이에게 그녀의 죽음에 대해 거짓말을했습니다.\n

Source: Do you have any other prospects?
Target: Do you have any other prospects?

Source: Do you have any other prospects?
Target: Do you have any other prospects?

Source: It was a narrow victory, but <<1>> is free of pirate invaders. The cost may have been high, but the city is safe once more.
Target: It was a narrow victory, but <<1>> is free of pirate invaders. The cost may have been high, but the city is safe once more.

Source: Where is the Oghma Infinium?
Target: 오그마 인피니움은 어디로 갔죠?

Source: Do you have any other prospects?
Target: 다른 신병 후보가 또 있나요?

Source: Do you have any other prospects?
Target: Do you have any other prospects?

Source: Maybe Jorunn deserved this fate. Maybe Fildgor was right all along. The Nord people must stand together.
Target: Maybe Jorunn deserved this fate. Maybe Fildgor was right all along. The Nord people must stand together.

Source: They say you are the one who fights the Withered Hand. Tu'whacca watch over you.
Target: 그들은 자네가 메마른 손과 싸우는 이라고 말했지. Tu'whacca가 자네를 굽어살피시길.

Source: What now?
Target: 뭐지?

Source: They're all placed.
Target: 다 갖다놨어.

Source: I'm a big fat liar.
Target: 나는 큰 뚱뚱한 거짓말 쟁이 야.\n

Source: I'll consider helping you.
Target: 한번 생각해 보도록 하죠.

Source: I lied to Remelie and took the reward from Geoffroi.
Target: 레멜리에에게 거짓말을 하고 제프로이로부터 보상을 받았습니다.\n

Source: It was just an amulet.
Target: 이건 그냥 부적이야.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 할 건가요?

Source: Ah, so you have? You have the gratitude of the Clockwork Apostles.\n\nNow, if you'll excuse me, I must inspect the memories to see if they were damaged by the attack. You would be surprised how fragile they can be.
Target: 아, 그랬나요? 시계장치의 사도들을 대신하여 감사합니다.\n\n이제 좀 실례하겠습니다, 공격에 피해를 입은 기억이 없는지 살펴보아야 하거든요. 그 별들이 얼마나 취약한지 알면 놀라실거예요.

Source: I wish you well, King Bazrag.
Target: 잘있어,King Bazrag.

Source: I have defeated Selene, an ancient changeling that was in conflict with a group of Guild Mages. Her power is now left to the Warlock Carindon, the group's leader, to study.
Target: I have defeated Selene, an ancient changeling that was in conflict with a group of Guild Mages. Her power is now left to the Warlock Carindon, the group's leader, to study.

Source: In the ruins beneath Salas En, I discovered an Orc imprisoned for centuries within magical bonds. I found a way to dispel the magic, setting him free and reuniting him with his long-lost love.
Target: In the ruins beneath Salas En, I discovered an Orc imprisoned for centuries within magical bonds. I found a way to dispel the magic, setting him free and reuniting him with his long-lost love.

Source: I used your ritual to protect the consecrated oils.
Target: 봉헌 된 기름을 보호하기 위해 당신의 의식을 사용했습니다.\n

Source: I'll consider helping you.
Target: 나는 너를 돕는 것을 고려할 것이다.\n

Source: I killed the ogre chieftain who held it.
Target: 이것을 쥐고 있는 오우거 족장을 죽였습니다.

Source: This is delightful! World saved, heroes gone their separate ways, and this knight has a new mistress to serve. Bravo! Couldn't be happier! Smashing! Truly!
Target: 정말 기분 좋구먼! 세상을 구하고, 영웅들이 각자의 길을 떠나고, 이 기사는 새롭게 섬길 여주인을 가졌으니 말일세. 브라보! 이보다 행복할 순 없다네! 정말이지, 아주 멋져!

Source: Wood Elves! Never could stand the little gnats. Do they always have to be so cheerful? There's nothing as annoying as a target that smiles and laughs all the while you're slicing them open from stomach to stern. \n\nAnyway, here's your pay.
Target: Wood Elves! Never could stand the little gnats. Do they always have to be so cheerful? There's nothing as annoying as a target that smiles and laughs all the while you're slicing them open from stomach to stern. \n\nAnyway, here's your pay.

Source: This is delightful! World saved, heroes gone their separate ways, and this knight has a new mistress to serve. Bravo! Couldn't be happier! Smashing! Truly!
Target: 정말 기분 좋구먼! 세상을 구하고, 영웅들이 각자의 길을 떠나고, 이 기사는 새롭게 섬길 여주인을 가졌으니 말일세. 브라보! 이보다 행복할 순 없다네! 정말이지, 아주 멋져!

Source: This is delightful! World saved, heroes gone their separate ways, and this knight has a new mistress to serve. Bravo! Couldn't be happier! Smashing! Truly!
Target: 정말 기분 좋구먼! 세상을 구하고, 영웅들이 각자의 길을 떠나고, 이 기사는 새롭게 섬길 여주인을 가졌으니 말일세. 브라보! 이보다 행복할 순 없다네! 정말이지, 아주 멋져!

Source: Windhelm. You know they dunk their sweetrolls in mead. Only the Nords, am I right? Speaking of which, we received a mysterious package full of sweetrolls today. I recommend avoiding the temptation. Never trust an unannounced dessert, I always say.
Target: Windhelm. You know they dunk their sweetrolls in mead. Only the Nords, am I right? Speaking of which, we received a mysterious package full of sweetrolls today. I recommend avoiding the temptation. Never trust an unannounced dessert, I always say.

Source: Yes. They are at peace. Even King Ranser, I suppose.\n\nHe was a wise and courageous king at one time, you know. I hope what happened here does not further damage his legacy. That is beyond my control, however. Goodbye, my friend, and thank you.
Target: 그래. 그들은 이제 평온하다네. 랜서 왕조차도 말이야.\n\n알다시피, 그는 한때 현명하고 용감한 왕이었어. 나는 이 곳에서 일어난 일이 그의 유산을 더 이상 손상시키지 않길 바란다. 하지만 그건 내가 어떻게 할 수 없는 일이겠지. 잘 가게, 친구. 고맙네.

Source: Nords. Even their cheese is bigger and bolder than those of the other races. I once killed a Thane with a wheel of Nord cheese loosed from a cart at the top of a hill. As Sithis is my witness, her guards, as well.\n\nBefore I forget, your gold.
Target: Nords. Even their cheese is bigger and bolder than those of the other races. I once killed a Thane with a wheel of Nord cheese loosed from a cart at the top of a hill. As Sithis is my witness, her guards, as well.\n\nBefore I forget, your gold.

Source: Here's what I managed to find.
Target: 이게 내가 찾을수 있었던 거야.

Source: Wish everybody was making the same effort. Let's see what you've got. Mm. Mmhmm. Not bad. It's yours, plus a little extra for the effort.
Target: 모두가 너처럼 노력을 했으면 좋겠어. 뭘 가져 왔는지 보자구. 음. 음. 나쁘지 않네. 여기 네 몫이야. 노력에 대한 보상으로 조금 더 챙겨줬어.

Source: Do you really think this will work?
Target: 이게 효과가 있을거라고 생각해?

Source: Eastmarch. Too much snow and too many Nords for my taste. But speaking of taste, I did try that Voljar's mead once. Awful stuff! I had to kill three drunks and a bard to get the taste out of my mouth! \n\nYour gold. Oh, and don't spend it on the mead.
Target: Eastmarch. Too much snow and too many Nords for my taste. But speaking of taste, I did try that Voljar's mead once. Awful stuff! I had to kill three drunks and a bard to get the taste out of my mouth! \n\nYour gold. Oh, and don't spend it on the mead.

Source: You wished to speak with me?
Target: You wished to speak with me?

Source: The Dark Elves sure like their kwama eggs. I think they taste terrible, but that's just my opinion.
Target: The Dark Elves sure like their kwama eggs. I think they taste terrible, but that's just my opinion.

Source: A few words and a handshake don't make you safe. They certainly didn't protect that ambassador from my blade. But I do enjoy visiting embassies. I find their many nooks and crannies make the perfect spots for quiet assassinations.\n\nHere's your pay.
Target: A few words and a handshake don't make you safe. They certainly didn't protect that ambassador from my blade. But I do enjoy visiting embassies. I find their many nooks and crannies make the perfect spots for quiet assassinations.\n\nHere's your pay.

Source: Take the others to the Hollow City. You'll be safe there.
Target: 다른 사람들을 공허한 도시로 데려가세요. 거기선 안전할 겁니다.

Source: You wished to speak with me?
Target: You wished to speak with me?

Source: I recovered the <<1>>, but <<2>> didn't make it.
Target: 나는 <<1>>을 되찾았다. 그러나 <<2>>할 수는 없었다.\n

Source: Being trapped in the tree was a fate worse than any death I can imagine. Though I once did all I could to extend my life, I am now grateful to be granted the peace of death.\n\nIf you were the one responsible for releasing me, then I thank you.
Target: Being trapped in the tree was a fate worse than any death I can imagine. Though I once did all I could to extend my life, I am now grateful to be granted the peace of death.\n\nIf you were the one responsible for releasing me, then I thank you.

Source: With the cult defeated and the bodies burned, there should be no way for the illness to spread. All thanks to you, of course.\n\nNow, as for my part, I will ensure that Scalecaller's soul can never return again.
Target: 숭배자들이 격퇴되고 시체도 다 태웠으니, 역병이 퍼질 길은 없습니다. 물론, 이게 다 당신 덕입니다.\n\n이제, 제 역할로, 비늘소환자의 영혼이 다시는 돌아오지 못하게 하겠습니다.

Source: I am glad you are sane enough still to appreciate the victory.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Drown any nightmares in rich drink and good company. Approach the new dawn with renewed verve and seek me again.
Target: I am glad you are sane enough still to appreciate the victory.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Drown any nightmares in rich drink and good company. Approach the new dawn with renewed verve and seek me again.

Source: Despite the name, Bramblebreach is remarkably pleasant. They have a talent for cooking with insects that makes me curious how they'd approach scrib. Hmm. I remember a kwama miner. Killed him with his own prod. Good times!\n\nHere. Your payment.
Target: Despite the name, Bramblebreach is remarkably pleasant. They have a talent for cooking with insects that makes me curious how they'd approach scrib. Hmm. I remember a kwama miner. Killed him with his own prod. Good times!\n\nHere. Your payment.

Source: Legion Zero won't be making any new siege engines for a while.
Target: Legion Zero는 잠시 동안 새로운 포위 공격 엔진을 만들지 않을 것입니다.\n

Source: The Veiled Heritance were using my notes? No. What have I done?\n\nI was young and foolish when I wrote these notes. I just wanted to save my wife from a consuming plague. I should've destroyed them then. I will destroy them now. Thank you.
Target: 베일의 계승단이 내 기록을 이용하고 있었다고? 이런, 내가 무슨 짓을 한 거지?\n\n내가 이 기록을 썼을 때 난 어렸고 어리석었네. 난 내 아내를 전염병에서 간절히 구해내고 싶었을 뿐이었지. 기록을 그 때 없애버렸어야 했는데. 지금 없애버리겠네. 고맙네.

Source: You seem to be getting the hang of this. I do enjoy watching a blade become honed and keen. Speaking of which, remember to sharpen your weapon before a job. Too late, I realized my blade was dull. The cut I made was embarrassingly ragged.\n\nYour pay.
Target: You seem to be getting the hang of this. I do enjoy watching a blade become honed and keen. Speaking of which, remember to sharpen your weapon before a job. Too late, I realized my blade was dull. The cut I made was embarrassingly ragged.\n\nYour pay.

Source: Oh, I have a few tricks up my sleeve, but first I'll need to expel Orryn's soul from the Dragon. I'm sure our new compatriots would love to settle their unfinished business with our host.\n\nWe should be able to handle things from here. Thank you.
Target: Oh, I have a few tricks up my sleeve, but first I'll need to expel Orryn's soul from the Dragon. I'm sure our new compatriots would love to settle their unfinished business with our host.\n\nWe should be able to handle things from here. Thank you.

Source: I've killed Deathclaw and helped finish what <<1>> started.
Target: I've killed Deathclaw and helped finish what <<1>> started.

Source: Good archery school in Marbruk, if that's your sort of thing. I have a fondness for target shooting myself, but I find the bow too impersonal when it comes to work. I prefer close-quarter killing to ranged any day.\n\nHere you go. For the job.
Target: Good archery school in Marbruk, if that's your sort of thing. I have a fondness for target shooting myself, but I find the bow too impersonal when it comes to work. I prefer close-quarter killing to ranged any day.\n\nHere you go. For the job.

Source: What more is there to be said? Your actions speak for themselves. Let mine do the same.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Seek me again. There are more deeds to be met with deeds, not words.
Target: What more is there to be said? Your actions speak for themselves. Let mine do the same.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Seek me again. There are more deeds to be met with deeds, not words.

Source: I found this permit in the wilderness.
Target: 나는 황야에서 이 허가증을 발견했다.

Source: Already done. You'll now be able to fulfill clothier crafting writs. And I look forward to seeing more of your work!
Target: 이미 인증됐어요. 이제 당신은 재봉사 제작 의뢰를 받을 수 있어요. 당신의 작품을 더 많이 보게 되기를 바랄게요!

Source: I must admit, your skills get better with every contract you complete. In fact, the Matron told me that if you complete one more contract in record time, I should put your name on the next sheet of paper.\n\nThat's a Brotherhood joke. No, seriously.
Target: I must admit, your skills get better with every contract you complete. In fact, the Matron told me that if you complete one more contract in record time, I should put your name on the next sheet of paper.\n\nThat's a Brotherhood joke. No, seriously.

Source: Nothing like a Khajiiti bazaar to alleviate boredom. If you find yourself in a rut, spend an hour browsing the stalls. Just leave your purse at home. Come to think of it, don't. Hunting the cutpurse who robbed you is an even better cure.\n\nYour pay.
Target: Nothing like a Khajiiti bazaar to alleviate boredom. If you find yourself in a rut, spend an hour browsing the stalls. Just leave your purse at home. Come to think of it, don't. Hunting the cutpurse who robbed you is an even better cure.\n\nYour pay.

Source: I reset your traps, and cut down a few legionaries.
Target: 나는 함정을 다시 설정하고 몇 명의 군대를 줄였습니다.\n

Source: I'm quite fond of horses. Lightly salted, roasted over a roaring flame. If you grew up eating guar, you'd understand that riding a horse is just a waste of good food.\n\nHere, your gold.
Target: I'm quite fond of horses. Lightly salted, roasted over a roaring flame. If you grew up eating guar, you'd understand that riding a horse is just a waste of good food.\n\nHere, your gold.

Source: I heard that someone killed all the cultists and saved the Wyrd Tree.
Target: 누군가 광신도들을 모두 죽이고 위어드 나무를 구했다고 들었어요.

Source: Thalmor bureaucrats are some of the most humorless people I've ever murdered. I used some of my best material on one target and he barely cracked a smile as I gutted him. There's just no accounting for taste.\n\nOh, here's your pay.
Target: Thalmor bureaucrats are some of the most humorless people I've ever murdered. I used some of my best material on one target and he barely cracked a smile as I gutted him. There's just no accounting for taste.\n\nOh, here's your pay.

Source: I hunted a Khajiit once. Well, more than once, but I'm telling this story. She knew I was tracking her almost immediately. Led me on a wild chase. Then decided to slip back and ambush me. That was her fatal mistake. I always drop caltrops behind me.
Target: I hunted a Khajiit once. Well, more than once, but I'm telling this story. She knew I was tracking her almost immediately. Led me on a wild chase. Then decided to slip back and ambush me. That was her fatal mistake. I always drop caltrops behind me.

Source: Then let me be the first to officially welcome you as an Associate of the Fighters Guild! Get out there and take the fight to the Daedra!
Target: 그렇다면, 파이터 길드의 견습생으로서 정식적으로 널 환영하지! 꼭 데이드라와 싸워주게!

Source: The Hollow City is safe. You should go there.
Target: 공허한 도시는 안전하죠. 거기로 가야 합니다.

Source: Do you have any other prospects?
Target: Do you have any other prospects?

Source: Do you have any other prospects?
Target: Do you have any other prospects?

Source: The Serpent poisoned the Warrior's Apex Stone, but I restored it.
Target: The Serpent poisoned the Warrior's Apex Stone, but I restored it.

Source: Do you have any other prospects?
Target: Do you have any other prospects?

Source: Exarch Arnoth? I've heard his name whispered in fear, even among the Scaled Court. If you killed him, you've dealt a far greater blow to the Serpent's cult than you can imagine. \n\nPerhaps now we'll be able to learn more about the nirncrux element.
Target: Exarch Arnoth? I've heard his name whispered in fear, even among the Scaled Court. If you killed him, you've dealt a far greater blow to the Serpent's cult than you can imagine. \n\nPerhaps now we'll be able to learn more about the nirncrux element.

Source: The inn's workers are safe. I've informed <<1>>, the inn's cook.
Target: 여관 직원들은 안전해요. 여관 요리사 <<1>>한테 알려줬습니다.

Source: Mournhold's a nice place to visit, but … well, you know. I do get a little homesick on occasion. A night of dusky beauties and sujamma scrib-jelly shots are hard to come by on the Gold Coast.\n\nHere. Save a little for your next visit.
Target: Mournhold's a nice place to visit, but … well, you know. I do get a little homesick on occasion. A night of dusky beauties and sujamma scrib-jelly shots are hard to come by on the Gold Coast.\n\nHere. Save a little for your next visit.

Source: If an Orc was in charge, Camlorn would have never fallen to a bunch of mangy werewolves.
Target: 만약 오크가 책임자였으면, 캠론은 지저분한 늑대인간 떼들에게 절대 함락되지 않았을 거야.

Source: We Dark Elves tend to think of fortresses as less of a protective barrier and more of a means to discreetly organize one's enemies. Is it odd that I sleep better in a den of assassins than I ever did at home?\n\nHere, for your work.
Target: We Dark Elves tend to think of fortresses as less of a protective barrier and more of a means to discreetly organize one's enemies. Is it odd that I sleep better in a den of assassins than I ever did at home?\n\nHere, for your work.

Source: Gods that walk around and greet followers give me the shivers, don't you agree? I prefer ancient and unknowable deities. Separation of church and state, as it were. And at least Sithis only asks for blood.\n\nHere's your gold.
Target: Gods that walk around and greet followers give me the shivers, don't you agree? I prefer ancient and unknowable deities. Separation of church and state, as it were. And at least Sithis only asks for blood.\n\nHere's your gold.

Source: I do enjoy contracts to eliminate those Fighters Guild buffoons. All that armor and weapons and they still don't have eyes in the back of their heads. They expect everyone to face them head on and fight fair, the fools.\n\nHere's to easy marks.
Target: I do enjoy contracts to eliminate those Fighters Guild buffoons. All that armor and weapons and they still don't have eyes in the back of their heads. They expect everyone to face them head on and fight fair, the fools.\n\nHere's to easy marks.

Source: This is incredible. Where did you find it? I hope it wasn't too much trouble.\n\nPromise I'll stretch this bottle long as it'll last, now that I know better!
Target: This is incredible. Where did you find it? I hope it wasn't too much trouble.\n\nPromise I'll stretch this bottle long as it'll last, now that I know better!

Source: Never had much use for royalty. Kings and queens, expecting everyone to kneel and grovel. I made a target kneel and grovel once, just to see what it was like. I suppose I could get used to it, but I enjoyed slitting his throat even better.\n\nYour pay.
Target: Never had much use for royalty. Kings and queens, expecting everyone to kneel and grovel. I made a target kneel and grovel once, just to see what it was like. I suppose I could get used to it, but I enjoyed slitting his throat even better.\n\nYour pay.

Source: Fort Amol? Never heard of it. I killed a Forn Amil once, near a river that ran past a fort. Or was that on a cliff overlooking a ford? I really should start writing my memoirs one of these days ….\n\nAnyway, here's your pay.
Target: 아몰 요새? 들어본 적이 없어. 폰 아밀이라면 요새를 지나는 강 근처에서 죽인 적이 있는데, 아니, 요새가 내려다 보이는 벼랑에서 한건가? 이런 기억은 적어 두지 않으면...\n\n어쨌든, 보수다.

Source: You were the one who saved Camp Tamrith and killed Reezal-Jul? I hope you made him suffer.
Target: 당신이 탐리스 야영지를 구하고 리잘-줄을 죽였죠? 그 놈이 고통 받았길 바라니다.

Source: I'm fond of the beaches around Vulkhel Guard. Lots of mudcrabs. Great for making a body disappear. And they're good steamed and cracked, too. But not after they went to town on a body. That's just unsanitary.\n\nHere's your pay.
Target: I'm fond of the beaches around Vulkhel Guard. Lots of mudcrabs. Great for making a body disappear. And they're good steamed and cracked, too. But not after they went to town on a body. That's just unsanitary.\n\nHere's your pay.

Source: I'm sorry.
Target: I'm sorry.

Source: Drink on the job? It's not against the Tenets. I often share an ale with a target. Get to know them a bit, let them enjoy one last pleasure. Then I follow them into the shadows and … you know.\n\nIf you want to buy me an ale later, just say the word.
Target: Drink on the job? It's not against the Tenets. I often share an ale with a target. Get to know them a bit, let them enjoy one last pleasure. Then I follow them into the shadows and … you know.\n\nIf you want to buy me an ale later, just say the word.

Source: Nothing too difficult, I promise. Most of the ingredients should be readily available in Clockwork City, so you shouldn't have to jump through any more hoops for a decent meal.
Target: Nothing too difficult, I promise. Most of the ingredients should be readily available in Clockwork City, so you shouldn't have to jump through any more hoops for a decent meal.

Source: Poison. An interesting tool. I used it once. A splash in the mushroom gravy at one of the Queen's banquets. Got my target, but also killed seventeen other guests. Missed the Queen, though. Apparently she's not fond of mushrooms. Or gravy.\n\nYour gold.
Target: Poison. An interesting tool. I used it once. A splash in the mushroom gravy at one of the Queen's banquets. Got my target, but also killed seventeen other guests. Missed the Queen, though. Apparently she's not fond of mushrooms. Or gravy.\n\nYour gold.

Source: I recovered your lute.
Target: 당신의 류트를 찾아왔습니다.

Source: Things seem to have worked out.
Target: 상황이 해결된 것 같네요.

Source: I rescued the three crewmembers and reunited them with Captain Marck.
Target: 나는 3 명의 승무원을 구출하고 그들을 마르크 선장과 합류시켰다.

Source: I helped <<1>> retake Fallowstone Hall. Unfortunately Wuuthrad, the legendary axe of Ysgramor, is missing.
Target: I helped <<1>> retake Fallowstone Hall. Unfortunately Wuuthrad, the legendary axe of Ysgramor, is missing.

Source: I actually have fond memories of the Redfur Trading Post. Fresh Grahtwood game roasted in Khajiiti spices—the finest food served on a stick you can find. And after you've eaten your fill, use the stick to make your next kill.\n\nHere. Your gold.
Target: I actually have fond memories of the Redfur Trading Post. Fresh Grahtwood game roasted in Khajiiti spices—the finest food served on a stick you can find. And after you've eaten your fill, use the stick to make your next kill.\n\nHere. Your gold.

Source: The real Lord Seht will aid us eventually, I know it. In the meantime, we must do for ourselves.\n\nThank you for everything you've done. It appears we'll have to do a lot more before this is through.
Target: 결국엔 진짜 셋 경이 우리를 도와줄거란걸,알고있어요. 하지만 그 전에까진, 우리가 우리 스스로를 도와야겠죠.\n\n당신이 해 준 이 모든 일들에 감사합니다. 이 일이 끝나기 전에 우리는 더 준비해야 할 것 같아요.

Source: Nobles, am I right? Snap their fingers and pay their gold, and we'll just kill whoever they point at. I suppose that's what we do, but it still rankles my feathers. That's why I collect noble ears. Just doing my part for the common folk.\n\nYour pay.
Target: Nobles, am I right? Snap their fingers and pay their gold, and we'll just kill whoever they point at. I suppose that's what we do, but it still rankles my feathers. That's why I collect noble ears. Just doing my part for the common folk.\n\nYour pay.

Source: I don't expect you to last a week, but as long as you're still here ….\n\nReady for your first contract, Initiate?
Target: 네가 일주일도 버티지 못할 거라고 생각하지만, 어쨌든 여기 있으니까 ...\n\n첫 번째 의뢰를 받을 준비가 된 거겠지, 시작할까?

Source: I've retrieved those werewolf pelts and killed their pack leader.
Target: 나는 그 늑대 인간 가죽 껍질을 꺼내고 그들의 팩 리더를 죽였다.

Source: I had hoped until the end that Nerien'eth could be redeemed. He never gave us the chance. I suppose I have to decide what to do with this blade. Try to move on. Whatever that means at this point.\n\nThank you again—you proved invaluable today.
Target: I had hoped until the end that Nerien'eth could be redeemed. He never gave us the chance. I suppose I have to decide what to do with this blade. Try to move on. Whatever that means at this point.\n\nThank you again—you proved invaluable today.

Source: Did you carve your initials into the Elden Tree, or just your target? I find it hard to get excited about an overgrown log, but I can certainly appreciate its scale. You think it ever bears fruit? Now that might be something to fuss about.\n\nYour pay.
Target: Did you carve your initials into the Elden Tree, or just your target? I find it hard to get excited about an overgrown log, but I can certainly appreciate its scale. You think it ever bears fruit? Now that might be something to fuss about.\n\nYour pay.

Source: I recall a moon-sugar glazed ham I bought at the Baandari Trading Post. This was ages ago. It made my tongue tingle, but left me with this blissful contentment. Made the four assassinations I had to do that much more enjoyable.\n\nHere, your gold.
Target: I recall a moon-sugar glazed ham I bought at the Baandari Trading Post. This was ages ago. It made my tongue tingle, but left me with this blissful contentment. Made the four assassinations I had to do that much more enjoyable.\n\nHere, your gold.

Source: With her help, I found proof of her innocence.
Target: 그녀의 도움으로 저는 그녀가 결백하다는 증거를 찾았습니다.

Source: Ah, the Outside Inn. My only regret during my last stay was not lodging my daggers in the little wag running the place. I swear, he laughs himself silly every time he says his establishment's insipid name.\n\nHere's your pay.
Target: Ah, the Outside Inn. My only regret during my last stay was not lodging my daggers in the little wag running the place. I swear, he laughs himself silly every time he says his establishment's insipid name.\n\nHere's your pay.

Source: Kor and I went hunting in Malabal Tor once. No, not that kind of hunting! We were stalking the prey with two legs. Wood Elves, to be exact. It was a close contest, but I beat Kor by a nose. And an ear.\n\nHere. You earned this.
Target: Kor and I went hunting in Malabal Tor once. No, not that kind of hunting! We were stalking the prey with two legs. Wood Elves, to be exact. It was a close contest, but I beat Kor by a nose. And an ear.\n\nHere. You earned this.

Source: It is done. The recalibration may take some time, but the proctor will make a full recovery. I know she will put this gift to good use.\n\nPlease, take this as well. A token from my personal collection. It is, and always has been, yours.
Target: 그렇네.  재조정에 시간이 좀 걸리겠지만, 대변자는 완전히 회복될걸세. 그녀가 이 선물을 유용하게 사용하리라 믿고있네.\n\n부탁이니, 이것도 가져가 주게. 내 개인 소장용 토큰일세. 이건,  그대의 것이네,아주 오래 전부터 계속 그랬지.

Source: You fought at Shinji's Scarp, huh? Heard that was quite a battle.
Target: You fought at Shinji's Scarp, huh? Heard that was quite a battle.

Source: I bought a potted fern in Vulkwasten. Had the notion to nurture a green thumb. Not my knack, as it were. Only thing I've unintentionally killed in nearly a decade.\n\nBest stick to what comes natural, right? Your gold.
Target: I bought a potted fern in Vulkwasten. Had the notion to nurture a green thumb. Not my knack, as it were. Only thing I've unintentionally killed in nearly a decade.\n\nBest stick to what comes natural, right? Your gold.

Source: Raz wishes you the best of luck, my friend, but Vvardenfell is a bit out of my jurisdiction.\n\nIf they show themselves in the Dominion, Raz will deal with them. But in Dark Elf lands? That's someone else's problem, yes?
Target: Raz wishes you the best of luck, my friend, but Vvardenfell is a bit out of my jurisdiction.\n\nIf they show themselves in the Dominion, Raz will deal with them. But in Dark Elf lands? That's someone else's problem, yes?

Source: Good thing you stopped General Serien. Too bad about Tanval's son, though.
Target: Good thing you stopped General Serien. Too bad about Tanval's son, though.

Source: You wished to speak with me?
Target: You wished to speak with me?

Source: And you're ready to set sail?
Target: 항해를 시작할 준비는 되셨나요?

Source: Drathus told everyone who would listen how you discovered that spy.
Target: Drathus told everyone who would listen how you discovered that spy.

Source: You wished to speak with me?
Target: You wished to speak with me?

Source: Here are some more pelts, and I killed the pack leader.
Target: 여기에 더 많은 털이 있으며, 나는 팩 리더를 죽였다.

Source: <Plant the Banner>
Target: <깃발을 달기>

Source: I burned the Wayward's supplies and killed their leader.
Target: 나는 웨이와드의 보급품을 태웠고 그들의 지도자를 죽였다.

Source: I thank you. Water and bandages will keep our wounded from passing over Shor's Bridge.\n\nTake this for your efforts.
Target: 고맙네. 물과 붕대는 우리 부상자들이 쇼어의 다리를 건너가는 것을 막아줄 게야.\n\n노력해준 대가로 이걸 받게나.

Source: <Plant the Banner>
Target: <깃발을 달기>

Source: <Plant the Banner>
Target: <깃발을 달기>

Source: I've got your eggs right here. The hagraven is dead as well.
Target: 난 여기에 네 알을 가져 왔어. 헤그레이븐도 죽었어.

Source: Yes. Here's your orb. I also managed to destroy the Guardian.
Target: 예. 여기 당신의 오브가 있어. 또, 그 곳의 수호자를 파괴했지.

Source: No. She attacked. I killed her.
Target: 아니, 그녀가 공격했어. 나는 그녀를 죽였지.

Source: <<1>> purchased the poison.
Target: <<1>> purchased the poison.

Source: I'm glad the two of you are safe now.
Target: 두 분이 이제 안전하니 마음이 놓이는군요.

Source: Your reputation spreads far and wide, Geirmund's Guardian.
Target: Your reputation spreads far and wide, Geirmund's Guardian.

Source: <Plant the Banner>
Target: <깃발을 달기>

Source: Iniel … we were close, once. I wish I could've spoken to her one last time.\n\nWe'll mop up the remaining Daedra and start rebuilding the outpost. Thanks to you, we won't have to fight a war on two fronts.
Target: 이니엘... 우린 한때 가까운 사이였죠. 마지막으로 한번 더 얘기할 수 있다면 좋을 텐데.\n\n저희는 남은 데이드라를 소탕하고 전초 기지를 복구하겠습니다. 당신 덕분에 양쪽에서 전쟁을 치를 걱정은 없겠군요.

Source: Damn. She'd just joined us. I should not have allowed the Captain to take her.\n\nWe'll mop up the remaining Daedra and start rebuilding the outpost. Thanks to you, we won't have to fight a war on two fronts.
Target: 젠장. 우리 분대에 들어온지 얼마나 됐다고. 대장님이 데려가게 하지 말았어야 했습니다.\n\n저희는 남은 데이드라를 소탕하고 전초 기지를 복구하겠습니다. 당신 덕분에 양쪽에서 전쟁을 치를 걱정은 없겠군요.

Source: Yes. I'll say my farewells first. It won't be easy, but I won't sneak out like a thief. My family has a right to hear it from my lips. \n\nI'll see you on the ship when you're ready to leave.
Target: 네, 먼저 작별인사를 하겠습니다. 쉽지는 않겠지만 도둑처럼 몰래 빠져나가지는 않을 겁니다. 우리 가족은 내 입술에서 그것을 들을 권리가 있어요.\n\n떠날 준비가 되면 배에서 볼게요.

Source: He was a fine soldier and a good friend. I'll remember his sacrifice. That's what he'd do for me.\n\nWe'll mop up the remaining Daedra and start rebuilding the outpost. Thanks to you, we won't have to fight a war on two fronts.
Target: 그는 훌륭한 병사이자 좋은 친구였습니다. 그의 희생을 기억할 겁니다. 그것밖엔 해줄 것이 없군요.\n\n저희는 남은 데이드라를 소탕하고 전초 기지를 복구하겠습니다. 당신 덕분에 양쪽에서 전쟁을 치를 걱정은 없겠군요.

Source: Travel to <<1>> to have it appraised. Surely Zahra has dealt with <<2>> in the past. She is wily, but Zahra is her match.\n\nHere is compensation for your efforts. Rest assured, you will be remembered when Zahra tells the tale!
Target: 이걸 살펴보기 위해 <<1>>로 여행을 갔었다. 확실히 자하라는 과거에 <<2>>와 거래를 했었어. 그녀는 교활했고, 자하라는 그녀의 적수였었지.\n\n여기 너의 노력에 대한 보상이다. 안심해라, 자하라가 이 얘길 할 때면 너도 기억될테니!

Source: Yes. His death severed his connection with the town.\n\nI do hope Renoit makes it safely away, though I doubt anyone would believe his wild tales if he chose to speak about us. Another legend to hand down, I suppose.
Target: Yes. His death severed his connection with the town.\n\nI do hope Renoit makes it safely away, though I doubt anyone would believe his wild tales if he chose to speak about us. Another legend to hand down, I suppose.

Source: Maldred? That's the name of the … no. That unclawed traitor! Adusa only wishes she had been the one to end him!\n\nYou did well, five-claw. Adusa will see that these people reach a safe haven. Then I have business of my own to attend to.
Target: 말드레드? 그 이름은 ... 아니야. 그 발톱 없는 배신자! 아두사가 말드레드를 끝장 내는 사람이길 바랐는데!\n\n잘 했어, 다섯 발톱. 아두사는 이 사람들이 안전한 피난처에 도착하는 걸 지켜볼 거야. 그런 뒤 내가 처리해야 할 일로 돌아가겠어.

Source: Yes, I found your durzog feed and killed <<1>>.
Target: Yes, I found your durzog feed and killed <<1>>.

Source: <Plant the Banner>
Target: <깃발을 달기>

Source: <Plant the Banner>
Target: <깃발을 달기>

Source: Aren't we all, my friend. Aren't we all.\n\nWe might be able to assist each other, but we have some other business to take care of first.
Target: Aren't we all, my friend. Aren't we all.\n\nWe might be able to assist each other, but we have some other business to take care of first.

Source: Much, when it is time. You have taught humility to a Daedric Prince, mortal. Tread carefully, for he will attempt to exact his revenge.\n\nNow go, with my blessing. When I have need of you, you will know.
Target: 때가 되면 많이 있을 것이다. 네가 데이드릭 군주에게 치욕을 가르쳐 주었구나, 필멸자여. 조심하거라. 놈이 필히 복수를 하려 들 것이니.\n\n이제 내 축복과 함께 떠나거라. 내가 널 필요로 할 때면, 자연히 알 수 있을 것이다.

Source: I believe so, yes. I have much more reading to do before we get to that point, though.\n\nKnow that we wouldn't have this advantage if not for you. I could never have navigated Lleraya's veil without your help.
Target: 그럴 거라고 믿소. 하지만 그 시점에 도달하기 전에 난 이 책을 더 많이 읽어야 하오.\n\n당신이 없었다면 이 책을 얻을 수 없었을 거요. 당신이 도와주지 않았다면 르라야의 베일을 결코 통과하지 못했을 겁니다.

Source: The spirits are free and <<1>> has been defeated.
Target: 정령들은 풀려났고 <<1>>은(는) 패배했다.

Source: I'm glad we straightened it all out.
Target: I'm glad we straightened it all out.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 어떻게 하면 좋을까?

Source: I have driven the Daedra from the Crypt of Hearts and made whole the soul of Alanwe.
Target: 나는 Crypt of Hearts에서 데이드라를 몰아냈고 Alanwe의 영혼을 하나로 만들었다.

Source: I'm glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군.

Source: I heard there was an attempt on Jorunn the Skald-King's life.
Target: I heard there was an attempt on Jorunn the Skald-King's life.

Source: "Almandine" is Duchess Lakana herself.
Target: "Almandine" is Duchess Lakana herself.

Source: Clan Morkul can add this to their long list of achievements. Their outlawry against the Covenant has damaged their reputation, but perhaps this will change that.\n\nRegardless, I just want to go home. Thank you for making that possible.
Target: Clan Morkul can add this to their long list of achievements. Their outlawry against the Covenant has damaged their reputation, but perhaps this will change that.\n\nRegardless, I just want to go home. Thank you for making that possible.

Source: What you've done has helped the entire town. You've given us back our pride.\n\nWe should never have let those Red Rooks frighten us. We're tougher than that. You can bet we'll be better prepared in the future.
Target: What you've done has helped the entire town. You've given us back our pride.\n\nWe should never have let those Red Rooks frighten us. We're tougher than that. You can bet we'll be better prepared in the future.

Source: Who would have thought it was Clan Agluk? They're all but extinct. To be honest, I think there are only a handful left. This may be just the thing to bring them back. \n\nRegardless, I just want to go home. Thank you for making that possible.
Target: 그게 Agluk 부족이었다고 누가 생각이나 했을까? 그들은 거의 사라졌는데 말이오. 솔직히 난 그들이 한줌밖에 남지 않은 줄 알았소. 이걸로 그들이 부활할 수 있을지도 모르겠군.\n\n어찌 되었든, 난 집에 가고 싶구려. 일을 도와줘서 고맙소.

Source: Take the constructs as your blood price and use them until you regain your strength.
Target: 힘을 회복 할때까지 구조물들을 피를 흘린 값으로 대신해 쓰는건 어떨까요.

Source: Look there! It's the one who brought those Pellingare brats to justice!
Target: 저길 봐! 펠링게어의 자식들에게 정의를 가져다 준 사람이야!

Source: Right. Of course. \n\nCassi asked me to bring some of the altered nirncrux to her. So she can study it. I'll stay here and collect what I need. But thanks. I couldn't have completed my mission without you!
Target: Right. Of course. \n\nCassi asked me to bring some of the altered nirncrux to her. So she can study it. I'll stay here and collect what I need. But thanks. I couldn't have completed my mission without you!

Source: The Wilderqueen, eh? Times are changing in Valenwood, aren't they? \n\nAll this has put the Dominion in a delicate position. I suppose that's why it's so important that we're here.
Target: 윌더퀸이라고요? 발렌우드가 변하고 있군요, 안 그런가요?\n\n이 모든 상황이 자치령을 미묘한 입장으로 몰아넣었어요. 우리가 여기 있는게 그렇게 중요한 이유도 그래서겠죠.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: That is some consolation at least. Mallius will be sorely missed. Thank you, friend, for bringing the urn and news of Mallius's end.\n\nIn the future, if you know you will face Daedra, return to me. I may be able to help.
Target: That is some consolation at least. Mallius will be sorely missed. Thank you, friend, for bringing the urn and news of Mallius's end.\n\nIn the future, if you know you will face Daedra, return to me. I may be able to help.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: His last blessing, given to another. I am not surprised—Mallius was ever selfless. I will travel to <<1>> and recover his body. He deserves rest.\n\nThank you, friend, for all you have done. Arkay be with you!
Target: His last blessing, given to another. I am not surprised—Mallius was ever selfless. I will travel to <<1>> and recover his body. He deserves rest.\n\nThank you, friend, for all you have done. Arkay be with you!

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: My brother was stationed at Firsthold. Thank you, traveler.
Target: 내 동생이 퍼스트홀드에 배치됐었죠. 고맙습니다, 여행자님.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: Comrade. I grow … very tired. My time here on Tamriel has gone on far too long. I go now to join my ancestors, to feast in the halls of those gone by. I go knowing that the Fighters Guild is in very good hands.
Target: 동료여. 매우 피곤하군. 탐리엘에서 보낸 시간이 너무 길었네. 나는 이제 선조들과 함께, 지나간 사람들의 홀에서 잔치를 베풀기 위해 갈거야. 파이터 길드가 아주 좋은 사람들에게 관리 되고 있다는 걸 알고 가게되는군.

Source: Thank you for helping me in this matter.\n\nNow, I need to make sure these spawning pools can't be used again. And I should collect a few of the mantikora remains. I need to study them so I can continue to oppose the Serpent's horrid plans.
Target: Thank you for helping me in this matter.\n\nNow, I need to make sure these spawning pools can't be used again. And I should collect a few of the mantikora remains. I need to study them so I can continue to oppose the Serpent's horrid plans.

Source: You will not be sorry, my friend. I assure you that my days of aiding man-eating serpents are over!
Target: You will not be sorry, my friend. I assure you that my days of aiding man-eating serpents are over!

Source: Thank you for bringing this simpering cur to me. If what you say is true, many dear friends fell to this dog's treachery. I look forward to returning the favor.
Target: Thank you for bringing this simpering cur to me. If what you say is true, many dear friends fell to this dog's treachery. I look forward to returning the favor.

Source: I've heard of cold feet, but why would anyone open an Oblivion portal just to stop a wedding?
Target: 나는 차가운 발자국 소리를 들었다. 그러나 누가 왜 결혼식을 중단하기 위해 오블리비언 포털을 열었을 까?\n

Source: Thank the Eight. The army here is greater than we anticipated.
Target: 여덟이시여, 감사합니다. 여기 있는 군대는 우리 생각보다 더 거대하구나.

Source: I've heard of cold feet, but why would anyone open an Oblivion portal just to stop a wedding?
Target: 나는 차가운 발자국 소리를 들었다. 그러나 누가 왜 결혼식을 중단하기 위해 오블리비언 포털을 열었을 까?\n

Source: You're right. He murdered Duchess Lakana.
Target: 네 말이 맞아. 그는 라카나 공작부인을 살해했어.

Source: It's done. The souls of The Three are destroyed.
Target: It's done. The souls of The Three are destroyed.

Source: <<1>> is responsible for this.
Target: <<1>> is responsible for this.

Source: I see. So their lust for power led them to their demise. A lesson every mage should take to heart. \n\nThank you for seeking me out about this. You've saved me much fruitless searching. It is good to know the matter is dealt with.
Target: 그렇군요. 힘에 대한 욕망이 녀석들을 죽음으로 몰고 갔네요. 모든 마법사가 가슴에 새겨야 할 교훈이에요.\n\n절 찾아와 주셔서 고맙네요. 덕분에 성과없는 수색을 끝낼 수 있게 됐어요. 문제가 해결됐다는걸 알면 좋은 법이죠.

Source: Truly? You have all three? Quickly, let me see. Yes. These will do. Satisfactory. Here, take your payment.\n\nAt last, I can join my five-clawed brothers. I can be the predator I was born to be!
Target: 진짜로? 세 개 다 가져왔나? 빨리 보여줘. 그래. 이거면 되겠어. 만족스럽군. 여기, 보수를 받으라고.\n\n드디어, 다섯 발톱 형제들과 함께할 수 있겠어. 타고난 포식자가 될 수 있다고!

Source: I've freed Daeril, and he should live a long, healthy life, never to be bothered by Supernal Dreamers again.
Target: I've freed Daeril, and he should live a long, healthy life, never to be bothered by Supernal Dreamers again.

Source: I have untied Marcus.
Target: 마커스를 풀어주었다.

Source: You've done it! The madness has left them, and the Ancestral Spirits are at peace.\n\nI can still sense residual necromantic energy, so be careful. The stones were powerful. We may feel their influence for some time to come.
Target: 당신이 해냈다는 뜻이죠! 광기가 떠나가고, 선조 영혼들이 안식에 들었다는 뜻이에요.\n\n여전히 강령술의 기운이 남은 것이 느껴지니까, 조심하세요. 그 돌들은 강력했어요. 그 영향력은 앞으로도 한동안 느낄 수 있을지도 몰라요.

Source: I've temporarily freed Kidnapped Guy.
Target: 나는 일시적으로 납치범을 해방 시켰습니다.\n

Source: I freed the young man from captivity.
Target: 감금되어있는 어린 아이를 풀어주었다.

Source: Bob escaped dramatically.
Target: Bob은 기적적으로 탈출하였다.

Source: You! Baron Sorick's in jail because of you. Best place for him.
Target: 너! 너 덕분에 소릭 남작이 감옥에 들어갔어. 그에게 최고로 어울리는 장소야.

Source: You do? I was told the Knights of St. Pelin might return it, but with the attack on the garrison, I had given up.\n\nThis is … beyond amazing. I know King Fahara'jad will be grateful. And you have my personal thanks, as well.
Target: 그래요? 난 St. Pelin의 기사들에게 그걸 가져와 달라고 부탁했지만, 주둔지가 공격받아서 포기했었는데. \n\n이건... 놀라움 이상인데요. Fahara'jad 왕께서 기뻐하실 거에요. 제 개인적인 감사를 드리죠.

Source: Draven needs to learn how to control his … power. I don't know where we'll go while he does. Somewhere far away from anyone else, where no one will question us.\n\nIf this is the life we must lead together, I'll gladly run with him.
Target: 드레이븐은 그... 힘을 통제하는 방법을 배워야겠죠. 그 동안 우리가 어디로 갈지는 모르겠네요. 다른 누군가에게서 멀리 떨어진 곳으로, 누구도 간섭하지 않을 곳으로 가야겠죠.\n\n이것이 우리가 함께 해야하는 삶이라면, 난 기꺼이 그이와 함께 할 거에요.

Source: We'll stay here for a while, at least until the trolls are gone.\n\nMany thanks for your help. If you ever have the need for a Dreamwalker, you only need to ask. It would be my honor to help one who helped us.
Target: We'll stay here for a while, at least until the trolls are gone.\n\nMany thanks for your help. If you ever have the need for a Dreamwalker, you only need to ask. It would be my honor to help one who helped us.

Source: I may not be the most honest Nord, but I promised I would surrender myself to the royal workers if you got me away from the rieklings. And I will.\n\nI never intended for anyone to get hurt. I'll stay away from enchanted items from now on.
Target: I may not be the most honest Nord, but I promised I would surrender myself to the royal workers if you got me away from the rieklings. And I will.\n\nI never intended for anyone to get hurt. I'll stay away from enchanted items from now on.

Source: A terrible shame about General Endare. I suppose you had to do what was best.
Target: 엔다레 장군에 대해선 정말로 유감스럽군요. 전 당신이 최선을 다했다고 생각해요.

Source: You're too modest. Thank you, my brave and noble friend.\n\nUntil we meet again, wherever the road may take us.
Target: 그대는 너무 겸손하구나. 고맙다, 용감하고 고결한 나의 친구여.\n\n운명이 우리를 어디로 이끌던간에, 다시 만날 때까지 잘 있거라.

Source: Ah! Vulkhel Guard, of course. Welcome to Tanzelwil. Perhaps you'll get through to Her Majesty where we could not.
Target: 아! 그래, 불켈 가드에서 봤었지. 탄젤윌에 온 것을 환영한다. 어쩌면 자네는 폐하를 설득할 수 있을지도 모르겠군. 우리는 못 했지만 말이다.

Source: We'll gear up and patch our wounds. In the meantime, find out who's behind this conspiracy. \n\nI'll send one of my best men along with you, to help loosen some tongues. Stars guide your steps.
Target: 우리는 장비를 갖추고 부상자를 수습하겠네. 그동안 이 음모의 배후를 밝혀주게.\n\n내 최고의 부하를 같이 보내주겠네. 심문을 도와줄걸세. 별들이 자네의 발걸음을 인도하길.

Source: My father was a traitor to the crown? Orchestrated an assault on his own people? \n\nWhy? Why would you do this, father?
Target: 아버지께서 여왕님의 배신자였다고요? 자기 사람들을 공격하게 했단 말인가요?\n\n어째서? 어째서 이런 짓을 하셨나요, 아버지?

Source: I killed Remelie and recieved a gift from Geoffroi.
Target: 레멜리에를 죽이고 제프로이로부터 작은 선물을 받았습니다.\n

Source: I killed Remelie Frinck, and freed Test Realm from the Supernal Dreamers.
Target: \n

Source: That gives us some breathing room. I'm sure they'll try again, but we'll burn that bridge when we come to it.\n\nAluri will keep an eye on the roads. That's all we can do for now.
Target: 약간은 숨 쉴 틈이 생겼구만. 놈들은 분명히 다시 오겠지만, 그 때는 우리가 그 다리를 태워버릴 걸세.\n\n알루리가 계속 길을 감시할 테고 말이지. 지금으로썬 우리가 할 수 있는 일은 그게 다일세.

Source: I will. Once I've made arrangements, we will return to the city with our captive.\n\nShe was a good woman once, and in many ways still is. Whatever her fate, as it comes through my decisions, she deserves to look me in the eyes as it happens.
Target: 그렇게 하지. 우린 준비를 마치면 포로와 함께 도시로 돌아갈 걸세.\n\n이 여자는 한때 좋은 사람이었고, 아직도 여러모로 그렇지. 그녀의 운명이 무엇이건 그건 내가 결정한 일이고, 그녀는 내 눈을 똑바로 바라보아야 할거야.

Source: Smart woman. Damn glad she's back in charge. Who'd have thought Duke Renchant was going to sell us all out? Guess he got what was coming to him.\n\nWe've got Reachmen to worry about now. Captain Gaercroft's in charge here—you should talk to him.
Target: Smart woman. Damn glad she's back in charge. Who'd have thought Duke Renchant was going to sell us all out? Guess he got what was coming to him.\n\nWe've got Reachmen to worry about now. Captain Gaercroft's in charge here—you should talk to him.

Source: I heard what you did at the Doomcrag. I don't know if I could have been as half as brave as you, but thanks for what you did.
Target: I heard what you did at the Doomcrag. I don't know if I could have been as half as brave as you, but thanks for what you did.

Source: No matter what the future holds, Evermore is deeply indebted to you, as I am too.\n\nIn times like these, we all need a hero like you … to remind us that no matter how bad things get, there's always hope.
Target: No matter what the future holds, Evermore is deeply indebted to you, as I am too.\n\nIn times like these, we all need a hero like you … to remind us that no matter how bad things get, there's always hope.

Source: No matter what the future holds, Evermore is deeply indebted to you, as I am too.\n\nIn times like these, we all need a hero like you … to remind us that no matter how bad things get, there's always hope.
Target: No matter what the future holds, Evermore is deeply indebted to you, as I am too.\n\nIn times like these, we all need a hero like you … to remind us that no matter how bad things get, there's always hope.

Source: I would have enjoyed tangling with the Orcs at Malak's Maw. They're strong fighters. Almost as strong as Nords.
Target: I would have enjoyed tangling with the Orcs at Malak's Maw. They're strong fighters. Almost as strong as Nords.

Source: I don't know, but I can't put a price on your aid to me in this.\n\nYour actions make it clear to me that my choice to eschew responsibility and remain a squire wasn't the right one. I will never forget this lesson.
Target: I don't know, but I can't put a price on your aid to me in this.\n\nYour actions make it clear to me that my choice to eschew responsibility and remain a squire wasn't the right one. I will never forget this lesson.

Source: Thank you. I can't leave to do this myself, and few others would survive the trip. Your efforts will keep at least some here from passing over Shor's Bridge.
Target: 고맙네. 난 여길 뜰 수 없는 처지고, 다른 이들은 무사히 다녀오기가 쉽지 않지. 자네의 노력 덕분에 적어도 여기 있는 몇몇은 쇼어의 다리를 건너지 않게 될 게야.

Source: Yes, can't you feel it? \n\nThe spirits still remain, but in time they will learn they are free to move on.
Target: 그럼요. 느껴지지 않았나요?\n\n영혼들은 아직 남아 있지만, 시간이 지나면 자유롭게 움직일 수 있다는 사실을 알게 될 거에요.

Source: All that remains is to tend to the wounded. And continue the research. With the Mora in hand and Uricantar dead, Ezduiin will soon be at peace. \n\nI'll see to it.
Target: 이제 남은 일은 부상자들을 돌보는 것 뿐이군. 그리고 연구를 계속해야지. 모라가 손에 들어왔고 우리칸타도 죽었으니, 에즈두인은 곧 평화로워질 것이오.\n\n내가 그렇게 만들겠소.

Source: We'll head to Vulkhel Guard and return with reinforcements. By this time tomorrow, South Beacon will be ours again and the invaders will be nothing but a bad memory. \n\nWe couldn't have done this without your help. You won't be forgotten.
Target: 우리가 벌켈 가드로 가서 증원 병력을 데려올거요. 내일 이 시간쯤 되면 남부 신호소는 다시 우리의 것이 될 것이고 침략자들은 나쁜 기억으로만 남게 되겠지.\n\n당신의 도움이 없었으면 이렇게 해내지 못했을 것이오. 잊지 않겠소.

Source: Fine. You win. But as soon as you leave Eastmarch, I'll be the best hunter here again.
Target: 좋아. 네가 이겼다. 하지만 당신이 Eastmarch를 떠나자마자, 나는 여기서 다시 최고의 사냥꾼이 될 거야.\n

Source: Yes. You're free to go.
Target: Yes. You're free to go.

Source: He's all yours.
Target: 놈은 이제 네 거야.

Source: I found Dominion correspondence that may interest you.
Target: I found Dominion correspondence that may interest you.

Source: One of your soldiers was betrayed.
Target: One of your soldiers was betrayed.

Source: Of course not! Though I can blame myself no less. I am the one who trusted the fool.\n\nHe's apparently just a damn coward. You know, Eamond told me Renchant was naive. You've now given me proof of this fact.
Target: Of course not! Though I can blame myself no less. I am the one who trusted the fool.\n\nHe's apparently just a damn coward. You know, Eamond told me Renchant was naive. You've now given me proof of this fact.

Source: You've done more than most. Thank Kyne you showed up to help us!
Target: 가장 큰 일을 해 주었군. 자네가 나타나서 우릴 도와준 것은 카인님의 은총이야!

Source: I sold some of the trolls' loot, of course.\n\nI suppose you're here looking for your cut. You certainly deserve it. Best of luck to you, friend.
Target: 당연히 트롤의 약탈품 몇개를 팔았죠.\n\n당신 몫을 받으러 온거겠죠? 당신은 확실히 자격이 있어요. 최고의 행운이 함께하길 빌죠, 친구.

Source: Good news. Good news indeed. I was feeling a bit parched on this beach. Ale's run dry, you see.\n\nI know several hard-working lads back in Anvil. I'll see they throw a proper … hero's welcome for <<1>>. My thanks for your service.
Target: Good news. Good news indeed. I was feeling a bit parched on this beach. Ale's run dry, you see.\n\nI know several hard-working lads back in Anvil. I'll see they throw a proper … hero's welcome for <<1>>. My thanks for your service.

Source: What? That can't be. Being a bandit was supposed to be full of excitement and adventure. If you have this then he must have really said that. I need some time alone to think.
Target: What? That can't be. Being a bandit was supposed to be full of excitement and adventure. If you have this then he must have really said that. I need some time alone to think.

Source: The Seamount Warchief? Impressive. I don't know what you did to convince him, friend, but you have my gratitude. Well done!\n\nI will take this petition to High King Emeric immediately. Enjoy your stay in Daggerfall.
Target: 해저산의 대족장 말인가? 인상적이군. 자네가 그를 설득하기 위해 무엇을 했는지는 모르겠지만, 내 감사인사를 받아주게, 친구. 정말 잘 했네!\n\n이 청원서를 하이 킹 에머릭님께 즉시 가져다 주겠네. 대거폴에서 편안한 시간 보내게.

Source: Thank you. I'm still not ready to marry, but I accept my duty to my clan. I'll ask my father's wives for guidance, to prepare for my duties.
Target: 고맙습니다. 나는 아직 결혼 할 준비가되어 있지 않지만 내 일족에 대한 나의 의무는 받아 들이겠어요. 나는 내 아버지의 아내에게 지도를 부탁할 거에요.

Source: Kyne be praised! We'll get these prepared immediately. \n\nYour efforts will save lives here. I can't thank you enough.
Target: 카인을 찬미하라! 약을 즉시 준비하도록 하겠네.\n\n자네의 노력이 여기 있는 생명들을 구한 게야. 감사를 말로 다 할 수가 없구만.

Source: I freed <<1>>. He said he would return to <<2>>'s camp.
Target: I freed <<1>>. He said he would return to <<2>>'s camp.

Source: That's a relief. Thank you. Now comes the tricky bit. \n\nThe final ritual must take place inside the ancestral tombs. Where, I would imagine, the most powerful dead dwell.
Target: 안심이 되는군. 고맙다. 하지만 힘든 일은 지금부터다.\n\n마지막 의식은 내부에 있는 선조의 묘에서 수행해야 한다. 내 생각으로는 가장 강력한 망자가 머무르고 있을 장소이지.

Source: Someone told me that the Library of Dusk is a trap for smart people. I guess we're safe then.
Target: Someone told me that the Library of Dusk is a trap for smart people. I guess we're safe then.

Source: The Worm Cult was here. I've pushed them out of Riften, but they left with a shard of Wuuthrad.
Target: The Worm Cult was here. I've pushed them out of Riften, but they left with a shard of Wuuthrad.

Source: Yes. Are you drunk?
Target: 그래요. 당신 취했어요?

Source: Yes. Some Daedra got through, but I destroyed them.
Target: 응. 데이드라 몇 명이 귀찮게 했지만 죽여 버렸어.

Source: My brother joined that Bad Man cult. Word is they're all dead now. I never liked my brother much.
Target: My brother joined that Bad Man cult. Word is they're all dead now. I never liked my brother much.

Source: Go well, Treva.
Target: 잘 가요, 트레바.

Source: And I'm damned proud to be standing with you. Ahem. All right, enough of emotion. Let's walk the Moons-damned Path and see this through. The way Shazah would have wanted.
Target: 그리고 저는 당신과 함께 서 있는 것이 빌어먹게 자랑스럽네요. 에헴. 좋아요, 감상에 빠져 있는 건 그만두고 달의 빌어먹을 길이나 걸어보자구요. 샤자도 그걸 원할 거예요.

Source: I'll get it as far away from Marius as possible. You've saved numerous lives today.
Target: I'll get it as far away from Marius as possible. You've saved numerous lives today.

Source: I know it's a lot to take in. We'll talk more later.\n\nIn the meantime, I'll keep an eye on the Prophet. Hopefully that orb will help him find out where Sai Sahan is being held. Once we know that, we can plan our next move.
Target: 할 말이 많다는 건 알아. 하지만 나중에 더 이야기 하자.\n\n그 동안, 난 예언자를 지켜보고 있을게. 그 오브가 사이 사한이 있는 곳을 알아내는 데 도움이 되기를 바라. 위치를 알아내면, 다음 행동을 개시할거야.

Source: This is the last of it, then. Anyone who tries to stand in my way will regret it.\n\nHere's your coin, as promised. Now begone, there's much work to be done.
Target: This is the last of it, then. Anyone who tries to stand in my way will regret it.\n\nHere's your coin, as promised. Now begone, there's much work to be done.

Source:
Is there? You don't just recover from vampirism. 

Gods, what am I talking about? He's my son! I have to try. 

I'm not ready to lose him.
Target:
Is there? You don't just recover from vampirism. 

Gods, what am I talking about? He's my son! I have to try. 

I'm not ready to lose him.

Source: You have my never-ending thanks! If I should meet a singer in my travels, I'll commission a song in your honor.\n\nLuck to your house, my friend.
Target: 당신에게 끝없는 감사를 드립니다! 길을 가다 가수를 만나게 되면 당신의 명예에 대한 노래를 의뢰 할것입니다.\n\n친구여, 당신의 식구들에게 행운이 있기를.

Source: Help? You saved me from a fate worse than death! What that Argonian had planned … well, you'll see! The claw's on the other foot, now.\n\nPlease, take this reward. It's not much, but you've earned it tenfold.
Target: 도움? 넌 죽음보다 끔찍한 운명에게서 날 구해준거야. 아르고니안이 계획했던.. 뭐 보면 알겠지! 전세 역전이라걸.\n\n이 보수를 받아줘. 대단한건 아니지만, 넌 이거의 10배의 일을 해주었어.

Source: My gratitudinous knows no bounds. I'm not certain my reputation would survive the humiliation of paying off this bet.\n\nHere, take this. It may not help a hunter of your obvious adroitinosity, but you deserve something for your efforts.
Target: 너게 한없이 고마움을 느낀다. 나는 내 명성이 이 내기에 패배했을시 받을 굴욕을 받고도 버틸거라는 확신이 없었었다.\n\n여기, 이걸 가져가라. 너처럼 누가봐도 능숙한 사냥꾼인 너에게 도움이 안될진 몰라도, 너는 너가 한 노력에 대한 보상을 받을 자격이 있다.

Source: You're right. It has to be done. It has to.
Target: 당신이 맞아요. 끝을 내야 하죠. 그래야만 합니다.

Source: The sailboats are burning.
Target: The sailboats are burning.

Source: Can you make it from here?
Target: 여기서 빠져나갈 수 있으시겠어요?

Source: Yes. I destroyed the manifest.
Target: 네. 목록을 없애버렸어요.

Source: Seems as if the Pact leaders are preparing to take on the Skald-King's traitorous brother.
Target: Seems as if the Pact leaders are preparing to take on the Skald-King's traitorous brother.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Champion of the Blessed Crucible, this one salutes you!
Target: Champion of the Blessed Crucible, this one salutes you!

Source: Hmm. That's troubling news. I'll pass that to my commander as soon as we're done here.\n\nThank you for your service, traveler.
Target: Hmm. That's troubling news. I'll pass that to my commander as soon as we're done here.\n\nThank you for your service, traveler.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: It has, friend. It has!\n\nYou've given me and the others a chance to bring our story to Tamriel, and perhaps bring closure for our loved ones. You have my eternal gratitude. I only hope the Divines find a way to pay you back for your kindness.
Target: 그럼요, 친구. 그렇고 말고요!\n\n저와 다른 이들에게 이 이야기를 탐리엘에 전할 기회를 주셨네요. 우리가 사랑하는 사람들을 만나게 될지도 모르죠. 영원한 감사를 표할게요. 디바인들께서 당신의 친절에 보답할 수 있는 길을 열어 주셨으면 좋겠네요.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Their union has been a long time coming.
Target: 이 결혼이 있기까지 정말 오래도 걸렸군요.

Source: Certainly. You're more than qualified to fulfill woodworking crafting writs. I'll certify you immediately.
Target: 좋아요. 당신은 목세공사 제작 의뢰를 수행할 자격이 있어요. 당신을 곧바로 인증해 드릴게요.

Source: I hope things will settle down at the mine now
Target: I hope things will settle down at the mine now

Source: Then take what you are owed. Use it for the betterment of all that walk the surface. And return to me tomorrow, to see what cavern you will plumb next.
Target: Then take what you are owed. Use it for the betterment of all that walk the surface. And return to me tomorrow, to see what cavern you will plumb next.

Source: Excellent. Take what you are owed. Enjoy your cut of the wealth. And return to me tomorrow. What else will need to be reduced to scrap then?
Target: Excellent. Take what you are owed. Enjoy your cut of the wealth. And return to me tomorrow. What else will need to be reduced to scrap then?

Source: I made sure the fire won't spread beyond Pariah Abbey's fields. Safia thanked me for my help.
Target: 파리야 애비의 들판 너머로 불길이 번지지 않게 했다. 사피아는 나의 도움에 고마워했다.\n

Source: I heard that the ghost of Queen Nurnhilde was seen in Fort Morvunskar.
Target: 넌힐데 여왕의 유령이 모분스카 요새에서 목격된다고 들었다.

Source: Don't worry about it. Here are the ingredients you needed.
Target: 그건 걱정 마시죠. 여기 필요하다던 재료에요.

Source: Have we made a difference?
Target: 우리가 뭔가 바꾸긴 했나요?

Source: Victory for the Pact!
Target: Victory for the Pact!

Source: I did everything I could.
Target: 제가 할 수 있는 일은 다 했습니다.

Source: Are you all right?
Target: 괜찮아?

Source: Interesting scent. Do I detect a hint of wamasu? No, that can't be right.\n\nNot how I'd do it, of course … but interesting enough to pass certification. You may now fulfill provisioning writs. Keep your pots warm and your ladle clean.
Target: 신기한 냄새로군요.  와마수 냄새인가? 아냐, 그럴리가 없지.\n\n저만큼 잘하진 않았지만, 물론 인증을 통과하기엔 충분할 정도군요. 이제 주문 의뢰를 받아도 되겠어요. 냄비를 뜨겁게 유지하고 국자를 항상 깨끗이 하세요.

Source: You saw possible futures. No path is set. Your actions will influence what is to come.
Target: 당신은 가능한 미래를 보았어. 어떤 길도 정해지지 않았지. 당신의 행보가 앞으로 닥칠 일에 영향을 미칠 거야.

Source: Hmph. I had hoped to learn the secret to your trotter pie.\n\nNo matter, I'll certify you immediately. You may now fulfill provisioning writs. Try not to poison anyone.
Target: Hmph. I had hoped to learn the secret to your trotter pie.\n\nNo matter, I'll certify you immediately. You may now fulfill provisioning writs. Try not to poison anyone.

Source: Do you think the Bosmer and Drublog will ever stop fighting?
Target: 보스머와 드루블로그가 싸움을 멈추지 않을 것이라고 생각하나요?

Source: Pirate hoards have whet your appetite for treasure. You've earned that much, at least.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Tomorrow riches may be the least of your concern.
Target: Pirate hoards have whet your appetite for treasure. You've earned that much, at least.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Tomorrow riches may be the least of your concern.

Source: King Fahara'jad sent me to help.
Target: King Fahara'jad sent me to help.

Source: One less crew of marauders plaguing the seas is worth celebrating. I cheer at your conquest. In my heart.\n\nTake your rewards. Seek me again on the morrow. Our work is never done.
Target: One less crew of marauders plaguing the seas is worth celebrating. I cheer at your conquest. In my heart.\n\nTake your rewards. Seek me again on the morrow. Our work is never done.

Source: You kept the Silvenar and the Green Lady from harm. You're alright.
Target: You kept the Silvenar and the Green Lady from harm. You're alright.

Source: When I finally spoke to Durak, he revealed the purpose of the Spirit Wardens. Durak founded their order at Azura's behest. They're protecting Menevia from a threat created by the Daedric Prince Vaermina. Spirit Wardens fight the Fervor.
Target: When I finally spoke to Durak, he revealed the purpose of the Spirit Wardens. Durak founded their order at Azura's behest. They're protecting Menevia from a threat created by the Daedric Prince Vaermina. Spirit Wardens fight the Fervor.

Source: Then it's as the Mane suggested. Magical forces are at work here that we can't fight with sheer numbers. I shouldn't be surprised.\n\nI'm just glad we have you and Indaenir on our side to sort this out. Yes. I think maybe Y'ffre smiles on us after all.
Target: 메인이 암시했던 대로군. 여기에는 우리가 머릿수로 이겨낼 수 없는 마법적인 힘이 작용하고 있어. 놀라울 것도 없겠지.\n\n당신이랑 인대니어가 우리 편에 있어서 다행이야. 그래. 결국에는 이프레께서도 우리에게 미소지으시겠지.

Source: I thought the Daggers were finished. But, well, it looks like we have a future after all!\n\nHere, take this. For helping us finish the job. Consider it a small token of our appreciation. And you'll always have a place with the Daggers if you want it.
Target: I thought the Daggers were finished. But, well, it looks like we have a future after all!\n\nHere, take this. For helping us finish the job. Consider it a small token of our appreciation. And you'll always have a place with the Daggers if you want it.

Source: Right here, Undaunted. Go, and taste the freedom of pumping blood. Taste the luxury of life. Return tomorrow, and we will tempt death's fangs once again.
Target: Right here, Undaunted. Go, and taste the freedom of pumping blood. Taste the luxury of life. Return tomorrow, and we will tempt death's fangs once again.

Source: Oh, you did. And, as promised, here's your share of the winnings. Finally things are looking up for Firtoril!
Target: 아, 도움이 됐지. 그리고 약속대로, 여기 당신 몫의 상금이야. 드디어 퍼토릴의 운수가 펴지는구만!

Source: You have claimed the title and now you claim the prize. Do not grow complacent. Tomorrow a new challenge may rob you of both.\n\nTonight, take your key and spend your cut on the finer things in life.
Target: You have claimed the title and now you claim the prize. Do not grow complacent. Tomorrow a new challenge may rob you of both.\n\nTonight, take your key and spend your cut on the finer things in life.

Source: Oh, you did. And, as promised, here's your share of the winnings. Finally things are looking up for Firtoril!
Target: Oh, you did. And, as promised, here's your share of the winnings. Finally things are looking up for Firtoril!

Source: There is no shortage of bounty, but the apex predator takes their pickings first. Today, that is you.\n\nYour key and your cut. Rest well. Tomorrow we hunt again.
Target: There is no shortage of bounty, but the apex predator takes their pickings first. Today, that is you.\n\nYour key and your cut. Rest well. Tomorrow we hunt again.

Source: My word is as solid as this steel. Take my axe. Maybe someday you'll learn how to use it.
Target: 내 말은 이 강철처럼 단단하다. 내 도끼를 가져가라. 언젠가는 어떻게 사용하는지 배울지도 모르지.

Source: Are you not sated on your game? You seek a trophy too. So be it.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Relish them. Tomorrow you may be the hunted.
Target: Are you not sated on your game? You seek a trophy too. So be it.\n\nTake your key and your cut. Relish them. Tomorrow you may be the hunted.

Source: I'm glad I could bring peace to you both.
Target: 두 분께 평화를 드릴 수 있어서 기쁘군요.

Source: I was attacked by an enraged spirit. He said you would destroy us all.
Target: 나는 격분한 영혼에게 공격당했어. 그는 당신이 우리 모두를 파괴할 것이라고 말했어.

Source: I'm glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군.

Source: King Camoran Aeradan knows his place. He made no attempt to use the Orrery for himself.
Target: 카모란 에라단 왕은 자신의 위치를 알고 있죠. 그는 태양계의를 자신을 위해 사용하려고 시도하지도 않았어요.

Source: The Heart is ours.
Target: 심장은 우리의 것입니다.

Source: Captain Hjolm sent me to retrieve these plans from the enemy. When I returned I found him dead.
Target: 흐요움 대령이 이 명령서들을 적들로부터 회수하도록 저를 보냈습니다. 하지만 제가 돌아왔을 때, 그는 죽어 있었습니다.

Source: I anointed all I found.
Target: 찾은 모든 유골에 기름을 부었어요.

Source: Deleyn's Mill used to grow the sweetest berries in the spring. I wonder where we'll get them from now?
Target: 델린의 제분소는 봄에 가장 달콤한 베리들을 키우곤 했어요. 지금부터 우리가 어디 가는지 궁금하네요.

Source: My family's together for the first time since the Imperials left! Praise the gods, we've survived!
Target: My family's together for the first time since the Imperials left! Praise the gods, we've survived!

Source: I heard that Gloria Fausta sacrificed herself to cure Duke Sebastien's affliction.
Target: I heard that Gloria Fausta sacrificed herself to cure Duke Sebastien's affliction.

Source: You seem quite sure of that.
Target: 꽤나 확신에 차 계신것 같군요.

Source: You're welcome. The cult can't try that again?
Target: 천만에요. 교단이 다시 이런 일을 시도할 수 있지 않나요?

Source: She's floating all around you.
Target: 당신 주변에 떠 있어요.

Source: Glad to help.
Target: 도움이 됐다니 다행이군요.

Source: Did you hear that Duke Sebastien turned out to be a werewolf?
Target: Did you hear that Duke Sebastien turned out to be a werewolf?

Source: We are earth's bones. We endure. We knew someone would come to set us free. We just didn't know when it would happen or who it would be.\n\nIt seems right that you were the one. You are mortal, but also not mortal. Angof has much to fear from you.
Target: 우리는 지구의 뼈이다. 우리는 견뎌낸다. 우리는 누군가가 우리를 풀어주러 올 것을 알고 있었다. 우리는 단지 언제 그런 일이 일어날지, 누가 될지 몰랐을 뿐.\n\n네가 바로 그였던 것 같군. 너는 필멸자 이지만, 또한 필멸자가 아니지. 앵고프는 그대를 두려워 할 이유가 많은 것 같군.

Source: We're bringing in more troops, but that will take time. Until then, we hold this position. \n\nWe never would have gotten this far without your help.
Target: We're bringing in more troops, but that will take time. Until then, we hold this position. \n\nWe never would have gotten this far without your help.

Source: Farewell, mortal. Your actions this day shall prove a decisive blow to the Bloodthorn cult and their evil master.
Target: Farewell, mortal. Your actions this day shall prove a decisive blow to the Bloodthorn cult and their evil master.

Source: Imprisoned! Our enemy is that powerful?\n\nWe will do whatever we can to help. The guardians must be set free.
Target: 속박되다니! 우리의 적이 그렇게 강력하단 말인가?\n\n 우리는 우리가 도울 수 있는 모든 것을 해야해. 수호자들을 풀어줘야 해.

Source: So you're the one that saved the Queen, eh? You don't look that special.
Target: So you're the one that saved the Queen, eh? You don't look that special.

Source: You're the spirit that was trapped inside the skull? What will you do now?
Target: 두개골에 갇혀 있던 영혼인가? 이제 뭘 할거지?

Source: Here is the cap for you, Reesa.
Target: 여기 네 버섯 모자야, 리사.

Source: I can't believe they're making Guildmaster at-Aswala listen to that Argonian scum. He should have killed her when he had the chance!
Target: I can't believe they're making Guildmaster at-Aswala listen to that Argonian scum. He should have killed her when he had the chance!

Source: Ahknara is dead.
Target: 아크나라는 죽었습니다.

Source: I managed to rescue the captive locals.
Target: 포로로 잡힌 주민들을 구출했습니다.

Source: He was part of a cult, sacrificing Pact troops. Here's their ritual book.
Target: 그는 벌레 교단의 일원이었고,  에본하트 조약의 병사들을 희생시켰어. 여기 의식에 대한 책이야.

Source: Is it true that this Llodos Plague turned whatever it touched into a zombie?
Target: 이 로도스 전염병에 노출된 모든 것이 좀비로 변한다는 게 사실인가?

Source: The Divines walked at your side at Torinaan. Auri-el bless you.
Target: The Divines walked at your side at Torinaan. Auri-el bless you.

Source: You showed the Dominion at Murkwater. Burn, milk-suckers, burn! Ha!
Target: You showed the Dominion at Murkwater. Burn, milk-suckers, burn! Ha!

Source: Vanus Galerion tried to destroy the Black Forge all by himself. He was captured, but someone rescued him.
Target: Vanus Galerion tried to destroy the Black Forge all by himself. He was captured, but someone rescued him.

Source: Thank you for the warning.
Target: 경고해주어 고맙네.

Source: The Orcs call themselves the Oathbound. You'll want to look at these documents.
Target: 오크들은 자신들을 Oathbound라고 부릅니다. 이 서류들을 보고 싶을 것입니다.

Source: Your father told me to report to you.
Target: 네 아버지가 날 여기로 보냈어.

Source: We've won the day?
Target: 우리가 이긴건가?

Source: I burned down their siege gear, as you requested.
Target: 네가 부탁한대로 그들의 포위 장비들을 전부 불태웠어.

Source: I'm glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군.

Source: I'm just glad you're safe now.
Target: I'm just glad you're safe now.

Source: Is it done?
Target: 끝난 거야?

Source: The ritual is complete.
Target: 의식은 끝났어.

Source: Dead? Then the guides told the truth. Thank you for my strength and my life!\n\nI'll visit Mauloch's fury upon our clan! They'll pay the blood price for abandoning my father and me.
Target: 돌아가셨다고? 그렇다면 안내인들이 말했던게 사실이었군. 내 힘과 생명을 구해줘서 고마워!\n\n우리 부족에게 말락의 분노를 맛보여주겠어! 내 아버지와 나를 버린 것에 대한 피의 대가를 치르게 할 거라고.

Source: Dead? I don't … the males of my clan were right. I'm weak, not worth saving. Still, the poison no longer burns in my veins.\n\nThank you for your efforts. I'll stay here and rest. Perhaps some day I'll be strong enough to leave.
Target: 돌아가셨다고? 나는... 내 부족의 남자들이 맞았어. 난 약해. 구원받을 가치가 없어. 적어도 독이 더 이상 내 혈관을 불태우지는 않는군.\n\n애써줘서 고마워. 난 여기 머물면서 쉬어야겠어. 언젠가는 떠나기 충분할 정도로 강해질지도 모르지.

Source: Takes some grit to rip out your own heart and stick some shiny rock in its place, so I suppose those Dreadhorn warriors were worthy of a tidy reward.\n\nYour key and cut. Tear one out for me next Heart's Day and maybe I won't break yours.
Target: Takes some grit to rip out your own heart and stick some shiny rock in its place, so I suppose those Dreadhorn warriors were worthy of a tidy reward.\n\nYour key and cut. Tear one out for me next Heart's Day and maybe I won't break yours.

Source: Our foes' bones decorate the grounds of Glademist Farm. Enjoy the Pact's gratitude!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Our foes' bones decorate the grounds of Glademist Farm. Enjoy the Pact's gratitude!\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: Ash Farm is ours! The Pact's heroes may collect their rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: Ash Farm is ours! The Pact's heroes may collect their rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: Let's see how many that actually is … Hm. Thought it would be more.\n\nIt's easy arithmetic, at least. Here's your gold.
Target: Let's see how many that actually is … Hm. Thought it would be more.\n\nIt's easy arithmetic, at least. Here's your gold.

Source: Slaughtering the beasts of the Reach until that primal Forge coughed up a lump of molten rage, and then beating that into a thousand bits too? We'll be calling you the "Butcher of Bloodroot" after this.\n\nTake your spoils, Butcher. You earned them.
Target: Slaughtering the beasts of the Reach until that primal Forge coughed up a lump of molten rage, and then beating that into a thousand bits too? We'll be calling you the "Butcher of Bloodroot" after this.\n\nTake your spoils, Butcher. You earned them.

Source: Reachmen are a lot like the old Orc clans, just dumber and weaker. What they lack in strength, or smarts, or honor, they make up in vicious brutality. \n\nNot everyone's got the guts to face a slow painful death, so that merits a key at least.
