Target: Reachmen are a lot like the old Orc clans, just dumber and weaker. What they lack in strength, or smarts, or honor, they make up in vicious brutality. \n\nNot everyone's got the guts to face a slow painful death, so that merits a key at least.

Source: Bloodfiends. For dead people they sure have a healthy appetite. Good work feeding them fire and steel!\n\nAccept your key and cut! Tomorrow there'll be another ravenous threat to put down.
Target: Bloodfiends. For dead people they sure have a healthy appetite. Good work feeding them fire and steel!\n\nAccept your key and cut! Tomorrow there'll be another ravenous threat to put down.

Source: Oof, it's heavy! Just shear the sheep, don't steal the whole mutton.\n\nShaking up those laborers is worth a good bit to the guild. Here, you earned it.
Target: Oof, it's heavy! Just shear the sheep, don't steal the whole mutton.\n\nShaking up those laborers is worth a good bit to the guild. Here, you earned it.

Source: For marching right into the middle of a pitched battle and sending those rampaging beasts off with their tails between their legs? I'd say routing an army is worth a key and cut, even if it was a shabby one.
Target: For marching right into the middle of a pitched battle and sending those rampaging beasts off with their tails between their legs? I'd say routing an army is worth a key and cut, even if it was a shabby one.

Source: Beyond the eternal gratitude of maidens snatched from the jaws of death? Oh, I think I can manage something shiny for their gleaming savior. Hah!\n\nYour key. Your cut. Now how about celebrating with your new friends before dawn brings new challenges?
Target: 죽음의 문턱에서 구한 처녀들의 영원한 감사로 모자라? 글쎄, 그럼 빛나는 구세주에게 좀 빛나는 것을 전해드려 볼까? 하!\n\n열쇠와 네 몫의 보상이야. 새벽이 새로운 도전을 불러오기 전에 새로운 친구들과 축하라도 하지 그래?

Source: Oh? Let me tally it. Yes, uh-huh, ouch—stupid, sharp—all right. This should put a dent in their business, and their egos.\n\nGood work, your pay.
Target: Oh? Let me tally it. Yes, uh-huh, ouch—stupid, sharp—all right. This should put a dent in their business, and their egos.\n\nGood work, your pay.

Source: The Nord-songs claim you waded through the enemy like the wrath of Molag Bal, took that bull warlord by the horns, and pitched him clear over the Jerall Mountains. You can show me how you wrestled him down after a few drinks.\n\nTake your spoils.
Target: The Nord-songs claim you waded through the enemy like the wrath of Molag Bal, took that bull warlord by the horns, and pitched him clear over the Jerall Mountains. You can show me how you wrestled him down after a few drinks.\n\nTake your spoils.

Source: Besting those mangy curs wouldn't be much to brag about, if you hadn't been facing them down fifty-to-one, and all those minotaurs, and the angry dead—from what I hear—so I suppose you earned your key and cut.\n\nLet the Nords toast you tonight!
Target: Besting those mangy curs wouldn't be much to brag about, if you hadn't been facing them down fifty-to-one, and all those minotaurs, and the angry dead—from what I hear—so I suppose you earned your key and cut.\n\nLet the Nords toast you tonight!

Source: Let's see how many that actually is … Hm. Thought it would be more.\n\nIt's easy arithmetic, at least. Here's your gold.
Target: Let's see how many that actually is … Hm. Thought it would be more.\n\nIt's easy arithmetic, at least. Here's your gold.

Source: Here you are, my friend! Take your key, and your cut, and see to any wounds. Those construct blades leave a nasty taint in the flesh. Come back tomorrow, and we'll send you somewhere fun!
Target: 여기 있어, 친구! 열쇠랑 네 몫을 챙겨. 그리고 상처난 곳을 살펴. 그 구조물의 날붙이들은 몸에 불쾌한 상처를 남기니까. 내일 다시 와. 재미있는 곳으로 보내줄게!

Source: I'm glad I could help.
Target: 도움이 되었다니 기쁘네요.

Source: A Bosmer named Alreal outside of Elden Root had me collect some Wayward Branches fallen from the trees.
Target: 엘든 루트 외곽에 사는 Alreal이라는 보스 먼 이라는 이름을 가진 제가 나무에서 떨어진 여기저기 떨어진 가지들을 모으게 했어요.\n

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떡하실 건가요?

Source: Yes. Here. Take the plans.
Target: Yes. Here. Take the plans.

Source: I see you made it out safely.
Target: 무사히 마무리했군요.

Source: Yes, I can. <<1>> told me to speak with you.
Target: Yes, I can. <<1>> told me to speak with you.

Source: They say someone brought High King Emeric back from the dead. From the dead! I don't know what to believe any more.
Target: 그들은 누군가가 에밀릭 왕을 죽은 자 가운데로 데려왔다고 말합니다. 죽은 자들에게서! 나는 더 이상 무엇을 믿어야할지 모르겠어.\n

Source: I'm a friend of the Green Lady.
Target: 전 녹색 여군주의 친굽니다.

Source: <Move the rocks aside.>
Target: <Move the rocks aside.>

Source: Farragut Farm is ours! The Pact's heroes may collect their rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: Farragut Farm is ours! The Pact's heroes may collect their rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron has authorized rewards for all who helped take Blue Road Farm. For the Pact!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron has authorized rewards for all who helped take Blue Road Farm. For the Pact!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron has authorized rewards for all who helped take Arrius Farm. For the Pact!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron has authorized rewards for all who helped take Arrius Farm. For the Pact!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Our foes' bones decorate the grounds of Kingscrest Farm. Enjoy the Pact's gratitude!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Our foes' bones decorate the grounds of Kingscrest Farm. Enjoy the Pact's gratitude!\n\n- General Jeggord

Target: Chalman Farm is ours! The Pact's heroes may collect their rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: Oh? Let me tally it. Yes, uh-huh, ouch—stupid, sharp—all right. This should put a dent in their business, and their egos.\n\nGood work, your pay.
Target: Oh? Let me tally it. Yes, uh-huh, ouch—stupid, sharp—all right. This should put a dent in their business, and their egos.\n\nGood work, your pay.

Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron has authorized rewards for all who helped take Aleswell Farm. For the Pact!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Our foes' bones decorate the grounds of Dragonclaw Farm. Enjoy the Pact's gratitude!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Our foes' bones decorate the grounds of Dragonclaw Farm. Enjoy the Pact's gratitude!\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: Take it, my friend. And remember an old proverb my mother used to tell me. "Tomorrow is another chance for profit. And death." Strange old woman, she is.
Target: Take it, my friend. And remember an old proverb my mother used to tell me. \\"Tomorrow is another chance for profit. And death.\"\" Strange old woman
column4: she is."

Source: Oof, it's heavy! Just shear the sheep, don't steal the whole mutton.\n\nShaking up those laborers is worth a good bit to the guild. Here, you earned it.
Target: 우와, 무겁네! 양고기를 훔치진 말고 양의 털만 깎으라구.\n\n저 노동자들이 길드에 약간 도움이 된 것 같네. 여기, 네 몫이야.

Source: To all who participated in the capture of Castle Alessia—the Pact thanks you! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: To all who participated in the capture of Castle Alessia—the Pact thanks you! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: You've earned more than whatever trophies you pulled from those cogwork monstrosities. Take your key and your cut! Tomorrow I'll see about finding you a foe with the decency to bleed!
Target: You've earned more than whatever trophies you pulled from those cogwork monstrosities. Take your key and your cut! Tomorrow I'll see about finding you a foe with the decency to bleed!

Source: Let's see what you nicked … Not much, is it? A few more unruly bards getting a lesson in tragedy is worth something though. \n\nHere's your cut.
Target: Let's see what you nicked … Not much, is it? A few more unruly bards getting a lesson in tragedy is worth something though. \n\nHere's your cut.

Source: For dismantling that oversized contraption without a care for the Dwarves' diabolical designs, I'll scrape together more than a pat on the back!\n\nTake your key and your cut! Tomorrow I'll seek out a challenge to rival what you've accomplished today.
Target: 드워프들의 악마적인 설계 따위는 신경 쓰지 않고 그 거대한 기계를 해체한 것을 위해, 등을 두드려 주는 것 이상은 챙겨 줘야겠지!\n\n열쇠와 네 몫을 챙겨! 내일 네가 오늘 성취한 것에 맞설 도전을 찾아 보겠어.

Source: I'm glad I still have it. Hah! Take your cut, take your key, come on back tomorrow to me!
Target: 아직 가지고 있어서 기뻐. 하하! 네 몫과 열쇠를 가져가. 그리고 내일 나에게 다시 와!

Source: No kidding. Did you rob a whole troupe or something? Maybe they'll think twice about mouthing off about us in the future.\n\nHave a night on the town courtesy of the guild.
Target: 정말이네. 극단 전체나 뭔가를 턴 거야? 아마 놈들은 앞으로 우리에 대해 투덜대는 걸 두 번 생각하게 될 거야.\n\n길드에서 좋은 밤 보내라고.

Source: Mmhmm. Mmhmm. So you did. I guess we'll see how good this lot is at improvisation.\n\nHere's your pay, plus a bonus to please keep this stuff away from Andarri.
Target: Mmhmm. Mmhmm. So you did. I guess we'll see how good this lot is at improvisation.\n\nHere's your pay, plus a bonus to please keep this stuff away from Andarri.

Source: You're lucky I still have it! Hah. Take it, my friend. And come see me tomorrow. We'll give you another chance to take care of the Daedra problem.
Target: 운이 좋네. 아직 내가 그것을 가지고 있거든! 하하. 가져가, 친구. 그리고 내일 나를 보러 와. 데이드라 문제를 해결할 또 다른 기회를 줄 테니.

Source: Teaching the Daedra the concept of fear is always worth a fair share! Take your key and your cut, then shake the dirt and blood off and share the story of your victory!\n\nIt'll be hard to out do a trip to Oblivion, but tomorrow we'll try!
Target: Teaching the Daedra the concept of fear is always worth a fair share! Take your key and your cut, then shake the dirt and blood off and share the story of your victory!\n\nIt'll be hard to out do a trip to Oblivion, but tomorrow we'll try!

Source: I heard that Duke Sebastien was a werewolf so they put him in a cage.
Target: I heard that Duke Sebastien was a werewolf so they put him in a cage.

Source: A lot! Not to mention adding insult to injury by torching the Opus of Torment. Can't let that go without reward, eh?\n\nTake your key and your cut! We'll be talking of this victory for some time to come, unless tomorrow you best it!
Target: 엄청 많이! 고뇌의 작품(The Opus of Torment)을 태워 부상을 입은 건 말할 것도 없고. 보수를 주지 않을 수 없군. 그렇지? \n\n열쇠와 보수를 받아! 이 승리는 잠시 얘깃거리가 될 거야.내일 네가 갱신하지 않는 한!

Source: What do you mean?
Target: 무슨 말을 하는 거지?

Source: Are you in charge here? <<1>> sent me from <<2>>.
Target: 당신이 여기 담당자인가요? <<2>>에서 <<1>>님의 명을 받고 왔습니다.

Source: I'm a friend of the Green Lady.
Target: 전 녹색 여군주의 친굽니다.

Source: The necromancer is dead.
Target: 강령술사는 죽었어요.

Source: I rescued Arcady Charnis from the dreugh. It seems the dreugh were abducting villagers and encasing them in mud. That saved them for the hatchlings, who then burrowed into the mud and fed on the villagers. Fortunately, Arcady survived.
Target: 나는 드레그로 부터 Arcady Charnis를 구해 주었다. 드레그는 마을 사람들을 납치해서 진흙에 가두고 있었던 것 같다. 드레그는 새끼들을 위해 마을 사람들을 모아 뒀다. 새끼들은 진흙을 파고 들어 마을사람들을 먹고 살았다. 다행히 Arcady는 살아 있었다.\n

Source: Yes, here's the briar heart.
Target: 그렇습니다. 여기 찔레 심장입니다.

Source: I did, but the bandits were mostly drunk.
Target: I did, but the bandits were mostly drunk.

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron has authorized rewards for all who helped take Rayles Farm. For the Pact!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron has authorized rewards for all who helped take Rayles Farm. For the Pact!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Target: We have vanquished the enemy from Castle Bloodmayne. Rewards are granted to the heroes of this battle.\n\n- General Jeggord

Target: Warden Farm is ours! The Pact's heroes may collect their rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron thanks all who helped the Pact conquer Castle Black Boot. Bask in our gratitude!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Will your new prison hold him?
Target: Will your new prison hold him?

Source: Cake? I don't know. This one came out so well, I might just keep it for myself.\n\nJust kidding! You earned this special cake. Wait until you taste it! I think you're going to be pleasantly surprised.
Target: Cake? I don't know. This one came out so well, I might just keep it for myself.\n\nJust kidding! You earned this special cake. Wait until you taste it! I think you're going to be pleasantly surprised.

Source: What else would a book provided by the Listener contain? Determine each target and assassinate them. Beyond that, the will of Sithis isn't for you or I to question.\n\nYour task won't be easy, but the Listener has faith that you will succeed.
Target: What else would a book provided by the Listener contain? Determine each target and assassinate them. Beyond that, the will of Sithis isn't for you or I to question.\n\nYour task won't be easy, but the Listener has faith that you will succeed.

Source: Dead? Shadow array? I—I suppose the perception tabulator will explain everything. I'll study it right away.\n\nIn the meantime, take this. A little something for helping the Clockwork Apostles today.
Target: Dead? Shadow array? I—I suppose the perception tabulator will explain everything. I'll study it right away.\n\nIn the meantime, take this. A little something for helping the Clockwork Apostles today.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: I've met few heroes like you. Very few. I take this matter of the Triad upon myself, but in truth, you may be the one that saves us. The Prisoner who frees the world.\n\nWe shall see. Farewell.
Target: 자네와 같은 영웅을 만나는 일은 흔치않네. 아주 드믄일이지. 나는 세명의 신에 의한 문제를 마무리 하려 할것이지만, 어쩌면 네가 우리를 구할지도 모르겠구나. 세상을 자유롭게 할 죄수라.\n\n훗날이 되면 알게되겠지, 작별일세.

Source: Those Xit-Xaht didn't put up the fight I'd hoped. You're not even limping! Still, you did as I asked.\n\nHere's your key and cut. Tomorrow I'll at least try to maim you a little.
Target: Those Xit-Xaht didn't put up the fight I'd hoped. You're not even limping! Still, you did as I asked.\n\nHere's your key and cut. Tomorrow I'll at least try to maim you a little.

Source: With the shadow barrier removed, we can move freely between the Brass Fortress and the Cogitum again. \n\nNow, we have a Daedric Prince to thwart and a god to save. I hope you're ready.
Target: 그림자 장벽을 제거하면 황동 요새와 코지튬 사이를 이동해 다닐거야.\n\n자 이제, 우리가 구해야 하는 신이 하나 무찔러야 하는 데이드릭 군주가 하나있으니, 네가 준비가 되어있었으면 좋겠어.

Source: Bet she erected a few choice spines after you destroyed her insane scribblings! She look more like an angry porcupine, or a scared cat? Either way, I'll be drinking to you tonight! \n\nTake your due and come back tomorrow. Just don't make it early.
Target: Bet she erected a few choice spines after you destroyed her insane scribblings! She look more like an angry porcupine, or a scared cat? Either way, I'll be drinking to you tonight! \n\nTake your due and come back tomorrow. Just don't make it early.

Source: Then you shall have it—along with a prize from my vault. This treasure is, and always has been, yours.\n\nPut these gifts to good use … or do not. Triumphs await regardless. We are, all of us, bound by our natures. Your nature demands victory.
Target: Then you shall have it—along with a prize from my vault. This treasure is, and always has been, yours.\n\nPut these gifts to good use … or do not. Triumphs await regardless. We are, all of us, bound by our natures. Your nature demands victory.

Source: Lord Ellic Dorell must have been working with the Montclairs. Why else would his father throw him in the stocks?
Target: 엘릭 도렐 (Ellic Dorell) 경은 몽 클레어 (Montclairs)와 함께 일했음에 틀림 없다. 왜 아버지가 그를 형구에 채웠겠습니까?

Source: Thanks are owed to all who regained Blue Road Keep for the Pact. Accept these rewards from Grand Warlord Zimmeron.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Thanks are owed to all who regained Blue Road Keep for the Pact. Accept these rewards from Grand Warlord Zimmeron.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Drakelowe Keep is ours once again. The Pact's gratitude is offered to all who helped.\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Drakelowe Keep is ours once again. The Pact's gratitude is offered to all who helped.\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: Kingscrest Keep is ours once again! The Pact's gratitude is offered to all who helped.\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Kingscrest Keep is ours once again! The Pact's gratitude is offered to all who helped.\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: The re-capture of Farragut Keep showed the skill and bravery of Pact warriors. Our enemies have learned to fear us! Rewards are granted to all who helped.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: The re-capture of Farragut Keep showed the skill and bravery of Pact warriors. Our enemies have learned to fear us! Rewards are granted to all who helped.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Target: The re-capture of Chalman Keep showed the skill and bravery of Pact warriors. Our enemies have learned to fear us! Rewards are granted to all who helped.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Target: Thanks are owed to all who regained Arrius Keep for the Pact. Accept these rewards from Grand Warlord Zimmeron.\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron thanks all who helped the Pact conquer Fort Aleswell. Bask in our gratitude!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron thanks all who helped the Pact conquer Fort Aleswell. Bask in our gratitude!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: We have vanquished the enemy from Fort Dragonclaw. Rewards are granted to the heroes of this battle.\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: We have vanquished the enemy from Fort Dragonclaw. Rewards are granted to the heroes of this battle.\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: We have vanquished the enemy from Fort Glademist. Rewards are granted to the heroes of this battle.\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: We have vanquished the enemy from Fort Glademist. Rewards are granted to the heroes of this battle.\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: To all who participated in the capture of Fort Ash—the Pact thanks you! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: To all who participated in the capture of Fort Ash—the Pact thanks you! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: Cut the head off the serpent—Lizard? Whatever—the body dies with it. The Xit-Xaht are scattered and leaderless. They won't be bothering anyone anytime soon, even if they do survive.\n\nYou earned your key and cut today. Do it again tomorrow.
Target: Cut the head off the serpent—Lizard? Whatever—the body dies with it. The Xit-Xaht are scattered and leaderless. They won't be bothering anyone anytime soon, even if they do survive.\n\nYou earned your key and cut today. Do it again tomorrow.

Source: Yes. One life a season in exchange for a bountiful harvest. What could be more noble than sacrificing your life to feed the hungry?\n\nAnd I'll continue to work with the remaining apprentices. Maybe we can find another way … someday.
Target: 네. 한 계절에 하나의 생명을 대가로 풍성한 수확을 맞이할 수 있을 거예요. 배고픈 사람들을 먹이기 위해서 자신의 생명을 희생하는 것보다 더 고귀한 것이 있을까요?\n\n그리고 전 남아있는 견습생들과 함께 일할 거예요. 어쩌면 우리가 언젠간 … 다른 방법을 찾을 수 있을지도 모르니까요.

Source: You've revived my memories of the Barons Who Move Like This! I must go and re-corporate them while the memories are still fresh. Then, we shall begin to conquer the Aurbis!\n\nOh! And thank you. Please accept an award appropriate to your station.
Target: 네가 움직이는 남작의 기억을 되돌려 줬잖아! 아직 기억이 생생할 때 그들과 다시 협력 해야겠어. 그런 다음, 우리는 아루비스(Arubis) 정복을 시작할거야!\n\n아! 그리고 고마워. 네 점수에 상응하는 보상을 가져가든가 해.

Source: I'm not a citizen. And even if I were, I'd not waste time wading through their opaque bureaucracy. You've proven yourself to be more than capable. I have no doubt you'll figure something out.\n\nGain your sponsorship. We will speak again soon.
Target: 난 이곳 시민이 아닐세. 그리고 설령 내가 그렇다고 해도, 이곳의 이해할 수 없는 관료제에 시간 낭비하고 싶지도 않고 말이지. 자네는 이미 충분히 자격이 있다는걸 증명했네. 자네가 잘 헤쳐나갈거라고 난 믿어 의심치 않네.\n\n후원자를 찾게. 그럼 우린 나중에 다시 이야기하도록 하지.

Source: Let's see how many that actually is … Hm. Thought it would be more.\n\nIt's easy arithmetic, at least. Here's your gold.
Target: 어디 얼마나 되는지 보자... 흠. 좀 더 많을 거라고 생각했는데.\n\n 세기는 편하군. 여기 대금을 받아.

Source: Wish everybody was making the same effort. Let's see what you've got. Mm. Mmhmm. Not bad. It's yours, plus a little extra for the effort.
Target: Wish everybody was making the same effort. Let's see what you've got. Mm. Mmhmm. Not bad. It's yours, plus a little extra for the effort.

Source: You're right. The sacrifice is too great. Lector Naril turned Sotha Sil's dream into a nightmare.\n\nI'll work with the remaining apprentices. Together, we'll find another way for the Everwound Wellspring to help the Clockwork City.
Target: 당신이 옳아요. 너무 큰 희생이 뒤따르죠. 렉터 나릴 은 소사 실의 꿈을 악몽으로 바꾸어버렸어요.\n\n전 남은 견습생들과 같이 일할게요. 우리는 함께, 에버 웬 원천지에서 클락워크 시티를 위한 다른 방법을 찾을 거예요.

Source: Someone told me recently that crime doesn't pay. Isn't that the dumbest thing you've ever heard?\n\nHere's your cut.
Target: Someone told me recently that crime doesn't pay. Isn't that the dumbest thing you've ever heard?\n\nHere's your cut.

Source: The garrison's safe now, but there'll soon be another fight. Another way to raise our weapons in battle. Mark my words.
Target: The garrison's safe now, but there'll soon be another fight. Another way to raise our weapons in battle. Mark my words.

Source: They say the Hag Fen is safe for travel these days. But I still hate nasty, smelly swamps.
Target: They say the Hag Fen is safe for travel these days. But I still hate nasty, smelly swamps.

Source: Good luck, Bumnog.
Target: Good luck, Bumnog.

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron thanks all who helped the Pact conquer Fort Rayles. Bask in our gratitude!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron thanks all who helped the Pact conquer Fort Rayles. Bask in our gratitude!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: The talisman would be the key to defeating Angof—if its power wasn't depleted. We need to recharge the talisman. \n\nThen we'll finally get our chance to deal with Angof and take the battle to him!
Target: The talisman would be the key to defeating Angof—if its power wasn't depleted. We need to recharge the talisman. \n\nThen we'll finally get our chance to deal with Angof and take the battle to him!

Source: To all who participated in the capture of Fort Warden—the Pact thanks you! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: To all who participated in the capture of Fort Warden—the Pact thanks you! Claim your rewards here.\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: It's as I feared. The Shadow breached the Cogitum Centralis—Lord Seht's seat of power. If it reaches the core … if it removes Lord Seht from the Throne-Aligned …. We can't let that happen.\n\nYou should steel yourself for the battles ahead.
Target: 내 염려대로야. 그 그림자가 코지튬의 중심—셋 경의 권좌를 침범했어. 만약 그게 코어를 손에 넣는다면… 만약 셋 경을 왕좌에서 끌어내리는 데 성공한다면… 우린 그런 일이 일어나게 해선 안돼.\n\n넌 다음에 있을 전투에 대비해서 준비해.

Source: Of course! I'll get you certified right away so you can fulfill blacksmith crafting writs immediately.
Target: 물론이죠! 당신을 곧바로 인증해 드릴게요. 이제 당신은 곧바로 대장장이 제작 의뢰를 수행할 수 있어요.

Source: Oh, I know you did. People are already talking about the rash of break-ins. I can hardly keep up with the flood of merchants making "security deposits" with the guild.\n\nI've got your cut of that right here.
Target: Oh, I know you did. People are already talking about the rash of break-ins. I can hardly keep up with the flood of merchants making "security deposits" with the guild.\n\nI've got your cut of that right here.

Source: A reasonable request, for one who has cheated death. Take your key, and your cut. Tomorrow I will put more faith in your abilities, and your will to live.
Target: A reasonable request, for one who has cheated death. Take your key, and your cut. Tomorrow I will put more faith in your abilities, and your will to live.

Source: Your skill is well known among the Undaunted. It would be foolish not to reward you. Take your key, and your cut. Return tomorrow, and we shall see what the Undaunted say of you then.
Target: Your skill is well known among the Undaunted. It would be foolish not to reward you. Take your key, and your cut. Return tomorrow, and we shall see what the Undaunted say of you then.

Source: Just one lockbox? You know the point was to stir things up. Oh well, you're chipping in. I'll note it in the log.\n\nHere's your pay.
Target: Just one lockbox? You know the point was to stir things up. Oh well, you're chipping in. I'll note it in the log.\n\nHere's your pay.

Source: Wish everybody was making the same effort. Let's see what you've got. Mm. Mmhmm. Not bad. It's yours, plus a little extra for the effort. \n\nIf we keep this up, the whole Landing will know that the Thieves Guild is back.
Target: Wish everybody was making the same effort. Let's see what you've got. Mm. Mmhmm. Not bad. It's yours, plus a little extra for the effort. \n\nIf we keep this up, the whole Landing will know that the Thieves Guild is back.

Source: Fildgor is dead, and the Ebonheart Pact is sealed.
Target: Fildgor is dead, and the Ebonheart Pact is sealed.

Source: A reasonable request. Take your key, and your cut. When next we speak, tomorrow, I will put more faith in your sword arm.
Target: A reasonable request. Take your key, and your cut. When next we speak, tomorrow, I will put more faith in your sword arm.

Source: I defeated the Covenant necromancer who corrupted the barrow.
Target: I defeated the Covenant necromancer who corrupted the barrow.

Source: There is no more unrelenting foe than your environment. It cannot be bested, only withstood. Today you made an enemy of the elements and return Undaunted.\n\nTake your reward. Let the warmth return to your body before another day cools it forever more.
Target: 환경보다 가차없는 적은 없다네. 그것은 이길 수 없고, 견뎌내야 할 뿐이야. 오늘 자네는 원소를 적으로 만들고 언던티드로 돌아왔다.\n\n보상을 받게나. 언젠가 영원히 식기 전에 온기가 자네의 몸에 되돌아 오도록 만들게.

Source: The guardian is dead and I retrieved the notes.
Target: The guardian is dead and I retrieved the notes.

Source: I dealt with the New Moon's representative in the Bone Orchard.
Target: I dealt with the New Moon's representative in the Bone Orchard.

Source: The Ebonheart Pact is sealed and Fildgor lives.
Target: The Ebonheart Pact is sealed and Fildgor lives.

Source: I was able to recover this from the Corpse Garden.
Target: I was able to recover this from the Corpse Garden.

Source: Where can I find Fildgor?
Target: Where can I find Fildgor?

Source: Wh … what? How do you know this?\n\nThe wind is truly at our backs! I've misjudged you. My apologies.
Target: 뭐... 뭐라고? 이걸 어떻게 알고 있지?\n\n바람이 정말로 우리 뒤에서 불어오는군! 당신을 잘못 판단했던 모양이야. 사과할게.

Source: Your wit and wisdom deserve nothing less. Take your key, and your cut. Rest well this evening. And return tomorrow. Pit your wits against death once again.
Target: Your wit and wisdom deserve nothing less. Take your key, and your cut. Rest well this evening. And return tomorrow. Pit your wits against death once again.

Target: <<1)>> is dead and I collected some arrows.

Target: <일을 끝마친다.>

Source: Where are you heading now?
Target: 이제 어디로 갈 건가요?

Source: Brindle Mine is now ours. Claim your rewards, heroes!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: Brindle Mine is now ours. Claim your rewards, heroes!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Target: 때까치들이 당신네 배를 부숴버렸는데요.

Target: The Pact's banner now flies over Black Boot Mine. Accept Grand Warlord Zimmeron's thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord

Target: To those who helped conquer Roebeck Mine—the rewards of victory are yours!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Target: Let me try.

Target: Alessia Mine is now ours. Claim your rewards, heroes!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: I used Durak's scroll to summon a storm atronach. It put out the biggest fire in the fields, saving some of the crops.
Target: 나는 Durak의 두루마리를 사용하여 storm atronach를 소환했다. atronach는 농작물의 일부를 보호하면서, 들판에서 가장 큰 불을 껐다.\n

Source: I reported Lord Sorick's crime to Padier Renoit, who grew even more furious upon hearing his suspicions confirmed. I do not think Sorick will live another day.
Target: I reported Lord Sorick's crime to Padier Renoit, who grew even more furious upon hearing his suspicions confirmed. I do not think Sorick will live another day.

Source: I uncovered the truth. Lord Sorick had his men bring eggs into Wayrest slums so the dreugh would slaughter peasants. I agreed to take a bribe to keep his secret.
Target: I uncovered the truth. Lord Sorick had his men bring eggs into Wayrest slums so the dreugh would slaughter peasants. I agreed to take a bribe to keep his secret.

Source: I recovered the Dragonguard scrolls from the Reliquary of Stars.
Target: I recovered the Dragonguard scrolls from the Reliquary of Stars.

Source: I found your ensorcelled swords.
Target: I found your ensorcelled swords.

Source: Yes, I killed the Dragons.
Target: Yes, I killed the Dragons.

Source: The Pact now controls Ash Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: The Pact now controls Ash Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: The present, actually. Take the key to your reward. Take it, and your cut. As for the future, who knows? Return to me tomorrow and we will see what rewards may come.
Target: The present, actually. Take the key to your reward. Take it, and your cut. As for the future, who knows? Return to me tomorrow and we will see what rewards may come.

Source: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Rayles Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: Grand Warlord Zimmeron offers his thanks to all who helped bring Rayles Lumbermill under Pact control. Rewards await the conquering heroes!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: The present holds the key, for all that you've accomplished. Your well-deserved cut awaits. Return to me tomorrow and we will see what the future holds.
Target: The present holds the key, for all that you've accomplished. Your well-deserved cut awaits. Return to me tomorrow and we will see what the future holds.

Source: Yes, I placed the enchanted candles.
Target: Yes, I placed the enchanted candles.

Source: Glademist Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: Glademist Lumbermill now provides wood for the Pact, not our enemies. Accept our thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: Certainly. You're more than qualified to fulfill woodworking crafting writs. I'll certify you immediately.
Target: 좋아요. 당신은 목세공사 제작 의뢰를 수행할 자격이 있어요. 당신을 곧바로 인증해 드릴게요.

Source: Yes, I killed the Dragons.
Target: Yes, I killed the Dragons.

Source: To those who helped conquer Bloodmayne Mine—the rewards of victory are yours!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: To those who helped conquer Bloodmayne Mine—the rewards of victory are yours!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: I got rid of the New Moon's recruiter at the Supernal Dreamers' camp.
Target: I got rid of the New Moon's recruiter at the Supernal Dreamers' camp.

Source: The Pact now controls Warden Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: The Pact now controls Warden Lumbermill. Those who contributed, your rewards await!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: Every time we bury a blade in a bandit, I feel like we've done a service. So, for your service: take your key and your cut. And come on back tomorrow!
Target: Every time we bury a blade in a bandit, I feel like we've done a service. So, for your service: take your key and your cut. And come on back tomorrow!

Source: To those who helped conquer Dragonclaw Mine—the rewards of victory are yours!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm
Target: To those who helped conquer Dragonclaw Mine—the rewards of victory are yours!\n\n- Scribe Dreet-Wulm

Source: The city of Wayrest may not know all you've done. But I say you've done Tamriel a service. So, for your service: take your key and your cut. And get back here tomorrow, all right?
Target: The city of Wayrest may not know all you've done. But I say you've done Tamriel a service. So, for your service: take your key and your cut. And get back here tomorrow, all right?

Source: No kidding. Did you rob a whole troupe or something? Maybe they'll think twice about mouthing off about us in the future.\n\nHave a night on the town courtesy of the guild.
Target: 정말이네. 극단 전체나 뭔가를 턴 거야? 아마 놈들은 앞으로 우리에 대해 투덜대는 걸 두 번 생각하게 될 거야.\n\n길드에서 좋은 밤 보내라고.

Source: Chalman Mine is now ours. Claim your rewards, heroes!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: Chalman Mine is now ours. Claim your rewards, heroes!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: Ash Mine is now ours. Claim your rewards, heroes!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron
Target: Ash Mine is now ours. Claim your rewards, heroes!\n\n- Grand Warlord Zimmeron

Source: I'm glad I could help.
Target: 도울 수 있어서 기쁘군.

Source: The Pact's banner now flies over Aleswell Mine. Accept Grand Warlord Zimmeron's thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord
Target: The Pact's banner now flies over Aleswell Mine. Accept Grand Warlord Zimmeron's thanks, warriors!\n\n- General Jeggord

Source: Someone told me recently that crime doesn't pay. Isn't that the dumbest thing you've ever heard?\n\nHere's your cut.
Target: Someone told me recently that crime doesn't pay. Isn't that the dumbest thing you've ever heard?\n\nHere's your cut.

Source: The Congress of Calibration thanks you for your service. And on a personal note, I applaud your mercy. Gascone's an insufferable traitor, but he's still an apostle. Lord Seht always said we should take care of each other.\n\nTake this, and my thanks.
Target: 조정의 의회는 네가 도와준 것에 고마워 하고 있어. 그리고 개인적으로도, 나도 네 자비로운 일에 대해서 고마워 하고있고. 개스톤은 짜증나는 배신자지만, 여전히 우리 사도고. 로드셋은 언제나 우리가 서로를 돌봐주어야 한다고 했으니까.\n\n이걸 받아, 그리고 내 감사도.

Source: Let's see how many that actually is … Hm. Thought it would be more.\n\nIt's easy arithmetic, at least. Here's your gold.
Target: Let's see how many that actually is … Hm. Thought it would be more.\n\nIt's easy arithmetic, at least. Here's your gold.

Source: What did the cult want with you?
Target: 교단이 당신에게 뭘 원한거죠?

Source: I'm sure you'll find this worth slogging through a frothing soup of fetid muck! Take your key, your cut, and a well deserved bath … or three. Tomorrow we'll challenge more than your intestinal fortitude.
Target: 악취가 진동하는 진창을 헤쳐나온 가치가 있었다는 것을 알았으면 해! 열쇠와 네 몫을 가져가. 그리고 목욕할 자격도 충분히 있어... 확실히. 내일은 네가 가진 배짱 이상의 것에 도전해 보자고.

Source: Hah! You've proven you can wade through zombies and filth in equal measure! Take comfort in knowing that at least your rewards will be shining. \n\nYour key and your cut. Tomorrow we'll arrange a trial for more than your sense of smell!
Target: Hah! You've proven you can wade through zombies and filth in equal measure! Take comfort in knowing that at least your rewards will be shining. \n\nYour key and your cut. Tomorrow we'll arrange a trial for more than your sense of smell!

Target: 파르미온(Parmion)사령관이 우리와 동행하기로 했지만, 그건 함정이었습니다. 우리는 팔츄(Faolchu)와 그의 장교들을 찾을 수 있을 거라 기대했지만, 우리를 기다리는 것은 소대 전체였어요.\n\n우리는 그들을 막을 수 없었습니다. 사령관이 용감하게 싸웠지만, 그들은 사령관을 쓰러뜨리고 알레나(Alana)를 데려갔어요.

Target: A strong Redguard man leading the Fighters Guild! Tall Papa be praised, it is as it should be!

Source: QUEST: Artifacts of the Mundus
Target: 퀘스트:  문두스의 유물\n

Source: I didn't think we'd ever find this journal! My brother escaped the mines, but one of Faolchu's werewolves attacked him. He's resting, but he'll be happy to have this again. And I'm sure his notes will be useful.\n\nThank you for returning it to us!
Target: I didn't think we'd ever find this journal! My brother escaped the mines, but one of Faolchu's werewolves attacked him. He's resting, but he'll be happy to have this again. And I'm sure his notes will be useful.\n\nThank you for returning it to us!

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Little Ozo! You found him! Thank you so much! \n\nI don't know how he manages to get so lost. Here's the reward, as promised!
Target: 꼬마 오조! 그 애를 찾으셨군요! 정말 감사해요!\n\n얘가 어쩌다가 길을 잃었는지 모르겠네요. 여기 약속했던 보상이에요!

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: This is interesting. We suspected the Red Rooks of collaborating with the Bloodthorns, but it's heartening to know that their alliance is fragile.\n\nWe can use this to our advantage. And I can also make good use of these healing recipes.
Target: This is interesting. We suspected the Red Rooks of collaborating with the Bloodthorns, but it's heartening to know that their alliance is fragile.\n\nWe can use this to our advantage. And I can also make good use of these healing recipes.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Blood is thicker than water, after all. With the money we'll get from this place, I can buy us a good home in Sentinel.\n\nOhama will welcome my sister, even after all this. She's beautiful that way.
Target: Blood is thicker than water, after all. With the money we'll get from this place, I can buy us a good home in Sentinel.\n\nOhama will welcome my sister, even after all this. She's beautiful that way.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Target: 스톤폴즈에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Target: 데샨에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: You saved the Mane at Driladan pass. This one's friend was among the soldiers there.
Target: 당신이 드릴라단 고개에서 메인을 구했군요. 이 몸의 친구가 그곳 군인들 사이에 있었습니다.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I don't suppose you found any harpy feathers while you were in the Scar? I heard tailors pay a fortune for them.
Target: I don't suppose you found any harpy feathers while you were in the Scar? I heard tailors pay a fortune for them.

Target: 스톰헤이븐에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Target: 리븐스파이어에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Target: 알리키어 사막에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in Bangkorai.
Target: 뱅코라이에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: Glad you got that lunatic Serge off Miranda Arcole's neck. Well done.
Target: 미치광이 Serge로부터 미란다 아콜을 구했군요. 훌륭합니다.

Source: Miranda died
Target: Miranda는 죽었다.

Source: What now, Muzgu?
Target: 이젠 뭘해야하지, Muzgu?

Source: Muzgu sacrificed himself to save Stormhaven.
Target: Muzgu 는 스톰헤이븐을 구하기위해 자신을 희생하기로 하였다.

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in Eastmarch.
Target: 이스트마치에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in the Rift.
Target: 리프트에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in Auridon.
Target: 아우리돈에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in Grahtwood.
Target: 그랏우드에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: Yes, you're right. I know you're right. I need to think about this.\n\nPlease, just leave me alone.
Target: 맞아. 니가 맞다는걸 알아. 생각할 시간이 필요해\n\n혼자 있게 해줘.

Source: What a thoughtful person you are, coming all this way to give me this news. Thank you.\n\nNow, if you don't mind, I need to be alone for awhile.
Target: What a thoughtful person you are, coming all this way to give me this news. Thank you.\n\nNow, if you don't mind, I need to be alone for awhile.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: And you look perfectly healthy. How … irksome. I suppose my wayward acolytes weren't as powerful as I thought. I'll need to be more diligent in my training of their replacements.\n\nStill, my lord Satakal thanks you. May his coils guide your steps.
Target: And you look perfectly healthy. How … irksome. I suppose my wayward acolytes weren't as powerful as I thought. I'll need to be more diligent in my training of their replacements.\n\nStill, my lord Satakal thanks you. May his coils guide your steps.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in Shadowfen.
Target: 섀도우펜에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: I humiliated the Daedra in <<1>>.
Target: <<1>>에 데이드라가 있다니 수치스러운 일이군요.

Source: The path ahead of us is a dark one, but it pleases me to know that I shall walk that path with friends. \n\nMay we all rest a little easier tonight. I know I shall.
Target: 우리 앞에 놓인 길은 어둡지만, 그 길을 친구와 같이 걸을 수 있다는 것을 알게되어 기쁘구료.\n\n우리 모두 오늘 밤은 좀 더 편히 쉴 수 있겠군. 그래야만 하고.

Source: You've outdone us, friend. You've explored the Aetherian Archive before the Undaunted.\n\nThis doesn't happen often, but we'd like to give you something special to commemorate your feat!
Target: You've outdone us, friend. You've explored the Aetherian Archive before the Undaunted.\n\nThis doesn't happen often, but we'd like to give you something special to commemorate your feat!

Source: I witnessed the Titan's assault and sensed the deaths of many innocents. It is a great and terrible loss.   \n\nSai Sahan and the others will need time to aid Kasura. I will contact you when they return and we will begin the journey to Sancre Tor.
Target: 타이탄의 돌격을 보았고 수많은 무고한 자들의 죽음을 느꼈네. 거대하고 끔찍한 손실이야.\n\n사이 사한과 나머지는 카수라를 도와줄 시간이 필요할 걸세. 그들이 돌아오면 연락하겠네. 그리고 생커 토르로의 여정을 시작해야지.

Source: You've outdone us, friend. You've reached the heart of this Citadel before the Undaunted.\n\nThis doesn't happen often, but we'd like to give you something special to commemorate your feat!
Target: You've outdone us, friend. You've reached the heart of this Citadel before the Undaunted.\n\nThis doesn't happen often, but we'd like to give you something special to commemorate your feat!

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in Malabal Tor.
Target: 말라발 토르에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in Greenshade.
Target: 그린셰이드에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: Did you hear what happened at Hinault Farm? Some hero saved the family and the guards from Montclair's forces.
Target: 히널트 농장에서 무슨 일이 있었는지 들었어? 어떤 영웅이 그 가족을 구하고 몽클레어 군대로부터 경비대를 지켰대.

Source: I destroyed the Dark Anchors in Reaper's March.
Target: 리퍼스 마치에 있는 어둠의 닻을 파괴했습니다.

Source: Those Montclair traitors ambushed the guard at Hinault Farm! I heard a stranger happened along and saved them all.
Target: Those Montclair traitors ambushed the guard at Hinault Farm! I heard a stranger happened along and saved them all.

Source: Yes. I killed the leader of the Backstreet Gang.
Target: 맞아요. 제가 뒷골목 깡패들의 두목을 죽였죠.

Source: The spirit of Shalidor returned and advising the Mages Guild! The times we live in.
Target: The spirit of Shalidor returned and advising the Mages Guild! The times we live in.

Source: Some lucky bastard solved Frodibert Fontbonne's last puzzle. Wish that were me!
Target: 어떤 운 좋은 개자식이 Frodibert Fontbonne의 마지막 퍼즐을 풀었대. 그게 나였으면!

Source: I returned the cursed items to Norvulk Ruins.
Target: 노벅 유적에 저주받은 물건들을 돌려놓았어요.

Source: QUEST: Out of Darkness, Light OLD
Target: 퀘스트: 어둠 바깥에서, 빛이늙다

Source: Yeah. Here's your stuff.
Target: Yeah. Here's your stuff.

Source: The council is waiting.
Target: The council is waiting.

Source: You may return here as often as you like, and anywhere you see the shrine of the Tiger, you may seek Brackenleaf's blessing.\n\nCongratulations, friend.
Target: 넌 언제든지 원할 때에 여기로 돌아올 수 있고, 호랑이 화로가 있는 곳이라면 어디에서든지 고사리잎의 축복을 받을 수 있을 것이다.\n\n축하한다, 친구여.

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Yes. You should be able to clear things up with your boss now.
Target: 그래. 그럼 이제 네 상관과의 일을 말끔하게 해결할 수 있겠군.

Source: I delivered <<1>> to her contact, <<2>>. He seemed very happy to have it.
Target: I delivered <<1>> to her contact, <<2>>. He seemed very happy to have it.

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I defeated the toughest draugr in Shroud Hearth Barrow.
Target: 장막난로 고분에서 가장 강한 드로거를 처치했어요.

Source: You said you wanted to tell me a secret, Lord Vivec?
Target: 내게 비밀을 말하고 싶다고 하셨죠? 로드 비벡?

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: This is amazing! Our family used to be much more prominent back in my great-grandmother's day. Maybe her sword will turn our fortunes around. Maybe.\n\nAnyway, thank you so much for bringing this to me.
Target:
이거 엄청나 네! 증조 할머니 시대에는 우리 가족이 훨씬 더 눈에 띄었습니다. 어쩌면 그녀의 칼은 우리의 운명을 돌릴 것입니다. 아마도.

어쨌든, 이걸 가져다 주셔서 고마워요.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: QUEST: A Ritual in Camlorn
Target: 퀘스트: 캠론(Camlorn)에서의 의식\n

Source: You may return here as often as you like, and anywhere you see the shrine of the Snake, you may seek Brackenleaf's blessing.\n\nCongratulations, friend.
Target: 넌 언제든지 원할 때에 여기로 돌아올 수 있고, 뱀 화로가 있는 곳이라면 어디에서든지 고사리잎의 축복을 받을 수 있을 것이다.\n\n축하한다, 친구여.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: You may return here as often as you like, and anywhere you see the shrine of the Wolf, you may seek Brackenleaf's blessing.\n\nCongratulations, friend.
Target: 넌 언제든지 원할 때에 여기로 돌아올 수 있고, 늑대 화로가 있는 곳이라면 어디에서든지 고사리잎의 축복을 받을 수 있을 것이다.\n\n축하한다, 친구여.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I hear you wiped out a vampire lair in Glenumbra. We need more people like you 'round here.
Target: 당신이 글렌움브라의 흡혈귀 소굴을 쓸어버렸다고 들었어요. 당신같은 사람이 더 필요해요.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I helped a Morag Tong agent. She had a writ to assassinate the slaver captain.
Target: 전 모락 통의 요원을 도왔습니다. 그녀가 노예상인 선장을 암살하라는 영장을 가지고 있었죠.

Source: I hear you wiped out a vampire lair in Glenumbra, then killed a child just because he was bitten. That's heartless.
Target: 당신이 글렌움브라의 흡혈귀 소굴을 쓸어버리고, 아이가 물렸다고 죽여버린 이야기를 들었어요. 무자비하군요.

Source: Without you, so many more would have died at Dune. Bright moons.
Target: 당신이 없었다면 듄에선 더 많은 사상자가 있었을 겁니다, 신성한 달이여!

Source: I heard about Mathragor. You know what it means to settle a score.
Target: I heard about Mathragor. You know what it means to settle a score.

Source: After all he'd been through, you couldn't let Mathragor get his justice? Figures.
Target: After all he'd been through, you couldn't let Mathragor get his justice? Figures.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I ate the <<z:1>> and defeated the bandit leader.
Target: <<1>>을 먹고 도적 지도자를 처치했어요.

Source: I'll open a portal so you can tell them directly. My servants will defend our home from trespassers, but shall not stray beyond the ruins above.\n\nIf they seek lost knowledge, <<Ac:1>> is a wonderful old ruin. And it isn't here.
Target: 내가 포탈을 열어줄 테니 그들에게 직접 전해 주거라. 내 하인들은 무단 침입자로부터 우리 집을 지키겠지만, 유적 위로는 벗어나지 않겠다고 말이다.\n\n그들이 잊혀진 지식을 찾는다면, <<1>>이 멋지고 오래된 유적이 되어 줄 게다. 여기가 아니라 말이다.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: I don't know. But whatever it is, I'll be far away from here. <<1>> can't hurt me anymore.\n\nHere, I can open a portal so you can be with your friends. Tell them I'm sorry about the shades. As long as they stay away, they should be fine.
Target: 나도 모르겠어. 그래도 어쨌든 여기서 먼 곳으로 갈 거야. <<1>>는 더이상 날 해치지 못 해.\n\n자, 포탈을 열어줄 테니까 네 친구들한테 갈 수 있을 거야. 유령들 문제는 미안하다고 말해 줘. 유령한테서 떨어져 있기만 하면 분명 괜찮을 거야.

Source: <Sign the Manifest.>
Target: <화물 목록에 서명합니다.>

Source: Thank you, for all that you have done. May bright moons light your path … and Mathal's, wherever he may be.
Target: 당신이 해준 모든 일에 감사드립니다. 밝은 달들이 당신의 길을 밝혀 주기를. 마탈의 길도... 그가 어디에 있든지 간에요.

Source: What good would that do?
Target: 그렇게 하면 뭐가 좋은 거죠?

Source: I found these letters.
Target: 이 편지들을 찾았습니다.

Source: That's the thanks I get?
Target: 그게 내가 받는 감사의 전부인가?

Source: You were controlled by one of Vaermina's Omen spirits.
Target: 베르미나의 오멘의 영혼 하나가 당신을 조종하고 있었습니다.

Source: Now Cradlecrush is crawling with giants? Is that better? Really?
Target: Now Cradlecrush is crawling with giants? Is that better? Really?

Source: I can't help but feel that losing our Spinner makes us twice-punished for this crime. Is it the sense of betrayal? Or knowing how hard he will be to replace?\n\nBut we are in your debt. Thank you.
Target: 어쩔 수 없는 일이었지만, 우리 방적공을 잃으니 두 배로 처벌받는 느낌이로군. 배신감 때문일까? 아니면 대체자를 찾기가 얼마나 힘든지 알아서 드는 느낌일까?\n\n그래도 당신에게 빚을 졌구려. 고맙소.

Source: Gathiel was the gem of our village. It's still hard to believe—but who could blame her for wanting a cure to her illness? The Green Pact is a harsh burden, sometimes.\n\nStill, we are grateful to you. You're welcome here anytime.
Target: 가티엘은 우리 마을의 보석이었지. 아직도 믿기가 어렵지만, 병을 치료하길 원했던 그녀를 누가 비난할 수 있겠소? 녹색 조약은 이따금 가혹한 짐이 되곤 한다오.\n\n그래도, 우린 당신에게 감사드리겠소. 언제든지 환영해 드리리다.

Source: No more will be forced to this horrible place. You have helped do a great thing.\n\nNow Tamriel is safe. Safer. Safe-ish? Until others make bad deals with Dremora. Sometimes Mezha-dro weeps for the world.
Target: 이 끔찍한 장소에 강제로 있지 않아도 되겠죠. 커다란 도움을 주셨군요.\n\n이제 탐리엘은 안전합니다. 더 안전해졌죠. 대략 안전한 건가? 다른 자들이 드레모라와 나쁜 거래를 하기 전까진 말이죠. 가끔 메자-드로는 세상을 위해 눈물 흘린답니다.

Source: We were attacked. Savaged by a dark creature … and I think it was a Khajiit. The Mane!
Target: 공격당했어요. 어둠의 생명체한테 무참하게 당했죠... 제 생각엔 카짓이었던 것 같아요. 메인 말이에요!

Source: You are five-clawed, my friend. Milksop no longer, though it will not stop this one from naming you "Milksop."\n\nIt seems none among the captured live. A shame, but Turuk will think of them when he sheathes his sword with the belly of a beast.
Target: You are five-clawed, my friend. Milksop no longer, though it will not stop this one from naming you "Milksop."\n\nIt seems none among the captured live. A shame, but Turuk will think of them when he sheathes his sword with the belly of a beast.

Source: Even those who do not follow the light of the moons sometimes serve it. The agent shrouded in darkness nearby, the Wood Elf Orthoron? He can tell you where you must go.
Target: Even those who do not follow the light of the moons sometimes serve it. The agent shrouded in darkness nearby, the Wood Elf Orthoron? He can tell you where you must go.

Source: Thank you, for all that you have done. May bright moons light your path … and Mathal's, wherever he may be.
Target: 당신이 해준 모든 일에 감사드립니다. 밝은 달들이 당신의 길을 밝혀 주기를. 마탈의 길도... 그가 어디에 있든지 간에요.

Source: I freed <<1>>. He said he would return to <<2>>'s camp.
Target: I freed <<1>>. He said he would return to <<2>>'s camp.

Source: I saved the trapped companions.
Target: 잡힌 companions를 구해주었다.

Source: Who did the Hound think he was to steal the Green Lady's sister, Rajhin himself?
Target: Who did the Hound think he was to steal the Green Lady's sister, Rajhin himself?

Source: I heard you battled the Worm Cult in Rulanyil's Fall. What would they want with an old museum like that?
Target: I heard you battled the Worm Cult in Rulanyil's Fall. What would they want with an old museum like that?

Source: Good. You should know, little one, that you've helped one of the most respected members of our small community.\n\nAnd you have his gratitude. Hmph.
Target: 좋지. 이건 알아둬라, 꼬마야. 넌 방금 우리 작은 공동체에서 가장 존경받는 사람을 도와준 거라고 말이야.\n\n그리고 도와줘서 고마웠다. 흠.

Source: I knew something wasn't right. She had stopped eating. It made her ill. I wish she could have told me what was happening to her. Maybe I could have helped.\n\nRest in peace, Heloise. Rest in peace.
Target: 나는 뭔가 잘못됐다는 걸 알고 있었지. 그녀는 식사를 하지 않았어. 그게 그녀를 아프게 만들었지. 무슨 일이 있었는지 내게 말해줬으면 좋았을 텐데. 그럼 내가 그녀를 도울 수 있었을 거야.\n\n편히 쉬기를, 헬로이즈. 편히 쉬기를.

Source: The battle against the Scaled Court will continue, but this was the one place in Craglorn the Serpent could be contained. You accomplished wonders today.\n\nTuruk wanted me to give this to you. Don't worry—it's not diseased. I think.
Target: The battle against the Scaled Court will continue, but this was the one place in Craglorn the Serpent could be contained. You accomplished wonders today.\n\nTuruk wanted me to give this to you. Don't worry—it's not diseased. I think.

Source: I knew something was wrong. I tried to get her to talk to me. Maybe I could have done something and then she'd still be here.\n\nBut she's alive, right? That's something. When this business with Montclair is over, I'll find her. I'll bring her back.
Target: I knew something was wrong. I tried to get her to talk to me. Maybe I could have done something and then she'd still be here.\n\nBut she's alive, right? That's something. When this business with Montclair is over, I'll find her. I'll bring her back.

Source: Fed them to … but why would …. Those scaleless savages! I swear on the Hist, we'll sun ourselves with vengeance before we depart!\n\nThank you for trying to save them. And for bringing us their badges. Their families will appreciate the gesture.
Target: Fed them to … but why would …. Those scaleless savages! I swear on the Hist, we'll sun ourselves with vengeance before we depart!\n\nThank you for trying to save them. And for bringing us their badges. Their families will appreciate the gesture.

Source: Good! Now get gone. Ezzag has many chores to do, and has already spent too much time jawing with you.
Target: 좋아! 이제 가 봐. 에자그는 해야 할 잡일이 너무 많은데, 너랑 수다떠느라 시간을 너무 많이 보냈어.

Source: Despite what the Bishop told you … it is not here. Not yet, anyway. This one's fellow priest, Zaddo. He will get you moving again.
Target: Despite what the Bishop told you … it is not here. Not yet, anyway. This one's fellow priest, Zaddo. He will get you moving again.

Source: The little goat honors the stones with Agganor's blood! I will see the Scaled Court destroyed as well, this Lashburr swears.\n\nLittle goat, it has my thanks. Steel for its enemies, blood for its tribe.
Target: The little goat honors the stones with Agganor's blood! I will see the Scaled Court destroyed as well, this Lashburr swears.\n\nLittle goat, it has my thanks. Steel for its enemies, blood for its tribe.

Source: The thought sickens me, but they might be needed. Cultists have been sighted at Carzog's Demise. I will deliver the horn to Chief Tazgol and he can decide to use it or not.
Target: The thought sickens me, but they might be needed. Cultists have been sighted at Carzog's Demise. I will deliver the horn to Chief Tazgol and he can decide to use it or not.

Source: Good. You should know, little one, that you've helped one of the most respected members of our small community.\n\nAnd you have his gratitude. Hmph.
Target: 좋지. 이건 알아둬라, 꼬마야. 넌 방금 우리 작은 공동체에서 가장 존경받는 사람을 도와준 거라고 말이야.\n\n그리고 도와줘서 고마웠다. 흠.

Source: Thank you, for all that you have done. May bright moons light your path … and Mathal's, wherever he may be.
Target: 당신이 해준 모든 일에 감사드립니다. 밝은 달들이 당신의 길을 밝혀 주기를. 마탈의 길도... 그가 어디에 있든지 간에요.

Source: Thank you, for all that you have done. May bright moons light your path … as they have not done for my family.
Target: 당신이 해준 모든 일에 감사드립니다. 밝은 달들이 당신의 길을 비춰 주기를... 내 가족에게는 비춰주지 않았지만...

Source: They say Aera Earth-Turner was working with the Worm Cult.
Target: They say Aera Earth-Turner was working with the Worm Cult.

Source: Blaise from the Mage's Guild told me that you're one to be trusted.
Target: Blaise from the Mage's Guild told me that you're one to be trusted.

Source: So am I worthy of a reward?
Target: So am I worthy of a reward?

Source: Indeed. Tamriel is fortunate that my people decided to handle the crisis. And we are fortunate to have you.\n\nIf we had allowed it, the Maormer would have devastated the Malabal Tor mainland with their storms.
Target: Indeed. Tamriel is fortunate that my people decided to handle the crisis. And we are fortunate to have you.\n\nIf we had allowed it, the Maormer would have devastated the Malabal Tor mainland with their storms.

Source: So am I worthy of a reward?
Target: So am I worthy of a reward?

Source: Truly? Rid-Thar-ri'Datta himself? This one is humbled by his faith in Azahrr. She will do her best to make him proud. \n\nThe Order of the Claw will protect their most sacred relic, and the March will one day be cleansed of these shadows.
Target: 정말로요? 리드-타-리다타 님이요? 그분께서 아자르를 믿어주시다니, 이 몸이 겸손해지는군요. 최선을 다해서 그분을 자랑스럽게 만들어 드리겠어요.\n\n발톱 교단은 가장 신성한 유물을 지킬 것이고, 마치는 언젠가 저 그림자를 완전히 몰아낼 거에요.

Source: <You light the candle to memorialize Ehtayah's brother, Indal.>
Target: <에타야의 동생 인달을 기념하기 위한 촛불을 밝힙니다.>

Source: Well, that's a start. Goblins are like ants—you think they're all dead, then more show up. Another Goblin will declare itself chieftain soon. I hope someone is here to help when it happens.
Target: 음, 출발이 좋군. 고블린은 개미와도 같아. 전부 죽은 것 같아도 더 많이 나타나거든. 곧 있으면 또 다른 고블린이 자기가 족장이라고 선언할거야. 그렇게 됐을 때 여기 있는 누군가가 도와준다면 좋을텐데.

Source: I heard cultists took over Eagle's Brook. We should double our security here.
Target: I heard cultists took over Eagle's Brook. We should double our security here.

Source: He got to the destination.
Target: He got to the destination.

Source: Will you be taking over for <<1>>?
Target: 당신이 <<1>>의 자리를 이어받을 건가요?

Source: You helped save Eagle's Brook? I thought you'd be taller.
Target: You helped save Eagle's Brook? I thought you'd be taller.

Source: <<1>> and <<2>> are safe now.
Target: <<1>>과 <<2>>은 이제 안전합니다.

Source: So you'll release Raston?
Target: 그러면 라스턴을 풀어 줄 겁니까?

Source: Why did you send me to stop the necromancers if there wasn't a real Ayleid warlord?
Target: Why did you send me to stop the necromancers if there wasn't a real Ayleid warlord?

Source: The Worm Cult can't enslave you again?
Target: 벌레 교단이 너희를 다시 노예로 만들 수는 없는 건가?

Source: Dulini sent me to retrieve these.
Target: 둘리니가 이걸 회수해달라고 하더군요.

Source: Thank you. I think we've contained the Dro-m'Athra.
Target: 고마워요. 드로 마스라는 이제 억제된 것 같네요.

Source: You're Khali, right? <<1>> sent me.
Target: 당신이 칼리 맞죠? <<1>>가 보내서 왔어요.

Source: Here are the ceremonial gems you wanted.
Target: Here are the ceremonial gems you wanted.

Source: Someone called the Hound. But he won't be troubling you any longer.
Target: 사냥개라고 불리는 사람이더군요. 하지만 이제 더는 문제를 일으키지 않을 겁니다.

Source: I suspected Baron Sorick from the start. Don't worry—he'll pay for his crimes. I'll take it from here.
Target: 나는 소릭 남작이 배후일 거라고 의심했지. 걱정 말게ㅡ그는 범죄를 저지른 대가를 치를 거야. 여기서부턴 내가 알아서 처리하지.

Source: My scout? <<1>>! Then <<2>> may still be alive! She'd be camped at our fallback position.\n\nI must go to them. Thank you for all you've done! I'd be dead if you hadn't come!
Target: 내 정찰병? <<1>>! 그렇다면 <<2>>도 아직 살아있을 수 있겠군! 우리 후방 진지에 야영지를 설치해 뒀겠지.\n\n부하들한테 가봐야겠소. 여기서 해준 일에 전부 감사드리오! 당신이 오지 않았다면 난 죽었을 거요!

Source: Forgive me. Bringing you into my mind seems to have taken quite a toll on me. I must rest. \n\nI will contact you when the time is right. Until then, walk in the light Vestige.
Target: 미안하네. 자네를 내 정신 속으로 끌어들였던 것이 내게 꽤나 많은 피로를 유발한 것 같네. 난 좀 쉬어야겠네.\n\n때가 되면 다시 보기로 하지. 그때까지 빛 속을 걷게나, 잔존자여.

Source: You found it! I thought my <<z:1>> was lost forever. Thank you!
Target: You found it! I thought my <<z:1>> was lost forever. Thank you!

Source: When the Planemeld has been thwarted and the dust has settled, the Five Companions shall gather one last time to face our destinies.\n\nThe God of Schemes must be stopped, Vestige. That is the only thing that matters now.
Target: 차원융합이 좌절되고 먼지가 가라앉을 때, 다섯 동료들이 마지막으로 모여 우리의 운명을 마주할 것일세.\n\n음모의 신을 반드시 막아야 하네, 잔존자여. 지금은 그것이 유일한 문제야.

Source: Not much chance of that. It goes out anytime there's even a stray breeze. But as long as someone's willing to re-light it, we're happy. As I said, we're a superstitious lot.
Target: 그럴 확률은 별로 없을걸. 가끔 부는 산들바람에도 언제든지 꺼져버릴 수 있으니까. 그래도 누군가가 불꽃을 다시 붙여주는 한, 우리는 행복할거야. 전에도 말했지만, 우린 미신적인 사람들이니까.

Source: Rough luck. Thanks so much for bringing news. It's better than spending the rest of my life wondering.
Target: 운이 없었군요. 알려주셔서 정말 감사드려요. 왜 안오나 궁금해 하며 여생을 보내는 것 보단 나으니까요.

Source: Have you spoken to the Wood Orcs yet?
Target: Have you spoken to the Wood Orcs yet?

Source: General Noramil sent me.
Target: 노라밀 장군이 나를 보냈습니다.

Source: I collected these notes from the Stormfist scouts.
Target: I collected these notes from the Stormfist scouts.

Source: And my reward?
Target: 그리고 내 보상은?

Source: <<1>> is dead. [Lie]
Target: <<1>>은(는) 죽었습니다. [거짓말]

Source: Let me get this straight. The King was poisoned and an Argonian saved him by entering his dreams? That's a little far-fetched.
Target: Let me get this straight. The King was poisoned and an Argonian saved him by entering his dreams? That's a little far-fetched.

Source: Have you spoken to the Wood Orcs yet?
Target: 우드 오크들과는 말을 해 보셨습니까?

Source: I hear the Silvenar ate his advisor's heart. Bosmer memorial rituals are nasty business.
Target: 실베나가 자기 대사의 심장을 먹었다고 하던데. 보스머의 추도식은 끔찍하다니까.

Source: Not bad. Not bad at all, to kill a rare specimen such as that. You'd make a fine member of the Hounds someday. They're a company of trophy hunters. I've been with them for years now and I've never seen anyone as quick a study as you.
Target: 나쁘지 않네요. 나쁘지 않아요. 그런 희귀한 녀석을 죽이다니, 당신 언젠가는 훌륭한 사냥개가 되겠는데요. 뛰어난 사냥꾼들의 모임 말이에요. 내가 사냥개와 함께한지 몇 년이 됐는데, 당신만큼 빠르게 배우는 사람을 본 적이 없어요.

Source: That's a relief. I couldn't have lived with myself if it had killed you. You'd make a pretty good Hound, you know. Thanks!
Target: 다행이로군. 당신이 죽었으면 내 자신을 용서하지 못했을 거요. 당신 꽤 훌륭한 사냥개가 될 수 있겠는데. 고맙소!

Source: Fantastic! Well done! Of course, I can't exactly take credit for the kill. But I think I understand tracking better now that I've seen you do it. You're a natural!
Target: 환상적! 잘 했어! 물론, 나는 그 죽이기에 대해 정확하게 믿을 수는 없다. 그러나 나는 당신이 그것을하는 것을 보았을 때 나는 더 나은 추적을 이해한다고 생각합니다. 너는 자연 스럽다!\n

Source: Ha! I knew you'd get it done. Who needs the old crew—those traitors!—when we've got you helping us?
Target: 하! 네가 해낼 줄 알았어. 이전 선원들—배신자들!—은 쓸모없는 놈들 뿐 이었는데.

Source: I'm glad you see things my way. When I think about all the suffering caused by this man and his children ….\n\nNever again. The Pellingare line ends today.
Target: 자네가 나와 같이 생각해서 기쁘군. 이 남자와 그의 자식들에 의해 야기된 모든 고통을 생각하면…\n\n다시는 그런 일이 있으면 안돼. 펠링게어의 대는 오늘로 끝난다.

Source: Good. We should begin while things are busy for neither of us.
Target: Good. We should begin while things are busy for neither of us.

Source: Excellent! We can get started whenever you're ready.
Target: 좋아요! 언제든지 당신이 준비되면 우린 시작할 수 있어요.

Source: This is a magnificent blade! I can feel its energy. It calls to me, just as the Warrior once did.\n\nIt feels right. As though I was meant to have it. Well then, in friendship, I hope you will accept my old blade. Something to remember me by.
Target: This is a magnificent blade! I can feel its energy. It calls to me, just as the Warrior once did.\n\nIt feels right. As though I was meant to have it. Well then, in friendship, I hope you will accept my old blade. Something to remember me by.

Source: Ah, Cloudy Dregs. Coziest hearth in Stormhaven. Does the pretty blonde crooner still sing there? Can't remember her name, but I'll never forget her voice. She had a lovely scream.\n\nGot your gold right here.
Target: Ah, Cloudy Dregs. Coziest hearth in Stormhaven. Does the pretty blonde crooner still sing there? Can't remember her name, but I'll never forget her voice. She had a lovely scream.\n\nGot your gold right here.

Source: Cassi sent you? Well, why didn't you say so? I'm so lucky that the regent looks out for me!\n\nAll right. We've got a lot of work to do. Have you ever tried to change an Iron Orc's mind? Oh, this is going to be so much fun!
Target: Cassi sent you? Well, why didn't you say so? I'm so lucky that the regent looks out for me!\n\nAll right. We've got a lot of work to do. Have you ever tried to change an Iron Orc's mind? Oh, this is going to be so much fun!

Source: I'm sure no one will notice a little more gloom at the Dusklight Inn. If I lived out there, I'd be in a drunken stupor every waking hour to forget that fact.\n\nHope the pay was worth the bother.
Target: I'm sure no one will notice a little more gloom at the Dusklight Inn. If I lived out there, I'd be in a drunken stupor every waking hour to forget that fact.\n\nHope the pay was worth the bother.

Source: Though I was able to save Moon Hunter Keep, I was not able to find the ingredients necessary to cure Adonatus. Though he must remain a werewolf, he still wishes to reward me for my actions. I should speak to him.
Target: 문 헌터 요새를 구했지만, 아도나투스의 늑대인간화를 치료하기 위한 재료를 모으지 못 했다. 그는 늑대인간으로 살아야 하지만, 그는 내 행동에 대한 보답으로 보상을 주고 싶어한다. 그와 이야기 해야 한다.

Source: You? You're one of our bravest, our boldest! We reward our own. Take your key. Enjoy your well-deserved cut. And remember to come see me again tomorrow!
Target: You? You're one of our bravest, our boldest! We reward our own. Take your key. Enjoy your well-deserved cut. And remember to come see me again tomorrow!

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 하실 건가요?

Source: Hah! Of course! We reward our own. Take your key. Enjoy your well-deserved cut. And remember to come see me again tomorrow!
Target: Hah! Of course! We reward our own. Take your key. Enjoy your well-deserved cut. And remember to come see me again tomorrow!

Source: Oldgate has all the charm of a jailhouse door clanging shut behind you. Last threshold on the path to a new and dismal life. You did someone a mercy out there.\n\nHere, your thanks for a life cut short.
Target: Oldgate has all the charm of a jailhouse door clanging shut behind you. Last threshold on the path to a new and dismal life. You did someone a mercy out there.\n\nHere, your thanks for a life cut short.

Source: Why would Z'en kill his own follower?
Target: 왜 젠'이 자신의 추종자를 죽인거죠?

Source: Dulini sent me to retrieve these.
Target: 둘리니가 이걸 회수해달라고 하더군요.

Source: Captain Kaleen needs help with a big heist she's planning. Interested?
Target: 칼린 선장이, 크게 한탕 하려는 계획을 짜고있어. 이 계획을 도와줄 사람이 필요한데, 관심있어?

Source: How about a trip off this island?
Target: 이 섬을 떠나는 여행은 어떨까?

Source: Help Captain Kaleen and I pull off her heist.
Target: 칼린 선장이 저지르려는 도둑질에 도움이 필요해. 도와줄수있어?

Source: How about a trip off this island?
Target: 이 섬에서 떠나는 여행은 어떨까?

Source: At last the troublemaker, Fildgor, is dead. The Pact can move forward and I can return home.
Target: At last the troublemaker, Fildgor, is dead. The Pact can move forward and I can return home.

Source: What's going on?
Target: 무슨 일이지?

Source: Good! Now get gone. Ezzag has many chores to do, and has already spent too much time jawing with you.
Target: 좋아! 이제 가 봐. 에자그는 해야 할 잡일이 너무 많은데, 너랑 수다떠느라 시간을 너무 많이 보냈어.

Source: I knew that Goblin-spawn would put a dagger in our backs. Siraj never could pass up a pretty face.\n\nThis bracelet was given to my ancestors by King Fahel. Siraj always wore it. Take this in thanks. Ruptga guide you.
Target: 언젠가는 그 고블린이 우리를 노릴 줄 알고 있었어. Siraj는 예쁜얼굴을 그냥 지나치는 법이 없었지.\n\n이 팔찌는 Fahel왕이 우리 선조들에게 하사했던 물건이야. Siraj는 항상 이걸 지니고 있었지. 고마워, 그리고 이걸 받아.  Ruptga가 널 인도할 거야.

Source: You're the hero who defeated Sadal at tormented spire. My respect.
Target: You're the hero who defeated Sadal at tormented spire. My respect.

Source: You'd think Wayrest was the center of the universe with the way its citizens carry on. I recall having a conversation with one of the locals. He made a very persuasive point. Then I stuck my dagger in his eye.\n\nSave this for your next visit.
Target: You'd think Wayrest was the center of the universe with the way its citizens carry on. I recall having a conversation with one of the locals. He made a very persuasive point. Then I stuck my dagger in his eye.\n\nSave this for your next visit.

Source: You destroyed the creature? And even took its head for a trophy, I see. Huh, impressive. \n\nThank you for avenging my companions. I'll take the head if you don't mind. I should prepare a meal and say a prayer for my fallen friends.
Target: You destroyed the creature? And even took its head for a trophy, I see. Huh, impressive. \n\nThank you for avenging my companions. I'll take the head if you don't mind. I should prepare a meal and say a prayer for my fallen friends.

Source: By Kyne, that's the Goblin king's crown! Bastards killed my brothers and were going to attack the town. With that king dead, they're probably killing and eating each other by now.
Target: By Kyne, that's the Goblin king's crown! Bastards killed my brothers and were going to attack the town. With that king dead, they're probably killing and eating each other by now.

Source: I find it telling that the Wayrest Castle balconies overlook the treasury instead of the sunset, which is beautiful by the way. Gold will be the death of that dynasty.\n\nSpeaking of gold, good work.
Target: I find it telling that the Wayrest Castle balconies overlook the treasury instead of the sunset, which is beautiful by the way. Gold will be the death of that dynasty.\n\nSpeaking of gold, good work.

Source: Little Leaf sent you? Then I assume all is well with my dearest companion?\n\nSince you did as my Little Leaf asked, I can only hope you shall grant me the same courtesy.
Target: Little Leaf sent you? Then I assume all is well with my dearest companion?\n\nSince you did as my Little Leaf asked, I can only hope you shall grant me the same courtesy.

Source: Oh, I love Alcaire Castle. Did you see the waterfall? Bubbles up from an underground river. Best place in the entire region to make a body disappear.\n\nHere you go. For your savings.
Target: Oh, I love Alcaire Castle. Did you see the waterfall? Bubbles up from an underground river. Best place in the entire region to make a body disappear.\n\nHere you go. For your savings.

Source: Koeglin Village is a bit of a hidden jewel. Best fresh crustaceans you'll ever taste, sold right in their markets. I weep for the day the traders in Wayrest catch on.\n\nAnyway, your pay.
Target: Koeglin Village is a bit of a hidden jewel. Best fresh crustaceans you'll ever taste, sold right in their markets. I weep for the day the traders in Wayrest catch on.\n\nAnyway, your pay.

Source: Thank you, for all that you have done. May bright moons light your path … as they have not done for my family.
Target: 당신이 해준 모든 일에 감사드립니다. 밝은 달들이 당신의 길을 비춰 주기를... 내 가족에게는 비춰주지 않았지만...

Source: Shornhelm, right? What a sorry sight that place is since King Ranser's War. The cook in the Dead Wolf Inn might be that place's one saving grace. Sithis knows why she's still there.\n\nHere's your due for the trouble.
Target: 숀헬름인가? 랜서 왕의 전쟁 이후 참담한 곳이지. 그곳의 유일한 축복은 죽은 늑대 여관의 요리사일지도 몰라. 그녀가 아직 그곳에 남아 있는 이유는 시디스만 알고 있겠지.\n\n자, 품삯이다.

Source: That'll keep us safe for another day, I hope. Luckily, there's no shortage of adventurers willing to help us out. Here's the coin I promised.\n\nIs that a bit of skull on your boot?
Target: 그게 우리를 하루 정도 더 안전하게 지켜준다면 좋겠군. 다행히도 우리를 도와주려 하는 모험가들은 부족하지 않아. 여기 약속했던 보수야.\n\n그 신발에 붙은건 해골 조각이야?

Source: What did you think of the Sisters of the Sands? I don't think anyone can appreciate the feel of cold stone until they've baked in the Alik'r sun. I left three brothers tied up and baking in the sun once. Good times!\n\nYour gold.
Target: What did you think of the Sisters of the Sands? I don't think anyone can appreciate the feel of cold stone until they've baked in the Alik'r sun. I left three brothers tied up and baking in the sun once. Good times!\n\nYour gold.

Source: Your key and your cut await, my friend. Come back tomorrow, and we'll see if we can't send you into a Daedra-less ruin. Just this once.
Target: 키와 보상금을 받으세요. 내일도 오시면, 데이드라가 없는 유적으로 보내드릴 수 있는지 알아보도록 하죠. 이번처럼 말이에요.

Source: Did you try the candied scorpions in Bergama? They have a delightful bite to them. Especially if you neglect to clip the stinger first. I know a confectioner who is happy to overlook that detail for the right price.\n\nPayment's the same, in any case.
Target: Did you try the candied scorpions in Bergama? They have a delightful bite to them. Especially if you neglect to clip the stinger first. I know a confectioner who is happy to overlook that detail for the right price.\n\nPayment's the same, in any case.

Source: Captain Kaleen sent me. She'd like you to help with a big heist she's planning.
Target: 칼린 선장이 나를 보냈어. 크게 한탕하려고 하는데, 네가 계획이 성공 할 수 있도록 우리를 도와줬으면 해.

Source: Take your key and your cut, my friend. Only the Undaunted can truly appreciate all you do. Return tomorrow. We will admire your prowess and skill once again.
Target: Take your key and your cut, my friend. Only the Undaunted can truly appreciate all you do. Return tomorrow. We will admire your prowess and skill once again.

Source: If you need proof of a Redguard's tenacity, just look at Castle Sentinel. Can you imagine forging a thing of that scale and beauty in such a wasteland? Always give a Redguard a few extra strikes before calling the job done.\n\nSpeaking of, good work.
Target: If you need proof of a Redguard's tenacity, just look at Castle Sentinel. Can you imagine forging a thing of that scale and beauty in such a wasteland? Always give a Redguard a few extra strikes before calling the job done.\n\nSpeaking of, good work.

Source: We reward our bravest delvers, we sing their names in taverns! Take your key and enjoy your well-deserved cut. And remember to come see me again tomorrow!
Target: 우리는 우리중 가장 용감한 사람에게 보상을 주며, 여관에서 그의 이름을 노래로 부릅니다. 열쇠를 가져가 즐기면서 당신의 응당한 보상을 가져가세요. 그리고 내일 또 오는걸 잊지 마세요!

Source: I do love a contract that gets to the point. Why so many feel the need to justify their reasons to us, I'll never know. I suspect it's more to convince themselves, but I've never had the opportunity to ask.\n\nHere's your pay for the contract.
Target: I do love a contract that gets to the point. Why so many feel the need to justify their reasons to us, I'll never know. I suspect it's more to convince themselves, but I've never had the opportunity to ask.\n\nHere's your pay for the contract.

Source: You'll need it, just to get the juices off your gear! Take your key. Enjoy your cut, and remember to come see me again tomorrow!
Target: You'll need it, just to get the juices off your gear! Take your key. Enjoy your cut, and remember to come see me again tomorrow!

Source: A trip to the Fighters Guild? Exciting work. I do so enjoy sending those sell-swords to the Void. You'd think they'd be harder to kill, but they bleed as red as any other target. Maybe a bit redder.\n\nHere's your gold.
Target: A trip to the Fighters Guild? Exciting work. I do so enjoy sending those sell-swords to the Void. You'd think they'd be harder to kill, but they bleed as red as any other target. Maybe a bit redder.\n\nHere's your gold.

Source: How did you do that?
Target: 방금 어떻게 한 거지?

Source: <Place the sword and shield beside Lothgar's body.>
Target: <로스가르의 몸 옆에 검과 방패를 놓는다.>

Source: Captain Kaleen sent me. She needs your help with a heist.
Target: 칼린 선장이 나를 보냈어. 그녀의 계획에 너의 도움이 필요하다더군.

Source: The Nords can be valuable allies. That is, when they're not fighting among themselves.
Target: The Nords can be valuable allies. That is, when they're not fighting among themselves.

Source: Wyress Delphique suggested I come here.
Target: 위어리스 Delphique가 여기로 가보라고 했소.

Source: I never thought I'd enjoy a stage magician before I went to Sarandel's Carnival.
Target: 사란델의 축제에 오기 전까진 내가 무대 마법사를 좋아하게 될 줄은 꿈에도 몰랐어.

Source: Lob the Cleaver is dead.
Target: Lob the Cleaver is dead.

Source: You're in. I've got some preparations to make, and then we're as good as gone.
Target: You're in. I've got some preparations to make, and then we're as good as gone.

Source: Take your key! And use your cut at a tavern tonight! You deserve a warm fire, a dark drink, and some friendly companionship. Hah!
Target: 키를 받아요! 오늘 밤 선술집에서 보상금을 쓰세요! 따뜻한 불길과, 음료, 친절한 친구와 함께 보낼 자격이 있죠. 하!

Source: Thank you. We'll sell this food at markets in Alessia and Drakelowe. Here's the pay Shagol would have received, if he wasn't so lazy.\n\nHow did you like the village? Nice, huh? Think of us when it comes time to settle down.
Target: 고마워. 이 음식은 알레시아랑 드레이크로우에 있는 시장에서 팔 거야. 여기 샤골이 게으르지 않았다면 받았을 보수를 주도록 하지.\n\n마을을 둘러보니 좀 어땠어? 멋지지 않아? 정착할 때가 되면 우릴 생각해 달라고.

Source: You stood your ground, Undaunted. For refusing to budge in the face of Vila Theran's dark magic, you have my esteem. Take your key and your cut. Tomorrow I'll give you another opportunity to impress me!
Target: 잘 버텨냈어, 언던티드. 빌라 데란의 흑마법에 꿈쩍도 하지 않은 점이 존경스러워. 여기 열쇠와 보상금을 받아. 내일도 나를 감명시킬만한 기회를 주도록 하지!

Source: Of course! I'll get you certified right away so you can fulfill blacksmith crafting writs immediately.
Target: 물론이죠! 당신을 곧바로 인증해 드릴게요. 이제 당신은 곧바로 대장장이 제작 의뢰를 수행할 수 있어요.

Source: Of course not. Silly of me to think you'd lift a finger to do anything at all!\n\nWell, you've done your good deed for the day. I need to attend to my brother. Excuse me.
Target: 물론 그러셨겠지. 당신이 손가락이라도 까딱할 줄 알았던 내가 바보같군!\n\n뭐, 오늘 할 선행은 다 하신 것 같은데. 난 형을 돌봐줘야 해서. 이만 실례하지.

Source: Truly the gods sent you here to save us from the Withered Hand...thank you!
Target: 진실로 신들께서 메마른 손으로부터 우리를 구하기 위해 당신을 보내셨군요... 감사합니다!

Source: Raynor is right. You almost died in here.
Target: Raynor is right. You almost died in here.

Source: Divines protect you, just as you protected our honored Keepers.
Target: Divines protect you, just as you protected our honored Keepers.

Source: Donel gave up on his inheritance. I'm going to keep it.
Target: Donel gave up on his inheritance. I'm going to keep it.

Source: You mentioned I would receive power for helping you.
Target: You mentioned I would receive power for helping you.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: What will you do now?

Source: Kireth is right. You don't need anyone's approval.
Target: Kireth is right. You don't need anyone's approval.

Source: Farragut Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin
Target: Farragut Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin

Source: All who helped conquer Arrius Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin
Target: All who helped conquer Arrius Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin

Source: The lumbermill at Kingscrest Keep now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba
Target: The lumbermill at Kingscrest Keep now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba

Source: The lumbermill at Fort Dragonclaw now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba
Target: The lumbermill at Fort Dragonclaw now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba

Source: Chalman Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin
Target: Chalman Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin

Source: Ash Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin
Target: Ash Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin

Source: All who helped conquer Aleswell Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin
Target: All who helped conquer Aleswell Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin

Source: All who helped conquer Rayles Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin
Target: All who helped conquer Rayles Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin

Source: The lumbermill at Glademist now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba
Target: The lumbermill at Glademist now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba

Source: Now I guess I'll see about restoring my family's fortune. Eventually this unnatural Pact will fall apart and we can return to farming the old-fashioned way. Please, take this in gratitude for your help.
Target: 이제는 가족의 재산을 회복하는 방법에 대해 알아 볼 것입니다.결국엔 이 불공정한 협정은 사라질 것이고 우리는 전통적인 방식의 농사를 지을 수 있을 것입니다.

Source: Warden Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin
Target: Warden Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin

Source: Your brother sent me to find you.
Target: Your brother sent me to find you.
