Source: Don't make me regret my decision.
Target: Don't make me regret my decision.

Source: I guess I'll just console myself with her gold and the taste of victory.\n\nAhem. "Beddi, I recognize that you've lost. I release you from our contract."
Target: I guess I'll just console myself with her gold and the taste of victory.\n\nAhem. "Beddi, I recognize that you've lost. I release you from our contract."

Source: Oh, look. There he is now. Poor, bedraggled darling. \n\nThank you for helping him. I really will feel better once I get him safely to my mother's house. I just adore him so. I'd hate for anything to happen to him.
Target: Oh, look. There he is now. Poor, bedraggled darling. \n\nThank you for helping him. I really will feel better once I get him safely to my mother's house. I just adore him so. I'd hate for anything to happen to him.

Source: Red Rooks under Ilessan Tower? These bandits continue poking their noses where they don't belong.\n\nThanks for letting us know. It provides context to this attack and now we can watch for any reinforcements from the tower.
Target: Red Rooks under Ilessan Tower? These bandits continue poking their noses where they don't belong.\n\nThanks for letting us know. It provides context to this attack and now we can watch for any reinforcements from the tower.

Source: That's a relief, though I wished I'd killed it myself. I really wanted to stab it over and over again.\n\nMaybe I'll go jab the body a few times, just to be sure.
Target: 그거 안심이네요. 내가 직접 죽여버리고 싶었지만요. 그놈을 계속해서 칼로 찔러주고 싶었거든요.\n\n어쩌면 시체를 몇 번 찔러주러 갈지도 모르겠어요. 일은 확실히 해야죠.

Source: Thank you. It seems silly to worry about books at such times, but I would hate to see Goblins destroy our heritage. If those books were lost and Goblins overran us, no one would know we were ever here!
Target: 고마워. 이런 시기에 책 걱정을 하는게 바보같아 보일지도 모르지만, 고블린들이 우리의 유산을 파괴하는 모습을 볼 순 없어. 그 책들이 사라지고 고블린이 우릴 몰아낸다면, 우리가 여기 있었다는걸 누구도 모를 거라고!

Source: Take it, then! And remember Maj tomorrow when you find yourself wondering what to do. Another day, another pledge.
Target: Take it, then! And remember Maj tomorrow when you find yourself wondering what to do. Another day, another pledge.

Source: Slayer of spiders, smiter of spinner-spawn! Your name will be uttered in fear by all servants of Mephala if you keep this up!\n\nTake your key and your cut, and get yourself to a tavern. Who knows what tomorrow will bring?
Target: Slayer of spiders, smiter of spinner-spawn! Your name will be uttered in fear by all servants of Mephala if you keep this up!\n\nTake your key and your cut, and get yourself to a tavern. Who knows what tomorrow will bring?

Source: Did you hear about the attempt on the King's life? Someone saved him!
Target: 왕의 목숨을 노린 시도에 대한 걸 들으셨나요? 누군가 그를 구했대요!

Source: That's one less valuable for the bandits to profit from. I'll keep sending adventurers out there until there's nothing left to steal back.\n\nThank you for your efforts.
Target: 도적놈들이 수익을 얻기에는 가치가 떨어지는 물건이네. 다시 훔쳐올 물건이 하나도 남지 않을 때까지 계속 모험가들을 보내야겠어.\n\n노력해줘서 고마워.

Source: Bloodthorn Cultists were sighted at those ruins. Chieftain Tazgol has already taken the army to deal with them. They're walking into a trap!
Target: 핏빛 가시단이 그 유적지에서 발견됐어. 족장 타즈골이 그들을 상대하기 위해 이미 군대를 모집했어. 그들은 함정으로 걸어가고 있어!

Source: He's what? No! Let me see that! I told him not to join those fools! Why didn't he listen?\n\nHe figured out the truth for himself, in the end. I can be proud of my boy. That's not enough, but it'll have to do.
Target: 그 애가 뭐라고요? 안 돼! 이리 줘요! 그 멍청이들과 어울리지 말라고 했는데! 왜 말을 듣지 않았을까요?\n\n그 애가 결국엔 진실을 알아냈군요. 내 아들을 자랑스러워 할 수 있겠어요. 그걸론 충분하지 않지만, 반드시 해야 할 일이죠.

Source: Thank you, stranger. \n\nWith this dark act behind us, we can get on with our lives. No Elves will own me or my family again.
Target: Thank you, stranger. \n\nWith this dark act behind us, we can get on with our lives. No Elves will own me or my family again.

Source: Cultists have indeed been spotted at Carzog's Demise. Their intent is unknown.\n\nI will pray for the honored dead then return to speak with the chief. I fear all will be needed to end the Bloodthorn plot.
Target: 카조그의 종말에서 숭배자들이 목격되었어. 그들의 의도는 모르겠지만.\n\n나는 명예로운 영혼들을 위해 기도하고 나서 다시 돌아와 족장과 이야기를 나눌거야. 핏빛가시단의 음모를 끝내기 위해 필요 한 모든 것들 마저 두렵군.

Source: Here, take them.
Target: 받아.

Source: You're safe now.
Target: 이제 당신은 안전합니다.

Source: Excellent. I doubt we'll ever eliminate that tribe, but with luck we can keep them from an all-out attack.\n\nTake this with our gratitude.
Target: 훌륭하구만. 우리가 그 부족을 완전히 없애버리진 못하겠지만, 운이 좋다면 놈들이 총공격을 하지 못하게 막아낼 수는 있을거야.\n\n감사의 표시로 이걸 받아줘.

Source: And this is for you—shrouded armor, the uniform of the Dark Brotherhood. You're one of the family now. You might as well look the part.\n\nPerform well and you'll rise in the ranks of the Brotherhood. I'm sure you'll make us all proud.
Target: 그리고 이건 네 몫이다—다크 브라더 후드의 제복인 가려진 갑옷이지. 이제 넌 가족의 일원이다. 알맞은 옷을 입는 게 좋을 거야.\n\n성과가 좋으면 브라더후드에서 계급이 상승할 거야. 네가 우리 모두를 자랑스럽게 해 줄 거라고 확신하지.

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: A strange vine? Unusually thick and covered in thorns? In the city? Son of a troll!\n\nI've seen such vines to the north. They're connected to the Bloodthorn cult. A clear indication that the cult is corrupting the land.
Target: 이상한 덩굴이라고? 특이할 정도로 두껍고 가시가 덮혀 있는 것 말인가? 이 도시에서?  트롤의 자식 같으니라고!\n\n난 그런 덩굴을 북쪽에서 봤었어. 핏빛가시단과 관련있는 것이지. 그 녀석들이 땅을 더럽히고 있다는 명백한 징후가 틀림없어.

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: Whatever it is, we'll be ready for it. For now though, I owe you a debt as well. Without your help, the Dragonguard would never have been reborn. We succeeded beyond my expectations. Take this. And know that there will always be a place for you here.
Target: Whatever it is, we'll be ready for it. For now though, I owe you a debt as well. Without your help, the Dragonguard would never have been reborn. We succeeded beyond my expectations. Take this. And know that there will always be a place for you here.

Source: I hope you're right. But why do the Akatosh priests seem to be moving against us? First the Sermonizers, now this. Are they trying to take advantage of our recent setbacks or is there something more going on here?\n\nAt least Hildegard is safe now.
Target: I hope you're right. But why do the Akatosh priests seem to be moving against us? First the Sermonizers, now this. Are they trying to take advantage of our recent setbacks or is there something more going on here?\n\nAt least Hildegard is safe now.

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: There are few more deserving to walk the Sands Behind the Stars. Though you might count among them.\n\nTake this, with all our gratitude. This one hopes we cross paths in happier times.
Target: There are few more deserving to walk the Sands Behind the Stars. Though you might count among them.\n\nTake this, with all our gratitude. This one hopes we cross paths in happier times.

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: <He notes your work and tenders payment.>
Target: <그가 당신의 일을 기록하고 보수를 지급한다.>

Source: Am I cured?
Target: 내가 치유된 겁니까?

Source: You were the one who saved Camp Tamrith and killed Reezal-Jul? I hope his end was long and painful.
Target: 너 Tamrith 캠프를 구했고 Reezal-Jul을 죽인 사람 이니? 나는 그의 끝이 길고 고통 스러웠기를 바랍니다.\n

Source: <<1>> said you'd pay me on delivery.
Target: <<1>>는 당신이 배달 보수를 줄 거라고 하던데요.

Source: So it's over?
Target: 그래서 이제 끝난 거야?

Source: I removed a Stonechewer tribal totem from Cumberland's Watch.
Target: 나는 컴벌랜드 전망대에서 Stonechewer 부족의 토템 을 제거했다.\n

Source: A werewolf killed those beggars? You're certain? Damn. I shouldn't have ignored Matthew when he came to me. \n\nTake this as a reward, but say nothing. People are nervous enough as it is. I promise not to dismiss the concerns of the poor again.
Target: 늑대 인간이 그 거지들을 죽였다고? 확실한가요? 젠장. 매튜가 나에게 왔을 때 그를 무시하는 게 아니었는데.\n\n이걸 보상으로 받으시오. 하지만 아무 말도 하지 마시오. 지금 실정으로도 사람들은 충분히 불안해하오. 다시는 빈민들의 걱정을 묵살하지 않겠다 약속하겠소.

Source: Ah, the pain fades ….\n\nThat was blood, wasn't it? You gave me Gloria's blood, didn't you? Just one more thing Faolchu must pay for.
Target: 아, 고통이 없어지는군 ...\n\n그건 피였어, 그렇지? 넌 내게 글로리아의 피를 줬어. 팔츄가 대가를 치러야할 것이 하나 더 늘어났군.

Source: I should return to our camp and help protect the villagers. My sisters will continue to look into the madness that occurred here. Perhaps you could help them, if you have an interest.\n\nYou have earned my respect, stone-dweller. Thank you.
Target: 난 야영지로 돌아가 마을 사람들을 보호하는 걸 도와야해. 내 자매들은 여기서 일어난 광기를 계속 조사할 거야. 관심이 있다면 아마 그들을 도울 수 있겠지.\n\n넌 돌로 만든 도시에서 살지만, 넌 내 존경을 받을 자격이 있어. 고마워.

Source: So Gloria was right. I suppose I should have known. At least we'll be better prepared this time.\n\nAnd it seems I'm once again in your debt.
Target: 그렇군. 글로리아(Gloria)가 옳았어. 내가 더 일찍 알아채야 했는데. 그래도 이번엔 더 잘 준비할 수 있겠지.\n\n그리고 난 또 한번 당신에게 빚을 졌군.

Source: The remaining fires should burn out soon. You did what you could, but the forest's rage has ravaged this village. \n\nIt's terrible, for sure, but a small part of me is thankful that these saws won't operate again.
Target: 나머지 불은 곧 꺼질 거야. 넌 네가 할 수 있는 걸 했지만, 숲의 분노는 이 마을을 집어 삼켰어.\n\n물론 끔찍한 일이지, 하지만 이런 일이 다시는 일어나지 않을 거라니 조금은 감사하네.

Source: I must train with the Dragonhorn and prepare for what lies ahead. And so must you, warrior. \n\nWhen the time comes, I will call for your aid. Together, we shall fight back against the Dragons and drive them from Elsweyr. This, I swear to you.
Target: I must train with the Dragonhorn and prepare for what lies ahead. And so must you, warrior. \n\nWhen the time comes, I will call for your aid. Together, we shall fight back against the Dragons and drive them from Elsweyr. This, I swear to you.

Source: Regarding Artorius and the Black Dragon? No. That threat has passed.\n\nBut there is one more thing. Step back, Assassin, and prepare yourself.
Target: Artorius와 Black Dragon에 대해 말인가? 아니. 그 위협은 지나간 일일세.\n\n하지만 한 가지가 더 있지. 암살자여, 한 걸음 물러나 준비하게.

Source: We also need to learn more about this Dragon, Laatvulon. If it does indeed wish to destroy all of Tamriel, then an alliance is our best way to end that threat.\n\nI'm just glad I have your support in this. Your help has already been invaluable.
Target: We also need to learn more about this Dragon, Laatvulon. If it does indeed wish to destroy all of Tamriel, then an alliance is our best way to end that threat.\n\nI'm just glad I have your support in this. Your help has already been invaluable.

Source: Then we must do everything in our power to stop them. \n\nThank you for taking this risk, my friend. Through your actions, we know where the cult plans to strike next. Here, another treasure from the sanctum's stores. You've certainly earned it.
Target: Then we must do everything in our power to stop them. \n\nThank you for taking this risk, my friend. Through your actions, we know where the cult plans to strike next. Here, another treasure from the sanctum's stores. You've certainly earned it.

Source: And I'll see to Hildegard's punishment personally. But I'm more disturbed by the priests of Akatosh. First the Sermonizers, now this. Are they just trying to take advantage of our recent setbacks or is there something more going on here?
Target: And I'll see to Hildegard's punishment personally. But I'm more disturbed by the priests of Akatosh. First the Sermonizers, now this. Are they just trying to take advantage of our recent setbacks or is there something more going on here?

Source: I found these. I hope it's enough.
Target: 저는 이것들을 발견했습니다. 이걸로 충분했으면 좋겠군요.

Source: Agreed. The mill is safe for now, but we need to get the villagers out of here.
Target: 동의해. 제분소는 지금은 안전하지만, 마을 사람들을 여기서 나가게 해야 해.

Source: Oh, my! I didn't think I'd see this again. And it's still sealed! This means the world to me. There are so many good memories in this box.\n\nYour kindness is appreciated. And here's the reward I promised you.
Target: Oh, my! I didn't think I'd see this again. And it's still sealed! This means the world to me. There are so many good memories in this box.\n\nYour kindness is appreciated. And here's the reward I promised you.

Source: <<1>>? That poor village.\n\nI hope the Shadowscales made the Dominion's conquest a costly one!
Target: <<1>>? That poor village.\n\nI hope the Shadowscales made the Dominion's conquest a costly one!

Source: Well done. With the nobles safe, my guards can storm the camp without worry. We won't have any trouble rounding up the rest of these Red Rook thieves.\n\nHere. Compliments of the Daggerfall Watch.
Target: Well done. With the nobles safe, my guards can storm the camp without worry. We won't have any trouble rounding up the rest of these Red Rook thieves.\n\nHere. Compliments of the Daggerfall Watch.

Source: You're dubious. Skeptical. That's good. All I ask is that you consider it and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.
Target: You're dubious. Skeptical. That's good. All I ask is that you consider it and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.

Source: What a daring rescue. This is quite exciting!\n\nLook, everyone! We have wolf's woe. This will be an adventure!
Target: What a daring rescue. This is quite exciting!\n\nLook, everyone! We have wolf's woe. This will be an adventure!

Source: I'm sure you did all that you could. We have to be grateful for what we have saved, not for what we have lost. I'll begin my research on his notes to see what damage his magic may have caused.\n\nI thank you for your service.
Target: 할수있는건 모두 해줬네. 잃어버린 것이 아닌 구한것에 감사를 해야할것같아. 마법이 일으킨 손해를 가늠하기 위해서 쪽지의 연구를 시작할거야.\n\n일을 해줘서 고마워.

Source: This means a lot. Really. I don't have much left to remember him by. The things in this pack, and the condolences of the legion paymaster every month when I collect his due.\n\nTake the gold. I don't need it. You've more than earned it.
Target: 이것은 많은 것을 의미해요. 정말로. 나는 그를 기억할 만한 것이 별로 남아 있지 않아요. 이 짐의 물건들, 그리고 내가 매달 군단 봉급담당자에게 납부를 받을 때 애도의 뜻을 표할거에요.\n\n금화을 가져가세요. 저는 그것이 필요하지 않아요. 그것을 얻은 당신보다 더 큰 의미가 있는 것 을 가지고 있으니까요.

Source: Looks like it's seen better days, but I'm sure that's no fault of yours. I'll have it mended and return it to its rightful owner. He's a good man, and if this will bring him some comfort I'm glad we could help.\n\nAnother job well done.
Target: Looks like it's seen better days, but I'm sure that's no fault of yours. I'll have it mended and return it to its rightful owner. He's a good man, and if this will bring him some comfort I'm glad we could help.\n\nAnother job well done.

Source: <Attached to the bounty board is a message from General Dar-Liurz:>\n\n"Your prowess in hunting enemy Wardens has gained you great renown. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron, I leave this reward for your efforts."
Target: 상금판에 다-리어즈 대장의 메시지가 붙어있다:\n\n\\"적 워든을 정복하려는 용감함은 당신의 명성에 걸맞는 것이다. 짐머론 대장군을 대신에 당신에게 보수를 하사한다\"\""

Source: <Nailed to the bounty board is a scrawled note from General Khamagash:>\n\n"When you've killed your quota of enemy Wardens, take your reward."
Target: 상금판에 카마가쉬 대장이 휘갈겨쓴 쪽지가 붙어있다:\n\n\\"해당분의 적 워든을 죽인 자에겐 보수를 주겠다\"\""

Source: Hard to picture a noble wearing this, isn't it? I thought so too. Her husband was a pauper. She had more wealth than he could dream of, but he insisted on buying her ring. Can't put a price on that.\n\nSee you tomorrow then, if you're available.
Target: Hard to picture a noble wearing this, isn't it? I thought so too. Her husband was a pauper. She had more wealth than he could dream of, but he insisted on buying her ring. Can't put a price on that.\n\nSee you tomorrow then, if you're available.

Source: So you did! Some of the sailors you freed already made it back to Abah's Landing as well. Seems they told the captain about you and he's offering to pay us a bit extra for the effort. \n\nNot a bad day's work. I appreciate the help, my friend.
Target: 해내셨군요! 당신이 풀어줬던 선원들은 이미 아바스 랜딩으로 돌아왔습니다. 선장에게 당신에 관해 말한 것 같더군요. 그리고 선장은 노력에 대한 보답으로 우리에게 추가 보수를 약간 더 지불했습니다.\n\n나쁘지 않게 처리했어요. 도와줘서 고마워요, 친구.

Source: <Pinned to the bounty board is a note from General Thoron:>\n\n"I received word of your success in slaying enemy Wardens, soldier. Accept this bonus pay. It has been well-earned!"
Target: 상금판에 소론 대장의 메모가 붙어 있다:\n\n\\"병사여
column4: 적 워든을 죽였다고 들었네. 이 보수를 받게. 당연한 결과지!\"\""

Source: <Attached to the bounty board is a message from General Dar-Liurz:>\n\n"Your prowess in hunting enemy Necromancers has gained you great renown. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron, I leave this reward for your efforts."
Target: <Attached to the bounty board is a message from General Dar-Liurz:>\n\n\\"Your prowess in hunting enemy Necromancers has gained you great renown. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron
column4: I leave this reward for your efforts.\"\""

Source: Ha! You did! May not look like much, but it'll make a world o' difference to the old hand. Funny how objects take root in a body, after so long they just seem to become part of a person.\n\nHere's your pay, as promised.
Target: 하! 해내셨군요! 별로 대단치 않아 보일 수 있지만, 노련한 사람에겐 하늘과 땅 차이죠. 한 물건이 어떤 이의 일부가 되고 나면 그것들이 얼마나 소중해지는 지, 그걸 보면 우습죠.\n\n 여기 약속한 대로 보수입니다.

Source: Got the day off in Aldcroft? Can't say I envy you. Gloomy town. Save for this one Argonian. You'd know her if you saw her. Runs a winery. Loves her product as much as I do. It warms my heart. Oh wait. I had to kill her. Pity.\n\nYour gold. Good work.
Target: Got the day off in Aldcroft? Can't say I envy you. Gloomy town. Save for this one Argonian. You'd know her if you saw her. Runs a winery. Loves her product as much as I do. It warms my heart. Oh wait. I had to kill her. Pity.\n\nYour gold. Good work.

Source: <Nailed to the bounty board is a scrawled note from General Khamagash:>\n\n"When you've killed your quota of enemy Necromancers, take your reward."
Target: <Nailed to the bounty board is a scrawled note from General Khamagash:>\n\n\\"When you've killed your quota of enemy Necromancers
column4: take your reward.\"\""

Source: Throwing dagger? No? I don't know why no one else finds that funny. The last time I visited Daggerfall Castle, I left mine in a sentry. Had to borrow another one from the kitchen. Decent sandwiches. Had three before I left.\n\nAnyway, here's your gold.
Target: Throwing dagger? No? I don't know why no one else finds that funny. The last time I visited Daggerfall Castle, I left mine in a sentry. Had to borrow another one from the kitchen. Decent sandwiches. Had three before I left.\n\nAnyway, here's your gold.

Source: <<1>> was pleased to hear I had collected heads and burned territory markers. I've stopped the goblins from laying claim to Cumberland's Watch.
Target: <<1>> was pleased to hear I had collected heads and burned territory markers. I've stopped the goblins from laying claim to Cumberland's Watch.

Source: With Svargrim's help, the Gray Host might already be prepared to summon their harrowstorm.
Target: With Svargrim's help, the Gray Host might already be prepared to summon their harrowstorm.

Source: What will you do?
Target: 어떻게 하실 건가요?

Source: I did help him regain control of his emotions.
Target: I did help him regain control of his emotions.

Source: His Lordship? Keep this quiet or we'll never find the assassins in time. \n\nDivines help us if the King is killed. It could destroy the alliance!
Target: 전하가? 이걸 비밀로 하지 않으면 제 시간 안에 암살자들을 찾지 못할 거야.\n\n만약 왕이 죽으면... 디바인들이여 도와주소서. 그건 동맹을 파괴시킬 수 있어!

Source: What am I supposed to do?
Target: What am I supposed to do?

Source: Does Reaper's March count as an escape?
Target: 리퍼스 마치로 간 것도 탈출이라고 할 수 있을까요?

Source: You'll know when the time comes. By now, my agents should have retaken Murkwater. They'll be celebrating in the village as we speak.
Target: 때가 되면 알게 될거야. 지금은, 내 요원들이 머크워터를 되찾아야 해. 우리가 말 하는 동안 그들은 마을에서 축하를 하고 있을거야.

Source: In honor of your selfless dedication, your unwavering courage, and the incredible service you have done the kingdom, I have a gift.\n \nThis was one of Sentinel's greatest treasures. Now it is yours. I know you will use it well.
Target: 자네의 아낌없는 헌신, 확고한 용기, 그리고 왕국을 위해 해준 믿을 수 없는 업적들을 기리며 자네에게 선물을 주겠네.\n\n이것은 센티넬의 가장 위대한 보물 중 하나였지만, 이제 자네의 것일세. 자네라면 이것을 잘 사용해 주겠지.

Source: The storm has stopped. You should be safe now.
Target: The storm has stopped. You should be safe now.

Source: You were with the Resistance at Arenthia. Bright moons!
Target: 아렌시아에서 저항군과 함께 하셨군요. 빛나는 달들이시여!

Source: He's gone.
Target: He's gone.

Source: What will happen now?
Target: What will happen now?

Source: Still, we can't lower our defenses yet. This was just one piece of the Maulborn scheme. \n\nBut for now, the Gorge—and Mournhold—are safe.
Target: 여전히 방어선을 낮출 수 없습니다. 이것은 마울본 계획의 일부분에 지나지 않습니다.\n\n하지만, 적어도 이 협곡과 모운홀드는 안전해요.

Source: Daggerfall has these curious little sausages in a sweet brine. Addictive as Skooma and twice as tasty. Reminds me of a contract. Client wanted the target's pinkies sliced off. Ah, memories!\n\nNext time, bring back a few sausages. Here's your gold.
Target: Daggerfall has these curious little sausages in a sweet brine. Addictive as Skooma and twice as tasty. Reminds me of a contract. Client wanted the target's pinkies sliced off. Ah, memories!\n\nNext time, bring back a few sausages. Here's your gold.

Source: <Pinned to the bounty board is a note from General Thoron:>\n\n"I received word of your success in slaying enemy Necromancers, soldier. Accept this bonus pay. It has been well-earned!"
Target: <Pinned to the bounty board is a note from General Thoron:>\n\n\\"I received word of your success in slaying enemy Necromancers
column4: soldier. Accept this bonus pay. It has been well-earned!\"\""

Source: Daggerfall's docks are a tricky place. Lots of trade, lots of witnesses. Great place to pick up a bargain, though. Bought a whole crate of local funerary decorations a while back. Little touch of home for the departed.\n\nGot your pay right here.
Target: Daggerfall's docks are a tricky place. Lots of trade, lots of witnesses. Great place to pick up a bargain, though. Bought a whole crate of local funerary decorations a while back. Little touch of home for the departed.\n\nGot your pay right here.

Source: Oh! Well, everyone's experience is different, to be sure. \n\nBut don't let that keep you from getting out there and making a legend for yourself. The Whitestrake will walk in your steps and goad you to righteous fury!
Target: 오, 글쎄, 확실히 경험은 사람마다 제각각이야.\n\n그래도 저곳에 가서 전설이 될수는 있어. 화이트스트레이크는 너와 함께 걷고 정의로운 분노를 내뿜겠지!

Source: Maybe a cute little Wood Elf to warm up my bed, but I'd probably fall asleep before we got to the good stuff.\n\nJust stay sharp, New-blade. The roots of our trouble stretch deep below the soil. Things are going to get worse, my friend. Mark my words.
Target: Maybe a cute little Wood Elf to warm up my bed, but I'd probably fall asleep before we got to the good stuff.\n\nJust stay sharp, New-blade. The roots of our trouble stretch deep below the soil. Things are going to get worse, my friend. Mark my words.

Source: And we'll find that way. Somehow. For now, rest. Prepare yourself.\n\nAnd take this for your efforts. Remember, you confirmed Kaalgrontiid's plan and removed Dragonhold's protection. We're one step closer to ending this, my friend.
Target: And we'll find that way. Somehow. For now, rest. Prepare yourself.\n\nAnd take this for your efforts. Remember, you confirmed Kaalgrontiid's plan and removed Dragonhold's protection. We're one step closer to ending this, my friend.

Source: Another corpse for Cath Bedraud—let's hope it stays put! Used to be a good place to think before the dead started shambling about.\n\nDon't worry. You completed the contract. It's not our fault if some people don't have the good graces to stay dead.
Target: Another corpse for Cath Bedraud—let's hope it stays put! Used to be a good place to think before the dead started shambling about.\n\nDon't worry. You completed the contract. It's not our fault if some people don't have the good graces to stay dead.

Source: I do, but first I have something for you. I found it in the sanctum's treasury.\n\nBut let's keep this between us. If a certain smuggling crew knew we had a treasury, they'd empty it faster than Za'ji can drain a bottle of plum brandy.
Target: I do, but first I have something for you. I found it in the sanctum's treasury.\n\nBut let's keep this between us. If a certain smuggling crew knew we had a treasury, they'd empty it faster than Za'ji can drain a bottle of plum brandy.

Source: The Thizzrini champion! Here, before me!
Target: The Thizzrini champion! Here, before me!

Source: Then I believe a new title is in order, Initiate. You've demonstrated skills and abilities that we will definitely need in the battles to come.\n\nStand tall, Assassin. You've earned your place in the Brotherhood and we're proud to have you among us.
Target: Then I believe a new title is in order, Initiate. You've demonstrated skills and abilities that we will definitely need in the battles to come.\n\nStand tall, Assassin. You've earned your place in the Brotherhood and we're proud to have you among us.

Source: test
Target: 테스트

Source: Eventually. When Artorius feels the time is right. But he'll hesitate to make the first move, to send his soldiers into our viper's nest. We have time to prepare.\n\nIn the meantime, I'll confer with the Speaker. When you return, the Primate will die.
Target: Eventually. When Artorius feels the time is right. But he'll hesitate to make the first move, to send his soldiers into our viper's nest. We have time to prepare.\n\nIn the meantime, I'll confer with the Speaker. When you return, the Primate will die.

Source: Those who risk nothing inadvertently risk it all. Either we face this single Dragon to gain a Dragonhorn, or we face a horde without such a weapon at our side.\n\nBut what's risk without reward? Here's something for the aid you provided thus far.
Target: Those who risk nothing inadvertently risk it all. Either we face this single Dragon to gain a Dragonhorn, or we face a horde without such a weapon at our side.\n\nBut what's risk without reward? Here's something for the aid you provided thus far.

Source: Would you prefer punishment to praise, Assassin? Let the Black Hand decide how we navigate these troubled waters. For now, work your contracts. Sharpen your skills.\n\nThe Black Dragon will pay for her transgressions, as will her master, Artorius.
Target: 상으로 처벌이라도 받고 싶은 것이냐? 블랙 핸드들이 이 문제를 어떻게 해결할 지에 대한 답을 내 놓을 때 까지 기다리자. 그러는 동안 계약을 처리 하거라. 네 솜씨를 늘려야지.\n\n블랙 드래곤은 아르토리우스와 함께 패륜의 죗값을 치룰 것이다.

Source: I thought someone might be able to make use of it. It's yours.
Target: 누군가는 이걸 유용하게 쓸 수 있을 거라고 생각했죠. 당신한테 드릴게요.

Source: What?
Target: What?

Source: I found the texts that you wanted.
Target: 당신이 원하던 자료들을 찾았어.

Source: Indeed. It sounds like he needs me.
Target: 그렇군요. 폐하께서 저를 필요로 하시는 것처럼 들리는군요.

Source: I don't know what to say. Thank you.\n\nI'll find a way to make up for this. I swear it.
Target: 당신에게 뭐라 말씀 드려야할지 모르겠습니다.정말 감사합니다.\n\n이 일을 만회할 방법을 찾아내겠습니다.맹세합니다.

Source: All who helped conquer Black Boot Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin
Target: All who helped conquer Black Boot Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin

Source: Truly the Three have touched this temple! The spirits of past Ordinators now guard our walls. Peace at last.\n\nNow if only … wait, who is that?
Target: 진실로 세 명의 신들께서 이 사원을 살피시는구나! 그 옛날 신성집행관의 영혼들이 우리를 지켜주고 있다. 드디어 평화가 찾아 왔네.\n\n이제... 잠깐, 이게 누군가?

Source: The lumbermill at Castle Bloodmayne now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba
Target: The lumbermill at Castle Bloodmayne now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba

Source: The lumbermill at Castle Roebeck now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba
Target: The lumbermill at Castle Roebeck now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba

Source: So what happens now?
Target: 그럼 이제 어떻게 되는거야?

Source: When you banished Namira's corruption, you allowed me to reconnect with the Hist throughout Xal Ithix. There is still work to be done, but, thanks to you, we can now complete the cleansing.\n\nThank you. You will be remembered.
Target: When you banished Namira's corruption, you allowed me to reconnect with the Hist throughout Xal Ithix. There is still work to be done, but, thanks to you, we can now complete the cleansing.\n\nThank you. You will be remembered.

Source: Brindle Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin
Target: Brindle Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin

Source: It is well. You've proven the strength of my Great House, and you brought my son home safely.\n\nI now name you the Hand of Dres and offer you my aid, should you need it in the future. To their friends, the Dres are generous.
Target: 좋아. 우리 가문의 힘을 증명해 주었군. 내 아들도 무사히 되찾아 주었고 말이야.\n\n자네를 드레스 가문의 수호자로 임명하고, 필요할 경우 지원을 해주겠네. 드레스 가문은 협력자들에게 관대함을 베풀지.

Source: Alessia Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin
Target: Alessia Lumbermill is now in Dominion hands. All who helped—take your rewards with my thanks!\n\n- Grand Warlord Sorcalin

Source: All who helped conquer Faregyl Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin
Target: All who helped conquer Faregyl Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin

Source: All who helped conquer Blue Road Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin
Target: All who helped conquer Blue Road Lumbermill have earned the Dominion's thanks. Accept your rewards.\n\n- Scribe Fireluin

Source: I … do not understand these words. But their performance is said to have made Dark Elves writhe on the ground with laughter. Perhaps this will finally immerse me in the River of Humor.\n\nHere we go.
Target: I … do not understand these words. But their performance is said to have made Dark Elves writhe on the ground with laughter. Perhaps this will finally immerse me in the River of Humor.\n\nHere we go.

Source: The lumbermill at Drakelowe now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba
Target: The lumbermill at Drakelowe now supplies wood for our siege weapons. The Dominion offers its gratitude, warriors!\n\n- General Atahba

Source: We weren't able to save Karthwatch.
Target: We weren't able to save Karthwatch.

Source: <Nailed to the bounty board is a scrawled note from General Khamagash:>\n\n"When you've killed your quota of enemy Sorcerers, take your reward."
Target: <Nailed to the bounty board is a scrawled note from General Khamagash:>\n\n\\"When you've killed your quota of enemy Sorcerers
column4: take your reward.\"\""

Source: I'll find your body and your crown. Also, I still need to return your amulet to your tomb.
Target: I'll find your body and your crown. Also, I still need to return your amulet to your tomb.

Source: <Pinned to the bounty board is a note from General Thoron:>\n\n"I received word of your success in slaying enemy Sorcerers, soldier. Accept this reward. It has been well-earned!"
Target: <Pinned to the bounty board is a note from General Thoron:>\n\n\\"I received word of your success in slaying enemy Sorcerers
column4: soldier. Accept this reward. It has been well-earned!\"\""

Source: Now there are a few less of them.
Target: 이제 녀석들 머릿수가 좀 줄었죠.

Source: Are you, now? You're the first one today who still has all his arms and legs.\n\nAh, these are pretty. Pretty disgusting! Ha! Here, take your gold.
Target: 지금? 팔 다리가 아직까지 모두 붙어있는 사람을 오늘 처음 보는구만!\n\n아, 이것들 참. 참 역겨워! 하! 여기, 돈 받아가.

Source: <Attached to the bounty board is a message from General Dar-Liurz:>\n\n"Your prowess in hunting enemy Sorcerers has gained you great renown. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron, I leave this reward for your efforts."
Target: <Attached to the bounty board is a message from General Dar-Liurz:>\n\n\\"Your prowess in hunting enemy Sorcerers has gained you great renown. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron
column4: I leave this reward for your efforts.\"\""

Source: He appeared? He appeared and spoke about me? I recognize this satchel. What's inside it? \n\nOh, Poppa. Ever the pragmatist. There's enough here to get supplies in Aldcroft. Then I can go on to Crosswych.
Target: 아버지가 나타났어요? 아버지가 나타나서 나에 대해 말했어요? 이 가방을 알아보겠어요. 가방 안에 뭐가 있나요?\n\n오, 아빠. 아빠는 항상 현실적이셨죠. 알드크로프트(Aldcroft)에서 보급품을 사기에 충분하네요. 그리고 나서 크로스위치(Crosswych)로 갈 수 있을 거에요.

Source: I have your banner here.
Target: 여기 당신 깃발이에요.

Source: Yes.
Target: 네.

Source: Is there something you need me to do?
Target: Is there something you need me to do?

Source: Pinned to the Bounty board is a note:\n\n"We have received word of your success, soldier. Accept this bonus pay. It has been well-earned!"
Target: Pinned to the Bounty board is a note:\n\n\\"We have received word of your success
column4: soldier. Accept this bonus pay. It has been well-earned!\"\""

Source: Mmhmm. Mmhmm. So you did. I guess we'll see how good this lot is at improvisation.\n\nHere's your pay, plus a bonus to please keep this stuff away from Andarri.
Target: Mmhmm. Mmhmm. So you did. I guess we'll see how good this lot is at improvisation.\n\nHere's your pay, plus a bonus to please keep this stuff away from Andarri.

Source: Let's see what you nicked … Not much, is it? A few more unruly bards getting a lesson in tragedy is worth something though. \n\nHere's your cut.
Target: Let's see what you nicked … Not much, is it? A few more unruly bards getting a lesson in tragedy is worth something though. \n\nHere's your cut.

Source: What do you think we should do?
Target: 우리가 어떻게 하면 좋겠습니까?

Source: No kidding. Did you rob a whole troupe or something? Maybe they'll think twice about mouthing off about us in the future.\n\nHave a night on the town courtesy of the guild.
Target: 정말이네. 극단 전체나 뭔가를 턴 거야? 아마 놈들은 앞으로 우리에 대해 투덜대는 걸 두 번 생각하게 될 거야.\n\n길드에서 좋은 밤 보내라고.

Source: What are you going to do?
Target: 어떻게 하실 건가요?

Source: Oh? Let me tally it. Yes, uh-huh, ouch—stupid, sharp—all right. This should put a dent in their business, and their egos.\n\nGood work, your pay.
Target: Oh? Let me tally it. Yes, uh-huh, ouch—stupid, sharp—all right. This should put a dent in their business, and their egos.\n\nGood work, your pay.

Source: Arkay bless you, for the living will rest easier now that Virmaril is gone. But I sense … something.\n\nI will remain here. Where necromancy is concerned, who can say what is possible? If Virmaril rises again, someone will need to take action.
Target: Arkay bless you, for the living will rest easier now that Virmaril is gone. But I sense … something.\n\nI will remain here. Where necromancy is concerned, who can say what is possible? If Virmaril rises again, someone will need to take action.

Source: Let's see how many that actually is … Hm. Thought it would be more.\n\nIt's easy arithmetic, at least. Here's your gold.
Target: Let's see how many that actually is … Hm. Thought it would be more.\n\nIt's easy arithmetic, at least. Here's your gold.

Source: Oof, it's heavy! Just shear the sheep, don't steal the whole mutton.\n\nShaking up those laborers is worth a good bit to the guild. Here, you earned it.
Target: Oof, it's heavy! Just shear the sheep, don't steal the whole mutton.\n\nShaking up those laborers is worth a good bit to the guild. Here, you earned it.

Source: Yes, here's Meridia's Brilliance.
Target: Yes, here's Meridia's Brilliance.

Source: How long has the king been here?
Target: 왕께서 여기 도착하신지 얼마나 지났습니까?

Source: I found everything on the list.
Target: 목록에 있던 모든 물건을 찾았다.

Source: Killed Helenus
Target: Killed Helenus

Source: You killed him?
Target: 당신이 그를 죽였습니까?

Source: Indeed. With Mother Murk gone, the hags will wither and the Wyrd will prosper. \n\nYou, however, have somewhere else to be. I see a long road ahead of you, traveler. Tread carefully.
Target: 그래요. Mother Murk의 죽음으로, 해그들은 시들 것이고 Wyrd는 번성할 거예요.\n\n하지만 당신은 가야할 곳이 또 있어요. 나는 당신의 앞에 펼쳐진 긴 길을 보았습니다, 여행자여.  신중히 발을 디디세요.

Source: And so we did. Cassipia and Little Leaf's deaths were regrettable, but they were a necessary evil in our efforts to save Craglorn.\n\nYou have provided another great service to the Guardian Celestials. For that, you have my gratitude.
Target: And so we did. Cassipia and Little Leaf's deaths were regrettable, but they were a necessary evil in our efforts to save Craglorn.\n\nYou have provided another great service to the Guardian Celestials. For that, you have my gratitude.

Source: And this is for you—shrouded armor, the uniform of the Dark Brotherhood. You're one of the family now. You might as well look the part. And since you showed such expertise with the Blade of Woe, take this as well.\n\nI expect great things, Initiate.
Target: 그리고 이건 네 몫이다—다크 브라더 후드의 제복인 가려진 갑옷이지. 이제 넌 가족의 일원이다. 알맞은 옷을 입는 게 좋을 거야. 그리고 비통의 검을 잘 활용했으니, 이것도 가져 가거라.\n\n큰 기대를 걸지, 신입.

Source: Of course! And I will do what I can to dissuade others from entering this portion of the city again.\n\nPerhaps some day we can seal the ruins completely, as the Yokudans tried to do. For now, be content that the wards have bought us time.
Target: Of course! And I will do what I can to dissuade others from entering this portion of the city again.\n\nPerhaps some day we can seal the ruins completely, as the Yokudans tried to do. For now, be content that the wards have bought us time.

Source: You're dubious. Skeptical. That's good. All I ask is that you consider it and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.
Target: 당신 의심이 많네요. 회의적이고요. 좋아요. 내가 부탁하는 것은 이 제안을 잘 생각해보고 계속 경계하라는 거예요. 저도 똑같이 할 거고요. 작은 시작 같은 거예요. 간단하죠.\n\n당신이 내가 생각하는 것의 반만큼 능력이 있다면, 우리는 곧 다시 말 날 거예요.

Source: I must inform the Psijic Ritemaster. If Daedra have breached the gates of the Clockwork City, we must move swiftly.\n\nAs for you, I would counsel vigilance. Whoever set these events in motion no doubt sees you as a threat. Take this, and my thanks.
Target: 나는 빨리 시직의 라이트 마스터에게 알리러 가야겠네. 데이드라가 클락워크 시티의 게이트를 통과했었다면, 우리는 신속하게 움직여야만 하네. \n\n자네도 조심하게. 이 음모의 배후에 있는 자들이, 자네를 위협적인 존재로 인식했을 걸세. 이거 받게, 그리고 정말 고맙네.

Source: The Bad Man is no more.
Target: The Bad Man is no more.

Source: A bandit was carrying this.
Target: A bandit was carrying this.

Source: Oh, my apologies. You must be the stranger who helped my sisters at Deleyn's Mill.\n\nI'm honored to meet you.
Target: 오, 미안해. 넌 델린의 제분소에서 내 자매들을 도왔던 이방인이 틀림 없구나.\n\n만나서 영광이야.

Source: I can understand if you're dubious. Skeptical. I would be. All I ask is that you go to the districts and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.
Target: I can understand if you're dubious. Skeptical. I would be. All I ask is that you go to the districts and stay watchful. I'll do the same. Small beginnings and such. Simple.\n\nIf you're half as capable as I think you are, we'll be meeting again soon.

Source: I must inform the Psijic Ritemaster. If Daedra have breached the gates of the Clockwork City, anything is possible. We must be prepared.\n\nPlease, take this as a token of the Psijic Order's appreciation—and mine.
Target: 나는 빨리 시직의 라이트 마스터에게 알리러 가야겠네. 데이드라가 클락워크 시티의 게이트를 통과했었다면, 그들에게 불가능 한것은 없을 걸세. 우리는 만약의 사태를 준비를 해야 만 하네.\n\n시직 오더와 나의 감사의 표시로 이걸 받아주게.

Source: I'm here because the one I loved gave up everything that day to save his people.\n\nYou seek answers. I'm here to help you find them and hopefully avoid the tragedy that occured on that long ago day.
Target: 내가 사랑했던 사람이 그 날, 사람들을 구하기 위해 모든 것을 포기했기 때문에 이 곳에 왔습니다.\n\n당신은 답을 구하고 있죠. 나는 당신이 그 답을 찾는 것을 도와줄 것입니다. 오래 전 그날 일어났던 비극을 피할 수 있도록요.

Source: Yes. They're in the crystal.
Target: 네. 수정 안에 들어있죠.

Source: Her last wish was to kill the bandit leader.
Target: Her last wish was to kill the bandit leader.

Source: You … you did? That's fantastic news. For the common good, I mean. Safety above all, that's my motto.\n\nAnd these ledgers will do just fine. Here's some gold for your trouble.
Target: You … you did? That's fantastic news. For the common good, I mean. Safety above all, that's my motto.\n\nAnd these ledgers will do just fine. Here's some gold for your trouble.

Source: Flap my feathers and call me a pigeon, but these will do nicely! Even the Duke of Crows will be impressed, and he's a hard one to please.\n\nI have something for you in return. A prize for the Blackfeather Court's favorite crow-friend.
Target: Flap my feathers and call me a pigeon, but these will do nicely! Even the Duke of Crows will be impressed, and he's a hard one to please.\n\nI have something for you in return. A prize for the Blackfeather Court's favorite crow-friend.

Source: As promised, your reward. \n\nYou have done a great service for Arkay and for me. The souls of my brave friends may rest easy now, knowing their sacrifice did not go unanswered. These pauldrons will find a place of honor in the Temple of Arkay.
Target: 약속드린대로, 여기 보상입니다.\n\n아케이와 저를 위해 큰 봉사를 하셨군요. 용감했던 형제들의 희생은 헛되지 않았고, 이제 그들의 영혼은 이제 안식을 취할 것입니다. 이 흉갑들은 아케이의 신전에 안치될 것입니다.

Source: You're welcome.
Target: 천만에요.

Source: I worked things out. He'll still transport you to Anvil Island, but expects help from your contacts.
Target: 거래가 잘 풀렸어요. 데로스가 당신을 앤빌 섬까지 데려다줄 겁니다. 하지만 당신이 연줄을 써서 데로스를 좀 도와줘야 할 거에요.

Source: I will inform the Psijic Ritemaster. Nocturnal's intrigues in the Clockwork City cannot be the end of her plot. A greater scheme is brewing, I know it. We must be prepared.\n\nIn the meantime, please take this, and my thanks.
Target: 나는 빨리 시직의 라이트 마스터에게 알리러 가야겠네. 녹터널의 음모는 클락워크 시티에서 끝나지 않을걸세. 분명 더 큰 계획을 준비중일 걸세 . 우리는 준비를 해야만 하네.\n\n우선은,이걸받아주게, 그리고 내 감사도 받아주게.

Source: Yes. I hope this is enough.
Target: 네. 이걸로 충분했으면 좋겠군요.

Source: <Pinned to the bounty board is a note from General Thoron:>\n\n"I received word of your success in slaying enemy Templars, soldier. Accept this bonus pay. It has been well-earned!"
Target: <Pinned to the bounty board is a note from General Thoron:>\n\n\\"I received word of your success in slaying enemy Templars
column4: soldier. Accept this bonus pay. It has been well-earned!\"\""

Source: Wonderful! Once I get the new dig underway, I'm sure we'll make progress quickly. I can't believe that not long ago, this was just a smoking hole in the ground. Now we may have uncovered the complex that gave Tribune's Folly its name!
Target: 훌륭해! 일단 새로 발굴을 진행하게 된다면, 분명 이전보다 빨리 진행 될거야. 얼마 전까지만 해도, 이게 땅 속에 있는 스모킹 홀에 불과했다는 게 믿기지가 않는다니까. 이제 트리뷴의 어리석음 이라는 이름의 기원을 밝혀낼 수 있을지도 몰라!

Source: Falice thanked me for healing her fellow wardens. She'll be returning to Abbey soon.
Target: Falice는 나의 치료에 고마워했다. 그녀는 Abbey로 곧 돌아갈 것이다.

Source: Nelanya is dead, and the bargain with the Toothmaul tribe is void.
Target: 넬라니아는 죽었고, 이빨망치 부족과의 거래는 무효가 되었습니다.

Source: Fennorian thinks the harrowstorms create the harrowfiends and the harrowed.
Target: Fennorian thinks the harrowstorms create the harrowfiends and the harrowed.

Source: Fenn was captured and we killed a vampire leader. We also recovered a map and documents.
Target: Fenn was captured and we killed a vampire leader. We also recovered a map and documents.

Source: Let's hope it doesn't come to that. But, Bjora seemed important to the Reach.
Target: Let's hope it doesn't come to that. But, Bjora seemed important to the Reach.

Source: No. You have done enough, more than enough.\n\nYou have restored the temple's treasures. These relics were all that was here when the temple was built … and they are all that is needed for it to be rebuilt.
Target: 아니요. 당신은 충분히 했어요, 훨씬 더 많이요.\n\n당신은 사원의 보물을 되찾았습니다. 이 유물들은 모두 사원이 지어졌을 때 있었던 것입니다 ... 그리고 모두 사원이 다시 건축되는 데 필요한 것들이죠.

Source: <Attached to the bounty board is a message from General Dar-Liurz:>\n\n"Your prowess in hunting enemy Templars has gained you great renown. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron, I leave this reward for your efforts."
Target: <Attached to the bounty board is a message from General Dar-Liurz:>\n\n\\"Your prowess in hunting enemy Templars has gained you great renown. On behalf of Grand Warlord Zimmeron
column4: I leave this reward for your efforts.\"\""

Source: The Clockwork City owes you a tremendous debt. Gascone's death is … was necessary to safeguard the people. Now we just have to follow the clues he left behind.\n\nPlease, take this. And my thanks.
Target: 클락워크 시티는 네게 엄청난 빚을 지고 말았어. 개스콘의 죽음은 … 사람들을 보호하기 위해서라도 필요했던 일이었어. 이제 그가 남긴 단서들을 추적해 봐야겠군.\n\n여기, 이것 좀 받아. 그리고 제 감사도 같이 받고.

Source: And a well-earned reward it is! I haven't seen a beating that brutal since the Spear Sisters bested the Iron Lion in nothing but their smallclothes.\n\nHere's the victory purse. I suggest you live a little before your next dance with death!
Target: And a well-earned reward it is! I haven't seen a beating that brutal since the Spear Sisters bested the Iron Lion in nothing but their smallclothes.\n\nHere's the victory purse. I suggest you live a little before your next dance with death!

Target: I'll head for Skuldafn immediately.

Target: <Nailed to the bounty board is a scrawled note from General Khamagash:>\n\n\\"When you've killed your quota of enemy Templars

Source: Perhaps. Maybe you can help us.\n\nYou're attuned to Rosalind now. If anyone can break this curse, it's you.
Target: Perhaps. Maybe you can help us.\n\nYou're attuned to Rosalind now. If anyone can break this curse, it's you.

Source: You did well to disrupt the Order's preparations and your reward includes a bonus to reflect that. I just wish we hadn't lost another Sister along the way.\n\nBut that's all for now, Assassin. <<1>> and I have much to discuss.
Target: You did well to disrupt the Order's preparations and your reward includes a bonus to reflect that. I just wish we hadn't lost another Sister along the way.\n\nBut that's all for now, Assassin. <<1>> and I have much to discuss.

Target: 네 기록을 깰 수 있는 기회가 필요하지. 어쨋든 설교사의 사제 몇 명을 죽였나?\n\n진지하게 말하는 건데 신입, 항상 날카롭게 경계하고 있으라고. 문제의 근본이 땅 밑 깊숙이 퍼져 있으니까. 상황이 더 나빠질 거야, 친구. 내 말 명심해.

Source: Small comfort that is. Chamberlain Weller and I will burn the Duke's body. In secret, of course. No one needs to know what happened here.\n\nThis was bad business. Let's bring it to an end.
Target: 작은 위안이군. 웰러(Weller)집사와 나는 공작의 시신을 태울 거야. 물론, 비밀 리에. 여기에서 무슨 일이 일어났는지 아무도 알 필요가 없지.\n\n곤란한 일이었어. 이제 끝을 보자구.

Source: Yes, Captain Juras is at rest.
Target: 네. 주라스 대장은 안식에 들었어요.

Source: Thank you. Wyress Emilie says a hag named Mother Murk was likely behind the abduction of the women. I wish we could stop her before she tries this again.\n\nAll this danger and adventure … we're so not cut out for this.
Target: 고맙습니다. Wyress 에밀리가 Mother Murk이라는 해그가 여성 납치의 배후라고 말했습니다. 그녀가 또 이런 짓을 하기 전에 막아야할텐데요.\n\n이 모든 위험과 모험 ... 우리는 이런 게 맞지 않는군요.

Source: Our torment is finally over. Rosalind has forgiven me, though Stendarr knows I don't deserve it. \n\nOur thanks for bringing peace to Westtry and rest to us all. May you walk in Stendarr's light.

Source: You've done well thus far, but I warn you, the betrayer is wicked and he will not hesitate to employ devious tricks to trap and defeat you.\n\nHe brought the greatest Sword-Disciples of the age to their knees. He will not easily be stopped.
Target: You've done well thus far, but I warn you, the betrayer is wicked and he will not hesitate to employ devious tricks to trap and defeat you.\n\nHe brought the greatest Sword-Disciples of the age to their knees. He will not easily be stopped.

Source: Indeed. It's for the best. The pits are unnecessary now that Rahni'Za is no more.

Source: Well done, five-claw! Now, Elsweyr's merchants finally have a chance to breathe!\n\nYou will take this for your trouble, yes? Strong will and good hunting.
Target: Well done, five-claw! Now, Elsweyr's merchants finally have a chance to breathe!\n\nYou will take this for your trouble, yes? Strong will and good hunting.

Source: You are nearly there. But the final trial is the hardest. You will need to pay close attention to your environment and beware Abelazar's tricks.
Target: You are nearly there. But the final trial is the hardest. You will need to pay close attention to your environment and beware Abelazar's tricks.

Source: You have bested Abelazar and conquered the trials of Rahni'Za.\n\nYou are a true Sword-Disciple. May your name ever be remembered.
Target: You have bested Abelazar and conquered the trials of Rahni'Za.\n\nYou are a true Sword-Disciple. May your name ever be remembered.

Source: Moons be praised! Necromancers should be scrawny and clever, or musclebound and stupid. Musclebound and clever is just unfair, yes?\n\nHere is your reward. Many thanks, five-claw.
Target: Moons be praised! Necromancers should be scrawny and clever, or musclebound and stupid. Musclebound and clever is just unfair, yes?\n\nHere is your reward. Many thanks, five-claw.

Source: Then let it be known that from this moment forth, you shall be called the Champion of Vivec! And along with my thanks, take this modest reward. \n\nI foresee even greater achievements in your future, but for now be content to be the hero of Morrowind!
Target: 그럼 이 순간부터 당신은 비벡의 용사라 불리는 걸 사람들에게 알리는 것이 좋을 것이다. 그리고 내 감사와 함께 약간의 보수를 받아주게.\n\n당신의 미래엔 더한 위업이 보이네. 하지만 지금은 모로윈드의 영웅으로 만족하길 바라네.

Source: If you're lying, you do so remarkably well. If you're not, it is of no concern to me. You will receive the same coinage either way.\n\nTake it and be about your business. And tell Edryno that if she fails again, I shall locate another mushroom seller.
Target: 거짓말을 하는 거라면 참 진짜같이도 말하는군. 진실이라면 나랑은 상관 없지. 어쨌든 같은 액수를 줄거야.\n\n돈을 받아. 그리고 에드리노에게 다시 한번 날 실망시키면 다른 버섯 상인을 찾을 거라고 전해.

Target: 임무: 주의를 기울이기

Source: Excellent work! Knowing you were on the job eased my mind a little.\n\nCome back tomorrow. I'll have more Dragons to hunt for you.
Target: Excellent work! Knowing you were on the job eased my mind a little.\n\nCome back tomorrow. I'll have more Dragons to hunt for you.

Source: Verandis wants us to bring the army to Shrouded Pass.
Target: Verandis wants us to bring the army to Shrouded Pass.

Source: QUEST: Incidental Damage
Target: 임무: 부수적인 피해

Source: Meet with the Ashlander tribes. Hear their problems and offer your aid. Show your respect for their traditions, and you will surely find someone willing to speak with you. \n\nHelp all you can, and let them see not everyone is our enemy.
Target: 애쉬랜더 부족들과 만나게. 문제를 듣고 도움을 주게. 그들의 전통에 대한 존경심을 나타내면 분명히 당신과 말할 수있는 사람을 찾을 수 있을거네.\n\n 할 수 있는 모든 것을 도와주게. 모두가 우리의 적이 아니라는 것을 알리게.

Source: Turn in.
Target: Turn in.

Source: I would hope. You came to us, after all.\n\nTraylan and Beleru are just down the hall. They should already have assignments for you. Speak to either of them to get started.
Target: 그럴 줄 알았어. 그래서 여기 온 걸 테니.\n\n트레일런과 벨레루는 복도 건너편 방에 있어. 아마 이미 자네에게 줄 일거리를 찾아놨을 거야. 그 둘 중 아무에게 이야기해서 일을 시작해.

Source: Is something wrong here?
Target: 여기에 무슨 일 있나요?

Source: I'm ready.
Target: 준비됐습니다.

Source: Turn in.
Target: Turn in.

Source: Poor Princess Lakana! Thank you for trying to save her.
Target: Poor Princess Lakana! Thank you for trying to save her.

Source: Turn in.
Target: Turn in.

Source: Excellent. Here's your reward. But … huh. Were these scrolls scribbled on when you found them? Looks like someone stabbed them with ink and profanity.\n\nAh, wait, does vandalism of sacred Goutfang property make you a pariah? I'll chew on that.
Target: Excellent. Here's your reward. But … huh. Were these scrolls scribbled on when you found them? Looks like someone stabbed them with ink and profanity.\n\nAh, wait, does vandalism of sacred Goutfang property make you a pariah? I'll chew on that.

Source: I defeated <<1>>.
Target: <<1>>을(를) 처리했어.

Source: Spotless work, walker! With that overgrown buzzard dealt with, the sugar traders can resume their caravans. Thank Alkosh for that! Old Ri'hirr hates an unsweetened meal.\n\nYou will take this and our thanks, yes? Yes.
Target: Spotless work, walker! With that overgrown buzzard dealt with, the sugar traders can resume their caravans. Thank Alkosh for that! Old Ri'hirr hates an unsweetened meal.\n\nYou will take this and our thanks, yes? Yes.

Source: Ha! Well done, five-claw. Well done! Old Ri'hirr only hopes she stays dead.\n\nThank you for this. Here is your reward. Well earned, yes? Yes.
Target: 하! 잘했네, 다섯 개의 발톱을 지닌 자여. 아주 잘했네! 늙은 리'히르는 그녀가 죽은 채로 있길 바란다네.\n\n정말 고맙네. 여기 보상일세. 충분하지, 그렇지? 그렇고 말고.

Source: Yes. We're both lucky to have survived.
Target: 아닙니다. 저희가 살아남은 건 행운이었습니다.

Source: I found this codebook in Edouard Celd's house.
Target: I found this codebook in Edouard Celd's house.

Source: What will you do now?
Target: 이제 어떻게 할 건가요?

Source: Yes, the house is yours "in deed."\n\nDo you … oh, never mind.
Target: 이 계약으로 이 집은 드디어 완전히 네 것이 되었어.\n\n아.. 아니, 신경쓰지마.

Source: And you brought them back? Well, that's just … wow. Why don't you just lay them down there, five-claw. Old Ri'hirr will call an adept to collect them. Very soon.\n\nNow, I'm glad to hear you settled this business. Please, take this and my thanks.
Target: And you brought them back? Well, that's just … wow. Why don't you just lay them down there, five-claw. Old Ri'hirr will call an adept to collect them. Very soon.\n\nNow, I'm glad to hear you settled this business. Please, take this and my thanks.

Source: Good! We can only hope that she will remain dead this time, yes? Old Ri'hirr is tired of foes getting back up all the time!\n\nHere's your payment. Be well, five-claw.
Target: 훌륭하군! 이번에는 그녀가 죽은 채로 있길 바란다네, 그렇지 않나? 늙은 리'히르는 적이 항상 되돌아 오는 것에 지쳤다네.\n여기 자네 보상일세. 몸조심하게 다섯-발톱

Source: She asked for my help.
Target: 어머님께서 도와달라고 부탁하시더군요.

Source: <<1>> said I should speak with you about joining <<2>>'s Briars.
Target: <<1>> said I should speak with you about joining <<2>>'s Briars.

Target: 임무: 세바스티앙(Sebastien)에게 경고하기

Source: You brought Constable Pascal to justice, didn't you? That poor man.
Target: You brought Constable Pascal to justice, didn't you? That poor man.

Source: At least he dealt with your draugr problem.
Target: 적어도 그는 당신의 드로거 문제를 처리 했습니다.

Source: Rumor is that Count Ravenwatch found something important in the Lorkrata Hills. Was it a weapon, maybe? Or an ancient artifact of incredible power?
Target: 레이븐와치 백작이 로크라타 언덕에서 중요한 걸 발견했다는 소문이 있어. 그건 아마 무기였을까? 아니면 믿을 수 없는 힘을 가진 고대 아티팩트?

Source: The draugr have been dealt with and Dren wants to help out the village with a little gold.
Target: 드로거들을 처리했으며 드렌은 약간의 돈으로 마을을 돕고 싶어해요.

Source: It's going to be like that, is it? Fine. I'll escort him to Captain Lucius myself. Maybe they'll see sense and burn him at the stake. Or maybe they'll let him go free.\n\nWhatever happens now is on your head.
Target: It's going to be like that, is it? Fine. I'll escort him to Captain Lucius myself. Maybe they'll see sense and burn him at the stake. Or maybe they'll let him go free.\n\nWhatever happens now is on your head.

Source: More sad news? This wretched domain is full of it. \n\nStill, it's better to know what happened to <<1>> than to wonder what fate befell her. Thank you for that.
Target: 또 다른 비보요? 이 끔찍한 영역은 비보로 가득하군.\n\n그래도 <<1>>에게 무슨 운명이 닥쳤나 궁금해하는 것보단 어떻게 됐는지 아는게 더 낫지. 알려줘서 고맙소.

Source: We've sent the Serpent reeling, but he will strike again.\n\nWe need to use this time to prepare our forces and free the Mage and the Warrior. The Serpent can only be defeated through the combined efforts of all three guardians.
Target: We've sent the Serpent reeling, but he will strike again.\n\nWe need to use this time to prepare our forces and free the Mage and the Warrior. The Serpent can only be defeated through the combined efforts of all three guardians.

Source: What now?
Target: 이젠 어떡하죠?

Source: What now?
Target: 이젠 어떡하죠?

Source: Here are the items you asked me to find.
Target: 여기 네가 찾아 달라 부탁한 물건들이야.

Source: I successfully used <<1>>'s <<z:2>> to defeat several Covenant invaders.
Target: I successfully used <<1>>'s <<z:2>> to defeat several Covenant invaders.

Source: I succeeded in helping Tharayya find the Guardian's Eye. Unfortunately, as she attempted to loose it from its resting place, the artifact shattered. The destruction of the artifact seemed to awaken a group of undead that we were forced to flee from.
Target: I succeeded in helping Tharayya find the Guardian's Eye. Unfortunately, as she attempted to loose it from its resting place, the artifact shattered. The destruction of the artifact seemed to awaken a group of undead that we were forced to flee from.

Source: With Reezal-Jul dead, the refugees should be safe now.
Target: 리잘-줄이 죽었으니 이제 난민들은 안전할 겁니다.

Target: 임무: 교차로

Source: QUEST: A Family Divided
Target: 임무: 분열된 가문

Source: You were at Eidolon's Hollow and survived? You must be stronger than a mammoth!
Target: You were at Eidolon's Hollow and survived? You must be stronger than a mammoth!

Source: Thank you, thank you for looking past this little indiscretion of mine. I promise it won't happen again.\n\nFor what it's worth, I'm truly sorry for the pain I caused.
Target: 고마워. 내 작은 어리석은 짓을 눈감아 줘서 고마워. 다시는 이런 일이 없을거라고 장담할게.\n\n도움이 될진 모르겠지만, 내가 일으킨 고통에 대해선 진심으로 사과하겠어.

Source: QUEST: Shornhelm
Target: 임무: Shornhelm

Source: I find this offering to be acceptable. Inside the gem, you can see the celestial bodies in their courses.\n\nThe text says the constellations are gods. They can be brought to earth using stones carved from Aetherium. Make of that what you will.
Target: I find this offering to be acceptable. Inside the gem, you can see the celestial bodies in their courses.\n\nThe text says the constellations are gods. They can be brought to earth using stones carved from Aetherium. Make of that what you will.

Source: What are you going to do with the relics now?
Target: 이제 그 유물로 어떻게 할 생각이지?

Source: Jone and Jode dance in the heavens! Soon Nirnroot wine will flow out to the thirsty people of Cyrodiil, and riches will flow back to Thalara.
Target: 존과 조드께서 하늘에서 춤을 추시는군요! 곧 넌루트 포도주가 시로딜의 목마른 사람들에게 흐르고, 부자들이 탈라라에게 다시 돌아올 거에요.

Source: What about Stibbons?
Target: 스티븐스는?

Source: I knew I could count on you. The minute I saw your face, I said to myself, "Wilminn, all your troubles are over." Bless your honest soul.\n\nNow just hand over that ash and take your reward, with my heartfelt thanks!
Target: I knew I could count on you. The minute I saw your face, I said to myself, "Wilminn, all your troubles are over." Bless your honest soul.\n\nNow just hand over that ash and take your reward, with my heartfelt thanks!

Source: A death, and an unrequited love. Sentimental, and unimportant. \n\nBut you have fulfilled your part of the bargain, so here is mine: there is a man who can help you defeat the Anka-Ra. His name is Titus Valerius, but he is not of this time.
Target: A death, and an unrequited love. Sentimental, and unimportant. \n\nBut you have fulfilled your part of the bargain, so here is mine: there is a man who can help you defeat the Anka-Ra. His name is Titus Valerius, but he is not of this time.

Source: And what about Stibbons?
Target: 스티븐스는 어때?

Source: Zeht's blessings upon you! Soon Nirnroot wine shall fill my casks and customers will flock to my brewery again.\n\nAccept these offerings in thanks, friend.
Target: 제트께서 당신을 축복하시길! 곧 넌루트 포도주가 내 술통을 채우고, 손님들이 다시금 내 양조장에 모여들거요.\n\n이걸 감사의 표시로 받아 주시구려, 친구여.

Source: The Dwemer knew things you cannot even dream.\n\nHere is your reward: the Celestials are bound to this realm by their Apex stones. These stones were constructed using knowledge stolen from the Dwemer. To defeat the Celestials, you must find the stones.
Target: The Dwemer knew things you cannot even dream.\n\nHere is your reward: the Celestials are bound to this realm by their Apex stones. These stones were constructed using knowledge stolen from the Dwemer. To defeat the Celestials, you must find the stones.

Source: You wanted to speak to me?
Target: You wanted to speak to me?

Source: Thank you. I'll treasure this always. I'll always remember your kindness. And the inspiration of my ancestors.
Target: 고마워요. 항상 이것을 소중히 간직할게요. 당신의 친절을 항상 기억할 것입니다. 그리고 제 조상들이 주신 영감도.

Source: I certainly hope so.
Target: I certainly hope so.

Source: I have. How can I help save the lake?
Target: I have. How can I help save the lake?

Source: I killed <<1>>.
Target: <<1>>을 죽였어요.

Source: We eliminated the Orcthane's spymaster and shaman.
Target: We eliminated the Orcthane's spymaster and shaman.

Source: I completed the tasks for the Argonian and Dark Elf leaders.
Target: 아르고니안과 다크엘프 지도자들을 위한 임무를 완수 했습니다.

Source: Yes, I recovered several items.
Target: 네. 몇가지 물건들을 회수했어요.

Source: I understand you were instrumental in crushing the Daggerfall army at Davon's Watch.
Target: 다본의 감시대에서 대거폴의 군대를 하는 데 자네가 중요한 역할을 했다는 것을 알고있네.

Source: Maybe the restrictions in Mournhold will ease now that the Temple is safe again.
Target: Maybe the restrictions in Mournhold will ease now that the Temple is safe again.

Source: I can't believe Vox smashed Saint Veloth's reliquary. Thank you for helping to restore it.
Target: I can't believe Vox smashed Saint Veloth's reliquary. Thank you for helping to restore it.

Source: Oh yes, my friend. Like the corrupted vines he so loved to plant, Angof's villainy reaches into the farthest corners of my kingdom. I order you to pluck out these lingering threats in my name.\n\nI shall never forget your service this day, however.
Target: Oh yes, my friend. Like the corrupted vines he so loved to plant, Angof's villainy reaches into the farthest corners of my kingdom. I order you to pluck out these lingering threats in my name.\n\nI shall never forget your service this day, however.

Source: Good. Then at least now her spirit can make the journey to the Far Shores.\n\nIf only—no, it does no good to dwell on what might have been. This is enough. Thank you.
Target: 좋은. 적어도 지금 그녀의 영혼은 파 쇼어 (Far Shores) 여행을 할 수 있습니다.\n\n만약에 - 아니오, 그것은일지도 모른 무슨에에 연연하게 좋지 않습니다. 이 정도면 충분합니다. 고맙습니다.

Source: I suspect it will be a long time before the people of Elinhir trust mages again—and with good reason. The city is in ruins and it's our fault.\n\nI'll seal off the mage towers and help rebuild the city. If they'll let me, that is.
Target: I suspect it will be a long time before the people of Elinhir trust mages again—and with good reason. The city is in ruins and it's our fault.\n\nI'll seal off the mage towers and help rebuild the city. If they'll let me, that is.

Source: May Jone, Jode, and Yenadar watch you on the road. Kala's brother will be guiding your steps. She can feel it.
Target: 존, 조드 그리고 예나다르가 당신을 길에서 지켜주기를. 칼라의 오빠가 당신의 걸음을 인도 할 것입니다. 그녀는 그것을 느낄 수 있습니다.

Source: QUEST: Simple Kill Quest
Target: 임무: 단순 살해 임무

Source: Good luck on the road. And if you find Kala's brother before she does, tell him he will need the blessings of Jone and Jode both to avoid my claws. Bah!
Target: 길에서 행운을 빌어요, 여행자님. 그리고 그녀가 찾기 전에 오빠를 찾으면 말해주세요. 내 발톱을 피하기 위해 존과 조드의 축복이 필요할 거라고. 하하!

Source: I hope not, but we can never be too cautious. \n\nIn the meantime, I will take samples of the staff to the Mages Guild for study.
Target: I hope not, but we can never be too cautious. \n\nIn the meantime, I will take samples of the staff to the Mages Guild for study.

Source: Your husband wanted to make sure you were safe.
Target: 당신 남편은 당신이 안전하길 원했습니다.

Source: I know. But still, it's so terrible. Whatever the source of this curse, you must find a way to end it.\n\nI will take Nahlia back to the main camp. Thank you for helping us.
Target: I know. But still, it's so terrible. Whatever the source of this curse, you must find a way to end it.\n\nI will take Nahlia back to the main camp. Thank you for helping us.

Source: Fire! Of course. The beast couldn't stand against its purifying flame.\n\nIn happened in the past, just as you defeated him in Camlorn. If something like him appears in the future, we'll be ready—thanks to you!
Target: 불! 물론이오. 그 짐승은 정화의 불꽃에 저항할 수 없었을 거요.\n\n당신이 캠론에서 팔츄를 무찔렀던 것처럼 과거에 일어났소. 팔츄와 같은 것이 미래에 나타나도 우리는 대비할 수 있을 거요ㅡ당신 덕분에!

Source: That's good. It was hard losing Camlorn, but I heard what you did there. Impressive work.\n\nMeanwhile, we've made significant progress here. Our research is finally beginning to yield results.
Target: That's good. It was hard losing Camlorn, but I heard what you did there. Impressive work.\n\nMeanwhile, we've made significant progress here. Our research is finally beginning to yield results.

Source: I thought as much. That's how you defeated him in Camlorn, and it matches the story my family passed down. \n\nYou really are a hero, aren't you? Maybe more than we know.
Target: I thought as much. That's how you defeated him in Camlorn, and it matches the story my family passed down. \n\nYou really are a hero, aren't you? Maybe more than we know.

Source: Malabal Tor's better off without Captain Khammo. Now the rum sells at half price.
Target: Malabal Tor's better off without Captain Khammo. Now the rum sells at half price.

Source: This one thinks the Fighters Guild is confused...why let a Daedra-worshipper live? Yes?
Target: 이 사람은 파이터스 길드가 혼란 스럽다고 생각합니다 ... 왜 데이드라 숭배자를 살려두는거죠? 예?\n

Source: I hear old Aphren's Hold is no longer haunted...if that was you, you have my thanks.
Target: I hear old Aphren's Hold is no longer haunted...if that was you, you have my thanks.

Source: My cousin was studying with Telenger at Ezduiin. Thank you for all you did there!
Target: 내 사촌이 에즈두인에서 텔렌저와 같이 연구했지. 거기서 당신이 해줬던 일은 정말 감사하게 생각하네!

Source: You're the hero who defeated Alexandra Conele at Vivec's Antlers!
Target: 비벡의 뿔에서 알렉산드라 코넬레를 물리친 당신은 영웅입니다!

Source: Why would Vox attack her own people in Selfora? It's madness!
Target: Why would Vox attack her own people in Selfora? It's madness!

Source: Oh. About that. I may have exaggerated my position here at the forge.\n\nBut don't worry. I'll find a way to get my sister what she needs for the family business. In the meantime, take this. For your trouble.
Target: Oh. About that. I may have exaggerated my position here at the forge.\n\nBut don't worry. I'll find a way to get my sister what she needs for the family business. In the meantime, take this. For your trouble.

Source: Oh, I don't have the answers. I just know we need you. Go on into the camp. Talk to Holgunn One-Eye, or better yet, talk to King Jorunn himself. Find out what they're planning.\n\nAll I can say is I'm glad you're here. They need you.
Target: 오, 저도 모른답니다. 단지 우리에게 당신이 필요하다는 것 뿐. 야영지에 들어가세요. 애꾸눈 홀건과 대화하거나 더 나은 방법은 요룬 왕께 직접 이야기하십시오. 그들의 계획을 찾아보십시오.\n\n말할 수있는 것은, 당신이 여기에 있어 기쁘다는 것입니다. 그들은 당신이 필요해요.

Source: If Bazrag ordered the attack on the temple, what should we do?
Target: 만약 바즈라그가 사원을 공격하라고 명령했다면, 우린 어떻게 해야하죠?

Source: Well, you look like you think you've won a war. What did you best up there? One of the Divines? Ha! I slay me.\n\nI hope there's something left for me to kill up there. Brulo—still nowhere to be found!
Target: Well, you look like you think you've won a war. What did you best up there? One of the Divines? Ha! I slay me.\n\nI hope there's something left for me to kill up there. Brulo—still nowhere to be found!

Source: I heard you fought beside the Champions at Grimwatch! By the Green!
Target: 당신이 그림워치에서 챔피언들과 함꼐 싸웠다는 말을 들었어요. 녹색의 가호를!

Source: I can't believe the Duke's in trouble He did so many good things for Evermore's people.
Target: I can't believe the Duke's in trouble He did so many good things for Evermore's people.

Source: So you saw everything there was to see, eh?\n\nWhat do these mages keep up there? Giant rats from their experiments? Ha! I'm joking—don't tell me. I'll see for myself, soon enough.
Target: So you saw everything there was to see, eh?\n\nWhat do these mages keep up there? Giant rats from their experiments? Ha! I'm joking—don't tell me. I'll see for myself, soon enough.

Source: Plots, plans, deception! Such times as we live in! Good thing the Duke won't be around any longer.
Target: Plots, plans, deception! Such times as we live in! Good thing the Duke won't be around any longer.

Source: I disrupted the meeting by killing the Bloodthorn envoy while disguised as a Red Rook.
Target: I disrupted the meeting by killing the Bloodthorn envoy while disguised as a Red Rook.

Source: I disrupted the meeting by killing the Bloodthorn envoy while disguised as a Red Rook.
Target: I disrupted the meeting by killing the Bloodthorn envoy while disguised as a Red Rook.

Source: Speak to Sylvian Herius
Target: 실비안 헤리우스와 대화하기

Source: You stood among the standing stones of Tanzelwil! Auri-el be praised.
Target: You stood among the standing stones of Tanzelwil! Auri-el be praised.

Source: What happens now?
Target: 무슨일이야?

Source: Gulug betrayed the clans. He says the stolen supplies were taken to Frostbreak Fortress.
Target: 구루그가 부족을 배신했습니다. 그는 도난당한 물품이 서리붕괴 요새로 옮겨졌다고 말했습니다.

Source: What will you do now, Orgotha?
Target: 이제 뭘 할 생각이지, 오르고싸?

Source: I killed the ogre chieftain who held it.
Target: 이것을 쥐고 있는 오우거 족장을 죽였습니다.

Source: To be with the Silvenar on his wedding day. Must have been a real honor for you.
Target: To be with the Silvenar on his wedding day. Must have been a real honor for you.

Source: You're the one who stopped Thallik from opening the portal to Oblivion!
Target: You're the one who stopped Thallik from opening the portal to Oblivion!

Source: Wait … they were telling the truth? I guess it makes sense. They did all look and talk the same.\n\nI must inform the Star-Gazers of this development. The tides may finally be turning in our favor!
Target: Wait … they were telling the truth? I guess it makes sense. They did all look and talk the same.\n\nI must inform the Star-Gazers of this development. The tides may finally be turning in our favor!

Source: Problem? Make that problems. Chickens eaten by predators, horses down with disease, and the damned fields!\n\nWhich problem are you here to solve, moons-blessed savior of Ezzag's humble farm?
Target: 문제? 문제들을 말해볼까. 포식자들에게 잡혀 먹히는 닭, 질병에 걸린 말, 그리고 저주받은 들판!\n\n에자그의 보잘것 없는 농장의 축복받은 달빛 구세주여, 어떤 문제를 해결하러 왔나?

Source: Oh good, another helper for Kalari. Thank you for coming over, but I am not sure you can help.
Target: 오, 칼라리를 도울 분이 또 오셨군요. 와주셔서 감사해요. 하지만 절 도와주실 수 있을지 잘 모르겠네요.

Source: Excellent! Here's your payment.\n\nI expect our dear friend will be back any moment. So, if you would like to stick around, it's sure to be an entertaining spectacle.
Target: 훌륭해! 여기 당신 보상이야.\n\n우리 친애하는 친구는 금방 돌아올 거야. 그러니까 이 주변에 붙어 있으면 분명 재밌는 구경거리를 감상할 수 있을 거라고.

Source: That was not your call! Razum-dar told you what had to be done. Now, he must carry this circlet. Search for a new place to hide it. A fearsome burden, and one he does not take lightly. Damn it!
Target: 그건 네가 결정할 문제가 아니었다고! 라줌-다르가 해야만 하는 일이라고 했었잖아. 이제 그가 이 보관을 옮겨야 해. 숨길 장소를 새로 찾아야 한단 말이야. 이런 무시무시한 짐을, 가볍게 지지 못할 짐을 지우다니. 젠장!

Source: I'm glad you learned about your past.
Target: 네 과거에 대해 알게되어 기뻐.

Source: You're a godsend! Things are still a little hazy, but I think that's the ale.\n\nTake this gold for your efforts.
Target: 신께서 자네를 보낸 게 틀림없어! 아직도 모든게 분명하진 않지만, 분명 내가 마신 맥주 때문일 거야.\n\n정말 고마워. 이 금화를 받아.

Source: In this matter, nothing. Abnur and I must confer. We will contact you again when we have more information. \n\nI did not foresee Abnur's defection, but I welcome it. Mannimarco fears him—and with good reason. He can help us. I feel certain of it.
Target: 현재로서는 아무것도 없군. 아브너와 논의를 해보겠네. 정보를 더 얻게 되면 자네에게 연락하지.\n\n아브너의 전향은 예상치 못했지만, 기쁘군. 매니마코는 아브너가 우리를 도울 수 있다고 생각했기에 그를 두려워했지. 확언 할 수 있네.

Source: I feel Zenithar's blessing on us already. May his blessing be on you as well, friend!
Target: 제니타르님의 축복이 벌써 우리에게 내려지는 것이 느껴져. 그분의 축복이 당신에게도 내려지길 바라지, 친구!

Source: QUEST: The Lost Courier
Target: 임무: 사라진 배달부

Source: Rumor has it that Deepcrag Den was sabotaged. By one of its own workers!
Target: Rumor has it that Deepcrag Den was sabotaged. By one of its own workers!

Source: It's all we have to hold on to right now. I … have my doubts, but I need to stay strong for <<1>>.\n\nBut even so, this was all worth it. Just to know there're still good people in this world. People like you.
Target: 지금 기대볼 곳은 그것밖에 없네요. 저도... 의심스럽긴 하지만, <<1>> 형을 위해서라도 계속 힘을 내야죠.\n\n효과가 없다 해도 가치있는 일이었어요. 이 세상에 여전히 좋은 사람들이 남아 있다는걸 알았잖아요. 당신같은 사람들이요.

Source: Thank Zenithar! We'll keep an eye on those Bloody Hand Goblins from now on. \n\nI hope we can buy them off with a few bushels of food next time. That usually works.
Target: 제니타르시여 감사합니다! 이제부터 핏빛손 고블린들을 계속 주시해야겠어.\n\n다음번엔 약간의 음식으로 녀석들을 매수할 수 있었으면 좋겠어. 보통은 그 방법이 먹히거든.

Source: By Kyne, you did it! I've been expecting them to attack the town any minute. Bhosek tossed me out when I tried to warn him, said he'd have my head if I didn't shut up. He'll never know you saved his town for him.
Target: Kyne이시여, 네가 해내다니! 나는 조만가 놈들이 마을로 공격해 올줄로만 알았네. 내가 Bhosek에게 경고하려 했지만, 입 닥치지 않으면 내 머리를 취하겠다더군. 그는 자네가 마을을 구한 줄도 모를거야.

Source: Unbelievable! Razum-dar, dead. I hope … Burri hopes that wherever he is, the moons shine bright upon him. If he trusted you with this task, he must have greatly respected you. Go well, soldier.
Target: 믿기질 않네요! 라줌-다르가 죽었다니. 나는... 부리는 그 사람이 어디로 갔던지, 달들께서 환하게 비춰 주시길 바랄게요. 그 사람이 당신을 믿었다면, 분명 당신을 굉장히 존경했던 거겠죠. 잘 했어요.

Source: QUEST: Find Werewolf Evidence
Target: 임무: 늑대인간 증거 찾기

Source: Bright Moons, Hallowed. Wherever Jone and Jode take you next, I hope you will remember your friend Shazah. And her sister Khali. The sisters, and the Khajiit … they will never forget you.
Target: 빛나는 달들이시여, 성자님. 당신을 존과 조드께서 다음으로 인도하시는 곳마다, 당신이 당신의 친구 샤자를 기억하기를 바랄게요. 그리고 그녀의 동생 칼리도요. 그 자매들, 그리고 카짓... 그들은 당신을 절대 잊지 않을거에요.

Source: Ra Gada or not, I owe you a debt for returning my shield. Don't think I'd be able to show my face in Windhelm without it!\n\nI've been in this tiny village long enough. It's about time I get back out there and knock in a few heads!
Target: 라 가다든 아니든, 내 방패를 돌려줬으니 내가 빚을 졌구만. 방패가 없으면 윈드헬름에 얼굴을 내밀 수도 없다고!\n\n이 쬐끄만 마을에도 충분히 오래 있었지. 이제 다시 나가서 머리통 몇 개를 때려박을 때가 왔군 그래!

Source: I thank you, my friend. From the bottom of my soul, I thank you. I don't care where we go, or what we do. What you've given back to me is priceless.
Target: I thank you, my friend. From the bottom of my soul, I thank you. I don't care where we go, or what we do. What you've given back to me is priceless.

Source: Not if I have anything to say about it. I know what this is, Hallowed. These visions … they're a future where the Mane does not lead her people. With strength as well as wisdom. This will not be our future.
Target: 제가 그것에 대해 말하지 않는다면 그렇겠죠. 저는 이게 뭔지 알아요, 성자님. 이 환영들...그것은 메인이 그녀의 사람들을 이끌지 않았을 때의 미래에요. 지혜와 힘이 있다면, 이것은 우리가 갈 미래는 아닐거에요.

Source: And I'm proud to be standing with you. Ahem. Now then. Let's focus our wits, and prepare. Let's walk the Path and see this through. The way Khali would have wanted.
Target: 그리고 나는 당신과 함께 있어 자랑스러워요.. 에헴. 지금. 우리의 지혜에 초점을 맞추고 준비해야해요. 칼리가 원했던 방법으로 말이죠.

Source: Are you the one I should thank, for saving my home from Balreth?
Target: Are you the one I should thank, for saving my home from Balreth?

Source: <<1>>! Those last words I said to her … I take it all back! Forgive me, love!\n\nPlease, go. I can't bear to speak of her anymore.
Target: <<1>>! 내가 마지막으로 했던 말... 다 취소하마! 날 용서하렴, 내 사랑!\n\n이제 자릴 비켜 주세요. 더 이상 딸 이야기는 못 견디겠네요.

Source: blah
Target: blah

Source: Best Boast we've had in years. Believe you me, Baan Dar is well pleased. Very well pleased indeed! Feel free to return to the Dance any time you want. And keep an eye out. You might see me around!
Target: 지난 몇 년 동안에 최고의 자랑 축제였어. 내가 장담하는데, 반 다르님도 정말 기뻐하셨거든. 정말 크게 기뻐하셨지! 원한다면 언제든지 춤으로 돌아가도 좋아. 눈 크게 뜨고. 주변에 내가 있을지도 모르니까!

Source: I see. So the rumors were true. Pelidil…\n\nIt is good that you brought him to his end. But I hope you aren't too weary, my Eye. Pelidil may be gone, but his actions are being felt across Valenwood. We have much left to do.
Target: 알겠다. 그 소문이 사실이었군. 펠리딜...\n\n놈을 끝장낸 것은 잘한 일이다. 허나 그대가 너무 지친 것이 아니라면 좋겠구나, 나의 눈이여. 펠리딜은 죽었지만, 놈이 한 짓은 발렌우드 전역에 남아 있다. 우리가 할 일이 많구나.

Source: Old Raz sent you, eh? That could complicate things. Thank you for telling me. The Queen's enemies are all around her. Her protectors must be vigilant at all times, and this information will be critical in their calculations.
Target: 오랜 친구 라즈가 보냈다고? 그럼 일이 복잡해지겠군. 알려줘서 고맙소. 여왕님의 주변에는 적들이 깔려 있지. 그분의 보호자들은 언제나 바짝 경계해야 한다오. 그리고 이 정보는 앞으로의 계획에 중요한 역할을 할 것이오.

Source: You did what had to be done, Hallowed. Bright moons watched you at Moonmont.
Target: 당신은 해야 할 일을 행하셨습니다, 성자님. 빛나는 달이 달언덕에서 당신을 지켜보시길.

Source: Listen. I know I've been a spineless lout, but I'm grateful for this. When we summoned those atronachs, we never imagined they'd be turned against Craglorn.\n\nIf I can ever repay the favor, let me know.
Target: 들어보게. 내가 멍청하게 굴었던 건 알아. 하지만 고맙네. 우리가 그 아트로나크들을 소환했을 때, 그들이 크래글론에 등을 돌릴 거라고는 상상도 못했어.\n\n만약 내가 그 은혜에 보답할 수 있다면 알려주게.

Source: "Speculations on a Cure for the Dreadful Corruption, Imposed by Shada on the City of Water, on the Eve of the Invasion of Tarish-Zi"?\n\nThis is Nedic! How did you? No, I don't care. This may be just what we need to help the afflicted. Many thanks!
Target: "Speculations on a Cure for the Dreadful Corruption, Imposed by Shada on the City of Water, on the Eve of the Invasion of Tarish-Zi"?\n\nThis is Nedic! How did you? No, I don't care. This may be just what we need to help the afflicted. Many thanks!

Source: The Thronekeepers are broken.\n\nStill, to consecrate the dead is my duty, and Tava's was once my home. I will go to them.
Target: The Thronekeepers are broken.\n\nStill, to consecrate the dead is my duty, and Tava's was once my home. I will go to them.

Source: It's a painful loss. Aranak was an important part of this community. He gave us contact with the outside world.\n\nI hope you'll be able to fill that role for us. You're welcome here always.
Target: 뼈아픈 손실이로군. 아라낙은 우리 공동체의 중요한 요소였소. 바깥 세상과의 접촉을 유지하게 해 줬으니 말이오.\n\n당신이 그 역할을 해 줄 수 있길 바라야겠소. 여기 온다면 언제든지 환영해 드리리다.

Source: He did? I could never have guessed how desperate our situation has become, but he was correct nonetheless.\n\nI'm glad you are here with us. I know Prince Azah feels the same.
Target: He did? I could never have guessed how desperate our situation has become, but he was correct nonetheless.\n\nI'm glad you are here with us. I know Prince Azah feels the same.

Source: Caught the King's old mage red-handed in Lodorr's tomb, did you? You've got my thanks.
Target: Caught the King's old mage red-handed in Lodorr's tomb, did you? You've got my thanks.
